1b1(rnying rgyud): chug / dab zanam/ bad na/ na nam sa byug/ dpal nga ba larnan
1b2(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// ye grol ye shes rang la shar// phye nang med pa'i zang thal
1b3(rnying rgyud): gnas// chen po lnga yi bstan pa la// rang snang chen po rnam dag yin// de yang thog ma med pa'i dus// gzhi gsum dbyer med lhun gyis grub// yang
1b4(rnying rgyud): dag ye shes snang ba dang // dag pa 'jig rten snang ba dang // ma dag 'bul pa'i snang ba gsum// dbyer med lhun gyis grub pa yin// yang dag ye shes
1b5(rnying rgyud): spang du ni// sku gsum dang sbyang lhun gyis drug/ dpeng phyogs sum sna rgya mched// dge pa 'jig rten snang ba yin// 'od la la sogs sbyin gyis grub/
2a1(rnying rgyud): mdeng rgyags su srung rgya mchad// ma dag 'khrul pa'i drang ba pang // 'byo ka sogs spyan gyis thub// dbang chags yang med pa yin/ chos te gdalab // bzlag 'dis
2a2(rnying rgyud): pa// ga rgya ga na kyi pa // gzug ga sa pa'i / de rigs mas// na ga 'i ldeg pa dang/
2a3(rnying rgyud): sa de ltar yin pa la// de las dgul pa ji ltar lags// kun bzang sangs rgyas ji ltar pags// byin rlabs 'byung ba ji ltar lags// 'khrul par snang ba ji lta bu// ldog bcas chos de gang la gsungs//
2a4(rnying rgyud): zhus so// sgra byung rin po che spungs pa las/ gleng bzhi'i le'u te dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan kun bzang gis// de las 'khrul pa bstan pa ni// kun gzhi gter gyi 'byung gnas la// lun grub pon
2a5(rnying rgyud): phyogs med klong // dper ni rgya mtsho chos mthun pa// rang byang chub gi dngos bskyod// mthing rnam gsum yid 'byas pas// 'dul chung gi mig can do// rang skar 'od lnga'i lam du zhugs// de nyid mtshan
2b1(rnying rgyud): sa rnas pas sa / mjugags gas gang// spru myos/ sa na pas s+ho// sa nga 'a na// ban sung ba kyu lus d+ha //
2b2(rnying rgyud): mes len// kun tu bzang po blo thos bzung // zlog ma'i sangs pas 'od dpag myed// sangs pas kun gyi gru bo pini// dmed pa 'i sdon ngolan// sangs rgyas thaba'i med pang med// po shes bya ba'i mi yang med// rjes surba pa'i ming pad med// chos las grol ba
2b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas yin// thig po chos sbyin po zhes spyong // bya btsal med pas dang sgrol len// dang byung ring gi 'od snang sangs// 'das pa rdze durgyas pas mchog/ don gyi sde shes bor nas shA // ye shes khong cang mi byed pas// ye shes mig can dri ma med// mngan
2b4(rnying rgyud): nga 'byed pa/ nga byung kyigs // 'dra ba'i ri rtogags kyi nang pa ma rjod// ga gi dbang nges pa ba ga ga/ na// rang mi pa du byed // sa kyi kyi bkyi poshes pas// de dang gapa mad po
2b5(rnying rgyud): shung // ma long da bu pyo rkAs phyiH// phyi nang med par mnyam pas na// mnyam pa kyi phyi nas yin// thams cad bu lus rbA byu pas// t+ya drub pa'i lo gas phyir// pe shes yin pas col btu med// don tan re shes lnga dang wAn// dardzam bu du gsum
2b6(rnying rgyud): yo nas sh+tsa// mchog sa po zugs ma 'chang // mugs ma ngadathol lam kyi marjog/ shes dang shang rig pa'i tshog/ 'dus pacoM po bas bu'i mdza// yA shes nang nal gdams pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas ku gyi dashings pa yin// zhes
2b7(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// byung po rje myos pa las/ kun tu bang po dang blang gi le'u sa gnyis pa'o// de nasags pa'i bdan pa 'is// 'gro drug la ga 'phral ba'i snang lags// des nus pas/ kun tu babang po po bka' stsal pa// zag
3a1(rnying rgyud): na du sa na du / tu
3a2(rnying rgyud): ga/ pa'i ga gas// gzigs pa'i bya gas sa par// rjegs / nabyas / sa// ma
3a3(rnying rgyud): 'i da kyi/ ci dus mtshungs rgya yang ma // ga sa byung pa par// dmyal nga mi migs yo gyu pa/ mas kyi 'bras ste bu da byen/ med patshogs rgyas pa sa padang // dede sa skyes pa'i na
3a4(rnying rgyud): sahU~M shim gsu pa/ nas sa pa'i bad khopas// 'a gyu 'am s+ho// sa nus pas/ tu nga dpos paka'argyal ro// ga thal pa
3a5(rnying rgyud): nA~M/ dbya kyi bla // chos kyi dra la byi drubs so// bas rjosams dpang rjod// demi byi byas spang bathab pa gyu/ mi thog pa'i ston pa // klu dpung bkang brgyad byin brgyad dang // bya sla brtad pang ston pags sa// rdzogs
3a6(rnying rgyud): kyi bas thul ben pa phi/ gas rdzog ma de rnangapas// zhes dang sna 'i'angob ba da/ pA li shes ra/ macing gi nga bgi / sogs pa'i sa btsud padu
3a7(rnying rgyud): ting po ba dzod// rje bsti ka'i gzugs snang ba// tha dad du mang mchong ba ltang// mug cin yongs la da bas srul du yin// mi shes phyogs med gang bas zugs rdzu che// kud pa rtoms pas sngags rdzogs med gang // zhes gsungs so/
3b1(rnying rgyud): smra sa mas 'a mas/ du gsas su/
3b2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin byin rlabs ngo bo'i rgyud// rang bzhin chud la rnam pa gnyis// nges pa'i rgyud dang don gyi rgyud// nges rgyung sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin// rgyun du mi 'gyur chud kyi mchog/ de don thugs la gang gnas pa// don rgyud chen po yin par bshad// byi rlabs gyud la
3b3(rnying rgyud): rnam pag // bad sa da/ la nga med da ma ma da ra dum la mas // rdul ga ga sa
3b4(rnying rgyud): la 'jug/ de don gtan la gang 'bebs pa// man ngag kun gyi mchog tu bshad// de don thugs la gang gnas pa// lung rnams ma lus thugs la gnas// rgyud lung man ngag dbyer med pas// thig le ye shes brtsegs pa yin// zhes gsungs so//
3b5(rnying rgyud): lha rgyad rin po che srungs pa las// byin rlabs kyi drung brtan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis// bcom ldan kun tu bzang po la// rdol med byin rlabs ji ltar lags// zhes nus pas/ bka' stsal pa/ byin rlabs
3b6(rnying rgyud): dbang las 'jug pas na// dbang gi gdamus pa bshad par bya// dbang la gyi nang gsang ba gsum// lha dbang ye shes b+ha yi dbang // chos dbyer rig pa sems kyi dbang // rtsol med ye shes thig le'i dbang // de 'dod pa pi gang zag gis// lus po
3b7(rnying rgyud): smad 'khor rdzas kun// byin rlabs zhu ba'i yon tu dbul// byin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas// dbang ba dur nus pa'i bla ma la// yon phul yon tan bsam mi khyab// slob dpon gdams pas ma brgyan pa// de 'dra'i slob dpon bsnyen min te// de bsnyen gyin
4a1(rnying rgyud): rlabs 'byung ma 'gyur// slob ma shes rab ma brgyan cing // gdams pa gzung mi rngub pa ni// dan slob ma snad min no// dal byin rlabs 'jug mi 'gyur// du log pas na dan kun 'grub// sgra dbang pa shes dbang bsrur bas
4a2(rnying rgyud): mig gi gzugs snang ma 'gags pas// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs kyi dbang // chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes yin// de yis don la bskyed med pas// rdo rje sems dpa' me bskyod pa// me long lta bu'i ye shes yin// de la yon tanaHla snang ba// snang ba
4a3(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas 'od dpag med// so sor kun tu rtogs pa yin// yon tan phyogs ris mi mnga' bas// rin chen 'byung ldan 'od 'gro bas// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes yin// thams cad rang byung thub pas na// don yod grub pa rdo rje'i snying po yin// byab thub
4a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes zhes kyang brjod// rna ba mi bskyod kyi ni 'od dpag med// sku ni rin 'thung 'og sgo don grub sku// lnga ldan ye shes rang la snang bas na// lha dbang ye shes su yi dbang bskur yin// 'byung ba lnga yi gzugs stong pas// nam mkha' dbyings phyug chos kyi
4a5(rnying rgyud): dbyings// de yi ngo bo sangs rgyas spyan// 'od gsal ye shes me long lnga// yon tan rtsal smin gos dkar mo// so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes rdzogs// yon tan thams cad 'dus pa mA ma ki// kun la yangs dog med pas mnyam pa nyid// de yi don la 'da' med
4a6(rnying rgyud): pas// dam tshig sgrol ma zhes bya'o// thams cad gcig tu grub pas bya ba grub// ye shes thams cad rdzogs pas 'khor lo yin// 'gyur ba med pas rdo rje yin// skyon gyis mgos pad+ma yin// thams cad 'gyur bas rin po che// kun la khyab pas rgya gram mo//
4a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad rdzogs pas seng ge yin// ma lus theg pas glang po che// dug lnga spu ru shar bas ma bya yin// thams cad zhugs las grol bas rta mchog yin// thogs med spyan chen mnga' bas mkha' lding yin// de yi don rtogs rtsol med dngang bsrung yin// mi 'da'
4b1(rnying rgyud): ma masapas dag/ chos surnam ma sa sa dang / gyur mdags dag 'das dang zla// dngas gdus dpas ga/ dran su dus yangs// gag du // ma
4b2(rnying rgyud): chen rang la shar bas na// spyan ras gzigs dbang seng ge rnam par brtsegs// 'khor ba ma bcos rang grol 'od gsal ba// rdo rje mi g.yo'i sgra ste rang byung yin// thugs rdo kun la 'phro bas 'od zer can// sangs rgyas byin rlabs phog pas rgol ma yin// snga ba lcag
4b3(rnying rgyud): ngang snang ngas phag gdong ma// shes rang khong shar dpa gri yin// ye shes zang thal rdo rje dang // sku gsum byin rlabs snang baphreng ba dang // yon tan sna tshigs gcod pa'i ral ze dang // chos sku yon tan nus pas ut+pal// yon tan gtang 'chang bum pa dang // phrugasu ma
4b4(rnying rgyud): rang la gnas pas kha T+wAMg/ thams cad rang la rdzogs pas dbang chen thob// ces gsungs so// lha chud rin po che spangs pa las/ lha dbang lus la bskur ba dang / rtsol med rang snang du bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas yang bka' phul ba/
4b5(rnying rgyud): la bcas lda dbang bldan pa ni// dang po bum pa'i dbang yin te// bu ma pa lha mi blangs dang mthun// de la dbang rdzo rdzogs pa ni// bum pa gzhal pas khang yin pas// hUM las gzhal yas khang du bskyed// de yi nang du bum dzas blags// gdan dang bskyed dang
4b6(rnying rgyud): spyan 'dren pa snyem// ngang ba dang brdzun bsdubabyas nas ni// de nas 'a du wA nas ni// skye ba dag nas dbang baphrar ba// bum pa'i dbang zhes brjod pa yin// lus kyi sgrib pa dag par byed// bum pa bum dzes bskyed bya thabs kyi dbang // lha rnams bsugang zhes b+h+yo sa
4b7(rnying rgyud): mdzad// shes rab dbang du bstan pa ni// rjer dbyang chub sems kyi rtsa// yoM zhes dbang du brtan pa yin// rdo rje rje steng ba zhag pa yis// ngag gi sgrib pa dag par byed// lhal ye shes rgyas btab nas// bye ba med par bstan pa ni// tshig gi dbang du rjod pa yin//
5a1(rnying rgyud): sems kyi sgrib pa dag par byed// ces gsungs sa// lha drung rin po che spangs pa las// bum pa'i dbang ga la lus bdun pa // / da nas yang bka' stsal pa// thubs dang shas rab dbang la namany+dzas// ngan
5a2(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi rang bzhin te// lus kyi bum pa snang ba yin// sgra dang lus rgyan lus po ni// sku gsum drag pa'i snang ba'o// sgo lnga 'bru lnga ye shes lnga// phung po lnga ni rin chen sna lnga yin// rang byung bdud rtsi ldan lnga'i ngo bo la// rnam shes lU ni dri lnga yin par bshad//
5a3(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems ni bdud rtsi 'o ma chu// dbugs ni gzungs thag thugs rjes 'brel// de ni bum pa'i dbang yin no// rang la snang ba thabs kyi dbang // de ltar shes pas shes rab dbang // ye nas grub pa ye shes dbang // de mtshon pa ni tshig dbang ngo po// shes rab
5a4(rnying rgyud): dbang la rnam pa lnga// b+ha ga bum pa'i rang bzhin no// ri ga bu mdzas rang bzhin no// rgyagasu mnyed pa thabs kyi dbang // zung 'jig stong pa shes rab dbang // bde ba'i ye shes gsang ba'i dbang // ngag gis brgyan che dbang ngo // zhes gsungs so// lha rgyud rin
5a5(rnying rgyud): po che srungs pa'i rgyud las/ thabs dang shes rab kyi dbang bstan pa'i le'u blo brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i dbang la rnam lnga ste// rdo rje bum pa chos kyi sku// rtsa gsum brgyan pa langs su yin// thig le sprul pa'i sku ru
5a6(rnying rgyud): bshad// bde ba chen po bum rdzas yin// de ni bum pa'i dbang yin no// yig 'bru bkod pa thabs kyi dbang // lha rnams sbyor ba mdod pa ni// b+ha ga stong pa shes rab dbang // byang chub sems 'phros gsang ba'i dbang // rgyas gdab po ni tshig dbang yin
5a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes sa bon dgug pa dang // dam tshigs bon bskyed pa dang // sbyor ba gnyis med bstim pa dang // bde ba'i mchod pa 'bul ba dang // mchod pa phyogs bcur spro ba dang // de rnams rgyas su gdab pa ni// rtsol ba dang bcas dbang zhes brjod// ces gsungs so//
5b1(rnying rgyud): rlung da bu ma srungs pa las/ gsar ba'i dbang ga la du ga dgu pal// de nas yang bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gsang ba'i bdag c-i/ tshig gi dab la rnamasas// rtswang mad cig tuston pa na// dngas na gas gzugs dang /
5b2(rnying rgyud): byung ba lda ni bum par bshad// kha dog sna tshogs bum pa'i rgyan// dbyings su snang ba mgul chings yin// 'du 'bral med pa gzungs thug yin// 'gro drug yongs sur zer snang ba// bum pa'i rdzas su bstan pa ni// de ni bum pa'i dbang yin to// skang da
5b3(rnying rgyud): bsdus nas lam du bslang // snang ba rang byung ye shes shar// bla ma'i gdams pas phyogs med grol// rang sbrang ye shes 'phel 'grib med// kyi nang med pa ye shes smra// ye shes sku ste rang byung ba// de ni thabs kyi dbang mchog yin// da ni shes rang dang
5b4(rnying rgyud): brten pa// drugasun 'gas ma pa de// med 'thus rlung me pa mas pa sha/ bla di rdzub pa rig na// ga sa ma dag pa nang // ma shes ba kyang mthom// gas shes dbab yang/ sa
5b5(rnying rgyud): na// mi bkru ba yi gtan tshigs yin// yid ces nges pa'i dbang du bshad// da ni ye shes dbang bshad de// ye ni kun gzhi skyes yin// shes pa gzhi las grol ba'o// grol ba gzhan rkyen ma yin te// rang rkyen shes pas grol bar bstan// mo yang
5b6(rnying rgyud): da kyi dpe bzhin no// thig le ye shes khong nas shar// phar bltas pas ni tshur la gsal// ye shes zang thal kho na yin// ma bcos pa yi zang thal la// ma byas pa yi rang byung shar// rang grol sbrul gyi mdud pa ltar// rang grol dug 'khong du grol// rtse gcis
5b7(rnying rgyud): zang thal chen por slebs// da ni tshig dbang don bshad de// nor bu rin chen gling dag na// sa rdo la sogs ming yang med// gdams pa'i tshi ga dbang thob pas na// 'khor ba bya ba'i ming yang med// 'khor ba thig par dbang bsrung bas// rma bya ha la bza' ba 'dra//
6a1(rnying rgyud): A kha ste tshogs mdangs dang ldan// de bzhin drug gi dbang bsgyur na// 'dra dung dang kyis mi tshugs so// de bzhin dug lnga'i dbang bsrung na// 'khor ba'i dgra yas ni tshugs so// rjeg la po shes rab rtul// las dang dngabazhin pa
6a2(rnying rgyud): pa ni// lam dang sgo dang yon tan dang // 'bras bu rnam brjed dbyer med pas// dpe ming skrod shel gyis mtshon// rtags kyi sprod do// yin// ri ni chen zung brgyad 'ab dang yin// don ni thig le ye shes te// rgya chen brgyad la gnas pa yin// rtags kyi rtsa dang yon tan
6a3(rnying rgyud): rtsa// rnam pa brgyad du shes par bya// de ni rten gyi gsang lam yin// ma rig pa yi gdar bcad pas// rig pa'i ye shes khong nas rdol// thig le brtsegs pa'i dbang mchog thob// tshe ga dbang zhes ni de la rtsa// 'khor ba nAd gtsang ces kyang \u0f7f// ma rig mig 'byed
6a4(rnying rgyud): ces kyang bya// rig pa'i ye shes zhes kyang bya// ye shes rang shar zhes kyang bya// shes rab rang byung zhes kyang bya// ye shes thig le khong nas shar// zhes gsungs so// lha chung rin po che spangs pa las/ tshig dbang rin po che'i le'u ste brda pa'o// / de
6a5(rnying rgyud): nas yang bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gsang ba'i bdag po khyod// dbang bskur yon tan bstan pa ni// bum pa'i dbang bskur nyon mongs sgrib pa dag/ thabs kyi dbang bskur las kyi sgrib pa dag/ shes rab dbang tha lur shes bya'i sgrib pa dag/ gsang ba'i dbang baphur ro
6a6(rnying rgyud): po'i sgrib pa drug/ tshig gi dbang bskur rnam smin sgrib pa dang // bum dbang ba slar bas thul gru 'thob// thabs kyi dbang bsrung longs su 'thob// shes rab dbang bsrur chos sku 'thob// gsang ba'i dbang bskur ye shes sgra// tshig gi dngang phyung rang byol 'thob// dbang
6a7(rnying rgyud): ma bskur bar chos 'chad pa// long bas long ba khrid pa 'dra// slob dpon tshad mar mabya rings// gdams pa med par dbang bskur byed// sngags med dub la dzub pa 'dra// slob ma tshad dang mi ldan pas// dbang bskur rjod pa byed pa de// ska ma mo la mchongs pa 'dra// grong
6b1(rnying rgyud): ba cang ldan dpang bzung // bdud kyang langs spyad bral ba'ang// thobasacad ldan dadang dadab/ cand gnana'abadag cod par nga// zhus gsasas// gargyang ngan ma rje spangs pa las/ dbang bzlang ba'i khyod nad rkyen na pa'i ma na bcwa gcog pa'o//
6b2(rnying rgyud): de nas pang bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ lta ba rig pa rang rtsal bstan pa ni/ lha ba skye med rnam par dag/ rang bzhin chos su brjod las 'das// gnyis med rang snang ma bcos pa// chos nyid sme med shes bya'i gshis// sems nyid ma
6b3(rnying rgyud): bcos blo las 'das// sems nyid stong pa chos kyi bu// nam mkha' lta bu'i chos nyid las// hi zla skar tshogs ma 'dres rdzogs// tshogs rdzogs rang byung lta ba'i mchog/ dngos po med pa rangs dgrol// rang grol 'ub chub lta ba'i klong // lta bgrong chen mtha' grol
6b4(rnying rgyud): phyin// skya ba rig pa'i dbang rdzob na// skye ba med pa'i dgongs pathob// brnam pa rig pa rang rtsal dbang // mtshan bcas pasgom dang mtshan med pasgom// dang po ma shar shar bar byed pa la// nam mkha' gong pa'i mkha' dkyil bsgom// de las hUM wa~M rdo rje bskor
6b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'od chu rdo rje sems dpar bsgom// spu mdog dkar po gangs ring nyi shar 'dra// g.yas na rdo rdo rje lnga bsnams// g.yon pas dril bu dkun brten// rgyan rnams kun gyis brtan par bsgom// oM badz+ra sarbA hUM/ dpa' bo 'bru lnga thugs kyi yang snying bzla// badz+ra A ha ratrAM/
6b6(rnying rgyud): hA baM b+h+rUM/ puSh+paM trAM/ A lo ke hUM/ gats+tsha b+h+rUM/ ne bi te b+h+rUM/ sha d+ha rad+h+wa d+hI/ zhes mchod pas/ 'gro drug zhu nas bdag zhwa ste// spyi gtsug rdo rje sems dpar thim// rdo rje sems dpa' 'od puzla// rdo rje dkar po rtse lngar gyur// rdo rje 'od zhu la thi ma/
6b7(rnying rgyud): hUMgi zhabs bskyed zhu nas ni// 'ayang 'od du skems kyis chu// de nas g.yang 'od du khru ba yis// de yang zla ba dag la thim// zla ba 'od zhu thig le la// thig le 'od zhu ye shes zang thal bsgom// de ni thig le khong shar yin// mtshan bcas su yi bsgom
7a1(rnying rgyud): pa'o// thugs kyi sngags tsu rnam pan// du bang nas sa da sarnam// demyo pa la // da na da// / dgas tha pa rang nab// dngos rgyags mas padag
7a2(rnying rgyud): dA ni gsang gi bsgo pa bstan// dang po rang byung sems nyid nyid // mtshon pa'i rje yang dzin dugyi// de la shes pa ga ng+gA la bsgom// de nas shes badz+re dang srob// dz+wal shes pa chung pa'i// sems zin pa mi tsha yid no// danas snang ba
7a3(rnying rgyud): chags san/ b+h+r-i mi 'gyur rang bang na/ rgyanas 'angags la bang bral ba rnam// des ni gsung gi dgongs pa rdzogs/ dbyen kyad b+h+ri dang // 'kho 'a dzi paskyed pa// yig 'jug du yang rung bal// dang rdzab rgyas na//
7a4(rnying rgyud): mtshan bcas pasgom pa rdzogs pa yin// zhes gsungs so// rta rgyad rin po che spangs pa la sa/ ma rig pa rang rdul gyi ledz+ra gyi bcu gnyis pa 'o// / de nas mtshan med po rnam pa brtan pa ni// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa'i khyod// 8
7a5(rnying rgyud): gi byang chub sems nyid ni// phyong gsal khyad pa'i don de ni// rang gi steng gi dkyil du grom// gzung 'dzin rnam pa gyes pa'iH// nyid stong pa nyid du bsgom// de nas shes pa gsal gdapal// mar me lta gyur ba sgom par bya// gzings thog tu 'phur slar la
7a6(rnying rgyud): ldog/ 'gro ba stod par bsgoms pas gzung 'dzin drong // dper na tshul 'khyag chu bzhin// dug lnga bsgoms pas gzung 'dzin 'jig/ dper na nam mkha' sprin drangs bzhin// rtog pa rtse med bsgoms pas grol bar 'gyur// bya ba btang ba'i skyes du bzhin//
7a7(rnying rgyud): lhang ngam bcos dang la bzhag// stong nyid 'od gsal bsgom par bya// dang po sde dro nas brtsams nas// tshogs drug 'od gsal bsgom par bya// shes pa 'jog pa bsrangs nas ni// lus kyis ngal dub sha chang spang // dkar gsum dkal brten pa ni// thun
7b1(rnying rgyud): dgur bcad la bsgom par bya// khams dang sbyar zhing bsgom pa ni// srod nas brtsams te bsgom pa la// 'gyu ba 'od gsal bsgom par bya// thun dang khams rnams gong dang mthun// spyod pa 'od gsal kho nar bya// gung la 'grub rjes med bsgom//
7b2(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal rdzun tshad khams dang sbyar// rmi lam 'phyongs na lam chen yin// 'od gsal sgra lus mkhas pas bsgom// skya lus bsgoms pas shes gyur na// de nas rig pa 'od gsal bsgom// rig pa 'od gsal shes nas ni// de nas ye shes 'od gsapa/
7b3(rnying rgyud): bsgom// ye shes 'od gsal shes nas ni// thig le 'od gsal mthar thug bsgo maM// ma shar ba la shar ba bya// shar ba bogs dbyung brtan pa'i 'bras bu bstan// tho rangs rang snang 'od gsal bsgom par bya// rmis pa'i cho 'phrul dang snang 'od gsal yin//
7b4(rnying rgyud): btsun mo bde spyod rmis nas ni// bu btsas lo gsum lon pa rmi// bu yang shi ste bsregs pa rmi// mya ngan chen po skyes kyang mi// de rmis sad par gyur pa na// sdug bsngal shes pa tsam gyis grol// de bzhin rmis pa ci thung yang // 'khrul pa'i snang bar rtogs gyur
7b5(rnying rgyud): na// de nyid gnyid pas bsgom pa yin// dus bzhi mnyam sbyor dgongs pa'i mchog/ bsam gtan rang grol gdams pa'i mchog/ zang zing shes pa gnad kyi mchog/ ces gsungs so// lha chud rin po che srungs pa las/ sgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu
7b6(rnying rgyud): gsum pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ spyod pa'i khyad par bstan pa ni// dang po lha sgom dang bcas nas// nags khrod dgon par gcig pur gnas// dur khrod wa skya grogs su btsal// lta ba gdeng
7b7(rnying rgyud): chung bag tsha med// da/ zhon pa'i spu bcad shin tu gces// bsgom pa gdeng chud nyam nga med// gang yang spyod pa'i grogs su 'gyur// sems kyi sgra bcad ces bya'o// 'khu khrig med pa'i rang sgra sgrogs// thams cad gsung ni 'khor lor shes// gsung gi
8a1(rnying rgyud): smra bcad ces bya'o// gcer bu'i spyod pas ci dgar gnas// tshogs drug lkug para'i spyod pa yin// lus kyi sgrubacad ces bya'o// 'khor ba'i reg ma mtshan ldan pa// bag chanyam nga mad sar ni// tsaM spyod bde ba'i rlan gyis
8a2(rnying rgyud): 'tsha// 'khor ba'i spu bcad ces bya'o// gdams pa gsang gnas rang don bsgrub// byin rlabs phyogs med 'char ba ni// rig pa'i spyod pa zhes bya ste// gdams pa'i sla bcad ces bya'o// yul khyims spangs nas phyogs med 'gro// blo dang skur pas nyam
8a3(rnying rgyud): da med// dman pa'i spyod pas 'khyams pa ni// gsang ba'i spyod pa zhes bya ste// yul gyi sgra bcad rjes su brjod// phyogs bcur 'khyams shing bdud rtsi bsten// rtog pa thams cad rang sar dag/ rnam par rgyal ba'i spyod pa yin// brtul phugs spyod
8a4(rnying rgyud): pa zhes kyang bya// zas kyi sgra bcad ces bya'o// thams cad rang snang dang byung pas// rtogs pas rtsil ma rtogs bdud// bdud ni 'dre ru shar ba yin// rtsi ni lha ru shar ba yin// bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i rgyu ni dang bung yin// bskyab pa'i bdud rtsi ma yin dang byung
8a5(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi yin// zhes gsungs so// lha chud rin po che spungs pa las/ spyod pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ de ltar byas pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa ni// thig le mi 'da'
8a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes klod slebs nas// mi 'gyur rdo rje lta bu'i chu thob 'gyur// lus kun las ni rab grol te// lus kyi mtha' rtogs ye shes lus// gnas kyi mtha' grol thig ler brdal// skad cig gcig gis don dang mjal// 'khor ba ma spangs gnas su dge
8a7(rnying rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa rang pa shar// ye shes thig le'i rtse mo sleb// phyi nang med par dbyings dang mngal// bgrod pa med par rang sar sreb// sbyang pa med par gnas su dag/ bsrub pa med par 'bras bu thob// ma byas pa ru las rnams zin// ma bkrus pa ru
8b1(rnying rgyud): ma dang // sgron ma ma bteg mun pa sangs// khams gsum rtsa ba de ru chod// srid gsum lo mde ru chod// snga ma rtsi ma'i bar mtshams chod// srid pa rgyas thobs chos skur shar// 'jig rten gsum gyi zam pa brgal// dbang phyug chen po'i ma mar thob// tshangs
8b2(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i me long rnyed// dga' bo 'jog po'i rin chen thob// dkar po spyan gcig shel mkhar thob// ha nu pag shu'i ral gri thob// nag po bkrag med khram pa mthob// gnod sbyin kun la khrid kyi shel skong thob// gshin rje'i rgyal po'i lcags mkhar thob/
8b3(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i rgyal mo'i gter mdzod thob// gsung mchog dmar po'i zhags pa thob// lha srin sde brgyad srog rtsa chod// chos 'khor skyong ba'i rgyal blon 'bangs dang gsum// ma lus lus pa med pa'i srog rtsa chod// lha khang zhig pas sgo lcags stor// lde mig tshig
8b4(rnying rgyud): bas dbye ru med// pha spyan gnyis kyis dme byas pas// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sgo rgyan bcad// rnam par snang mdzad zhing khams mthong // rdo rje sems dpa'i me long mthong // snang ba mtha' yas zhing khams mthong // rin chen 'byung ldan yon tan mthong // don yod//
8b5(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i zhing khams mthong // zhes gsungs so// lha chud rin po che srungs pa las/ 'bras bu rang sa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ de rnams yon tan bstan pa ni// lta ba bstan
8b6(rnying rgyud): pas chos sku thob// sgom pa bstan pas longs su thob// spyod pa bstan pas sbrul sku thob// 'bras bu bstan pas rang grol thob// lta bas dug lnga zhi bar byed// sgoms pas nyon mongs zhi bar byed// spyod pas 'dre gdon zhi bar byed// 'bras bus 'dod
8b7(rnying rgyud): khams zhi bar byed// da lta ba rtogs pas ye shes shar// sgom pa rtogs pas nyams myong shar// spyod pa rtogs pas thug phrad shar// 'bras bu rtogs pas thig le shar// lta ba rang grol rig pa'i gnad// ye shes zang thal dbang po yin/
9a1(rnying rgyud): pa rang krol gdams pa'i gnang // nyams khyod 'dags la dbang ba yin// stod par dgrol thabs kyi gnang // gnyis meng dang dar dbang po yin// 'bras bu dang gral legs gdang // rig pa yul med dbang po yin// nyam
9a2(rnying rgyud): kyod ye shes 'char ba la// gzung 'dzin ga nyis kyi pas sprul// gnyis med rje slod dbang phyugatsas// ma rig 'bor bar 'khyam sra pa la// rig pa ye shes srong dgos// 'gru ba rje chogapa 'khru la pa la// ye shing ro spod phyogs rjod da /
9a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i rtsa ba nyon mongs yid// ngang krol shes rab ngo srod dgos// de ni rdo slod rnam pa pa re// 'gyu ba dang sangs shar grol ba'i// kha mig 'byar dang 'azer thebs pas// sgo dang dbang dang gzeng lta bu// de'i dbang bsur 'dus pa yin// zhes
9a4(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// lha chud rin po rje spangs pa las/ yon tan dang 'bras bu dmar khrid kyi phyi'u steng cu drug pa'o// / da ni rig pa ye shes tsom med dbang bsnyen gyis// nyon cig gsang ba'i bdag po khyod// thig le rang byung dbang bskur bas// brda'
9a5(rnying rgyud): rtags dang don du bstan// sbyi ni brda yi dbang bstan pa// rin chen man shes zad thal de// byas pas ma byas rang byung yin// man shel zang thal yin pa ni// thig la zang thal yin pa'i brdar/ shel gyi po rjod gsal ba// rdog po 'o dgas pa yi
9a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i brdang // shel la bur drug shar ba ni// 'gro drug rang sar grol ba'i brda // shel la thil drug byung ba ni// thig zur gA med pa'i brda'// man shel mthing gar shang nga ni// thig le 'gyur bamed pa'i brda'// mar spel gzhi la 'od gnas pas// thig la
9a7(rnying rgyud): yon nam 'gags brdang// shel ni dri med rang byung bas// chos bu dri ma med pa'i brda'// shel kyi phreng ba ma 'gags pas// longs sugazhi la gnas pa brdar// mang shi di pa 'od rkar bas// srul skum 'gro dan byed pa'i bdar// ldan gsum yi shes rnam
9b1(rnying rgyud): gras// kun pa gas tho ma // da gas pa // rjong bdag // thugs gags da byang kla/ ngal rgyu ba'i nga ba/ zags bang bral yong sa gas / gang dgang ba // da /
9b2(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal yod pa'i rtogs// cong+ka byung drug 'bar ba ni// 'gro drugs yang pa gcod pa'i rdzogs// snying pathal drug byung ba ni// rdeg pa tshas min yod pa'i rtags// snying mtshams chos nyid sas mtshan pa// theg pa gyur med 'ang pa gas
9b3(rnying rgyud): zur bcad 'bar ba'i// thig le gyon tan ma 'gags rtags// snying di zur gsum dbyibs su nar// sku gas mi rang la thub pa'i rtags// snying la spyod skud dbus dang gsum// spyan gsum rang pa yod pa rtags// thig le yi gnas dpa
9b4(rnying rgyud): grub// de ltar shes na dbang gi rdul po yin// de d+ha r+tha shes na dbang bskur bla ma yin// btsal mi dgos pa mchog gi dbang // thig le ye nas yod pa dbang gi rgyal po yin// rig pa rang gnas dbang gi rdzas su bshad// rig pa rang gnas dbang gi bsrung thangs yin//
9b5(rnying rgyud): thig rang da dbang gi zas pa pas/ sa d-i ba dzod// gyu byung spyod pas// de pas byed zhes brjod// yid la shes rabang skad pa// shes dbang bang zhes pa // 'grub sa spang pas// gsang pa'i dbang na
9b6(rnying rgyud): la bya// ma rig ye shes zang thal la// gzung 'dzin theg le khong nas shang // tshig dbang rin po che zhes brjod// ces gsungs so// lha rgyad rin po che spangs pa las/ thig le dang ye shes kyi dbang gi le'u ste brngu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal
9b7(rnying rgyud): pa// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod kon cig/ spyan gyi dbang bskur bstan pa ni// thog la gnyer gyi 'byung gnas na// spyan gyis grub po'i sman gnas te// gsal ba gzhan dbang ma gyur rang gsal spyan// de ni thabs kyi spyan yin no// 'gag med
10a1(rnying rgyud): gzhan dbang ma gyur pa// de ni shes rab stan yin no// zang thal gzhan dbang ma gyur pa// de ni ye shes spyan gyi gzhi// de gsum dbyer med dbang yin pas// lhun grub yongs su rdzogs pa'i spyan// de ni gzhi yi spyan gyi dbang // de nas
10a2(rnying rgyud): lam gyi dbang bstan pa// dpe don rtags kyi dbang bstan no// dper na rin chen man shel te// spyan gsum dbang gi dpe yin no// rtags ni mig la shar ba'o// spyi yi rtags dang don du 'brel// nang gi dbang rtags snying yin no// don gyi rtags dang sbyar ba
10a3(rnying rgyud): gces// gyi yi dbang rtags mig yin no// ngo spod byas te rtags su bstan// mig g.yas chos kyi spyan gyi rtags// g.yon pa shes rab spyan gyi rtags// mdzod su ye shes spyan gyi rtags// don gyi spyan gsum 'gyu ba'i mig/ 'gru ba'i spyan la ngo sprad na/
10a4(rnying rgyud): spyan gyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rna ba g.yas pa chos kyi spyan// g.yon pa shes rab chen po'i ston// mig ni ye shes spyan yin no// rna ba chos nyid rtsa gnas pa// blo 'dogs gcod pa'i ji spyod bya// mig la ye shes rtsa gnas pas// zang thal rtogs pa'i
10a5(rnying rgyud): rdo sbed bya// snying la shes rab rtsa gnas pas// ye shes te spod shin tu gces// blo sgang gnyis la rtsa gnyis gnas// gzung 'dzin gnyis snang blo pi tsa// med par dbugs kyi rtsa gnas pa// sems kyi rta mo byed pa'iH// snying mtshams thugs kar 'brel ba'i rtsa/
10a6(rnying rgyud): dbugs chen dbugs med so mtshams yin// snying la rtsa chen brgyad gnas pa// thika le ye shes brgyad kyi rtsa// mgrin pa rtsa lnga 'od gsal ba// bar de 'od du 'char ba'i rtsa// thig le btson thabs rtags su bshad// mdzod du mig laM zad thal tsa// 'das pa lnga yi rtsa
10a7(rnying rgyud): yin no// zhes gsungs so// lha chung rin po che spangs pa las/ sman dang rtsa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag yod kyad kon cig/ lu gsum dbang bsrung bstan pa ni// snying ga 'od dpag med pa'i
10b1(rnying rgyud): dbang // dpag med ye shes yon tan dbang // len pa yod pa'i dbang yin no// ma bskur sdud par mi nus te// bsrur bas thob pa'i dbang yin no// chos gsum 'dus pa 'od dpag med// kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa yin// de la sgo mtshams 'od srungs ni//
10b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' khong shar yin// sra ba'i mthil du mar me mdzad// dga' ba rdo rjeji rig par grol yin// skyon pa sgragasum dang la gnas// ya~M nas gzhil grub pas na// sru gsu sa dbang bskur zhes kyang pa// mu med pa 'od srungs dbang bltar thob// mig
10b3(rnying rgyud): la mar me mdzad kyi dbang // ma bskur mun pa 'thibs pa yin// bskur bas mun pa yul na med// mar me mdzad kyi dbang bskur rdzogs// bskal pa stong gi mun pa la// mar me mtheb mo tsam gyis sel// ma rig mun pa 'thibs pa la// mar me mdzad kyi dab
10b4(rnying rgyud): 'i phyi/ dag / na 'a// me // shrI//
10b5(rnying rgyud): so// ma bstan shes par mi 'gyur ro// bstan na mi 'char mi srid do// re bas 'dod pa 'byung mi 'gyur// dbang gi rgyal po sku gsum dag/ rtags kyi rgyal po bstan du yod// dpe yi rgyal po mtshon du yod// thig le'i rgyal po spang du yod// ngo slong rgyal
10b6(rnying rgyud): po thig le rang snang yin// nyams kyi rgyal po ye shes rang snang yin// gzhi yi rgyal po lhun grub yongs rdzogs yin// 'bras bu'i rgyal po tshes la grol ba yin// thugs rje'i rgyal po sku gsum rang 'khungs yin// zhes gsungs so// lha rgyang rin po che
10b7(rnying rgyud): srungs pa las/ sku gsum dbang bskur gyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ gzhi yi skor lugs ma shes na// nor bu rin chen stor ba 'dra// kun gzhi zhing sa lta bu la//
11a1(rnying rgyud): ma kyi ma thug pa rtsab // ga ga mas ma/ 'dul tham spang ba'// thag dpa gang bas kyis pa lag na/ sa kyi sog tud tho / nga sa pang dngul// tudags gas pa /
11a2(rnying rgyud): 'dra// dri mchog sna tshogs 'byung bas sbal sku'ang // 'bras bu rang sar sbyin pas chos su 'ang // de ni par kyi 'dril lugs yin// mar gyi 'dril grags bshad pa ni// kunag zhi yang gags pangs pa la// nyin tshangs rgo la zag pas
11a3(rnying rgyud): 'dra// drag gas ma ga cig 'dril bas sdong po 'dra// nyon mongs ldan skyes pas pa lag 'dra// skyodan mongs brgyad khrir shang bas rgyas pa lo 'dab 'dra// me tog gsal la modzes pas 'byung ba 'dra// 'bram bu rang sa de sbyin pas ma
11a4(rnying rgyud): drugag/ sa ga / rdzogs na/ phyogs ra dzin pa ldarnapa pa yin// phyog dgas pa pa togs/ ga sa sa dgas
11a5(rnying rgyud): shes na// me tog sa kyis khyer ba 'dra// mthong stong tha dang ma shes na// gos sgrib gdang sha mi rjod pas// la ltos pa'i sbyin du 'gyur// nor bu rin chen pa 'ag nas mching bu 'tshal ba dang// zhes gsungs so// gzung rin po che spangs pa las/
11a6(rnying rgyud): theg pa dang 'gro drug badz+ra ba'i len ste nyi par// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa// gas pa'i bdag po khyed nyon cig/ snang ba lngal nga srad ba// me lor dang gi byung lta shang// rlung bas garjod pa mi rnam pas// dI ba dbang du 'dus pa yin/
11a7(rnying rgyud): rlungang ba dag par chung pa'o// rig pa degs la lhags ra r+Ya// ga sa dag sa pa 'ang mang gros// 'a'ajug dpang du 'dus n-i// rag kyal 'groba'i badrang pa dra// pags 'dags par srid de// thig / nga shed/
11b1(rnying rgyud): 'gro drug g.yangs dbang du 'dus// ri rab rtse mor phyin pa 'dra// lnga gsum bco lngas mig 'byed pa// dbang po'i rim pas shes par bya// phyi 'gyu 'gro drug rang snang yin// nang 'gyu lha yi rnal 'byor yin// gsang gu zag gi sdang jog gar// dang
11b2(rnying rgyud): gzhi gnyis po ma shes na// long bas long ba khrid pa 'dra// 'khrul gzhi 'khrul pa dngos po gsum// de yi sa mtshams ma shes na// rgyal bu rkang nas 'khyams pa 'dra// 'khor ba 'khrul pa ldog pa gsum// de yi gdams pa ma shes na// dmus long
11b3(rnying rgyud): byang thad lus pa 'dra// gzhi dang tshig dang dpe thog shor// de gsum ngo yis ma zin na// rdo bos ma 'chu khol po 'dra// snang rgya rig rgya gdams pa'i rgya// rgya gsum rang shar ma shes na// khyi mo nad zan byed pa 'dra// da lta 'chi ka bar do gsum// gdams
11b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtse yis ma thebs na// shing gi rang thag bskor ba 'dra// go ba rtogs pa chod pa gsum// de gsum tshad du ma stsol na// ma 'dzad med par gser nyo 'dra// brgyad pa gdams pa nyams dang gsum// de gsum med par slob ma bstan// chu shing snying po bton
11b5(rnying rgyud): pa 'dra// dbang dang lag len nyams myong gsum// de gsum med par dbang bskur ba// nor bus rgyal sa bzung ba 'dra// zhes gsungs so// lha chud rin po che srungs pa las/ ngo sprod gnad kyi le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o// / de nas yang
11b6(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ ngo sprod bzhi dang dus bzhi mnyam sbyor dang // sems dang ye shes dbye ba dang // rig pa'i ye shes ngo sprad pa// 'bring gi gdams pa yin par bshad// gsang lam bzhi yi ngo spod dang // 'od
11b7(rnying rgyud): gsal 'khor lo'i gzer gdab pa// snang ba 'od gsal 'khor lo bskor// gnad dang log gnon shes par bya// tshogs drug 'od gsal 'khor lo bskor// tshogs drug rang grol dbang po yin// 'gyu ba 'od gsal 'khor lo bskor// gzung 'dzin dngas pa
12a1(rnying rgyud): dbang po yin// shes rab rig pa'i de sprod bstan// 'khor 'das drug cad dbang pa med// ye shes dngos 'dzin dbang po ni// ye shes stan gyis byed pa yin// spyan gsum dbang ba spyad byed pa pa// gnas tshal bzhugs grol rtogs tshul
12a2(rnying rgyud): dang // bskur tshul 'char tshul grol tshul gyis// spyan gyi dbang bskur thob pa yin// drug gsum bco brgyad dag gis meg kye nas// chos dang shes rab sun gyi dbang // rang dbang rang gis thob pas rgyal po yin// ye shes gsal 'grib med pa de// zab dang
12a3(rnying rgyud): 'gags med 'gag pa med// ye shes dbang gi bskur thabs yin// shes rab thogs pa med pa de// myur dang drag dang skad cig la// bzung ste dbab dang phyir ldog pa// shes rab dbang gi bsrung thabs yin// chos nyid rang grol myur ba de// myang dang
12a4(rnying rgyud): gsal de skad cig la// chos kyi dbang gi bskur thabs yin// ye shes spyan gyi gnas tshul dmigs// bzhugs tshul zang thal// rab dang 'bring dang tha ma gsum// sdang ba rgya yan rig pa rang grol dang // chos nyid 'od gsal chen po gsum// dbye dus byed
12a5(rnying rgyud): dus byed pa'i tshad// ma byed skyon yon 'bras bu rnams// gdeng ldan bla ma slob ma yin// 'di 'dra rgya mtsho'i pha bong bzhin// bskal pa 'khrugs kyang khar 'byung min// rus sbal sre bar nor ba chung pa bzhin du sdoms// zhes gsungs so// lha rgyud rin
12a6(rnying rgyud): po che spungs pa las/ dmar khrid dmar byang dang / don skor sangs rgyas rdo sprod kyi le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ 'chi ba 'chi ltas 'chi rtsis su// rlung dang thig le rtsa dang
12a7(rnying rgyud): gsum// nad dang gdon dang rnam smin gsum// 'byung ba 'khrugs pa'i nad yin te// dkar na grang ba chu yi dug/ dmar na tshwa ba ma yi dug/ mthing na bad kan nam mkha'i dug/ ser na mkhris pa sa yi dug/ ljang nag 'du ba rlung gi dug/ dkar na nu ye
12b1(rnying rgyud): rlung la rgyal po'i gdon// mthing nag nam mkha'i rlud la bdud kyi gdon// dmar nag me yi rlung la btson khams gdon// ser nags ye rlung la dmu tshogs gdon// ljang nag rlung gi rlung la sna tshogs 'dre kun gdon/ rkang mthil du dkar drod stor na// dmyal
12b2(rnying rgyud): bar 'gro ba'i snga ltas yin// gsang bar bred dmar drod stor na// yi dwags 'gro ba'i snga ltas yin// lte bar bu mthing drod skor na// byol song 'gro ba'i snga ltas yin// snying gar ni ser drod skor na// mi ru 'gro ba'i snga ltas yin// reg me na/ mgrin par sa
12b3(rnying rgyud): ljang drod stor na// lha ma yin du skye ba'i snga ltas yin// spyi bor a ljang drod stor nas// lha ru skye ba'i snga ltas yin// de yang dmyal ba la sogs sdang ba bsgyur// mi lus thob pa'i snang ba thams cad bshad// dbang po chu ltar 'khod par byed// rlung ni lnga
12b4(rnying rgyud): gsum bco lnga brtags// thig le mig gi ba zag ya la/ dkar yin nas/ bla rtsa stong na 'che bar bshad// gnam gyis re thag chad pa dang // chos kyi dbyings kyi rnga sgra tshang// shes rab spyan gyis shes par 'gyur// ye shes spyan gyi thig ma nub// rta mchog sngon po'i grwa
12b5(rnying rgyud): phur lhor// ti tshe gangs kyi rlangs pa yal// glog lum dmar mo'i sbrang rtsi yal// rgya mchod chu bran thams cad 'dus// dbus kyi ka pa ba can chen 'chus// khol po bzhi po ka bzhin rengs// dpag bsam shing gi me tog yal// zhes gsungs so// g+ha rmyad ri
12b6(rnying rgyud): po che spangs pa las/ 'chi ba 'chi ltas 'chi rtsis dang rtags kyi le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// // de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ 'chi ga'i gdams pa bstan pa ni// mthun pa'i dpe dang 'gal ba'i rkyen// rkyen gnyis
12b7(rnying rgyud): dag gis 'chi ba yin// mthun rtsen 'du dus 'char ba'i dus// grol ba'i dus dang rnam pa bzhi// dbang po rab 'bring tha ma gsum// bar do yod dang bar do med// rgyal thabs spyi thug tshul du bstan// bar de yod dang 'bring dang tha ma gsum// chos nyid bar do 'khrul
13a1(rnying rgyud): pa lnga// rang rkyen mthun pa'i thogs su 'char// chos nyid dang snang don gyi me long yin// mthun rkyen rang snang ngo srod bla ma'i gdams par 'char// de ni rang snang rkyen du 'char zhes bya// 'gal rkyen pod de la chags sdang skye// de yi 'bras bu
13a2(rnying rgyud): gzhan rkyen 'gro drug 'khrul// 'khor ba rnam bzhir 'khyams pa 'gal rkyen yin// rgya ltar 'khor ba ma rig dug lnga yin// nag po ltar 'khor las kyi rnam smin yin/ dkar po ltar 'khor las kyi 'bras bu yin// 'bras bu ltar 'khor grags chen
13a3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas yin// 'khor ba rnam bzhi srog gcod snang chen sangs rgyas yin// snang ba gzhan dbang ma gyur dbang bskur rgyal po yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ 'khor ba rnam bzhi'i 'bras bu bstan pa ni// rgyu ltar 'khor ba dang //
13a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i las dang ni// rgyu dang rgyan gyi 'gro badrug zla mi// las dang 'gro dang bathun pa'i 'bras pan// las ni ga dang me gra lung ma byastan tshums// dag pa las la mtshan bcas mtshan medang // mtshan pa sunam pa c+doMs sbed te// ga sa dugapa
13a5(rnying rgyud): bcu po dang // sngags dang yi dam bsgom pa zlas bya// de ni las kyi rnam grangs yin// bsdu ba dge dang mi dge gnyis su 'dus// de yang chos dang skrod pa yin par bshad// las med lus mi len pas 'phro med pa// de ni thig le chos min yin// 'od lus yid lus
13a6(rnying rgyud): sha khrag lus dang gsum// 'khor ba'i lus la bsam mi khyab// bsdus pas lus gsum dag par 'dus pa yin// las ni de lta 'gro ni bar dor mthung // mthong ba'i 'bras bu gnas skabs rang sor sbyar// zhes gsungs so// lha rgyang rin po che srungs pa
13a7(rnying rgyud): las/ bar do bstan pa'i le'u stenyer bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po nyon cig/ maM lus chags lugs bstan pa ni// bye ba nas phan pa dang // 'chi ba dang ni rnam pa bzhi// skye ba rnam pa lnga yin te// mngal dang
13b1(rnying rgyud): skyong las skye dang // drod las skyes dang gsher las skyes// rdzus te skye ba rnam pa lnga// mngal nas skye ba sha khrag lus// yid lus 'od lus rdzus nas skye// drod gsher skye ba sha khrag lus// skye ba 'byung bas 'chi ba 'byung // de yang lus kyi chags lugs la//
13b2(rnying rgyud): pho dang mo dang ma ning dang // pho mo rgod dang ma ning tshan po che// de yang ji ltar chags zhe na// rten gyis nad ri cha yin te// de ltar rlung na rlung yin no// de la rten gyi rtsa bstan pa// dang po gzhi la lhun gyis grub// phra ba'i rtsa dang rlung dang ni// rags pa'i rtswa dang rlung dang
13b3(rnying rgyud): gsum// de nas dngos po'i rtsar 'khrul te// dngos po pha ma'i theg le dkar dmar te// rags pa'i rtsa ru mthong ba las// rags pa rjer gyur dngos por smin// thig le rtswa yi rgyal po de// de las spu com cor gyis byung // rkyang ma zhes bya'i rtsa ru grags//
13b4(rnying rgyud): de nas yang rig thang // rlom zhes bya gnyis subyu // de yi dbyas sa gsam dubyung // degs ma dus pas ste du byung // a mad+had+ha nas cang \u0f7f// dri nas sprul gnas skye bar kyang // me phrog pa le gsu mog par 'brel nas gnas// zhi bar nas
13b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad skyed// mas zos bu yi lte bar 'khor// de nas lus la 'khor bas na// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo yin// de nas bur du byung ba la// ma yis zos pa bu la thim// bu yis zos pa gsang sgor 'khor// gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes kyang brjod//
13b6(rnying rgyud): snying gar pha yi thig le'i rtsal// dmar mo ma ye shes rab rtsal// mthing ka rig pa sems kyi rtsal// de yis thams cad tshang bas na// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes kyang bya// snying la chos nyid rtsa yis bskor// zhi ba la sogs chos sku'i rten// chos kyi 'khor lo
13b7(rnying rgyud): zhes kyang brjod// 'gyu ba mdzod spur 'khyil pa'i lam// mgrin pa'i rtsa la longs spyod byed// longs spyod 'khor lo zhes kyang bya// gsang ba'i rtsal thams cad 'dus// bde ba gsal ba mi rtog pas// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes kyang bya// mdzod srur ye shes
14a1(rnying rgyud): cu gnas pa// rten gyi 'byung gnas nas bya'o// rom chung ma gnyis po'i kha// s+thU la zug pas po marten// gsang bar byug bas mo yirten// yar yar bsnol mar 'byung ba ni// ma ning shes su bshad pa yin// Sha
14a2(rnying rgyud): gang 'greb 'phel ba ni// kho mo rgod ces 'gyur ba yinA// kha gnyis zum nas ma byed pas// ma ning chom po che nas brjod// de ltar spyod pa rlung yin no// po drung drag la mo rdung ngal// dal bar chubs zur du byung // drag par skabs gyen dbyung // 2
14a3(rnying rgyud): dum bstan drung dag las// pha ma nad dang mnid chen po ma// de ltar grub par shes par rje'o// de nas rus pa'i gnang bstun pa// mngo pa'i rten du smin dus chags// de las gyes pas dpral dus byung // de las mu gong dus pazung // de las ra ba'i
14a4(rnying rgyud): za 'gram byung // de nas ya thod mthod byung // de gnyis 'brel pas rus sub byung // snying dang 'brel pas srog rus chags/ de rnams 'tshogs pas sog pa chags// de rnams tshigs su bcad pas tshigs pa chags// rus pa thams cad khyab pas
14a5(rnying rgyud): rtsib ma chags// rus pas lus kyi stobs skyed brda rul chags// de rnams ma 'gags bstod pas rkang lag yin// de nas mjug rus 'phong dus chags// de nas gzhug gu chung du chags// de ni rus pa'i chags lugs rdzogs// da ni sha li
14a6(rnying rgyud): chags lugs ston// smi nam pags pa'i sha yang sbyin// dang po de la smin pas smin ma yin// de bzhin rim gyis cha mnyam mo// de la rtsa yi mtshan nyid cang // rtsa ba gcig tu 'dus pa yin// gcig po rang 'byung gnas pa'iH// de las kya
14a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i pho rtsa dang // mo rtsa dang ni ye shes rtsa// ma ning po mo nod dang ni// ma ning chen po che yi rtsa dang gsum// de las gyes pas 'khor lo lnga// de la brgya dang rtsa bzhi yod// de las gyes pa'i rtsa rnams ni// stong na brgyad khribazhi stong yod// smad nas
14b1(rnying rgyud): brgyad khri bzhi stong yod// de las gyes pas bsam mi khyab// dper na kha sho ba yi lo ma 'dra// dper na sha mo'i sul bzhin no// rlung dang theg le yang ni de dang 'dra// rtsa dang thag dang drod dang rlung // sha dang sa rnams brten pas na// brten pa rtsa zhes brjod/
14b2(rnying rgyud): pa yin// de la 'byung ba brten pas na// 'byung ba'i nad rnams 'khrugs nas ni// de las bgegs rten gdon du che// de la dbugs ni ni chad pas 'chi// 'byung ba cha ma snyoms pas 'phel 'grib 'byung // de las rgas shing 'khogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur/
14b3(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// lha rgyad rin po che spangs pa las/ lus kyi man ngag bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ gyi rtsa lus la gnas pa ni// kha sho'i lo ma 'dra ste spel bar gnas
14b4(rnying rgyud): de la bshad na bsam mi khyab// nang rtsa rus pa dag la gnas// de ni gser gyi me tog 'dra ste yon tan rgyas// gsang rtsa snying la gnas te 'khor lo 'dra// de 'dra ston yon 'byed pa'i rtsa// gdams pa'i rtsani rna ba mig la gnas// gnad kyi man ngag rab tu
14b5(rnying rgyud): gces// tshad mas 'jal ba'i srang dang grub mtha' sbyong ba'i srang // lag phrad byed pa'i sang dang gsum du 'dus// tshad mas 'jal ba'i srang ni brgyad pa yin// grub mtha' sbyong ba'i srang ni 'bras bu yin// lag phrad byed pa'i srang ni gdams pa yin// snang/
14b6(rnying rgyud): ba dbang du 'dus pas reg pa gcer bur zhen// rig pa dbang du 'dus pas sangs rgyas yul med mthong // rang grol dbang du 'dus pas tshes min tshad las grol// brgyud pa tshad dang mi ldan na// gnad med kyi brko ba 'dra// gdams pa chod dang mi ldan na//
14b7(rnying rgyud): rgyus med chen skyong med pa 'dra// bka' rgyud tshad dang mi ldan na// be'u thag spel nas lhung ba 'dra// rkyen chud tshad dang mi ldan na// grogs po skam por nya bsug 'dra// stan bcud tshad dang mi ldan na// skong rul ba gnod pa 'dra// thugs chud tshad dang
15a1(rnying rgyud): stan du// rtsig pa'i tshang nas su 'tshal 'dra// nyams kyang chad dang mi ldan na// smon pa'i lag na mdung bskur 'dra// de rnams tshad dang ldan pa ni// nor badzin rjed 'chang ba 'ang // ngas gsungs sa// tsan darin
15a2(rnying rgyud): spangs pa las/ rtsa dang tshad ma'i le'u ste lder drug pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ gsong ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ byid chung tshad dang ldan pa ni// mkha' 'gro mni rab gnas te// rang bzhin ngo bo sprul pa gsum// rang bzhin
15a3(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro rnam pa lnga// rdo rje mkha' 'gro rin chen dang // pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro las 'gro dang // de bzhin rigs kyi mkha' 'gro dang // rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya// ngo bo'i mkha' 'gro rnam pa gsum// 'thung ba rnam lnga'i mkha' 'gro lnga// dbyings kyi mkha'
15a4(rnying rgyud): bgro rnam lnga yin// 'byung ba lus kyi mkha' 'gro lnga// dam tshig dri sdom mkha' 'gro yin// rnam shes sgo lnga mkha' 'gro lnga// lus kyi mkha' 'gro rnam ldadzin// sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro rnam pa gsum// kun gzhi ye shes mkha' 'gro yin// yid ni
15a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i mkha' 'gro yin// rnam shes sha za mkha' 'gro yin// nub mkha' 'gro klog blang ma// mig g.yon nyi ma'i 'od zer can// yig g.yas zla ba'i da zer can// lce ni mkha' 'gro mtsho skyes ma// snga ni mkhang 'gro d+ha ma med// lus ni mkha'
15a6(rnying rgyud): 'gro dung skyong ma// de ni mkha' 'gro'i brgyad pa len// mkha' 'gro'i byin rgyud bstan pa ni// mkha' ni dge pa'i sdang ba'o// 'gro ba 'gyu ba thogs med do// de gnyis 'dus pa'i dbang bsrung bas// gyen rlabs phyogs ris med par 'char/
15a7(rnying rgyud): rlabs nang nas shar tsamin// nyams myong tshad ldan skye ba yin// nyams myong ye shes rang shar bas// ye shes tshad dang ldan pas na// sangs la mi tsu'i rang dbang med// sangs rgyas sa la grol tsam na// lugs rje mi 'thung dang dbang mang / dzu na/
15b1(rnying rgyud): phyogs med shar tsam na// byin rlabs mi 'dug rang dbang med// ces gsungs pa/ wA rgyud rin po che sbyangs pa las/ mkha' 'gro ma dbang bskur ba dI le'u ske nyer bdun pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag /
15b2(rnying rgyud): brjod na cig// theg pa'i khyad par bstan pa ni// nyan thos 'bras bu dragra bcom pa// bskal pa grangs med bdun na 'dod// drag lnga dgra bzhin spong ba yin// theg chen dbu ma stong par 'dod// gcig dang dpral la sogs pa// gtan tshigs
15b3(rnying rgyud): gzhiganas stong par 'dod// de yang dug dang sbyor ba yin// shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs// mdo rgyud sngags kyi khyad par gang // mdo rgyud dbang gi gdams pa med// sngags la rnam pa gnyis yin te// gyi pa dang ni nang pa'o// phyi ba'i dbang las nang
15b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang // phan pa'i dbang bcu khyad par 'phags// nang gi rgyud ni dbang lnga dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis khyad par 'phags// de bas rdzogs chen khyad par che// sngags ni bsgrub bsgyur 'bras bur 'dod// rdzogs chen rtogs pas sangs rgyas pa// tshig
15b5(rnying rgyud): dbang gcig gis rtogs par 'dod// dbang bskur rdzogs pa dbang lnga yin// de ni 'og ma rnams la med// mchod pa rnam lnga lta sgom pa// de ni kr-i ya yin par 'dod// mchod pa rnam lnga spu lnga bsgom// de ni yo g.yin par 'dod// bdud rtsi lnga mchod rigs
15b6(rnying rgyud): bsgrub// de ni ma hA a nur 'dod// gsang sngags dbang gis khyad par 'phags// rdzogs chen thams cad chos sbyar rtogs// rig pa rtsal gyi dbang chen thob// des na khyad par rab tu che// snyan brgyad rin chen spungs pa 'di// thams cad do spod pa la 'dod//
15b7(rnying rgyud): dus bzhi mnyam sbyor khyad par che// gzhi las grol bas khyad par 'phags// des gsungs so// lha chud rin po che spangs pa las/ theg pa'i khyad par mtshon pa'i le'u ste nyer brkyang ba'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i
16a1(rnying rgyud): bdag po khyod nyon cig/ rdzogs pa'i rdzogs lugs bstan pa ni// nyon mongs drug lnga'i dgra bcom nas// 'das pa lnga rnga grol bas na// nyan thos grub mtha'i 'bras bu rdzogs//
16a2(rnying rgyud): dro bo gsal bas sems tsam rdzogs// rang bzhin stong pas dbu ma rdzogs// 'das pa gsum gyis kri ya rdzogs// sku lnga rigs lnga dbyings dang ye shes kyis// yo ga ma hA a nu'i theg pa rdzogs// 'das pa lnga
16a3(rnying rgyud): yis thams cad khyab// rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba rdzogs// phyogs su ma lhung rgya ma chad// mtshan ma rang sar grol ba ni// snyan brgyad byin rgyud grub mtha' rdzogs// lha sgom spyod pa 'bras bu rdzogs//
16a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes lnga dang sku lnga rdzogs// 'gro ba rigs drug mu stegs rtag chad rdzogs// 'gag pa med pa'i shes rab rang byung bas// mtshan ma sna tshogs dag pa'i zhing du sangs// chos min 'byed pa med pa'i
16a5(rnying rgyud): klong du rgyas// ma bsgribs yongs la gsal bas na// cir yang mi 'gag phyogs ris mi mnga' bas// thams cad ma lus lus med rang snang yin// shes rab yongs gcod ma 'gags pas//
16a6(rnying rgyud): dris pa'i tshig ni mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin// dbye ba gyi nang gsang ba yang gsang yin// shes rab ldang tshad chos kun rang thol yin// 'ub rtsub ye shes shes pas shes rab yin// rang sdang rang 'byung
16a7(rnying rgyud): shes pas sbyin pa rdzogs// rig pa dang grol shes pas tshul khrims rdzogs// gnyis med zang thal shar bas bzod pa rdzogs// chos min zad thal shar bas brtson 'grus rdzogs// thams cad thig ler shar bas
16b1(rnying rgyud): bsam gtan rdzogs// snang srid lhag mthong shar bas shes rab rdzogs// chos su rang la shar bas thabs chen rdzogs// mtshan ma rang grol stobs kyang rdzogs// snang ba chu la na glon lam rdzogs// 'dra bral med
16b2(rnying rgyud): pas ye shes rdzogs// 'od lnga 'byung bas rin chen sna lnga rdzogs// rdzogs pa'i gdams ngag ma shes na// bong bus sed lpags gon pa 'dra// zhes gsungs so// lha chud rin po che spungs pa las/ rdzogs lugs
16b3(rnying rgyud): kyi ro spod dbang bskur chen po'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o// // de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ de ni s+thi yi mtshan nyid yin// rang gi mtshan nyid 'di lta ste// mig ni yul las
16b4(rnying rgyud): 'das par rdzogs// rna ba sru las 'das par rdzogs// lce ni gnyis med 'das par rdzogs// sna ni ye shes zad thal rdzogs// dog sgo gzhi las 'das par rdzogs// tshogs brgyad thig le ye shes brgyad du/
16b5(rnying rgyud): phung po lnga ni 'das pa lnga ru rdzogs// drug lnga khong khro 'das pa lta ru rdzogs// 'byung lnga sha khrag drod sems dbugs// 'das pa lnga ru rdzogs pas dbang chen thob// snying snod sku las 'das par rdzogs// dbus ni
16b6(rnying rgyud): yul las 'das par rdzogs// smad ni gnyis med 'das par rdzogs// bu ba ril chos las 'das par rdzogs// rtsa rnams thams cad mkhyen par rdzogs// zur brgyad ye shes brgyad du rdzogs// thel brgyad thig le
16b7(rnying rgyud): brgyad du rdzogs/ shel gyi sbu gu thugs rje'i rol par rdzogs// ngo bo sku las 'das par rdzogs// rang bzhin yul las 'das par rdzogs// zhugs rje gnyis med 'das par rdzogs// yon tan ye shes zad thal
17a1(rnying rgyud): dz+nyAnas/ sas sus sa / da bya rnam du da // mas /
17a2(rnying rgyud): 'a ma kha ga 'du ga nga spyog nga pa'i dzi pa da /
17a3(rnying rgyud): mtshan 'du sa // na lam sa pa/ sa sa / de sa nga
17a4(rnying rgyud): gsang da'i bdag bzhu / nga gas da ngas// di pa da do/ pa rnaM ma/ chung po pa'i phyi pa par/ bzhis bye bgapas
17a5(rnying rgyud): ma pan// rdzogs gzhi sa byung ba da// de rlu shi pa rang sa nga kyid // nga batshul brten po'i
17a6(rnying rgyud): dun ga da / / di papa sa
17a7(rnying rgyud): mi sa 'dud ni'i byeb pa dag 'o thal ma dru ga sus pa su du ba 'a sa ga nan pa
17b1(rnying rgyud): yid dang 'gru ba 'dra dang gsum// rang thung rang la shar pas sku gsum lam du bskang // 'byung lnga rang 'ung 'od las grol ba na// lha ldan ye shes mig gcig dri ma med// thugs rje byin rlabs mkha' la nyi shar
17b2(rnying rgyud): 'a // bskal pa bar pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs dang // thog ma'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med pa dang // tha ma'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad dang gsum// bka' ba gros chud du byin brlabs nas// sangs rgyas
17b3(rnying rgyud): bka' bgros rgyud ces bya// gzhi yi chos lnga ldan grub yin// de ma shes pas 'khrul pa yin/ lam gyi 'od lnga rang snang yin// de ma shes pas 'khor ba yin// 'bras bu 'khor pa rnam bzhi yin// dri ma
17b4(rnying rgyud): shes pas dngos po yin// gzhi shes pas ni grol ba de// thams cad mkhyen pa thob pa yin// lam shes pas ni rang byung ba// 'khor ba'i g.yang sa chod pa yin// 'bras bu 'das pa sngar grol bas// 'khor
17b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'bras bu chod pa yin// ye shes spyan gsum gcig tu dri la// sangs rgyas spyan zhes rab tu brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ni// gos dkar mo zhes brjod pa yin// dgongs pa phyogs med
17b6(rnying rgyud): khyab pa yis// nam mkha'i dbyings phyug mo zhes brjod// thugs rje'i rlan dang mi 'bral bas// mA ma ki zhes rab tu brjod// thugs rje kun la snyoms par 'char// dam tshig sgrol ma zhes bya'o// theg pa'i rang
17b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin shes rab snying rje ste// phyi yi khyad par theg pa che chung bstan// 'og ma rnams ni rang don spyod pa yin// sngags kyi theg pa gnyis ka spyod pa yin// rdzogs pa chen po dbye ba med pa yin// bka'
18a1(rnying rgyud): // chung 'di ni bdag don gzhan don gnyis// rang grol dbang po'i khyad par ston pa yin// thabs dang shes rab nyan thos nyid du lhung / snying rje dang ni shes rab kyis// 'gro don ma lus byed pa po// snying rje chen po cir mi mdzad// me ba'i ye shes rnyed
18a2(rnying rgyud): dka' ba// shes rab thabs kyis 'gro don byed// grol nas grol ba'i lam yang ston// lam rnams kun gyi mchog tu bshad// thun mong khyad par mchog dang gsum// log lha ma dad le lo dang // ma rig pa de lam du slong // de spod sangs rgyas sa la 'god// lam
18a3(rnying rgyud): kye mchog ces bya ba'o// zhes gsungs so// lha rgyad rin po che spungs pa pas/ jo sprod kyi lha bsgom las grol ba'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dang // ye shes rnam pa
18a4(rnying rgyud): bzhi ru 'dus// thun mong khyad par mchog dang gsum// thun mong 'khor lo lnga la gnas// brgya dang nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod// de yang bsdus pas gsum du 'dus// de yang a ba d+hU tir 'dus// a ni tshig dbang rin po che// wa ni gsang ba'i ye shes dbang // 'a ni shes rab
18a5(rnying rgyud): dbang yin no// d+hu ni thabs kyi dbang yin no// ti ni bum pa'i dbang zhes bya// thams cad 'dus pas bum pa'i dbang // tshig tu mtshon pas ming gi dbang // brgyud pa ma chad lnga yi dbang // rang chos ston pas dbu rgyan dbang // zung du 'brel pas rdo rje dril bu'i dbang // rig pa'i
18a6(rnying rgyud): dbang lnga zhes kyang de la bya// de ni khyad par dbang zhes bya// de ni mchog gi rtsa bstan pa// zag pa med pa'i dbang bskur te// gzhi la rtsa rlung lhun gyis grub// phra ba'i rtsa dang rig pa'i rtsa// dngos po 'khrul pa'i rtsa dang gsum// dang po'i rtsa ni zag bcas yin// de la sbyangs
18a7(rnying rgyud): na bded skye// bde ba skyes nas lam du 'jug/ zag med rtsa ni bka' brgyad yin// gzhi yi rtsa dang rlung dang ni// thig la lhan sbas ye shes dang // lam dud lta bar ngo la// zag pa med pa'i ngo spod yin// 'bras bu dang sar grol ba'o// ngo spod shin rta gces pa yin//
18b1(rnying rgyud): deyang bkang bad+ha byed brgyad dag/ thugs su brtad dang byayin pas// bskal pa 'jug pa cug par ma brgyan// sems can las 'gro med pa dang // 'og ma thab mtha grod drags pas// dngangs shing gaganas sur brnye bas// yen pa yin pas pa/
18b2(rnying rgyud): dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur// des na bskal par 'ar mi 'byen// rdus ngan pa mthung ba'i tshe// mar me 'the kar gsal ba yin// bstan pa nu ba kAr da mtshos dang // gsal ba dang gsu gyi ba yid// dang pa'ang gas nub pa yin// des gsungs so// b+ha rlung po
18b3(rnying rgyud): spangs pa lasa~M/ rtsa drung thig le ye shes rlung gi le'u ste so gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ lha rgyang rin po che srungs pa 'di// ngo srod dbang bskur rgyad yin te// byid gyis brlabs kyis bshad pa yin// 'khor ba
18b4(rnying rgyud): d+hu du pa/ ye shes spyan gsum cung du rung // dbang bskur rgyal po'i rlud du rung // ye shes rten rdzogs rgyung du drung // ye shes 'khor lo'i byu rdung// ngaM nyid chen po'i chung du rlung // zhes gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpasu gsol pa/ legs so rdzogs sa sa nus pa'i
18b5(rnying rgyud): mchog/ de ltar gsungs par rjes y-i rang // 'khor rnams rab tu dgyes pa'o// byang chub sems dbang thug rje tshe// zhes gsungs so// gyung rin po che spangs pa las/ rjes su yi rang ba'i ye'u ste lo gsum pa'o// / lha nu rin po che spangs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba rdzogs so// pham pa'i
18b6(rnying rgyud): gdapas pa/ be rgyal khams yongs la babang po che khrims sa che/ 'dra bangs yongs la kon ma tshig sa nan pa de// ljags pa kun kyis ngan sngags rngaban btsun// rnal 'byor rnams kyisna tshul 'chos sbyangs tu brjing // rnga ma'i gdams pa grubs thub// gco
18b7(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis chad las me dag la bzang // mo btsun rnams kyis lus khrims dman badz+ran// chos sbyor srung mas bstan pa bsrungs na btsun// gdams ngag srog pas gces pa byas na byi phyir btsun// slob dpon bi ma las de skad gsungs so//
19a1(rnying rgyud): phya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI d+ha Sha ta n+t+ra rat+na mAl+yA nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bshad rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor
19a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i sems can thams cad kun// ma rig pas ni rgyu byas nas// las dang nyon mongs rkyen dbang gis// sdug bsngal rgya mtshor chud pa rnams// sdug bsngal mtsho las bton pa ni// byang chub bde la bkod pa'i phyir// gsang dbang lag na
19a3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje yis// 'jam dpa' don gyi mtshan brjod pa'i// rgyud kyi snying po pud+ha rdzogs 'di// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// thub pa'i dbang po nyid la khrus// de don sbyin rdzi ma log par// rjes 'jug rnams kyis rtogs bya'i phyir/
19a4(rnying rgyud): gas la rjod smon ma swA bu khrus// e mchos rnams pa na cing // zab cing rgya tshe'i dini ston pa// 'jam dpal don gyi mtshan brjod pa'i// rgyud kyi snying po lhur rdzogaso 'di// mar me 'chi ka'i 'od bzhin du// bstan pa 'jig ka'i dus dag tu
19a5(rnying rgyud): tal ba'i thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// 'dzam bu gling gi dbus su dang // skal ldan rnams kyi sgron me byed// las dang nyon mongs gnyen po byed// dang po'i 'og min chos dbyings su// gsang sngags glu 'di rang sgrar bshad// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// sangs rgyas
19a6(rnying rgyud): dpag med rnams la gsungs// de nas lha gnas gsum du grags// sbrul skye 'khor lo bsgyur rgyal gyis// lha rnams dang ni drang srong dang // rig 'dzin tshogs la bshad pa yin// tha ma 'dzam gling dbus su grags// bya rgod phung po'i ri yi 'gram/
19a7(rnying rgyud): bya rkang ri yi rje dag la// sangs rgyas bcom ldan shAka thub kyis// lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal// khro tshogs lnga brgya dang bcas la// zab cing rgya che'i mtshan don bshad// gsang ba'i bdag po nyid kyis bsdus// 'phags pa 'jam dpal
19b1(rnying rgyud): bshang chung rin po che'i byung ba las/ byang tshul bstan pa'i le'u skye dang po'o// / de nas gsang dbang la gan rdo rje pas// ston pa la ni dri bad+his// 'dum dpal du bri marga nu brjod pa'i// rgyud kyi d+hing ba spyan rdzogs
19b2(rnying rgyud): 'di// bshad pa'i tshul ni ji ltar bshad// rgyud kyi don ni ji lta bu// rgyud kyi mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// le'u'i skabs rnams du zhig mchis// le'u drug ye shes 'chang ba ci// rim gyis go rim ma mthun gang // rgyas bsdus
19b3(rnying rgyud): rim pa du zhig gsungs// srub thabs lha ni du zhig mchis// zab mo rdzogs pa'i rim pa yi// gdams ngag gnad ni ji ltar lags// tshig gi bka' tshoms ji ltar bshad// dri ba rnam pa bcu yi don// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol//
19b4(rnying rgyud): de skad zhus pa'i tshig don rnams// 'khor gyi rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal mdzod// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bshad rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba las/ 'khor gyis zhus pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
19b5(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ 'khor la zhal gzigs 'dzum pa mdzad// ljags brkyangs nas ni tshig gsungs pa// 'jam dpal don mtshan brjod pa yi// rgyud kyi snying po lhun rdzogs 'di//
19b6(rnying rgyud): bshad tshul rnam pa bzhi yin te// chos rnams zab cing rgya che ba'i// bdag nyid du ni sangs rgyas dang // 'gro bas de ma rtogs tshul dang // thugs rje bskyed tshul nyid dang ni// de las dam chos gsung tshul lo// dam chos gsung tshul rnam bzhi ste/
19b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas par gsung dang 'bring bsdus 'jug/ de las rgyas par gsungs pa ni// dug gsum nyon mongs cha mnyam pa'i// gnyen po brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo // theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis// 'gro ba'i don la ston pa'o// 'bring ni rnam pa
20a1(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis te// mdo dang dbyangs dang lung du bstan// tshig bcad ched brjod gleng gzhi'i sde// rtogs brjod de byung skyes pa'i rabs// rgyas dang rmad byung gtan la phab// yan lag bcu gnyis skyed rtsa bton/
20a2(rnying rgyud): bsdus pa sde stod gsum dag ste// mdo rje 'dul 'i chom mngon na// de yang rnam pa bzhi phyin te// gang gsung gang rje gang gaphyir// tshul ni ltar bslus pa'o// gdon brdung dang gnyis bshud pa'o// gang du sde stong gsum du// gang kyi
20a3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa gsum yin te// gnyen po'i don phyir gsum nyid dang // bslab gsum rgyud la skye phyir gsum// chos dang chos phyir bsdu ba gsum// bsdu tshul la ni rnam gnyis te// don dang tshig gi sgo nas so// don la rnam pa gsum bshad de//
20a4(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa gtsor skyon modo yi ste// bsrung sdom gcod ston 'dul ba yin// lte ba gtsor skyon mngon pa yin// tshig bsku rnam po gsum yin te// thug pa tshe chung thun mong gsum// mdo sogs rim lnga mdo pa ste// de rjes rnam bzhi 'dul ba ste//
20a5(rnying rgyud): tha mu gsum ni mngon pa'o// don theg parjing du yin// rgyas dang rba dpung med gyi sde// mdo sa gos su ni 'dul ba la// gtan la phrab pa mngon pa ste// de ni theg pa chen po'i gzhang// dang po lnga ni mdo'i ste// de rjes drug nI 'dul ba yin//
20a6(rnying rgyud): mngon pa thun mong gzhung // theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po// gang zag blo yi rim pa gnyis// theg chen thun mong ma yin pa'i// dbang du rnas te bshad pa la// mtshan nyid rgya yi theg pa dang // 'bras bu rdo rje theg pa'o// theg pa gsum gyi nges
20a7(rnying rgyud): 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// de la yang ni lnga yin te// su gsung thugs dang yon tan las// 'di ni 'jam dpal su yaM sbyar// zab dang rgya che'i lam dang 'bras// khyad par bshar lugs bzhi pas bshang // thun mo
20b1(rnying rgyud): gas thos bshad// bya gnas la bang dus pa sogs// na rdzogs pa pas gzhi bzadang // bshad rgyal bdun pas gnas skabs nga// rlung ca rnam pa 'ad 'du bsnang // dang ba mog cag bang// gag
20b2(rnying rgyud): skabs rna bu pas// cung rtsig nga tshogs sa rnams bcad // dang moganing pa'i 'bros hA ngas// gor 'og tshig gi 'brel par byur// rje dgyen cod po skye bu posaM// brgal ba yin gyis bskyed pa \u0f7f// drang dka dpo ba// wang shes
20b3(rnying rgyud): gang zag rid rgyas bya// bu gla ga gzad 'dum lta bugs// gdams ngag gnad byung skal ldan d+ha // dra srul rlung 'gros stu rla bas// pi go dI dbyu joms tshig mtha' brgya pa// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bshad chung rin po che'i phreng ba pas/
20b4(rnying rgyud): bgang thabs kyi yan lag bstan pa'i 'a b+ha gsum pa'o// / rig nang khri ston cig/ gis ba'i nga sbyid na bsdud du// dang saTIg peb// bya dang dgos 'gyub la// dbye ngas pa'ir shes byaste// rtag na/
20b5(rnying rgyud): rnonas dbye ba dang // gnalapa 'bras thang da bri ba dang // rtsa ba dang ni yan lag dang // spyod sgro nas dbye 'o// ro bo dkyilas shes par bya// nges pa'i tshig ni drug yin te// phun sum tshogs rdzas chad kyid dang // 'grob dang masbya
20b6(rnying rgyud): sgyi dang // 'khrugs pa'i phyi dang dag sung gyid// gsang sngag pa pa sgrub pa ston phying ro// l+r-ing mau dganying na yin te// gle gni dang ni ldeng bslang dang // yongs su shes bu dngos po ban// mjug tu yongs sugatad dang nga // med
20b7(rnying rgyud): rnam btsun// ltab dkyil lokhorang dbang dam dang // 'grub pa phrin pas sngags phyag rgya// ting 'dzin mchod dang rnam bcu pas// gsang sngags rgyud kyi dbyeb bstan// lba ba'i don la rnam bcu ste// ngom mtshan nyid nge satshig bri// ma
21a1(rnying rgyud): dpe rtogs thabs phan yon dang // rtogs pa shi rtags dang rtogs pa'i tshad// martogs nyes dmigs skung byed do// smye dgag me dang mtshan nyi dag na// ma dbyings la g+ha N+Ding dang // ming tsam snang rtsir gnang
21a2(rnying rgyud): bzhengs dbye// mthun dpe rnam pa bdun du sbyar// nyi ma rdo rje rin po che// num mkha' rgya mtsho bad+hA gser// lung dang gdam sangag rtogs pa'i thabs// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang sgrib las grol// chags sdang kun bral gyogs zhin med// 'jol
21a3(rnying rgyud): pa myi trang lung dang rigs// shes rab chen pos smad cig la// chos bcu khong du chud pa po// dkyil 'khor don la rnam gnyis te// thub pa chos nyid dkyil 'khor dang // rgya rtags kyi kyi la labor ngo // chos nyid do kyi kyil 'khor ni// dkyil
21a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor chen po yangs pa yin// hUM med chos de sna tshogs don// ci yang min las cir yang 'char// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog chen po// rgya chen rtags la dgu yin te// gzhi dang ngo bo des tshig dang // dbye ba snang lugs sgom thabs dang // tshad dang
21a5(rnying rgyud): phan yon nyes dmigs so// gzhi nis gzhi phung po sems// phyi nang gsang bar shes par bya// rgyal ba'i pho brang 'khor dang bcas// rig pa chos nyid snying po la// rigs bzhi lha dang lha mo'i 'khor// dkyil 'khor zhes ni de phyir brjod// dbye ba
21a6(rnying rgyud): gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor dang // ting 'dzin rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gsum// goms dang mgoms bye brag gis// dngos dang ting 'dzin yul du snang // yang na dbang po rab 'bring gsum// chos sku longs su sprul sgra'o// bsgom pa rim
21a7(rnying rgyud): ma macig car ro// rdul chen 'dom gang srung zhi la// ting 'dzin phyogs tshad tshad yin no// bris pas rtogs pa bskyed byed cing // bsgom pas tha ma la zhen pa bzlog// 'khor ba mi glol nyes pa'i byor// dbang la mo gtos der shes bya// tha sa
21b1(rnying rgyud): nga rgyag dang / dgas kyi dbang nying ngo // zab pa ngan kyi dbang dadang// ngag pa'i rgyal dbang thob pa ste// ma nyad rtogs pa dbang byas bya// lags dbang bslang pyod pa na can/ b+hU rtags kyi dbar bskur la// rnam par
21b2(rnying rgyud): bzhing shes byaste// chu dang ngo po nges rjeg dang // dbyeb rnam grangs bskur tshig dang // thob rkyen las dang dbang bskur rlabs// dus dag dang ni 'dzin byed ted// dpe dang chen pon zhes dmigs so// rtswa nis ponas thon baHsa// sri bar
21b3(rnying rgyud): bye snang la dgong // gsang sngags kyi du sgrupa pa dang / por dag pa dbang phyi dab // dbye dAm pon byi // ma pa'i dbang dang gapang pa dadang / sa rab po kyi skyed pa rgyu dang / dbang bstan pa pa/
21b4(rnying rgyud): dusaya shA pa // da / nga ga // nga zla dpa pa nga/
21b5(rnying rgyud): badzin bye byin no// ma drang pong bzhug pa spang / ma pa na ma cing mchog/ rnam pa la tu cing// rjod phung bar byeng byeng ngo // dbang bad snang du // bang sngags pa tsu dang byung bad// tham la brim dupa cig
21b6(rnying rgyud): du mi ga byu sa// da ma su yi da// rlu du phyu nga nga ba hU~M/ bas so// rnam da// sa kyi
21b7(rnying rgyud): mi'i thang dpa ga sa/ 'du ga // drang ba dab da ci// yi tsho la nyigs sasaso// sems rgyags pa pos dru/ mi dang bye rje ba 'a//
22a1(rnying rgyud): nyan mongs chung // dbang nyid mtho brtags dag kyang // gsang ba'i man dag tu tshal bar na// rtang pa 'dun kyang ni yang zad// rdod slob pad la spyang byeng // slob ma dang ldan dbang la mos// dgos pa rdzas
22a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs bsrung ba'i dus// snod ngan byung na sbyang ba'i thabs// slob dpon gyis ni sbyin bsreg dang // tsha tshal sogs mdo yang gdon// slob mas sgrib pa rgyan gcod gdon// phyi bshags nang bshags ci nus bya// bum pa'i dbang gi nges tshig
22a3(rnying rgyud): kyang // dbu rgyan la sogs rdzas rnams kun// gcig pa'i phyir dang 'dus phyir dang // spros med mtshon phyir bum pa smos// dbye ba phyi nang gsang ba gsum// rang shar brda yi bum pa gyi// rang lus rtags kyi bum pa nang // gsang ba chos
22a4(rnying rgyud): kye bum pa'o// dbang bskur slob dpon mtshan nyid ni// lta ba ma nor gdong ldan zhing // ting 'dzin lha gsal rgyud la mkhas// las dang bya ba'i thabs la mkhas// grub pa brnyes pas dbang bskur bya// 'di la dkyil 'khor du zhe na// bsdus dang
22a5(rnying rgyud): 'bring dang shin tu rgyas// bsdus pa ye shes sems dpa'o// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog/ 'dring ni rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas// phyag rgya bzhi bcu tham pa'o// sangs rgyas su lnga'i bdag nyid
22a6(rnying rgyud): can// rgyal ba rigs lnga yab yum dang // sems dpa' sems ma sgo ba dang // nyan thos 'jig rten gtso bo dang // dkyil 'khor rgyal po 'di ru 'dus// de la dbang gi bye brag ni// dkyil 'khor gang blang bsrung thabs gang // sgrib pa gang dag gdams
22a7(rnying rgyud): ngag gang // lta ba spyod pa dam tshig dang // 'bras bu dag dang brgyad yin no// dkyil 'khor rdul tshon nyid las blangs// bsrung gnas slob ma'i spyi bor bsrung// sgrib pa las kyi sgrib pa dag/ gdams ngag bskyed rim gdams ngag ston// lta bsngag
22b1(rnying rgyud): kyi nyan thos rtogs// spyod pa dam rdzas lnga la spyod// dam tshig rtsa ba gcig nyid dang // yan lag dang ni bcas pa'o// 'bras bu mi dang lha gnas su// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po thob// gsang ba'i dbang la brgyad yin te// rgyu dang gang zag dgos
22b2(rnying rgyud): ched dang // thob pa'i rtags dang mdze ba rtags// srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs ma spangs// nges pa'i tshig dang bye brag go// dka' thub sdom pas mi gdung zhing // gsang ba'i don mos skye ba'i rgyu// gang zag sdod du mi rung ba// dge slong bram ze rkang po dang /
22b3(rnying rgyud): dad med dam med 'dir ma yin// dgos ched mos rang gsang thub dang // gsang ba sngags kyi byin rlabs 'byung // gsang mchog rgyal po 'di thob na// gang zag rnams la mi brten cing // rgyud rnams gcor len bsgrub la gus// dgon pa la dga' bzlas
22b4(rnying rgyud): brjod grems// theg pa dman yang gtong bar byed// 'di ni gsang mchog thob pa'i nags// dman pa'i sbyor ba dang du len// gsang ba'i don la srur pa 'debs// gsang ba'i gsang mtshan spogs shing gzho// 'di ni gsang dbang ma thobartags//
22b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dbang mchog 'di thob pas// pad ltar srid pa'i 'dod rgyags spang // dngos grub 'byung ba'i gsang dbang do// kun lagasang phyir gsang zhes bya// gsang dbang bye brag dgu yin te// dkyil 'khor bsrung gnas dag pa'i tshul// gang mas
22b6(rnying rgyud): dang sa dang blta ba dang // smod pa dam tshig 'bras bu'o// dkyil 'khor yab yum mkha' las blang // bskur gnas slob ma'i lce la byung // sgrib padag gi sgrib pa dag/ gdams ngag rang byung ye shes ston// skal pas brgyad non dang mtshungs// blta ba theg pa sems
22b7(rnying rgyud): tsam rtogs// spyod pa sbyong spe'i la sogs pa// gsang ba'i mdzad spyod rnams la spyod// dam tshig nyi shurtsa brgyad bsrung // 'bras bu tshong dbang rig 'dzin 'thob// gsang sngags don kun bskyed pa'o// shes rab ye shes rabang mchog la// rnam pa bcug cig shes
23a1(rnying rgyud): b+han+tu// s+yA dang stod du ma rung chad// spyod du rang ba tsud dang hrIhA// de la chos ni du sma dang // zang du 'brel dang blob rtags dang // mthob rtags dang bsrung chog dang // nges pa'i rngog dang bye brag go// thig chen mchog la mos shing /
23a2(rnying rgyud): bum dang gsang ba rnam gnyis thob// thabs deng shes rab zung du 'brel// de ni thob par byed pa'i rgya// shes rab ye shes de bo ni// kun gyi thun mod ma yin pas// snong dang 'phya dang yal bang dod// snod du mi rung brtan mi bya// brdung mchog seng ge'i ngo mni// snod
23a3(rnying rgyud): mchog rin chen gser snod brug/ mchog la mos shing dbang gnyis bgrod// shes rab ldan zhing dam tshig ldan// 'di ni snod du rung ba'i tshad// rten ni rang byung ye shes la// sgron mun bsal ba ji bzhin no// lus dang dgra la brten pa'i dbang // bgrod pas rnam gnyis
23a4(rnying rgyud): mi rtag 'gyur// shes rab la ni chos bzhi ste// ngo bo nyid dang gsang don rtogs// ma bsgribs pa dang rnam bzhi yin// ye shos la yang rnam bzhi ste// byed pa med par rang byung dang // ye don nges par shes pa dang // rkyen gyis mi 'gyur shes bya gsal// gang gis
23a5(rnying rgyud): rang byung rtogs gyur na// thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel// snang ba mi 'gog thabs yin no// zhen chags med pa shes rapa yin// gang gis gsang chen rtogs pa'i rtags// 'khor ba'i chos la zhen pa log/ mnyam pa'i rjes su gzhol ba'o// snying rje
23a6(rnying rgyud): byang sems rab tu 'phel// dbang mchog ma thob rtags dag kyang // dbul po phyug por khas 'che 'dra// nor 'dod phyir na ngan las byed// theg pa chen por khas 'ches kyang // tra snyid 'dod phyir mi phyir 'brang // dbang ma thob ste bskyang 'dod na// dad ldan tshul
23a7(rnying rgyud): shes ngan song sbyong // tshul dang ldan par gyen brlangs te// yang dang yang du snyoms 'jug gsal// bla me dpe ru nam mkha' gsal// lung dang man ngag rig pas spyir// shes bar ba yin ye shes yin// de phyir shes rab ye shes so// sa
23b1(rnying rgyud): la ni rnam pa brgyad// dkyil 'khor bskur gnas 'dag tshul dang // gdams dag blta spyod dam tshig dang // 'bras bu bstan pa nyid dang brgyad// dkyil 'khor bla ma'i zhal las byung // gnas ni slob ma'i sems la bsung // sgrib pa sems kyi sgrib pa/
23b2(rnying rgyud): dag/ gdams dag ye shes ngos bzung ston// blta ba gnyis med ye shes rtogs// spyod pa dang shugs dgag bslab med// dam tshig mnyam pa chen po bsrung // 'bras bu sku gsum ye shes lnga// shes rab ye shes me bo che// bcu drug phyed phyed thig le cen//
23b3(rnying rgyud): yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das// dbang bzhi pa ni de dag la// rgyas 'debs pa yi man ngag ste// gnyis med gnyis su med par ston// yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas// rang rig 'gag med 'dus ma byas// pade chen rang bzhin dngos med ston// ma skyes
23b4(rnying rgyud): gsal ba ye shes su// de yi gnas la goms par bya// dbang bskur ba dang rab tu gnas// go 'phang bsgom dang ring du sbyin// byin brlab ces bya rnam grangs so// de la dbang 'di bskur tshul dang // slob ma'i snod dang mos sbyar la// ting nge 'dzin ni rdul tshod
23b5(rnying rgyud): la// brten te rim ma ma cig car bskur// dbang thob rkyen la rnam bzhi ste// bla mas dbang thob nus ldan dang // slob ma dang ldan yod pa la// bla ma mnyes par byas pa dang // dbang gi cho ga legs pa'o// dbang go las ni slob ma yi// dri ma dag
23b6(rnying rgyud): par byed pa'o// bskur thabs rnam pa bzhi yin te// phyi ltar rdzas la brten nas bskur// nang gi rdzas gzungs brtan te bsrung// gsang pa ting nge 'dzin la bsrur// mthar thug gdams dag brten te bskur// dus ni sdig pa las thog pa// gsang sngags
23b7(rnying rgyud): chos la mos dus so// dbang rnams 'dzin pa'i rten dag ni// de mtshig yin te nyams na yal// dpe ni kyang dang ri mo ltar// dbang rnams bsrung ba'i phan po// ni// gsang sngags snod du rung ba dang // dus 'di tshun chad rgyal ba'i sras// dbang ma bsrung ba'i nyes dmis
24a1(rnying rgyud): rgyun pa lamags pa rnam pa rnams// 'bras pa na cing bcug par gyur// du gdan la rnamags/ sa rnamam nga// ba'angasachags/ dan sadang gan// rangasangs
24a2(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa chen po rtogs// dan mig kun gyi mchog tu gsungs// de mi dang las mi 'dra' bar// blo dang ldan pas gnas par bya// rgya che bsrung ba'i dam tshig la// don ni bco lngar shes par bya// rgyu dang ngo bangs tshig dang // dbyabang pa dang nam grang pa das//
24a3(rnying rgyud): las dang che ba bsrung thabs dang // tams rgyu nyams rtags skrod pa dang // bskud thabs pan yon nyes dmigs so// rgyu ni rtsab byang chub sems// ngo bo bsrung bar bya ba rnams// sems pa rgyun ma chad pa'o// nges tshig dam pas gsung rnams la// 'das
24a4(rnying rgyud): bar bya ba ma yin la// 'das na tshig phyir da mtshig go// dbye ba gsum ste sti dang ni// khyad par lhag pa'i dam tshig go// khyad par la ni rtsu ba dang // yan lag dag tu shes par bya// dpe ni so mkhar lta bu'o// dam tshig sdom pa tha tshig ste// ya la gam
24a5(rnying rgyud): zhes bya rnam grangs so// las ni sdig pa spong byed cing // legs pa'i yon tan 'dzin par byed// dam tshig dag gi che ba ni// bla med dam tshig 'di nyid du// bsrung bya kun 'dus rnam par dag/ bsrung thabs g.yo sgyu med pa yis// dran dang shes bzhin byangs
24a6(rnying rgyud): bsrung // 'khor ba'i chos la chags sdang che// chos la sgo sgur phyogs 'dzin dgas// dadang rtson shes rab snying rje zung // gnyid dgang chang dang rung 'dod che// gsang mi thub pa nyams pa'i rgya// 'khor dang longs sbyi me rtag dang // me sogs na ma tsho tsho
24a7(rnying rgyud): hru// mnyas dang skamakha' 'gro rgyad// brtsam pa'i las la 'bras bu meng// mid sa da tshogs 'byung // 'di rnams dam tshig nyams pa'i rnags// dam cig tams pa'i spyod pa na// rgya ma nga bras pa'o// nga bgams pa'i myod padzin// ba
24b1(rnying rgyud): mkhas par 'dod pa dang // sta bcugs sa nyon mangs dgas// ma ba dpa ma thad gsung thu bla ma// da chag rnams pa'i bsang thabs ni// yan lag dam tshig rnams gyur na// phyi bshags nang bshags 'badad bya// rtsa ba dag cag /
24b2(rnying rgyud): gyur na// blamal ni 'bul ba bsgyur// srul rgyal bu'i gzugs smra bya// gsung la med 'don ba kres brjod bya// thugs la mtshan bcas mtshan med bsgom// mchog tu bsgri mdon la 'bad// dmachog bsrungs pa'i phan yon ni// mcho gdud zan
24b3(rnying rgyud): srong dngos grub bo// nyams pa'i nyes dmigs rnam gnyis te// 'di dang phyi mar sdug bsngal 'grub// dngam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen// khyab bdag tshig chen de nyid mkhyen// gal te gsang sngags bsgrub 'dod na// dam tshig la ni gnas par bya// dam tshig dag da
24b4(rnying rgyud): mi ldan na// phyi dang sngo snod kun mkhas kyang // 'dab gshog med pa'i bya bzhin te// dmyal ba'i gnas su tshim med// bslab pa'i don la gnyis yin te// zab pa don gyi bslab pa dang // rgya che ba yi bsgrub pa'o// gnyis med don la bsgrub pa ni// zab pa don gyi 'gyur/
24b5(rnying rgyud): pa min// na chen bstan pa bcu gcig ste// rgyu dang ngo bo ngas tshig dang // dbye dang bsrub tshul rnam grangs dang // chu rkyen gang zag dmigs pa dang // phan yon dang ni nyes dmigs so// rgyu ni rang la gnas pa yi// byang chub sems kyi yon tan bsgrub// ngo bo dngos grub
24b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis 'grub par// byed pa'i thabs kyi rim pa'o// nges pa'i tshig ni thabs 'di phyis// dgos don bsrub phyir bsgrub pa'o// dbyeb pa ni rnam bzhi ste// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bskyed dang // sgrub pa dang ni sta ba chen po// grub pa'i tshul lan ma gnyis te// shes rab
24b7(rnying rgyud): sgonas cig du// 'jug pa'i tshul gyis bsgrub pa dang // thabs kyi sgonas rim pa yis// 'jug pa'i tshul du bsgrub pa'o// sgrub pa'i tshul gyis bsgrub pa dang // bsgrub pa nyams su len pa dang // tshul bzhin spod dang lam la gnas// rnapa byed 'artson zhes rnam/
25a1(rnying rgyud): grangasas// dal zla' du rgyan no// gnas dang grogs dang nga mkhyud// smyanas nardzogs pas ban pa'o// slab nyan gyi gang dgan// dad ba can dam dzub ldan pa dang // shes rab kyang mtsho ba dang // dbang tho man ngag can/
