25a2(rnying rgyud): gyis brla ba// dmigs pa mchog dang thun mong ngo // phan yon 'dod pa'i don rnams kun// ji lta bar ni 'grub pa'o// ma bsgrubs nyes dmigs bstan pa ni// 'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khyams pa'o// phrin las la ni rnam gnyis te// zab pa don gyi drin las dang /
25a3(rnying rgyud): rgyache don gyi phrin las so// zab pa don gyi phrin las ni// mnyam nyid togs pa'i dang nas ni// las bzhi zinA las kun kyang 'grub// rgya che rtags kyi phrin las la// don ni bcu gcig shes bya ste// rgyu dang ngo bo nges tshig dang // dbye ba ming gi rnam grangs
25a4(rnying rgyud): dus// yul dang rtsom pa'i gang zag tshul// phan yon ma brtsams nyes dmigs so// chu ni tshad med rnam bzhi po// shes rab dang ni bcas pa'o// ngo bo bdag nyid chen po yi// thugs rjes 'gro ba phan 'dogs pa'o// nges tshig bya bar 'os pa'o// mdzad
25a5(rnying rgyud): spyod bya phyir phrin las so// dbye ba bzhi la sogs pa yis// phrin las dang ni mdzad spyod dang // bya ba zhes bya rnam grangs so// dus ni 'dul ba la sogs pa// skabs la bab pa'i dus nyid do// phrin las brtsam yul bstan pa ni// spyir ni sems can thams cad
25a6(rnying rgyud): lo// khyad par gnod sdig dbu la phongs dang // log lha can dang dregs pa can// nad dang gdon gyis nyen po'o// bsnyen pa rdzogs shing nus par ldan// mos pa'i gang zag yin par gsungs// phrin las brtsam tshul rnam gnyis te// nad dang phyi ru shes par bya'o//
25a7(rnying rgyud): nang ni shes rab ting 'dzin deng // bzlas pa dag la brten pa'o// phyi ni sbyin bsreg phur bu dang // thun dang gtor ma dkyil 'khor dang // mnan gtad sbyor la sogs pa bstan// phrin las brtsam pa'i phan yon ni// bdag gzhan don ni 'grub pa'o// las ma
25b1(rnying rgyud): brnams pa'i gas dmigs// bdag gzhan par spyod don mi 'grub// byed pa sems can kun don byung // sngags pa rnam pa gnyis yinate// zad pa'i sngags dang d+hacha sngags// rnabanga'i sngags dag tus medad na// gsal bsngags nas bshad pa yod/
25b2(rnying rgyud): 'i sngags pa don ts+tsha ste// sngags kyar rdul bcu mas bstan// rgya dang dbyub ra ba dang // ngos tshig pa zla thabs byed pa'i las// rtags dang mtshan nyid ngan yon dang // sngags dang mi ldan nyes dmigs so// rgyun byang chubasams nyid de// gag med
25b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdag nyid du// dbyib la ni nim gnyis te// don nyid ye shes rnaM nas dang // rtags nyid nga zlas pa'i smonas so// rngon gyi sgo nas dbye ba gsum// gsang sngags rig sngags gzungs sngags so// bzla thubs dbyen pa'i dzin te/ mu ni banod pa /
25b4(rnying rgyud): sngags// bskyed pa rkyen dang rnam pa las// skul ba'i sprin las sngags dang bzhi// de la sngags kyi pon// chos ny-i mnar de bzhin gnas// rlabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can// dA ni gsang sngags po yin// de don ljin cim lo gtogs// don
25b5(rnying rgyud): sngags spyong // gas pa'i dod pa la mongs gnas// de ni gzungs sngags ba yin// ba'ang gas kyi thun// gsang kyi dag tu brjod pa'o// mchog man hA zhes pa'o na// shes pa rjo phyir sngags de spyo// bstsu ba'i thabs la rnam sas
25b6(rnying rgyud): don gyi sngags kyi bad+ma 'thabs ni// rtogs shing lha sgrim yid la gsal// rtags kyi sngags la yang ni gnyis// rdo rje zhi ba'i bzlas pa dang // rdo rje jo bo'i bzla' thabs so// zhi ba shin tu mer chags bzlas// khro bo drag cing dar chags bzlas// del
25b7(rnying rgyud): yad ni rnam gsum ste// bstan pachu ba'i gzhung nyid 'dren// bsgrub pa phra nu dru bltar// las sbyor nam mkha'i thog 'bab sbyar// sngags kyi byed pa'i las bshad pa// gsang sngags ba zlas pas 'khrul rtogs la// rig sngags kyis ni marig pa'i/
26a1(rnying rgyud): gzungs sngags kyis ni dran nyams sal// brnas pa'i thugs kyis 'jig rten dang // 'dag tan 'das pa'i srog baphrul te// dngos grub sgyur du 'thud par byud// g+sas gsun rnam gsu // gas rtags da na
26a2(rnying rgyud): lha po dang // rig sngags rtag sa nI lha mo dang // gzungs sngags yub yum drung bu zal// mtshan nyid bstan pa rnam pa ste// shes rab dang ni nyid rje nyid// gsang stegs dag gi mtshan nyid yin// shes rab dang ni ye shes nyid// reng/ lcags
26a3(rnying rgyud): ni mtshan nyid de// shes rabu dang ni dran pa nyid// gzungs sdigs kyi ni mtshan nyid yid// bzlas pa sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni// brjod pa sgra yi bdag nyin no// dngos grub gnyis po 'grub pa ni// de ni sngags kyi phan yon no// sngags dang mi ldan
26a4(rnying rgyud): zhes dmigs ni// 'dod pa'i don rnams mi 'grub pa// sngags mchog sngags bdag rig sngags rgyal// gsang sngags rgyal po den chen byed// phyag tshwa don la rnam gnyis te// zlab mi 'dron dang rgya tshu bshad// rna tshogs snang ba'i chos rnams la//
26a5(rnying rgyud): ba med pa'i mayis bta'o// de ni don zab phrag d+ha'o// rgya cher bshad pa den brgyad de// da bro ngas chog bye ba dang // mtshan nyid pa dang phyag rgyar rgyu// pan yon ma ldan nyes dmigs so// ngo ba bdag nyid chen po'o// man na ma'i gzugs su gyur ba'o//
26a6(rnying rgyud): seMs kyis sprul pa'i mchod nas so// mtshan med pa yi bdag nyid do// nges tshig mu gus pa'i sgra// mtshon par byed dang mdzad pasrub// bcings grol byed dang rgyas 'debs phyir// phyag rgya zhes ni bshad pa yin// dbyen bsus dang zlas pa da //
26a7(rnying rgyud): bsdum pa la ni gnyis yin te// mtshan mang bcas pa'i phyag rgya dang // mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya'o// rgyas par dbye ba rnam bzhi ste// phyag rgya tsho ngang mchog rgya// chos dang las kyi phyag tu'o// phyag rgya'i mtshan ted bshad byab// mtshan bcas rgya
26b1(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid ni// rang rang don las mi 'da' dang // bdag nyid chen po'i rtags su ston// mtshan med phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid na// cir yang ma grub ngo bo nyid// phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid ni// yongs su rdzogs pa stong bdag med// dam tshig thugs mtshan mtshan
26b2(rnying rgyud): ma'o// chos ni chos kyi mtshan ma'o// las ni 'gro don mtshan nyid do// dpe ni rnam pa bzhir bshad de// mtshon dpe me dang ngu ba'o// mdzad pa blon po'i pho nya'o// bcing grol gar mkhan phu dung ngo // rgyas 'debs rgyal po'i bka' rtags so// rgya ni byang
26b3(rnying rgyud): chub sems nyid dang // rdo rje thal mo nyid yin no// phan yon bdag dang gzhan don 'grub// phyag rgya mi ldan nyes dmigs ni// bdag gzhan don min ngan song 'khyams// phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa// phyag rgya 'di ni bla na med// ting 'dzin bstan pa bcu
26b4(rnying rgyud): ste// rludang bangs rtog dang // dbye pa sgo ma rlabs pa sgom pa // mam thun phyogs dang sbyin bcos zabs// nga rdzi rtags dang yin yan dang // nyes dmigs bsgyun pa shes pa ste// rgyuni dang byang chub sems// ngas pa dmigs
26b5(rnying rgyud): don dag la// bsam pa rtse gcig gnas bya'o// nges tshig dran pas zin phyir ro// dbye ba gnyis su shes bya ste// zab mo mtshan med ting 'dzin dang // rgya chen mtshan bcas ting 'dzin no// sgom thabs rim dang cig car ro// dpe ni rgya mtsho ri dbang dang // 'ja'
26b6(rnying rgyud): tshon ri mo lta bu'o// mi mthun phyogs ni bying rgod gnyis// bcos thabs gsed dang rgod zhi sa// drod tshad phyi nang gsang ba'o// rtags kyang rmi lam 'byung ba dang // dngos su 'byung ba gnyis yin te// chags sdang chung zhing mngon shes 'char// de sogs rtags ni/
26b7(rnying rgyud): rim gyis 'byung // ting 'dzin bsgoms pa'i phan yon ni// mtshan ma can gyis mtho ris dang // tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin dang // phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin thob// zab mo mtshan med dgongs pa yis// kun bzang dbyar me sa chen non// ting 'dzin
27a1(rnying rgyud): med pa'i nyes dmig ni// 'khor ba ngan song las mi grol// nyid 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog/ ting 'dzin 'di ni mchog tu bsngags// mchod pa'i bye brag rnam gnyis te// zab pa don gyi mchod pa dang //
27a2(rnying rgyud): thun mong spyi bshad mtshan nyid che// zab mo gnyis med dang gnas pa// rgyal ba dang gis mnyes pa'i phyir// mchod pa zhes ni bshad pa yin// rgya chen dbye ba don bcu ste// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba dang // dbul ba'i thabs dang gang zag las// rdzas
27a3(rnying rgyud): dang yul dang dgos ched dang // ma phul nyes dmigs bstan pa'o// de la mchod pa'i ngo bo ni// 'phags pa mnyes par byed pa yi// lus ngag yid gsum rdzas dang bcas// dmigs pa las kyi bdag nyid do// des tshig 'phags pa mnyes byed phyir//
27a4(rnying rgyud): mchod pa zhes su bshad pa yin// dbye ba rnam pa gsum yin no// rnam lnga phyil dam rdzas nang // sbyor sgrol gsang bar shes par bya// rgyas par dbye ba brgya shes bya// dbul thabs mos pa'i tshul dang ni// sgyu ma lta bu'i blo yis dbul// dbul
27a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rten gyi gang zag ni// dad pa gsum ldan lhag sems can// las kyi tshogs gsog sgrib pa skyong // dge ba las kyi mngon 'gro ba'o// rdzas ni yon chab sogs bdun dang // bdud rtsi wa la sogs pa dang/ drang srong che dgu mchod cing brjod// mchod
27a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i yul ni 'jig rten dang // 'jig rten 'das pa'i dkon mchogasum// mchod pa phul ba'i dgos pa dag/ dngos grub rnam gnyis 'byung ba'o// mchod pa lnga ni ma phul ba'i// nyes dmigs 'dod don 'grub mi 'gyur// mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag
27a7(rnying rgyud): gi gnas// drang srong che dgus mchod cing brjod// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bshad rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba las/ gsang bcu rgyud kI lus bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lag na rdo rje
27b1(rnying rgyud): nyon cig/ slad du rgyud kyi mtshan smos pa// dbang po rab kyi don 'gyur gyir// 'phags pa'i don dang 'jam dpal don// mtshan gyi don dang brjod thabs don// rnam pa bzhi yis bshad pa yin// 'phags pa'i don la rnam gsum ste// byed pa'i tshig
27b2(rnying rgyud): bzhi dbye sgo bzhi// thabs kyi khyad par rnam bzhi 'phags// de la byed pa'i tshig bzhi ni// gang 'phags gang las gang gis 'phags// gang dang 'dra bar 'phags pa'o// dbye sgo rnam pa bzhi dag ni// brjod bya rjod byed sgrub pa lam// mthar sug
27b3(rnying rgyud): 'bras bus 'phags pa'o// thabs kyi khyad par bzhi dag ni// 'jam dpal don gyi mtshan brjod pa'i// rgyud kyi rgyal po lhun rdzogs ni// thabs meng pa dang mkhas pa dang // de bzhin sla dang myur ba yis// sngags kyi bstan pa khyad par 'phags//
27b4(rnying rgyud): de yang rgyung rgyal lhun rdzogs 'di// thabs mang ba yi rgyud yin pas// ji ltar bsgrubs kyang 'bras bu 'byung // theg pa sgra tshigs thabs tshul gyis// 'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po// thabs mkhas pa yi rgyud yin pas// ma yeng ye shes rgyun du 'char//
27b5(rnying rgyud): mkhas pa chen po 'dod chags che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// thabs sla ba yi rgyad yin pas// dka' thub sdom pas gzir mi dgos// shes rab chen pos skad cig la// chos kun khong du chud pa'o// thabs myur ba yi rgyad yin pas//
27b6(rnying rgyud): bskal pa du mar bgrod mi dgos// skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'jam dpal don la rnam drug ste// rang bzhin chu dang bsgom pa lam// mthar thug 'bras bu rnam pa dang // gdul bya las dag snang ba yang // grub mtha' so so la grags
27b7(rnying rgyud): dpal// de la mtshan gyi don bshad pa// zag bcas zag med la sogs pa// 'khor 'das thams cad 'jam dpal mtshan// ci'i phyir 'thad pa drug yin te// khyab pa'i phyir dang sprul pa'i phyir// rang bzhin phyir dang mkhyen pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i phyir dang
28a1(rnying rgyud): mnga' ba rta zer// tsas kun dngam dpal mtshon du da// mtshan kyang rjod thabs rnam gnyis te// rnab pa'i don dang tshad cag/ zab pa don gyi brjod lags s+ho// gnyis mdangad la 'dog pa'o// tshig la yang ni nam gsung
28a2(rnying rgyud): s+ya// gnyis med tshul dang gnyis sngags tshul/ na tan gsumadang rnam bigs ma// 'phags pa dam dpal rdzi bshad chu rin po rkye phreng ba las/ rgyud kyi mtshan bstan pa'i le'u lnga pa 'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
28a3(rnying rgyud): lag sa na ga/ 'du ma dpa 'a dun kyi nga // gas rgyud kyi nga po di// 'aM sangs ni bcug ga// rdus da gsad rigs la gzigs/ rgyu 'phrul dra ba'i man ga sa pa da // ye shes ga
28a4(rnying rgyud): nirtsol pa lan mi ma // de nas bcom ldani zhes pa nas// gcig cha gzigs gshegs pa'i 'dra// tshig gi padag pa zhes pa nas// yang dag sgra 'phrul mngon bye 'a// 'di skang sangs rgyas shes pa nas// theg pa chen de'i tshul gyis
28a5(rnying rgyud): mchog/ rtsa bzung chub sems kyil 6// sangs rgyas rnam par snang zhes nas// zhags pa yan chad ches dbyings len// rdo rje 'digs byed ces pa nas// sgra dang ldan pa ma long lta bu// yang dag bdag med ces pa nas// ye shes ma
28a6(rnying rgyud): gas pa'o// 'dod pa drin kru cas pa das/ na na'i rgya tur mthas nyi 'dra/ sangs rgyas rtogs byas pa rnaMs// dbas dang ldan mchog pa phyi'adra// sachog sbyin rjes pa nas// mi shes pa nyidang med pa'i ba /
28b1(rnying rgyud): lag nan rje zhes pa nas// chos kyi rgyal po phan yan laH// zhes rba d+ha rba zhes pa nas// \u0f88\u0f90rAg tu skyugs kyi ldang // de nas dpal ldan zhes pa nas// kun bshad yan chad rjes su yi rang ldeH// dbang bstan rnam pa gsu ma ste// dmigs pa /
28b2(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i yul dang ni// nyams su blangs pa'i thabs dag dang // nyams su blangs pa'i 'bras bu'o// dmigs pa'i yul la rnam gsum ste// sdud pa'i 'khor la dmigs pa dang // ston pa nyid la dmigs pa dang // rigs drug 'bras bu la
28b3(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa'o// nyams su blangs thabs le'u dgra// nyams su blangs pa'i 'bras bral// rnam pa gnyis su shes bya ste// bsgrub dang bshad pa'i 'bras bu'o// bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu yan yon le'u// bshad pa'i 'brus bu rjes yi rang ba'i
28b4(rnying rgyud): le'u'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bshad rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba las/ le'u'i skabs phye ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa// gsang ba'i bdag po seng nyin cig/ ye shes drug gI le'u bstan pa ni// de'i
28b5(rnying rgyud): 'thung ba bshad byab// 'khor 'das lam dang 'bras bu'i chos// kun gyi cha bar gyur pa'i phyir// rtsa bya byang chub sems kyi le'u bshad// gti mug ces dbyings ye shes te// rab tu bye ba'i rnam grangs kun// gti mug gnyen po yin pa'i phyir// chos dbyings
28b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes le'u bshad// zhe sdang me long ye shes te// rtogs pas spyan mongs ma lu u 'do nas// 'doms kyi drag po'i sgra 'is bshad// 'dod chags ngan rtogs mi shes te// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid rna nas/ mkhyen mdag tso cher bshad pa'i phyir// so sor
28b7(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa'i le'u bshad// nga rgyal mnyam nyid ye shes te// rin chen yon tan rigs yin pas// yon tan chab gcor ston phyir// mnyam nyid ye shes le'u bshad// phrag dog bya grub ye shes te// sems can kun gyi don byed pas// mdzad brgya
29a1(rnying rgyud): shA/ sun tu gas su na nas smra/ sa
29a2(rnying rgyud): la ga/ sa na na ga gas rnas sa// ga pa sa gas nas/ ga di mag /
29a3(rnying rgyud): 'd-i'i rigs smos la// chos kyi sngon pa mtshig yin no// gsung gis 'thab dren gyi'o// sa drug gi le'u'i skabs// rigs sku ye shes lnga rnams rje// bzhi 'i drud+yar byed pa'i phyir// thogs nyid pa yin// rgyas pa
29a4(rnying rgyud): gan gas/ sa ma 'i rnas /
29a5(rnying rgyud): pa rdzun sa/ ga da pa rdzun pa du / 'di /
29a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas/ gi sa pa // badzus pa 'i gas ma dang / mig sems dpa // dus// rdzu gas ba la// ma da rjes du
29b1(rnying rgyud): nyid can// rgyal ba rigs lnga yab yum dang // sems dpa' sems ma tho ba dang // nyan thos 'jig rten gca bkrAn// dkyil 'khor rgyal po 'di du 'dus// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bshud tud dran pa che'i phreng ba las/ dkyil 'khor lha'i bye brag bstan pa /
29b2(rnying rgyud): stedagra ba'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang ba nyon// zab mo'i gdams dag bshad bya ba// rnam pa dgu ru shes bya ste// rten gyi gang zag rtogs pa'i rkyen// rtogs thabs rtogs pa'i lta ba dang // bsgo ma dngas
29b3(rnying rgyud): mtshams rgya mtshan dang // 'bras bu thugs rje'i mdzad pa'o// 'di la 'jug par byed pa yi// gang zag mtshan nyid bcu gcig ste// dad brtson shes rab snying rje dang // the tshom med dgus 'chi ba dran// gtong phod sgyu med ngang tshul bzang // byang chub mchog gi rigs
29b4(rnying rgyud): yin pas/ dad cing gus la mnang gi sbyin// lung rigs mnang gtogs pa'i rkyen// thabs ni thos bsam rnam pa gnyis// lta ba bshad sgom sngar bshad mtshungs// de yang chos sku'i rang bzhin te// skye 'gag med pa'i mtshan nyid can/ kun tu bzang po'i
29b5(rnying rgyud): nyid// dge mi dge las grub pa min// mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab bya'o// mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa'i rgyu// gsal bar snang ste brtags na stong // rang ga rang rig 'dus ma byas// skyon bral bde ba chen po'i dang // rang bzhin dngos med stong pa'i dbyings//
29b6(rnying rgyud): yon tan ma 'gags cir yang yin// chos nyid nam mkha' chen po ste// thogs pa'i reg bya kun dang bral// thog ma med pa spros med bdag/ de bzhin nyid bdag dag pa'i bdag/ cho 'phrul sna tshogs cir yang sdang // thabs kyi thugs rje 'gag pa
29b7(rnying rgyud): med// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang // snang tshad thams cad 'jam dpal sku// grag ched thams cad 'ja ma dpal gsung // dran rtog thams cad 'jam dpal thugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas/
30a1(rnying rgyud): snangs mas sun gyi pa// sangs rgyams kyigasung yang // 'ad ma pa thabs la dza// gang jun lags byal das// rgya ba pa nams dus// sa sa sul la brtenan // pham sa sa /
30a2(rnying rgyud): yod sa byedan pa ni// gleza sde ba sgyu da// dkyi'i ma dag su ba 'o// ma.A la ga med// ma dag gra ny-i ga 'i/ bang pas // ngas rgyas pas/ na dpa par man
30a3(rnying rgyud): dang su byer dani kyi de 'dzi la// shA nas byo / pang pa pa ha~M/ mau dang // ma gams dang// 'a du sa yang gas
30a4(rnying rgyud): 'jug sa na gas sa pal gyi dang // pe na pags // sheg la mdza ba shid drug/ ga de'i shes s+ho// brags me tid pa / med med pa chub stod/ byed pamam ldan pa byu/
30a5(rnying rgyud): bad // da sog/ sa nga grod de // d+ma tsa rnam par band pa na ma 'bye ba da da snang ba las/ co gangs sungag gas da 'i/ da pa
30a6(rnying rgyud): da ngas pa da sa da ba nyi na// / dgas pa la mdang kyi byin pa dag pa
30a7(rnying rgyud): bshad kyang rin pa cing phreng bzhes pag don pag tsham rnam pa ba shad pa/ rgyag dkyim ban tra~M dang / lid kyi bgatag padzin dublangs pad+mo ni rjes gta la' das mi kyi nga dag rdzurgya pa la gta 'o// de byung ting dzunam gta ba lags so//
30b1(rnying rgyud): rgyag slad du/ man+t+ra th+liM skr-i sha yas byud yam snga ma n+ta d+hanA pa/ bod skad du/ 'das dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa gas sngags men pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyug 'tshal la// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/
30b2(rnying rgyud): me ri 'bar ba'i rtse mo sre la mu kha la sogs pas rnam par spros pa'i gnas na/ pad+ma kha dog kun tu 'bar ba'i gdan la/ sku gsung thugs 'jam dpal bdag nyid can du gyur pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs te/ lag na rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pa/ 'jig rten pa dang /
30b3(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rigs kyis bskor te/ thabs gcig tu 'khod pa ni/ nges pa'i don gyis tshogs pa dang / nges pa'i don spogs pa'i phyir/ 'khor gnyis su 'dus so// de nas lag na rdo rjes 'khod pa rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen te// lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu// rdzog sangs/
30b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas// thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni// spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa po// dam tshigA chen po de nyid mkhyen// dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis// bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku/
30b5(rnying rgyud): gtsug tor chen po tshig gi bdag/ ye shes sku ste rang byung ba// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog/ don zab don ni rgya che zhing // don chen mtshungs med rab zhi pa// thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba// 'das dang mabyon da ltar
30b6(rnying rgyud): kyis// glur blangs pa ni gang lags pa// dgongs pa 'dus don gsung du gsol// gsang 'dzin ji nas bdag gyur phyir/ nges par 'byung ba'i bar du 'di// bdag gis bsam pa brtan pos gzung // nyon mongs ma lus bsal ba dang // mi shes ma lus spangs pa'i
30b7(rnying rgyud): phyer// sems can rnams la bshad par 'tshal// zhes zhu ldan sa rdo rje ser 'ad pa'i thugs nyid kyi gsang mdzod do kye ste/ ye shes rlung gi bum pa dril// ljags kyi rtse nas gsung gi 'od 'phro ba// ring zhing yangs pa brkyang mdzad de// 'jig rten
31a1(rnying rgyud): gsum po snang byed cing // bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams 'dul byed pa// sems can rnams kyi ngan song gsum// sbyong bar byed pa'i 'jam bstan nas// tshangs pa'i gsung ni ldan pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsungs// 'jam
31a2(rnying rgyud): dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog/ dag par byed cing sdig sel ba// de yi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i don// nga las nyan par brtson pa ni// legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // 'jam dpal dgongs pa ngas bshad do// zhes
31a3(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// 'jam dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa las/ gleng gzhi dang mtshan gyi le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa legs zung zhig/ gsang sngags phyi nang bskyed rdzogs gnyis// mtshan brjod nyid du 'phro zhing
31a4(rnying rgyud): 'du// 'di ru de yi dgongs pa 'dus// gsang sngags 'bras bu lam khyer lnga// sku gsum ye shes lnga yi bdag/ ye nas lhun grub ma shes par// so so'i yan lag yig 'bru bskyed// mtshan ma'i chos la blo zhen pas// yang dag lam mchog de ma bskyed//
31a5(rnying rgyud): sa
31a6(rnying rgyud): rig pa// ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog/ shes rab reg pa'i sku lpags la// de la gdul bya rnam gnyis la// gcig las mi g.yo sgyu gnyis snang // so sor mi gnas gcig gi dang // so so rang rig mi g.yo ba// mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chad// ya she
31a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis med tshul 'chang ba// rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub// zhi ba'i thabs kyi gdul ba la// ye shes bum pa'i klong yangs su// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid can// ye shes su ste rang byung ba// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che// gdong lnga gtsag phud lnga
31b1(rnying rgyud): dang lhan// ye shes snang ba lam me ba// 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed// gzi brjid ci ngo ltar rgyu// sum cuca gnyis mtshan chung ba// kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs byas// bcu drug byed byed pag pacan// dkying 'thor /
31b2(rnying rgyud): chen po yangs pa yin// ye shes gdangs kyi phung po lnga// lnga yi bdag nyid bcu ming can// sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag 'dzin pa// dri med dag pa'i mkha' la gsal// byang dang me long dus mtshungs kyang // g.ya' dang dri ma ma dag pas// bud bzhin rnam pa gsal mi nus// re 'o
31b3(rnying rgyud): g.yang dang bral ba la// byad kyi dri ma dag pa gsal// chos nyid rig pa ma bral yang // 'byung ba phra rags rnam pa dang // sems rtog phra rags rnam pa gsum// chod pas sku dang dngas ma gsal// gnyis po phra ragasalnga dag nas// btsal dang 'ong ba med bzhin
31b4(rnying rgyud): rtog med ye shes snang ba gsal// rdul med dul bral dri ma med// rnam par dag pa bdag med chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung // a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med// tshig tu brjod pa spang ba ste// brjod pa kun gyi
31b5(rnying rgyud): rgyu yi mchog/ tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// sems can ma lus dga' bar byed// mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che// nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po gti mug che// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel/
31b6(rnying rgyud): mchod pa chen po khro ba che// khro ba chen po dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po chags pa che// chags pa thams cad 'joms pa po// med pa las byung khyod la 'dud// nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud// ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud// ces gsungs so// 'jam
31b7(rnying rgyud): dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa las/ sru yi cha lugs bstan pa'o// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ gdul bya khro bor snang ba la// thugs rje rang byung dkyil 'khor shar// don la tha dad yod pa min// gnyis med gnyis su med par ston/
32a1(rnying rgyud): sbrus su mthun pa sna ba'o// rig pa tsha nyid ny-ing medang // brdza nas // ny-id ba dgas dri ma dag/ thas dag padas po thal// da napas// rig pa gang ba gas pa // gdul la gyur
32a2(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba bzhi// 'gyed med shes rab sru gsal bas// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya mi gnas pa// mkhyen pa'i ye shes phyag rgya gas la// lus med lus te lus kyi mchog/ lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa po// gdul byal snang ye shes sku// nam mkha' las byung ring
32a3(rnying rgyud): byung ba// shes rab ye shes me bo che// ye shes kyi ni dngas mal// yon tan sru lngas rab tu brgyan// 'di ni rtags dang cha 'dzin sku// chos su ye nas gzhi nyid la// longs su mkhyen pa'i shes rab ste// sprul skus phyir gsal don byed nus// mthi ga'i bum
32a4(rnying rgyud): pa me long ye shes snang // snang mdzad bud+d+ha he ru ka/ smug nag dbu gsum 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyag drug zhabs bzhi gdangs shing bskrad// mthing ga bum pa me ri mthing nag snang // mi bskyod badz+ra he ru ka/ mthing nag dbu gsum 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyag
32a5(rnying rgyud): drug zhabs bzhi gdengs shing bslang// ser po bum pa me ri ser nag snang // rin chen 'byung ldan he ru ka/ ser nag dbu gsum 'jigs pa'i sku// phyag drug zhabs pa zhe sde ma bzhin// dmar po bum pa me ri dmar nag snang // snang ba mtha' yas pad+ma
32a6(rnying rgyud): ruka/ dmar nag dbu gsum 'jigs pa'i sku// phyag drug zhabs bzhi snga ma bzhin// ljang gu bum pa me ri dmar nag gsal// don yod grub pa karma he ru ka/ ljang nag bum pa dbu gsum 'jigs pa'i sku// phyag drug zhabs bzhi ga dngas shing bgrad// kun gyi phyag
32a7(rnying rgyud): mtshan rnam pa gsum// ye shes rang rtagla phyag mtshon dang // gdul byed dpa' rtags phyag mtshon dang // phra men zod gtong phyag mtshan rnams// so so'i rtags dang cha 'dzin pa// ye shes rang rtags so sor snang // khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa// gzugs tshe lus kyang che
32b1(rnying rgyud): ba// 'dan ma ning lus bongs// ral bsum ma pa thogs// shes ra mtshan na thar te// brkos spyo brang ba// dang pograng pa dag la rbab po da/ dud pazhi'i 'jigs pas bar byed// bdudu kya du rnams pal byed pa// rnams dang phyi de
32b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor can// dpal ldan pa d+ma gar gyi bdag/ brtan po'i sdug gzugs 'chang ba// lag pa brgya 'o na brjod cing // gom pa'i rtags kyis gar byed pa// dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang ba// nam mkha' khyab pa'i gar byed pa// rngu 'jal dang pa'i stobs chen ldar// rje
32b3(rnying rgyud): rje 'jig khyed 'jigs par byed// khro bo rgyal po gdong drug 'dzegs// rtsig drug la gzug stobs dang ldan// keng dus mtsho ba gzi glapa po// ha la ha la gdong ba skye// gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal// rdo rje thugs can rigs byed pa// rdo rdo rjegs
32b4(rnying rgyud): ji nyid// skye dus rdo rje gsus s+hoste// rdo rjelas skyes nga'i ba // rdo stong byom pa 'drug/ mig pang la pa gcig gis bsgyings// mau rkyen go nags su gon// drug chen pa hUM zhes sgrogs pa// zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed// gdoso ma
32b5(rnying rgyud): rgya san+de/ rdo ga rji spogs pa// rdo sbyin stenis sgrogs/ mtshon du dorje'i mad thogs pa// rdo rje pa khris la sus rjod// rdo sa ma 'amang da byin// rdohUM 'bar nga mi ga mi bzad// sbrul ro rje 'bung ba ste// rdo rje 'thebs pa
32b6(rnying rgyud): paH// mig bcwa pa snying rje'i mig/ lus ni rdo dz+yo ba A dzin// sen mo skyes pa rdo rje rtse// rdo rje'i snying po phyags pa mu khregs// rdo rje'i phreng zlog dpal dang ldan// rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brtan pa ste/ glad rgya sa tata nges par sgrog sa// 'di ni thugs rje nga thung ste//
32b7(rnying rgyud): da'i phrulas ma g.yos pa / bdug pa na la dkar ldeng // kun gru'i yang du// ji brgyad rdzogs myong nags sa// gcis grong nagasal// gnyis ka ye na pa rtse// sems 'di la grogs hU~M/
33a1(rnying rgyud): bskur tsod parnyartan// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chu du thogs// rdo rje rin can dbang bkur dpal// zhes gsungs pa// 'dum dpal dgangs pa 'das pa las/ sgyu 'i khro gnyis tha bstan pa'i leH gnyis pa'o//
33a2(rnying rgyud): skye med don rtogs rab tu dga'// blo yi the tshom kun dang pral// des na gnyis pa dri ma med// thun mo thugs rjes don mdzad pa// ji bzhin rnam bzhi ma nor ston// 'di ni gsum pa 'od 'phyo'i sa// gdul bya la sdang mngon sum pas// rang shar thugs rjes
33a3(rnying rgyud): don mdzad pa// de ni bzhi pa 'od byengs// ye shes gdangs dang yon tan sku// gnyis po dag tu snang ba yin// de ltar don mchog nges thob pas// snod bcud mi gnas rang grol te// rnam rtog dri med sa la gnas// lnga pa sbyang dka'i sa non pa'o// dri med
33a4(rnying rgyud): sku dang ye shes rnams// rlung dang thal ba'i mar me ltar// ji bzhin gsal ba mngon gyur pas// zag bcas 'bras bu las 'phags nas// lhun grub mngon du gyur pa'i tshe// bdun pa ring du song ba'i sa// don chen de la 'gyur med pa// nga log rna mu gsum
33a5(rnying rgyud): don gnas pas// 'gyur med zang bral brgyad pa'i sa// chos nyid dri ma gsum dag pa'o// lnga dang drug gi mtshan nyid la// rig pa dri med snying por shar// 'bras bu dri med sku gsum gas pa// shes rab sru yis mtshams sbyar nas// dri med su
33a6(rnying rgyud): gsum 'du 'bral med// gdul bya 'od kyi sku mi 'gag/ sku gnyis bdag dang gzhan don mdzad// 'di ni dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros sa// 'khor rnams chos la rig dbang bskur// 'di nas btsu non pa ste// de dag 'gyur med zang thal la// chos
33a7(rnying rgyud): kyi skyes bcu gcig pa'o// mgon pos bcu'i dbang phyug ste// sa btsun ma dag bdag nyid can// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gengs pa 'dus pa las/ srung du med pa'i sa brngu bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de ngas smon pas bka'
33b1(rnying rgyud): sbal pa// lag na rdo rjengs zung zhig/ gsang sngags mthar sbyin pha rol phyin pa bcu// me gnas phyogs lhung med pa'i shes rab las// phyogs med yon tan khor 'das gnyis su shar// nyi ma'i snying po rin med bzhin// chos nyid byin par chos can sna tshogs snga /
33b2(rnying rgyud): rgyan dang rol par snang ba'o// bzhi gsum mtshan nyid dang ldan pas// 'byung ba zhi ma 'gags sa gzhi bzhin// de las lhan cig skyes pa dang // kun tu brtags gnyis snga phyi'i tshul// 'khrul pa'i rgyu ste sa bon bzhin// rkyen bzhis mthun pa'i phan rkyen byas//
33b3(rnying rgyud): dper na chu dang lung bzhin no// 'khrul gsum 'bras bu'i rtsi thog bzhin// sprul pa'i sku yi zhing khams so// de ni 'khor ba spyi sar shar// gzhi gsum dag pas 'bras bu rnam pa gsum// rgyu dang rkyen gyi pha rol phyin pa yin// chos sku gnyis med 'gyur med
33b4(rnying rgyud): pas// longs sku shes rab sku lngar shar// gdul bya dag la ye shes sgyu ma'i sku// rang la med par gzhan ltar snang ba gdul byar sku// byad dang me long ji bzhin du// gru gsum 'du 'bral med par shar// de ni myang 'das spyi sar shar// chos can spyi sar btang ba
33b5(rnying rgyud): chos can nyid du grol// rgya rkyen gnyis kyi pha rol phyin// mi gnas dmigs med shes rab klong du btang // sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo yin// chos nyid 'byung ba'i dri ma dag/ reg pa sems kyi dri ma dag/ chos sku mtha' yi dri ma dag/ shes rab mtha' yi dri ma dag/ ye
33b6(rnying rgyud): shes sku la yid dang mtshan ma dag/ sprul pa'i sku la reg bya nyon mongs dag/ zhi ba'i sku la phyogs ris dag/ nyag gcig don la phyogs ris dag/ zang thal don la skye 'gag med// rang byung don la 'dus byas dag/ lhan grub don la re dogs dang // dag pa'i de dag
33b7(rnying rgyud): kyang ni logs na med// de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa nges zung zhig/ nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems// mchog tu gyur pa sems dpa' nyid// de yi 'dod pa shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i chos// dus gsum bde gshegs kun gyi yul
34a1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' sems mtshogs kyi mes// rang rdzogs ldan grub dus gsum 'gyur ba med// 'du 'bral med pa'i lam tshan ma rtags par// mtho ras bgrod par lam des nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'gyur// 'gyur mengs bcur
34a2(rnying rgyud): rang rig ma rtogs par// rtsol spangs sa bcus rtsol bsgrub mthar lhung ste// a ti pra bral don dang 'gal bas gol// pha rol phyin bcu rang shar ma rtogs par// byang chub 'dod pa de la byang chub ga la yod// bde ba 'dod pa de la rgyab kyis phyogs/
34a3(rnying rgyud): gnas skabs bde bas mi bslu mthar zug 'bras bu med// de phyir mthar thag gsang sngags pha rol phyin pa'i don// ye nas lhun grub rang rdzogs chen po yi// tshogs gnyis tshogs ni mA btsal bsags pa po// 'phral la ma bsngags ye bsags chen po
34a4(rnying rgyud): la// sku gnyis phrer dang bar du snang / bsod nams tshogs zhes de la bya// chos su zang thal 'gyur med la// ye shes tshogs zhes de la bya// de ni tshogs la ma nges pa 'don// sbyor ba'i lam ni 'di lta ste// sku dang ye shes rang rig nyed// gnyis su ma
34a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i de nyid yod// ji bzhin rtog pa phra ba yis// rang las shar cing rang las grol// snang ba sum sbyor dbyer med pas// mthong lam ye shes rtogs pa shar// rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' la// phra rigs gnyis pos ma bsgribs pas// chos nyid dag
34a6(rnying rgyud): gsal snang ba mthong // sems nyid rang snang nam mkha' la// phra rags gsum pos mi besgrib pas// dri med rig pa'i snying po mthong // de nyid dbyer med zang thal la// mtha' bzhi phra rags dri ma gsum// ma bsgribs chos su ji bzhin mthong // de ni chos
34a7(rnying rgyud): mthong ba'i lam// de yi mtshan nyid sngar grags pa// dngos mtshan yid kyis ma bsgribla pas// rig padag la ma 'gags par// shes rab ngo bo skur gsal mthong // des ni longs su nges mthong lam// stong pa reg bya ma bsgribs par// gdul bya la sdang sgra wa
34b1(rnying rgyud): mthong // sprul blangs par mthong ba'i lam// sgo bur ma rig ma bsgribs par// de ltar gsum nyid ye shes lnga// lnga nyid dri med sgra gsum 'dus// ya nas rnga bzhin gnas lugs mthang // de ni ye shes ras mthong lam// da ltar don mthong 'dra 'bral cha
34b2(rnying rgyud): dbang po rab la dgongs pa gsal// 'brid la bsgom pa'i thabs mchog gsal// lta bsgom stobs kyi khyad par gyis// lte ba'i gdengs gnas bsgom lam gnas// bsgoms pas dngos po de bzhin nyid// de ni bsgom pa zhes bshad na// dri med sku dang ye shes
34b3(rnying rgyud): mngon 'gyur bas// de ni 'bras bu rang rdzogs te// mthar phyin lam teng log gsum// des ni bgrod med lam chen lnga// nam mkha'i lam la rab tu gnas// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa las/ gsang sngags kyi don lam bstan
34b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas ston pas 'gyur ba med pa'i sa bcu bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa des zung zhig/ rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' la// dri med dag pa'i chos sku mthong // ye shes sgrib pa'i dri ma la// gdul bya las snang bad+ma/
34b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis sdang // bar du shes rab sku lnga mthong // mtshan nyid lnga ldan ye shes mthong // khyad par 'phags pa'i don chen po// rang la mthong bas rab tu dga'// chos nyid mthong bas 'byung ba'i dri ma med// rig pa'i don mthong mtha' ba ni dri ma dang // shes bya'i sgra mthong
34b6(rnying rgyud): yang dang mtshan mngag/ sbal pa'i sgra mthong stong pa reg bya'i dri med ka/ ye shes don mthong glo bur ma rig dag/ don rnams nges mthong blo yi the tshom bral// don phyir rang gi rig pa rang gres reg/ lus kyis ma bsgribs bkres sgo nas mkha' la 'char// shar
34b7(rnying rgyud): kyang dngos po med de spos med thig le 'don// nyams shar ba dang goms pa kanas das/ tshung khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog/ gong ltar sbyin pa rnam gnyis cing rtsal yang // dri med snying po rang snang mtshan ma me de// dri ma med pas tshul khrims mchog/ zhes
35a1(rnying rgyud): gsungasas// rgyal khamasasa' wa dang // rang gangal dngos sprul// ga su nga byas// mu rdzapa sa nas spyan bas// thab 'a tsa sa gnas par// 'bras pawa dang // smanapa
35a2(rnying rgyud): bcos 'bras bu rdzogs// brtson 'bras chen po brtul ba yin// phyir med ring byung yi sangs rgyas// brtson 'grus kyi leT/ 'gyur med rdo rje'i gdan la 'byung zhing zad// phra rags dri ma dag pas sangs rgyas phral med de// rig 'dri ma nang bral shes dbegs la/
35a3(rnying rgyud): sna ye shes gzhan sdang rtog pa med// gzung 'dzin rtogs pa bde chen chos kyi sgra// bzod chen ma lus 'chang ba brtan pa po// bzod pa'i le'u/ dgongs pa bsgom du med par rang lcags chen por gnas// bsgom bya sgra dang ye shes rig pa'i ye shes nyid// dus gsum dus
35a4(rnying rgyud): med rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid// sgo lnga'i rtog pa skye gag/ 'char zhing nub// snying po zang thal nyid de skye 'gag mad// dus gsum 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi// tha snyad ming yang mi gnas 'gyur med de// nam mkha' gud bcad ma phub zang thal ltar// spos med thig
35a5(rnying rgyud): shes rab sgo nas shar// 'o ma'i snying po rtse mar khyab pa ltar// nam mkha'i dang la chos spus khyab pa dang // gdul bya la snang ye shes skra dang chas// dri mod tshul snang ba rang bzhin med// slang stong dbyer med bdag nyid chen po yin// bsgom zhing bsgrub pa 'tshos min ye
35a6(rnying rgyud): gnas pa// ldan grub nyam pa med pa'i bsgom pa dengs// thabs kyis khyeng rgod pasal du med pa ste// rang gis mtshan nyid zhibs bgrod pa med// rang bzhin don la byed rmugs med par gsal// byang rgod blol sdang 'tsho kyi dbyings// sems las 'das pa'i sangs
35a7(rnying rgyud): rgyas kyang // gsal 'grib sgre 'gag/ med pa'i 'don// g.yeng ba 'phro 'dra mi gnas par// rgod pa rags pa bying ba phra ba gnyis// gdod nas rnam dag sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin// de bzhin pas ni bcos shing bsgrim pa dang // reg pa'i rtsa la sgang ched du 'phro ba mad/
35b1(rnying rgyud): 'di ltar spang ga bo yi rtsal yin mod// lus la 'char ba'i sgo ni rnam pa gnyis// 'dod pa'i sgo nas shes rab 'char du med// ye shes sgo nas sgra dang ye shes 'char// 'dod pa mi 'byung rang bzhin tshugs kyis snang // bsam gtan chen po nyid 'dzin gnas// de ltar mdzod
35b2(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa'i tshe// thun mong khyad par lus reg bya ba btang // rkyen gyis bying ba de yis sel bar 'gyur// yid kyi bya ba btang ba'ang de bzhin te// rkyen gyis rgod pa zhi ba'i thabs// nad khams shes pa'i khyad par rang bzhin gyis// byid dang rgod pa byung na gang ni
35b3(rnying rgyud): gyin bya// de yis mi sel bying rgod skyon ma bstan// yon tan lus pas de nyid rang la rlabs// rlung gi rta la yid kyi sgra gsum paskyon// skar mda' bzhin du chos nyid mkha' la 'phang // thog dang 'dra ste seng ge 'bru tshugs lta// 'gul dbum gcod dang bral nas
35b4(rnying rgyud): dus mtshungs gnad// nam mkha' dag la khyud lding dang 'dra ste// rtsol bral mkha' la klod la bzhag/ gzer btab 'dra ste yang yang goms par bya// tshad phyin dgongs pa gdas la nyi ma shar ba bzhin// blon po btson du bzung ba 'dra ste blo yi rtog pa zhi// sgo lnga
35b5(rnying rgyud): la mi 'phro dgongs pa mtha' bzhir gnas// dngos po blo ltar snang ba slob pa'i thabs// don dang mthun par gyur pas dngos po blo yi thog tu grol// blon pos dmadas grol dmangs kyi bya ba bral// rang dngas dang bzhin bdag nyid chen por ldan gyis grub// sku dang ye shes
35b6(rnying rgyud): ma par gsal ba'i don// ting 'dzin blo ltar snang ba rang gsal rig dang rgyad rig pa// ma bcos ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog/ rang byung bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan pa// ye nas bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can// de ni bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa'o// rang
35b7(rnying rgyud): bya shes rab ye shes 'gag med rang shar bas// dbyer med shes dpagazhi la gnas pas 'byung // thos pa'i don rig rnam par 'byed pa dang // bsam pa'i don rig so sor phye ba dang // 'dus pa las byas ma byung don chen rig/ bsgom pa shes rab mi rtog shes rab
36a1(rnying rgyud): gsapa// bsgom pa'i don la mi gnas so sor 'byed pa dang // dgongs pa'i don la mi gnas shes rab thog tu bab// thos pas shes rab rgyad la skye ba'i thabs// nga sprod rtogs pa thob 'gyur bas// rdzi bsla nges pa'i bden pa bzhi/
36a2(rnying rgyud): gsum 'du 'bral med par gnas// sprad pa'i yul de rang la gnas// bden pa mthong ba'i thabs chen bzhis// don gyi sku gsum 'i sprad pas// ldan grab sangs rgyas nyid du shar// rtags kyi srag sum do sprad pas// 'bras bre tshe 'dir bden pa mthong // skrag
36a3(rnying rgyud): nga log nga spad pas// 'bras bu grub pa ched du phyin// dpe yi sku gsum do sprad pas// don gyi sku gsum nges pa rnyed// shes pa brgyad po rtog pa 'ching // de bzhin gzhi la mtshon pa'i thabs// de bzhin rnam gnyis brda dang ngag/ gnyis po gzung 'dzin la
36a4(rnying rgyud): brgyad de// rtogs pa'i ye shes shar ba ni// bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan// de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig/ rtog pa'i ye shes rnam bzhir shar// dgos ched 'bras bu de bzhin no// rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa// rnam pa sangs rgyas kun rig mchod// rgyas
36a5(rnying rgyud): dang bsdus pa'i bye brag gis// dpe don rtags dang rnam pa gsum// don gsum the tshom med pa yin// shin tu bsdus na gdams ngag nyid// de rnams shes rab ldan mig yin// bsam pa'i doni 'byung de dag las// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs// de mthu
36a6(rnying rgyud): shes rab nges pa rnyed// goms pa'i shes rab god du bstan// shes rab chen po'i don rig na// chos kun 'gyur ba med pa'i don// longs su shes rab rig pa'i sgra// mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang bsgyur// sprul sku gdul bya la snang dod byed rngus// de gsus
36a7(rnying rgyud): phyogs lhung med pa'i shes rab la// dbyer med shes rab rang gsal na// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i don// dang po'i chos spa rig par shad// rig pa'i ye shes 'od du gsal// de las sku dang lus 'byung bzhi// sred pa'i gzhin mi gnas gzung // chos
36b1(rnying rgyud): gas gang dang cas/ nga canapa bshes gsas// dam gtas las gangs/ N+Dig na ma thags lta ba gyu// dalas zas kyangs rnam pa sgyu// 'byung banan pa gzugags/ nga byung brnas pa / byas
36b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes 'brangab shing // dang 'i dbyung 'di las 'byung // snyigs ma dgas tha'i dang sams skyed// ma rig skabs 'brum pag chags sbyin// skugasum thugs rje skabs kyi thig tu shang// shes rab bzhi ni mos rtogs pa don// shes rab rje me dngos
36b3(rnying rgyud): ba// gzung la snyi pa nyan mongs mod// yid kyi rnam shes shes rab gcod la sbyib// do shes rab dri ma can yid te// dri med shes rab zag 'a khril rngam par dag/ zag pa zag byed ma 'phrul zag med rtogs// ma rig slong lta bu'i spangs 'byed pa// ma
36b4(rnying rgyud): shes rab ma med cin 'byung ba ste// shes rol ma dag tu phyogs nas 'dams// bangs migs gsular snyam// shes pas srid gyung byeganas med// rdul ma dul bral dri pa bral// shi sa dbus dpa'i bdag/ bla gis bran
36b5(rnying rgyud): dpra gro// rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das// spyod pa' brtson ma jams// sbyor ba'i dgan pa las zung ba// rgan mongs te bcan rten mang // dag chags pachis pa gtid snangs te// tshul bcu pi ma gro las// zhi shin s+ho/
36b6(rnying rgyud): na pa lngas byung ga// skad cig gtugags rdzob skyes sa ma// skang \u0f7fga rnams cad byu thug byed// ces gsungs s+ho// gaming sngags thabs kyiHbya na// ma sa me rtags ci thabs// spangs pa med nga cing ba ste//
36b7(rnying rgyud): pothabs la ma nga // stobs kyi po rnams tshogs srung // dmigs gnyis med dang spyod// du 'phrul ban ba sgrubs dang ldan// thugs ca ma sgrogs pa chen pa ste// bu'i bral chod pa ci grags pa// stongs cin ros gnod pa po//
37a1(rnying rgyud): ya shas rang la 'bar// rang shar rang la rnam par bkun// dz+nyAn 'bras bu rang rdzogs pan// yang bzhin 'bras bya chen pa nga // dpag bsam shing can rgyas pas// tham pa bzung ba che ba'i mchog/ byed pa sems canarban
37a2(rnying rgyud): don byed// theg pa sna tshogs zabs tshal gyis// 'gro ba'i don la ston pa po// rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog/ mi gnas ye shes gsal la rtog pa med// rnam dag ye shes zang thal gdangs dang bcas// chos su zad bral chos dbyings ye shes nyid//
37a3(rnying rgyud): rig pa ma 'gags me long ye shes nyid// shes rab gsal bas ye shes kun rtogs lnga// chos sku longs sku ye shes gnyis su snang // gdul bya la sdang sku dang ye shes chos// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes yin// su gsum dbyer med mnyam pa nyid// ye shes ye shes
37a4(rnying rgyud): khyad par che// ye shes ldan pa yod med shes// ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba// zhes gsungs so// ye shes kyi le'u'o// 'jam dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa las// smad du med pa pha rol tu phyin pa bcu bstan pa'i le'u'o// 'jam dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa'i
37a5(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ gsang sngags kyi don shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa des zung zhig/ sku yi don dang shes rab kyis// sngags dang mtshan nyid dgongs pa la bzla'o// de'i
37a6(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa'i rim pa ni// rim pas rtsol ba skyong 'dod pa// ma skyes spun gyis grub pa des// rtsol bral 'du 'bral med par bstan// 'di rdzogs rim mthar thug don// labazla thugs kyi dgongs pa bshad// chos skye zang thal dngos po med shes pas// rdzogs rim
37a7(rnying rgyud): skyebo med pa khas blangs kyang // wa spelas kaur brdzus pa bzhin// dngos med zang thal chos srum rtogs par// bla ma zhe 'dod tshul 'chos lhal blta// 'di gsang sngags kyi nang gnyis dang nyi// mthar thug a ti don mchog martogs par// mu gegs ca
37b1(rnying rgyud): gsus stong// da na gzugs pasas sa/ gas pa sas 'thas yo sa sa da/ ngasas skrag sus sagams / na nga rgyas pa sa pa// sa sa ma/
37b2(rnying rgyud): gas pas// sa lags rnamasas rdzogs gan/ pa mam ga pa ma rgyas byas// yan go sum rmugs / stod// mam ga sa tha gasngags pa// chags dgang namams cad dgangs pa la/
37b3(rnying rgyud): sa ga gas nas // sa sa // /
37b4(rnying rgyud): sas rnas sa/ dus sa / sa hU~M// / smrabs gsas/ glu
37b5(rnying rgyud): na sa sa
37b6(rnying rgyud): sa/ sa
37b7(rnying rgyud): ni// phrang ni dag ga thaM da pa // nanangs mig sa na ma rgyas// nyil gsas na pags ni// gas ga ga ma ga // ga pa sa /
38a1(rnying rgyud): sargya / nga na / na na
38a2(rnying rgyud): namangs myed kyis bslang // ye shes rang snang dgongs pa des ma mthong // des ts+tshag pas menas su mar khang mer me bzhid// dris drug la rdeg khras be gad pa drub chubangs// sbyin rim thang dbus med pa'i gnas med 'di nams su zung thal
38a3(rnying rgyud): mtha' nga mi za dang rags pa gnyis pa yin// dgas pa yang na tag mnga' ngos med spros bral ba sleb// phrab med mthang zad man+ta gnyis// po dag pa'i ye shes don pa mthong // phra ba'i glang dngos myed pag zugs sten// de gsum rnams
38a4(rnying rgyud): chas sra bstes// dag bram thul da med na mdag smos yin/ b+ba nam mkha snyed po dang / ye shes snying por dbyer me cos / ca gyis bsnyam mthon pa lpaganas// ye shes gon ces kyis// pa
38a5(rnying rgyud): la// gdul byal snang 'brung ded 'byung bas dag pa men// ngan ngos pa ma nga sung bzhin pabregags la lo shes // darjid 'gyur mid de dkyis sa brjod pa// gdul gyi ngom pa bzhin rdzu pa rig pa men// she 'ab la 'a 'ganang rnang pa sems/
38a6(rnying rgyud): cad// shes rab gsal nas dngas med dngos ltar mtsha// shes rab sang ces byeng 'dzin rdzas kyi mchog tu gsung // de nyi yon tan 'byur ba'i ring chen 'brung ldan yin// rtags dang rta 'dzin 'brang ba bzhir grub ma 'gags rigs yid// de ltang
38a7(rnying rgyud): sa shes // thabasas nas da kyi spong sa pa // de rab gags gapa so// nga 'a sa dngas ma // sa shing gas shes pa / gas pa pad du
38b1(rnying rgyud): pa la// dngas mdadungs ltar mthun pas shas rab sla// da lta smad srung gdasalan gnas// shes rab ga pus tho yangang nas gcad// mad dang 'grogs pas skrod bcud pag banas yin// chas srung maldan mam 'gags dag pa la// Am sa la gsal ba she
38b2(rnying rgyud): rab su// shes rab rol de las med bzhin du// gdul bya dang sngar rnam ngag su snang ste// ye shes gdangs pas yon tan sku lngar brgyan// me long chu zla 'ja' tsho na ji bzhin te// ye shes lus can sgyu ma tsam du ni// da lta ngo sprad ye shes sgron ma ste// sku yi rnam pa thugs
38b3(rnying rgyud): kyi klong na gsal// rten dang bral bas bsgrib med zad thal dang // de nyid ye shes lnga ste gong bstan bzhin// mi mngon mi snang gsal byed min// mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po// rdo rje'i gdan ni ma lus ldan// ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chad// rnam dag phung
38b4(rnying rgyud): po lnga 'chang ba// nges 'byung kun gyi mtha' la ga nas// rnam par rtog med lhan gyis grub// sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med// dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa// ye shes mig gcig dri ma med// 'od bzang 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u// sangs rgyas kun gyi skye bcang ba//
38b5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor can// rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don// dam pa'i don te 'jigs pa med// grub pa mthar phyin 'khrul pa
38b6(rnying rgyud): med// nor ba thams cad rnam par spangs// bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan// mu stegs ri dgas ngan 'jigs byed// mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud// yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sgyu 'phrul dang
38b7(rnying rgyud): khyod la 'dud// ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa las/ 'jam dpal thugs kyi le'u zab mo bstan pa ste drug pa'o// / de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par
39a1(rnying rgyud): zung // sku dang gsung dang thugs dang gsum// dgongs pa ma nor de bzhin no// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yang // yul med 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// sbyir na zhing khams gsum na yang // sku gsum rgyal ba'i zhing khams yin//
39a2(rnying rgyud): chos sku'i zhing khams rnam dag stug po bkod pa'i sa// longs sku'i zhing khams mtshon rdzogs rdo rje 'chang gis// sprul sku'i zhing khams khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu// gdul bya gsum yod de bzhin te// nyid las mi gzhan sku lnga dang // sems dpa' sems
39a3(rnying rgyud): ma'i sa pa dang // rigs drug du ma snang ba'o// de dag la yang gnyis yin te// sprul pa'i sku dang rang rgyud dang // rang chud 'khrul zhing 'khor ba ste// yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton// brten nas 'khor lo bcu gnyis 'chang // snang ba chen po gsal ba ste// nor
39a4(rnying rgyud): bu chen po rin chen tog/ 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed// ye shes sku ste dang byung ba// sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs// sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes// gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun tu ston// de ltar 'khrul snang shar ba'o// de ni
39a5(rnying rgyud): sprul sku'i zhing yin te// chos sku'i zhing khams thugs kyi le'u bzhin// yongs sku'i zhing khams sku yi le'u bzhin// thugs rje dag pa'i byung tshul yang // sku yi 'od dang gsung zer las// rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che// rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od// sku gsum dri med thugs rje
39a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung // chos sku'i gnas lugs gong bstan bzhin// thugs rje rgyal ba rig pa ste// gong bshad bzhin du shes par gyis// longs sku thugs rje sprul pa ste// longs spyod rdzogs sku skra yi rgyal// mngon shes drug ldan des dran phyag/ yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i
39a7(rnying rgyud): dul pa cu spom ma // ngas rgyas smrab pa byu da// cigs drang dru pa rdzogs byed// ngab da 'tha ba 'dod pa kyid pa/ mi dang mi // mi nga po lhamin da// 'tsha dadang sagrol thab/ sa
39b1(rnying rgyud): 'joms byed dbang phyug pa// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla// sprul pa'i 'khor lo d+ha tshogs 'chang // 'jig rten phyogs bzung rab grags pa// chos kyi sbyin dag ze po// byams pa gomachas pa ste// b+hang rje yi ni ya la da
39b2(rnying rgyud): bgos// sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa// dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes// kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas// shes rab chen pos skad cig la// chos kun khong du chud pa 'chang // chos kun mngon par rtogs pa
39b3(rnying rgyud): skye// rdo rje dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal// rdo rje blo gros don chen byed// kun tu bzang po blo gros bzang // 'gro kun dga' ba'i mig dang ldan// shes rab ral gri mda' gzu thogs// nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngos la// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che// rdo rje ral
39b4(rnying rgyud): gros ma lus gcod// chos kyi gaN+DI smra bo che// phyogs bcu'i chos kyi rnga bo che// chos kyi dung ste sgra chen ldan// chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzug/ 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste// byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can// sman pa che mchog
39b5(rnying rgyud): gtso bo ste// zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med// nad do cog gi dgra che ba// sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing // 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes smon// snying rje chen po shes rab thabs// don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa// 'du shes kun gyi don spangs shing // sems can
39b6(rnying rgyud): kun yid yul dang ldan// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// sems can kun gyi yid le gnas// de dag sems dang mthun par 'jug/ sems can kun yid tshim par byed// mya ngan 'das zhi mya ngan 'das// legs par mya ngan 'das dang nye// bde sug
39b7(rnying rgyud): sel ba mthar gyur pa// chags bral lus las 'das pa po// lus can kun las rnam par grol// zhes gsungs so// de nas lag na rdo rjes sA drangs nas/ bskor ba lan gsum byas pa de// dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar// rdzogs sangs kyin la phyag tshal/
40a1(rnying rgyud): nas// lag rdo sa kyang rgyal// sku tshogs gzhan dung na cigaH// gsang bskyod nas ni tshig 'dregs pa// mganas bdag nag yi rang ngo // legs po lags so lags par gsung // de mi don na pa 'dod// rnam tho
40a2(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu 'tshal ba po// dam bamag na zed rnam pa da na// bdag cag pang da rdzogs pa mi// byang chu ba rje pa di rkyen byu da// 'gro ba'i mgon po sa pa dang // zhes gsol to// rig pa can gyi yang / gsung rab ma lus pa nyag sa/ 'ang byed pa
40a3(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa'adas pa zhes thasami / gsu nga pasan// dab byed pag tu da pacad/ tshig dang / mi/ das
40a4(rnying rgyud): ma/ bod ni dang / du bapod mang po bang ba man ngag gi rgyud ces byab/ dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ drang khrod chen po'i rjong / keng rdzas kyi ri rab/ lcang mo can gyi 'azeng / gsang rje ba sgo bzhi btong
40a5(rnying rgyud): ten cung tsog gang le bar/ bcomaldan das brjod pa'i chog ter can/ ring rig pa'i rnam pa la shes chen pa jugs te/ nang gi 'phar ched pa khang hU~M / rtsi'i 'bang dag ce ca/ gsang ba'i dang dzim po sde dang thabs mig tu bajugs so// da
40a6(rnying rgyud): tshogs pa'i bdag pos zhus pa/ b+he bre com ldan gan mkha 'bur// t+yai zla 'bar ba'i gdan sted dang // rgyamatsho'i nang nas slu bzhengs nas// chos nyid stong nas gdangs bskyong la// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor tshags la// phung po ba dang rigasang nad
40a7(rnying rgyud): 'di// thugs kyi klong nas rab bkrol la// mgur gyi bum par chos nyid dril// sngags kyi pod+mo dag pa bkram// shangs kyi drung sgom dung gi choms par dag nas ston mdzod pa// yon tan sgo lnga khye'u spe la bad smad nas// mos pa'i 'khor la gsung du nga /
40b1(rnying rgyud): 'asathas / du khrod kyang blo ba ba'i chud las/ bla gzhi lang sred par// de nas bcom ldan 'das brjid pa thog ste ba mi bu ba'i 'khor gsang pa'i dag po dang / snang pa'i dastor dga' ba dzang / smos pa 'khong gang
40b2(rnying rgyud): 'gro rdzi la sogs tibs ma kyis 'i ba brnams la/ drang srong phung po 'bar ba'i gsang rtang dI// da yis bu nad kyis yid pazung / zhes bka' gyur to// sngon dur khrod phung po bar ba 'di rab na/ dpa ge bsam kyi ng+ge shing kyang bad po mthong na/ drung dag
40b3(rnying rgyud): smad na gtims pa dang shed// 'di drug sardug jugs pa'i dkyil shed// la gyi ldan bathogs// des ga 'di ba rtsel gang// de ga 'du gyid 'ang mdun// des ga'alakhor ba'i gakhyer// ga su
40b4(rnying rgyud): b+h+ring yang khol shi ba med// yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ bye kye bcom lam tho ga nyer cad// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor chags pa// de ma don rnams gsung dregs la// zhes gus so// smon pas gsungs pa/ sang yi don rnams sogon// pha bad /
40b5(rnying rgyud): yid la nges par drung // ngur khrod kyang po 'bar ba ni// du lta'i dus na me 'bar ba ste// gyis kyi dus na gzugs kyi thung po'o// dpag bsam ston zhing bstan pa'i// thog tu gyur ba'i rlung bzhin te// lda po'i bo brang bstan pa de// hU~M ltarang bstan na 'og mi gnas/
40b6(rnying rgyud): da ster baspya thaM pad zugs tu mang byeb pa'i// rten pong sa 'dad rtags can po// / rlung nig ldan pa gnyims pa'i// zag+sa gi ti zlas ba ces byed/ kyang pa midags pa ni/ smi nam po sa te/ lu gnas pan/
40b7(rnying rgyud): 'dadas la gdas pa ma// du rjod 'dab du sbyin so ni/ nying dngadu ma yin// 'thong ni mo khyod ni// nas teg cubs kyang 'i// slong ma bye // dri tA'i dbang spang ma 'ad// khong shi ba ma rgyas pa de// rig pa dang / ba'ibri/
41a1(rnying rgyud): sas+ho// / gags sas// zhwa sa sa pa ma na sa/ 'dus pa pa 'jug gshes pa/ 'a jus smras dag pa sa pa/ zags ma na kyang // bla pa'ang
41a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i don rnams gsung du gsol// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ ngas bstan 'khor rnams yid lazung // phung po zhes su bstan pa ni// du ma 'dus pas phung po'o// 'jig pa'i phyir na phung po'o// rten pa'i phyir na phung po'o// 'dus pa'i phyir na phung zer// lung
41a3(rnying rgyud): po dag la brten pa ni// klad pa dud khang gzhal yas ni// he ru ka yi bzhugs gnas yin// thugs rje 'byung ba'i sgo bzhi ni// rig pa 'gyu ba'i gsang bzhi yin// b+h+r-i gu dzak+Sha'i sgo yis ni// rig pa'i ngo bo gdangs gsal bstan// mngon du 'gyur ba'i ye
41a4(rnying rgyud): shes yin// 'byed pa med de zang zhal lo// de yi ngang las ma g.yos na// dgongs pa zin pa'i tshad yin no// sa la le sang de rtog med gsal// dug lnga skye yang 'phel 'grib med// dper na nyi ma'i snying po bzhin// dus gsum rgyan gyi mun pa sel//
41a5(rnying rgyud): thug parje 'byung ba'i sgo yis ni// sgron ma rig pa'i rtswa ru 'gyus// lus kyi brgyad dang thig ler bcas// skal tshig gsang ba'i rtswa brgyad nas// rdo rje'i lam du bde bar thor// yum gyi pad+ma'i rdzing bur lakhyil// bla dgu ngo dang bcu ru gnas// ngo bo nyid kyi dge slong de//
41a6(rnying rgyud): chos nyid rang sgra a haM zlos// sprul pa'i sku ru rab tu smin// thugs rjes gzigs snang don dam bcad// chos nyid shes rab sgro yis ni// shes rab dpyod pa'i rig pa ste// so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes so// shes rab skyes pa'i rlung zhes bya// chos rnams kun gyi thog
41a7(rnying rgyud): mtha' bcad// skye med ngang du bsgom par shes// sgo bzhi mtha' yi slob dpon no// skye med nam mkha' sgo yin te// thos bya ma 'gags sna tshogs ldan// sgo gsum 'dan la sgo gnyis phye// sgo gsum chod la sgo gcig sdom// skyer na sgo rnams ma bcad
41b1(rnying rgyud): rnas pa // sa nga/ sa// du gas sa// thabs // dag pa byed pa // ba da /
41b2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gnas// ma bcos ji bzhin ldan grub gnas// stong pa chen po rdo rje'i gru// snying po rang gsal 'dzin med de// chos nyid rang gi gdangs la bzhugs// 'du 'dzes g.yengs kyang g.yos pa med// rAdza zhes ni de la b+ha// rnon po sems kyi ngo ro ste//
41b3(rnying rgyud): na skyon gtung 'dzin gcod// rnam tog sna tshogs phul las ste// dran pa phyogs med zhen par gcod// gzung 'dzin rgyud la rab tu bsags// rnam rtog byin ci log la spyod// dug lnga dang 'dzin khong du bcas// byan mo mdzangs ma'i mdzod bzhin du// dge rjeg rtog pa
41b4(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs bsags// ma rtogs blon pos dbang bskur te// ngan song gsum du the tshom med// rtogs na chos nyid rang rtsal te// shar yang rig pa'i ngang las shar// skye yang rig pa'i ngang las skye// gro la yang rig pa'i rang du grol// sna tshogs shar yang rig pa'i
41b5(rnying rgyud): rtsal// dper na nam mkha'i stong nyid nas// sprin dang na phun bu rlangs shar// shar yang nam mkha' grong du thim// de bzhin dag pa'i rgyal po la// blon pos las rnams rtsal du 'gyur// rig pa'i rtsal du shes tsam na// rgyan dang rol pa thugs rje'o// rig pa'i
41b6(rnying rgyud): nga nas ma g.yos na// stong gsum 'jig rten bskul gyur kyang // ston pa'i thugs rjes bskal ba las// sdig ces bya ba'i ming yang med// rtog pa gdeng du ma gyur na// skad cig sems kyi la bu 'phrigs kyang // ngan song gsum po dag dang 'dra// des na dra rdzas pa
41b7(rnying rgyud): nan// son po sa rnams kyi sud kyang // de'i ngang pas g.yos pa rid// rtogs pa rab kyi mthor nyid do// dbang po 'bring gi mtshan nyid ni// rA dzas gdanas ma zin na// blon po dbang du dbyas// blon po brtson du bzung ba dang // rA dza gdanas pa chem
42a1(rnying rgyud): bstod do// rlung gdanas zin pa'i ngan nyid // rgya mtsho ya la gtad de mi bskal dang dpor bzhag/ shes rab gser gyi thung mas rig pa rang dbang bskur// des ni mnyam bzhag pa yid rjes thob bo// nyams su dang ba'i tshad yin no// zhes
42a2(rnying rgyud): s+ho
42a3(rnying rgyud): nam shes rnam pa lnga// lnga tshogs rkyen gyis yul la skrod// p+lag mi sdug gi yul gsum skye// sna tshogs spyad kyin yul la 'phyo// gzung 'dzin nam tog rgyan du bisags// rdib pa gnyis kyis srin du bsgribs// ma rig bdag tu nges pa dag zung // dud drug dag catag
42a4(rnying rgyud): tu 'khor// matogs dus ni de ltar spang // gsog pa'i dmangs te yul la sprad// yid kyi rnam shes bdag tu bzung // rgyal po blun pa'i nang na lakhyams// yang gsungs pa/ mchod pa'i dmangs ni 'di lta ste// sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa ste// byang chub sems
42a5(rnying rgyud): kyi khyen la// mig nis yi snying po ste// sdang ba'i rdul la shes pa shar// mthong ba'i gzugs ni sna tshogs spyad// rig pa'i jo ba 'dzin med de// 'dzin med dang las rtul du shar// snang ba rnams la~M rgya lis btab// mi gyur dang du rang mar grol/
42a6(rnying rgyud): ga ba rjes na zugs rje rkyen// grol ba'i drisan rgyal po sanas// sa me dang po 'grab na// ba drug // ngos bya gags sul 'i da// rnams ma ma nga pa te// des pa kyi nga dzu ma// dag par gas pa pang yi te// gang /
42b1(rnying rgyud): gas drag gdus// ma can pa mdzad par// nin pa man sa te// brnam bya dag pa'i rnas pa tu// snang na 'dri ma sa sti dgas sa// datang dag bu'i gdungs yin// / dri'i rang bzhin dngam bzang // gang yang dag pa'idasmrapas nang
42b2(rnying rgyud): brim yang rig pa'i ngang du thim// mnyam nyid thugs kyi grong du thim// lce ni khye'u spun ras gzigs// ro mchog rig pa'i ngang nas gsal// sna tshogs ro yi mchod pa ste// ro ni gnyis med rig par thim// rig pa chos kyi sku nyid la// gzugs ni sku yi mcho
42b3(rnying rgyud): yin// bde chen thugs kyi mchod pa yin// dri ni gsung gi mchod pa yin// ro ni yon tan mchod pa'o// lus ni sgribapa rnam sem te// reg bya sna tshogs yul la spyad// bde ba chen por rnams myong ste// bde chen gnyis med nga du thi ma// reg ni phrin las mdzod pa'o// ba/
42b4(rnying rgyud): pa'ang stsol shes tsam na?// rig pa'i rgyal po rang dbang thob// rig pa// nyes med tshem sbal// mchod dang mi mchod mi mangs ste// rtogs pa pade chen rnyed tsaman// don gyi la mchod mi mnga'// mtshon pa'i do nas btags pa tsam// rting snang ci srid rig pa'i rtsal
42b5(rnying rgyud): rgyal po dang las martogs pa// blon po dmangs ni yod mo srid// phre du brtags kying rig pa'i rtsal// rol pa mdzad spyod thags chang // de ltar rtags na dgongs pa'i mchog// ces gzungs so// dud khyo daphung po 'bar 'di rgyad las/ dasangs kyi
42b6(rnying rgyud): po'i len skye bzhes// yang khrus pa/ kye kye brjid pa'i khrog nyer can// phung po'i nang nas ji ltar byed// tsa yi lam ni dI sgyu sa// zhes zas so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ ngam bstar 'khor rnams des zung zhig/ phung po'i nang du dbye ni
42b7(rnying rgyud): cha mtsha nyi ma can na rig pa nyid// rig pa'i snying po tol 'bru'i cha dang mtshungs// de yi rang lus mtshon pa spa ris tsam// de yi rang gdangs nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// rig pa dngos med nam mkhara' nyed la gsal// sdeng med mkha' la'aja tshon te// dus gsum
43a1(rnying rgyud): bkyan bad 'dus gnas// snang bzhag sa dpa da pan// sa napa ga/ shugs nad// na rgyang rdu da// gas bya dag yo gas smras// shes na ma dzu na yin//
43a2(rnying rgyud): ngas byes // da ma sa / nga // / sa
43a3(rnying rgyud): /
43a4(rnying rgyud): rang lugs so// dgas nas ni rang mabyin// spel su dag gi dbye ba'o// chos bu'i da bong gag/ med pa// yongs su nas rab 'gag med myod// sbrul phyu ga dul rgya'i yul sbyang ba// mtshon pa'i dpo na pa'i snying po bzhin// nyi ma'i snying po rjes su'i dpe// de la
43a5(rnying rgyud): 'od zer sna tshogs shAng // des ni 'gro drug mun pa sil// de bzhin chos du rtog me gsal// yangs su shes rab 'gag med rton// sAl chu thugs rjes nyin mongs grol// de gsum mtha' dag gcig gi dang // chos sna'i bzugs gnas kyang zhugs te// lo
43a6(rnying rgyud): brlag pa sed ba mas// smral chu'i thugs rna rdza// nga nang na pa // zhes gsu mas// yang gang sa/ yi la rigs da de// kyang dgas nas gas/ nyid du nga zhes bya// rnam ma 'i rdzo
43b1(rnying rgyud): shing ba// gsang ba 'gag med bya zhes bya// dab dag// dab mau dag la drug/ dzad meng spro bzhi'i rtsa zhes so// ci// rir chen krung phub nas// gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i dru zhes te// rtsod pa'i sgogasum dag tu zag/ de la ming du marjod pan// ne
43b2(rnying rgyud): rab myur byed mi po che// rnam shes rlung gi rta la zhon// gzung 'dzin lcags kyu lag na thogs// rtsod pa'i sgo gsum dag tu phyin// snang ba'i yul la gzung 'dzin spyad// rnam shes tshim byed ces su bya// rig pa'i rtsal ni gzhi ru 'dzin// snying rje med pa bskal ba'i
43b3(rnying rgyud): rlung zhes bya// de dang bdud langs rtsa ru 'brel// rtsa de 'dus na 'chi rtags so// srog tu 'dzin pa'i rtse dag gnas// mdud pa dang sho ga rtsa zhes bya// de dang bdud langs rtsa ru 'brel// sdud byed rlung chen brtags pa'o// nag po sdig med rtse de nas// dpag
43b4(rnying rgyud): bos ma ldon shing rtsa zhes te// de ni bshad pa rang byung rtsa ru brtag/ des ni lus kyi dbang po bzung // thugs rje 'thung ba'i dus nyid na// rtsa ni mdud pa'i lhag sgo zhes// sa chen de rnams dag tu ni// khrag dang chu ser mi rgya ste// rig pa'i rtsal ni rlung du rgya// ngo bo 'gas
43b5(rnying rgyud): med gsal ba la// rtsa ni de rnams dag tu rgyu// rtsa las thugs rje sprul sku 'byin// la las shes rab chen por 'char// la las mi bskyod gzhi ru 'dzin// la las dus zad 'chi rtags ston// phung po'i nang du de ltar dbye// zhes gsungs so// dur khrod phung po
43b6(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ rig pa'i gnas lugs dang / rtsa'i dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas yang zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan tho gnyer can// sems su dbye ba ji ltar dbye// ye shes zhes ni gang la brtsi// zhes zhus so// bkra
43b7(rnying rgyud): stsal ba/ ngas bstan mid la nges cung zhig/ dbod pa dang rnam grangs dang // gnas deng las dang sgo dang ni// smon dang po rten 'bras thung // byad ca dbye ba'i dus bstan pa'o// sems kyis can nad bstan pani// chu ba de dag tuca pa 'grus te// dngung
44a1(rnying rgyud): bstan ma dag dang 'dres/ ga pa rkyen dang phrad pa pas// gzung 'don rtog pa ci sang ngo // delas nas zhes bya ba ni/ tu brnam pags pan/ dod la sems pa sna tshogs pa// gtsug pa phyir yang sems zhes bya// nga ba dbugs ni brtarnams te/
44a2(rnying rgyud): ye nas med de 'phral la byung // dper na tshod dus 'om bzhin// de lang je lang song ba'o// grangs ni rnam pa brgyad du bstan// gnas ni rlung can grong na gnas// lam ni mgrin pa dag tu rgya// sgo ni 'dod pa'i sgo gsum shar// skyon ni rtog pa sna tshogs byed// 'bras
44a3(rnying rgyud): bubag chags phung po len// phyed pa'i tshad ni rgyu srang tshad// dbye ba'i dus ni phung po bor// des gsungs so// yang gsungs pa/ ye shes zhes bya bstan pa ni// dbye ba rnam grangs nges tshig dang // ngo bo gnas dang lam dang sgo// las dang yon tan 'bras bu dang // phyed
44a4(rnying rgyud): tshad dbye ba'i dus bstan no// dbye ba rnam pa lnga yin no// rnam grangs dag ni brgyad du bstan// des tshig ye nas shes pas ye shes so// glo bur min pas ye shes so// ye nas yod pa'i rig pa de// bla ma dam pas mtshon nas ni// rang rig rtogs pas shes tsam
44a5(rnying rgyud): na// ye shes zhes ni de la bya// ngo bo lam gyi sgron ma de// ma bu rnams la rang ces gnas// lam ni chos nyid rgya chu brgyad// sgron d+h+r-i gu ta ru shar// las ni shes rab thogs med spyod// yon tan gzung 'dzin rtog pa med// 'bras bu su gsum rang la rdzogs/
44a6(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni// rgyu srang gcad la kha la gdon// rang gsal 'dzin med dang la bzhag/ dbye dus phung po bor pa'o// gzung 'dzin nam mkha'i mtha' la dang po// phung pos dang rdo dang 'dra// ye shes zhing khams rnam par dag/ sgog ni
44a7(rnying rgyud): gsum sbrel gyes pa bzhin// zhes gsungs so// dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ sems dang ye shes dbye ba'i le'u sta drug pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan khro gnyer can// sbubs gsum
44b1(rnying rgyud): rnyedas 'ang ste// sru gsum 'du 'bras yad dam dang// sa nus so// gang gsungs pa/ ngas pasan med langs par rung // smra babyar med skabs bstan pa// rgyas ting dang sgo gas pa bar // dag pa dang gdangs gyur byed shar//
44b2(rnying rgyud): 'gag med la// rang bzhin rjod kyi snang ba shar// dang po srid pazhi nas ni// bram zung dam thor ba dag tu// chos nyid rung sgo'i dang na gnas// thog mi ldan ba sangs rgyas te// da ga gsal pa'i sngon mar gnas// don tan chung
44b3(rnying rgyud): sragasam ye shes lnga shar// 'gyur ba med pas dong ste// reg pa gnas pas sbubs zhes bya// phung po dag la mngon gyur na// chos nyid rang byung sa rin no// ye shes skye ma'i sbubs zhes ni// byang chub las kyi byin sa ste// rtags kyis
44b4(rnying rgyud): zhes nyid la babyung // chos nyid dbang rngo zhes kyang bya// rig pa dang lus 'od du gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi nga lus te// brtags na med la bzhag ni 'byung bas legs pache// tshan gang 'od kyis kun du khyab// ye shes sna pa zhes bya ste// sgyum spangs
44b5(rnying rgyud): kyings bzung ngo // ras rtog pa gcags srubs gos de// gzugs kyi phung ba nyid yin te// de mardzogs naH la mi rdzogs// rtsal mardzogs na sgom byas// skom nus na mtha' midzad// mtha' mchod ni don mi rtogs// lus dag rdzogs na dgongs sa pa
44b6(rnying rgyud): dAs// dz+hal rdzogs chos rnams kun gyi rtogs mna'ajod// yang dag mtha' las rnam par grol// dus gsum 'gyur med dgongs pa cid// stsogs brgyad la rab tu sten// ska ba'i thag ni yongs su bcad// bsgrub pa'i dgongs pa rdul du dbyung // ts+tsho
44b7(rnying rgyud): la 'byor // / dus gsum 'o 'gyur mid par gnas// khrung chen gnam 'phang gcod pa la// nya ma nga bag tshag nas dag// ces gsungs so// yang gsungs pa/ sku gsum 'dra 'bral med pas te// gang zag rgyud la mtshan pas te// dang ma
45a1(rnying rgyud): ma pa ga / gas kya gas 'dadus// // sas na pa // / sa nga rgyam gas da// gsulal na du nas/ chu /
45a2(rnying rgyud): mig gi de nyid kho na ste// rnam shes ma yin 'od lngar gsal// snang la rang bzhin med pas te// drug ni thub pa kho nas te// phul pa phywa des del bya/ da ba rang bzhin thugs rje skye// dper nam bya'i slong bzhin// dbyibs su grub pa chos rlo ste/
45a3(rnying rgyud): nyid 'od lngar shar ban// longs sku mtshon pa'i dpecu bstan/ mab+ha'e mu gwang byung ba'i tshe// skul pasgra yid pa rlabastan// de gsum badrang bral yod dam med// 'du 'bral med de gcig gi dang // de gsum sngagasum ye shes wa// sra tshogs pa grangs
45a4(rnying rgyud): kyang tha dang myod// mchon bya'i yul du bgrangs pa tsam// don ni dngos med gcigalas med// ces gsungs so// dza srid zang po bar ba'i rgyud las/ sgrag sum grub pa gsum rgyud ma ba bstan pa'i ya ste bdun pa // de ngas yangs
45a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i bdag pos nus pa/ kyai rtse bcom ldan khro gnyer can// sring bag gzugs kyi phung po la// grong khyer gsum po ltar bgyi// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor tshog sa pa// brjid pa'i khrog nyer gsung du gsol// zhes nus so// yang ston pas bka' stsal
45a6(rnying rgyud): pa// 'khor ba'i grong khyer sdug bsngal mtsho/ phung por ro sbed dag yin te// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags sdug bsngal rgya// mi gtsang ba la longs spyod nas// nyon mongs drug lnga sna tshogs bskyed// don ni dngos med ma rtogs par// log srid 'dod pa sa chog
45a7(rnying rgyud): spang // chos su gnyis med do/ rtogs ni// thugs rngu bde ba'i rang bzhin pa skyed// rgyu nyid do dbyings nyid de// 'bras bu le shes dkyipa 'khor rdzogs// des gsung so// mya na 'das pa'i grong khyer ni// mngon par dga' ba'i ding 'ams te// me
45b1(rnying rgyud): pa ljongs spu'i gnas yin no// shes rab 'byed med rang sar shar// thugs rjem 'dres so sor ma khyen// shes rab sreg tu gyur pa ste// rlung lnga las ni tha dad med// rlung rjen mi bskyod pa de chu gnas// zhes gsungs so// srid pa'i grong khyer rje sngon bya ra'is//
45b2(rnying rgyud): rdoni ni rig pa chos srul// blon po 'gyur med sems zhes bya// rgyal po mi 'gyur chos kyu ste// sa 'dzin blon po zhes su grags// grong khyer gsum brtsegs man ga ni// gzugs kyi phung po nyid la'o// de gsum rig pa'i bzhugs gnas yin// zhes gsungs so//
45b3(rnying rgyud): dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gang zag gi rgyad la grong khyer gsum brtsegs bstan pa'i le'u skye brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan khro gnyer ldan// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs la// nyams
45b4(rnying rgyud): su blangs lugs gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nges zung zhig/ nyams su blang lugs bstan pa ni// yang rab nyams su blang lugs ni// spyod lam rnam pa'i gang spyod kyang // lta ba'i ngang las g.yos
45b5(rnying rgyud): pa med// dz+nyAn 'ang med pa'i dgongs pa'o// rkang med ma pa' la 'asra ba ni// sgrub bgyir med rgyab shang bshad // grogs med gcig zer gnas pa ni// dgongs pa zhag gcig tub sher bshad// 'grog la gyi tshugs kyi byed kyang // snying po'i don las g.yos pa med//
45b6(rnying rgyud): de ltar snying po'i don rtogs na// ma rig pa nyid cad nas bcad// rang rig dang po'i na pa bzhag/ shes bya'i sgrib pa ka nas dag/ 'khrul pa'i snang ba kra yis btab// sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i ngangan gnas// zhes gsungs so// yang gsungs pa/ dbang ba
45b7(rnying rgyud): 'bring gi nyams blangs ni// blon po btson du zin pas rgyal pos gdanas zin// ma yengs mnyam par bzhag pas byang chub ste// shes pa chu yi rkyen dang 'dra// brtags kyi na brtags kyi na rang dbang thob// shes rab chen po'i rang dbang thob// spos med dbyingam nang /
46a1(rnying rgyud): gas pa// yu thub pangs suzhugs // da sangs pa na nas// mang rudran / gzhan gyi stsogs pang/ byung ba mdubs dadangs pas// gas dbag ca gas pa da
46a2(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs so// dbang po tha ma'i nyams blang ni// sems gzung rig pa ar la gtad// byir ba mi gseng rang sar bsgom// de ltar bsgoms na rig pa zin// bar dor rtogs pa gdod kyi'o// zhes gsungs so// dur khrod phung po 'brang ba'i rgyud las/
46a3(rnying rgyud): dbang po rab 'bring tha ma gsum gyis nyams su blang lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhul pa/ kye kye bcom ldan khro gnyer can// phung po'i don la ji ltar srung // dur khrod ces ni gang la bgyi// mthong ljang rim gyis ji ltar
46a4(rnying rgyud): 'char// rig pa'i rgyal pos gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// yang gsungs pa/ phung po'i don ni 'di bzhin te// da lta'i bag chags rnam rtog la// rtogs pa'i ye shes ma skyes pas// ma rig rang gar gzung 'dzin spyad// nyon mongs drug lnga'i dbang du gyur//
46a5(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i ye shes phung zhes bya// po ni rang sa ma zin 'jig pa'o// 'bar ni nyon mongs dug lnga 'bar// brgyud ni 'khor ba rang gar brgyad// dur khrod mi gtsang nang na gnas// ma rig ma rtogs dus na'o// skyon gyi mtha' gsum sel gyur na// ma rig sems
46a6(rnying rgyud): kyi gdar sha bcad// dug lnga rang gro la ye shes te// de ltar rig pa'i don shes na// reg pa ma yin gzhan snang med// skye med chen po'i ngang du gol// thams cad mngon sangs nyid du rgyas// de ltar thams cad rgyas the bas na// phung ni ma rig dug lnga phung //
46a7(rnying rgyud): po ni rig pa 'gyur ba med// 'bar ni bde chen rtogs pa 'bar// dung ni chos kyi dbyings yin te// zhod ni rig pa'i ye shes nyid// rang gis rang snang zin pa'o// chos nyid zhing khams dag gsal la// rig pa'i ye shes rang gsal thim// dbyings dang
46b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes rig pa gnyis med de// rangs zin te mi 'gyur ba'o// zhes gsungs so// dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ phung po rgyud la sbyar zhing snang ba go bzlog pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po dang / sdud pa'i
46b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor dgang rab rdo rje dang / 'khor mkha' 'gro ma lnga ste/ ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/ las kyi mkha' 'gro ma/ gtsug gi rgyan gcig ma/ rdo rje khro gdong ma la sogs te mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye'u lnga dang / gsang ba'i
46b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor dug lnga dbang du sdud pa'i ye shes lnga dang / nye ba'i 'khor sprul pa'i sras bdun la sogs te/ gsang ba'i bdag pos sna drangs te/ skor ba lan gsum byas nas/ e ma ho/ bdag cag 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i
46b4(rnying rgyud): gsang chud de// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sgo phye nas// shes rab rlung gi lha mos bskyod// 'gyur med gsung gi bum par dril// ljags kyi pad+ma dag la bkram// choms dkar bzhi bcu'i nang nas bton// phung po 'bar ba'i gsang rgyad 'di// bdag ca
46b5(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i 'khor la gnang // ma rig mun pa'i blo gsal nas// rang rig 'byed med dang du bstsal// rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon du 'gyur// rang bzhin spos pa'i mtha' bcad nas// 'gyur med dgongs pa'i ngang du bskyal// zhes bstod do// du brjod
46b6(rnying rgyud): phung po 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ mjug rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i man ngag gi rgyung rdzogs so// // slob dpon be ma las mnga' bdag la gdams pa/ gzhan la bstan par gyur na/
46b7(rnying rgyud): sgrol byed chen pos skyed zhag 'jibs so// rgya gang skad du/ badz+ra bA grAta d+ha nA ma/ bdag dang/ rdo rje bang rtse'i rgyud kyi byeb/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chang chen po la phyag 'tshab pa// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcigs snang
47a1(rnying rgyud): bo rdo rje 'chang chen po// chos spu kun tu bzang po de// rang byung 'phrul gyi rdo rje'i sku// gnyis med mnyam pa rang byung gnas// gnyis med snang ba rang byung 'khor// brjod gsung med pa rang byung chos// snga phyi med pa snying po'i dus/
47a2(rnying rgyud): me nub rgyal mtshan rdo rje'i sku ru gsal// phyi med nang med 'og min kun tu nang // snga phyi dus mnyam snying po sprul pa'i 'khor// zhing khams dang gsal rig cha kha dog gsal// gdul bya med pa'i chos rnams rang byung chos skur bzhugs// de nas kun byed rdo rje
47a3(rnying rgyud): 'chang // rdo rje sems dpas rang byung 'phrul gyi me tog phul// sprul pa'i sprul pas rang byung du bskor te// kye kyi ston pa rdo rje 'chang // 'khor bar 'bul 'khor sems can la// thugs rje chen pos mi gzigs sam// nyid kyi sngon gyi thugs dam pa catsan// sems can
47a4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thob bya'i phyir// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// snying po ngos bzung cha rkyen las// nyid kyis rdzogs par bstan du gsol// de nas kun bzang rdo rje 'chang // rang byung 'phrul gyi skur bzhengs nas// sprul pa'i 'khor dang yang sprul 'khor// 'dus pa'i
47a5(rnying rgyud): tshogs la bka' stsal pa// rang byung snying po byang chub sems// rgyal bar gyur pa'i snying po yin// stong pa'i chos nyid dam pa yin// snang ba ma 'gags lhun gyis grub// gnyis su med pa'i dam pa yin// 'khor ba'i bcud phyung ba de gshegs rgyud// sku dang gsung dang
47a6(rnying rgyud): thugs dang ni// yon tan dang ni srin las kyi// snying po gsum du bsdu ba dang // de yi cha rkyen bstan par bya// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ zhus pa dang lan gyi le'u ste dang po'o// / rdo rje chang bas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rje
47a7(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' khyod// rang byung 'phrul gyi snying po'i sgo// rang byung snying po gsum las byung // pha dang ma dang rang dang gsum// lani thabs chen kun tu babang // ma ni shes rab kun bzang yum// bu ni gnyis med rang byung chu// rdo rje 'chang ba nyid kyi grwa// zhes gsungs
47b1(rnying rgyud): so// yang bka' sgrub pa// nyan cig sems dpa' rdorje 'chang// dkyil 'bor can po yangs pa yin// bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog/ ye shes su ste rang byung ba/ snying po sku ba dir dang byung bsgrags// skye med 'phrul gyi dang byung du// rin ze 'acur
47b2(rnying rgyud): gyirang byung sgra// rdo rje 'phrul gyi snying po'i sku// rang byung 'phrul gyi snying po'i lha// rang byung snyi ldan grub yin// skom skyod rtogs pa bskyed rdzogs ngas/ de nas kun gro dgongs pa'i mchog/ 'bru dran 'dzin chags gdo dkyis// 'gya dran 'dzin chags goms byed na// rtsa cung zig le gsal bar bya//
47b3(rnying rgyud): tramra rtsa rang rtsa gsus// thabs dang shes rab ye shes gsum// rom rkyang ma kun 'dar gsum// la las ti gsum// rtsa dang drung dang thig le gsum// dkar dang dmar dang mthing drang gsum// hUM dang snying po rang byung rtsal// thams cad 'dus pa gcig med ston//
47b4(rnying rgyud): a ti yo g.yul med khrol// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i chud las/ rang byang sku'i mtshan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / rdo rje 'chang bas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog/ d+h+waM zhes ma bslad+ma rang
47b5(rnying rgyud): byung skad// sangs rgyas gsung la sems can skya// ye nas rang byung 'phrul gyi sgra// gzhi nas 'bras bu lam gyi rgyu// ming gi snying po 'phrul gyi tshig/ ngo mtshar chen po rmad du byung // zhes bka' stsal pas/ kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang // snying po gang lags nye
47b6(rnying rgyud): snying gang // yang rnying gang lags bstan tu gsol// kun byed rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed// 'bru lnga ma hA m+bu lnga'i sngags// rigs snga phyogs dang dug lji byung // lnga ldan rngon gyi snying po yin// 'bru gsum nye ba'i snying po yin// gsum
47b7(rnying rgyud): lkol a ru'i dgongs pa bstan// su gsum dug gsum pa ma ring // gsum sgrol rig sngags gzungs sngags min// 'bru gcig ma ti yul med sra// gcig med yul dang 'brel pa'i sngags// blan med pa'i rang byung rnying / yang snying 'phrul gyi snying po yin/
48a1(rnying rgyud): sa na
48a2(rnying rgyud): ga/
48a3(rnying rgyud): sa sa
48b1(rnying rgyud): sa de gzugs kyi dkyil lab du// ldanan na// dbyung ma ga pa ran// desugs dmas// rdzud zung las/ thugs pa / 'chang bsdug sang//
48b2(rnying rgyud): nyon cig padz+ra sa r+b+ba khyod// nor bu rin chen 'od 'bar bshad// sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che// dper na nor bu rin chen gling // sa jo mi gnas rin po che// rang rgyang snying po sus rtogs pa// 'khrul sngar dge sdig kyang yang med/
48b3(rnying rgyud): chos nyid chos dbyings snying po'i klong // gang ltar byas kyang snying po'i grogs// dper na mel shing bstan 'dra// gang zhig rang byung ngo shes pa// zhi rgyas dbang drag phrin las 'grub// nad 'jil lus bde 'byung ba lnga// 'ji bas mi tshe ga rdo rje 'dra/
48b4(rnying rgyud): srog snying rang byung ngo shes na// lha dang klu dang gza' dang bdud// gnod sbyin srin po chu dang btsan// rgyal po mi mo lha srin kun// khrims la gnas kyi rgyal po 'dra// rang byang snying po sus 'chang ba// bsod nams longs spyod 'khor rdzas 'phel// dgra med lus
48b5(rnying rgyud): mthong pha dang ma// nor bu rin chen 'chang ba 'dra// lo zla gza' skad dus tshod med// sprin med mkha' dkyil nyi ma 'dra// gang la snang sngags rang byung sngags// 'byung ba 'khrugs pa'i glog dang 'dra// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ thams cad
