48b6(rnying rgyud): yon tan du mtshon pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig badz+ra satwa khyod// las rnams ldan par tshogs pa ni// snying po sgyu ma'i rdzas dang 'dra// gcig la mthong snang 'char lugs yang // dper na nor bu rin po che//
48b7(rnying rgyud): 'chang bas yon tan 'byung ba 'dra// dpa' bo gcig pa rin po che// zhe dang rgyas pa drag po'i las// gang la bya ba de nyid sdang // thogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// rnam smin 'byung ba 'khrugs pa'i gdon// de yi yon tan mngon du snang // dper na nyi
49a1(rnying rgyud): mas khyab pa 'dra// rnam smin sgrib pa'i nad dang gdon// snying po rtogs pa'i gang zag la// de yi don rtags bstan pa ni// dper na rmi lam sad pa 'dra// goms rtags brtan par 'byung ba yin// sgrib pa myong ba drag zhan yin//
49a2(rnying rgyud): dge sdig gnyis po mnyam nyid na// rnam par smin pa'i 'thun pa dengs// nam mkhar khu rlangs dengs pa 'dra// nad ni 'byung ba'i rang bzhin 'gyur// lus kun thig le rgyas pa 'dra// gdon kun rgyal po zin pa yi// dmangs dang mi lam rdzi star 'dra/
49a3(rnying rgyud): snying po dang byung sus rtogs pa// rin chen gser glir phyin pa 'dra// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang kye'i rgyud lngas/ phrin pas mdor bstan pa'i lce'u ste drug pa'o// / rdo rje 'chang bas bka' stsal pa// nyon cis badz+ra sarba khyed// ma
49a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi sbyod sgrol gyis// snying po chos kyi su du sgrol// phyir mi ldog paphyir mi dong // 'dren pa'i thugs rje rkyen mi chad// 'bru dran chos kyi dbyings su sbyor// chags pa dang byung klong du grol// gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa yin// 'khru dran don chags dbang du gyis/
49a5(rnying rgyud): dris pa rtsal gyi dbang bsrung yin// lha dang bum po reg ma dang // gzhan la ltos 'gyur chos ma yin// rang byung bos zin 'khrul pa med// 'bru dran rang sbyang rang grol dbang // 'dzin chags do tshad snying po'i yul// 'dzin med 'gyu ba rang phyung dbang // bdag med yul gro
49a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes dbang // dbang gi rgyal po rang byung dbang // sangs rgyas de med dbang mchog yin// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ dbang stor sgrol rtsa ba mtshon pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / rdo rje 'chang bas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig brda
49a7(rnying rgyud): sar+b+ba khyod// ce yang yin no gang yang rung // mdun dang rgyab dang phyogs bcu rtsa// gang ltar snang yang snying po nyid// snying po snang ba rang byung yin// ci yang med do gang yang snang // med btags pathul ba rdzun pa'i chos// ming tsam 'di zhes mtshon na ni// rdo rje sems
49b1(rnying rgyud): dpang mtshon du med// gcig ni kun gyi rang bzhin yin// gcig po rang yang gang du 'dug/ ming med yul dang bral bar gyis// yul snang gzugs ni srog gi gzhi// yul du bden pa gang na 'dung // rdul tsam 'dug na srob la shor// srog gi la shan phrad par gyis// ma
49b2(rnying rgyud): btags chos kun snying po gti// ming yig sla bsgrags gad la bden// gcig tsam bden na ming lnga 'khor// tshig gi sgo 'dogs tshod par gyes// gnyis med gnyis su med par ston// bstan pas yul med mtshon tshig gang // bdun par dus sA 'khrul pas
49b3(rnying rgyud): chog/ dngos po dngos med gnyis ka gcig/ stong nyid sba ba'i khyu mchog yin// rang byung 'phrul gyi snying po'i sku// gang ltar snang ba snying po'i brdal// 'dren pa'i thugs rje 'gag pa med// ye shes sku ste rang byung yin// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yid rtse'i rgyud
49b4(rnying rgyud): las// lta ba la bzla ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'chang kun tu bzang po nyid/ mtshon pa'i lam gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' la bkang stsal pa/ gcig ni kun gyi rang bzhin te// byed pa sems can kun
49b5(rnying rgyud): don byed// phan 'dod sems can gnyis ka shin pa// rang byung 'phrul gyi snying po'i sku// ting 'dzin gsum gyi sgo nas bskyed// sku gsal gdul bya la dmigs pa// mchod sbyin tshogs sogs rgyun du bya// tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsag par bya// mchod rten sku gdung gdab
49b6(rnying rgyud): par bya// rang byung snying po'i tshe tshwa dang // rgyu rkyen 'byung lnga'i tsha tshwa gdab// gtor ma gyi nang gnyis ka bya// chu gtor klu gtor dmar gtor dang // rdo rje tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor // 'byor bshams dngos po bsam pa tshogs// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags za tshogs bya// gcong ma
49b7(rnying rgyud): khrus kyi las byed de// rin tshen gang ldan thaM pa dor// grong dang blo rang du blangs // nyor po byin mapa dag par ba // meng chung dang sa dang bdud rtsemen// zlas sun pa 'byor gang ba bya// bzung ba gas pa'i rdzas dang sngags// dpa' bag cig pa dengs
50a1(rnying rgyud): bya// mdzend gdug pa'i las gson// zhi drag gnyis kyi las la 'jug/ bu rigs nad rigs mdzod gsad dkrol// nad kyi gnod lugs bcos ka bya// bsgrubral bar chod dgra byung na// lan gsum 'pham blang 'gyong zer
50a2(rnying rgyud): gyi// de nas dkon mchog dbang btsugs la// rlung ldog pa pi dus kyi bsgral// rang gis ma nges rbod gtor na// snying po 'phrul gyi sku bsgom la// hU~M la b+h+yo zlog rbad btags na// b+h+yo ka sdom sdig ji bzhin 'gyur// 'byung ba 'brug pa'i nang 'donan//
50a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnad kyis gdon// stod spang bar gyi gdon lugs yin// dza thang sdod pa bsams pas sbyangs// 'khor lo lnga yi rtsa sgo la// drod gdon grang ba po mo'i nad// bcud len zas ni grogs yin no// rnam sprin las kyang sbyangs par nges// 'byung bakhrug gdom
50a4(rnying rgyud): micho// bar chod gdon gyi chad byung sems 'khrugs na// gdon ngos bzung ba shin tu gces// srog snying gsal ba rab tu gces// gang yin de la gtad pa gces// lus nyams mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur// 'khor lo srog gnad snying pos gtems// rjes med mthong
50a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i bye brag bya// byang chub chen po'i grogs su 'gyur// kho yi cho 'phrul cu khrol// nga ni cir snang cing 'dug ltos// 'bru na 'dzin chags yul dang bral// ming med tshig gi rtog pa zad// rtogs shig rtogs shig skal ldan bu// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud lam/
50a6(rnying rgyud): las thams cad pa'i skangs kyi le'u skye dgu pa'o// / rdo rje 'chang bas bka' stsal pa/ don cig badz+ra satwa khyod// dus gsum bde gshegs gsang chen de// 'bum pas 'ga' yas rtogs par dka'// 'thur med dang thung snying po 'di// gang du gyur
50a7(rnying rgyud): kyang nga byung shid // gcig ni kun bye nga bzhin te// sprul pa'i 'khor lo rna tshogs 'chang // mi zung skyeng po // skye gsung thugs dang rgyang pa lnga// de de la yang gsus gsum ste// ting 'dzin po rjengs dang gsum// hU~M la pa yin pa cing yang byung/
50b1(rnying rgyud): byang gdang dang ldan par gyis// rang byung skyeng po srog dang 'ang // zung drug zhug pas dang gshed byung // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med do// dpa' bogacig pa'i 'khor ldan// rgyal mang ming dang bral ba las// rang byung snying po gcig pang rtogs// gta
50b2(rnying rgyud): rang yang phyogs dang bral// gang yang yin no ci yang rung // rang byung snying po'i 'khor ba lo// gdeng chen rtogs pa'i 'khor lo yin// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo ni// sku srog 'khor lo yul la bskor// gsung ming 'khor lo tshig la bskor// thugs
50b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo rtogs pas bskor// gsum tshan sku gsung thugs shes bya// thabs dang shes rab ye shes gsum// de la yon tan nor bu 'dra// sna tshogs thugs rje las su mdzad// yon tan phrin las 'khor lo yin// de de la yang gsum gsum du// cha ldan phrin las
50b4(rnying rgyud): sgo nas bstun// 'jig rten dregs pa gzhom pa dang // 'byung ba 'jugs pa gzhom pa'o// 'di ni phyag na rdo rje dang // khro bo la sogs gshin rje las// dpa' bo gcig pa dang byung thugs// rgyu dang snag tsha stu gung ldan// thig bskor rim pa lnga ru skor// 'khor
50b5(rnying rgyud): rtsibs bzhi brgyad cu drug/ sum cu rtsa gnyis drug cu bzhi// dpa' bo gnag pa sum bsgril bri// g.yas dang g.yon dang rang byung gzer// lha dang yig 'bru mtshon cha me// dug lnga 'byung ba skabs dang sbyar// bsam pa sgo 'bar rdzas gsum bya// dpa' bo
50b6(rnying rgyud): gcig pa'i 'khor lo yin// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ thugs kyi 'khor lo'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// nyon cig badz+ra satwa khyod// rdzas ni n+ya chog ngongs dang // grogs lnga las dang sbyar // bsam pa ting
50b7(rnying rgyud): de 'dzin gyi las// rin chen 'phrul gyi snying po bsgom// sems dpa' gsum ni gsang bar bya// ting 'dzin rnam gsum sems dpa' mkhang// yidam zhi khro dus dang sbyar// de nas spob spu dbugs la bskyon// bsrul sogs kun nas spro// re re'i sgo nas
51a1(rnying rgyud): grangs med so// blo bsgru dbugs kyi 'khor lor 'dod// 'khor lo'i rnam pa grangs mang yang // g.yas bkor g.yon pa tsha lu gsum// steng gnod tog gcod phyogs gcod gsum// dkrug dang bzhig dang
51a2(rnying rgyud): rnalam dgu// rkyang pa dang ni bcu ru bshad// 'khor lo bskor ba'i man ngag yin// pha bskor ma bskor rang bskor gsum// 'khor lo mdo yis bsdu bar bya// rang byung dmigs pa snying po'i klong // yul med ming dang bral tsan// 'bru dran 'din chags
51a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba la// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo'i gdams pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang dgu bshad bya ba// nyon cig badz+ra sar+b+ba khrod// sku gsum 'khor lo bstan pa ni// mi sgo chos can a yi bskor/
51a4(rnying rgyud): rdzas tshogs rgyu ni ldan pa la// thig skor rim pa lnga 'am drug/ lte brtsibs bzhi brgyad cu drug/ sum cu rtsa gnyis drug cu bzhi// a ni skye med a sbyor bkod// shis bstan pa'i 'khor lor bshad// dbyangs yig dug tu brgyad pa la// bcu drug 'jam dpal
51a5(rnying rgyud): yid ma sngags// bcu gnyis shis bstun pa dngos// drug pa 'khor lo lnga rdzogs nyid// skye med 'gags pa med pa'i chos// a ni chos kyi dbyings su gnas// sa ni chos nyid 'gyur ba med// ha ni 'gag med a ha chas// a ni skye med gnas su ldog/ skye
51a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung med pa a ha ma// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ gsung gi 'khor lo'i le'u stebacu gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sgra yi 'khor lo bstan pa ni// rdzas dang snag tsha tshogs pa la// thig le skor ri ma gong dang
51a7(rnying rgyud): 'dra// lte ba cibs bzhi dpa' bo lnga// brgyad pa tshogs brgyad sems dpa' brgyad// gang bsgrub 'khor gyi lha tshogs so// bcu drug khro bcu thub pa drug/ sum du gnyis la dbang mo mkha' 'gro bzhi// glu yi 'khor lo yin par 'dod// 'bru wa gtso byas 'khor lo lnga/
51b1(rnying rgyud): yon tan phrin las de bzhin shes// rin chen lta bur yon tan 'byung // sa tshon gang ba sgrub yi dam sngags// 'khor lo gang 'dra de la dgod// yon tan 'khor lo yin par 'chad// thugs rje'i byin rlabs cir yang ston// gang brtsam las de 'grub par 'gyur// has
51b2(rnying rgyud): mtshon gang bslab gsang ba'i gnas// phrin las 'khor lo yin par 'dod// thik+ka snying lnga ru rdzogs par bris// lce ba dz+wA la bzhi brgyad b+h+rUM// bcu drag ha la so gnyis hi// nad gdon thugs kyi 'khor lo yin// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/
51b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// thugs rjes 'gro ba 'dzin pa na// dam tshig can gyi slob bu la// thugs rje can gyi slob dpon gyis// dmapa sre gnang ba
51b4(rnying rgyud): sems bskyed bya// dad ldan bus kyang yid 'thad nor gyis bslu// bla ma mchod dang chos skyong bskang // sbyin pa dge ba tshogs gsog bya// sdig sbyangs chos ni chags pa'i rten// de ltar tshul dang ldan par bya// bla mthugs rje byams ldan des// brda dang ngag
51b5(rnying rgyud): gis slob bu bsrel// brda bstan yul du dmigs pa bstan// / ngag brjod lce rtses rna bar dkrugs// shes rab can gyis bu la bstim// phyi ltar snying po brda ru ston// nang ltar lus dang rtsa rlung sprod// gsang bar yi ge snying po khrol// don du chos nyid snying por
51b6(rnying rgyud): 'dus// lnga bskor gsum sgrom 'phrang du chug/ rang thog zangs kyi wa nas rmongs// 'thong ba thams cad de la spus// sku dang bum pa dkyil 'khor dang // dbyibs dang phyag mtshan sna tshogs gzugs// pad+ma dang ni rdo rje dang // rin chen rgya gra ma ral gri mda'//
51b7(rnying rgyud): khache snar pa zhing dbrog dang // gzhu dang drol bu zhags pa dang // lcags kyu zhigs pa dgra dang / chum po gru bzhi zla gam dang // bu gsum la sogs sna tshogs pa// kha dog la sogs de dang mtshungs// snang ba sna tshogs snying po nyid// snang ba yod med de la
52a1(rnying rgyud): gags// brlo ma sna na// kyis gas // rnams ma na / spyod bang bstan rdzun sa //
52a2(rnying rgyud): stsal pa// nyon cig rdo ni sems dpa' med// ming ma lus kyi rlung tshul ni// 8/ rkyen nyid po 'di// rang byung rgyab tshul tsa// 'khrul pa'i lus rten 'od la stsa len// 'gyur rgyal dkar da chen/ rtsub par dor chen dang 'jom// mama'i 'dra 'thad gzhal ya
52a3(rnying rgyud): 'od// bar 'od ya snang log 'dzin// bdun phrag bla dgu rdob tu ni// lus bu rdzogs te ma las/ yul// nang nas shes pa phyi dmigs la// zhag dang zla ba lo yis 'grig// gzung 'dzin shes pa je rags song// drug lnga chags sdang gzung 'dzin spyod// shes rab rtog dpyod
52a4(rnying rgyud): dge sdig go// de ltar snying po lus kyi rgyu// ha gnyis kha sprad lus kyi rgya// byang khog stod du brda sprad gsapa// 'a dang zhabs skyed ro smad rkang // gu gu thig le zla tshes mgo// 'greng bun ro rtsa dang sgra// de ltar snying po nyid las grub// brda du snying gi bu la ston// pha rtsem
52a5(rnying rgyud): rtsa rang rtsa gsum// lus dang sems kyi gzhi ma yin// rmya ba rlung gi rtsal rdzogs tshad// zam thig le rang gi sems// dang po rgyu las 'bras bu sIn// phaH shel gyi chu 'bab 'dra// tshad du smin pas sprin dus yin// thod pa dbang mo skal tshigs sbubs// rus pa'i
52a6(rnying rgyud): rtswardza la rdzogs sen mo yin// rkang dang rkang mar klad gzhung nas// thig leta mig bcud kyi mchog/ la la rtsa ste sbal tshigs sbubs// ro ma dkar mo thabs rtsa ba// bde ba gsal ba rags pa g.yas// ma rtswa btsod kyi theg pa 'dra// tshad du smin pa mdzod spu
52a7(rnying rgyud): yin// don spring nang rol sha ye skabs// dngas lpags rung rgya chus mang dgrags// rtsal rdzogs pags pa ba swAsgra// sha dang don snying rtsa las khrag/ thig le dmar potha tshigs 'jon// ras rkyang ma dmar ser srog brtsa// don snying 'khor lo lnga dang 'brel/
52b1(rnying rgyud): 'gag med nang bzung shes rab mchog/ stong pa martsa rags pa g.yon// de nyid thang 'brel srog dus lpags// de ltar lus po 'byung ba wa las grub// snying pa gas 'di rtags// sems can kun gyi s+thArba b+h+rU~M// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs sur+tha/
52b2(rnying rgyud): stong pa gsal ba 'gag med skye// chos min snying po rang 'byung hUM// rang byung rtogs na grol bar 'gyur// mi 'gyur mthing ga rang gi rtsa// a wa d+hU tI kun 'dar ma// ye shes lnga chu tshon gyi sku// 'od lnga 'ja' tshon nyi zer 'dra// pha ma gnyis kyi bar naN+Da
52b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje pad+ma tshangs bug sgo// 'khor lo lnga dang 'brel ba'i rtsa// bzhi brgyad bcu drug sum cu gnyis// drug cu rtsa bzhi lte ba'o// nyi khri chig stong rgyas pa'i rtsa// byang sems thig le chu brlung // rdo rje hU~M gi rtsal du bshad// ces gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/
52b4(rnying rgyud): snying po lus kyi grub tshul gyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / kun byed kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ ho na cig rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// sangs rgyas gsung la sems ca ni sgra// snying po sgra yi gdams pa 'di// snying po yin par gzhi ru bcas// gang snang
52b5(rnying rgyud): ming du btags pa kun// snying po'i chos su bsgrub par bya// tshig tu yi ge ming du btags// btags sgra gang brjod snying po'i sgra// gzhi dang sgrub byed gzhan 'phrang bsdam// yi ge'i tshogs sogs grogs su 'gyur// ka kha ga blang / tsa tsha da dz+ha nya/ TaN+DaSha Ta Na/
52b6(rnying rgyud): thad d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+Sha/ a A/ i I/ u U/ e I/ au AM/ ri r-I/ li l-I/ aM AH/ de dag snying po hU~M gi grogs// sku gsum khyab byed rgyam chad// nga ni rang byung snying po'i chos// gcod byed cha ldan 'joms par byed//
52b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa nya// gtan 'bebs thig le dus la babs// yod med gnyis la 'dug pa na/ rig pa gnas lugs 'khor ba'i rgyu// skyed par byed pa chos nyid ma// rdzab rnams myong 'dzin pa yin// gnas lugs snying po wa nas drongs// zhar za byed
53a1(rnying rgyud): stong pa'i dbyings// lhagasus kyang na 'das pa/ thags rjeg nas lugs shes rab shAgs// sani 'gyur ba med par btan// ha ni 'gyug myed spring ba darnyings// skye ba med pas 'ang gros// 'dun po padog pas du gyu
53a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa mkhyen byed gcod pa dang // 'brel khyab smad pa snying po'i grogs// snying po med pa gang zhig brjod// yi ge med pa srog snying gang // yig 'bru med pa gzugs snar ci// srog dang snying po'i gdams pa yin// srog ni gzugs la sbeng po meng // gzugs nas
53a3(rnying rgyud): bzung na snying pos bod// ces gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ gsang ba sgra dang srog gI le'u ste brgya drug pa'o// / de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyen cig sems dpa' rdo rje che// rdo rje hUM g+he hUM zhes sgrogs// thig le nyag gcig man ngag
53a4(rnying rgyud): ni// bsgom du ci yang med pa la// yengs pa med pa'i mnang gi bstan// rdo rje 'phrul gyi snying po'i sgra/ rdo rje skye med 'gag med thugs// rdo rje bzhi bskor ma yengs bzlas// rdo rje rdo rje shub cu dang // gnod pa 'gog/ byed i tir bzlas// sems dpa'i sngags pa/
53a5(rnying rgyud): bla madran// rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang song bzlas// rdo shub bru'i ba zlas pa ni// mo dang mamra ni mnyam thar la// g+ha mi ts+yai mos cung zad bskul// tshig gi smin bsnang ba'i bya// don thabasa'i brnas pa'o// 'gog pa dag gi bzlas pan// rgyud dang gdon ngos bzang bralas/ nga
53a6(rnying rgyud): 'phang smad bsgyur bar nas gdon// bsreg gsad char dbab mchod par dbul// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags rnam rtog 'gog/ 'gyu dran 'don chags kyang snang l-I// yod med gang 'dug ci 'dug brtags// nga drang snying po rang byang chos// gzugs med khrog tshod sdang
53a7(rnying rgyud): med// tshig med meng bral snying po rig/ a ni skye med bzlas pa'o// gsang sngags rig sngags gzungs sngags kun// gang bzlas snying gi shu gi ta// yi ge 'bru yi sla ltar ro// chen po 'jug sa ring po thung // drang po bzlog pa rnal ma rnams// kun gyi
53b1(rnying rgyud): snying po hU~M gi swa// gsang par bzlas dang 'brug ltar sgrogs// rang mar chog gsal chod pa bza'// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang ci'i rgyud las/ bza' lugs kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// zhon cig
53b2(rnying rgyud): satwa khyod// re bo'i rgyud dang tshig gi rgyud// rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po dang // lta 'phyogs dang bral ba'i chos// ma bris dkyil 'khor snang ba'i mchog/ dbang mchog snying po rang byung dbang // 'gyu dran 'dzin chags yengs med sgrogs// dam chog 'khra 'phrig spangs pa'i
53b3(rnying rgyud): gdeng // spyod pa shugs 'byung tshul 'chos med// phrin las 'gro don rdzogs pa yi// gsang sngags snying po hUM gi rgyud// 'brel dang ma tshang med pa yin// yongs su rdzogs pas ma tshang med// bsnyen pa nye bsnyen bskyab pa las// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs pa che//
53b4(rnying rgyud): 'di ni a ti snying po'i chung// gsang sngags bstan pa dar ba'i dus// dus kyi snyigs ma las ngan byed// rgyal po mang 'bri da mang+ga kun rang dgar spyod// de dus nga yi rgud 'di dar bar 'gyur// ma nyams gsang thub ro dogs bral// grol bar 'gyur te the tshom med// chos
53b5(rnying rgyud): kyi zong byed slob dpon 'phag tshong byed// sdig la mi 'jom tshul 'chos dge ba byed// mched kyi khrel med slob dpon mnyes mi byed// dngos gsum rjes 'brel ngan song dmyal ba'i gnas// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ rgyud kyi don bsdus pa dang dang
53b6(rnying rgyud): dus kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// kun byed ston pas bka' stsal pa// 'khor tshogs badz+ra satwa khyod nyon cing // snying po gang du gyur pas sangs rgyas thugs// rtsa ba 'dus pas sems can gzhi// myang 'das thugs la 'khor ba'i dbugs// gong du
53b7(rnying rgyud): gyur dang gong na med// rtse mo zang thal rin chen tog/ sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs pa gcig/ sems can kun gyi yid du gnas// 'khor ba'i gsham du 'dus pa yin// 'gro drug khams gsum hUM gi skad// mi mthun pa dang ga la srid// stong pa sems
54a1(rnying rgyud): kyi dang rtsal yin// rtse mo gar 'byung rtswa bA ga sham du 'dus// dus kyi tha mar sta co da bang nges// gces pa'i man dag za med snying po'i rgyud// stegs ma'i dus su chos 'di 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje sems
54a2(rnying rgyud): dngas 'di skad zhus// de ltar chos 'di 'byung ba ni// phrin gyis rlabs kyis 'byud mi 'byung // gang gis phyogs dang bar 'gyur// gang zag gang gis 'dzin pa lags// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje 'anang bas 'di srid gsungs// byin gyis rlabs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur//
54a3(rnying rgyud): nyid sprul mardo rje sems// rdo rje 'chang ba bar ma khyod// khyod nyid sprul pa rdo rje'i rigs// pad+ma'i ming la rdo rje'i sku// rgyal rigs yo rgyan rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje rdung ngas mdes// sa 'dul bor yul rgyal po dang // blon po sbrul skya gcig la gtod// de nas skar
54a4(rnying rgyud): ldan ri mo brgyud nas// gsang sngags bka' 'tshol dus su dang // zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ chos kyi dngas 'thung dus kyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / pang ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa'i tshogs/
54a5(rnying rgyud): snying po chos min rang byung 'di// dper na nor bu rin chen 'dra// thams cad mi 'byung gang yang med// 'gyur ba med pas gseng dang 'dra// gang ltar dpyid kyang snying po nyid// pa byung rang bzhin nam mkha' dra// stong pa dngos por snang bar byed// snyam mkhan gyi
54a6(rnying rgyud): dpe dang 'dra// gcig las thams cad sprul par snang // rgya mtshor gzu' skang shar ba 'dra// zab la ma'i dres kun gsal chos// rnam mkhar sbyin dang du chog dang 'dra// dngos po'i rdzas kun rlag par byed// sman gyi rgyal po rdo te 'dra// gang la reg pa
54a7(rnying rgyud): spa ru 'gyur// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dri// log lta dgra bgegs 'dul bar byed// nam mkhar nyim shar ba 'dra// marig sdig sgrib sbyong ba'o// sman gyi rgyal po ga pur 'dra// rtogs dang ma rtog khyad par che// thang khang mnyam po'i chu dang 'dra//
54b1(rnying rgyud): gang dang ga dpang 'ang byang sa// ting banan nga stobs// rtsam dab dang ma // 'do srung bzhan da// dpa ldagad du na// rdzo gang 'du na' dul da/ rgyags nam pa pa gcang ma / rdonang tu byangs das/
54b2(rnying rgyud): brdad // glab tshol chen ga gul dang // ta pon mu bri badz+ra zhing brtag/ sman dug bur ma ka nI// tsha grang gnyis la sbyar zhing btang // rtswa chu gnyis kyis na ngos bzung // sbyin bya theg pa pho rog mig/ mig mthong gdon ngos bzung ba'i rdzas// ku gul ta bon chal
54b3(rnying rgyud): zin ni// gdon bsreg yi dwags khachings rdzas// 'o ma can dang tshed ma can// sbyin bsreg zhi drag gnyis kyi rdzas// rog ya ma thod pa ming dang gzugs// rgya gram dpa' bo bco lngas bris// mnan pa rdo rje khwa gnon rdzas// khrag dang dug sde spro dang chu// lo thog drung
54b4(rnying rgyud): la bskur ba'i rdzas// nyung dkar nyung nag mda' phur khrag/ srog la zor thun gsad pa'i rdzas// hUM bsgom hU~M brjod me dpung mtshon// thog ris sdigs mdzub ser ba bzlog/ ces gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad zhus// ston pas gsungs pa'i
54b5(rnying rgyud): rgyung 'di la// mtshan du ji skad gzung bar bgyi// 'khor tshogs 'di la nges par gsung // zhes zhus pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// ngas bshad snying po don gyi rgyud// sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'dus pa'i chos// dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud du
54b6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i snying po chos min ston// gsang ba snying po'i chung ngu zung // rang byung snying po rdo rje ston// rang byung snying po'i rgyud du zung // 'og min gnas kyi dang po gsungs// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud du byung // zhes gsungs nas bka' stsal pa/ gsong sngags
54b7(rnying rgyud): 'di bcol ba spyod// dam tshig nyams pa'i chos byed kun// ni ga pi dwags dbug par shog/ mi bzang sngon po bdud mo yis// grogs dang bu tsha'akhong du shog/ ngid 'ong grogs dang bral bar shig/ ming btags srin sde brgyad kyis// rtag tu 'tsho pa/
55a1(rnying rgyud): rkang can shig/ byams pa'i gton med ma nangs kun// rtag tu pa salas rgya gag/ bu dang slo bathu bskabs gyur ba// sngon bu'i skad bzhon kun ma gag/ 'byung ba 'jug pas 'dra ba'i nad// rtag tu lus pa 'byung du na/
55a2(rnying rgyud): gdu byar klu dang dgras par dang // rtag tu lus sems pade med shog/ bla ma mags byed lus sro gnod// rig pa dam rdzog gtsang mar bsrung // 'khor drug yang phyir mi ldog par// dge sbyong grogs rti khor rnyed shig/ g+ha srin 'khor byed par cha sel bar da/
55a3(rnying rgyud): mgo dgu byams nas rgyal po'i bka' bzhin shog/ nad med lus bde nyams myong rang 'bar shog/ klu 'go bsod nams dge rgyas shog/ ces gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ dpe dang srung rdzas rgyud mtshan smon lam gyi le'u ste
55a4(rnying rgyud): nyi shu pa'o// / de nas ston pa kun byed rdo rje 'chang // 'od gsal kha dog snying po'i 'od// hUM las kha dog lngar bstan nas// rdo rje 'chang ba dang po'i skyu ru bzhugs// bruM las ha 'byung a ru rtogs// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje sems
55a5(rnying rgyud): dbang 'khod dang / mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje drug mo la sogs pa rigs lnga'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / rdo rje rigs kyi lha brgya stong gis/ me tog dang mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod cing mngon par bstod pa/ ston pa'i ston pa rdo rje 'chang // kun tu bzang po kun byed sgra/
55a6(rnying rgyud): snying po'i chos 'chad rdo rje'i thugs// snying po skye med sku la bstod// 'dus pa'i 'khor la tshud bshad ngo mtshar che// rang byung snying po hUM de rdo rje'i rgyud// gsang ba mngon du ston pa man ngag chos// 'khor tshogs 'di la gnang ba yi rang ngo // zhes gsungs so//
55a7(rnying rgyud): ston pa nyid mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rdo rje sems dpas/ kye mo gyi hud kyi hud ces gsungs shing / mi snang mi'i khor rdo rje chang // byur mi ldog 'i kun tu zang // snying po chos dbyings rdo rje'i sku// byin gyis rlabs kyis gzung bar zhu// zhes gsungs nas rgyud 'di ba
55b1(rnying rgyud): sa sbrul bu phru 'gyun gnas la gsungasaso// da gyi'i rgyu las/ rdzas su 'du / gsadang pa mdzad rdzogs su// / rtag zhadang / badz+raT tan nAH/ bad dan/
55b2(rnying rgyud): ni yang tig gi rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po rang rig pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ngadi skad pa drug gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ skyon 'don dzir chen no// chos dbyings snying po rang byung gnas// sa kyi med pa snying po'i dris// deng byung sprul pa ny-i
55b3(rnying rgyud): rang byung snying po rtogs pa'i chos// gcig las thams cad 'byung bar rtogs/ yang dang bral ba'i zag le ni// cir yang yin pa thams cad grol// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' drang // rdo rje dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro ma// rdo rje drag mo te zla'i gdo // sems dpa'
55b4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor la sogs kyis// ston pa nyid la 'di skad gsol// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang // snying po'i nyi zla gsal ba de// 'khrul pa log lhas 'gro drug bsgribs// thugs rjes snying po me sel ba// sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ci// zhes zhus pas/ de nas kun
55b5(rnying rgyud): bzang rdo rje 'chang // byin gyis rlabs kyis 'khor rnams pa// chos sku'i snying po skur bzhengs nas// rang byung snying po kun gyi gzhi// 'khor tshogs khyed la legs par bstan// de bzhin nyid la ming med de// 'khor ba'i sems can drangs pa'i phyir// chog
55b6(rnying rgyud): lam rkyen gyis mtshon te bstan// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog gi rgyud las/ phun sum tshogs pa zhus lan gyi le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// hU~M rje 'chang la 'di skad gsol// t+ye ston pa kun tu bzang // snying po'i
55b7(rnying rgyud): don 'di 'i lta bu// zhes zhus pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal la// nyon cig rdo dzin pa 'byor ma// snying po sprin bu bkun kyigazhi// rang byang du ma snying po'i rtsal// nga ni rang byung snying po yin// thams cadang las thang 'am // rdo bo rin chen pon pa
56a1(rnying rgyud): na byang nga canan// dug sang dun dran// rnam srasapa kyad rgyags dang bral// yul skang sangs pas rtogs pa nas// mau chags thal bas ga shes rgyas// rdzus 'gyur mang ma maH// rlung byung
56a2(rnying rgyud): da par 'byung // chos sul snying po thugs rje 'drung // D+yan gyis brlab kyir snang ba yin// nga nyid sbrul pa rdo rje sams// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dang // de ny-id sprul pa zlab pa drug/ 'grujug sems ca/ rnams la sdang // ma rig 'khrul pa
56a3(rnying rgyud): rigs drug nga// bdag shegs snying ze 'khor ba'i rgyu// dgro d+hag sems can snying pos khyab// da las 'byung ba ma shes 'khrul// sa chu mi rlung stod rten dang // nam mkhas zab pa'i rang klu dang // gling bzhi gling phran ring ba dang // snod brgyad snang ba gas
56a4(rnying rgyud): 'di nang // da ni snying po d+h+r-i kAN+Da la// 'khor 'das gnyis gang yo rgal// 'gag pa me dngas gnyis kAr// rigs lnga sangs rgyas yi sra// de yi yul ldang yi gdangs// ye shes rnam wa martogs// ldan ldang rang mthong bas sbyin// rigs rnam
56a5(rnying rgyud): ges// rna sa pa ma dpang dang // rigs su kyang // nga 'i byung bang // tshigs phrum rgya / tshigs rgyan dgazla na dang / na dang // dang rdzam tha gzang nga/
56a6(rnying rgyud): wA dag dbang po // don hU~M sha nas yan lagang // nga don gyi skyeng po Ta// gagatags kun gyi darigs dang skad// gzhin ma gyi dbyings// zhes gsungs so// rdo rjeyang / gzhing 'i chud las/ chos nyid 'byungs bstan pa'i latsu
56a7(rnying rgyud): denas rdo rje sems dpas lab// kyi kyi ston pa kun tu babang / da stod myeng po nga// 'khor 'das gyes pa nya ba// de la ngas 'di gang las byung // zhes pa labs/ rdo 'chang bas bka' stsal pa/
56b1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' mkha' 'gro khyod// sbyang po gnyis mad gzham las// rang byung dang rlung 'gags pa mad// snying po 'gag mad hA rlung rtsal// de nyid rang gdangs 'od du 'byung // snying po hUM gi rang byung yin// kha dog sna tshogs gzha' ltar gsal// 'gyu dran
56b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin chags rnam shes dengs// 'od mthong de rang rang 'byung rtogs// phar bltas pas ni tshur la gsal// ye shes snying po 'khrul rtsa chod// srog la mi 'khor tshig mi dgos// rang byung ye shes snying po grol// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags bag chags
56b3(rnying rgyud): med// dge ba ma bsags sangs rgyas ngas// chos min snying po chos kyi sku// srog snying la shan de dus phye// dang po'i sangs rgyas mu med pa// rang byung snying po kha dog las// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags lha mar snang // rang byad ma rtogs bag ma chags/
56b4(rnying rgyud): mam chags chags sdang med// dug rdza ma rgyas ye ma shes// sgyu ma stong pa rgya yis thebs// khyod nyid sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpar snang // rigs lnga sku lnga par ma dor// yang gzigs mar mthong so mtshams las// sgyu ma rang grol snying po rtogs//
56b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpar chos su yin// sbyi ma sku mar smad pas longs phra yin// lha ma 'gag med cing ya pon// sbrul su thub drug ts+yair yang nyon// rdo rje 'tshang bzla mdzes// thugs rjes dbang po zlog pa rim// blo dang sbyar te snying po son// zhes gas
56b6(rnying rgyud): so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ 'khor 'das 'khrul pa gyes pa las sku gsum sangs rgyas lugs kyi lo'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yang // kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang // sku gsum de ltar sangs rgyas na/
56b7(rnying rgyud): 'gro drug khams gsum sems can 'di// ci las 'khor ba ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig sems dpa' mkha' 'gro ma// snying po rang byung 'od du shar// snying po'i rang rgyal rang byung yin/ @
57a1(rnying rgyud): sa/ na nga / smra
57a2(rnying rgyud): rlung sa// phrin dang yanal gdabang gcings// dang pa 'dod pas thugapas pa byud // rig pa rgya sapasar// da las byas babyung // 'thun pa de chags rlob rdzogs// rang gi pa bya ban pa//
57a3(rnying rgyud): mabyong sa dran pong dag TIg las// bdag shegs skye po khor ba'i rgya// lus dang sems gnyis teg tu myong // dgraganyen gnyis ci lus pa spyod// snying por d+ha ma togs papa// blo brlang gnyis su tsun pa bcas// tid byung ba rjod de//
57a4(rnying rgyud): goms rtog ngo shes 'dris gnad gtsun// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ sems can 'khrul tshul gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpas yang / kye ston po rdo rje 'chang // srog snying ga
57a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i// mu rig 'gro ba nyonar mongs// snying po'i don la ji ltar sbyar// 'gro ba'i gnas nas gang du bskal// zhes gsol pas/ rdo rje 'chang bas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// mA rig meg 'byed gdams pa'i sa// rnga ba
57a6(rnying rgyud): nang gi mar me bzhin// snying po rang byung rang rig 'di// yul med yul du 'dod pas rdza lta bu// snying po rang chas mar me 'dra// dang la yod de rang gis bsgrib// gzugs phung shig dang rang byung mthong // yul snang gzir dang rang grung 'char// 'gyu dran gtims
57a7(rnying rgyud): dang rang byung mthong // 'dzin chags spongs dang rang byung shes// 'gyu dran ma bu'i gdams ngag ni// 'gu ba ha rtsal rang byung rlung // kyus kyi 'grus pas ha rtsal zin// 'gyu ba'i rtal dran pa'i srab// glang chen lcags kyis bsgyur ba 'dra// nanod srab kyis btu
57b1(rnying rgyud): ba yin// 'gyu ba dran pas btul ba yin// dran pa sangs pa'i ye shes ni// 'gru ba'i rtsal gyis dran pa grol// yul snang sangs pa'i rang byung nyams// dran pas zin pa'i ting 'dzin tams// chu yis chu da rgya ma'i slong // nyams las 'das pa'i ye shes yin//
57b2(rnying rgyud): 'gyu dran sa ngas na nyams las 'das// 'dzin pa gang na gang la gtad// gcig la las su rung bar gyis// chags pasangs pa'i ngang nyams yin// yul rten bral ba'i rang byung nyams// dran pas 'gyu ba grol te rtse chod nyams// 'don pa chags pas blta
57b3(rnying rgyud): rtse tshod nyams// blag nad dran pa che skye ma yi nyams// ma gnad 'dzin pa'i gnad de rang byung nyams// rlung gnad 'gyu ba dran pas so// dran gnad 'dzin pa chags pa gang yang med// ri drags khyis ded thar sa med// tA la mgo bcad bye ba med// tsas
57b4(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ 'khrul pa rtsad bcad kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpas yang // ston pa nyid la 'di skad zhus// kyai kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang // snying por sgrung pa'i rnal 'byor pas//
57b5(rnying rgyud): bsnyen bsrub phrin las dam tshig dang // mchod pa byin rlabs gsang sngags gang // lha spyod dbang dang ting nge 'dzin// bsgrub pa khyad par grub mtha' rnams// 'khor tshogs nyid la gsung bar zhu// zhes gsol pas// rdo rje 'chang gis bka'
57b6(rnying rgyud): stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rdo rje drag mo mkha' 'grong tshogs// de la gdung bzhi phrin las bzhi// sngags kyi yan lag dam tshig gsum// mchod pa'i bye brag bsgrub pa ste// khyad par grub mdza'i snying po bstan// zhes gsungs so//
57b7(rnying rgyud): yang bka' stsal pa/ rjes 'jug phrin las gzhung bsrangs te// dbang po gcig pa'i gzhung 'jug na// du zod thag shi'i khrod dam// grog po lung stod nags kyi gseb// dben gnas yid dang 'thad par// lha 'dro ga dug pa mi med der// bla ma yi pa
58a1(rnying rgyud): miHla dang / ma s+t+raing maN+Dal lags bshams pa// drugaka gas byams dkar gtar btang // bdan pa pa dang zhing dam chog dngag/ wang dang bklags shing cirigs brjod// thagadrug mtshams pad rtsinang bad
58a2(rnying rgyud): bla ma me pa skyabs gsol bas// ci 'byor ma rgyad byin gyis brlab// gtor tshogs dza gdang kya dgod// tha mchod rdzas ci 'byor dgram// de nas rnal 'byor can de yis// skra gsung thugs kyi mtshams gtad bya// lha dang bla ma ma
58a3(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal// byin dab rtags pa dbadum bca bya// phyi bshags nang bshags gas bshags bya// dpa' bos mchod rdzas byin gyis brlabs// de nas ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom// spyan zangs phyag 'tshal bzhugs su gsol// mchod
58a4(rnying rgyud): dbul spyan gtor rak+ta dang // longs spyod tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor// tshul dang mthun phyir dngos grub blang // mchod bsham sbyor sgrol phrin las bya// 'jig rten mchod cing gtor ma gtong // dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing rnal 'byor bya// zhes gsungs
58a5(rnying rgyud): so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ phrin las gzhung gi le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpas yang // rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad gsol// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang // rmongs pa gsar bu grol phyir bya// gzhung ltar bsgrub pa'i khyad par
58a6(rnying rgyud): gsung // zhes gsol pas/ blon cig rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// dpa' bo gcig pa'i rnal 'byor des// snying po rang byung gsal byas te// sems dpa' rnam gsum sku yi mtshams// rang byung snying po thugs kyi mtshams// hU~M zhes brjod pa gsung gi mtshams//
58a7(rnying rgyud): gzhi mi hUM las spro zhing bsdu// 'di skad tshig gis gsal de gdab// hUM steng yang bruM gi rang bzhin pa// 'og kyang hU~M gi rang bzhin 'ong // phyogs mtshams hUM ges rab tu gang // rdo rje khro bo 'jigs pas gtams// mtshan cha sna tshogs gshog pa can//
58b1(rnying rgyud): mtshams las ma 'da' zhig// d+hU snang yang thug rang bzhin la// 'og kyang ga rang ba zhan dza// rgyags na byams gas gtams pa la// thams cad yig 'jusngags kyis// gsung ga mtshams las ma'ada' zhig/ blo skragasum shing bar chung /
58b2(rnying rgyud): hUM// rnam par rtog pa rang d+hI// de rang hU~M du thams cad gcig/ mi rtog snying po'i mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ hUM snying po rang 'byung bla ma lha// rang byung snying po'i sgo phyes shig/ skye mos shing dngas pa'i dam chog gis// gnyis su med par
58b3(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// hUM lta ba hU~M du ma rdzogs shing // yengs pas snying po sgom yun thung // brtson 'grus bsgrub pa'i gzhung mtshugs// ma rig rang ma rtogs pa bshags// de nas gtor mdza gang khrag/ 'byor pa'i tshogs dang mchod rdzas rnams/
58b4(rnying rgyud): hUM brjod 'od zhu spro bsdu yis// phyi nang gsum du byin gyis brlabs// rig 'dzin la sogs byin dbab dang // yi dam mkha' 'gro byin dbab bya// rnal 'byor brtag tshe khrag tshil byug/ dam bcas bla ma lha dang bdag/ 'gro don byed par sems
58b5(rnying rgyud): pa bskyed// dam bsre sems bskyed sdom pa gzung // zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ sngon 'gro mtshams kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// gzhung spyod
58b6(rnying rgyud): dam gtsang skyes bu des// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang // rgyu yi ting 'dzin bsgom par bya// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba des// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang // rgya yi tid 'dzin rnam gsum sbyar// sems dpa' rnam gsum gsal phyir ro// zad sar
58b7(rnying rgyud): bskyal ba gdams ngag yin// de don gsal gdab 'di skad brjod// hUM ma nor ma bcos snying po nyid// rgya rkyen skye med stong pa hUM// hUM yongs la khyab pas dbri bkol med// 'dod pa'i longs spyod nam mkha' hUM// hUM rang byung snying po'i grong yangs
59a1(rnying rgyud): sa bya // du ga sa // ga sa gapa ga/
59a2(rnying rgyud): 'phru cin// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan pas// gang snang dzin pas y-idamaH// nas kyi po'i nga khang // rna na rigs/ sa pa 'ing dzar// 'gro ba don la gshegs su c-i
59a3(rnying rgyud): chos sgra rang b+h+yo g+ha// rdo rje 'chang dang drin chen dad// rdo rje mkha' 'bo kAr+Na ma gro dang // d+ha ga 'tshal lha la slebs su mchi// hU~M sems hU~M nang ng+ge'i steng/ rdo rje de bzhin don chen pad// gas kyi yu mya dang bcad// gnyis su
59a4(rnying rgyud): bzla ska sngags pa// dang byung gnod nas dag pa ste// brgyad po nyid kyi smad// rje byung ba dang / 'kha tshul pa'i tshogs pa 'phrul// rmugs rnaMs zer dgongs dab dang dngos pa tshul/ mamr-i
59a5(rnying rgyud): rkyen gas gsu tshogs bas/ kyi lag dpa doH// dan pa dadapa po// gzugs slar sogs mtshong par brnyes// smanang gi mthong badzin pa'i// dbang po ni shos rnam shes yul
59a6(rnying rgyud): thugs dam skyong gyon rin po che// mthong snang dag par bzhis su gsal// hUM gsang ba mchod par na \u0f7f// gyes dang dru dang 'dzin dang chags// srog dang snyir po spyong sgrol 'di// snying po ste dgag med par bzhes/
59a7(rnying rgyud): dag rten gtor mo'i sdod// brgyad kyi sems can bcung dang khrag/ 'ji 'dag tar mthogs su 'bral// 'dud kyi 'ding yon mchid pa bzhes/ sa kyi 'jig rten gtor ma dzod// shaM khrag rdzas tshal kunang // dbugs
59b1(rnying rgyud): naspyan tshugs// dra ba yan lag mdzad pabanas// phyogasang ba dbang ba rgyal jug rjod// rnam gas dbang po 'gyu na 'dzin// chags pa gtad ma ng+ga// jug/ dadud cu rdzogs chen mchod pa bzhes// rdza grar pa Sh+Tha taN haM/ zla badra ba
59b2(rnying rgyud): da nas ga
59b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i hUM// dbyar med rdo rje'i skal phyag 'tshal ba stod// hU~M rang byung skye med drang po'i gsung // thams cad gsung du sgrogs mdzad d+ha// snying po rgya sngags pado rgyud mchog/ kun kyang gdams par sgrogs la brjod// hU~M tag gcig zung thal
59b4(rnying rgyud): chos las 'das// gcig tu mi rtog du mamed// 'gyu dran med par 'don zags med// gnyis med rdo rjong rdugs la bstod// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ gzung mchod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas
59b5(rnying rgyud): yang dag pashad bye // ce mkha' 'grom// dr-i ni rjes drug slong ma lnga// gas sngags hU~M ga dbang bsgyur \u0f7f// hUM gsung rdzogs kyi dbang nga ni// gton mazhwa zas tshogs dang chung // nA ma na rgya yi dbang // rdzas dang na mdzags
59b6(rnying rgyud): shi dbang // skye sgo ma hU~M padze dbang ban // rdo rgyal po rjes 'jug gyis// zhus gnang dpa'i min gdams pa bstan// dang po nga la 'jug can// dkyil 'khor dbang rdzas badz+ra// yon dadul dbang bapur ba dmas parba/
59b7(rnying rgyud): dedon nu ba 'di skad gsol// sru de chen snying po'i pho brang du// thugs rjes gnad 'tshal bstan par zhu// bdag lha nyon mongs snying rdol// ma rig mig 'byed gsal bar zhu// sngon gyi mig dakhan rgyal po las// ma rig ling tog ngas 'a khor zhu// 'dug khri
60a1(rnying rgyud): gdams pa chos bskrun d+ha// sbas pa'i man dag bstan pa \u0f88\u0f90// d+hi la ldan rigs kyi bu khyod kyis// tha la rdo rje'i bka'adrin gyis// gas dnga'i ma'i dkyil 'khor sgom// hU~M rang byung snying po'i das pang bang raM// ga shA
60a2(rnying rgyud): pas ni thams cad mthong // rig pa'i me tog 'di do la// mig 'di dbye bis legs par rnam// hU~M badz+ra pA wi shU ra phaT+Ta/ thugs kyi maN+Dal po phreng ngo // de nas rigs d+d+hi bu de la// rdo rje rgyal po'i dbang bsgyur bya// theg tir ma ye shes phyag rgyache// gams
60a3(rnying rgyud): dbyin brlabs nas// skal ldan myod la dbang btung byas// snying po dan rtogs par shog/ chub po rlon ma wa~M rdod+ha/ dz+nyAs la ldan rigs kyi bu khyod la// dza gad a mr-i ta'i dbang bskur bas// 'gro ba'i na sa la ye shes lnga// 'job byangs su 'dra bar ga/
60a4(rnying rgyud): oM mr-i ta a hai/ b+ha mi dz+riM/ ske la ldan rigs kyi buM rdzong la// dmar chen raHsa dbang bsrung bas// thugs rje chags pa nga grol nas// shes rab rang byung me bar te// mkha' 'gro dbang du 'du bar shog/ k+Sha sa rmA bi li hrI/ hUMskal ldan rigs kyi bu khyod la// dang tha tsha/
60a5(rnying rgyud): gyi dbang bskur bas// thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa le// bza' ba tu longs spyod tshogs rje zhong// hUM bran a hrISh+Ti d+ha mi/ rjeskal ldan rigs kyi bu khyod la// zhun mar snang bas dbang bsrur bas// rang gsal snying po rang dag ston// ye shes rang 'byung rang snang shog/ s+yai sA po kA
60a6(rnying rgyud): d+heny+tsa me/ hUM skal ldan rigs kyi bu khyod la// snying po mi 'gyur tshe yi dbang bskur bas// bar tshad rgyan med tsho dang dbang zang rgyas// rdo rje hUM gi tsho dbang thob par shog/ badz+ra A yu wes b+hi Shi n+t+ra ma/ g+hu dz+wa a b+hi Shi Sh+Ta moM/ swai Tad+d+ha a g+niHny+tsa me/ swai ra/ d+hA ya b+hi Shid+d+ha mi/ hU~Mngatra
60a7(rnying rgyud): kr-is ma/ smyi na ma/ don sgogasung zugs kyi dbang // rig pa 'dzin la dbang bad+mad gyis// byas rgyas byung 'phrul gyi ste// bden pa dang byung chug lpags// ting 'dzin snang bar nga byung // phyimang drugasu zugs sre dog/ mi ma ngas ma
60b1(rnying rgyud): mi/ b+h+yom thang bral ma yangs spyan du spyod// mi bkyigs mtshol ri dgas med// rdo rje 'chang ba batshas nyid ni// sbrul ldan khyod kyis rtogs par shog/ b+ha ma ma \u0f7f/ NI/ sdig rtogs pa rang gi dbang // rang chas snying po sdig sgrib gal// srog rting yul ming gnyis
60b2(rnying rgyud): las grol// chos min snying po rtogs par shog/ ni NIkrA a b+hi ts+yai mi/ hUM chos rnams thams cad gezhi bo'i hUM// brda rtags bstan pas de nyid reg/ rang byung 'bru drin lam du spongs// 'dzin chags rang grol 'bras bu // des na 'chad pa'i dbang bskur bya/
60b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'chang da rigs kyi bu// snying po 'gro ba yongs la khyab// de nyid rang byung hUM du gnas// de nyid khyod kyis tshig rgyud ston// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ dbang bskur gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya
60b4(rnying rgyud): ba// nyon cig sems dpa' mkha' 'gro ma// srinA las bcol ba'i rim pa ni// dpa' bo gcig pa'i tshal ga ste// hU~M rdo rje 'chang ba nga yi sku// rdo rje zhe khrong las byung // lha mo mdzes ma sna tshogs dang // gtum chen mtshon thogs nga nyid dz+haiM// hUM las
60b5(rnying rgyud): gyur pa bde chen d+h+waM// rbad puT+Tad+har+g+haM dang g+ho li dzaH/ ru lu kI la ya ya nga // snying po thams cad nga yi sngags// N+yai zhi 'gyur tshe dang dbang zad rgyas// dbang srung thams cad rlag par byed// srog snying gzir ba dgra dang bgegs// ming med srog dang bral
60b6(rnying rgyud): bar mdzod// hU~M r-I las me chung mo chen lnga// dug lnga 'dri lnga'i phung po bsreg/ sna tshogs dmigs te 'od kyis bsreg/ rang byung me ni nga rang hUM// hUM khaM la~Ms chu byang rgya mtsho'i klong // klung chen krung phranas bdag gnyen// nyon mongs snang min sgrib pa 'khru/
60b7(rnying rgyud): rang byung chu rdul da ring hU~M// hUM me las chung byung dang po'i chud// sub rlung chen sprob su rung // snang med ra shung dngos med du// dUr rab chen po dpa' rje// dab brtan rdo rjes gram gsar// lugs ri ma thang lha yi 'og/ tho ba chen po 'khor brtsa waM// tha~Mng rje ba /
61a1(rnying rgyud): gas // khrag d+hA dag su rdzun pa dadapal// skar ma dang gang baH// ngan sag tu mal ba 'dzad// phud dang ga na // rtsol ba 'a rdzogs sogs nas 'byor sa//
61a2(rnying rgyud): zugang dang geng phran tshogs// dbang phyug te shra bran mo badz+rad// ma bdun med pa de'o rnams// 'bang mi brtan ma mtha' sgong b+ha// hUM bka' ye gtor ma 'di pa zhes la// gul tI ga ta me ma b+hAngs na// sngon gyi dam bcang 'gal la re// bam
61a3(rnying rgyud): chad pabyung ba re// de bas gtor ma 'di yongs la// dam rtog skyengs shig 'gal byed sgrol// de nas dngos gru bablang dang gto 'o// rkad deng gtid ma gta' rla bzung ba'o// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtog / snying po'i chungad lus/ sprin las yongs su mdzan pa'i ye
61a4(rnying rgyud): brgya do// / de nas yang dag pashad bya ba// nyon cig badz+ra mkha' 'gros// 'dze ba 'di ma yengs snying po bak+ka// dz+haiM moMSh+Ti badz+ra trA~M/ oM hU~M hrI hrI hrIhU~M/ oM ba~Mdz+dza hrI na/ skAr d+ha hU~M hU~MhUM/ pA ka sa hU~M Sh+T+r-i nAM/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badz+ra toka ni ti tid hrI/ hU~M dz+haiM b+h+rU~Mr/ tu kan kyi te rten
61a5(rnying rgyud): hUM hU~M hUM bad+mA ta ki ni mr-i te ti te na hUM/ druM k+Shu~M hU~M ka rma ta ka ni hU~M te te te nar+g+haM/ mAM hU~M Sh+T+r-iHt+ta d+ha kin m+b+hi ti te te na hUM/ skabs su pho mo'i snying po bzlas/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ oM AHts+tsha trAM/ gcig dang gsum dang lnga yi sngags// ngas med kun du bzlas pa yin// gces pa'i gsang sngags
61a6(rnying rgyud): snying po'o// sngags kyi grong khyer spel ba ni// dpa' bo rang byung 'di ltar gdogs// hU~M dang ri rab can du sbrel// phaTaHdang rlung sprad can du spel// rbad dang gri gug can du sbrel// yaM dang mtshon cha can du sbrel// b+h+yo dang g.ya ba dang can du ste la// ngoH dang lcags kyu can du sbrel//
61a7(rnying rgyud): ri ro chen po'i mgul la ma rtser// mnan dang spel te rgya gram mo// gdug pa tsher ma 'o ma can// rno dpal ngi dang spel ba'o// hung da/ rdo lcags khrag thun dang // mA ra ya b+h+yo thun spel ba ni/ las kha rdzogs pa'i rtsi skor ro// kA ya wA kra dang tsit+ta hUM// dngos grub dbang dang A li sbrel/
61b1(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ sngags dang ma'i laT ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig sems dpa' mkha' 'gro ma// dbang bcad stong 'ardzogs par gyis// rang thung snyed pa brgya/
61b2(rnying rgyud): 'di ni l+r-in las yongs kyi drung // rtsab dang bu rin chen no// gru dran 'don chags las kyi mtha'// rdo rje yang tog las kyi khrig// lang/ len dmar dbyang yang zhog rgyud// kun dang 'brel pa snying po'i rgyud// rtsi bathabs kyi rgyud du zung // 'di des drug tu lag
61b3(rnying rgyud): gtad// des kyang snying dang mig tu gyis// sbas pa'i snying po gsang dbang 'di// dam tshig gakhung bsrang yul khams dgra// bdag gis mnyes pha ma gsum grangs// bstan pa 'jig na las 'di bya// snying po 'phrul gyi sku bsgom la// ngag kyang ma bstad hU~M drag
61b4(rnying rgyud): bgrang // yid kyang mi bsdad po bskam// yul khams gsal bar byas la dbang / mdze bod sha thag rje sa tshogs// bang pargyu / m+ba wi nA ga/ gu ku la rabs ca kri pa'i khrag/ hrIn+da gtsa pa ni pral sa ha/ spr-i n+ta gaM tsa pA nIn hrul mo mgrom/ hU~MnA~M ga tsa 'i
61b5(rnying rgyud): hrul chu dril grom mo bslab/ yul khams phung bar the tshom med// khrag brgyad basbyin la bzhi ru bsgrub// zhag gsum lhas sbyor dbab pa'i las// gtor ma 'ongs dkyil nu bstsal// khrag dang ljang da/ 'od mtha' bskor// bong nga sa mi / la gyis/
61b6(rnying rgyud): ske mer srang srung ma mnol// thad pa brdab la khrag krung gtor// ri rtser blon la gos brda ba rtsod pa bsgril// rgyu 'drug ldog par shes par gyis// lha sbyin kun la gtor mdzod// 'dis ni thams cad cham la phebs// zhes gsungs so// de nas tsu
61b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i las byan// dpa' ba gcig pa'i sde gas pa te// dzarje chang ga med dam// sa tha~M na kyi gyi po// gang dmigs yul phyogs nar ba bya// da thabs gtams pas ma la// yul spel sogs phyogs bcug//
62a1(rnying rgyud): gzhan kya bsas / / 8// sagasungs gnam/

62b3(rnying rgyud): ma pa 'di do// spangasas 'das pa'i sangs ngas kyang / brtogs nas sangs rgyas pa// 'bras dugrol ba bden du// bdag kyi rnying pa ga par ngamaben// rjes dus bas nas rjes su sgrub/ 'das para'i rgyal bas kyi dkyis rlobs/ tsun

62b6(rnying rgyud): sa/ sa pa 'i'i spyod sdom pa'i ni skye myu / nas paku ma / rnam sa mi byu nga/ na mthog cides 'di // shA du 'di chags bdu byas
62b7(rnying rgyud): 'di pa byu // don pa nyi 'dzi na phyog dang // gtsun thapas sras / gas gces// gatshul bcwan pa zabs ches/ nga rgyal pa ba zhig tshas// yul bang gnyis dang bral khrigaces// ga cigs sa
63a1(rnying rgyud): bA yin// mthong bas kun gyi rtsa brjod// tshogs chung man dag bstan pa gces// 'phrang du chug pag cig la bslus// gzhi nyid gang po rtogs 'dres kyis// gdeng dang ldan par ma gyur na// gal ba'is dang ldan pa
63a2(rnying rgyud): rdzog pa'i dus dang sreb ba'i nid// srog sbyong man ga med pa ni// dpag po mad pa'i dmig sa rang // thugs kyi mig ma bya// de mig mi med pa mig yon dang// skyon gyi mig ming ba'i// nam thaMd med pa'i dmag mi /
63a3(rnying rgyud): gnad dang srog gi gnang // gcig ni srog la gnyis ni meng // gsum ni grogs la bzhin rgyan// mgon tshod la gzug la thogs// rked pa rjod po srid spyad khyer// khrog tu chang la khong du dbugs// des gsungs so// rdo rje yang shig snying po rgyud las/ nyams
63a4(rnying rgyud): thang srog snying gi le 'u skye bcu gzhi ba'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rdo rje ma kha' 'gro drag mo yis// rdo rje 'tsha la 'di ska gsal// kye kyai ston pa rdo rje 'chang // 'bras bu mangs rgyas grub mtha' zhing // rgyu kyi po mcho dang ltang
63a5(rnying rgyud): lags// tham su le lag tu gtad// ces gsol bas/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig sems dpa' mkha' 'gro ma// 'bras bugs dang ni nyid suM// snying po nga grol cos kyi ste// sral sdang sangs pa'i ming ba yin// sangs rgyams
63a6(rnying rgyud): nanas 'di ltar mthun// rtswa dang rgya 'dris pa'am// ma 'dres mtsho yi gza' skar 'dra// nam mkha'i mtha' bzhin tshad las 'das// Thakra je 'byung ba ni ma 'dra// rang rang yul mthun thabs kyis 'dren// snying po dang zas kun la yod// ye shes
63a7(rnying rgyud): gang+yams pa cur gyis gtod// ngo bo'i dru dang bka' rgyud dang // dan gyi rgyud dang gsum du yod// ras nges chog dbyeb da'i// 'di na ga dmam pa mig yon d+ha // dper nan dzadzin chen 'dra// snying po thams cad 'byung ba med// dper na za 'og pa/
63b1(rnying rgyud): khyem 'dra// snying po ma 'dres yongs su gsal// mu tig car la brgyas pa 'dra// go rim 'brel brgyud nagasal/ dper na nyi ma mun pa 'dra// thams cad 'gal byed ma rig sel// snying po gsang ba mngon du ston// sbas pa mig 'byed rgyud du zung //
63b2(rnying rgyud): chos nyid snying po bla med rdzong // 'gyu dran 'dzin chags hUM gi 'phrang // bla med rjod 'phrang rgyud du zung // kun gyi lag len gsal bar ston// snying po gsal byed rgyud du zung // gces pa'i man ngag mdzub khrid ston// gces pa dmar khrid rgyud du
63b3(rnying rgyud): zung // rtse mo rtse mo 'og men gsungs// rdo rje yang tog rgyud du zung // 'bras bu rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas kyis// sbrul sku rim par brgyud tshul la// rgyal blon rig pa can dang spyod// de nas brag dang chu gzhung gi/
63b4(rnying rgyud): tsho gajigasod dag// dus kyi tha ma sngags 'tshal tshe// bstan pa 'dzin par the tshom med// zhes gsungs so// ston pa nyid mya ngan las 'das so// do nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang / mkha' nga'agro ma kun gyis mngon par bsdus nas/ sprul pa'i sku pad+ma
63b5(rnying rgyud): 'byung gnas nyid la gtad de/ sprul pa'i lham srin sde brgyad rnams/ rjes su yi rang ste mngon par bstod do// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // rdzogs so// / gser la mtho sems
63b6(rnying rgyud): mi bdog ste// zong med lag tu gser mi 'khor// chos la mtho sems mi bdog ste// snod med lag tu chos mi 'khor// don gyi snying po gsung rgyud 'di// snying gi bur gtad gcig rgyud re// log gi snying bton snying po rdo rje'i rgyud// yang rtse yang
63b7(rnying rgyud): tog gdams pa'i ma bu rnams// snying gi snying bton snying po hUM gi bskor// skal ldan skyong la med pa'i bu li gtod// kun gyi gzhim byed de nam mkha' khab mig 'dra// sa ni gser gyi gzhi ma byang ste rdo dang gseg mas bsgrib// mig gis thams
64a1(rnying rgyud): na da blta ste dang ma mthang bas yang gang banyid dang rtag tu 'phrogs te thab la 'asmras la// es dgas dang bskus dang / ri// na tu kun pa'i rin tunags tu byang // nga bud ca nga ba mthag dmas
64a2(rnying rgyud): rnams// sbyin par snod med sgo srung sgrib pa'i rten laka nga// zhes pa 'byung gnas kyir// nas la ba'i ti pA la gdams nus/ myo bagling phran du gshegs do// na rgya bar skad du/
64a3(rnying rgyud): ye badz+ra ra tA sarba ka ka tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje 'chang ched po ches sku ye shes nyag gcig la phyag 'tshal lo// chos sku rdo rje 'chang pa de// snying po rang byung nyag gcig gnas// snga phyi med pa
64a4(rnying rgyud): snying po'i dus// rang byung rang shar rang snang 'khor// gcig po kun snang gnyis med chos// ye med nyag gcig rdo rje'i sku// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi nyi ma bzhin// 'og min rigs brgyad nyag gcig sdang // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' sogs// mkha'
64a5(rnying rgyud): grordo dag mo yis// rdorje 'byung sa bskong bya 'tshal// ldi 'jug ste zal mo snang// rdo rje dra pang srid gsol// sto brdo rje la // snying po zag partag ga cig tu / rigs ga gzung 'dzin du ma pabral// gas che nges pa /
64a6(rnying rgyud): su gsol// 'og min rdo rje 'khor 'dus la// thams cad gcig pa'i rdo rje rgyud// gcig las du ma med par gsungs// zhes gsol pa dang / rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// dog min dbyings su 'dus pa yi// rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro khyod// rjes
64a7(rnying rgyud): 'dreg don du zhus pa legs// snying po nyag gcig rin poH// thams cadag cig pang yis bstan// chos can thams cad chos nyid gcig/ dbang dang de mchog dkyil 'khor gcig/ phrin las mchod pa rnal 'byor gcig/ sngags dang phyag rgya ba snyen bsgrub
64b1(rnying rgyud): gcid // rgyud dang lung dang man ngag gcig/ lta ba sgom pa stod pa gcig/ 'bras bu sku gsung thugs kyang gcig/ dge btsun ma grangs du ma gcig/ ces gsungs so// snying po rin po rdza thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ phun sum tshogs pa zhus pa dang /
64b2(rnying rgyud): kyi ma dang po'o// / nas rdo rje rjeg ma mos// rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad gsol// skyon pa // de ltar snying ba'i ga cig kyang // bdag 'og med dkyi 'khor dang // kha~Mr detha~M rdzogs legs pa bang //
64b3(rnying rgyud): gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cika dkyil 'khor rang thung dang // mkha' 'gro 'dul ba'i 'khor tshogs khyed// chos can chos nyid ngo gcig phyir// don gyi snying po chos nyid gcig/ gcig po kun gyi rang bzhin yin// nor bu rin chen yon tan
64b4(rnying rgyud): 'dra// du ma gang snang gcig yin no// rnam grangs brgya stong phrag brgyas kyang // chos nyid snying po'i dbang po ni// gcig po rang sdang rang byung bas// gcig pa nyid kyang gang na 'du// yul med pas ni ming bral yin// 'byung ba me chus chung yang // nam mal
64b5(rnying rgyud): ngang du yenas gcig/ sangs rgyas sems can chos nyid ga.a// bde gshegs snying pos 'gro kun khyab// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med// gnyis med gnyis su med par smon// zhes gsungs so// snying po rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ chos
64b6(rnying rgyud): da rjes nyid gcig par bstan pa'i seM skye gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang dge bshad byug// yenas snying der ngadabyung bas// rang chas yod pas gzhim gcig/ rtogs pas rdo rje dachang ba'i dbang // skra ga su marib par rjod par byed//
64b7(rnying rgyud): dbang gi chu bo ldan thub gcig/ 'gro drug khams gsum thams cad pa// til la yar gyis khyab pa bzhin// bde gshegs sbreng po dbri kol med/ rang dung rang la bstan thobapas// ye nas ye shes rang dbang gcig/ dbul ma yenas gsar
65a1(rnying rgyud): stan can// rig brtan gyis bstan pas gas// nas rang dbang rang gis thong// s+yAd cig ma la longs spyong bdag/ dgra dag yanas snying pa bAzhi// b+h+ra ma gdams pas rang rgyas bstan// rang byung rang dbang yin sa zo/
65a2(rnying rgyud): gi rgyab po ye shes gcig/ snying por nga byung chos bzhi ldan// dbyas dran 'dzin chags dbang gi hU~M// snying po ye shes rang byung rtsal// hrI nang drang bcang gang b+ha ga// dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa tshad// 'dzin bcol ba'i rgyu thag gros// chags parang snang
65a3(rnying rgyud): shes shar// rig pa rtsal gyi dbang gcig po// dbang gi ngo bo lhun gyis grub// nges tshig 'khor 'das gnyis kar dbang // dbye ba rang rang dod gzhung la// dIb ni rgyal bu khyams pa 'dra// snang ba sna tshogs gcig gi dbang // badzod sra sna tsho ga chos
65a4(rnying rgyud): gcig dbang // dran rtog thams cad snying po gcig/ bum pa thams cad shes rab dbang // gsang drab tshig dbang rnam grangs rnams// rig pa rtsal gyi dbang du gcig/ ces gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ dbang
65a5(rnying rgyud): le'u ste gsum po'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dam tshig snying po bstan pa ni// ye shes rang bzhin snying po bzhi// gang snang ming du btags pas kyang // snying po dbyings las 'das mi srid// snying po hUM gi nga bzhin gcig/ gde
