66a3(rnying rgyud): ga dbyed des// babyen pa dag gi bte gci pa/ des gsu sagro// shing podzo rin pa thams cadagacig na // de nas yang dag pashad byang// nyon cigadornan la 'byor pa// sgrub pa skab chen gyi
66a4(rnying rgyud): gcig/ snying po don gyi gzhi ma la// gtan la phebs pa bsgrub pa yin no// brda' bstan snang bzebs pa yin// rtags bstan dang lus gtan la phebs// sra bstan thos pa gtan la phebs// de ltar snying po don du gcig/ rang byung ye shes bslab pa yin//
66a5(rnying rgyud): chos nyid rang byung khring po // brtarnams bstan pas snang btogs// rang byud dang sdang tshum med stong // rtags su bstan ngas gang thag rtogs// nam shes rgyas kyi bdag las grol// lnga ru bstan pas chog tshogs grol// thos pa'i grub mtha' ming med rtogs//
66a6(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa chen po zhes bya yin// rgol pa'i re dgas hU~M gis chod// snying po chos min da byung 'grub// bsgrub pa'i bsgrub pa chen pogacin// ces gsungs so// nying po ni ni rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ bstan pa bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun
66a7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro maM// dpa' ba gcig pa'i drin las che// dpa' bo gcig pas las kun byed// bya thams cad 'gru ba pa'i te// snying po las bzhi gcig gos byed// ni rgyas dbang dang drag
66b1(rnying rgyud): ngasas ma 'gags thabs rgyan// na ma gsus rgyadang na/ nangs gas na pa byud// zhumangasangag gas// dugasas nas rgyas pa byed// grang 'thu badra pas rnas
66b2(rnying rgyud): ra krung rig pa ra la byung // rang dbang thothabs thogs rgyags dang// drag pa mi da rjod bya ba thub// phrin las chen du snying po gcig/ las kun snang makrugs byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi stong pa'o// chos srung ngas med rtsol na phreM// rtags pas
66b3(rnying rgyud): bangs cad pa// zhi ba'i phris las snying po gcig/ snyid po 'odags pa 'angs spyod pa// min pa rgyas su la nus// sa pa srin las skyed po gcig/ rig pa dang rtsal sprul swA ste// mdzad pa'i las kun snying ba'i dbang // dbang gi phran las nyid
66b4(rnying rgyud): gcig/ snying po 'gag med thogs med // 'byung ba chung chen tshogs chags med// yid skang tsog dren sbyor sgrol byed// drag po'i phrin las dpa' bo gcig/ 'grus drin 'dzin chags ni rgyas dbang // drag po zang thal dpa' dog ceg// bya ba pa
66b5(rnying rgyud): zlab pa shes gcig/ zhes gsungs so/ rin pa 'i thams cad gcig pa'i zud las/ phrin l+r-i hA// de sa yang dgra bshad byug// nyon cig donanal 'byur ba// mchod pa stod pa gcig dun
66b6(rnying rgyud): 'dris shing dbyar med gnyis su myed// snying po 'gro bran sangs rgyas la// til la bar bzhin bye med// gzhig cig snying po'i mchod pa gcig/ gzhi gang rang gangs gnyis su med// 'khrul pa ltas kyi mchod pa gcig/ snying po rgyas ngan 'a
66b7(rnying rgyud): 'brel par bajug sa tshad pagacig/ m+bu mig par gyu// gsapa shig da pa dang / drug dung rdzags // sa nas da na ma// rnam medapa pa
67a1(rnying rgyud): tham kun ma myod pag // ba yangs sgyu sngags pa// me sa nga byung bang pa dang / rnan sa tu chun/ sa 'das sa can du nga tha ba nas// zas nanamanyad
67a2(rnying rgyud): snying por gcig/ da por 'das sun rdo bdon dam gcig/ 'di ni mchod nga chen pa gci// cis gsungs so// snyi rin pa che thams cad gtsug pa'i rgyud las/ mchod pa'i le'u ste dgu // / nga nas yang dag bshang byu ba/
67a3(rnying rgyud): nyin cig rdo rjerda la 'byor ma// rnala'i byor snying po'i dang 'jog cig/ tha med sbyi ba tshas min la// hr-id ngos na lam snying por 'byor// tha med nal 'khyod chos smrag kyi// snying po ma shes rna la ma la// rang byung longs sun la 'byor gcig/ 'gyubs
67a4(rnying rgyud): mad nal mar 'byor// 'gag med sprul smarnal 'byor gcig/ snang ze mig tshogs rnal mar 'byor// srog dang snying po'i rnam 'byor gcig/ hUM las gnyis med 'bras bu gcig/ skyeng po'i don la 'byor na 'byung // chos man chos kun rnal mar 'byor//
67a5(rnying rgyud): snying po rje grin la 'byor yin// gcig ni kun gyi dang btsun te// dUm de byung gdams dag yin// bub ro gcig martogs na// rnal ma'i don la 'byor mi srid// ming gnas 'byor grangs med do// don gyi rna la 'byor shin tu dka'// chas men skyong du mam can
67a6(rnying rgyud): spyo// don ma klong du kun rdzob stor// gcig med klong du du mgyur// ming med spyod du rdzog/ tshogs spyor// su mo krong du snang gzugs spong// rgyu med rkyen byed mye byon pa// 'khor 'das gnyis med ye shes 'byor// snying po rang byung rnal 'byor gcig
67a7(rnying rgyud): chos gsu so// snying ba rje rje chen po tha thams cad ga cig pa rgyad lam/ nal 'byer kyi 'i chu dud // / de nas yang dag pashad byig// rten cishi rjen la 'gyung ro// stong ba chus min sngags gcigs// mdzan du gyur pas sngags 'onas
67b1(rnying rgyud): sbyong bar dmas dang 'thung gsang// thugs pa 'dun gsang bsan// gsung sngags gas sung 'chad pa/ b+hab pa kun kyab rten ci de meng // 'dus dang tsun du ltar dang // drun 'phrul pa dgas gnags// shA sngag nas su ca ga// mang dra/
67b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'das ma nga// dngar nag sa deng gzugs brnyan 'ang// bder gshegs snying pos 'phrog sa d+haH// gzungs sngags zhes smang yi bshad// steng ba da kyi sngags cig min// gsang sngags ded gu rtan// shes rab snying rje ga nyis /
67b3(rnying rgyud): reg sngags dag gi ngo bo ni// shes rab ye shes gnyis su med// gzung sngags dag gi ngo bo ni// shes rab ting 'dzin gnyis su med// snying po don du sngags gsum gcig/ shes skyob phyer ngan sngags zhes bya// snying po rang byung sngags las ni// gzhi nas
67b4(rnying rgyud): chags sel ba dang // ma rig rtog pa sel ba dang // 'phral byeng nyon mongs sel bar gcig/ rang byung chen po sngags gcig ye nAM// zhes gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rinapo che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyang las/ snying po don gyi sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste/
67b5(rnying rgyud): bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje drag mo khyod// snying po rin chen phyag rgya ni// snying po dus gsum 'gyur ba med// phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo gcig/ snying po 'chos pas 'das pa med// phyag rgya chen po
67b6(rnying rgyud): des tshig gcig/ phyag rgya bzhi dang rtsa la hU~M// chos dang bral ba'i snying po sgra// chos sku phyag chen po gcig/ rang byung rang gdangs ye shes lnga// dam tshig longs sku'i phyag rgya gcig/ rang byung rang sbrul 'gags pa med// sprul sku chos kyi phyag
67b7(rnying rgyud): rgya gcig/ snying po rang byang rang 'gyu sdang // sna tshogs las kun de mas byed// mngag shel 'khor 'das las// snying po las kyi phyag rgya gcig/ snying po phyag rgya kun gyi gzhi// nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston// snying po'i dpe na
68a1(rnying rgyud): mkha' bzhin// phrag d+ha'i dpe'i thal ba dasha'// rgyas btab de las 'da' mi spyod// gsang sngags snying po ya shapa yin// des na 'gag med shes pa shes rab yin// snang ba chas min 'gyur med kyang // zag
68a2(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya 'gag med gcig/ 'bru brlung gi ye shes na// mjig nyon mongs chags sngad phyug/ chos min rgya las ma 'das so// 'bru brnyang gi gti mug na// rang rig ye shes dang grol phyag/ snying po chos can mtha' mas/
68a3(rnying rgyud): de 'ams can chos nyid gce/ gcig la las su rung bar gyi// zhes gsungs so// skyong ba rdo rje rin po thams cad gcig pa'i d+hadums/ ste bcu gnyis pa // / de nas ya dag bshad N+ya gA/
68a4(rnying rgyud): nyon cig rdo rje drag mo khyod// snying po don gyi gsang rgyud ni// don gyi rgyud dang tshig gi rgyud// snying po rang byung klong na gcig/ sangs rgyas kun gyi snyid po che// pad bdugashegs pa'i thugs kyang des// khams gsum snying po 'gro drug khyab// ngon
68a5(rnying rgyud): rgyad chen khyad par med// snying po rang byung gsung tshig bzhi// rdo rje hUM ste hUM zhes sgrogs// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin// sems can kun gyi skad du hUM// tshig rgyud snying po khyad par med// sangs rgyas sems can 'brel pa d+haM// haM gi klong
68a6(rnying rgyud): chos kun rdzogs// rdzogs pa'i slong du kun ka dzang // snying po'i glid du chos kun 'thungs// rang byung hU~M phun sung tshogs// wA sgom spyod pa dbang la migs// snying po rgyud kyi ljang tshad gcig/ chos su longs sku sA la sgur bzung /
68a7(rnying rgyud): rje'achang gsum brgyad ma chad// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med// gnyis med gnyis su med par ston// 'khor 'das gnyis po chud mchad// rgyud chen snying po kun gzhir gcig/ ces gsungs so// nga po rdorjerin po che thams cad
68b1(rnying rgyud): na du mu dudu na/ chu na na tu na/
68b2(rnying rgyud): nan snang/ ga ga su
68b3(rnying rgyud): rgya
69a1(rnying rgyud): byung ba// chos can chos nyo 'khor 'das dang // phye pa nang pa theg par sgo// snying po gzhi las gyes mdog cig/ cho ga don snying po'i byin rlabs na// dzarje 'jung gsum ba shad lugs la// mtshan byed tshig gi snying du
69a2(rnying rgyud): bstan// rang byung snying po gdams ngag gcig/ yi ge don gyi snying po bstan// rang rang theg pa la shan dbye// snying po 'di ru chos nyid gcig/ rtsa ba snying po rang byung gcig/ dgos ched snying po spyi gzhi 'di// 'gro drug theg pa kha 'thor nas// 'byung //
69a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i don du rang byung hUM// 'khrul pa bzlog pa snying po gcig/ don gyi chos nyid spyi gzhi 'di// khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa// nyag gcig snying po bstan pa yin// rdo rje 'chang ba'i gsung gi mdzod// tshig gi don gyis don la sbyar// zhal nas gsung
69a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud lung kun// ma nor khrigs su don la btab// gsal 'debs yi ge'i ris su bkod// tshig don gsal bar byed pa yin// tshogs chung don che snying po 'di// gang dang ci yang las rung ba sa// nges tshig gtan tshigs snying po hUM/ bla ma
69a5(rnying rgyud): slob bu ma bu 'dra// spyir na rgyud lung man ngag gsum// rje dang blon po 'bangs gsum 'dra// bla ma'i brgyud pa bar ma chad// de yi lung thob bka' bzhin bsgrub// bum pa'i chu bzhin man ngag thob// de la de bstan de yang tho // snying po don gyi man ngag
69a6(rnying rgyud): gcig/ ces gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ man ngag gi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje drag mo khyod// snying po don gyi lta ba ni// ci yang yin no/
69a7(rnying rgyud): gang yang rung // phyogs dang bral bas nam mkha' 'dra// snying po rang byung klong yangs pas// dgag/ sgrub med pa'i chos min yin// yul med ming med gcig kyang med// rang byung rang snang rtsol ba sgrub med// gsal med stod med chos las 'das//
69b1(rnying rgyud): rgyag smrab sa// / sa blag nga ba dang // ba gas su kya sa pa // na phrul bya nanas// ma yang sa gan rgyu gags sa chung // rdzas ga spyang da dam/
69b2(rnying rgyud): dkar dmang rlung bsdam tshangs bug gtod// mkha' la 'bru tshug pa tsan thabs gnad// rdo rje pad+ma \u0f7f kha nas// dkar dmar rtsa rab N+Di rtsi// bdud pa ldan sgo thabs lnga// phyed par rtsol 'dris par gyis// gyen dang thur dang nad ka gsum// lta stangs
69b3(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i gnad// mtshud gzhung dang thag pa ste// yang g.yang nga bcas pas tshu de// 'gyus dran 'dzin chags yengs pa med// gang sdang gar 'gyus lam slongs shing // gnyid dang dngo g.yeng ba kun// khyad par med na bsgom pa gcig/ rang
69b4(rnying rgyud): rang nyams myong nga rgyal gnod// dge sdig 'brul chos lam du slongs// bar med 'phro med 'bral ba med// log rdug 'dod pa'i ro mi ldan// dgra sdang chags gnyen ngos mi 'dzin// skyes bu nad kyis gzir ba 'dra// pu shi ma yi sems las bzhin//
69b5(rnying rgyud): yengs pa med na spyod pa gcig/ snying po rgyun chags spyod pa gcig/ ces gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las// lha sgom spyod pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon
69b6(rnying rgyud): cig rdo rje drag mo khyod// snying po chos mi ni grub mtha' gcig/ sku gsum chos spu'i drung du gcig/ 'byung lda nam mkha'i ngang du gcig/ sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs pa gcig/ dper na rgya mtshor chu bran 'dus pa 'dra// gdul bya'i don du slar bstan
69b7(rnying rgyud): pa// rgya mtshor gza' skar shar ba 'dra// rdo rje 'chang gsum chos min sgra// snying po chos min chos kyi sku// thams cad 'dus pa'i 'bras bu gcig/ yul snang yangs pa ye shes rgyas// rang rig ye shes chos kyi sku// dang po'i rdo rje 'chang du grags//
70a1(rnying rgyud): dag pachos min chos kyisra// mdzad pa med pa'i byin rlabs ni// rtsol ba med pa sgra nyid 'byung // !kamathos men longs spod sgra// sa sa'i rigs kyi 'bras bur snang // sU lA ya shes sgyum lnga// 'odags gas lnga mtshan rdzogs su/
70a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'chang ba mtshan ma yin// do// nyid gzigs kyang shes bya 'phang // 'od zer dpag med yum dang sras// ma bskyed dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs gcig/ tshogs chos min sprul pa'i sku// u ga sung thugs kyi 'bras bur snang // rang byung dang snang ye shes su// sna tshogs
70a3(rnying rgyud): skal pas sna tshogs 'dul// rdo rje 'chang ba tha ma ste// mdzad pa'i las rnams 'gro don byed// gang la ces 'dul sbal pa 'gyed// sna tshogs theg pa'i blo dang sbyor// snying po rang byung dpa' bo rje// snying po ti la dang mar bzhin du// yongs su khyab pa'i sgra sgrogs te// rdza drung ye
70a4(rnying rgyud): sa rang byung ston// snying po grub pa'i mtha' gcig yin// zhes gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ grub mtha'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje drag mo khyod// snying po chos min su
70a5(rnying rgyud): gsum las// thugs rje ye shes rang byung bstan pa ni// dper na ston ka'i nyi ma sprin dang char// byin gyi rlabs kyis 'byung ba yin// lus dang yan lag nyid lag bzhin// lus dang dbang po rnam shes 'dra// chos sru nam mkha' lus dang nyid// chos sku chos min rdo rje
70a6(rnying rgyud): 'chang // g.yos pa med pa'i mya ngan 'das// mdzad pa med pa'i byir rlabs 'byung // longs sku 'od dang sprin dang yin// sprin 'dus 'od gsal yan lag lnga// thig le chos min rdo rje 'chang // srul sku chang dang zer dang nying lag 'dra// gang la gang mos cel cis 'dul bzhin/
70a7(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa'i phrin las 'gro don sna tshog mdzad// theg pa sna tshogs rdo rje 'chang // lus dag yid gsum dge bcur 'dzud// yi ge 'bri klog la sogs te// rgyu dang ye shes tshogs la bskul// dbang po rab 'bring tha ma la// rang rang blo dang sbyar te 'brid// tha med snying po
70b1(rnying rgyud): ku sa su sa// tu gnan sa na
70b2(rnying rgyud): sa thas dang // drug sum 'a 'ab dus nga // wAn gisas gcig lung// drug nyi pa'i tha b+hag yin// sprul rol ba dang mthogs 'ang// thugasum 'ab na mtha la da// zhes gsasas/ ti bting ga ming sa
70b3(rnying rgyud): nga'i rdungangs/ rdzogs rje dag bang dang gzung gi se na skye bco rgyad pa'o// de nas rdo drag mo dang / mtha'i grang rdzogs dang sems dpa' ban s+ho// ji 'byung la 'ag dgas pa spyod pa rda'adang // ngagis na dras
70b4(rnying rgyud): sa
70b5(rnying rgyud): lags// sbyor pa gcig dang gyug ga/ bsu gcig dang pomar gcig/ zhes ra ba byes slob par // bkra shes da pa tshugs sa// da rnams nyes byab la// maN+Dal khrag gis ga ga dang // sgrub brkosas
70b6(rnying rgyud): zing ga rdzog/ d+ha ga dris rdzun lngas bskong // rdo rjeng bang gi dkyil 'khor chags// rnam pa zing gangos dang // sman dang dri dang rten can dang // ting ba 'byung bcas pa gcig/ brgya rtsa gcig la ma yang // ra spel gzung zag gcig btags /
70b7(rnying rgyud): 'i sa kyis mgul bcings la// bad+mal dza phreng dbus su bdag/ mtshan ldan pa dab thong par// 'grub shos shan gtor ma gcig/ khrug chen mo tog mthong gas bya// dkyil 'bar nga yi g.yas nga dag/ dri me das pad pa nga
71a1(rnying rgyud): na chung rdol pa' mang la khrag dang // sbas pa dar ma lnga khrag dang de// Na spyang khrag ni rab rten // / lcags dang tshad tha myang // maN+Dal de pa g.yon du ba 'ang/ thod pa da cad bum pan
71a2(rnying rgyud): gas 'bru ye pa ye/ brlang tu sma mchog zhal ba ni// rlung ba dag gi mdu stegs rjo// drug lcags kyi gang ban// ta yod ma'i dun thugs pa// rings dri mang spong bags// ga
71a3(rnying rgyud): bum pa'i rgya chu bzhag/ tshogs dang mchong rdzas ldan pa bslab// thams cad 'dus pa kun gyi las// chos min snying po rang byung 'di// chos sku'i zhal gzigs longs skur gsal// sprul sra'i lung ston 'byung bar nges/
71a4(rnying rgyud): dpa' bo gcig sgrub de ltar bsgrub// ces gsungs so// snying po rdo rji na ma thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ rang brang gtsog bskrab kyi le'u ste bcu dag pa'o// / de nas yang dag pa shang bye /
71a5(rnying rgyud): cig rdo rje dag mo khyod// pho bsgrub po bsgrub sngags kyis dbye// sngags ni pho mo dang rang 'dzab// dpa' bo gcig 'jab pho ltar bsgrub// mkha' 'gro gru lnga mo ltar bslab// phyi ltar dkyil 'khor brda' du brtag/ nang ltar
71a6(rnying rgyud): rlung thig le mos// gsang ba 'gyu ba tshig des byed// rang byung lus kyi dkyil 'khor la// pho mo yab yum mtha' dag rdzogs// snying po'i 'gru ba rang byung la// 'khor 'das ye shes nyon mongs 'byung // nyon cig mkha'
71a7(rnying rgyud): 'grom mo khyed// nam mkha' stong pa'i klong yangs la// 'byung ba bzhi po 'gro bar byed// kun gyi gzhi ma nam mkha' yin// don gyi snying po 'di la sbyor// spyi gzhi lus kyi log pa las// yan lag dbang po rnam shes 'gro// kun
71b1(rnying rgyud): gzhim ca dang rlung // snying po 'gag med rang la gyur// b+hU Ni snang po'i mkha' spyong la// gang+gA nang 'gyu ba 'gag med grags// kur yang thags pad ma thogs grogs// yang dag la ban+d+ha mkha' 'gro man// d+hA
71b2(rnying rgyud): ma mo mkha' 'gra yin// sarba me rlung mabran 'dra// spyi gzhi mkha' la kun gzhi mo// 'byung ba lnga ni mi mo yin// lus ni ma la yan lag mo// dbang po nyid lag ma bran 'dra// ri rab lus dang phyi nang rtsi// srid pa'i rgyal mo ma
71b3(rnying rgyud): ma mo 'bum sde grangs med kyang // dman mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad 'dus// de yang mkha' 'gro sum cu gnyis// de yang dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad// rje mo bcu bzhi yum chen drung // mkha' 'gro sde bzhi srid rgyal mo// srid pa'i rgyal
71b4(rnying rgyud): pa mthong na// snang sred ma mo thams cad gzigs// rtse ltar re rab gling bzhi mtshon// nang du rtsa rlung thig le'o// dman mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyang // 'khor lo rtsa mdud rnam lnga la// rtswa 'dab brgyad brgyad steng 'og
71b5(rnying rgyud): mtha' gnyis med pas lnga bcu brgyad// lus kyi 'khor lo spyi bo mkha'// gyes pa'i rtsa 'dab sum cu gnyis// mkha' 'gro sum cu rtsa gnyis drung // mkha' 'gro ma yi cha 'dzin no// skal tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni//
71b6(rnying rgyud): theg le zhugs pa dbang // dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad tshogs 'khor te// ma dang b+h+yo ya tshul du gnas// mgrin pa longs spyod thabs shes bzhag/ bzhi bcu rtsa dang rtsa bran hU~M// ye nas snying po kun skyed byed// rje mo
71b7(rnying rgyud): 'i tshul du gnas// rnam shes tshogs drug rtsa ba'i tshul// mtshan nyid 'dzin pa hU~M las ma// yab las yum ni dgyes byed 'dra// dbyings kyi yum drug tshul du gnas// snying nas rtsa bzhi yig 'bru bzhi// dngas ma 'od
72a1(rnying rgyud): ga dus sa gdus dru // ngangan 'do snangs smrasta rang dur las sreng // sred pa'i rnam maldan 'das// rtswag na sbyong bcug pa'o// ga sum
72a2(rnying rgyud): rnams smid pa yin// zhes gsungs so// snying po'i rje rin po'i byams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ mkha' 'gro ma'i le'u sti nyi shu pa'o// / de nas yang dge bshad bya'o// nyon ci dran gabyed// skye brgyad
72a3(rnying rgyud): skye slo byed po'i tsal// 'byung ba 'drung blan rnam pa pa gling// chos sa snying po kun ga // yongs su dang byung 'gas me ga // sbrul sbya rang snang rdzogs gnyis ston// thab cugasung pa'i brnams sbyin// mo thos na
72a4(rnying rgyud): drug tu sprul// gdul byar ras mngon rtags bstan// sral 'debs lha srin sde rgyad ni// gling bzhir rab rgya mtsho kun// byi rten dang ring chos mthun rten// badz+ra'i raphyi rabs rjes 'dug pa// yang dag snying po min gyi
72a5(rnying rgyud): lus dang rnam shes don snying ngo// yan lag tu rlung nyid lag la// nang rten rang rung chos mthun yod// rigs drug thub drug lus la gnas// spyi bo'i rtags nye dbang
72a6(rnying rgyud): bstan// gdul bya phyi ltar dgye ba yin//
72a7(rnying rgyud): sum d+huH gnyis bas rkyen gtsuH// lU dang thub pa byas ma pa ste// lus kyi ri rab stod dang mthun// mgrin brjod pa'i sgo ldan nas// lha min thugs bzang bcas pa yin// snying ni ri rab rtsa bzhi gleng //
72a8(rnying rgyud): skyel dag ga shA sh+tha'i ma // skye ba sring / gas rgyam songs dag btun// gsang kyi da chags sle ba pa'i du / mi dbus kha'i bar rdzas mthuran med// phan lag nga rnam she // zhesnang
72b1(rnying rgyud): rang gyur rang sag yul// 'dad man chags srung ca gang dang // dang la dang gsun mar ma gsung// lha dang klu gshin // gan 'ad rgyal ba bdud dang bcar// sprin saganod ldan ma ma rnams// slong tha skad
72b2(rnying rgyud): du hUM// spyi gzhi snying po rang byung ngo // mig dang na bsnga dang lce// lus dang yid dang rnam shes dang // kun gzhi rnam shes tshogs brgyad ni// mtshan 'dzin rang gnas sde brgyad do// brten pa lus ni spyi gzhi la//
72b3(rnying rgyud): snying dang ni rtsa rlung khrag/ sde brgyad dngos por yod pa ste// mkhal ma gla yi mkhar yin te// chu rtsa rgya mtsho chen po gnas// mtsher pa bdud kyi gnas yin te// lhag pa'i bdud rtsa nag por 'brel// mchin pa btsan dang gshin
72b4(rnying rgyud): rje'i mkhar// khrag mtsho sngog po rtsa dang 'brel// glo ba gnod sbyin ma mo'i mkhar// las rlung dbugs dang 'brel pa'i rtsa// snying ni gza' dang rgyal po'i mkhar// kun khyab rgyal po 'gyu ba'i rtsa// rgyal po dkar nag gnyis yin/
72b5(rnying rgyud): snying stod dkar mthing gnyis la gnas// snying rtsa gza' yi rlung rtsar 'brel// lha dang khyab 'jug klu dang ma// dbang du bsdu ba shin tu gces// lha ni dbang phyug chen po ste// 'gyu ba dbang phyug dbang du gyis// dran pas
72b6(rnying rgyud): dbang du 'dus pa yin// gza' ni tshangs pa khyab 'jug ste// yid dang 'khrubs khyab cing 'dug/ rang byung snying po do shes tshangs// tshangs pa'i bu ga 'byobs na 'char// klu rgyal nor bu rin chen ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad
72b7(rnying rgyud): 'byung // snying po nor bu rin chen 'dra// rang byung 'od kyi ngo shes na// 'dod pa'i don 'grub rin po che// rdo rje pad+ma 'byoras na phan// gzhi ma snying po rgyu yin pas// srid pa'i rgyal mo ma mo'i gtso// mkha' 'gro bzhi ni rtag
73a1(rnying rgyud): 'a byud// mthar ba'i dbang dubasgrub gas// chos nyid gzhim snang pa pa 'ang // nam mkha'i thang bzhin 'thul 'a// nam mkha' thugs 'grodran pa sags// 'dzin pa gzung 'ang chubyung 'dzin
73a2(rnying rgyud): gnang // chags pa rang 'dod nyams myong gnad// dran pa yengs med lhong pa'i gnad// 'grub rang byung lta stangs gnad// gnad ba dri shes pa lta sgom gzer// gzer bzhi thebs pas mkha' 'gro dbang // dbang bzhi thob pas
73a3(rnying rgyud): 'phrang bzhi sol// 'phrang bzhi sol bas 'khor bzhi grol// 'khor bzhi grol bas bdud bzhi brtul// bdud bzhi thul bas ye shes bzhi// ye shes ra'abyung chos kyi dbyings// srid pa'i rgyal mo'i zhal dngos gzigs// dbang phyug
73a4(rnying rgyud): chen po dbang du 'dus// tshangs pa chen pos lung ston gnar// dga' bo 'jog po'i nor bu 'ong // rigs drug g.yang sa de ru chod// 'da' ka'i gcan 'phreng de ru bskul// 'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi de ru choms// sde brgyad
73a5(rnying rgyud): 'phrul de ru zad// srid pa'i bon la gyi ras med// dam pa'i chos la bshad pa med// 'tsho byed sman la bcos sa med// mthong byed mo la bltas med// so nam bzo la byas med// sde brgyad 'dre yi gnod pa med// shes pa
73a6(rnying rgyud): brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang // bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad rig/ 'byung ba snying po chos las grol// zhes gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ sde brgyad rang grol gyi le'u ste nyer gcig
73a7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje drag mo khyod// nga yi ge dmas pa'i chos rgyud 'di// 'byung ba'i rgyal po nam mkha' 'dra// rgya chad phyogs su ltung ba med// rgya mtsho chen po'i
73b1(rnying rgyud): dang dang 'dra// zad pas gtang mtha' chod pa med// za'ag ba byas rgya mtsho 'dra// gcig las 'dres kun ka gsal// snyam mkhan gyi rtse mo 'dra// med par rnachags ston par byed// nor brarin zin 'thang ba 'dra// tha
73b2(rnying rgyud): cad mi 'byung gang yang med// rin chen gser gyi gzugs dang 'dra// gzhi la 'gyur med sna tshogs gzugs// rin chen gser gleng phyin pa 'dra// bor du rung ba gang ying med// 'phrul gyi me long g.yanga' dag 'dra// yod dang
73b3(rnying rgyud): med pa snga phyir gsal// ga pur tsan+dan dug nyid 'ang // mkhas na sman de ma rig dung // brda' rtags sgra dang don bzhi yis// chos nyid shig thog mdzu gu 'dra// gcig par bstan pa'i gdams ngag ni// zangs kyi sngags su chu bcug
73b4(rnying rgyud): 'dra// gshor gyi nang du rlung bcu de 'dra// thogs pa bzhin du gcig steng gcig/ bya brgya thal mo gcig gis 'jur// rol brgya bshal ba gcig gis bsub// brgyad khri bzhi spyong chos nyid gcig/ gcig tu bstan
73b5(rnying rgyud): gyis legs par rtogs// gcig par bstan pa'i gsang rgyud 'di// chos can thams cad chos nyid gcig/ gcig po 'khor 'das snying po gcig/ snying po khyab chen rgyud du zung // dpa' bo gcig pa rdo rje hUM// gcig pu 'gyur med thams
73b6(rnying rgyud): cad 'joms// rdo rje gcig pa'i rgyud du rung // gcig ni sna tshogs kun gyi gzhi// snying ngo thams cad 'byung ba rin po che// rin chen rang byung rgyud du zung // 'jug sgo theg pa bsam 'das kyang // snying po chos min chos nyid
73b7(rnying rgyud): cig/ thams cad hUM la 'dus pas ni// 'thor bsdang po'i rgyung du zung // sangs rgyas thams cad 'dul pa gcig/ dgongs pa gcig pa'i rgyud du zung // de yi dgongs pa de la bstan// dgongs pa brgyud pa'i chung ngu chung /
74a1(rnying rgyud): de yi lung blangs de dang ldan// lung blangs zab mo'i rgyud du thung // tshogs chung bar ni don gcig baspyan// man ngag zab mo'i rgyud du zung // de la de bstan de yang thon// thob pa gcig pa rdza
74a2(rnying rgyud): rgyad du zung // gnas kyi dang po'i 'og min du// mkha' 'gro drag mo khyod kyi zhus// ma rgyud ma mo'i rgyud du zung // thams cad snying po'i ma las gcig/ thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud du zung // zhes gsungs so// snying
74a3(rnying rgyud): pa rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ dpe dang rgyud kyi mtshan don du bkrol ba'i le'u s+t+waM nyer gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig mkha' 'gro'i ma tshogs khyed// byin gyis
74a4(rnying rgyud): brlabs kyi rgyud 'di zung // phyir bas rnal 'byor las can la// snying po don gyi tshig rgyud 'di// pha rol phyin drug snying por bstan// snying po'i don shes shes rab mchog/ shes rab pha rol phyin par smos// de yi don la
74a5(rnying rgyud): g.yengs pa med// bsam gtan pha rol phyin par spros// rnal 'byor snying po'i tshul dang ldan// tshul khrims pha rol phyin par smros// de rtogs bde sdug gang yang bzod// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin par spros// snying po zab mo
74a6(rnying rgyud): de sbyin pa// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par smros// don la gzhan don de longs brtson// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin par spros// pha rol phyin pa'i don bsdus pa// yi ge gcig pa'i mdo gsum bstan// de ltar 'di ni
74a7(rnying rgyud): gcig pa'i sgor// thams cad gcig pa'i don kyad 'di// rdo rje drag mo khyod la gtad// khyod kyis mkhar yi rigs la gtod// rgyal po'i sras po la chang gi// de la gtad pas nga yi tshangad dang 'phrad//
74b1(rnying rgyud): lus 'phyog ga pa ma kha' 'grog cig/ 'dusal ldan pa / khams sa// patud du 'gro ma nas sgrubar ba smranas// bad+hA sa ngan//
74b2(rnying rgyud): mas can dgade// thos pardugs par spyad par dus/ gzhan dag go slong sgrib pa stsogs// 'di shes dus gyis gas la spyad par bya// zhes gsungs sa/ nyid mye na mas 'das so// dag so nga/
74b3(rnying rgyud): rin chen drag slong / pad+ma drag mo dang / las kyi drug mod / ga mo la sogs pa/ mkha' 'grom rnams rjes su yi rang nas mngon par bsdus te/ mngon par bstod pa/ ston pa'i sbyin po rdo rduld//
74b4(rnying rgyud): snying po chos min chos kyi sku// byin rlabs 'gag med khru gnyis 'byung // rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bskyod de/ mkha' 'gro ma'i rang skad la phyag mtshan lnga yis brgyan/ don dril te dri
74b5(rnying rgyud): bu'i sgra yi mchod pa phul lo// kun tu 'i spel bar mkha' 'gro ma'i rang grus mna' bstsal lo// rdo rje drug mo zhu smad kyi bdag po'i mna' yod do// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i
74b6(rnying rgyud): le'u nyar gsum pa'o// / rdzogs so// / irti/ rdo rje drag mos srasu mgo ma de byi la/ da/ / gnang ngo // des pad+ma la'o// des rje 'bangs grogs gsum
74b7(rnying rgyud): rgya garang skad du/ sa ma ya b+hu ha d+h+yA mi tan+t+ra thA ku nA li kAr nA ma/ bod skad du/ dmachog bkod pas gzhi'i rgyud/ rin po che spangs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu 'a
75a1(rnying rgyud): po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po 'og min gyi gnas mchog chen po na bzhugs pa'i tshe/ dpal rdo rje sems
75a2(rnying rgyud): dpas yang ti'i chos zhus pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ snyan rgyud kyi gdams ngag rnam pa gsum ste/ sangs rgyas nyag gcig dang / dam tshig thun gcig dang / dpe brda' gcig go// sangs rgyas larda'i le'u ste dang
75a3(rnying rgyud): po'o// / rdo rje sems dpas zhus pa'i sangs rgyas nyag gcig ni/ rig pa dngos med ye shes la// sku gsum ka nas ma grub bo// ci ste logs snang med pa'i phyir// parda ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'o//
75a4(rnying rgyud): don ni ye shes rang la ldan gyis grub pa'i// sgra ni d+ha ni ka ya a'o// sangs rgyas nyag gcig ni/ dgongs pa la thun med pa dang / chos nyid la bar do med pa dang / ye shes la skyel bsu med pa dang / ches skul skad cig ma
75a5(rnying rgyud): med pa dang / sku gsum la 'du 'bral med pa dang / snying po la 'tshor gyur med pa dang / shes rab la dgag sgrub med pa dang / thig le nyag gcig la gnyis snang med pa'o// lung las kyang / gnyis med gnyis su med par ston/ zhes bya
75a6(rnying rgyud): ba dang / sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med de// zhes pas gsal lo// brda don gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ dam tshig thun gcig ni/ yang ti nag po gser gyi 'bru gcig pa// dper na rin chen gser gyi rdo ba la/
75a7(rnying rgyud): bya dang khyi dang sku gzugs rnams// gyis kyang gser las 'gyur ba med// bzang dul song ngan du mi 'gr-i ste// gzugs kyirnam parba dkyang // ra bogasar las 'byung ba med// de bzhin da mtshig thun gcig ni// thig le rtag gcig dang rtags na/
75b1(rnying rgyud): gta snang mdab phyir// bsung byang nar na// tag da// gtu sna bung na gzung na s+ho// sras b+hab mad+hA ga pa// tshul kyang yang ti da ga na// de yang grang las/ dam dzadu ca pa dand mnad/
75b2(rnying rgyud): dbang nga ngasam pa mkhyen mchag gis// bad ni drag lnga grol ra shA y-i / sma nas ma ya tri kA ya e ka ngi// zhes gsungs sa// brdang ska dan gyi le'u ste gsum pa la// / kun nu bzang pos bka' sprul pa/ dpe ban gcig ni/ mtsho tshan po
75b3(rnying rgyud): gdum ba dang // nam ma da' chen po drug pa rjo pa dang // spyan gyi rgyal bag za ni// sman dang gra dang nasu badzang // den phyi mi brdang gsum yin// dzaM badrang bzhin drugs rdo brdang // de ni 'khrul pa gzhi yi bar// ma ni rnam gsum sems can bdag
75b4(rnying rgyud): rab rnam gsum 'khrul pa'i brdang // de ni nang gi rdang bzhi yin// 'ad tshigs ni sdang gti mug ne// de ni cig le dag gcig brdzun// dr-i ba wA ye shes lnga 'i brda// 'gro drug nga byung yi shes pa dang // gzung 'dzin rig pa ye shes brda'// de ni gas pa /
75b5(rnying rgyud): brda' bzhi yin// sgra yi don ni 'di lta ste// yaM shes sgra las yi ge ha// dbyings kyi sgra las yi ge ma// rol pa'i grwa las yi ge ra// da ni grwa yi chos nyid de// don 'di rtogs pa'i rnal 'tshang la// rab dang 'drid dang tham bstan// dbang po yang rab rob pa lA// sangs/
75b6(rnying rgyud): rgyas chos dang mya ngan 'das// dngos po'i chos dang gnas lugs te// bar do med par rang grol lo// 'bring dang tha ma'i chos nyid ni// da lta'i sprod par de sangs rgyas te// rdzogs chen lam pa'i chos nyid do// sems can 'khor bzlo yi snang lugs te// 'bring dang za
75b7(rnying rgyud): mabar dor grol// zhes 'byung ngo // yang ti rang grol du bshad pa'o/ brdang 'gyur sgra 'gyur don 'gyur du bstan pa'o// cho ga gsum brgyud pas sangs rgyas kyi chos brgyud pa bar ma chad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ b+hU ta sarba Da ma ra nA ma tar+tha/
76a1(rnying rgyud): bod skad du/ 'byung ba kun 'dul zhes bya ba 'i rgyud/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan kun tu rtag pa mi 'gyur ba'i sgra/ bad ba can pa'i gnas brdal bar bzhugs so//
76a2(rnying rgyud): nab pas ngas mag de/ gshes sa
76a3(rnying rgyud): dgongs pazang mchad pa'i sprin nubs skor du bstan pa'i// byin rlabs thugs rje'i chos rnams la// bstan pa'i yang rtse man ngag kun gyi bcud // theg pa'i yang rtsi sbyi don dgongs pa'i rgyud// man ngag sde mig 'phrul gyi sbom bu 'byed// rig pa'i tshad pa 'ang 'byed kyi 'di
76a4(rnying rgyud): rig 'dzin rgyal po rdo rje chos kyi 'a gros la// byin rlabs rgyal po bstan pa'i rten du bzhag/ tshogs chung don che man dag zab// rgya cher bzlab dgongs pa brgyud pa la// rjes kyi blo gros thugs la byin rlab shad// steng srid 'khor 'das kyi nang med par gsal// me long ba lngas
76a5(rnying rgyud): pas rang stang gsal ba ltar// 'gro drug dang snang spu dang ye shes dang // thig le nyag gcig ma long nang ltar gsal// de ltar rdo spod dgongs pa bstan pa ni// chos can chos med dang grol dgongs pashar// de byer dgongs btud pa yin// rang byung me long nang na ci drung ltar//
76a6(rnying rgyud): snang rang mad 'di ni cing yang snang // rgyal pa'i thugs kyig te sh+lo s+ye// nyag gcig dgongs pa dang k+kol bstan pa ni// mu stegs 'gro drug theg pad+ma ste// rang sna dang mos dod gsung tha dad kyang // don du rnam pa myang yang nges par gaTIg/ gcig po mtha' grol zlal
76a7(rnying rgyud): rtse mo ste// byis pa rnams kyis de ltar mi shes so// kye ma to// de ltar snang yang de ltar mi srid kyis// yang dag rang grol dgongs pa 'di yin no// thog mi rang bzhin ldan gyis grub pa la// snang ba rgya chang phyogs ris kyi// ris su chad pa rdul tsam mi srid do//
76b1(rnying rgyud): par bya mams 'thab pa 'drab la// brnam pa byu rngub yang maman// byung bar la gas da gas sa bdud// phyogs dang dgangs par dgro laman sa// rang snang banamang mtha' las bcangs pa yan// yum dang 'bras su rangag 'ang grab mnag/
76b2(rnying rgyud): mtha' grol rang byung shar bzhin tu dkul// zhes gsungs pa dang // rdo rje chos kyi blo gros la// thugs cad zhes gi skyong nas sprul pa'i su byu ste// mu dang rlabs dang nyi ma 'od dang zer// de bzhin lnga ba'i rnam pa ltar// byin napas spyad cig ma la gang // rang
76b3(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu'i dgongs pa las// ston pa dga' rab rdo rje 'thun// de nas thugs rje'i byin rlabs shar bya las// rig pa'i klong nas byin gyi rlabs kyis su// rdo rje chos kyi blo gros dang // ston pa kun tu bzang po la// snang babasam gyis mi khyab pa// 'di yi brtag pa rdzi
76b4(rnying rgyud): su
76b5(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa li/ ya ma/ badz+ra na/ b+h+r-ita/ pA b+h+r-i/ bA y+ra/ tsan+na dap+ta/ sUr+tha de bA/ ma di b+ha/ b+hA ba ya/ ta la de thA/ ba ta li da bA/ dza la/ nA ga de bya/ de rnams thams cad 'dus nas ni/ mchod pa'i rnam pa 'di rnams 'bral/ mahA pA d+ha thimad+d+ha
76b6(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod pas byin rlabs 'grag pa med pa ni/ dang ba thugs rje 'gag med do// byin gyis rlabs kyi gzhi ma yin// rgya mtsho'i rnga dang rlabs lta bre// nyi ma'i 'od dang zer lta bu// bar du byin gyis rlabs kyi rgya// 'grub 'gag pa med pa yin// 'gyi ba'i
76b7(rnying rgyud): rlangs shang pa yis// thugs rje mi 'byung bang dbang med// de yang lamadu 'gyu ba'i phrin rlabs shar// 'grub byin che gtan la phengs// zang tha la rlabs chen dgongs pa shad// ngang krol 'bras bu chos las 'das// da yi byin rlabs gnad chen gang /
77a1(rnying rgyud): lag len nyams chen 'phel 'grib med// don gyi khong gzer gnad dra thabs// 'jig rten snang ba sangs rgyas yin// nyon mongs pa snang dgra bcom yin// 'jig rten rnam rtog shes rab tu// shes rab rgya brtogs pa yin//
77a2(rnying rgyud): rtog med shes rab tshad ma gang // shes rab rtags kyis rab brgyan na// langs la rgyas pa med cing chos la spyod pa med// dgra bcom dang skal byang chub sems dpa' med// gang zag rnam pacad med cing bar da las dbang med// 'khor ba myang 'das med ci /
77a3(rnying rgyud): thar pa thob mkhan med// drag dang ma dag yang dag snang ba tha dad med// las med 'phro med mthung pa'i 'bras bu med// rnam par smin pa med cing yang dag thar pa med// de gyir 'byung po kun 'dul yin// thams cad 'brel shing 'dul ba'i rgyud// ngo spong
77a4(rnying rgyud): 'di dang mi ldan na// tshig gi bdag pos mtshon nas las// stong pa'i bdag pos stong par bltas// mtshan ma'i bdag pos mtshan mar khyer// kun rdzob bdag pos rdzob tu bcug/ mya ngan 'das zer mya ngan non// 'khor ba bshad cing 'khor bar 'khyam
77a5(rnying rgyud): 'khrul 'khor bdag po nyon ro mongs// thar pa 'dod pa sgrib pa che// byang chub 'dod pas golasar chud// chos spyod byed pa ladub che// dmigs pa'i bdud zhugs mtshor ro// byas parba m+ba cad mi rtag 'dus byas yin// 'dus byas mya ngan mtha' las 'das/
77a6(rnying rgyud): e me ho// bgrod par 'dod pa nyon re mongs// de ltar bgrod pas de ltar mi rtogs so// bgrod nas byang chub 'dod pa smig rgyar bsnyeg pa 'dra// gser sba ma khrim du smras nas gseras 'tshol// chos nyid rang snang ma shes gzhan la 'chol// brtson
77a7(rnying rgyud): 'grus byas pas 'bras bu rnyed par dka'// zhes gsungs so// 'byung po kun 'dul gyi rgyud las/ kun tu bzang po la byin rlabs rang la shar nas/ myos las 'das pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang byin gyis rlangs kyis lung bstan pa/
77b1(rnying rgyud): sa sa / ga pa sna na gas paslab ba dang // de'i 'bras pasu ba byed dang // snang ba lamatha dang bzlas pa/ don bdag gos bshad pa sa// sa snang bdu lanan dang // nang gshes pa rjod ma yin// dayang shes rab gyud pa las/ da
77b2(rnying rgyud): bdul du shes pa dang // rkang pa brjod med pa'o// du yang rngam ma do dum mo// rang rgyal ba yi sdeng pa 'di// rnga la ldan rgyun la bral// tron 'brel bcug nyis shes rab yini// gis rgyas rtag thong shes pas 'jugs// sargyas tsam rnam par snang ba 'di/
77b3(rnying rgyud): lase martogs logs snang med// rnam par snang yang mi rtog pas// deni chubs zhes pa'o// dam pa pa'i slong tha~M // sangs kyi ma badzan pa // rnam med nga pa'o// sgyum lta ba'i grod dade// mam rnams thams kyad sems man/
77b4(rnying rgyud): kyang rdzun par shes pa'o// kwa rngub sgyum nim du badren pa dang // dod pa smos pa bral bar bden pa shes rab bo// rab tu mi gnas snang ba ni// rnam par dpung bats+tsham zhig las/ khas yin thams cad dang bral ba'i// gnyis su med pas dbu ma yin// de ltar shes pang /
77b5(rnying rgyud): shes rab yin// de la kI ya'i snang ba yang // rigs gsum sgyu ma lta bu las// don dam skye ba med pa'o// de ltar shes pas shes rab bo// yog sgra lnga ma hA rigs lngar snang // ana? te draka lngar snang ba dang // rdzogs chen dang snang ma bcos pa// dbu ma sgyu mar bden pa
77b6(rnying rgyud): da // bden pa gnyis kyi mul steng // gsang sngags sgra ma 'di rnga na pas na// gsang sngags rang snang zad par 'phags// a ti n+dan dang bden pa gnyis// rang snang ma badzes chos kyi sa// sen 'dul dgongs pa ye shes rang lding ste// 'gro drug dang snang rnam pa sa/
77b7(rnying rgyud): stegs rtag chad kyu dang 'bras bu sted // skugasum rang lding yon tan snang // lA ba rnom spyod 'bras rang re snang // rang snang 'di la 'jug pa'i lam// de phyid lam gyi dgongs pa bshad pa yin// zhes gsungs so// 'byung po kun 'dus kyi sgyid las/
78a1(rnying rgyud): snas/ 'ad na na nga sa na gyu // / mas// na /
78a2(rnying rgyud): las// grol lamachags ma ma shrIs na// sngags kyi bka' ba sgo nyams pas na// dbang gi dam cing bshad par // 'bras tha na dbyang chub za'i 'dod la// mtshan nyid pa dang pha rol phyin pa da // ya nas bas ma se ngag/ tshus sa dang par bya
78a3(rnying rgyud): brtan pa// mtsha da pa nga 'o la sbyin pani// thabs dang shes rag ca ba ga/ shes rabag kyi ba nga nas 'bras du 'tshal// thas dang pasan pa'i shes rabazlang 'i brten// shes rab med na cig med pa ros byin pa dku'// thabs kyi stong pa sems bskyed pa dang b+h+yod rje //
78a4(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags 'bras pa'i theg pa ni// swA wA pa shes sna nga ldan te// brgyang bsgra la rdzogs pas legs ni// zung du 'brel pa bas pa'i thig 'i// de yang na dang khya pa las/ khams gas pa sems can grol bar byed pa la// dbang garten dang
78a5(rnying rgyud): par// dbang bzhi bskur ba'i gnad bstan pa// dper na bel zho yod kyang // bi lba ba med thug snod zeng// de bzhin thams dbang bsrur rtse// rten dang mi ldan pa slar thabs med// gzugs med pa yi khams rnams la// dbang rnams bskur ba'i rten snyed de//
78a6(rnying rgyud): rlung rtog pa mi dmigs byas// ye shes dbang bskur ga lanas// gzugs khams ca dang rA la kyang / khams kyi zas dang bral bas rten ma yin// des ni 'dod khams gnas ris khon la// dbang rnams bsla ba'i rted du drung // 'dod chags ni sdang gti druH
78a7(rnying rgyud): dargyal khong thozug dog gis// gangs nas 'das pa'i 'dod rnams nga// dpe gi slong du nga ba na// rab nga na ga ga rdzu // brgya dang bsrung babs gsum// kyi dang dang gas ma// tham bathangs dang nas rab ga//
78b1(rnying rgyud): s+yA dang po bye'a'o// bsgyur thabs gnas dang rdzas dang ni// gleng gnyi dkyil 'bor bskur ba'i dus// 'bras bud du na ngas pa'i chog/ g+ha ni sa chog la sogasas bslang dang // brtag dang sbrang dang bri ba dang // mchod pa'i rdzas dang kun dgram pa// dkyil 'dzar
78b2(rnying rgyud): cho ga la sogs yin// ngo bo dbang thob don dang ldan// nges tshig don ldan rnal 'byor pos// dbye ba phyi nang gsang ba'o// gleng gzhi sngon byung rjes 'jug go// dkyil 'khor phyi nang kun la snang // bskur thabs bskyed rim rdzogs rim mo// gnas ni lus ngag
78b3(rnying rgyud): yid gsum mo// rdzas ni bum pa thabs dang gsang ba'o// dus ni bkra shis nyi ma yin// 'bras bu sgra gsum rang sgrol yin// zhes gsungs so// 'byung po kun 'dul gyi rgyud las/ dbang gi sdom bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
78b4(rnying rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// bum pa'i dbang gi ngo spong ba// bum pa'i ngo bo ngas tshig dbye ba dang // mthun pa'i dpe dang bskur ba'i gnas// bskur ba'i rdzas dang dus tshod dang // yon tan 'bras bu skyon bstan pa// bum pa'i nga
78b5(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa yin// nges pa'i tshig ni rdzogs pa yin// dbye ba phyi nang gsang ba'o// mthun pa'i dpe ni rin po che// bsrung ba'i gnas ni mgo bo la// rdzas ni phyi nang gsung ba'o// dus ni gnam skyong nyi ma la// yon tan lus kyi sgrib gsum dag/ srog gcong ma sbyin
78b6(rnying rgyud): 'dod log dag/ 'bras bu sbal pa'i sku ru rdzogs// ma bskur khams gsum 'khor bar 'khyams// phyi yi bum pa rin chen dang // bum pa'i rdzas ni 'di dag go// 'bru lnga sman lnga rin chen lnga// spos lnga snying po rnam lnga yin// bskur gnas la sogs gong
78b7(rnying rgyud): du'o// nang gi bum pa tha ma'i sku// bdud rtsi la sogs lus la rdzogs// bskur ba'i gnas ni lce la'o// rdzas ni bdun rtsi 'om chu// dus ni bskyed rim bsgom pa'i dus// yon tan dag gi sgrib padag/ bdud rtsi stso la bzhag pa'o// dgos pa thams
79a1(rnying rgyud): rtogapa med pa dang // bdud rtsa yongs srung grogs su shes pa dang // rngan dang bram rdzog tu bdag 'khyal gyi// ngag gi sgrib pa dag par byang // gsang bar tham pa rang lus kyi// tham rdzas lhag pa byang chub sems// bzung thabs yur
79a2(rnying rgyud): kyi b+hag pa// bsrur ba'i rten ni rdza gsum ste// yon tan gzung 'dzin bde bar 'bar// dus ni snyoms par zhugs pa yin// 'bras bu dga' bde lhan cig skyes pa'o// yang gsang bum pa'i dbang bsrung ba// rang rig ye shes bum pa yin// tham rdzas 'das pa rnam pany+dza
79a3(rnying rgyud): bskur thabs chos las 'das pa yin// rten ni blo ldan gang zag yin// yon tan dang grol byin rlabs 'char// dus ni gdams pa skad cig yin// 'bras bu rig pa dang grol yin// de la dkyil 'khor gang dang 'brel ce na// phyi yi bum pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// me tog
79a4(rnying rgyud): thang ka rdul tshon no// bskur tshul gang dang 'brel he na// slob dpon bla mar gus bya yi// chu ni spyi bo'i gtsug tu bskur// rna ba g.yas su dbu rgyan no// lhag par rdo rje rna g.yon dril// ming ni dpral bar bskur ba yin// me tog phrang ba mgo la bcings// shes rab
79a5(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i dbang lnga yin// sras kyi sgrib pa 'dag par byed// ces gsungs sa// 'byung po dran dul gyi rgyud las/ bram pa'i dbang gi le'u skye lA pa // / de nas yang dag bshad byab// nyon cig rdo rje nas kyig smos dz+nyAd// thabs dang zhes dbang bang
79a6(rnying rgyud): bskur bstan par bya// thabs dang shes rab ldan pas bum pa'o// thabs kyi bum pa bla ma yin// ting 'dzin byang chub sems kyi chu// bla ma'i kha yis pad+ma blangs// slob ma'i tshangs pa'i bu gar basbyar// ga pung chu yi bdud rtsis ni// lus kyi sgrib pa 'dag par byed
79a7(rnying rgyud): shes rab bum pa mi mo yi// lus kyi pad+mar k+She yin// gsang ba pad+ma'i sbyor ba yis// gsang ba'i bdud rtsi phab byas la// thabs kyis rdo rje'i ngag dag byed// bskur gnas pad+ma'i lte ba la// bskur dus lhag cig smyos pa'o// yon tan rnam rtog bde bar 'ab
79b1(rnying rgyud): // / slod/
79b2(rnying rgyud): sa pa drug ts+tshan/ ga sa pas gyi// de dag gi las // da da nga man // la~M mas dzod// danapa pa dag da// lam gyi nas sa rjod// danam
79b3(rnying rgyud): spyan cig skyes pa'i ye shes sa// drug 'bral byangs pa sa na// dgang ba las rtse drug tu yi// dga' ma drug tu yin// lhan cig shes pa dang tshig tug tu med// dag thal byags chen po 'di// man lus kyi sa rgya na
79b4(rnying rgyud): ni mnang lasogs pa yin pa'o// dus drug lan 'o// ma nyan ma zhes da ldan/ lta kyis thu bar// dang nga 'a // rig pa ba la snang bsrag/ nga brjid gnyis med
79b5(rnying rgyud): yis// thabs dang shes dab bang mchog thog// babs dngadu shes rang tsam na// ning zed pa dbang ba rdzogs// rtenani rnam ngam pa ma// rje rtog pa skad cig le// mi tan mtshan ma rang snang po la// dbras pa srung srong rkye/ ya 'byung // yangags
79b6(rnying rgyud): thabs dang gas rabang bang bskyang ba// rang gas thabs kyis chod pa // dang ni shes dab dbang bskar ba// rjod pagrangs kyi bang bsgyur dang // thab sed nas ba dbang bsgyur rjon // rten ni ma rig ma rtogs pa// dus ni 'i lamarig ma rtogs lag
79b7(rnying rgyud): dang // phyogs las gang ma rnams gyung// yo sa mad pa ni ciga'ib ga dpe kyis na/ ngan 'i kyi pa'i nga / sprul pa med papa byed dru //
80a1(rnying rgyud): dmachog mamams spyod pa sa// du gyu/ na / da / smra sa na
80a2(rnying rgyud): de nas yang dag bzud nug// rdo rdzos kyi zlas non// gas pa'i byu ba cwa stan d+haH// dab tshig bye dade// mthun pa'i mye dang// dzA mA~M dang yo na gyus thag// da ba ba mas stong bya'i// ma ga zhes
80a3(rnying rgyud): snying rdza mas// ba 'i ye shes bskyed rtsir min// dbyeb sbyin dgas bya'o// ma pe 'bras cad byung ba 'dra// de yi she pa 'byung ba'o// gnas mau thug ga DI'i dang // rang zhes rab badz+ra dang // gsung zhes rab la shes / rdzas
80a4(rnying rgyud): byang sems dka dmang nga// yan tan migs dgongs pa gyur// dus ni da ba ga nyi rdzogs nas ni// dkyilal ba tsugs dang rang zhes stso/ brji tshul rnam kyi yan lagagardung // 'bras ma ga mgartags la// dan gyinas nga
80a5(rnying rgyud): snang san nas myod pa zhes ba dbang // rang srung ye nas shes pa la shes dadang // hrIn yang thal na dbang po yin// rig pa ngas dgrol banas chog yin// ye shes rang byung byang chung zhis par bye ba yin// nye shang rmad pa dngas phyis thun po yin// rigs
80a6(rnying rgyud): rang la gnas pa dgos pa yin// rang rig ye bris rang la yod pa dbang rdzas yir// ye shes lnga ldan ma bsgrubs yon tan yid// dus gsum 'du 'byu med par shes pad+ma sa khyod med// rang byung thams cad 'dus pa kyil 'khor yon// rig pa rang
80a7(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa bsgrar tshul yin// ma rig log sta tshe spa pa 'bras bu len// danigs pa'i dbang bstan po// shes rab ye shes le nas rang la gnas// jo bo shes pas 'khor ba'i skyon dang me// rang po la ngas pa'i tshig gi deng 'grol// dbye ba ye dang shes
80b1(rnying rgyud): g+hanyis// hA sa ni srung dag ye shus ga // mthun pan sa srid 'ang// rkyen snad pa'o// cigs 'dunas nang// byung nas nas rab nas du sa dzunas/ na danangs pasod// bslad dus srung bag ngan
80b2(rnying rgyud): byed// dkyil 'khor ye shes gtid rdzogs yin// bskrang tshul du srod skasmad cig la// 'bras byu dang grol dgongs pasad// de spod dbang bsgyur 'di lta bu// bum pa nang gi myar me ltang// snod ma yin gyi gang dag la// dus dang gnas skyabs kun rje gsang // shA
80b3(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pa rnams la yang // dbang mthob par bshad ma yin// ci phyed de spyod 'di nyid la// ma rtogs pa rnams skur pa 'debs// log par rtogs nas skur bar 'gyur// don ma rtogs pas yid ma rjes// tshig la 'tshal zhing don la rmongs// bshad cho
80b4(rnying rgyud): mkhan gyis go bar dka'// skye bo rnams kyi yagar 'gyur// de bas 'di don gsang bar bya// zhes gsungs so// 'byung po kun 'dul gyi rgyud las/ shes rab ye shes gsang bar dbang bsrung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yang dag/
80b5(rnying rgyud): bsha byab// rdornga chos kyi thams nyon// chog dbang don can bstan pa ni// lags par rtsig cig/ yid kyis nyon// yum pa'i lhang da nga dbang ba skyed rnams// skye ba med par rdzas 'dabs pas// hU~M yo ga dbang zhes su 'arjod// dga' ba bzhi la rgyas 'debs
80b6(rnying rgyud): pas/ na shrI nI k+Sha bang zhes su bshad// shes rab pa shes rgyas 'dibasu pas// gsang ba'i chog dpa skyesas spyod// rig pa'i ye shes pa slong ngas// tshig bang blun med pa yin// dz+regag ni/ dbang du rnyed// dbyung da ston lha rje man/
80b7(rnying rgyud): lha yi dbang po lha yi lha// lhabs bla ma lhag pas lha yi bla// lha la zab mo'i tshogs 'khor 'bul// tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan// lha yi dze bo kuR+Sha'i snying po bya// de rnams shes shing slob pas sleb dpo ni yin// ma rtogs ma shes 'dren pas
81a1(rnying rgyud): dpon yin// 'dren pa rang rgyal slob dpon yin// tshogs kyi skyob dpon tshogs kyi bdag/ de nas tshig dpung rgyas btab pas// rdo ji lta bu'i sku brnyes pas// gcig pu sa mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag/ skyes ma thag tu rang grol 'as/
81a2(rnying rgyud): rje slob dpon zhes su brjod// dbang bzhi rdzogs pa'i slob dpon de// rdo rje slob dpon zhes brjod do// rdo rje'i gdan ni ma lus ldan// rdo rje gcig pus g.yus sel bas// skyob dpon dpa' bo che zhes brjod// cho ga dbang gcig la thams cad rdzogs// rang rig
81a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes ma bcos pas// rnal 'byor zhes kyang de la bya// don ldan grol 'byor pa yis// rnal 'byor chen po zhes kyang bya// chos sku mi 'gyur rtag pa'i sku// dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med par shes// rtag pa kun rgyal rnal 'byor can// gsang ba mngon du phyung nas bstan/
81a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba sbas pa'i khungs brtol bas// blams dbang bzhi bskur bas na// bla ma gsang sngags kun pas mchog/ ces gsungs so// 'byung po kun 'dul gyi rgyud lus/ tshig dbang bla ma la dag smras pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang dag/
81a5(rnying rgyud): bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros gyod// gsang sngags bla ma'i thugs laganas// gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po// gsang sngags bdag po ste tshogs ston/ khyod ni rje gcig yid kyis nyor// gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag/ sangs rgyas
81a6(rnying rgyud): rabs bdun do zla'o// de yi dgongs pa bshad par bya// ldem por dgongs pa rnam pa bzhi// gzhi la lde ma dang chog la ldem// don la ldem dang gnod la ldem// ldem dgongs bsgom rtsa mchod na// 'khrul 'khor mongs pa nyon mongs// kye rigs kyi bu nyon cig
81a7(rnying rgyud): thog ma med pa dus kyi dbyings// dngos gzhi chen po kun gzhi la// gzhi la phun tshogs gnad med na// ston pas bsten pa 'dus byas 'gyur// bka' tshoms gags kyi/ nad med na// kun brtags theg pa rang gzhung grol// 'bras bu mi 'dra nges shes med/
81b1(rnying rgyud): ma // bar bar byung bar byabyas med// rnal ba gyung chu sa ta// sa pa na/ sa na tan yang / da da/ da//
81b2(rnying rgyud): 'gag mdag nad med na// mkha' mi rlung bsngon du nang // gdal mkhas pa'i dang mdun// dpo bad hU~Mg sdong du 'byung // 'bras tha nga mye'i ga dang medan// bran tu bcing po 'a khor bar snang // thigs ngos pa'i gnang men// 'jo
81b3(rnying rgyud): lhung bsngod dus ngas// 'grub med pa'i byin zla bas gnad med na// chags sdung lnga po sngon du zad// ma rig ga tu mug ga dad med// gzung 'dzin 'dus byas snong nga zhig/ lde bu'i bdag po gnad med na// skye la dag brgya // am
81b4(rnying rgyud): tshig la ldem por dgongs pa dag sungs so// dri nas cang mi gsung par chos nyid tshe rmong du med mam// zhes 'byung po kun rjes kyi chung mas/ lteng bu mdze sprod pa'i leng bu dgu pa'o// / dngos rgya tha thos kyis/ @
81b5(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po lags// skye dgu'i mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// zhes nus pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// gnas dang brtan dang skyeng gA'i 'dag/ gnas pa phrin gzhi g+hi mra yin// brtan pa rang bzhin stong pa lnga dang ldan// rgan po thog mamad
81b6(rnying rgyud): pa yin// skye ba dgra ni mi 'grog pa// phyi yi skye ba dgu brgyad la// dang po gzhis ngo sprod gces// bar du rgya rkyen ngo skong gnas// tha ma gyes pa'i dngos po brtan par gces// 'gro ba rigs drug mu stegs rtag chang gnyis// 'dra dang lha ru sme ba dgra
81b7(rnying rgyud): bsrud pa// dang po brgyud pa'i khungs btsal na// 'khor ba thog mtha' bcad pagaces// lha ni 'dre srin mo dang 'gro drug gi/ sde ba'i gzhom ma shes ni// sngags pa mthu rtsal bas ma yas kyang // spyi ba dgu babyung rjod me srid// ngan sngags skyo ba'i
82a1(rnying rgyud): mdza na// dgu brgyad gtsad pa la rnyeH// tshad pa med pa nyan mongs// sred gabum brgyud mdzad na// khams gsum grangs thal dka byung // rtso mi rgyad gcod pa la// 'byung ba kun 'dul gdams pa dan //
82a2(rnying rgyud): skyedag rgyang nas gcod pa'ing stod dgos// khams gsum yongs grol dgongs pa dgel// sring gsu ma rnam par dag pa'i yid ces dgos// gnas brtan rgan po sgrol ba'i dbang po dgang // sangs kyis mes po mthong ba'i stan mig rigs// 'gyo
82a3(rnying rgyud): gcod pa'i gegs sel dgos// rtag chad srog rtsa gcod pa'i bshan pa dgos// wA srog 'dro gzing gtan la phebs pa'i phur thun dgos// nam mkha'i por du slob pa'i gshog pa dgos// rgya mtsho thub kyi// 'debs pa'i kham cu dgos// mtshan gos su gyon pa'i
82a4(rnying rgyud): pa dgos// sa chen gdan du bting ba'i lus stobs dgos// rlung po gshog par byed pa'i yang rtsal dgos// 'byung lnga lngas su 'jug pa'i mi go dgos// dug lnga bdud rtsir spyod pa'i rnal 'byor dgos// gnyis snang rang snang gcod pa'i 'khyer ka dgos//
82a5(rnying rgyud): khams gsum rang la shar ba'i dgongs pa dgos// de ltar zhes na phy-i yi 'byung po 'dul// zhes gsungs so// 'byung po kun 'dul gyi khyed las/ phyi'i 'byung po sgra rgyud brjed pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig
82a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// nang gi ste dgu rtsadu bcad bstun par bya// thog ma'i gnas brtan skye dbu las// thog ma med pa'i dus nyid nas// nyon mongs brgyad khri'i gzhi ma yin// chos kyi sgo myo bkyad khri bzhi stong gis// de rnams skye ba'i gzhi mde// zag
82a7(rnying rgyud): rim pa dbu le gzhi// kun ga'i skye ba'i mdzod chen yin// rgyu dang la ma dang gzhi dngos gsum// de gsum gtan la phebs par 'gyur// gtan la 'bebs pa sde'i lung du bshad// de la gol gni rim pa dgu// gol ba la ma gyi so mtshabs dkri/
82b1(rnying rgyud): go las dngos po mtha' bcas rnams// gol gzhi go las ma shes na// theg pa spyi las bogs mi rngon// sun 'don la brnam shes na// theg pa'i la shan ris mi byed// de sprod ngangs ma bstanan// 'bras bsgra yi go la sar 'char// gegs dang sel
82b2(rnying rgyud): lugs ma shes na// spre'u rgan ma ru' chos pa 'dra// lta ba'i gol sgrib ma chad na// bong bu seng lpags gyon pa 'dra// bsgom pa'i grol sgrib mchod na// spre'u la bsgom pa bslabs pa 'dra// stod pa'i gol sgrib mchod na// rgod po gshogs chag pa 'dra/
82b3(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu'i gol sgrib mchod na// nyi ma gza' yis bzung ba 'dra// thams cad do sprod ma shes na// nor bu mching bu thogs pa 'dra// dngos po rtsad nas mchod na// nyan thos la sogs rang gzhung re// nga yi mtshan ma ma grol na// grwang nad can la ga pur ltar//
82b4(rnying rgyud): rang snang ye shes bdud du 'gyur// phyogs rtogs rtog pas zin pa ni// kha brag lam mdor tshogs pa 'dra// des na ngo sprod shin tu gces// nang gi skye dgu rtsad gcod na// theg pa'i go lAs shes pa ngo spyod yin// theg pa'i grol gzhi shes pa gdams
82b5(rnying rgyud): ngag yin// theg pa sun 'don shes pa dbang po yin// theg pa'i la bzla shes pa yid ches yin// theg pa'i ji sprod rang grol shes pa nges shes yin// thig le gcig tu shes pa 'bras bu yin// zhes gsungs so// 'byung po kun 'dul gyi drung
82b6(rnying rgyud): las/ nang gi skye dgu rtsad nas bcad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// gsang ba'i skye dgu rtsad nas gcad pa bstan par bya// kun gzhi skye bo dgu pa'i bdag/ rnam par
82b7(rnying rgyud): shes pa'i tshogs brgyad la// skye lugs me 'dra rnam pa brgyad// brgyad kyi dpon por gyur pa yin// de skye ba dang dgu zhes bya// de la gzhi dang lam dang ni// 'bras bu dngos po dag tu sprin// gabado sprod bstan pa ni// lha yi ngo sbrid skye ba dgu// nor lha brgyad ces
83a1(rnying rgyud): bya bar skyes// de'i dpon pa dbang phyug can ma b+ha can pa dang das// lhar cig skyes pas snadas pan// wA yi skyes dgram shes nA// g+ha' maspyod pa 'bral mi shes// lha ni mchod thab sam nas na// ga nga du
83a2(rnying rgyud): 'thob mi 'gyur// 'dre ni 'byung po srin po dang // nyi ma zlang khyab 'dzug tshangs pa dang // gshin rje dang ni ma mo dang // sa ya~M lha dang chu g+ha me g+ham+ma ga~M g+ha// ku be dA'i lha dang / 'brog gnas sgra dang / gang ba bzang po lha dang / nor gyi lha brgyad/ don nor gyi lha brgyang
83a3(rnying rgyud): no// lhan cig skyes pa'i 'dre dgu po// de yi bcos thabs ma shes na// bar rjod sel ba'i dus mi mche// de la dang po par dang tham gsum// de gsum po snong ma shes na// rnam rtog rang krol dus mi mche// kye rigs kyi bu b+h+yor nyon la// gsung ba'i steng ga/
83a4(rnying rgyud): gcod ni// skye gzhi'i rdzab mchod na// rgya mtsho'i lha bsrub pa 'dra// skye dgu'i rtsa ba mchod ni// chu gting zla bar rdo brdeg 'dra// dngos po'i skye rgyud mchod na// smyon pa'i lag du sman 'gyed 'dra// gzhi lam skye rgyud gcod pa la// dgang po 'jog po'i nor
83a5(rnying rgyud): bu ltar// dug la mi 'jigs nor bu rnyed pa ltar// dngos po spang dang smyud pa dang // bsgyur dang rang snang yin zer ba// de yi 'bras bu sgrib pa yin// kye rigs kyi bu non cig/ 'gyus ni rang grol zung 'jug med// lha brgyad do sprod de yin no// 'gyus nam
83a6(rnying rgyud): rig bdud du 'byung // 'gyu ba gcig gi rtsad chod na// tshig chod ngo sprod de yin no// gcig po rang grol shes tsam na// lha 'dre dbang du 'dus pas 'byung po thul// mkha' 'gro chos skyod dbang du 'dus pas 'byung po thul// nyag gcig nyams las
83a7(rnying rgyud): grol ba rtog ge'i yul las 'das// mtshon ma sna tshogs rang sar grol bas thig le nyag gcig rang la 'char// lha 'dri gnyis med shar bas dngos grub par tshad med// lha yi skye rgyud chod pas zug rngu dus gcig choms// 'dre yi skye chung chod pas
83b1(rnying rgyud): bar gcod dus gcig ni// bde sdug g+ha rgyud tshad pas labar ba rangs dgrol// thig le rang la shar bas mtha' bzhe dus thag tshad// me rgya gnyis kyi tsha gang bsnyams pas brjo baphrag khang mi ltung // sa dang rlung gnyis mtshan nyid shes pas byed rgod rang sar
83b2(rnying rgyud): grol// mkha' dang 'gru ba'i chos nyid shes pas dgongs pa rnam par dag/ nam shes 'od gsal shes pas bar do tshad las sprul// rig pa ye shes shes pas mkhyen pa'i zhing khams 'cha // thig le ye shes shar bas sangs rgyas dgongs pa shar/
83b3(rnying rgyud): 'grub zang thal shar bas byin rlabs phyogs med 'char// 'gro drug rang sar grol bas sangs rgyas yul med 'char// 'khor ba rang sang grol bas 'gro drug 'khyams sa med// snod bcud phyi nang med pas gzung 'dzin dngas sa med// rig pa 'ongan
83b4(rnying rgyud): shar bas ma rig dngas sa med// shes ra' khor nas shar bas sgrib pa byung ba med// 'gyu bzang thal shar bas las kyi 'kholas med// dug lnga dngas dgrol bas nyon mongs skyes ma med// gzung 'dzin dkar nag grol bas shes bya'i sgrib pa med/
83b5(rnying rgyud): sa / ga su
83b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtsa batshang can// lo ma mi tog 'bras ldan bskam par 'gyur// de bzhin sgrib pa'i rtsa ba yin par shes pA la// 'gyu ba shes pas gong ltar thams cad chod// rtsu ba gcig gi don rtogs na// dper na dzA ta'i sman bzhin du// gang la reg pa sngon
83b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// de bzhin cing snang cir 'grus yang // ye shes dag la 'das pa ni// skad cig tsam yang me sridade// dbang po bsam pa dang sbyar du// 'gru ba gcig po'i spyi khyab yin// khyab pa gcig po'i don shis na// thams cad sangs rgyasadzin

84a2(rnying rgyud): sa skye zhes smra /
