84a4(rnying rgyud): den mi yang dag pa / nis dang man dang dzi
84a5(rnying rgyud): dang pa'i gzhin bstan pa ni// bdu dang rtsadang rig sa dang // rje sbyi 'dus pas 'dus kyi / po shin byung chub sems// dkang dum na nyis po ngas pa las// rtsal brtags dang byed pa sa// tha chu
84a6(rnying rgyud): pa// gdugs dang bad+ma 'khor lo dang // na pa sngags ma dze rtse// gnas pa dang sa pa rgyags rjod// da ni du sa gnas pa'i// / de lapas lar+b+ba ti dang // rgyang mags mdu 'dus// thog sa rgyas pas mngag
84a7(rnying rgyud): gro/ gsum rdzus/ dag pa di nga pa sa mas pa
84b1(rnying rgyud): bya d+ha ti gsum du grags// gdugs lA bu yiHzhes pa// spyi bo bde chen gzhal yas yin// ma ni sum cu rtsa gnyis gnas// mkha' 'gro sasum sa rgya gnyis dang // ye shes rtsa dang thabs dang shes rang rtswa// yon tanam dang rang drud \u0f7f/
84b2(rnying rgyud): rnam pa lnga las gyes pa yin// ye shes rtsa ni dbus nas 'gyu// rang rgyud rtsa yang de la brten// thabs kyi rtsa la cha lnga gnas// gnyis 'gyur mkha' 'gro bcu ru bshad// shes rab rtsa la rno ba lnga ru snang // gnyis 'gyur mkha' 'grob tu ru gnas/
84b3(rnying rgyud): yon tan rtsil rnam pa lnga// gnyis 'gyur mkha' 'gro bcu ru gnas// ye shes mkha' 'gro las 'gro gnyis// sum cu rtsa gnyis gdugs kyi gnas// rma bya mdongs dang bcas pa ltar// rtsa dang mkha' 'byor nga chas yin// mgrin pa longs spyod
84b4(rnying rgyud): pad+ma 'dra// pad+ma can gyi gnas zhes bya// de la rtsa yang bcu drug yod// ye shes thabs dang shes rab rtswa// yon tan rang rgyud rnam lnga'i rtsa// thabs kyi rtsa la mkha' 'gro lnga// shes rab la yang de ltar ro// yon tan la yang de ltar shes/
84b5(rnying rgyud): shes rtsa dang rang rgyud la// mkha' 'gro rnam snang gsal bas ni// de yang rang chas sngags kyi rtswa// snying gA chos kyi 'khor lo ni// byang chub mthas las phug ces bya// de na rtsa bcus khyud mo 'dra ba yi// rtsa yang rnam pa brgyad yod de// ye shes
84b6(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab dang // yon tan dang khyud rtsi brgyad gnas// thabs kyi rnal mkha' 'gro gnyis// lho phyogs shAr gyi rang sa zin// shes rab rtsa la mkha' 'gro gnyis// nub byung gnyis kyi rang sa zin// yon tan rtsa la mkha' 'gro gnyis/
84b7(rnying rgyud): mtshams kyi mkha' 'gro zhes su bshad// ye shes rtsa dang rang rgyud la// skyeng 'og mkhanga' 'gro gnas pa yid// nyi ma mdangs dang chas pa bzhin// rtsa dang mkha' 'gro rang chas yin// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo ni// 'jigs su rung ba'i gnas
85a1(rnying rgyud): du zhes// de yang ga da dam pas shes// de la rtaganas paganas// 'am ma mngon ma 'drab la// 'dzugs su rung gnas gsaH// de yang ga dang 'dab la// thabs kyil mkha' 'gyo /
85a2(rnying rgyud): ba 'a du ba / yan tu nga shin// la gnyis nas te// sa sems / smra/ na dmyal
85a3(rnying rgyud): sma rung ba'i gnas zhes bya// man shel 'od dang chas pa bzhin// cha dang mkha' 'gro rang chas phyir// gsang badzin s+'ud+ma'i // rdo gsum lha nu yod// baN+Di Sh+Ta nan shin tu dkon// de yo mtshan nyid bstun pa ni// mas 'geb zlas se mig
85a4(rnying rgyud): sbyin 'byung// bral ga nan rnams // lkug tu 'khor bar yang pa la// po skad can dang ga dong rdzogs m+b+ha// ba ci lag shing nad 'gos byung // de la dung nan yong bani// mkha' 'grom sa rigs smrab shing // dmas pa bgrang bags pas/
85a5(rnying rgyud): bde ba can gyi gnas zhes bya// g.yas na thabs kyi mkha' 'gro ni// glang po gdong zhes bya ba yod// g.yon na shes rab mkha' 'gro ma// kha la mu kha des pa yod// dbus na ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// srin mo gdong ldan dung can yod// de phyir rdo rje
85a6(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro yin// bde ba bskyed pas ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// bde ba spong bas las kyi mkha' 'gro ma// bde ba zad med rin chen mkha' 'gro ma// bde la ma chags pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma// rang don mthar phyin ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// gzhan don mthar
85a7(rnying rgyud): phyin da ma tshig mkha' 'gro ma// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal zad byed 'jig rten mkha' 'gro ma// dug lnga rang log log 'dren mkha' 'gro ma// spyi bo bde chen gnas pas chos dbyings ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// mgrin par gyon pas bdel skyed byed longs
85b1(rnying rgyud): spyod mkha' 'gro ma// snying gar nyams su myong bas chos skyong mkha' 'gro ma// lte bar bde ba 'khyil bas las kyi mkha' 'gro ma// gsang bar bde ba 'bar byas bde skyong mkha' 'gro ma// nang gi rtsa yi rgyud la mkha' 'gror spyod yin// mkha'
85b2(rnying rgyud): 'gro'i tshogs 'khor smin par byed na de ltar gyis// mchod rdzas dam rtsas mthun rdzas rang chus yin// rnga dang gtor mar klu bdud rtsi rkang gling de ci dgos// mkha' 'gro 'bod pa ci dgos mchod dang bstod ci dgos// tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ci
85b3(rnying rgyud): dgos// 'di ni gsang ba nges pa'i don// zhes gsungs so// 'byung po kun 'dul gyi rgyud las/ gsang ba'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad byang// nyon cheg rdo rje chos kyi blo gros
85b4(rnying rgyud): rtsa yi gnas lugs ngo spyod bstan par bya// pho rtse mo rtsa ma ning rtsa dang tshan po che// de yang gzhi dang lam dang dngos po rnams// de rnams gtan la phab par bya// dang por skye ba 'byung ba ni// dang po lhun grub ma 'gags par// thugs rje 'gag pa med
85b5(rnying rgyud): las// 'grub rlung gis bskyod nas ni// ldan grub rlung chen ma 'gags pas// ma ning rnam pa gsum du 'byung // ma ning rlung gi rtsal drag pas// drag por 'gyis nas 'od la bcad// thig le dkar dmar 'dus pa las// mdzod tshon zhes
85b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtsa ru 'khyi'o// chung ma ri ma kun 'dang ma// de la dngos po'i rtse ru 'byung // dngos po'i rtsa yi snang ba yang // ro rgyang kun 'dar gsum po las// por+N+Na'i sna ni kha la zug nas kha bye bas// zla ba re le mtshan ma // sna yi nang nas 'byung
85b7(rnying rgyud): jig le de la byas pa'i rtse// a wad+ha ti'i nang nas 'byung // bde ba 'byung ba de ltar yin// rdo rje'i rtse mor rtsam du gnas// mo ye shes rab rtsal gyis su// zla mtshan 'dzag ces bya ba yang // thig le a war+N+Na ti nas su 'dzag/ hri
86a1(rnying rgyud): la dmar por kyang nas// sna yi bu ga gnyis nas 'dzag/ zla mtshan zhes kyang de la bya// zla ba re la chub yang // mdzod snga drag tu/ yo bar byed// mgrin par zhag drug par du 'bab// snying dang lte bar de bzhin no//
86a2(rnying rgyud): dngas ma rgyas pa drug tu 'dod// de bas me 'byung rang dbang med// de nas sna r+ya 'byung ba yang // rdo rgyad gnyis nas byung ba yin// de nyid med par skur pa nA// thabs dang shes rab brtenas med// gzhi ni ngo bo thugs rje'o// lam ni rig dang ma rig
86a3(rnying rgyud): snang // rags pa 'gyu ba 'od du'o// dngos po thabs dang shes rab rtsa// de gsum 'dus pa d+hA ti yin// de la 'khor lo rnam pa lnga// spyi bo bde ba chen po na// thig le dkar dmar 'dzag pa ni// haM kha thur du bltas pa yin// ha ni phrin las ldang
86a4(rnying rgyud): gu'i mdog/ da ni rang byung thig le yin// zhag drug bar du rtsa rnams bskor// des na bde chen 'khor lo yin// 'khor lo dar dang ldan pa bzhin// bde ba'i dar gyis rtsa rnams gso// bde ba skye ba de ltar yin// de bzhin 'khor lo bzhi rnams
86a5(rnying rgyud): la// re mos re mos 'khor bas na// 'khor lo lnga zhes brjod pa yin// gsang ba'i rtsa yi gnad med na// bde chen ye shes ngos mi zin// thig les rtsa rnams ma brgyan zhing // 'khor lo bzhin du mi bskor na// rtsa rnams thams cad sdong skam
86a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// rtsa rnams bskam par gyur pa na// 'chi ba zhes ni brjod pa yin// thig le'i gnad dang dus mi myong // skor zlog mi btu 'gyur pa na// 'chi ba'i rtags su bshad pa yin// pho ni gsal ba shas che bas// pho rtswa zhes ni brjod pa yin// de la
86a7(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi rtsa zhes brjod// mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la snang // mo ni thugs rje shas che bas// mo rtse zhes ni brjod pa yin// shes rab rang bzhin bud med yin// rak+ta 'bab ring zang thal yod// mtshan ldan bud med
86b1(rnying rgyud): ces byab// byang chub sems ma rnams la snang // yid 'ong mdzes ma'i mdog ldan ma// yang 'ong mdzes pa'i gzugs 'chang yin// zhes gsungs so// mning ma ning zhes bya ba// rtsa gnyis la na bsnol ba las// mnang mtshan ma
86b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis dang ldan// thugs rje me 'gag dang po'i gzhi// bar du ma ning rtswa 'u byung // tha ma dngos su ma ning ngo // ma ning chen po che yang de ltar shes// pho mo rgod ldan rtsa mi ro rgyang gnad// ro rgyang kha 'phel 'grib pa 'byung // desra na pho mor
86b3(rnying rgyud): byung ba yang // rtswa yi srid mtha' mi khegs pas// de lta bu ru 'byung ba yin// ri dwags lta bu'i slad dang ni// glang po lta bu'i skad 'byung bas// pho rtse mo rtsa'i mtshan nyid ces// gnyis 'dzom pas ni snyoms pa yin// byis pa mi tsho mar 'byung
86b4(rnying rgyud): ba yang // zla mtshan dus myur gnyis 'doms pas// gyis pa mtshe mar 'byung ba yin// skye bsdu phyir 'byung ba yang // rlung dang theg le'i rtsal stobs yin// mkhas pa thabs dang ldan pa yang // thabs kyi rtsan shas che yin// rtogs pa shes rab
86b5(rnying rgyud): ba yang // shes rab rtsa ni shas che yin// dbang po tha mar gyur pa yang // rtsa gnyis yod kyang tshe chung yin// gti mug che zhing 'dod chags chung // zhe sdang chung ba'i mo rnams ni// mig nag 'dril kyang mi shes par// gyen la ldog cing blta ba ni// glen pa
86b6(rnying rgyud): glang zhes su brjod// gnyis 'doms pa yi rtags bstan pa// spyan mig dmar la hrig chags na// 'dod chags che zhing zhe sdang 'bar// shes pa gsal zhing myur por ste// dbang po rab kyi rtags yin te// lhag rtsa mig la rgyas pa dang // mig ni dmar
86b7(rnying rgyud): zhing phred pa dang // bcud na pho rog khu 'phrig ltar// thig chags 'phrul shes spyod lam drag/ dbang po rab kyi gang zag yin pa'i phyir// shes pa dpa zhing 'jam por sgra// sman mig dkar nag pyid pa la// thad kar blta zhing ni sems tshul// 'bral bar
87a1(rnying rgyud): na rgyu sa na mas sa na sa/ pa ga samanas na/ na na na
87a2(rnying rgyud): cad longs spyod pas// padz+ra can gyi gnas zhes bya// snying gachos kyi 'khor lo gnas// de ru thams cad kyil tshogs pas/ byang chung mtha' yas phrag ces bya// lte bar thams cad sprul pas na// 'jigs su rung ba'i phyag ces bya// ngan 'gror 'grob/
87a3(rnying rgyud): skye bung zhes kyang bya// gsang ba mkha' 'gro dngos su byon// byon nas bde ba bskyed pas na// de ba can gyi gnas zhes bya// de ni shar phyogs mngon par dka' ba'i tshal dang // lho phyogs yangs pa can gyi gnas// nub phyogs byang chub mtha' yas kyi du
87a4(rnying rgyud): dang // byang phyogs 'jigs su rung ba'i skye bung gnas// dbus phyogs bde ba chen po'i gnas zhes bya'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro rin chen mkha' 'gro dang // pad+ma mapa' 'gro las kyi mkha' 'gro dang // dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro thams cad 'du// rnal 'byor
87a5(rnying rgyud): pa des thams cad dbang // des na rnal 'byor dbang phyug yin// zhes gsungs so// 'byung po kun 'dul gyi rgyud las/ rtswa'i mtshan nyid la ngo spyad pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad b+ha ba// nyon \u0f7fga rdo rje chos kyi
87a6(rnying rgyud): khyod// rtsa rnams de dag thams cad kyi// rdo sprod mdor bsdus bstan par bya// gzhi rtsa lnga li ngo sprod pa// rang bzhin ngo bo zhugs rje rgyun// yon tad phrin las gnyis kyirtsa// rtsa lnga'i gzhi rtsa ma shes na// 'khor lo lnga yi rgya bachod mi 'gyur// de
87a7(rnying rgyud): be mchod na// bde bangs 'dzin dngos par spyang // zag parkyen gyi rgya zhes bya// bdeb zag pas zag ces bya// a war+d+hatAM'i mtshan nyid ni// srog pa rtsa laM 'ogan myod // yang la tshangs pa mar la gsang ba'i gnas// ma na sgra lcag 'azung ba tsam
87b1(rnying rgyud): smras pa nga snang bar snang // gan gyi brtags pas na sa bzud// kun brtags nga nas byu \u0f7f// 'grus rba tu'i nang // kunan can mas byams cad dan// brtags pa sa spyang // kun brtags myong 'o/
87b2(rnying rgyud): nAM awa trail// brtags pasad+d+ha d+hi nang spyong pa// gan ba rtags stong de skyong ba dang // dbugs ni nang sgod mi r+g+ha ste// shes pa s+yA mam+ba ti rjod// dzA N+DI stong pa rnam mkha' yin// shes pa stong por brtsegs pa pa// / nam mkha' shes pa/ 'a
87b3(rnying rgyud): rtog pa med cing spyod pa med// sgrib med cing brjod du med// rab tu mi gnas lta ba yin// de yang brtan par mi gyur na// so sor bsdus te brten par bya// shes pa a wa d+hA tIH// yang zang mar zad sbyangs byas la// tshangs pa'i bu ga'i thad ka la// nam
87b4(rnying rgyud): mkha'i rang bzhin stong par shes// shes ba d+hU ti'i nang gnas stong // mkha' la 'phangs pas 'dres pa ni// dang po so sor shes pa la// de las 'phang bas bsdus pa yin// nam mkha'i ngang du rnam rtog 'phyang // nam mkha' lta bur brjod du med
87b5(rnying rgyud): so sor sdud ces bya ba yin// de ltar 'phen pas bsam gtan te// 'du shes chad pas srog rtsol chod// rtsol chod dbu ma'i lta ba yin// gnyis ma grub pas dbus ma yin// zhes gsungs so// 'byung po kun 'dul gyi rgyud las/ rtsa'i stongar
87b6(rnying rgyud): dang rtog pa'i kun brtags nam mkha' dang bse ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// rtsa chud bsam gyis mi khyab par// thabs lam bsam gyis mi khyab ste// zag bcas chags
87b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i lam dang ni// de nyid grol ba'i lam du 'dus// grol ba'i 'bras bu khyad par che// theg pa dang gzhung grol ba dang // mthar thug pa yi grol ba gnyis// ming tsam 'dra ste don las 'phags// 'phags pa kun dga' shAka du ba ltar// 'khor dang ston pa'i
88a1(rnying rgyud): !/ / byud par yod// de phyir zag bcas rnyag myadaH// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i khyad par yod// dado na ma rtogs a la nyams shing byar yang // thar pa'i lam can podun pa 'phang bya'i lam du zhugs// lam 'dang grag sang rnams rgyas
88a2(rnying rgyud): zag med 'bras bu thog// gzhi'iHlnga ldan gyi sa grub// lam du de nyid rtogs pa mchog/ 'bras bur du kri pa b+hag med de// rtsa rnams ma badz+ra la rdzogs pas na// rdzogs pa chen po'i rtswarlung rdzogs// rdzogs nas lam byed mi 'ag te// gzhi dang dngas po
88a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis su shes// de yi ldog rgyas skyon mi 'byung // thob pa'i gzhi dang grol ba dngos// rdog pa'i gzhi dang rdzogs pa dngos// lam gyi gzhi dang lam dngos dang // 'bras bu'i gzhi deng 'bras tha'i dngos// 'bras bu la yang rnam pa gsum// ngan 'a/
88a4(rnying rgyud): mtho ris 'dren pa gsum// longs su sems dpa' thub pa drug/ 'byas bu'i sku gsum grub mtha' theg pa gsum// de yi gzhi lam 'bras bu rnams// rtag pa rab tu gces pas ngo sprod garjes// gab pa mngon du phyung nas bshad pa 'di// 'bras
88a5(rnying rgyud): bul ma dang gzhi gsum mo// khyad par sgra mthun don las 'phags// dngos gzhi gnyis kyi ral med na// lag rdum thag la 'jog pa 'dra// 'bras bur dgrol gnad med na// bye ma'i sgrol mkhar brtsig 'dra// lam gyi sa mdzams ma shes na// khas
88a6(rnying rgyud): drag khyo bsad sngon na tu// de yi gnad dang log non ma shes na// bas sbas kye tshad bcas pa 'dra// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le gsum// mtshan nyid 'dzin pa re re la// kun dang rgyam chad pa yin// de ltar gzhi lam 'bras bu yang // mtshan nyid 'dzin pa rangs
88a7(rnying rgyud): la// rgya mched brim rdzogs pa yid// gzhi rtsa lnga yi gnad shes pas// rtsa lde 'ang sprod byas tsan// srin brtags stong re dus gcig 'byongs// drung lnga'i ngo spod ga dang ldan pas// shes pa a la tra nying chud// thig khror sdod byis pa yas/
88b1(rnying rgyud): shes pa bad brdzun por bal// ye shes pa stod byas pa los// rnam pa pa 'ing du ma stog 'byung // D+ha ba rnam pa na dbyung gling byung // lhan cigs dang 'dus byas smras// sa pa zla mthan 'ad las 'gas// da ltar shes nas gtan pa dang /
88b2(rnying rgyud): 'dus byas pa yi bas ma gtan gnyis// bsam ga tan ska mthun byed par te// mthon nyid so sor rgya la snang dang // tha bral so sor mal sdang dang // so song sprod kyang por che// gcig tu ga na rdzogs pa dang // phyogs na chog ra
88b3(rnying rgyud): nyag gcig sgra mthun kyad par gyi// zhes gsungs so// 'byung po kun 'dul gyi b+h+yad mas/ 6 snod kyi le'u ste btu dag pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ chos kyi sa nyon// theg pa'i gzhi dang la mardzogs pas/
88b4(rnying rgyud): 'bral bamathun rnams// mdor bskyes bdag gas brjodan pa de/ 'grob dza ma gas pas/ rjes dag med lta ba mdzan// dbugs la mi ga ni sa mdzad// rag pa ngogs la thaMng pa 'i// sems tsam pa da lta ba mthan/ @
88b5(rnying rgyud): grol bas grolas med// rang bzhin stong par nga spad pas// dbu ma pa dang lba ba man+ta// sgyu mar mi 'dod golas med// gnyis su med par 'bras bu mthur// grangs med dus mo smos pas gol sa med// snga ma'i dpe brgyad mi ba sdug byed pa dang bdas
88b6(rnying rgyud): dathong bzhir thugs rje gsum// trail ba dang khyer stso ma than// rigs gsum me zin mo groms med// khyod glid me dgos byung pa 'phags// ngos ma sogs lnga dang ldan// phyog pa dang lta ba mdzun// byang nub sngal mams gams mar
88b7(rnying rgyud): lnga me bsrub byed par 'phags// chos lnga dag dang ldan pa'i// mthu log dag dang mdzang // rigs mi bskyed ga las med// cho ga rnam gsum mi las khyad par 'phags// dpo nga bzhin thugs rje gsum// a rub dang lce ba mdzud/
89a1(rnying rgyud): sasu / ga rdzu / na // // da sa // u
89a2(rnying rgyud): mdang zad par 'gags// ma na mnam ma da// sdug sa gas pal pas pa gsapadasadangs / /
89a3(rnying rgyud): pa dang lha sa mthun// bag pa med pas golas med// spyan cig rtogs pas ltung par 'phags// thams cad nam cad par shes// rdzogs rim pa dang sbyi mthun// phyogs rdzogs mi bsgra pagalas med// mdzan pa dang ga brgyad par 'chags/
89a4(rnying rgyud): zung 'jug pa dang sa man// gnyis su med pa zang byer bamigs// dzAs las 'dus pagoms dang // thams cad mdzad pas byang pa dgas// sa med pa 'i sa pangan// sanamasamams ca dang ldan// me bzod pas namams da /
89a5(rnying rgyud): sernam sa dang thal mad pa 'dugasalam pa dang sa // chung gos pas gams da/ na pa 'gyug// sa pas da dang / mam ma ma / dang thal ma ca
89a6(rnying rgyud): shA ma shA/ ga pa shA 'das byu ba na// ngan 'dul gyu byung maci// zhes gsums// dzin sa/ rdzogs grags pa pa'i 'du bcwa dun pa danas yang dag
89a7(rnying rgyud): bkod byug/ mas sa kyad// dri// sum da bad pa// dang se 'ab sa dang yid pa rdzogs pa / kyang slong bcaganyisas// ga pa na// dayang gyu
89b1(rnying rgyud): rnam pa zhi dag gis// kha rkyang nar ba'i galas bsal// tams gling rnam pa bzhi dag gis// nyams kyis 'chang ba'i galas bcang // gzer chen ban yang sbed kyis// glang blang 'du 'brul golas bcad// dmar lding gsar khrid laka lan 'di// [ऽ]
89b2(rnying rgyud): pa dbang dang gzer lta bu// 'di 'dra bstan pa'i sdod re nyung // chos 'drid bsre 'tshong tshul 'o mas bslang// e maho shin tu bstan par dka'// dka' bas snod tu dgab pa yin// gzung 'dzin gnyis med do sprad de// de yi dpe yi ngo sprad gces// 'khrul
89b3(rnying rgyud): mig gis lhas pa'i tshe// zla ba gnyis su snang ba ltar// brtags pas gnyis su med par mthong // de bzhin 'khrul pa'i gzung 'dzin yang // bltas pas gnyis su med par shar// gzung 'dzin gnyis med do sprang ngo do// ma rig pa yi ye shes su ngo sprad pa ni/
89b4(rnying rgyud): de yi dpe yi ngo skad ni// dper na lteng ka'i zla ba rnams// yang dag don la dngos su med// mkha' zla gcig tu shes pa ltar// ma rig bltas pas dngos po med// blta thabs mkhas pas shes par bya// 'gyeb ye shes ngo sprad pa// dper na smig rgyu
89b5(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs kyang // yang dag don la rang bzhin med// de bzhin 'gru ba sna tshogs kyang // bltas pas dngos po med par shar// shes rab yid la ngo sprod pa// de yi dpe yi ngo sprad pas// brag cha lta bur gang byas 'char// yid la ngo skad sku gsum 'char//
89b6(rnying rgyud): de don ngo sprod rnam bzhi yin// rten gyi gsang ba sprod pa// de yi dpe yi ngo sprod rgya mtsho 'dra// rtags kyang lba ba lta bu'o// don gyi ngo sprod rtsa gnyis la// rtags ni phyi 'gyu nang 'gyu'o// don ni 'grub rang dngas so// de ni nyams len ngo rnyed yin//
89b7(rnying rgyud): nyams la chags pas 'khor ya na// dus bzhi mnyam sbyor gzer gdang ste// 'gyu ba'i dus na rang ngo shes// bltas pa'i dus na 'grub dang // dper na rdo ta'i sman bzhin du// 'grub thams cad sangs rgyas yin// mthong ba'i dus na dgongs pa shar/
90a1(rnying rgyud): ldan gyis grub par stan ltar shing // da yongs na gzung 'dzin dang // nam mkha' dngas bstarban// sbyang bas 'das dang spyad sa tshan// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gangs pa yin// can mnam par dang gsum/
90a2(rnying rgyud): de yi dgongs pa bstan pa yin// skal ldan rnams yi na gzhan gyis thos pa r+ya dka'// 'di na thos cang don phyaganas padaka // 'di din bstan yang dam tshig bsrung badruga'// 'didon stan yang ga bzhin rtogs pa dka'// dka' bas bskru
90a3(rnying rgyud): tshong bas s+ho// nyams sa khyen pa'i gang shAg mag gas // 'dod dgas pas gas sngags kyi pa yi// / 'did nathags ga nas pa// rdo rjes sa ga// gis rdzogs rgyal pamathunan cheng // zhamags hA/
90a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung po na 'dul gyi rgyud las srid dam mid kyi leng+ge ba ma rnaMde nas yang dag shad sa kyi sa na/ stong bsdus pa brtan pa da // sathabs gcig gis pan mthong bas// dang
90a5(rnying rgyud): 'og gung khyim ltar// ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs par mthong // theg pa'i dang gzhung thams cad rdzogs// ches rnams dang rang gi mtshan nyid kyang // dris gcig blo 'digs ched pa yid// lha thabs gcig gis thams cad mthong // mkha'
90a6(rnying rgyud): mthong ba ltar// 'gro ba rigs drug 'khrul pa mthong // ma rig pa pa spro 'dogs chod// lha thabs gcig gis thams cad mthong // dper na long bzhin bstan ltar// sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i mtshan nyid mthong // phyi nang tshwa 'dogs dus ga
90a7(rnying rgyud): skyababs gcig gis thams cad mthong // rin chen chen zhal bstan pa skyed// phyen rjod brgyad dang grol shang // 'bras pa blo dogs dus gcig tshad// brji rtags su // dag nas// gnas pa mngang bsdus gnyis las meng //
90b1(rnying rgyud): ma su na smras sa
90b2(rnying rgyud): sa sa
90b3(rnying rgyud): sa'angs pa'i ngas/ rnams rlung la byung ba na/ na/ ngas nga byung bathams ca du/
90b4(rnying rgyud): smrabs
90b5(rnying rgyud): da/ na cig sa sa ga sa
90b6(rnying rgyud): sa su sugasu su
91a1(rnying rgyud): bskur bas// 'byung po kun gyi blon po yin// de la spyod mabyas na// 'byung ba kun tshoms shin tu dka'// 'byung bya tshoms par mgyur na// ra snyoms 'byung ba shin tu dka'// ngom snyoms par gyur pa na// sa
91a2(rnying rgyud): rgyas dgongs pa'i don mi mthong // 'dre rnams thams cad 'dul byed na// 'dre gcig rtsa ba mchod na// thams cad 'dul bas ga la lang // gcig chod pas ni tham la cad chod// dper na dral gri kha mang gis// lag pa'i ma khrig mchod tsam na// sor
91a3(rnying rgyud): mo lnga po bcad mi dgos// 'byung po'i rgyal po sod tsan// 'byung po thams cad song ba yin// rtsa yi rgyal po srog pa rtsa// srog pa rtsa de mchod na// rtsa bran chod kyang mi 'chi zhing // rtsa chen chod pas 'chi bar 'gyur// ro rnams bsnyam pas mi snyoms te// 'byung po gcig la ro bsnyam na//
91a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma lus bsnyams pa yin// 'byung po rnam rtog lha dang 'dre// pa nyams ro snyoms tshad dang ldan// 'bras bu gdeng dang ldan par gyis// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le rnams// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu la// ro ltoms ro ma snyoms pa dang //
91a5(rnying rgyud): tshad dang dbang po 'bras bu rnams// nges shes gdeng / dang ldan par gyis// nad la rnam pa mang yang ni// rgas byed 'dre dang 'byung 'khrugs na de// rnam smin rkyen gyur 'chi ba'i nad// de yi ro snyoms tshad dang ldan// 'bras bu des shes gdeng
91a6(rnying rgyud): ldan par gyis// 'brel bsam gyis mi khyab ste// rtog 'dra 'byung 'dre stod kyi 'dre// mi 'dre dang ni rnam pa bzhi// de yi ro snyoms ro snyoms tshad// 'bras bu nges shes gdeng dang dbang po med gyur na// rnal 'byor don dang ldan zhes bya ba shin tu dka
91a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad mnang gango sbed 'di ru 'dus pa yin// sangs rgyas pa dang de yi thugs rje yang // 'di ni ma rtogs gdeng dang mi ldan gyis// 'bras bu gdeng rnyed 'di ru shes par gyis// shes pas 'khor bar skye ba'i kun rnams bcad// de ltar shes na la
91b1(rnying rgyud): bdud nas sgrugs// sangs// mas zlas mas pa da pa nan// khyod gsum byung ga spyong pa lda nag/ sa sa ga/ rlung po na du ba du'as/ gdusas ngas thuban/
91b2(rnying rgyud): de nas yang dge bgang thub// rgyas kyi zlun nyon// 'du mas cad/ ni rdzas rgyal na / thams cad rdzogs pa'i sagazhi // sems cad 'asgrub byad shA// ldan sta
91b3(rnying rgyud): 'gags pas// dgra ba'i sdig tu grub pa yon// rang srung 'od du mthong ba yin// bgacugs chags sna rdza tha~M // mthong zhings 'bru ba'i stan la bris// kun bzang pos mthong ba ni// dus panamanyam spyad sangs rgyas dgangs pa da/
91b4(rnying rgyud): 'das pa lnga yi thig la y-i shes kyi// grong du gang nas gzhil 'bras bu mkhyen// lhag mthong rig pa'i ye shes pa 'od byeng ltar gas la// gsol ba rjing thal 'di la blta shes na// sangs rgyas dgongs brtags pas dgangs pa mngan sum dgyur/
91b5(rnying rgyud): de li dus na gzhilam mo song bsan patsam// de la ma brtan rtogs thob 'byung ba med// de las thugs rnas ta ma 'di bzhin 'char// don dgongs pasngags nas thugs bsrud // kha snga ba zhabs rdal drug can gzhags dal la 'ang /
91b6(rnying rgyud): rlabs 'byung bas byin rlapas kyang du bshad// khams gsum 'khrul pa ma shes ma rig pa// 'brub grogagis song gsum bltas pas lan// bgru banyes pas myig sman zhag gis rjod// dper nanas mkha' zhag rigs tshad pa wang // @
91b7(rnying rgyud): pa 'od kyis tshad pas sangs kyis sbyin ma gsal// 'od lus yid lus sha khrag lus su tshad // gnas dang mtshad lung du bsta pa med// dge sdig las kyi 'bras bu so song shar ba med// las dang 'bras bu rnam smin grub nas skal ba med// dbus pa /
92a1(rnying rgyud): na tu na du rgyun du rdzu sa na ga tu na rgyu tu smra tu
92a2(rnying rgyud): na nan su sa
92a3(rnying rgyud): nan na
92b1(rnying rgyud): su na na// dag su sa mu na/ // su / so//
92b2(rnying rgyud): gad pa'i dbang pa yin// mithongs tshig byi ba dang // za ma'i di skad yi na par shes// chos mthun pa sgribabyud pa ba stan// ngabags la gdangs 'gyur ba med// rlung la 'gag pa med pa yin// des chog sathong snang pa 'gag slob/
92b3(rnying rgyud): gzhi la 'dus pa // 'as ldan 'ardas gsas// 'phrul ba bag gas nag / 'dus skye ma'i lhan sbya nga // pa po shes phyog ming ldan// snyun bya nagangag zhi'i byad// bya ba
92b4(rnying rgyud): rlung kyi bra zhes pa'o// sbyin kyang pan nyim man 'o// shel wA gas pa dang wA gyis 'o// rnyed 'i sring do ma // bad+ma byed dang byu pa/ nyi mdang srid thams cad la// da pa spyod pas thaM
92b5(rnying rgyud): sna sa rgyas/ sa khri'i ba sa nga/ / na sa dang
92b6(rnying rgyud): byas sa yin pa dun gas du// kung+gA lags 'as
92b7(rnying rgyud): dang // gzung kyi tsu na seM tha bar mabyu// ngas pa ba'i nga gang / dran pa'i sa tshom ngas bya'o// bdung sa nga kyi / dran pa 'dug sa rje byi nu pa pa da/
93a1(rnying rgyud): na slad dun na na /
93a2(rnying rgyud): snang byas// dbu ma rab tu ma gnas pado// brgya dag nas ca pa dgags/ sa snang pa sno pa sa// sapas mdag ris rgya par phyags// 'gru ba tsham med pa dbyal bas// thig partagag dan ma
93a3(rnying rgyud): ci dag khyad par 'phags/ na pa tsun bye sa gapa rji pa sa ts+li'i/ sa kyi rlabs kyi byeng bas// rdzogs rdzun galas kyang byung byubags/
93a4(rnying rgyud): lcags rgya mcho la bzla yin// de mas de ltar da ma rtogs// de ma rtogs pas dam pa// de ma rig pas lta ma byin/ de 'du les 'byung // snron da drang da ltar rnams// de bzhin de dang da rang thog// du ma
93a5(rnying rgyud): da ltar snang // da'i 'khrul bu m+b+ha shas// de shes pas ni gal pa byed// dbang de ltu bgyu/ rnam gas khri khri'i slo/ la dmigs pa me thabs// de ma tshad dang de lam grags// dal mi 'khar ra
93a6(rnying rgyud): dpung med// de la shes na de yi log non de// de yang rtsol ba de yi na dang grol// de ltar thabs bstan der shes pas// zag pa kye ma chong ngo spyod yin// 'khor lo bskor lugs rnam pa gsum// snang ba tshigs drug 'byung ba gsum//
93a7(rnying rgyud): dani d+hi yi 'khor lo yin// sha dang gyi dang rus pa la// 'khor lo rnam pa gsum yang bskor// shal 'khor lo bskor shes na// sbrul srung dngos su 'byung bar 'gyur// de la'ang bskor ba rnam pa lnga// de ye log gnon shes par bya/
93b1(rnying rgyud): rtsal 'khor lo bskor shes na// longs su'i dgongs tshad 'char bar 'gyur// de la de bzhin de ltar ro// rus pa'i 'khor lo bskor shes na// chos sku mngon du 'byung bar 'gyur// de la da ltar rim bzhin no// dbyer med rang byung 'ja
93b2(rnying rgyud): lo bskor// sgra gsum rang grol dgongs pa 'char// lta ba chos sgra mi mthong te// de dgongs 'char ba'i gnad med na// zla ba mtshon nas bstan pa bzhin// yul can dag las ma shar ro// de la gnas pa a re lakhram// ra shAr
93b3(rnying rgyud): lta ba'i gdeng mi rnyed// ceste gsungs so// 'byung po kun 'dul gyi rgyud las/ theg pa rgya mtsho la blo dang 'od gsal gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad b+hA ba// rdo rje chos kyi blo gros
93b4(rnying rgyud): ma la na na// dedags pa lab rgyun // rnams nga byu d+d+ha // 'don cid dang yin pa yin/ ngas snang bangs yin// rmugs pa pa du / rigs pa phyir teklags
93b5(rnying rgyud): 'dra// zang thal 'gro te thog dang 'dra// reg pa dang drags 'khor lo 'dra// dmigs pa sta rdo spa gr-i 'dra// 'grub na drag skar mda' 'dra// 'od gsal byin ni nyi ma 'dra// dmigs pargya chenam mkha' 'dra// dgongs pa gteng zab rgya mtsho 'dra//
93b6(rnying rgyud): nyams len brtan drags gangs ri 'dra// dgongs pa don zab za 'og gur khyim 'dra// su gsum lam bde nyi shar 'dra// de ltar ma rtogs skyon bstan pa// ma rig mun nag 'thib pa 'dra// 'grub ce spyang lag pa 'dra// gzung 'dzin gangs la/
93b7(rnying rgyud): babs 'dra// bag chags rgya mtsho'i gnyer ma 'dra// dug ldan gas la me shor 'dra// dgra gnyen gram pa'i rdo dang 'dra// chags sdang lam ka'i mgron po 'dra// 'khrul pa gzi lum bzlas pa 'dra// 'khor bzo chu'i khyad mo 'dra// 'gro 'dug
94a1(rnying rgyud): ming pa skye khya bas 'dra// sdug bsnga latshong pa 'dzes pa 'ang// rnam rtag cad dus lam 'dra// 'dad pa bla sha'i 'om 'dra// chags pa byul bla mar shAn 'du// snang ba mam gyi dgra dang 'dra// rnam rtag srog su gas
94a2(rnying rgyud): 'dra// de rtseng spyad shes gyur na// rdzogs pa chen po lamachen yin// zhes gsungs so// 'byung po kun 'dul gyi rgyud las/ 'od gsal 'gor ma phyir zlog nang zlog gi le'u ste nye bzhi pa'i// nas yang dag
94a3(rnying rgyud): pa// rdo rje chos kyi blo gros nyon// dran pa bzhi yis ma brgyan na// 'od gsal 'khor lo bskor ba dka'// de phyir dran pa'i thag pas gdags// mchog pas ni bskor thabs med// des na dran pa'i zag pas gdags// de la ngo sprod bstan par bya//
94a4(rnying rgyud): da lta bar do gnyis su bstan// man shel me long gnyis po la// bzhi la rgyu rkyen 'bras bu gzhi// da ltar bar do sbyar la bstan// thugs rje'i 'byung lugs ngo sprad bstan// da lta rang la ngo ldang na// snying dang mgrin pa mig dang gsum// chos
94a5(rnying rgyud): longs sku sbrul sku gsum// sku re la'ang gsum gsum bstan// thugs rje yas babs sku gsum dang // nga log sku gsum shes par bya// rab la bar do med pa yang // dus bzhi mnyam sbyor dgongs pa yin// bar dor sku gsum dran par 'gyur//
94a6(rnying rgyud): 'od dang 'gyu ba yid dang gsum// dgu phrug shes pa ngo sprod do// de yis grol bar 'gyur ba yin// de las grol nas shar ba ni// mchog gi sku gsum zhes su bshad// de yi spong ma shes na// gdams pa bstan pa skyon du 'gyur// thugs
94a7(rnying rgyud): rje 'byung bar ma shes na// nyi ma 'od dang bral ba ltar// gzugs sku gnyis po 'char mi 'gyur// gzugs sku gnyis po ma shar na// 'gro drug ston pa gang las 'byung // 'du dus thim dus 'char dus dang // de gnyis grol bar 'dus dang bzhi
94b1(rnying rgyud): de bzhi'i sa mtshams ma shes na// sangs rgyas dus tshad shes pa dka'// mar gyi dus bzhi yar gyi bzhi// bar rdo'i so mtshams ma shes na// 'khor ba'i 'gromathang dras tshod dka'// 'dre dus zi ma dus 'cha dus dang thal dus// 'dungs
94b2(rnying rgyud): dus 'chang dus lus 'jug dus// 'dra 'dra 'dra ston ras che// des na brtag pa rab tu dka'// 'khor ba tsam du sgra mthun yang // rgyu dang dkar nag 'bras thu bzhi// de mo so mtshams byed par che// ldes bo tsam du sgo mthun te// 'dug
94b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i lus la khyad par che// 'bras bu tsam du sgra mthun ste// lung du bstan dang lung ma bstan// de yi 'bras bu khyad par me// zhes gsungs so// 'byung po kun 'dul gyi rgyud las/ jo skrod bsdus te bstan pa sgra gsumango sprod kyi le 'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//
94b4(rnying rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rje chos sna gro gros nyon// ji skad gtan nas gnas pa dang // de yaM ngo stod ma byas pa// 'chi ba zhes bya kun la 'byung // lus dang 'pho ba zhes byab// de yi mdor bsdus bshad par bya// 'chi ba rnam pa bzhi dag las// rgas na
94b5(rnying rgyud): thug nas 'chi ba dang // 'dus pa'i nad kyis 'chi ba dang // bar chad gdon gyis 'chi ba dang // las kyi rnam par smin pas 'chi// rlung yang lha bcu rtsa lnga yin// brtag pa yin par shes par bya// de la rlung gi mtshan nyid kyang // ngo bo dbye ba nges tshig/
94b6(rnying rgyud): dang / kha dog dang ni gnas pa dang // rgyu ba'i dus chod bstan pa'o// ngo bo g.yo zhing mi 'gag pa// nges pa'i tshig ni 'degs bskyod do// dbye ba rgyu dang 'jug gnas so// de ni dngos po'i drung du shes// gang+gA yi rlung dang 'bras bu'i rlung //
94b7(rnying rgyud): ngeng 'dir 'chi gyis 'bras bur bshad// rtsu ba la yang rnam pa gsum// gyen tu zung sel thad kar b+ha// khyab par gnas pa'i rlung dang wa// thugs rje bakhrag dang drod 'bebs dang // thur dris la byed g.yo ba'i rlung // rtsa ba'i rlung lnga zhes su
95a1(rnying rgyud): bshad// 'dun d+hA dag lda m+b+has// ma sgyur grug pa sa// sang+ya sa ba gran na// d+ha na na spyod// thugs / rtsub ga dang /

95a3(rnying rgyud): pa padag sa napas / sa
95a4(rnying rgyud): bskal pa 'byung bar 'gyur // hA rAg gnyis dbugs med pas// mjug ta rlung gis 'jog pa yin// mthil bzhir drod dang 'dags 'arjod bde// gling ldan pazhi bu'i rig pa y-in// 'am ba brgyad cig g+sa rlas// thing gi log 'jig

95a6(rnying rgyud): pa de ltar yin// mig gnyis khong du nub pa yis// nyi zla rlab pa de ltar yin// gzhud pa srog pa'i cha med pa// dgra tshigs nam mkhar med pa yin// tshogs brgyad med pas gza' bgyad med// skasgal tshigs rtsa brgyad ya bral bas/
95a7(rnying rgyud): sgyu skar rgya ba kyang chub pa yin// rig po med pas rgyal po med// yid 'dug med pas zin po med// dug sde med pas 'khor dang de sangs rnams med// snod// rgyad 'jig pa de par yin// des ni 'ang dus ci pangs dang // 'chang ngas 'ji
95b1(rnying rgyud): dru na// bral ba'i dus dang blad nams// 'dir na rgyas par bshad pa yon// zar ma'i martag ma yal lam/ spang ba'i mthar shAg ma chad dam// na ma yang 'am byung dug// stong rnal gangs ga tu 'gas pa mdag//
95b2(rnying rgyud): skye ga pa'i ma pa ma / blugs can mtha' gas pa ma nad ngam// kun la dag ci'i namamanar // rgyam tsha bas da sa// kyi mye da da brtsal la// dang+yasan la rnams
95b3(rnying rgyud): nas/ gar chang 'thung naser ro // rgyal po gnyid log lta bur gyur te/ zhag gsum du brgyal zhing 'dug par gyur to// de nas bud med 'am de 'i rgyal sangs tsam na/ rmi lam rnam pA gsum rmis par gyur to// de'i tsho de snang gi dus na/ den
95b4(rnying rgyud): marnams sbyar mal ma dang // 'khrul pa 'bru' du la ma dang // ye shes rab snang ga da po pa// nam s+t+rai la gas ma la mkhas pa'o// tshul ba thar blan la bral was// rnam gro sa 'i pa'i banyid// legs par mye du 'di sa dngaH/
95b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis kA rnam par sel// grol ba thar pa rnam grol mchog/ rnam par grol ba mkhas pa'i mchog/ mchog gi 'bras bu bstan pa yin// ces gsungs so// 'byung po kun 'dul gyi rgyud las// 'chi rtsis dang rdo sprod de lta bar rdor ro nya mas
95b6(rnying rgyud): dza snod kyi le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya // rdo rje chos kyi blo gros nyon// de las thugs rje sbal pa ni// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'byung // thams cad mkhyen pa'i stan ldan pas// las da
95b7(rnying rgyud): gro nga mthung ba dang // 'bru shag las kyi 'khor lo 'dus// gaslabs ma lus zhe kyad 'gyur/ la zungs pa gnong med ni// thams cad rtag chad gol bar rgyu// kye rgyal ba'i sras pa lus nas // 'ad lus yi

96b1(rnying rgyud): bshad byu // rdordo chos bya mams tan// drug pa sgyu du dadagamatsha da // lamadu drug myong la ma tha bshad// tshogs dang sto dang mthong ba dang // brnam pa dang nimang spyod pa// nyan pas tshogs sus 'du na// sa brgya lta ba tshogs

96b3(rnying rgyud): srem sna dpa' yi// tshigs kyi la mdu ba shad pa yin// bzod pa 'jig rten chos kyi mchog/ sbyin dang tshul khrims pa rlos sbyin pa bcwa// rkyod ba'i lamadu bshad gA min// chos rnams rna ma mkha' lce ba ni// mthong ba'i lamadza bstan pa yin// dngas
96b4(rnying rgyud): pa tshan ma med dag skabs// badz+ram+b+ha pa'i lam du bstan pa yin// 'bras pa rdzogs pas sangs rdzas pa// mthang byin la seM bstan pa yin// gsang stag sa skye ba 'i la mdzub snyed pa ni// dgra pa nim gsum gun 'dang / skur ba 'o// brtul lpags
96b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor stor btsam// tshogs kyi lam du bstan pa yin// de nyid rje dang 'bangs kyi tshul// 'gro 'du ting 'dzin byed pa ni// sbyor ba'i lam du bstan pa yin// ting 'dzin pas su gyur pa ni// mthong ba'i lam du bstan pa yin// ting 'dzin
96b6(rnying rgyud): mAnd pa n-i// bsgom pa'i lam du bstan pa yin// 'bras pa gas gas mi 'thab pa ni// mthar byin la 'arje bstan pa yon// bang ga d+hang dam chog sa me pacwa gnyis/ dpal bral po zi ngo // sun dung rdzogs pa'i gnas bsgrub// ma
96b7(rnying rgyud): la mdu brtan pa yin// sa kyis cadags pa pan// rdzong ba'i mdu smye ngapas su pa ma / la 'jims pa da rnam pa'i la mashes pa ga du
97a1(rnying rgyud): // nags // ba lta da dusadu lta na/
97a2(rnying rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rje chos kyi blo gos nyon// chung lung mnangag stan chus // de yi lam lnga bshad par gyi// ting 'dzin rnamags ma mtshig brgyad// 'phags pa sbyin drangs misogs pa// tshogs kyi lam du bshad pa yin// goms shing
97a3(rnying rgyud): par byed pa ni// sbyor ba'i lam du bshad pa yin// brtan nas rigs lnga yab yum gsal// mthong ba'i lam du bshad pa yin// ting 'dzin rnam gsum ma thob par du bsgom// bsgom pa'i lam du bstan pa yin// longs skye zhe gnyis sangs rgyas pa// mtha
97a4(rnying rgyud): phyin lam du bstan pa yin// phung po khams rnams lha ru bsgom// 'dzab dang dbro 'du tshogs kyi lam// de nyid 'dris byed sbyor ba'i lam// kun bzang yab y+ra ma he ru ka/ dgu cha gsal ba mthong ba'i lam// he ru ya ba yum brtan pa bsgom pa'i lam/
97a5(rnying rgyud): dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par mthar phyin lam// a tI yo ga'i lamA lnga ni// snang srid rgyan du gyur pa tshogs kyi lam// thig le nyag gcig rtogs thabs sbyor ba'i lam// the tshom med pa ga pa mthong ba'i lam// de yi don la gnas pa bsgom pa'i lam//
97a6(rnying rgyud): chos spu thig ler shar ba mthar phyin lam// stan rgyud nges pa'i lam lnga 'di ltar bstan// rang snang zing thal yin pas tshogs lam rdzogs// rig pa rang sar grol bas sbyor lam rdzogs// thig le rang la shar bas ma thod lam rdzogs// 'grubazang thal sha
97a7(rnying rgyud): bas bsgom la ma rdzogs// thog la chos min sha rabs thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs// tshig tu brjod pas lngar lngang don la gcig/ gser bzang mdog bzang byas pa'i don la gcig/ theg pa rang rang lam lnga de ltar yin// zhes gsungs so// 'byung po
97b1(rnying rgyud): kun 'dul gyi rgyud las/ lam lnga khyad par bstan pa'i lang+ga sa ny+dzar dag pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rna chos kyi bla zas nyon// sa dang 'angal phyin pa ni// gsung sngags mtshan nyid man ngag gsum// du yang chad
97b2(rnying rgyud): par 'di ltar bstan// dang po rab tu dga' ba ni// sbyin pa yi ni pha rol phyin// pad+ma can gyis zhes bya ba dang // bla ma'i gdams ngag thob pa'o// gnyis pa dri ma med pa ni// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'o// rig pa dri ma med pa rdo sprod yin//
97b3(rnying rgyud): gsum pa 'od 'phro zhes pa ni// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa'o// bcugasu ma yi ga 'khor lo tshogs chen yin// sku gsum dgongs pa gzhan don byed// bzhi pa 'od byed ces pa ni// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'o// yi ge tshogs chen rdzogs
97b4(rnying rgyud): pa yin// sku gsum gyis ni gzhan don byed pa yin// lnga pa sbyang par dka' ba'i sa// bsum gtan pha rol phyin pa'o// bco lnga rdo rje 'chang gris// dbang po dman la ngo sprod bya// drug pa mngon du gyur pa'i sa// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'o//
97b5(rnying rgyud): ngo sprod pas ni rtag pa mngon du gyur// bdun pa ring du song ba'i sa// thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa yin// nyan thos spong ba yin te ring pa'o// 'di nyid lam du byed pa'o// brgyad pa mi g.yo ba yis// smon lam pha rol phyin pa'o// chos su 'gyur ba
97b6(rnying rgyud): med par rtogs// dgu po legs pa'i blo gros sa// stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa yin// kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa'o// bcu pa chos kyi sprin gyis// ye shes pha rol phyin pa'o// rtogs pa mngon du gyur pa'o// bcu gcig la ni 'od du 'char//
97b7(rnying rgyud): ye shes pha rol phyin pa'o// zhes gsungs so// 'byung ba kun 'dul gyi rgyud las/ sa gsum spyod kyi la'u spyi sumacu pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rje chos kyi blo gros nyon// phyag rgya bzhi yo don ston pa// 'gro ba'i bsnyen
98a1(rnying rgyud): bkur gnas kyi mchog/ bden pa bzhin ston pa'o// da la tan thos phrag rgyabazhi// nyis bcu lnga bcu las kyi phyag rgya yin// bden bzhi gtan la 'bebs pa rgyas kyi phyag sa yin// gang zag bdag med dam na ga phyag su ra na//
98a2(rnying rgyud): dgra bcom 'bras bu nam bdun phyag rgya chen po yin// byang chub sems dpa'i phyag rgya ni// sdom pa nyi shu bsrung ba las rgya yin// pha rol phyin drag spyod pa chos rgya yin// chos rnams rang bzhin stong pad ma tshig phyag rgya yin// thams cad mkhyen pa thob pa phrag
98a3(rnying rgyud): rgya chen po yin// dag pa rnam gsum spyod pa las kyi phyag rgya yin// rigs gsum spyan 'dren mcho dang stod chos kyi phyag rgya yin// ny+dza sha sgog btsong bsrung ba dam tshig phyag rgya yin// 'bras bu rigs gsum bslab pa phyag rgya chen po yin// byang chub lam
98a4(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa las kyi phyag rgya yin// sku lnga bzhu btul byed pa chos kyi phyag rgya yin// dkor gsum mang gsum bsten pa dam tshig phyag rgya yin// sku lnga mngon du gyur pa phyag rgya chen po yin// bdud rtsi lnga la spyod cing sbyor sgrol las kyi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang
98a5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya chos kyi phyag rgya yin// da ma chog nyi shu rtsa brgyad bsrung ba dam chog phrag/ rgya yin// bzhi bcu d+ha gnyis bsgrub pa phyag rgya chen po yin// ting 'dzin rnam gsum da mardzas lnga stong las kyi phyag rgya yin// kun bzad yab yum bsgom pa chos kyi phyag rgya yin/
98a6(rnying rgyud): 'du 'jo rgyun mi gcod pa dam tshig phyag rgya yin// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa phyag rgya chen po yin// rol pa 'gag pa med pa chos kyi phyag rgya yin// mtshan nyid skye ba med pa las kyi phyag rgya yin// ngo bo klong grol dam tshig phyag rgya yin// rang bzhi
98a7(rnying rgyud): skye ba med pa phyag rgya chen po yin// 'gru ba 'gag pa med pa las kyi phyag rgya yin// ye shes zang thal shes pa chos kyi phyag rgya yin// rig gnas phyi nang med pa dam tshig phyag rgya yin// chos las 'das pa phyags chen po yin// zhes gsungs so//
98b1(rnying rgyud): b+h+ya rgyan 'jal sa rgyad las/ phyag a btab pa'i la khyum gcig par// nga nas yang dag // 'asgrub pa/ s+ho// dran kya ga na/ ga/ g+sa pa dgas par// gzha
98b2(rnying rgyud): sa dngas bltas shing kya gas pa ga / ya rna saso// mang thubasas// sa so// la 'imi gams pa mim pa 'di nem/ brjo ma ma ma
98b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas sum// ltabs bltas sa ma/ blta bar byas sam/ lbu bar byed bzhin nam// lta ba bzlas nas sangs rgyas sam/ de smad dam spyod par byed dam/ spyad nas num/ spyad zin nas des sangs rgyas sam/ gzhi 'bras bu gzha
98b4(rnying rgyud): nam/ gzhi des 'bras bu myong ngam/ gzhis 'bras bu thob bam/ gzhon re 'bras bu yin zer ram/ de bzhin du lam lngas brgya tshogs gnyis rnams kyang / de bzhin de yi rang bzhin yin/ zhes gsungs so// dper nag phyar na reng ldan yin zer ram
98b5(rnying rgyud): drug yin zas phul pa yin zer ram/ nor bu rin po che de skad zer ram ste/ gzhi 'khrub pas gzhing shas te// mi shes pa mi rang dbang med// mi yi byad kyis me long ltar// phar bltas tshur mthong bzhin gsal ba// gzhing shes pas gzhi las 'das
98b6(rnying rgyud): 'dres pa lnga po chos las min// ye shes zang thal rang shang bas// thams cad mkhyen pa ma 'gags pas// mkhyen pa de ltar shar ba yin// drug gis bstan pa'i dgongs pa dang // mu stegs ston pa drug po yis// grub mtha' gnyis su phye bas log
98b7(rnying rgyud): gnyis med don dang me 'gal lam// mnyam phyir don ni bzang ngan med// bzang por 'dod na 'dod chags yin// 'dod pas mi myong rtog 'dredra yin// 'dri ru 'di pas tsha ba med// ces gsungs so// 'byung po kun 'dul gyi rgyad las/ kun tu
99a1(rnying rgyud): bzang po'i dgongs pa bstan pa'i latsugs gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya bya// 'byung po kun 'dul kyad chen 'dir// thams cad ma lus 'das pa yin// 'di ni nicis pa sa pa snang du zab
99a2(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// ston pa kun tu bzang po la/ rdo rje chos kyi blo gros rjes su yi rang ngo // 'byung po can 'dul gyi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// / rgya ga skad du/ de btan d+hi She ke ta ra t+na tsakra nA ma/ bod skad du/ lha spyang dbang rin po
99a3(rnying rgyud): po zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pad+mo dus gcig na/ chos kyi dbyings gdal ba chen po'i pho thang na/ rgya yongs su ma chad pa'i zhing khams/ gser gyi 'od zer rab tu 'tho ba zhes bya ba/
99a4(rnying rgyud): DUR+Ya zhun mas rang nan du byas pa'i sa gzhi/ ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i gnas chen po/ gser la rin po ches spras pa'i gnas de na bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po bzhugs te/ 'khor nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor/ ye shes rnam pa lnga lnga sog
99a5(rnying rgyud): rgya myoms sprul bya'i 'dzo/ rjesems dpa' dang / dbang mi da pas 'dus pa'i 'byor mkha' 'gro mdze rje drag ni choganyer gdong zhes bya ba dang / sgrol ma dadu 'ang zer can dang / phagag dang ce skang la sogs te/ dung byed kyi 'das ma thag gi zong ba/
99a6(rnying rgyud): sogs pas bskor te/ de yi tshe de'i dus su gsang ba'i bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po lags/ bdag rtag 'khor dang bcas pa la/ dbang bskur brda dang bcas pa bstan du gsol// zhes zhus pas/
99a7(rnying rgyud): bzang pos bka' stsal pa// rgyal thabs spyi blugs dbang dang ni// skal spu zug phrad dbang dang ni// rig pa rtsal gyi dbang dang ni// mtshan ma zil gnon dbang dang ni// dbul mo gter gyi dbang dang ni// rgyal po'i bkad rtags dbang dang ni// na
99b1(rnying rgyud): po'i bka' chad dbang dang ni// brtan po dpa' mo'i dbang bstan to// zhes gsungs so// dbang rin po che 'khor lo'i klad las/ glang gzhi'i ladra ste dang pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyal thabs spyi blugs/
99b2(rnying rgyud): dbang bstan pa/ sngon rgya gar yul grong khyer ser skya zhes pa ru/ rgyal po'i phrag gu ltad mo la phyin pas/ rgyal bu rkang 'khyams so// sprang po dang khyad med do// de nas blon pos ngo shes so// rgyal bu la khrus byas te dbang bskur ro// dus de tshun tshod du
99b3(rnying rgyud): mnga' 'og tu 'dus so// dpe de bzhin du/ thog ma sangs rgyas kyi skyes nas/ 'gyu ba'i 'od lnga mthong ba las// 'khor ba'i 'khrul ba la sogs spyad// 'gro drug gnas las thar ba med// de nas ngo sprad bstan pa yis// sangs rgyas sa yi
99b4(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur bas// rgyal thabs ye shes dbang bslar yin// ye shes dbang bskur zang thal bstan// 'khor ba'i mtshan ma rang sar grol// rang grol thig le'i rtse mor tshig// rtse mor che ba byas mtshan mdangs// ye shes ye shes khyad par che//
99b5(rnying rgyud): ye shes zang thal rang la shar// 'gyu ba spangs nas ye shes gang // gzung 'dzin spangs nas gnyis med gang // ma rig spangs nas rig pa gang // dug lnga spangs nas ye shes gang // phung po lnga spangs sku lnga gang // sgo lnga spangs nas zang thal gang/
99b6(rnying rgyud): 'byung lnga spangs nas zhing khams grang // rtog bcag spangadra nas rtog med gang // sprang po srungs nas rgyal po gang // sems can spangs nas sangs rgyas gang // de rnams gdams pas zin pa na// dbyer med rang grol chos las 'das/
99b7(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// dbang rin po che 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ rgyal thabs spyi glags kyi dbang gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ sbrul gru thug phrad dbang bstan pa// dper na ral
100a1(rnying rgyud): sman smras// gag / na/
100a2(rnying rgyud): ral ma khamyangs chen pongs// ma brgya pa 'od gis thams cad nga / du zhidi 'grul ma tshugs / ma ma rjod pa'o// cos da sems dpa' zhes// tshogs brgyad 'gru bdag de na// thabs pa gags pa pa /

100b1(rnying rgyud): shos tug da'ang// nags thaMd du la drung bstan// des nasag gawAn gnog sman// ngag sgor thams cad 'byin bying ba rnags pa dang // dri mi zhim pas gnad sbyin pa ni pa sgrig/ yid ldanas shos thams cadang// rlabs shing dang nga /
100b2(rnying rgyud): brte pas ni// ha na pags pa rkang mgrogs yin// yid ni 'khor bar bya zhing kun pa sgrubs// gras la dga' bosan bsku yin// chags bdun kun gzhi dag pa 'dus pa ni// snyid pa'i la moldan 'dam dang can/ lci gron rdzobatud
100b3(rnying rgyud): gang ba yin// slob rgyad dpon par dang byug tan na ldan// dernams sgrag brgyad dbang du ba ba'i phyir// dbang phyug chen par byung dub // srid pa'i rgyas mi dbyings su bskyes// bon rdza ba da sdig 'byu/ yid snying

101a1(rnying rgyud): rang snang la shes zung nalang // phyinang med pas sangs nas yul ma shar// rig pa pa ga mnanan m+b+haH// rig pa zang thal snang pod rgyang bya blang du // 'gyur med log pa'oHla chen chags na
101a2(rnying rgyud): gdams pas dbang du gyur pas sang+yas kyis yul med shar// rig pa rang dbang gyur pas mkha' la ral bskor dadra // seng ge'i phru gu rum na gnas pa ltar// sangs rgyas dgongs pa khong du rdzogs pa yin// rus skal rkang lag nang du bskams pa
101a3(rnying rgyud): 'grubasangs pas rig pa khong dgrol// mtshan ma'i rnam pAr rtag pa ci skyes kyang // chos nyid 'dugs la gnad kyi dam pa yin// rig pa'i rang sgo m+bi shes ma rig bdud // rang sno rang snang shes pas kyi// drug khong 'khri ba dang ltar babyed// rang
101a4(rnying rgyud): shes sha rabs rtsi// rnam rtog 'khor ba ma rig bdud// rang rig ye shes rang shar rtsi// sde brgyad bsdongs pas nad dang bad+mad// rang rig ye shes lha yi lha// lhag pa'i lha ni b+h+ra ma'i rtse// chags sdang gzugs kyi phung po dang // bar ched byed pa'i bge
101a5(rnying rgyud): ni bdud// 'gyur med rig pa bzlog pas rtsi// rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pas bdud// 'gyu bzang thal shes pas rtse// 'byung ba rnam lnga bdud du shar// bla ma'i thabs mi 'gag pas rtse// snang ba dkar dmar bdud du shar// bltas pas zang

102b1(rnying rgyud): 'das pa ba sma ga zang // kha ma 'phyar ba 'dags pa yang // ces gsungs so// dbang rin po mye khar la'i rgyud las/ dbul mo gter gyi dbang gi lan ste drug pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad byab// gsang ba'i bdag pa khyad ta \u0f7fh+ma/
102b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal po bka' rtags dbang bstan pa// rgyal pos btsun mo blangs nas ni// dbang bskur khrus sogs byas tsam ni// skyes pa bsam gyis mi khrab kyang // btsun mo de la 'jug mi nus// rgyal po'i bka' rtags phyag rgya'i dbang zhes bya// de bzhin
102b3(rnying rgyud): tha ma dam pa yis// rig pa'i ye shes ngaskad na// snang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// nyon mongs bad khri bzhi spyong kyang // phyag tu'i dbang la 'dra' mi nus// mi 'da' ye shes thugs saH// gnyis ma
102b4(rnying rgyud): shes gsung gi bya// mi bskyed pa ni ske yirgya// mi 'da' bas na yul gyi rgya// rgya bzhi gnad kyis thebs tsan// rgyal po'i bka' rtags phyag rgya bzhin// sus kyang 'ad 'bar mi nus so// gdams pa bka' yi gzer dang rgya// rnal 'byor snod drung
102b5(rnying rgyud): ldan la gdab// rig pa ye shes lha yi gzer dang rgya// lha sprin sde brgyad srog la gdab// phud byed sde brgyad srog rtsa bcad// byin rgyud nyams myongs ye shes gzer dang rgya// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi srog la gdab// mkha' 'gro'i srog myi mcho
102b6(rnying rgyud): na// ya ma da ma sri gdon du che// thugs rgyud gdams pa gnad kyi gzer dang rgya// 'khor ba rnam bzhi'i srog la gdab// 'khor ba'i sgrog rtsa ma nod na// 'gro drug 'khrul pa g.yang sa che// snyan chud dngo spyod gnad kyi gzer dang cha// tshogs kyi
102b7(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur ngas su gdapa// bla ma'i gdams pa mchod na// theg pa'i srog la thug pa med// dpe rgyud gdams pa gags dang them gyi chu// mtshon par byed pa dang po'i dus su grang bas// da pe yang mthun dpe khyad par che// yid mchis pa'i srog
103a1(rnying rgyud): btsud// gnad la 'bangs pa 'og dang// rmanan pa la phyan du// ma pa pyad pa // rban nang bang ngan pa da/
103a2(rnying rgyud): dbyeb rnam pag ma yin// 'd-i/ bya na 'jig rten 'das// yang dag shepa ba na pa/ mthun pa pa'i / thung pa shA na// bad+ma'i rnam pa ga nas// 'grub 'i srog dang ma
103a3(rnying rgyud): dbugs gang byi yi thog dang gsum// mchog gi srog ni 'di lta ste// 'grubs bzang ba 'khrul pa'i chog/ 'grub zeng thal nyams kyi srog/ ye shes ring snang theg mo'i srog// theg pa'i mig can 'phe 'gyur 'ad// rgyal pa'i phyag tu dbang gi
103a4(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs so// dbang rin pa che 'khor lo'i rgyud lus/ bka' rtags phyag rgya'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad b+hab/ rten cigags ba 'a na parjod// blon po bka' chang da 'ang bstan pa/
103a5(rnying rgyud): dper ni blon pos rgyal po'i khrims bcas na// dmangs kyis khrims las 'da' mi nus// gal hU~M khri mes las 'das pa na// chad pa thengs gcig bcad pa yis// de nas pus kyang 'da' mi nas// de bzhin ye shes dza skad na// rtog pa ste'i
103a6(rnying rgyud): sa myi rnyed// gal te skyes na sprad bus// phyis ni skye bar mi nus sa// yang dgangs pa'i dza sgod 'di// dper na gser la nag tshu bzhin// phyis ni gala' yi skyon dang bral// de bzhin ma rig ye shes bstan// phyis ni 'khor bar mo lhung ngo //
103a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i bag chags rtag pa yin// bag chags sro ga rtsa mchod na// 'khor ba'i 'jam du bying bar mche// de la gnad kyi gdams pa bstan pa 'i// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong chags sdang lnga// lnga lo gsum du 'dus te ma rig /
103b1(rnying rgyud): sa la dus spyad nag/ dam dang gang na / sa nga// mdag 'ad btsu drug dang // man bam panan med na pa // dgas pa ga ga / zugs nga na sa slong dadas

103b5(rnying rgyud): ga ba nas/ na na ga ma/ /
103b6(rnying rgyud): na/ // du na
104a1(rnying rgyud): tshad kyi dbang gi le'u ste bzad pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad thub// nyon cig gsang ba'i bdag gabyud // dper na mo btsun dpa' bo'i dbang brtan pa// dpa' bo rtsal dang ldan pa la// mo btsun mdza
104a2(rnying rgyud): mas g.yo brtsam nas// mo yi phar la grag bcol kyang // skyes pa rnams kyis 'jug mi nus// de bzhin ye shes dbang thob na// dug lnga sna tshogs rang dbang 'dus// 'gru ba btsal bas mi rnyed de// btsal bas ye shes phyogs su shar// drag
104a3(rnying rgyud): lha'i mtshan ma rang sar grol// 'grub bya ba ming yang med// snang srid thig le'i gling du grol// dug lnga skyes sa ming yang med// phyi nang med par rang snang bas// nyams su myong dgu'i yul me rnyed// thams cad thig le'i ngang du grol//
104a4(rnying rgyud): tshig tshogs yul na med// dpe las 'das pa'i ye shes yin// nem rtog ye shes 'char ba la// rlung gi gdams pa'i dbang po dgas// rlung gi ngo bo ga yo ba'o// nges pa'i tshig ni 'jigs bstod // dbu ba gzhi lam 'bras bu'o// 'bras bu rnam
104a5(rnying rgyud): pa gnyis yin te// ma rig rlung dang ye shes rlung // ma rig 'gyu ba'i rlung chen de// mi 'gag bskyod pas 'ab+ha ba'i rlung // dug lnga khong khro'i rlung chubs// glo sgang gnyis la dbugs can rgya// dbugs rgyu ma rig thuk+ka ka la// 'gyus pa rnam rtog ma
104a6(rnying rgyud): rig rlung // nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong gyi// srog rtsa dbugs med rlung rgyab// thag pa 'khor ba'i rlung rgya'o// mdzod spu yaM shes rlung rgyab// 'das pa lnga yi rlung rgya'o// snying nas ye shes rlung chub// zang thal 'gag pa med pa'i rlung // snying
104a7(rnying rgyud): mtshams shes rab rlung chub// shes bya 'gag pa med pa'i rlung // blo mtshams ye shes rlung chubs// rdzogs pa meng ba'i ye shes rlung // mgrin pa ma shes chung chubs// rtog pa 'gag pa med pa'i drang // kha sdang 'gas tsha
104b1(rnying rgyud): ste// 'gro ba 'ong pa gnas pargya// glo sgang dbugs chen rlung rgyu ba// skya ba gcod pa gnas pa ru// snying nas 'gyu ba 'gag myeng drung // 'char ba 'dug pa gnas pa rgya// de nas gsang lam 'od lnga'i rlung // rtog med shes pa'i rlung
104b2(rnying rgyud): rgyun/ mdzod su 'gru ba'i ga/ sa rlung// sdug tu 'gyu ba'i rgyu rgyano// mig la ye shes pa thal rlung // 'gag mad ye shes mngon myur bya// nab chos nyid rlung rgya'aM// hUM deg shes rab drang gyu'o// slad na 'khor ba'i rlung sgra'o// ji skad mya na
104b3(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i rlung // bar na 'khor 'das rugacod rgyung // 'gog pa med par chu ba yin// zhes gsungs so// dbang rin po che 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ rlung dang dpa' bo dbang gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas bka' stsal pa/
104b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ rtswa yi mdor bsdus rdo sprod bstan par bya// de la rtsa mjo bo stong pa yin// nges pa'i chog ni gnas pa'o// mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'o// da ba rnam pa gsum yin te// dpe ni dra ba'i tshul bzhin no// thun mong
104b5(rnying rgyud): khyad par mchog dang gsum// thun mong 'khor lo bzhi lnga gnas// de yang bsdu na gsum du 'dus// rgyang ma ro ma kun 'dar ma/ khyad par rtsa la bstan gsum// rnab chos kyi rtswa dang ni// snying ga shes rab rtsa dang ni// mig la ye shes rtsa dang gsum//
104b6(rnying rgyud): snying la shes rab rtswa gnas pa// rtsa chen bzhi ru gyes pa yin// rnab chos nyid rtsa dang 'bral// mig ni ye shes rtsa dang 'brel// mgrin pa chos nyid rtsa dang 'brel// glu skad skyon yon rtsa dang 'brel// mig la ye shes rtswa gnas pas// kha dog lha dang ldan
104b7(rnying rgyud): pa ni// rtags kyi ye shes phyi ru shar// mgrin pa 'od du shar ba ni// longs sku gzhi la gab pa'i rtsa// snying ga chos gsum 'dus pa ni// chos spu'i rtsa ste rang chas yin// 'gyu ba stong pa'i lam sA te// de ni rtsa ba'i lam chen yin// glo snying
105a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi mtshams shed na// s+phu gu lta bu'i rtsa gnas te// de la 'grub brtan pa yin// glo bar song bas sgrog 'dra'iH// skye ba gcod pa gnas pa'i rtsa// mgrin pa gnyis mtshon la bu'iH// dbugs kyi
105a2(rnying rgyud): 'od gnas pa'i rtsa// mgrin pa bathag sbreskyel 'dra'i rtsa// 'od lnga rang mas gnas pa'i rtsa// bde chen ka ba btsug 'dra'i rtsa// thig le'i rang gdangs rlangs pa rgyo// mdzod spu ye shes zar bu'i rtsa// 'gyu ba rang byang gnas pa'i rtsa// par dor
105a3(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal gnas pa'i rtsa// 'gyu ba stong pa rtsa yi rgyu// rtsa yi srog dang srog gi rten// de gnyis 'brel pas tshe dang zungs// tshe srog rtsa dang zungs chad rtsa// skyong sgrol 'gro ldog shes par bya// chos nyid ma bu spang ba la// rtsa rlung gnyis kyi gdams
105a4(rnying rgyud): pa dgos// tshe zungs nA gcod shes pa dgos// chos nyid bar do'i ngo sprod gces// bar do tshad la phebs tsan// chos nyid ma bu 'phrad pa yin// ye shes tshad la phebs tsam ni// rnam rtog rang sar grol ba yin// thos pa tshad la phebs pa na//
105a5(rnying rgyud): sgra 'dogs thag pa chod pa yin// 'od gsal tshad la phebs tsam na// sangs rgyas zhing khams shar ba yin// gnyis med tshad la phebs tsam na// sangs rgyas yul med shar ba yin// rnam rtog tshad la phebs tsam na// snang ba'i zhon pa log pa yin//
105a6(rnying rgyud): gdams pa tshad la phebs tsam na// nyams myong khong nas shar ba yin// byin rlabs tshad la phebs tsam na// 'khor ba'i zhen pa log pa yin// bka' rgyud tshad la phebs tsam na// sangs rgyas dgongs pa shar ba yin// thugs rgyud tshad la phebs
105a7(rnying rgyud): tsam na// skye rgyun thag pa chod pa yin// snyan rgyud tshad la phebs tsam na// ye shes khong nas shar ba yin// ye shes ye shes khyad par che// rgyan tshod med na ye shes yin// sdang ba tshad la phebs tsam na// mkha' 'gro dbang du 'dus pa yin/
105b1(rnying rgyud): go ba tshang la phebs tsamAn// rig 'dzin dbang du 'dus pa yin// rdzogs pa chang la phebs tsam na// sangs rgyas rang la rnyed pa yin// shar ba tshad la phebs tsam na// mtshan ma dang sar grol ba yin// grol ba tshad la phebs tsam na// tha mangs/
105b2(rnying rgyud): cad mkhyen pa thob pa yin// tshad ma gtan la phebs tsam na// phyir mi ldog pa'i dgongs pa 'char// zhes gsungs so// dbang rin po che 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ rtsa dang tshad ma'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas yang
105b3(rnying rgyud): dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig gsang ba'i bdag po khyod// thig le'i gdams ngag bstan pa ni// phyi nang gsang ba rnam pa gsum// de yang ngo bo nges tshig dang // dbye ba mthun pa'i dpe dang bzhi// thig le'i ngo bo gsal ba yin// nges tshig 'gyu
105b4(rnying rgyud): med bde ba yin// dbye ba thun mong khyad par mchog/ dpe ni thig dang 'dra ba'o// thun mong thig le dbab pa dang // gzung ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // dgum pa dang ni gtong ba'o// dngas ma gzung dang sdigs ma gtang // de las ye shes ngos 'dzin pa/
105b5(rnying rgyud): dz+nyAn mong theg ler shes pa d+ma thA// khyad par thig le rnam pa gsum// gzhi yi thig le ngo bo yin// rgyu yi thig le 'bru ba gsal// lam gyi thig le 'od lpags la// de ni tha thig dgas thig yin// dngos po gzhil ma 'bras bu gsum/
105b6(rnying rgyud): rig pa 'odags la gzhi yi thig la yin// snang ba 'od gsal lam gyi thig le yin// ye shes 'odwags lnga 'bras bu'i thig le yin/ zhigs la ba gnad N+DI thig lce yin// 'grus tshad rang gsal gdams pa'i thig le yin//
105b7(rnying rgyud): dpying med rang gsal bkang rgyud zig le yin// 'gru ba tshang la phebs tsam na// / ye shes mthil du phebs pa yin// thig le tshad la phebs tsaman// chad pa'i golasathod pa yin// tsa khyud tshad la 'bas tsaman// rtag pa'i gal
106a1(rnying rgyud): ba / du/ ga / / smra na /
106a2(rnying rgyud): rung ga ga ngas dag sa sa nga na sog/ / ma bya zlags byung

106a7(rnying rgyud): su su ma na na
106b1(rnying rgyud): dbang thabs// shas rab bum pa'i dbang dang lnga// rdza dang yi ge dbang gsum po// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang bskur yin// rtags dang brda' dang don dang gsum// bskur thabs dbang rjes thim lugs gsum// lha dang lus la bskur ba ni/
106b2(rnying rgyud): lus kyi zhen pa ldog pa yin// ye shes chos kyi dbang bskur bas// lha yi rang rgyud ldog pa yin// chos dbang sems la bskur ba ni// drug lnga dang sar dag pa yin// dbang gi chu bzhi bstan pa ni// btsal mi dgos pa'i yon tan yod// dbang ldang ngus
106b3(rnying rgyud): su bstan pa ni// ngo sprod kha mi 'khyar ba'i gzer// dbang lnga lam du blang ba ni// byin rlabs rang la 'byung ba yin// lhan cig skyes pa rnam bzhini// thun mong ma yin khyad par min// mchog gi 'bras bu thob pa yin// gzhi lam 'bras bu bstan pa ni/
106b4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor rab 'bring dag dri so yi na// zhes gsungs so// dbang rin po che 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ lha rgyud chung ngu'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / gsang ba'i bdag po nyon cig/ lha rgyud dbang rin po che'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di/
106b5(rnying rgyud): tshig nyung la don che/ brtags dka' la gting zab pa'i man ngag/ thams cad ma tshang ba med pa'i rgyud/ bka' las mi 'da' zhing brtag dka' ba'i lung / thams cad gtan la 'bebs pas rgyud lung gi tshad mar zung zhig/ ces gdams so// rdo rje sirba
106b6(rnying rgyud): dpa' rjes su yi rang nas bstod pa/ ston pa kun rig chos kyi rje// sna tshogs ngo sprod rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di// byin gyis rlabs kyi brgyad pa ngo mtshar che// byin rlabs sbrul sra 'gro don mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces gsungs so// dbang rin po che 'khor lo'i rgyud
106b7(rnying rgyud): las/ rjes su yi rang nas bstod pa'i l-i'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra gu h+ya mahA kA ya rat+na hi ra b+huHb+hU ma hA pradz+nye sU tra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje gsang ba chen po'i sku rin po che dbyig gi smon ma shes rab/
107a1(rnying rgyud): chen po'i mdo/ rang byung rig pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa'i dus ma byon pa'i sngan rol du/ sems nyid kun tu bzang ba ye shes kyi ldang ba la bzhugs pa'i dus na/ kun gzhi gsang bdag pa'i dbyings
107a2(rnying rgyud): rang shes rig gi rgyal po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos/ nyid la nyid kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa chen po thugs kyi gter lnga sbas/ lus kyi dbang po lnga wang bstanato// man ngag gi mjug rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis bsdus te lag na rdo rje la gtad do//
107a3(rnying rgyud): pas sa da du nga/ ga dzin smra na pa nga ma
107a4(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa dang / gsang ba byang chub sems dngos su bsgrub pa'o// phyi mtshan ma la brten pa la gnyis te/ bag chags kyi sgra lus ye shes kyi lus la 'jug pa dang / lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa la 'jug pa la bsgrub pa dang / b+hU lus
107a5(rnying rgyud): shes kyi lus la 'jug pa la/ ngo spod gzhi nas chos nyid bar rdo'i lus da lta dngos su bstan yang / de nyid la goms par bya ste/ lam dang 'bras bu dang bcas pa bsgom par bya ste/ lam dngos su byed pa ni/ dpe'i ye shes las shes par bya
107a6(rnying rgyud): lam la gnas pa ni/ yengs pa med pa'i gdeng gis zin te dus thams cad pa'o// ldum mngon du gyur pa ni/ rig pa gcer bur phyung ba'i man ngag las shes par bya'o// lam mi 'bras bu mthar phyin pa ni/ grags pa ye shes pa'i ldan
107a7(rnying rgyud): gyi dgongs pa mthar phyin nas bag chags kyi lus la nyam ba med pa'o// nang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor lo ba ten te bsgrub pa ni/ gong ma'i rtsal 'byongs nas/ thugs rang byung gi dkyil 'khor ye shes kyi sgra phye ste/ 'di rtse lus kyi nang med pa
107b1(rnying rgyud): nang na/ rang snang rtogs pa'i 'khar ma/ rang rang gi chom bu dang bcas pa la/ reg pa mar me'i 'od gsal te/ sa les dang lhag gi ldan na/ thog ma nas gnas pa/ ma byas par rang byung ba/ ma bac+doMs mdzes sdug ca dang ldan
107b2(rnying rgyud): pa de sgrub pa ni gangs la nyi ma shar blta bu tshigagasum gyis 'grub ste/ dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya rang yid la dran pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la 'byangs na gsang ba byang chub sems dang sras sgrub pa ni/ thog lta ba ldan
107b3(rnying rgyud): gis thog ma'i rangs bzung / gzer lta bu'i man ngag gis tshig dang yi ge'i don mtha' bsgral// khyung lta bu'i man ngag gis rtsol ba'i mtha' glod la bzhag/ skar mda' lta bu'i gdams ngag gis skad cig ma gsum la grol ba mthar phyin par bya
107b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen pos/ mkha' 'gro ma lnga'i lung bsdus nas lag na rdo rje lag tad do// mjug dga' rab rdo rjes bsdus nas/ 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la gtad de mgul khrag ma'o// byang chub sems kyi snying po seng ge 'akyil
107b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i sgrub thabs 'di la/ byas pa'i bslab grags kyi rtags rnam pa bzhi 'byung ba'i dus su bdud rnam pa bzhi 'jug ste/ phyi mtshan ma la brten te bsgrub pa zhes 'byung ba de/ bag chags kyi sgra las pa 'jug pa'i dus su/ shes pa dpa
107b6(rnying rgyud): mthon gyi nyams skye/ 'ja' tshon gyi gdan ba ting / nyi zlang rta zhon/ phyogs snang bdag pa'i yul snang ste/ shes bya de'idus su phung po'i bdud 'jug ste/ ye shes kyi lus la bar du gcad pa'i bdud zhes bya ste/ de'i dus su bdag tuHka/
107b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtsal/ 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzad ces byab 'byung ngo // rdo nyid 'dug nyid chen por shes par rgyaste/ rtags kyi nas chen gang bdang dan kyil shes ca ni gang bzhis 'byung / de lam ma mdzad me pa brgyas thab cig/
108a1(rnying rgyud): par byed pa lam rnam pa bzhi la gnas pa'i dus su/ shes pa khol bu'i nyams ste/ smug zil lta bu dang / raro lta bu dang / lus yong du mi tshor ba dang / lus yang ba dang / phyi nang gi srin bu mi 'byung ba dang / ma
108a2(rnying rgyud): par tshims pa dang / gang la yang nyam nga ba med pa dang / gzhan snying rje'i gnas su mthong ba dang / ri dang khang khyim gyis mi khegs par shes pa zang bral dang / sdang ba phyogs rga tsam dag pa dang / 'gro drug gi gnas dang gnas skabs kyi mthong ba
108a3(rnying rgyud): dga'abyung ba ste// de'i dus su tsun mongs pa'i bdud 'jug ste/ de ni bdag sangs rgya'o snyam r+tha shes pa'i shes pa 'byung ste/ gzhan la 'di 'dra ba'i gtam m+b+ha m+mA / de lang gA 'byur byed pa ni/ chos kyi mtha' lazhen pas nyin mongs pa'i bdud
108a4(rnying rgyud): bya'o// de'i dus su ma chags pa'i gnas sku gsum bzhi ldan gyis rgyas thob cig/ nang lha'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas bsgrub pa'i dus su/ thugs rnam dag gi slong na rang byung ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba dang / lung ston pa dang / yi ge'i
108a5(rnying rgyud): tshogs dang / snang ba med pa'i gtam thos pa dang / rin po che'i mchod rten la 'dzegs pa dang / bdud rtsi'i zas la longs spyod pa dang / rted med kyi nam mkha' la stegs bcas te/ bar snang lam du bde ba dang / lha dang slob dpon dang mkha'
108a6(rnying rgyud): 'gro mas nam mkha de khyud mar mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs mang pos bdag la dbang bskur ba dang / lung ston pa dang / de'i tshe ba dag la shes rab khyad par can skyes te/ nyams dga' zhing shes rab kyi mtha' grol ba dang / chos thams cad gang yang
108a7(rnying rgyud): mthun la chos kyis mi grol bar mthong ba dang / gzhan de la sogs pa'i snang ba dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong du yod pa dang / yi dwags dang byol song gi skye gnas ston pa dang / bdud kyi cha byad mang pos bdag la skyi bud pa byed pa 'byung ste/
108b1(rnying rgyud): de'i dus su lha'i bu'i bdud 'jug ste/ de rnams la blang dor dang nyam nga ba med par gangs la nyi ma shar blta bu gsal ba gsum gyi rgyas thob cig/ gsang ba byang chub sems dngos su grub pa'i dus su/ me long gA ya 'dag gi dgongs pa ma bsgreng /
108b2(rnying rgyud): pa yongs su gsal ba'ang / rnam mkha'i mthos nas snang gsal gyi nyi ma shar blta bu/ chos nyid dag pa'i klong nas ye shes rang snang gi dgongs pa/ gzigs snang gi mtha' las 'dres pa'i nyams skye ste/ de'i dus su 'chi bdag gi bdud 'dreg
108b3(rnying rgyud): ste/ rgya byin med par ye shes kyi sgra/ skye 'chi'i mtha' las grol ba/ skar mda'i lta bu'i rgyas thob cig/ byang la de byung de la dgongs pa ste// de la de med de yi spyod yul min/ ces de nyid gsungs/ byang chub sems seng ge 'khyil pa
108b4(rnying rgyud): dgongs pas/ bdud bzhi la ye shes bzhi'i rgyas gdab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa des/ ma byon par mkhyen nas/ thugs rje'i sprul pa/ ye shes kyi rnal 'byor ma bzhi/ ljags kyi 'od zer las spros te/ rdo
108b5(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi bu mo zhes kyang bya/ nyid kyi sku las skyes pas/ nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor rdo rje rnal 'byor me bzhi zhes kyang bya/ 'khor ba zhi nas gnon cing sdug bsngal myang nas gcod pas/ srid pa sgrol byed kyi khro mo bzhi zhes bya'o// 'das
108b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus ma byon pa'i sngon rol/ 'og min gyi gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang du/ ye shes rnam dag gi dbyings nas/ nyid kyi zhal bzang po bstan nas/ dur khrod chen po bzhir mi 'gyur ba'i gzer chen po zhig btab nas/ badz+ra sa hU li kar bzhi
108b7(rnying rgyud): bzhag nas yod kyis/ lag na rdo rje khyod deng song cig/ dung khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal na/ mkha' 'gro ma ro pra shAn+ti zad pa'i phreng ba can byabs/ gzer lta bu'i gdams ngag bstan to// ngur khrod chen po me ri 'bar ba zhes bya ba nas/

109a2(rnying rgyud): gyupa gapa / na nag zus/

109a5(rnying rgyud): na/ thig sa'i sangs rgyas 'du ra/ sa / ba rlom na pa / gtor ba'i skyes la ma'i thala'as rgyag sa nas/ ga ga yang gzhi zug la 'phrul pa ma la/
109a6(rnying rgyud): ltung ba ci'i sa mi thugs kyi mi 'a 'di na par byas kyi/ phreng snyen pa ni ni deni pa'i tsho ldan 'das la sa b+hU rgya dngas/ deb du ga ste'i skyes pa dang / nyin tu ba'i bdan ma/
109a7(rnying rgyud): mag nganan byu / yas can pa byung ba'irnam nang 'dun / sa gamigs pa dang/ chos thams cad bye don nyid kyi mams 'a pa na// 'ad chags pathal du byung chu'i gdams pa
109b1(rnying rgyud): badz+ra dz+nyA na la ma hA/ bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje thugs rje dang rdzu 'phrul du ldan pa legs par yid la zung shig/ thog ma med pa'i
109b2(rnying rgyud): gnas sngon byung ba'i dus su hA shang 'bar ne'i nags tshal du/ bdag rdo rje rnal 'byor ma nyid kyi thugs rje rang byung gi nyi ma shar nas/ nga nyid ye shes snang ba'i dus na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo zing ni rig pa las tha mi dad pa/ rang byung gi sku lnga snang la
109b3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin med par rang gsal ba/ mnan na nem zhes byed pa/ rdos pa'i spyod yul min pa/ bteg na 'phang zhes byed pa/ gsal bzang thal yin pa/ dam grog dang ga yang sa med pa/ tsher ma dang / rno zug med pa/ gcong rong dang bya skyibs med
109b4(rnying rgyud): pa/ shes pa nyams bde ba la phyogs su ma lhung ba/ bul ba'i yul bde ba nyams su myong ba'o// nang rig pa chos kyi sku/ 'gag pa med par lkug pa'i shes rab long nas shar bas/ lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes rin po che'i 'od 'bar ba'i nang na
109b5(rnying rgyud): da pa med pa phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor/ rang re'i yon tan gyi sku ma 'dres par so sor gsal ba bdag med pa'i bdag nyid chen po/ zhi ba chos kyi sku mnyam la ma 'dres par bzhugs so// de kho na nyid ma byas pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i babs kyis grub
109b6(rnying rgyud): pa ye shes rang snang dang bcas pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkhyen pa lags so// zhes rdo rje can la smras so// sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyod/ tshig nyung la don cheb/ bslab na go dka' ba/ 'di ni rang byung gi bcom ldan 'das/
109b7(rnying rgyud): rtsol bsgrub kyi mtha' las 'das pa/ 'dab chags kyi rgyal po khyud lta bu ste/ las kyi mtha' gang la yang mi gnas so// de'i phyir rtogs pa'i don thugs su ma chud par rnam par dag pa'i sa non na/ mkha' 'gro ma pun+d+ha nye bar zhi bas dpal
110a1(rnying rgyud): phyag na rdo rje'i mgo bo khos/ zhes don mtha' la bsgral ba'o// rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi rtsal las rdo rje 'chang gi sku bstan pa/ chos nyid ma bac+doMs pa'i dang nas/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma phyung ste/ de gnyis su
110a2(rnying rgyud): med pa las/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma bzhi byung ste/ rgyu rgyu ru gnas pa/ rgya 'bras bur smin pa/ 'bras bu rgyu la shar pa/ rgyu nyid ye shes su grol ba'o// rin po che dbyig gi sgron ma'i man ngag bya btsal med pa 'dab chags kyi rgyal po khyud
110a3(rnying rgyud): bla'i man drug gi dgongs pa mthur byin pa/ laga~M na rje 'byung gis lung bstan pa'o// brjo ma tha/ byecos sbyin 'das ran 'dzin pa lang ma/ rdo rje can nyon cig/ dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du song la thod pa'i phreng ba can la/ sbyin
110a4(rnying rgyud): le g+ha tsha sra shig/ rdo rje gdan gyi shar phyogs na rang byung gi mchod rten khru brgyad pa'i 'og na/ srin po rak+Sha dz+wa la'i thod pa'i nang du/ rdzogs pa chen po gzer lta bu'i man ngag yod kyis/ de mkha' 'gro ma la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa gtsug
110a5(rnying rgyud): tor dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya ston la zhus cig/ de nas rin po che gsang ba'i sbubs gsum na/ bkod pa med par phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor lnga rang byung du gsal bas/ mi bsgom pa'i bsgom pa chen po rdzogs so// gsang sngags chen po yi ge lnga pa'i
110a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo/ mi bsrung ba'i bsrung ba chen po dang ldan pas/ de kho na nyid kyi bsnyen pa rdzogs so// snying po byang chub mchog gi thig le yan lag med pa'i rdo rje la/ bca' du med pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdzogs so// dam tshig sa ma ya bkod pa'i rgyal
110a7(rnying rgyud): po/ bsrung ba med pa'i dam tshig la/ ma bsrungs pa med pa rdzogs so// rdzogs ldan chen po ye nas lhun gyis grub pa la bstan pa'i chos med pas/ bskyod pa'i mtha' dang bral bar bstan pa rdzogs so// lag na rdo rje la rdzogs ldan chen po gzer
110b1(rnying rgyud): wA r+ya'i lung bstan pa'o// badz+ra a tI dz+nyA na mar+d+ha/ rdo rje 'dzin pa la na mo// gsang ba'i mgon po bla na med/ ye shes dbyings nas rang byung ba'i// thog dang 'dra ba'i man ngag 'di// b+ha khwa gzan la brnam pa bzhin// the tshom med par ring
110b2(rnying rgyud): la chongs/ badz+ra pA Ni mA ri 'bar ba'i dur khrod na/ mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje'i mchu can nyes bya ba yod kyis/ der song la shing 'dzam bu brik+Sha'i drung na/ gser gyi rus sbal gyi 'og na bstan pa thams cad kyi snying po thog lta bu'i man ngag yod kyis/ der
110b3(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma la rig pa'i me tog phul la zhus shig/ lag na rdo rje nub phyogs kyi zhing khams na snang ba mtha' yas kyi zhing khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod kyis/ der khyod seng ge'i 'gros stangs kyis song la/ glang po che'i lta stangs
110b4(rnying rgyud): ga / sa sag ma das cwa gas kyi/
110b5(rnying rgyud): na/ sangs rgyas mar me mdzad rgyan 'od kyi phung po snang ba zhes bya ba yod kyis/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// badz+ra pA Ni la rdo rje 'chang gis gdams ngag thog babs su bstan pa'i lung bstan pa'o/ badz+ra sa twa Sha
110b6(rnying rgyud): badz+raHrdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// badz+ra pA Ni dur khrod chen po so sa'i gling na/ mkha' 'gro ma nam mkha'i bu mo rdo rje rlung gi gshog pa can bya ba yod kyis/ de la thugs kyi phyag rgya ston lnga/ rang byung gi me tog phul la zhus shig/ rgya'i bang so nag
110b7(rnying rgyud): byang phyogs pha bong dregs pa can gyi 'og na/ lcags kyi sdig pa mgo dgu pa zhig gi 'og na/ byang chub snying po nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i gdams ngag tshig gsum yod kyis/ de zhus shig/ badz+ra pA Ni bya btsal med par ye shes kyi 'od gsal ba/
111a1(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa nyi ma shar blta bu'i man ngag gis/ 'jig rten pa'i sun pa dag par byed pas/ yul dag la chos kyi dbyings pho brang me long gal 'dag pa ltar gsal ba/ rang rig pa'i chos kyi skusangs rgyas lnga'i bradan/
111a2(rnying rgyud): nyid du gsal ba/ shes rab mar me rlung gis ma bskyod pa ltar gsal ba/ bar na ye shes kyi sgra bde ba chen po nam mkha'i 'ja' chen ltar ma 'dres la yangs su rdzogs par gsal ba'o// gsang ba gsum dang ldan gyur na// sangs rgyas nyid kyi
111a3(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa yin/ dgongs pa mthar phyin pa'i lung bstan pa'o// badz+ra tset+ta pra tiSh+Tha dz+nyA na AHhUM/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// badz+ra pA Ni/ dur khrod chen po shin tu ru lu ba ra hasti bya ba na/ mkha' 'gro ma gtsug gi rgyan gcig bya ba yod
111a4(rnying rgyud): kyis/ der sor la pha la phra ba ra da du pra shig/ yul ma ga d+hA'i shar phyogs na/ rin po che sna lnga'i pha bong 'og na/ bstan pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba nam mkha'i rgyan zhes bya ba yod kyis/ mkha' 'gro ma la bskor ba lan gsum gyis la/
111a5(rnying rgyud): ljags kyi pad+mo yi ge lnga pa'i 'khor lo ston la zhus cig/ de nas ye shes kyi rtsal skar mda' nam mkha' la byung ba lta bu'i man ngag gis/ skad cig ma gsum la sbubs gsum gcod par byed pa/ byed pa po med par mthong ba pos mthong nas shes pa pos shes so//
111a6(rnying rgyud): khyod nub phyogs su phyin pa'i tshe/ bgrod pa med par skye med nam mkha'i klong nas/ bkod pa med par ye shes kyi gzhal med khang du/ 'gyur med rdo rje'i gdan la rang snang rtogs pa'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu 'khod de/ yul chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang khyab
111a7(rnying rgyud): gang la 'ub chub chen por 'dus te/ don gyi dgongs pa nyag gcig la 'du 'bral med par bzhugs so// de na sangs rgyas shing sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan to// zhes lung bstan nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig tu bzhugasaso// /
111b1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa gsang ba nam mkha'i rgyan zhes byang / lag na rdo rje la rdo rje sems dpas lung bstan pa'o// de la zhub po dga' rab rdo rjes zhus te/ sdud pa po rdo rje chos kyis bsdus nas/ rin po che'i za ma tog tshon gang gi nang
111b2(rnying rgyud): du sbas nas/ mgul khug du bcug nas/ nyid kyi thugs dam rtse gcig par mdzad do/ rgyud lud man ngag grangs mang yang // bstan pa'i snying po yi ge la// thugs kyi gter du bcangs pa yin// gcig las gnyis su ma spel cig/
111b3(rnying rgyud): ces bkas bsdigs so na ra ka na// 'jam dpal rdo rje ye shes ngas// shrI si d+ha khyod la gtad// phyag rgya brda' yi dbyings su sbas// rdo rje 'chang gis rgya yis btab// mkha' 'gro lnga yis mdud pa bkrol// 'jam dpal rdo rje chos kyi mgul khrag
111b4(rnying rgyud): da myen dge sus la bcangs// yid ladun rgyunan sa sa sta// chu hrI~M ba~M ba bzhin// s+yAd pa la lpags cang khang mi byung / thabatsa med pags badzin pa cid drug gi ston pa/ sed 'gyur bzhi ba rdzom
111b5(rnying rgyud): so// gru gu smon lam seng ge nas brgyud pa/ jo sras sbas kyi thugs dam mo// khong la mgo ban nor bus zhus so// bar 'dir gyi zad lta bzod chen mangs pa le wa rdza brgyan gsum pa mabyung // / rgya gar skad du/ mA hA A ba d+ha pra sAr Ni rA dza tar+d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/
111b6(rnying rgyud): klong chen rab 'byams kyal po'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid la thos pa'i dus gcig na/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
111b7(rnying rgyud): thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las thams cad dbyer med de/ thig le gcig las ma g.yos pa'i bdag nyid du bzhugs pa las/ thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi klong du gcig kyang de'i don mngon du gyur par gtan la dbab par bya ba'i phyir/ 'og min gyi
112a1(rnying rgyud): gnas khams gsum gyi gzhi rten dang dbyer med pa'i zhing der/ dbyer med dang las snang ba'i 'khor dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang khams gsum gyi sems can tha mi dad pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das
112a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig pa dang / nyid dang nyid kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa dang / nyid kyi ngo bo dang rang bzhin las sprul pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa rnams la seng ge'i nga ro don gyi gsung dbyangs kyis brjod par byas te/ sems nyid
112a3(rnying rgyud): klong chen rab 'byams rgyal po'i don 'di rab tu bshad do// ji snyed chos rnams ming gi rnam grangs kun// ye nas gang ga gzhi med pa'i klong du gcig/ klong chen gcig la 'khor dang mya ngan 'das// rkyen gyis cir yang 'char phyir glo bur chos//
112a4(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' sprin dang 'ja' tshe na mkha' snang bzhin// rig pa rang la 'char bas dbyings kyi dang // rang rig sgrib med skyon bral mu mtha' med// rtog pa mi mnga' ye shes rin po che// rang bzhin med las cir yang sdang // thams cad byang chub sems kyi
112a5(rnying rgyud): klong // bde gshegs rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor dang // ma rig 'khrul pas dbang bsgyur ba'i// log rtog cher byas 'khor ba'i chos// ji snyed snang ba'i chos rnams kun// sangs rgyas nyid du gcig pa la// yod med gnyis su rtog pa dang /
