180a7(rnying rgyud): nas sa na sun lus du
180b1(rnying rgyud): gyi nang nas rdo rje thams dpa' rang bzhengs nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// rtswa rtse rig pa'i rtsal shwar bcom ldan 'das// gab pa'i dbyings nas mngon byung ste// phrin las mdad pa cir yang smon// thugs rje'i cho 'phrul ris dang bral// thig pa
180b2(rnying rgyud): zag med kun tu bzang // zang thal chen po'i dbyings nyid las// rang byung gyogs med rang grol gyis// ga'u rig pa'i mthongs gsal nas// gsung du mod pa'i tshig brjod nas// rtogs pa'i 'khor la bstan du gsol// e ma ho// gsung du/
180b3(rnying rgyud): gsol zhes nus so// de nam rig pa'i rgyal ba chen po des/ rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ rig pa lhun grub zag med bde// mkha' la nyi ma shar ba bzhin// 'khor 'das kun la khyad par gsal// khyad gsal
180b4(rnying rgyud): gnyig meng cig le che// lhan grub chen po'i ngo bor shar// 'bad pa med par ye sangs rgyas// 'gyur med tha snyad rgyu 'bras med// rnam kun byang sems bde bar gshegs// shes dang mi shes tha snyad kyang // lhan grub nyid las gzhan ma
180b5(rnying rgyud): grub// 'khor ba'i rkyen 'gyur rnam smin las// 'gro drug nyid du snang ba las// ngo bo ma yin rkyen ltar shar// kun brtags rnam rtog mtshan nyid kyang // gang ltar brtags pa de ltar snang // ji ltar rtog pa'i rnam grangs kun// gcig las
180b6(rnying rgyud): yul dus kun tu rgyu// dper na nyi ma'i zer bzhin du// thig le gcig las du ma med// lhun grub zang thal rang bzhin ni// mtha' dang bral ba'i rtogs mtha' med// rang gsal dgongs par gnas par bya'o// lhun grub rang byung 'gag
180b7(rnying rgyud): med kyis// 'khor 'das cho 'phrul nyid du bstan// lhun grub phyogs med 'bras bu ni// rang krur ye shes nyid la rdzogs// rig pa spyi phrug chen por shar// rtsol med rtsal sngags klung chen las// bgrod med sa yi yon tan shar// rang
181a1(rnying rgyud): snang dbyer med cig tshangs// de las rtsol mar 'bras bu'i mchog/ rig pa'i rtsal shang rnal 'gyor pas// shes pa chos sgra rang gsal la// ma yangs chog bzhas nyid du bzhag/ ces gsungs so// kun tu bzang
181a2(rnying rgyud): po rig pa rang gi rtsal shar ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas rig pa'i rgyal po des/ rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ci shwar dang // mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba
181a3(rnying rgyud): nyid// rig pa'i ye shes rtsal du rdzogs// rnam rtog ci skye rig pa'i rtsal// rang byung ye shes 'gag med la// rtog dang rig pa tha dad med// lhun grub phyogs med rig pa'i rtsa ba// kun spangs kun gyi dngos gzhir shar// gzung 'dzin//
181a4(rnying rgyud): phra rags rtogs pa rnams// rol pa chen po'i cho 'phrul yin// yang dgra don la brjod du med// ma bcos go rtogs me skye bas// brjod med brjod kyi tshig gis mtshon// kun bzang lhan grub gdal ba la// 'khor dang myang 'das rnam
181a5(rnying rgyud): par dag/ tshig dang tshig don brjod bya bral// bya ba tsal bral zhing gnyen po med// shes pa dang gsal dang la zhog/ bya ba btang ba'i skyes bu'am// rgya mtshor snang ba'i rdzas lta bu// byed spyod med par rang bzhin gsal// gzung 'dzin
181a6(rnying rgyud): chu 'bras gang yang med// de lta nyid kyis 'bras bu thob// drang don rtsol sems khar ma lus// rnam rtog kun brtags mtshan ma rnams// rang byung rang gsal nyid kyi dang // chos nyid lhun grub 'gag/ med las// chos rnams rang bzhin
181a7(rnying rgyud): nyid du gnas// dper na rin chen gser gling na// sa rdo mi gnas gser du snang // sems nyid rang thung le shes la// cir snang ci srid bde chen 'bar// dper na skas kyi gdang bu ltar// rim par bgrang med sems nyid la// 'a
181b1(rnying rgyud): lam gyi thogs kyu med// rang bung rang shar rnam grol lam// bzod med rtsol bral rig pa'i chung // swa gyi med par mngon mthar phyin// reg pa rtsal gyi rang bzhin ni// ye shas te ma mngon shar bas// shar ba nyid na nub pa med// kun bzang theg dra/
181b2(rnying rgyud): chen po nyid// ma bcos ldan grub g.yo ba med// rgyu 'bres tog 'dzin ci yang med// yul med sgyu ma yul la rol// sems nyid nam mkha'i nyi ma 'dra// rang phyung lhan grub gdal ba che// glang dor gnyis med 'bad rtsol med// mdor na rig
181b3(rnying rgyud): rnal zhes bya// mkha' la nyi ma shar ba bzhin// 'dir gsal 'dir mi gsal dang bral// kun la khyab cing dbye bsal med// de bzhin lung dang man ngag dang // rig pa dag gi rtsal dag gis// snang srid 'khor 'das chos rnams kun// sems
181b4(rnying rgyud): nyid yin par thag tshod na// byang sems bde ba kun la brdal// byang chub sems kyis blta rdzag ched// sems nyid nyi zer spro zhing badz+ra// rig pa cal gyi rang bzhin ni// gang yang yin no nor yang 'char// de yang byang sems bde ba'i klong // chos
181b5(rnying rgyud): rang gsal dang la bzhag/ bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes mthong // rang byung rang gsal rdzogs pa'i don// mtha' dbus bral bas ye sangs rgyas// gyi na rtsol bral dbu ma'i lam// zhen cing bral bas gza' gtad mod// phyogs mang lhan 'byams
181b6(rnying rgyud): kun bzang 'dis// 'khor 'das rang lugs gzhi byas nas// rang byung gnyis med bde don rtogs// rang rig rang gsal blang dor bral// rnam dag lam chen dgongs pa'i phugs// khyud chen dar sa mkhar lding bzhin// sprong med bsdur med rang sar
181b7(rnying rgyud): grol// rtsol bsgrub med cing g.yang sabral// g.yangs nyid kyang sems bla shes// 'khor ba nyid kyang ye shes la// ye nas 'khor 'das gnyis su med// spyan grub nyid las gzhan du med// rang rig zir yang ma thug pas// den rlobs ma 'dod kun
182a1(rnying rgyud): dang hAl// rig pa mthanga' drang dor nyid// 'dags la nam mkha' nga bzhin 'dra// gang na med pas mnyam pa'i dang // rol bu'i cho 'phrul rje yang ston// cho phrul bstan yang dang blud bal// reg pa snam cu zla 'dra// kun tu 'chang byung /
182a2(rnying rgyud): gyis grub// 'di yin 'di min tha snyad bral// rig pa ma bslad dri ma bral// nam mkha' lta bu'i rig pa la// nam mkha'i dbyings ltar bsam dang bral// bsam med rje bde nam mkha' bzhin// rang srung ye shes bsam dang bral// ma skye mi 'gag cir mi gnas// rig
182a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i bral po blta ba yin// bltar med yongs med blta ba yin// sde kyi dus las ma dmigs te// 'thung med sems kyig/ yung dung len// zhe 'dod dag las 'gyur mi srid// 'dod pa med cing len pa dag/ ldan byab bde 'byams yangs dog med// rang grol dag pa chen po la//
182a4(rnying rgyud): 'jo 'gyur med pas rdo rje 'dra// rnam rtog rlung gis bgyod gyur kyang // yun grub dang las g.yos pa med// gzhi 'dzin rig pa rgya mtsho bzhin// phyi nang gsang ba kun gyi dngos// mtha' dbum med cing phyogs dang bral// rang phung 'gag med blta ba la// lam dang lam gyi
182a5(rnying rgyud): rtsol ba med// rdo rje nyi chen 'brang ba sbyar// s+ye dog 'phro 'gyur nub mtha' med// rin chen gling dang nyi ma ltar// rang gsal 'gag med rtog dang bral// 'khor ba'i gnas nyid ye sangs rgyas// rang sems rig pa gang snang ba// bsam pa ci/ sprul ye
182a6(rnying rgyud): shes dang // lhun grub gzhi 'dzin rig pa la// sems can chos nyid gang yang med// dbus dang mtha' thal dkyil du rdzogs// rtag pa ma yin chad mtha' min// mi rtag ma yin bdag mtha' med// shes pa mi 'gag 'dod pa min// bya byed med cing brtsol sems dag/ 'grod med rtsos
182a7(rnying rgyud): bral rig pa'i klung // phyogs bral phyogs la gnas pa med// rang rig yul med yul dang bral// len med 'dzin med 'dod pa med// rang byung 'gag med mi ldan na// phyogs 'dzin mtha' la zhen pas 'khrul// phyogs med rig pa rang shar 'di// tra//
182b1(rnying rgyud): dmal mi gnas te// gya 'gagasamed par rnam brtags shing // ba'i drang drang 'joms sems can la// thugs rjes gtakrA nas 'khor lo bskor// tha smad lam gyis 'grob 'dren// sna tshogs snang ba'i chos rnams kun// sku gsung thugs las ma g.yas pa'i//
182b2(rnying rgyud): nga 'byor po rnam gsum po// nam mkha' ste bu yo nas bskor// zag med bde ba ye shes lnga// lhun grub chen po bsam mi khyab// gang zhig 'gro ba'i sgra skad rnams// zag med padi chen rig pa'i gsung // gang zhig kha dog dbyibs snang ba// sku mchog rgyan
182b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo zang // sems nyid dbyer med rdo rje'i thugs// gnyis su med pas kun tu bzang // sku gsum mi 'bral bdes che// sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas pas// rtsol ba med par lhun gyis grub// 'dod dgu bskur ba'i rin po che// bkol ba med cing dbyings na
182b4(rnying rgyud): sal// yi ge med cing tshig las 'das// rig pa rtsal zhes bya ba ni// sbrang srid 'khor 'das chos rnams kun// sems ma yin pa'i chos yod min// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rig pa'i rtsal du rang shar bas// de nyid chos sku dang gsal la// yengs dang ma
182b5(rnying rgyud): ngas mtha' las grol// rig pa dang gsal ye shes la// rtogs pa des med don gyi mchog/ rang shar rig pa dbyings na gsal// rig pa brdal khyab rang bzhin la// dang bud ye shes rang gis gsal// chos sku dang gsal dang nyid la// zhen 'ching med cing
182b6(rnying rgyud): legs dang bral// rig pa rtsal gyi rang bzhin ni// dper na mkha' ba nyi shar bzhin// rig pa dngagasal phyogs dang bral// phyogs rnams med cing kun la khyab// sna tshogs rig pa'i chos srur gsal// zhes gsungs so// kun tu bzang po rig pa rang gi rtsal shar
182b7(rnying rgyud): da pas/ rig pa rtsal gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rig pa'i rgyal po kun tu bzang po des/ rdo rje sems dpa' pa 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye dgongs pa dang shar dbyings na gsal// don dam mi rtogs snang med la// gab pa'i don chen mngon du
183a1(rnying rgyud): phyung // bla mas dgongs pa'i dbyings brtol ba'i// tshad mngag ldan bla ma yis// man ngag bdud rtsi bcud du bstan// bslad pas mi slong chos su la// rnam rtog kun brtags ga la yod// gser la g.yang byung gser nyid bsgrib// g.ya 'byung
183a2(rnying rgyud): gser las 'das pa med// thig les chos sku khyab par gsal// dper na 'khor los sgyur rgyal la// mtshan dpe zhen med rang la tshang // dmig phyed rgyan cha rang la gsal// de bzhin sems can sems nyid la// thig le chen po ngo smod na// ma bslad tshes sku dang gis/
183a3(rnying rgyud): gsal// thig le chos sku rang gsal la// mtshan dpe zhen med rang la tshangs// ngo bo nyid ni dmigs su med// gar yang ma g.yos 'gyur ba med// nyams su blang med gza' gtad bral// skye med 'gag med shar nub med// gang mthong cing gas pa ches skur mthong/
183a4(rnying rgyud): gang du'ang ma bgrod klong du gnas// 'byung 'jug med cing gzhag bya bral// 'das dang ma 'ongs da lta ru// snang zhen med cing bgrod du med// rang byung ye shes rang gsal bas// mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po med// dper na dmus long mig phye bas// rang lus gzhan nas
183a5(rnying rgyud): btsal mi dgos// de bzhin thig le chen po yang // mtshan ma chos skur ngo shes na// mi mthun med pas gnyen po med// chos su rang gsal gdeng rnyed na// bgrod rtsol 'bad pag la yod// rnam par blta med zhen 'ching med// phyogs rnams med cing phyogs dang ba la// /
183a6(rnying rgyud): dper na nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar// rang gi ngo bo rang gsal ltar// rang srasal nyid la gnas pa med// dmigs med mtshan ma cing mi gnas// sdang stong kun gsal ye shes su// thig le dang gsal rang bzhin la// snang dang stong pa gnyis su med// dngos
183a7(rnying rgyud): por snang ba tha snyad rnams// snang zhes tha snyad ci byung yang // mtshan ma dang grol tha snyad pral// rnam rtog ye shes dgongs par ldan// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das rnams kun// gnyis ka ye shes rang gsal la// dgag srub med cing wang blar med// 'byung 'jug med
183b1(rnying rgyud): drim bral med// tha snyad med cing snying po med// ngag dang ma dag tshig mtha' bral// gang yang bde dang sdug bsngal med// rtsol ba med cing spyod mtha' bral// bya byed med cing chos skur gsal// khyed pa med cing 'ching grol dag/ bdag gzhan ye nas gnyis su med//
183b2(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba rigs drug bder gshegs zhing // yod med mtshan ma dbyer med la// blang dor dbye bas la rang gis bral// ma lus chos rnams thams cad kun// shes pa chos skud dang gsal bas// kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa la// gang yang ma g.yos chos nyid yin// rang phyu
183b3(rnying rgyud): nyid du dang grol bas// gzhan dag rtsol bsrub ga la yod// so sor rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis// theg pa na brtsegs dang byung bral// rang gung thig le gcig tu 'dus// theg le mi rtog dang bzhin gsal// chos su rdo rje 'gyur med lung // rang byud ye shes rang lags pas//
183b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad ye shes ngo bor gsal// zhes gsungs so// kun tu bzang po rig pa rang gi rtsal shar ba'i rgyud las/ gab pa mngon du phyung pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang rang gyung rig pa'i rgyal po kun tu bzang po des/ rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di
183b5(rnying rgyud): da ces gsol to// rang byung ye shes 'gag med la// bkag pas mi khegs ye shes shar// zang thal chen po'i rang bzhin ni// rangags la gang du mi rtog phyir// btsal med rig pa'i shugs las 'byung // dper na glang chen smyon pa ltar// btags thos
183b6(rnying rgyud): btang na rang ldog ltar// rnal 'byor shes pa yan btang na// ma btsal gnas lugs dang du ldog/ dang byung mi 'gag rtsal du khyer// gang la'ang ma chags thogs pa med// rang shar chen po'i lta ba lnga// don 'gyur nyams su blang pa med// ye shes chen
183b7(rnying rgyud): po'i cho 'phrul yin// rang byung rang gsal zad thal yin// zad thal nyid la gzung du med// 'dzin med rig pa ye shes shar// 'khrul rtog sdug bsngal sgra tshogs kyang // myang rgyu med par shugs la snang // rtsol med rang byung rang sa zin// 'di la ched du gzung
184a1(rnying rgyud): du med// 'di la nyams su blangs dang bral// 'di la rtog pas dgag tu med// ye shes rang shar lta ba'i gad // rtsol ba med pa sgom pa'i mchog/ btsal ma dgos pas 'bras bu 'don// zhes gsungs so// kun hA
184a2(rnying rgyud): bzang po rig pa rang gi rtsal shang ba'i chud las/ ye shes zang thal gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas rig pa'i rgyal po kun tu bzang po nges// rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal 'gro lam pa'i sems can rnams/
184a3(rnying rgyud): lhun grub dang la dbyer med pas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sbrul sku yin// b+hag phrang nyid du yi sangs rgyas// ma bcos su gsung 'khor long slong// chos rnams kun bzang rol par shar// gang yang ma yin chos kyi sku// gzhan du mi rtog btsal du med// gAng
184a4(rnying rgyud): yang ma spangs kun tu rol// dper na skyes bu ngo shes dang // phrad pa'i dus na the chos med// rnal 'byor dran rig ci 'thu la// ye shes zang thal chos srung shes// gang yang ma spangs rang sar grol// gzhan du skad cig tsam yang med// thig le drug zad chos
184a5(rnying rgyud): kyisku// rang bzhin mi 'gyur ka dag pa'i// spang bya sdong byed gnyis su med// 'bras bu kun bzang gtan tshigs yin// zhes gsungs so// kun tu bzang po rig pa rang gi rtsa la shar ba'i rgyud las/ chos nyid thug phrad kyi le ru ste lnga pa'o//
184a6(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po kun tu bzang po des/ rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bde cheran ljang bub tsog bzhag la// rtsol med rig pa bas me dang bral// gzung 'dzin gnyen po rang sar gzhag
184a7(rnying rgyud): mnyam nyid ye shes 'bras bu'i mchog/ tsog bzhag chen po'i ngang du gsal// dper na rgya mtsho dang pa la// rdos pa med par ljang srid gsal// rnal 'byor dang rig cir gsal ba// ming dang gdags gzhi gang yang med// gdags
184b1(rnying rgyud): gzhizal ba don gyi mjug/ mnyam nyid rang gsal rig pa'i klong // sbyang ba nyid na grub pa med// rang dzin stong nyid mgal ba// dal mtshol rnal 'byor mchog/ dbang ba 'ad la gang snang ba// me rtog ci dgas la gdags gzha
184b2(rnying rgyud): bral// snang med mi 'gag rjir mi dgongs// gnyen po med pas 'bad rtsol bral// zhes gsungs so// kun tu bzang po rig pa rang gi rtsal shar ba'i rgyud las/ mnyam nyid cog pazhig gi le'u ste drug pa'o//
184b3(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po kun tu bzang po des/ rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig sems dpa' rdo rje khyod// dbang po yang rab don rdzogs nas// 'bring dang dman pa'i
184b4(rnying rgyud): don bshad nyon// chos sku nyag gcig dngos mtshan med// dngos med chos gru tshol 'dod na// dper na grong chu'i khyi rkun gyis// cad med khang stong btsal gyur kyang // 'dod pa ma rnyed sun phyin nas// zhen log skar
184b5(rnying rgyud): nyal ba ltar// rnal 'byor rang rig cir skyes la// dbang po mi dgag nang du blta// cir snang brtags shing bdag por blta// gzung 'dzin gang skyes rtsa ba med// nang du blta zhing lha mkhan btsal// btsal bas cing
184b6(rnying rgyud): yang ma rnyed cing // gang du'ang ma mthong ming ma thogs// rjes med nam mkha'i bya lam 'dra// snang med rang byung nam mkha' 'dra// de la gnas pa 'bras bu'i mchog/ ces gsungs so// kun tu bzang po rig pa
184b7(rnying rgyud): rang gi rtsal shar ba'i rgyud las/ tshol ba rjes med kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas rig pa'i rgyal po kun tu bzang po des/ rdo rje sems dpa' la bka' stsal pa// chos su yaM nas dmigs gtad
185a1(rnying rgyud): yang// dmigs gtad med pa'i don 'dod na// dper na mig nad can dag gis// gang yang rung ba'i dngos po la// rgyang mig bltas shing yin min brtags// brtags pa'i rjes la dmigs pa 'dzubs
185a2(rnying rgyud): gang mthong ma shes mdongs pa ltar// rnal 'byor skyes bu gang zhig gis// rdzas ci rnam pa gang rung la// 'bru tshug bltas shing ma gtang na// dran med 'dzin med long gis skye// ma btang yun bsring ye shes 'chang // ye shes mkha'
185a3(rnying rgyud): mnyam nam mkha' 'dra// dran pa med pa'i blong blong po// myong med nyams skye dran rig 'gag/ dmigs pa rjes med kyi nar 'jug/ btang snyoms chen po'i chos sgra thob// ces gsungs so// kun tu bzang po rig par
185a4(rnying rgyud): rtsal shar ba'i rgyud las/ dmigs pa rjes med kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas rig pa'i rgyal po kun tu bzang pos/ rdo rje sems dpa' la bka' stsal pa// dpeng na khyud chen rdol med kyang // rtsol ba yid tsam stegs la
185a5(rnying rgyud): brten// rten med ye shes thob 'dod na// dper na khyi gsang rtod btags na// gang du mi 'gro der 'khor ltar// gang yang rung ba'i mtshan ma'am// dmigs dang bcas pa'i mtshan med la// yengs pa med par blo gtad nas// ma goms
185a6(rnying rgyud): bar du brtag par bya// goms shing dmigs pa gsal gyur nas// nus pa phra mo 'byin nus na// gdeng gis zin pa'i bla ma yis// kun bzang lhun grub dgongs pa'i dod// rus de khe nar lung phog na// snyan khung brgyud pa'i man ngag gis// rang byung
185a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes shugs las 'char// mtshan bcas mtshan med rang sar grol// khyung chen nam mkhar lding ba 'dra// de ltar ma shes rtog med na// gang yang rung ba'i mtshan ma'am// blo rtse gang 'phror dmigs pa las// bltas pas shes dang brtags pas shes//
185b1(rnying rgyud): bsgoms pas shes dang banang bas gas// gzung bas nas dang lagaganan shes// thun mong thabs kyim dug drug/ mang pyor bsgom dang rang nyid 'asgom// mtshan mtshan la bsnyen nas ni// mtshan mad la shAs shugs ngas sus// zags dag pa
185b2(rnying rgyud): ni// Thag med pa chen zhugs pas byung // zhes gsungs so// po dag par gi la ga pa'i rgyu las/ bu kyi larje byed krung // da rnas paco ldan 'das ga pa'i rtsal bzhin rgya bang pos/ sa dpa'
185b3(rnying rgyud): pa// rig pa'i rgyal ni rnamagasam kye// rang byung brtags snang gnyis med gsum// mkha' pa nyi shang ba rjid ste// rgyu dang 'om 'das star snang // grub pa mngon srung rnamags sa ste// rang gnas ma shes bral gyis 'i// gnyis
185b4(rnying rgyud): de rnam gsum po// dmus yong dmigs sde me long dang // rin ched 'das nas tshon snang spyad// chos nyid zang thal rnams sum ste// rang bzhin rtsa la dang gnyis med gsum// b+ho stag glang chen man shel 'dra// chos nyid gsum phre gsu nyid da/
185b5(rnying rgyud): rkyen dang nyis me dgas ma// dri du chen gseng phreng rdzogs mi// da gri kha mang lta bur rdar// tshig pazhag na ma gsum nyid len te// gnas lugs rnabs bral ma nga gsum// namamakha' rnaM rtsamatsho dang // thub btang ba'i skyes snang snang // tshol brjes myed nas
185b6(rnying rgyud): gsum ste// nang dang kyi dang gnyis su med// khyi kun nam mkha'i rgyal ma dang // tshu la la thib tab ltar snang // dmigs pa rjes med dag kyang / sum// myi dang nang dang gnyis su med// ma 'dris khang stong mig nad can// chu la chu thim lta bur snar// stod pa
185b7(rnying rgyud): kyang nam gsum ste// don yod gang gsal zhen pa med// bum pa bdud rtsi bu chung gzugs// khrung phrag gsheg rdzogs lta bung sngang // skang srid 'khor 'das lam pa'i chos// zab mo'i gdams ngag ji snyed pa// 'di ru ma 'dus gang yang med// ces
186a1(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// kun tu bzang po rig pa rang gi rtsal shar ba'i rgyud las/ dbye thabs 'khor lo'i man ngag rgya che grub mtha'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas rang grol rig pa'i rgyal po kun tu bzang po des/ rdo rje sems
186a2(rnying rgyud): dpa' la bka' stsal pa/ rig pa rtsal 'byongs rnal 'byor la// drod rtags mthar gyin 'di ltar 'byung // phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum// 'od dang nyi shar shes pa 'phyo// phyogs ris med dang 'dod pa chung // 'bras bu dag la mi re zhing // g.yengs pa
186a3(rnying rgyud): bdud la ta mang med// rig pa'i cha 'phrul dag tu 'char// gab pa mngon phyung mthar phyin rtags// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'dus// nam mkha'i mahod rtse snying rje che// chags med bla ma mched grogs gdung // dam tshig la gnas te ring med// spyod
186a4(rnying rgyud): yul gang lan 'dod med// ye shes zang thal mthar gyin rtags// gyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'byung // nam mkhar 'gro dang thogs pa med// lus yod ma tshor skyem byed bral// dr-i du yul gang la yang 'don med pa'o// bug zang goms teg
186a5(rnying rgyud): shes na// phyi nang gsang ba'i rtags gsum 'byung // gang la zhum med skyengs med dang // gtsang sme blang dor spang len med// cer mthong shug phrad ye shes shar// cog bzhag klong gyur mi rtsol rtags// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum// rtsol ba chung dang
186a6(rnying rgyud): khong khro med// lus sems rang lugs spyod yul bral// btsal ba rjes med rtsad chod rtags// gyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'char// rtsol ba chung dang zhen chags log/ sgo gsum las la rjes med 'char// dmigs pa rjes med mthil phebs rtags//
186a7(rnying rgyud): gyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'char// gang la this me 'dzugs pa dang // sems la gtad som rnyed cing // dbyer med gzung 'dzin med par 'char// rkang phur dmigs pa brtan thob rtags// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'char// me chu rlung dang / kha dog //
186b1(rnying rgyud): ga yo dang za sa yang dang // na la smrasadzang// da rnam sh-iganamaH dang // yang mar thugs sun dang // byang yul rgyam pa gsapa// mnyas gnas rnas med pa dang // thog da da rgya dang gas tshang / nan
186b2(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// kun tu bzang po rig pa rang gi rtsal shar ba'i chud las/ drod rtags 'bras bu bstan pa'i leng+ga ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po kun tu bzang pos// rdo rje sems dpa' la bkang stsal pa/
186b3(rnying rgyud): gdams ngag don rtogs gdeng ldan na// dus de kho nar 'bras bu 'thob// spyod yul rig pa rang shar yin// shes pa lhag parang byung nyid// chags med rtsog med rang grol ted// zhen pa rang log phyog ris med// dogs med cing phyo bla sa med// du ma ro ga cig 'phel 'grib
186b4(rnying rgyud): med// lhan grub phyag rgya chen po nyid// de lta nyid du 'bras bu grub// dbus cir snang ye shes la// ldan grub 'gyur mid bye ba med// rang shar sbal pa dpag med 'gyid// thams cad 'bras bu dang shwar na// thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'bras bu yin//
186b5(rnying rgyud): 'dre ldog spyi'u tshugs gar song yang // 'bras bu nyid de mngon sangs rgyas// 'khor 'das dbyer med 'bras bu'i mchog/ 'khor ba nyid la myang 'das gsal// sdug bsngal bde bar rang shar na// don gyi 'bras bu skye ba med// ces gsungs so// kun
186b6(rnying rgyud): bzang po rig pa rang gi rtsal shar ba'i rgyud las// 'bras bu mngon du phyung ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po kun tu bzang po de nyid snang ba rang grol ye shes rang gsal gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
186b7(rnying rgyud): mo// de'i dus de nyid kho nar rdo rje sems dpa' nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor rnams la 'dzum pa mdzad do// rig pa'i rgyal po la bstod pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po skye med nam mkha'i thugs// rdo rje'i skul 'gyur med skye 'jig bral// byin rlabs gsung gis tshig med ngon
187a1(rnying rgyud): la mngon// 'du 'bral med par phra gsung thugs kyi dang // a maho// al ta// zhes brjod pas rab tu dkris par gyur to// kun tu bzang po rig par dag rdul shar ba'i rgyud las/ bstod pa'i 'jam bcu gsum pa'o//
187a2(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po kun tu bzang po des rdo rje sems dpa' la rgyad dang man ngag gi don gtad pa/ kye sde rig pa'i skyes bu chen pos rgyud 'di zung / sgra dang tshig byer ma 'grengs don gyi gtar// yang dag don chen gsang ba'i nang mchog sa
187a3(rnying rgyud): nga yi thugs brtol dgongs pa'i bcud phyung nas// rgya mtsho lta zla gting zab dpag dka'adon// kun dang kun gyi thun mong ma yin pas// nyid las mi gzhan byad med 'khor rnams la// khyab par ston cig sems dpa' rdo rje khyod// snod ldan las 'gro yod par/
187a4(rnying rgyud): gang zag gam// rig pa skye brug shar ba'i gang zag la// the tshom yid gnyis med par myur du ston// zhes gsungs pas/ nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// kun tu bzang po rig pa rang gi rtsal shar ba'i rgyud las/ rlung
187a5(rnying rgyud): gtad pa dang rjes su yi rang ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// kun tu bzang po reg pa rang gi rtsal shar ba'i rgyud le'u bcu bzhi pa rdzogs so// shrI sid+d+ha dang po ros bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ ra dz+nyo ba de sha bi shwa tsakratan+ta pa b+hau ma~M nA ma/
187a6(rnying rgyud): skad du/ rin po che gdams ngag sna tshogs 'khor lo'i rgyud phyi ma/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis sems dpa' rdo rje'i brda' yongs su go ba'i dus 'tshig na// ston pa dka' rab rdo rje sprul pa'i skyes bu chen po
187a7(rnying rgyud): de nyid skye 'gag med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe lta ba rags par rtogs pa'i 'khor du ma 'khod do// sprul pa'i bdag nyid 'jam dpal ba shes gnyen dang / rgyal po d+han ta dang / thu bo rA dza ha sti dang / gzhan yang mkhas pa nyi shu rtsa
187a8(rnying rgyud): bar 'dir rin po che gdams ngag sna tshogs 'khor lo 'dzug/
187b1(rnying rgyud): gcig la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'khor dang / gzhan yang ye shes dang las las grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas yang 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis 'di skad ces
187b2(rnying rgyud): gsol to// kye sprul pa'i skyes chen dga' rab rdo rje nyid// mos gus dad pas 'dun shing rang sems rtogs// las dang skal par ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la// sdong chen brgyad kyi man ngag don bkrol bshad// lhun grub lta ba'i gdong ldan gdar sha bca
187b3(rnying rgyud): dus masum pa nis nas m+bu b+hUn la d+ha // dag pa'i la durgyas rnams mas cad bzlas// la bzlab ma pa sa shes 'a bal la// rnag nga dru kyis da ny-i// ma bsgrubs bas ga ga bdag 'a sa
187b4(rnying rgyud): sa / sa
187b5(rnying rgyud): pas mkhyen ltar bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas// de nas dga' rab rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal bshes gnyen nyon cig/ dbang po rab dang 'bring gi don// mthar thug don du nga yis bstan// blo na shes rab zhan pa la// phan gdags grol ba'i
187b6(rnying rgyud): man dag dang // ro snyoms zag bcas gdams ngag dang // de la brten 'byung zag med kyi// gdams dgaci gsungs ngas bshad kyis// 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gzung bar gyis// zhes gsungs nas/ ro snyoms bde ba dang thig le 'khyil pa zhes
187b7(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// gdams ngag sna tshogs 'khor lo'i rgyud phyi ma las/ gleng gzhi zhub dang bcas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas dga' rab rdo rje zhes bya ba des/ 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la sogs pa'i 'khor
188a1(rnying rgyud): na/ rnams la brda'a'am byon gyis brlab kyi tshul gyis 'di// daces bka rgam // gang dag sbyong na shas rlung gis// mtshan mtshan la brtan nas na// mtshan med ye shes 'char ba yin// mtshan ma dag grang ma yin te//
188a2(rnying rgyud): dang kha sbyor bde ba dang // sku tshad yig 'bru'i mtshan ma dang // gang 'phrod spyod yul mtha' dag yin// dang po rlung 'grom man ngag ni// rnam pa bdun du shes par bya// gzung dang bcing dang spyang dang wang // g.yas g.yon s+pho dang Sh+Tha ting gzug/ mthar phyen dag
188a3(rnying rgyud): dang rnam pa bdun// 'byung dang 'jug dang gnas pa gsum// hU~M dang oM dang AHgsum ni// bsgom pa yang ni de ltar bya// rlung gi de nyid bdag nyid do// sngags kyi de nyid dag dang gsum// rtogs nas rang sems gzung bar bya// rlung la sems 'dzin byed pa'i
188a4(rnying rgyud): cho// thun bzhir bcad la bsgom par bya// sna sgo dag gi bu kar ni// rlung ni phar 'gro tshur 'ong bar// de tsam gcig la gtad la bsgom// de la sems ni zin gyur na// kha dog gcig la bslab pa ni// dkar po dar gyi srung po tsam// snying ga ru ni byang
188a5(rnying rgyud): nas kyang // phyi rol sor brgyad tsam gyi bar// de la sems ni zin gyur na// lte ba yin phyi rol gyi// sor ni bcu dug dag tu bsgom// kha dog lnga la bslab pa yang // shin tu phra ba de bzhin bslab// khong pa khengs par bsgom pa yang // khong pa'i nang du
188a6(rnying rgyud): 'jug tsam na// skud pa khengs pa'i tshul du bsgom// rlung ni phar 'gro'i dus tsam na// skud pa stong pa bzhin du bsgom// rang sems gang la mi 'phro bar// rlung la chags par gyur pa na// rlung la sems ni zin pa'i rtags// rlung ni spang ba'i rim pa
188a7(rnying rgyud): yang // kha dog phra tshad spangs nas kyang // phyi nang 'byung 'jug rnam gsum po// oM dang AHda'i hUM gsum gyis// sgra spyi'i rnam pa dag la brten// 'byung 'jug byed parang shugs las// ma bcos pa ru bsgom pa yin// dang por thun bzhir bcad la bsgom//
188b1(rnying rgyud): de nas thun gyi khrag par bskrad// mjug tunyin mtshan bslang la bsgom// da yang 'byungs pa'i rtags rnams ni// yang bzar ba zhing lus pa yang // ji tsam bkag kyang na tsa med// gang rlung ga rlung 'dus paman// drug drung stong du 'dzangs pa yas/
188b2(rnying rgyud): grwab yang ni rtsa par 'drongs// rtsa ba'i rlung yang phra bar 'drangs// de ni rlung gi 'byings hwags yin// rlung rnams bcings pa'i man dag sang // rnam gsum drug tu shes par bya// bum pa che 'bring rnamag smam mo// tha me bA kyi man ga kyang // stan padun
188b3(rnying rgyud): gzhil 'dug nas kyang // lus bsrang stsol krung bcas nas kyang // maM yengs mig ni d+ha rtser gtad// dbugs ni nang du bsnam byas nas// lag pa'i mthil gyis sras mo bskor// so gol re re bdab pa ni// bcwa rtsa brgyad kyi bar du'o// bdun tsuci gnyis/
188b4(rnying rgyud): bum pa 'bring // sum cu rtswa gnyis bum pa za// bum pa can ni de ltar bslab// btsan thabs dag gi man dag ni// mgrin pa thig les bkag byas te// lus ni skyil mo krung brngas te// ol mdud og mas bkag nas ni// dbugs ni thub tshang bsdam par/
188b5(rnying rgyud): yang // yang na g.yas su gtsu bar bya// yang na an tod skrag pas mAnan// yang nagayon dugarngu bar bya// sems kyis thub tshad dag tu bsdam// stong nyid bsgoms pas rlung nad ni// rang bzhin dag tu 'gro ba yin// des ni bde ba 'bad med 'byung // rlung rnams
188b6(rnying rgyud): spar pa'i man ngag kyang // a long dag gi dkyil 'khor yin// de ni yang 'byed yang 'dzum byas// 'dod chags me ni 'bar bar 'gyur// rting chung mnan cing 'og rlung sbar// rtsa yi nang du song ba yis// byang sems zhu nas 'byings par 'gyur// g.yas g.yon khro ba'i
188b7(rnying rgyud): min gakyang// danas namug d+had me par// gang shes par 'di tshu sa// med bas min ga // sa nas po bsrung bgyi// 'gags na pa rnaMm pa yin// rgyur ba thug pa'i mnang gtsang // skyil ma thong babs lag pa shAr/
188b8(rnying rgyud): rlung gi yang //
189a1(rnying rgyud): ni cung zadagadangs nas kyang // srog pa rtsa yi nang nas kyang // awa thug// shin tu zab dang lngal 'dra// ska la tshogs pa brtan tu ti'i nang // dka na las g+nis byung bar bsam// nang du 'jug par sbyar ba yang // bug/
189a2(rnying rgyud): ni de la 'ong bar bsam// yud tsam nang du 'gran par bas ma// gal te chud par gyur pa na// mi tog ye shes rgyu bar 'gyur// rtswa yi g.yas dang g.yon shes pa// rnam par rtog pa'i lam yin no// a wat+mA ti zhes byu ba// mi tog ye shes lam yang
189a3(rnying rgyud): 'dus 'bring gi tshad du shes// g.yang lhung chus khyer 'byung ba'i dgras// tshe yi 'du byed mi nus pa/ rab tu gyur pa'i rtags yin no// de ltar de gsal shugs dag las// stong nyid goms shing ye shes gsal// je gsal rdo rig 'byung ba las// mi rtog ye
189a4(rnying rgyud): shes shugs las 'char// zhes gsungs so// gdams ngag hUM tshogs 'khor lo'i chud las/ rig pa rlung la gtang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas sprul pa'i skyes bu dga' ra ba rdo rje des/ 'jam dpal bshos gnyen la sogs pa'i
189a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dbang po dman pa'i gang zag gis// cig char thod rgal mgo ste// rim gyis bde ba bsgom pa na// mi mo la brten 'od rig dang // mtshan dang ldan pa'i mi mo la// brten pa'i gdams ngag lnga yin
189a6(rnying rgyud): te// tshogs dang gtad dang bzung ba dang // rim gyis sems bzung sdang thabs so// tshogs pa gnas zhes bya ba ni// zla ba phyed dam zla ba gcig/ lug gzhon sha dang chang zhim po// mi mngaran par bza' btung bya// nas zan sha dag bcos pa dang /
189b1(rnying rgyud): dpyi stong dag la gtang // sha chan chu ser phog gcig gdan// pa dmar mo yi'i mar btsas pa la// shing kun dag ga ma la// tsha ba gsum dang yang lo// chang dang sbyar ta kha spang bya// de bzhin thos na byung sa mas rgyas// ra mo shag dang mu bri sogs
189b2(rnying rgyud): bzud lon dag ni thams cad kyang // bde ba 'phel bar byed pa ste// dkar gsum zhong krugs la sogs pa// shu kra rgyas pa'i thabs mchog ste// bzung ba dbang ni gsum pa ste// bla mas lag par gtad pa ni// gtad pa shes rab ma der ni// tshig kyang
189b3(rnying rgyud): rab tu brjod pa'o// bzung ba de yi lam yin no// rim gyis sems bzung man ngag kyang // gnas ni dben sar phyin nas kyang // shin tu mdzes pa'i gzugs dag la// chags shing chags pa'i lta bas blta// des ni bde ba skye bar 'gyur// tshad du
189b4(rnying rgyud): tshul na bzhin \u0f7f/ sgyid med pa ba'an gyur na// num yan chad wA bar bya// des kyang zhan na pa d+ma sogs// lus rnams thams cad bsgru bar bya// sems ni zin nas myed med na// rta bong la sogs 'khrig pa'i gtam// sbrul brten
189b5(rnying rgyud): sems na bzung // de la bde ba skyed med na// lus la dri bzang dag gis gdab// sems ni dri ma dag la gzung bar bya// mchog tu bde ba skyes gyur kyang // tshad du sgrol bar ma gyur na// bde ba reg bya nyid la bslab// bud med shes rab ma
189b6(rnying rgyud): de yi// stong smad sked par 'khyud par bya// rked nas lag pas dam du 'khyud// sen mos rked skabs ngag tu gdab// de ltar byas pas bde ba skye// dbang po'i sgo ni mi sprad par// sems ni de la gzung bar bya// de nas ro smad dag la bslab//
189b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje pad+mar reg rig bya// rim gyis de ltar byas pa yis// bde ba je 'phel je 'phel 'gyur// des kyang ma zin skyed med na// de nas dbang po'i sgo sprad de/ shes rab gsang ba rno ba dang // rdo rje'i kha ni che ba dang // nang du snyoms 'jug 'ong ba ste//
190a1(rnying rgyud): thug par gsang ca chud pa na// byad ba byas na tan maman na// 'gags can nom chud na// gan rgyal tAl ta tshang dadu// dzang chung thug tsam brlagal// mkhal mdudu sas long gzhug/ gas ma da
190a2(rnying rgyud): dkris pa ni// phyi gnag sa song kha dru gzhug/ des ni phyi skor rtsa dag 'ong // kha sbol dag tu gyur pa na// pad+ma'i rgya ba 'phrul bar bya// zang 'gyur rdornga'i'abum par gzhug/ nang du de ltar 'grogs la btang // rdo rje nang du spod ba bzhin// phyi ba'i bshad
190a3(rnying rgyud): gsad na ni// rked pa brgyangs la sbyor bar bya// gsang cazhan cing zhi lung na// khyung lding dag gi myo baH// shes rab ma yi ting pa ga sa// thos pa'i phrag gong gnyis la bkal// rdo rje bzug ste bskrod par bya// ce ni brdungs pas ba
190a4(rnying rgyud): g.yas su zhan g.yon nas sbyor bar bya// mdun du zhan rgyub nas sbyor// rtsa nyid gal te ma rnyed kyang // steng rlung mnan cing 'og rlung bskul// sems bzung dal bus smod par byed// bde ba skyes nas bskyod pa bshol// chung rnga dum re du mar
190a5(rnying rgyud): babyud// bde ba ched du sgrol nas ni// bsgral ba ni srung bar bya// tsam gyis ni 'dri ba d+ma// rdo rgyal sogs thang byed bya'o// na pa stsol 'khyud pa yang // bai ltas pa'i smon su yang yang b+ha// brtse ba yangs shing dran pa ma// dran pa
190a6(rnying rgyud): nyid kyis tshad stsol na// zlog gi sgra yang yang byas te// bad bus mas pa kha la dus su// ci mthong thams ca dang dbar mthong // bad pa'i la shes khol tsam na// rang byung ba shes rang rtags 'char// gis gsungs so// gdams dgang tshogs par
190b1(rnying rgyud): ngo'i mya ma las// rig pa bdapal gtod pa'i ladra ste gsum pa'o// / de nas dga' rab rjes 'ja ma dpal bshas gnyen la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dbang po dman pa'i gang zag gis// sku tshad dag la ba slab h+ya hA/
190b2(rnying rgyud): bdag gi mdun gyi nam mkha' la// phar 'phen gang gis zad so ru// sems dpa' rdo rje tshon gang pa// rnam par snang mdzad dag kyang rung // mos pa'i gzugs sku gang yin pa// dkar ram ser ram dmar kyang rung // kha dog gsal zhing 'tshar
190b3(rnying rgyud): ba lnga// sku stod dar dkar po gzhu can// su sprad tshi gu'i sha ma thabs can// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag mtshan nam// rang gi phyag mtshan gang yin pa// gdan la bzhugs shing gsal bar bsgom// yang na rang nyid de ltar bsgom// degasal ma btang yun
190b4(rnying rgyud): bsgyings nas// shes pa gzir zhing gcan nas kyang // gsal bar dmigs zhing nin tan \u0f7f// mgasal thabs kyi lan gdug/ gnas skabs sbyor zhing gtang bar bya// de ltar sems ni byin gyur na// brtan par gyur pa'i drid dag ni// ji skar
190b5(rnying rgyud): bsgoms pas gsal gyur na// mtshan ma gzhan gyis rtog med na// mi rtog pa la gzhag par bya// yang na gang yang rung ba yis// dkyil 'khor gtso dang sbrul tshogs dang // 'khor lo'i cha byad gang mos pa// gcig dang mang po gang mos la//
190b6(rnying rgyud): dmigs shing bslab pa gong dang 'dra// yang na gzhung nas byung ba yi// mtshan rtags su tshad thams cad dang // dngos su snang dang mi snang ba'i// gdams dag la bslab pa yin// zhes gsungs so// gdams ngag sna tshogs 'khor
190b7(rnying rgyud): lo'i rgyud gyi ma las// mtshan rtags su tshad la rig pa gtad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas ston pa dga'i rab rdo rje yis/ 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo ngan
191a1(rnying rgyud): shes rab chung ba yis// yig 'bru dag la bslab rgyaste// k+Sha kha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis la// gang 'argyad ldan du bal zhing bsgom// yang na rang gA snying gca// yig a gcig gsal bar bsgom// de lam pa tang yan
191a2(rnying rgyud): bsrings pas// brtan par gyur pa'i drod tshad ni// phyi nad rnam rtog ma 'gyus par// yi ge dngos po gsal gyur na// mi rtog pa la gzhag par bya'o// yang na don gyi yi ge la// 'di ltar gsal zhing bsgom par bya'o// hUM ni kha dog sngon po
191a3(rnying rgyud): gcig/ dbugs kyi snal phyir 'byung bsam// de yang bde chen rnam par gsal// oM ni kha dog dkar po gcig/ nang du 'gro ba'i sngal bsgom// de yang bde ba'i rnam par gsal// yang na 'di ltar gsal bar bya// steng gar pad+ma 'dab
191a4(rnying rgyud): bzhi yi// ze 'bru a dang bcas pa la// 'phro 'du bya zhing bde bar gsal// sems ni ma zin bar du gtad// zin nas mi rtog don la sbyar// yang na rang nyid gang mos pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi yig 'bru'am// rgya gor rgya nag yi ge ru// ba'i
191a5(rnying rgyud): bcu rtsa gnyis bye brag la// dngos su gsal dang yid la chags// mi gtang sems ni gtad gyur na// shugs las rang byung ye shes 'char// zhes gsungs so// gdams ngag sna tshogs 'khor lo'i rgyud phyi ma las// gsung yig 'bru la sems
191a6(rnying rgyud): bzung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas yang ston pa dga' rab rdo rje zhes bya ba des// 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo ngan shes rab chung ba yis// lhun grub don la sbyor 'dod na/
191a7(rnying rgyud): sems kyi skye ba nges med yin// bde dang sdug bsngal btang snyoms dang // mi mthun phyogs dang dge sdig dang // phyogs mthun phyi nang spyod yul dang // dbang po lnga dang yul dus dang // skye mched yul du gang shar bar// brten nas ye shes 'char du
191b1(rnying rgyud): rung // mi dag bcu dang mtshams myed la// dug lnga drug gsum rtog pa'i chags// dag dang ma dag ni spyod yul la// brtan nas ya shas 'char du rung // 'dod yan lnga dang rgyan lnga dang // dag bcu pa ral phyin bcu dang // tshad med bzhi dang srin
191b2(rnying rgyud): las bzhi// chos dang mthun pa'i spyod yul la// brten nas ye shes 'char du rung // skye bo phal pa'i spyod pa dang // mdor na mu stegs rtag chad dang // byis pa'i spyod yul nges med dang // lus ngag yid ga mu masgo gsum gyi// gang yang rung ba'i
191b3(rnying rgyud): spyod yul la// gar 'phrod gang mos blo gtad nas// ma btang yun bsrings gsal bsgoms pas// brtan pa thob nas ye shes 'char// ting 'dzin ma gsal skyed med na// thun mong thabs kyi mnang gzug/ ci ltar 'byung bzhin bstan par bya// des ni rang
191b4(rnying rgyud): byung ye shes 'char// zhes gsungs so// gdams ngag sna tshogs 'khor lo'i chud phyi ma las/ tshogs drug yul du gtod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas yang ston pa dga' rab rdo rje yis// 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la
191b5(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mtshan ma bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la// spyi skyon khyad par skyon dag dang // bying rgod rtsol dang mi rtsol dang // byed rmugs 'dzin chags ther zug dang // phyal pa dag gi skyon rnams dang // g.yeng ba rnam pa drug rnams ni// rang bzhin
191b6(rnying rgyud): nang dang mtshan ma dang // phyi rol yul la byed pa dang // gnas ngan len gyi g.yeng ba'o// bar du gcod pa'i rkyen rnams kyang // le lo bya ba mang ba dang // rgod dang g.yengs dang rmugs pa dang // 'dod che gnyid dang re ba mang // dogs che the tshom za ba dang // nang
191b7(rnying rgyud): du srud dang phyir 'phro dang // spyod par dga' dang sems byung rkyen// ca cor dga' zhing yid 'khrug pa'o// ched du bya ba'i sgrib pa ni// sems mi g.yo dang gsal snyam byed// bde ba snyam byed sdug bsngal snyam// skye dang gsal dang 'byin pa dang // ngar 'don gzhan
192a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ khyad du gsad// rang gi lta ba sgom bsnams pa 'o// danams gtan pa rtsol bas gzham// mtshan bcas mtshan med bsgom pa la// rad ba cad dang zhu chad 'gyur// cha lugs 'gyur dang dbyibs 'gyur dang // blangs
192a2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba zhugs tshul 'gyur ba da// kha dag ma snang rim pa nub// martogs dz+nyAn dang dgu sa nus// gyon rnams bcos te brtan thu ba// spang ba'i 'du byed brgyad// spos gyon mo so'i gnyen pos gzhom// thun mo man dag rnam jug gas/
192a3(rnying rgyud): sngon rnams bcos te brtan par bya// zhes gsungs so// gdams ngag tu tshogs 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi ma las/ bsgom byon ngos bzung zhing gzhom por bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yang ston pa dga' rab rdo rnga skyes/ dngam dpral
192a4(rnying rgyud): bshes gnyen la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa// mtshan mal brten rnal 'byor pas// skyon bcos yun ring bsgom pa yang // de ltar gsal thob yun ring brtan// bzlas brjod thun tshad dag tu dab+he// nang du thun tshod dbugs la bci//
192a5(rnying rgyud): thug ts+tsha ba dang / pa parji bdang / de ny-i dag zug she/ nga cad dag de byung du d+d+ha// bzhi pa ni dag tu mnyam pa ni// ti na mtshan b+ha mnyam pa'i dus// rang thung can gyi thunachod te// tim ring na nyam la// thun tshad dag su gzung ba
192a6(rnying rgyud): bya// mtshan mo ring na mtshan mo la// thun tshod dag ni mang bar brtsi// de la rdzun grangs dgos pa ni// khams mi 'khrugs dang pazla mchod zin// yid mi 'khrugs dang ting 'dzin po ga/ zhag bdun dang ni lnga dang gsum// de ring rje ring zla ba phyed/ zla bar gnas
192a7(rnying rgyud): ni nus pa'o// ma bde bla ma'i dru rung slab// mdor na thun chod cing brtan kyang // ma mun pa dang tshad zin dang // rtag pa ci yang mi chu dang // gsal ba mi g.yo skad cig ma// yid tsam ring je ring 'bring // thun bzhi cha gsum cha byed dang // thun
192b1(rnying rgyud): ring dang na tan zhag dang // zlab la dang bskal pa dang // ma brtan par du bsring bar bya'o// brtan nas rang byung ya shas 'char// zhes gsungs so// gudams ngag sna tshogs 'khor lo'i rgyud phyi ma las/ bsgom pa'i thun tshad bzung ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
192b2(rnying rgyud): de nas yang ston pa dga' rang rdo rje yis/ 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bsgom pa'i dam tshig khyad par ni// man ngag ston pa'i bla ma la// gdung ba bar mi chad pa dang // ting 'dzin mthun bsten mi
192b3(rnying rgyud): mthun dor// 'gro 'chag 'dug nyal spyod lam bzhir// ting 'dzin yal bar mi gtang dang // yid mi g.yo dang mthar dbyung dang // gang bsgom ting 'dzin gsal ba'o// de ltar rtog gos ma ye shes 'char// zhes gsungs so// gdams ngag sna tshogs
192b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo'i rgyud phyi ma las/ bsgom pa'i dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas yang ston pa dga' rab rdo rje yis/ 'jam dpal bshes gton la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// don sbyor blo ni che ba yis/
192b5(rnying rgyud): gdod nas gnyis med sku ru bsgom// lha bsgom thun bskyar nus na dang // bdag gi lus nyid gang bsgom brtan// chu zla'am 'ja' tshon sgyu mar gsal// de brtan bdag nyid la dpyad de// 'di dag dang por gang nas byung // de lta rang bzhin ji zhig
192b6(rnying rgyud): yin// phyi ma cir 'gyur lo rgyus dpyod// dang po gang nas ma byung ste// chu 'khrugs chab rom 'gyur ba'am// gser dngul blug skur byung ba ltar// bdag sems rnam shes tshogs brgyad kyang // ye shes lnga yi ngo bor snang // de lnga rang byung ye shes nyid//
192b7(rnying rgyud): rang sems 'bras bu'i ngo bor snang // gzhan nas 'od med 'gro ba med// rig pa'i cho 'phrul cir yang shar// shar ba de nyid ye shes su// sems nyid snang bas ther zug min// 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas snang // de ltar gnas pa'i rang bzhin kyang // sems
193a1(rnying rgyud): kyis kyi star bas ma sbya shar// wAr snar yang dang snang bas// gzhan la gang yang mang bste// gzhan nas 'ang nga gzhag pa med// ce bsgom 'da' rkyen tshul gas pas// gsal 'artag pa med par bzlob// yang nA rnapa rgya
193a2(rnying rgyud): shes te// snang la rang bzhin med pa yin// don la yul med rig par snang // zhen cing snang ba'i rang bzhin med// yul dang bral bas zhen mi rung // sems la kha dog dbyibs med de// sems la pho mo'i mtshan ma med// ci yang med pa ma yin te// rig
193a3(rnying rgyud): rgyud nges par rtog pa med// med pa'ang min te kun tu snang // snang yang rang bzhin 'di 'dra med// ces gsungs so// gdams ngag sna tshogs 'khor lo'i rgyud phyi ma las/ don sbyor yid ches kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas yang ston pa dga'
193a4(rnying rgyud): rab rdo rje yis/ 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rtag par gcer bur phyud pa dang // rgya mtshor rgyal dang khrus byed cing // mes bsreg rlung gis g.yeng la sogs// mtshan ma spang ba'i
193a5(rnying rgyud): ltas yin// skas dang ljon shing 'dzegs pa dang // mchod rten 'jogs sogs rme ba ni// sa thob brtan pa'i snga ltas yin// khri dang 'khor lor 'dug pa dang // seng ge glang po la zhon dang // gzugs brnyan zhal 'dzam rol mo'i sgra// seng ge'i sgra thos lung
193a6(rnying rgyud): bstan rtags// mtshan me can la slob dus su// rmi lam bzang po byung na yang // dga' dang brod kha mi bya'o// zhes gsungs so// gdams ngag sna tshogs 'khor lo'i rgyad phyi ma las/ zhig nas rmi ltas kyi le'u ste 'dra gcig pa'o//
193a7(rnying rgyud): de nas yang ston pa dga' ra ba rdo rje yis/ 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// zhi ga nas sems snang 'dzin dus su// goms shing brtan pa'i drod chad ni// g.yo dang drod thob brtan
193b1(rnying rgyud): padang // rtsod ga nga gas pa rjod// dum blan mdamanams dang // log tugs can du la gas// nga sul gang par mthong ba dang // mdang nang dang ba dang 'a// blam chod dag tu thang ba dang // dbugs ni chu'am tshar dang /
193b2(rnying rgyud): sgra mar mthong ba dang // rgyud pa rting rje chen po b+h+yo// dud yul gang mthang ye shes 'char// rtags ni g.yo thob brtan pa rnams// rnam pa dag gis 'byung na yang // 'od 'byung lha'i zhal 'dzum dang // g.yo phrul 'od dang yang ba dang //
193b3(rnying rgyud): skye 'bri med pa dang // shig deng nad dgra mi tshar dang // gnyid choms khams kyi zas dang bral// snying rje che dang chags pa chung // phyogs ris med dang dam tshig che// bla ma mched la gdung ba yang // kun la nye rang mi byed cing // 'bras bu dag lar
193b4(rnying rgyud): de la sogs pa mang du 'byung // dga' dang brod pa skyed mi bya// nyams kyi phyag rgyas rang don sad// bla ma'i spyan sngar zhub bya// zhes gsungs so// gdams ngag sna tshogs 'khor lo'i chud phyi ma las/ g.yo tho ba rtags kyi le'u steng cu gnyis pa'o//
193b5(rnying rgyud): de nas ston pa dga' ra bo rdo rje yis/ 'jam dpal bshes gshin la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// bsgom pa brtan pa'i yon tan gyis// sgrib pa dbyangs shing tshogs 'phel dang // bsgoms pas kun brtags zad pa dang //
193b6(rnying rgyud): zad nas sgrib pa 'byangs// rig pa las su rung nas ni// mngon shes lnga dang cho 'phrul thob// mthar thug rang byung ye shes 'char// zhes gsungs so// gdams ngag sna tshogs 'khor lo'i rgyud phyi ma las/ sems bzung bas zin pa'i yon tan ba
193b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas sngon pa dga' ra ba rdo rje yis/ 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems ma zin pa zin par bya ba dang // zin pa brtan nas gdeng du gzhug pa dang /
194a1(rnying rgyud): brtan thob 'phro ru gtong ba dang // rnam shes yul la ldog pa dang // zag pa med pa'ir myong dang // thogs rdugs med par gnas pa'i phyir// rtsol ba med par klong du dbab// bdag 'don med pas nyams su blangs// 'gyung ba med
194a2(rnying rgyud): par g.yon par bya// zhen chags med par khong mi 'khrugs// nyams blang med par yal bar mi 'dor ngo ro// rang grol chen po'i mdud pa bkrol// ye shes chen pos ngo ti srid// ces gsungs so// gdams ngag sna tshogs 'khor lo'i chud phyi ma las
194a3(rnying rgyud): sems zin pa'i gang zag rang byung ye shes la bslab pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas ston pa dga' rab rdo rje des/ 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyi dgongs pa thugs su chud nas lta bas thag bcad cing
194a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i mdud pa grol ba 'di bka' stsal to// rig brtsal gyi rang bzhin gyis// snang srid rig pa'i rtsal du shar// gab pa mngon phyung rang bzhin gyis// dran rtog dang shar chos skur shes// ye shes zang thal chen po yi// rnam 'dzul cing yang
194a5(rnying rgyud): shar ba la// stong pas rgyas gdab zhen chags med// chos su rang gsal thug phrad kyis// ye nas grub par the tshom med// dbyer med dang byung rang gsal yin// lhun grub cog bzhag chen po yis// rang snang dbyer med rnam rtog bral// 'di la bzung zhing/
194a6(rnying rgyud): rtog dpyod bral// blang dor dbye bsal dang gis bral// rjes med don gyi rjes btsal bas// 'di la 'di zhes btsal du med// rang byung yin pas btsal du med// ye nas 'gyur med chu rkyen bral// dmigs gtad med pa'i sems nyid kyis// gang la bza' zhing gtad
194a7(rnying rgyud): med// gza' gtad med pas phyog med yin// rtod pur dag gis mtshon byas te// 'ching grol med pa'i don la sbyor// sdong chen brgyad kyi 'khor lo yis// snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams// / ye nas lhun grungab kun tu bzang // rang byung ye shes dang shar la// 'khor 'das rang bzhin dbyer med yin//
194b1(rnying rgyud): thams ca ma bya/ phyogs srung ma cing nA zang bral// ra na sa tong ldan thub pan// 'das mabyas par rnam mkhar 'dra// sashA nga gang ltar 'dug/ rang thams nyid las g.yas pa med// rang thung la gas ngan sa na//
194b2(rnying rgyud): la ched du bsgom mi dgos// ma bsgoms dang gis ngo bor gsal// yengs dang ma yengs spang thob med// bral dang ma bral phyi nang med// bkag pas mi kheg spyod pa la// dge sdig la sogs ci spyad kyang // bag chags rkyen gyis gos rgyu med//
194b3(rnying rgyud): bya lam rjes med rnal 'byor mchog/ ched du ma byas rtsol med par// rang byung ye shes rang bzhin shar// gtad so gzung 'dzin rtsol med par// thug phrad spyod pa ci spyad kyang // re dogaso spang blang zhing 'dod bral// spyod pa byar med lhan
194b4(rnying rgyud): grub pa// rtsol bsgrub zhen chags dang sang grol// ci byas skyon med 'gal rgyu bral// dmigs med zhen pa rang la shang// dper na nam mkha' nyi 'od bzhin// 'bras bu nyid de rang la shar// khyu chen nam mkhar lding ba bzhin// rtsol ba med ci
194b5(rnying rgyud): g.yang sa bral// re dang dogs med lhun gyis grub// mdor na spyod yul gang shar ba// 'bras bu de nyid mngon sangs rgyas// byar med lhun grub 'bras bu'i mchog/ rig pa dang gsal thams cad mkhyen// dbyer med dang du thams cad gsal//
194b6(rnying rgyud): dus gsum bde gshegs kun tu bzang // sku gsum snang ba'i sangs rgyas la// dgongs pa 'di las yongs mi mnga'// bsgom med bsgom par dmigs pa med// bsgom par bya ba yod ma yin// rang byang ye shes chen po la// lhun grub
194b7(rnying rgyud): du shar ba ni// rgyal ba meng po'i don mchog ste// 'di las basman te sa zhig bsgom// bas ma byad datshogs par bya ba med// rang byung shes rang gas pan// don lasams gas ladon gyi mchog/ rdzing chen brgyad kyi 'khor lo yis// sgo srung bra
195a1(rnying rgyud): gnan su na// ma sug // / sa / sa /
195a2(rnying rgyud): sa nyid chen por gsal// sdug bsngal bde ba'i rol par shar// mi mthun mi spang gnyen po bral// bgrod med rtsol bral 'bras bu'i mchog/ chos gsungs so// gdams dag sna tshogs 'khor lan chud phyin las/ lad+mo'i mthar thAg ra
195a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes su grol ba'i le'u lte bco lnga pa'o// / de skad ces bka' stsal pas/ 'khor thams cad dga' mgu yi rang ste// dga' rab rdo rje'i dgongs pa la mngon par 'dud do// dri ma med cing rang grol rgyang chen po// kun gyi thun
195a4(rnying rgyud): ma yin rtogs dka' zab// ma 'ongs skal ldan rnams kyi don ched du// rin chen gdams ngag sna tshogs 'khor lo'i rgyud// le'u bcu drug don gyi btsud gyung nas// 'jam dpal bshes gnyen nyid la gtad po yin// zhes gsungs so//
195a5(rnying rgyud): gdams ngag sna tshogs 'khor lo'i chung phyim las/ rjes su maM rang ba dang gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / sprul pa'i rgyun gyi mardzogs so// dz+nyAn shes rab rtogs pa'i nyi ma shar// phyag skad du/
195a6(rnying rgyud): ldan pa ni b+hu rnye pa/ bod ga dang / rin po chu 'phags lam bkod pa'i zung rjes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das kun rig ston pa la phyag 'argyal lo// 'di skad padag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rang shes rig gi rgyal bad/ 'og
195a7(rnying rgyud): min gyi gnas rgya yongs su pa chad pa/ rgyan ma bkod par snang ba zhes bya ba na/ byed las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma mi tshogs rnams la/ bstan pa'i skyong po 'chad pa'i dus// 'khor da rnams kyi dang pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'/
195b1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa dang ga skrun pas langs te/ gan rig ston pa chos ni la// rig pa nyid kyis 'di skad dus// rang snang rnam dag rang bzhin la// sna chags 'byung ba ji ltar lags// bstan pa'i snying po gsung du gsol// kun rig ston pas bka'
195b2(rnying rgyud): pa// rigs kyi bu legs par nyon cig/ rang ldang rnam dag rang bzhin la// sna tshogs su snang sems kyi yul// bstan pa'i snying po bdag med bstan// ngo bo nyid la gzung 'dzin med// 'dod pa'i spyod yul ma yin pas// bdag med mya ngan
195b3(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i lam// 'ad ga nyis kyi mtha' de bral// d+ha rman med pa'i ring byung ni// 'byung ba bzhi ma mtha' las tha~Ml// phyogs 'dzin me pas mnyam pAd+hA// rnam ts+tshag med pas chos kyi sa// sa lamakhyen pas migs pan// zhes
195b4(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// kun rig ston pa chos rje lags// khyod ni smra ba'i seng ge ste// rtsol med theg pa gsung du gsol// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs nyon// rtsol med
195b5(rnying rgyud): theg pa'i yang snying 'di// blod man go bshin tu dka'// 'dzin pa'i spyod yul ma yin pas// theg pa'i yang snying bla med 'di// rdo rje sems dpas thugs la chod// phyi rabs blo ldan rigs kyi gru// bstan pa'i yang snyid de la rton// zhes gsungs
195b6(rnying rgyud): so// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// gsang ba'i bdag po mthu stobs can// rtsol bral theg pa'i yang rab de// de yi rtogs tshul ji ltar lags// kun bzang ston pas bka' sprul pa// rtsol bral rdeg pa'i rtogs tshul de/ rang bzhin dbang po
195b7(rnying rgyud): rlung sa// na nga su tshum da// ma gags pa nga 'i thal chu/ tshigs nga bang spong // nga na med pa'i nas// rgyu rdzas ma pa kyi rkye pa// des pa'i byu bas pang ba da /
196a1(rnying rgyud): chu 'bras med par rtogs// sna chags chu 'bras dgag me nas// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// des don zag pa'i yang snying de// bslab pa'i yul na ji ltar lags// bslab pa'i yul man
196a2(rnying rgyud): ji ltar lags// bslab pa'i lugs ni ji ltar lags// thams cad mkhyen pas gsung du gsol// phran rigaton pas bkang rtsal pa// bslab pa'i yul ni rnam pa gsum// dad pas yang nas yang du zhar dang // skabs med skyabs
196a3(rnying rgyud): gsol ba dang // sdug bsngal drag pos nyen pa'o// bslab pa'i yul min rnam gsum ni// shed med stobs dang bral ba dang // bslab nyes don las byed pa dang // lang tsho'i dri mas phog pa'o// bslab pa'i lugs ni rnam gsum sgo// gdams
196a4(rnying rgyud): pa nyams bsdus bslab lugs dang // sbyor ba btsan thabs bslab lugs dang // mngon sum sra slob bsrab lugs so// slob lcags de yis mtsho na byas nas// ma bcos snying po'i gnas lugs ni// khyab can gzugs can ma yin kyang
196a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad duni 'gro'ang meng // sangs rgyas thog ma tha med pas// dadapa'am zabs kyis de rtogs pas// nyon mongs dang rnamasan par byed// zhen med rang byung spyan can gyis// 'dzin pa 'khor ba nad rnams sapa// ra
196a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus bya// kun rig/ rton patsho ji lags// mnyam pa'i rgyal po thams cad mkhyen// rang gi mas nyid 'drar langs nas// byang chub
196a7(rnying rgyud): 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//
196a8(rnying rgyud): rang gi sems nyid 'drer langs pas// byang chub
196a9(rnying rgyud): grag cag dang // dmig mabasag tsu // dran ma sa pa/ 'ab// 'dus chog pa / ya kyi pa na pa rdzun// ya sa pa gyu /
196b1(rnying rgyud): srog rtsa bcad pas na// de 'dra'i gnod pa gzhan mi byed// de yi gdul thabs bshad pa ni// ma zan zin par bya ba la// lag tu blang ba'i rim pa 'di// lus kyis 'khrul 'khor bca' ba dang // gyi nang dbugs rnams snyoms pa dang // dmig
196b2(rnying rgyud): pa mdun du gzhag pa dang // de la dmigs sems gtad pas ni// 'dod yon rjes su 'brangs pa med// 'gro la sems rgyud gnyis mi 'chang // de la mi gnas gzhan du 'phro ba na// gnyis bsgrim gong la drag tu gtad// des ni rang sems zin par
196b3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// gnas nyam 'tshar lham byed pa na// rnam par rtog pa gas tshangs// rgyung la bsgrub pa shes padam// 'og dung 'jam par gang ba dang // sgying rlung dag cu gzung bani// dag pa'i nga ni rlung gis gad+hag// wAs gyi 'khrul 'khor gong bzhin /
196b4(rnying rgyud): rngan dag byin la nang du bstim// rtsol ba bskyed la thun du gzhug/ thun tshad ngab 'bring gsum du gcad// khug pa drug cu bzhi bcu dang // nyi shu dgra ni zin gyur na// rtsal sbyang bya zhing rtsol ba bskyed// des ni gnas su zin par 'gyur// pho dang mo dang
196b5(rnying rgyud): ma ning ni// thod rgal la sogs byung gyur na// tshad ni bla ma mkhas pas te// rtsol ba mi bya gshis la gzhag/ rjes shes gnyen po bsten mi dgos// rang sar bzhug pas gnas su dongs// mi bsgom nyams la ngo smad pas// rig pa
196b6(rnying rgyud): rjen pa mtha' dang bral// mtha' bral chos kyi sku ru shar// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// mnyam pa med pa'i rdo rje 'chang / khyed kyis gsungs pa'i lag len la// mos pas rjes su yi rang nas// gus pa'i sems kyis byed
196b7(rnying rgyud): la 'dud// yang dag don la yang zhus pa// mi mthun gegs rnams bas la dgos pas/ de yi bye brag bshad du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// khyed kyis zhus pa'i don de la// legs par lan ni gdab par bya// gus pa'i sems kyis
197a1(rnying rgyud): tan par ma // bsam gtan gags ni rnam pa // na dang rna dag dang // 'gyur rna batsham za ni// bsamag tan gags srab sha pazhan// rang sems la rnam pa duH// ngabargya dang dbyung da
197a2(rnying rgyud): bcos pa'i thabs su shes par bya// ngo bo shes pa mi gsal zhing // yon tan phyogs la blo 'gags pa'i// rgya nis shas chen po dang // bad kan dag gis bgyed pa'o// dbye ba rnam pa gsum yin te// tshad du byas dang rkyen gyis bying // rang bzhin
197a3(rnying rgyud): shugs las bying ba'o// bcos pa'i thabs ni bsam yas kyang // gzhung lugs 'di la gsum yin te// rlung gi gnad dang dmigs pa'i gnad// rgyud lam gnang du zhes par bya// rgod pa la yang de bzhin te// ngo bo rgya dang dbye ba dang // bcos pa
197a4(rnying rgyud): thabs dang bzhi ru bshad// ngo bo yul rkyen rjes su 'brel// rgyu ni rlung shas che ba dang // 'dod pa dag gis bskyed pa'o// dbye ba'i tshul ni rnam pa gsum// ched du byas dang rkyen gyis rgod// rang bzhin shugs kyis rgod pa'o// bcos pa'i thabs ni ma
197a5(rnying rgyud): yod kyang // bstan pa'i snying po gsum du 'dod// dang po 'jug pa'i sgo yang dgag/ bar du 'gro ba'i lam yang gcod// tha ma gnas pa'i phug gtib po// rlung log pa yang rnam pa bzhi// rgya rkyen skyon dang dbye ba dang // bcos pa'i thabs ni shes par
197a6(rnying rgyud): bya// rgyu ni bsod nams ma bsags pas// lus dang khams ni ngan pa'o// rkyen ni dka' thub drag po yis// 'bung ba 'khrugs par shes par bya// skyon ni lus kyi 'og bzhug na// 'das na tshe yi 'du byed byed// sems skyon tid 'dzin mi
197a7(rnying rgyud): gsal zhing // snying rlung la sogs 'byung bar 'gyur// log par dbyen gsum du 'dus// phyi rlung lus la log pa dang // nad rlung rtsal log pa dang // gsong rlung sems la log pa'o// phyi rlung lus la log pa'i rtags// lus po khol bur na ba dang //

198b1(rnying rgyud): nyid na bye ba med// ma yi yon tan 'gag pa med// 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag/ 'grag pa nyid nus 'gag pa med/ Na mes bri dang gang ba med// TI ga med las bri gang bung // drud tsam nyid na dre gang med// rdo rje sems dpas yang bus
