198b6(rnying rgyud): po ba bya na// mo drung shes par dpa 'byo// bdag la brten nas gzhan sdug pa// shes pa gnyis kyi sa blangs nas// srog med pa ma sems can dang // rdzog me ga dang // dbugs med pa mi rgya ba dang // gnas med pa pa
198b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzam gling dang // bsung du med pa'i dam tshig dang // yi ge med pa'i rgyud chen po/ byi bser lta bu'i gdams ngag dang // chu bo rgyun gyi man ngag dang // 'dam gyes lte bu'i man ngag dang // myu gu lta bu'i man ngag dang // ldan pa lta bu'i man gdag
199a1(rnying rgyud): gas byar blang ban ga sa// thang ma ma pa/ dug sasu byed pa dang / ga zung nabu byed pa dag ga byud pa dang / zu rjod ga kyang lta nga byud pa dang / khabargya du tud pa dang / ltubang ma brtson dug
199a2(rnying rgyud): gcig la gcig brten gcig gi dang // spyong nyid rtogs pa lta ba yin// rtogs pa la mkhyer bsgom pa yin// grogs su shar bas smod pa'o// rin po che 'phags la ma bkod pa'i rgyud las// blta bsgom zung du 'jug pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
199a3(rnying rgyud): rdo rnasems dpas ya zhus pa/ kun rig rgyal po bya// pang pod kyis 'di gdag la// 'du kyidon che // sangs rgyas pa dang sems can gnyis// gcig pa lags sam ga dang lags// de skang pa sangs pa dan
199a4(rnying rgyud): nas// kun rig ston pas 'di skad gsungs// zhus pa'i don la phan 'debs pas// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams legs par nyon// gdod nas dag pa'i gzhi nyid la// sangs rgyas dang ni sems can gnyis// gnyis su yod pa ma yin no// gzhi
199a5(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// sku dang ye shes gnyis su gnas// de ma rtogs pa'i sems can ni// lus dang bag chags nyid du gnas// de phyir sangs rgyas sems can gnyis// gzhi gcig rtog pa tha dad med// lam pa'i dus na so sor snang // dpe
199a6(rnying rgyud): gapur sman bzhin du// gtong shes spyan gyi mchog yin te// ma shes pa ni srog gi bdud// de bzhin kun gzhi stong gsal yang // rtogs na sangs rgyas dngos yin te// ma rtogs na ni 'khor ba'i rgyu// don gyi ngo bo 'khrul med kyang // rkyen bzhi 'dzom pas
199a7(rnying rgyud): 'khrul po'i thung // dper nadung gang po'o// ser snang la sogs 'khrul me kyang // mig sngon can laser por sngu// rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rnams ni// dzus pa brgyad sgonas 'jug/ drug chen dang por chos rnams la// gnas gas
199b1(rnying rgyud): de ni 'dus ma byas// 'bras bu lugs ma mtha' na thug/ rgya 'bras gnyis la mi ltos dang // byas pa'i chos kyis sangs margya// yanas gnas pa'i don rtogs na// ma byas chos kyis sangs rgyas dang // cig char 'jug pa'i lam yin pas/
199b2(rnying rgyud): des don phyin ci ma log pa'o// drug tshan gnyis pa de chos rnams ni// rgyu las ma byung 'bras bu dang // lung pha ma brten man ngag dang // sems pa mi ltos sangs rgyas dang // 'byung ba bzhi la rag ma lus// 'bras bu gzhan la re ba med// rus
199b3(rnying rgyud): gsum sangs rgyas ngo bo dang // drug tshan tha ma'i chos rnams ni// stong pa thun mong ma yin dang // gsal ba thun mong ma yin dang // bde ba thun mong ma yin dang // stong pa tshad du phyin pa dang // gsal ba tshad du phyin pa dang // bde 'tshad du phyin pa'o//
199b4(rnying rgyud): ji lta bu dang ji snyed mkhyen// mi mthun phyogs rnams sangs pa dang // mthun pa'i yon tan rgyas pas na// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas yin// ma rtogs sems can chos rnams ni// chu 'bras chos la gas pa dang // bag tshogs goms
199b5(rnying rgyud): pas 'byung ba dang // byas pa'i chos kyis sangs rgyas dang // rim gyis rtogs pa'i 'dod pa drug/ drang don chos la yid ches skye// de ltar byas pas 'khor ba stongs// 'khor ba stongs pa'i chu mtshan ni// 'dug sgo gsum dang rtsol ba gnyis//
199b6(rnying rgyud): btsal thabs gnyis dang gsum gyis bzlog/ phyi yi sgo dang nang gi sgo// gsang ba'i sgo ru shes par bya// so ru btsal dang lhag par btsal// stong pa'i so dang rig pa'i ngo// tha dad ma yin ngo bo gcig/ lkug par
199b7(rnying rgyud): btsal ba rnam gsum ni// phyi dra rnam shas yul la bsdu// nang du sems nyid sdug bsngal glong // gsal ba 'dzin med dang la bzhag/ shes rab thabs kyis btsal ba dang // thabs la shes rab rtsi yis gzung // zung du 'dug pas sangs
200a1(rnying rgyud): rgyas pas// stong gsal rig pa chos kyi sku// logs na yod pa ma yin pas// rang gi sems ni stong gsal yin// dbang med gsum gyis 'khor ba stongs// snang ba rang snang shes tsam na// sha khag lus ni stongs par 'gyur// shar
200a2(rnying rgyud): rang shar shes tsam na// nyon mongs sems ni stongs par 'gyur// rlung yang rang gi rtsal du shes// lus sems gnyis su tshogs rgyu med// de ltar gsum la brten nas kyang // stong gsal rig pa sangs rgyas so// de lta da ma shes dro chung rnams// dbang med drug
200a3(rnying rgyud): gris 'khor bar 'khyams// snang ba rang snang ma shes na// lus su mi 'gro rang dbang med// shar ba dang shar ma shes na// sems su mi 'gro rang dbang med// rlung dang rtsal dum shes na// lus sems mi 'du rang dbang med// 'dus nas mi skye rang dbang med// na
200a4(rnying rgyud): mi rgas rang dbang med// rgas nas min rang dbang med// na nas mi 'chi rang dbang med// shi nas khams gsum 'khor bar 'khyams// 'khor 'das mtshan nyid bzhi ru 'dus// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// snod kyi 'jig rten ri dang gling rnams kyang // 'jig/
200a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus na bskal pa'i me byung bas// thal ba'i lhag ma tsam yang mi lus so// chu dang rlung gis 'jig pa de bzhin no// bcud kyi sems can tshe 'di mi rtag pas// lus dang longs spyod la sogs 'dor bar nges// rigs drug sdug bsngal mang po bsam mi khyab// srid pa lhong par
200a6(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa zhi ba'i mchog/ bdag med gnyis rtogs yang dag thar pa'i lam// 'khrul pa nyid dang byang chub lam// rtag tu glegs byed ma yin te// nyan thos dang ni rang sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas sa la gegs byed do// rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud las/ sangs
200a7(rnying rgyud): rgyas sems can khyad par bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / dong sems dpas yang zhus pa// kun rig skyon pa chos rdo lags// khyed ni 'dren pa'i lam mkhan te// gzhi lam 'bras bu bstan du gsol// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// gzhi ni ma
200b1(rnying rgyud): snying po'i don// 'khor dang myang 'das ro gcig pas// sangs rgyas sems can 'byung gnas sa// kun gyi spyi gzhi yin par bshad// gsal la 'dzin med rtogs pas lam// zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'grel// nyams myong sna tshogs 'byung ba'i gan
200b2(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu lam du byed pas bshad// yongs su rdzogs pas 'bras bu yin// khams gsum zhu gsum tha mi dad// bdag don gzhan don 'byung ba'i gnas// 'bras bu yi nas smin par bshad// ces gsungs so// rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud las//
200b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas dang sems can khyad par bstan pa dang / gzhi lam 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor la phan gdags phyir// kun rig ston pa chos rje lags// rgyud kyi ldang tshad bshad du
200b4(rnying rgyud): gsol// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams ngal ton// rgyud kyi don rnams ngas bshad pas// gus pas nyon la yid la zung // rgyu yi rgyud dang lam gyi rgyud// 'bras bu'i rgyud dang gsum du bshad// gsang sngags rgyud kyi dbye ba
200b5(rnying rgyud): yin// 'brel dang ma tshad med pa dang // phun sum tshogs pas rgyud ces bya// rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste// 'khor ba yang ni rgyud du 'dod// gsang sngags rgyud kyi dngos po ni// yongs su shes pa brgyad kyis bstan// blta ba spyod pa dkyil 'khor
200b6(rnying rgyud): dbang // dam tshig dang ni phrin las dang // bsrub pa mchod pa bya bar bshad// ces gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// thams cad mkhyen pa khyed kyi thugs khrol la// phyi rabs rnams la phan gdags phyir// 'di don rgyas par
200b7(rnying rgyud): bshad du gsol// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// lta ba log dang dman pa dang // shes par bya ba'i lta ba ni// mtha' bral ye shes phyogs cha bral// gzung 'dzin rtog pa ka nas dag/ yang dag nyid la yang dag blta// yang dag
201a1(rnying rgyud): na// // / ga smra// dag pa // nga sanan na na du mdu
201a2(rnying rgyud): dus da gis/ ga sa dang sangs pa ma // de du snyan pa
201a3(rnying rgyud): dab nga gis thog/ ngango pa pa tsun pa pas kyid sa nga med no// nga rje 'igs zhes pa'i / dan pa ting ba mi gopa// sangs cas pa thogs ba / pa ze zhes rang gi rdzogs// de
201a4(rnying rgyud): man la ba byadag// pag ma hU~M sa ste/ pa sa sa pa// ni da /
201a5(rnying rgyud): mid/ da // / s+ho// ma yi 'a
201a6(rnying rgyud): sa
201a7(rnying rgyud): su mas / sa nan skye su na
201b1(rnying rgyud): 'as pas smras nga / sa su
201b2(rnying rgyud): na sa
201b3(rnying rgyud): nas /
201b4(rnying rgyud): sa sa sa
201b5(rnying rgyud): mes/ rnam / sa
201b6(rnying rgyud): sems dadags ma paldan/ lkug nan med// ugs pa so// dzin pa kyi legs sa pakod pa byu ma/ sa pa na pa mi yod/ gzha /
201b7(rnying rgyud): mas sa la sus pa// na pa'i rgyal mas // 'a pa'i / ni nga na ga / na sa // pa gas tung/ sa
202a1(rnying rgyud): 'di lta grus// na ma dpa gagazugs pa// nags // d+hA sas// ngas nag// gas sa smra rgya napa// nga tsugs na na
202a2(rnying rgyud): 'gru mi 'gu las yid tsam 'grus// sna tshogs gzus
202a3(rnying rgyud): baji ba dzin// zhes gsungs so// dzA rnams dpas yang nus pa// ngan reg ston pa cos rdulags// dad rigs pa shAn dka'// da bdon banas pa gsung drugasal// deg rnas pa'i do nags nA nas// gnas rten pas bka'aphral pa// rang bad
202a4(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i bar da la// ma shes pa ni ngo shes byed// da phrug ma dang mad pa bzhin// ma ni snying la bu ni gsal// ma bu shes pa'i skyes bu ni// lha ma byed de las grol bar 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin gyi bar do la// mi gas la ba ni gsal byed pas// sreg mo sa la
202a5(rnying rgyud): long+ra lnga ba bzhin// sems kyis sems la bltas pa yis// gnyis 'dzin rtog pa zad par 'gyur// skye shi gnyis kyi bar dol// ye shes ngo yis 'don pa ni// mun khung gron me btegs pa bzhin// mtshon pa tshig gis don rtogs pas// rten 'brel 'jam
202a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes kyis// rmongs pa'i mun pa sangs par 'gyur// mi srid sred pa'i bar do la// bzang ngan las kyi 'phro mthud ni// rkang chag yur bar wa btsugs bzhin// gnyen po brten pa'i dka' thub kyis// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur// gnyid log
202b1(rnying rgyud): prilam bar do la// cir snangasams su shes pa ni// zam tho'i gling du gzhan tshol bzhin// thams rtad sems su rtogs pa la// bzang ngan pa na gnod med par 'gyur// chas nyid gsal ba'i bar dal// ya shas zang thal 'char ba na// sar mda' raSha
202b2(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin// phyir mi ldog pa'i rig pa ni// 'byung ba rang sar thim byas nas// rnam shes 'od la them pa'i dus// bag zugs lus las grol bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rin po rje 'phags las bkod pa'i rgyud las/ bar do'i dri zag bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad
202b3(rnying rgyud): sems dpas yang nus las// kun rig rten chos rna lags// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thug su las// hrInang sprul bdi b+ha'ang // gdu ston pa gang la bgyi// gan rig nyon pas bka' stsal pa// rdul pa'i phrag rdzogs
202b4(rnying rgyud): srul pa bas mgyis mi zhib pas/ tshogs rjengs gsum mi lus pa'o// sangs rgyas byed bklags pa can// ban dag ni sprul palas// gzhan na sangs rgyas dul cig byed// dang nang du blang bani// don drig yin par shes par gyis// pa'i sum
202b5(rnying rgyud): nga ma du palags pa'o// sa sa byas pan yang ni// dadas pa sa kyang dang // rgyal ba gzung ga thul pa pas// ngan la bab mny-i sa gas// chu bac+doMm seM ba / na gtsun pa man// dag
202b6(rnying rgyud): hAl sa// ga dang rnam la sags pa// rigs snga la ba sus nyid de// dmang pa po ldan sa// sa sa ma tha 'i mang pa mad// mdus ca rdzaganas cing // rnams pa dang dul ba'in// nyid sa skye gyis // dade rdus pa
202b7(rnying rgyud): na nga gnag su la ya// sa seMn pas ni// ba bye gas ga mi gan pa dang / sa ti / gas na na pan
203a1(rnying rgyud): 'angal bar ston// bdag shags gsung gi sngal pa las// 'ang ma 'a rje'i gdan thongs na// shAg thub snyam na pabyung // mad rdu rdu kham rda mas// drang dan das don mang pa gsu // bad+ma gzugs kyi sprul ba las// rgud bdag rjong
203a2(rnying rgyud): dpa' byung / sangs rgyas gatshogs rnams da ga// dga' ba rje 'a sdogs pas// gsung rdzogs dasador byung rdzogasangs// rin pa kyi 'phags la mi kod pa'i drud las/ skal pa babang po du snyed su pa // rjes mas
203a3(rnying rgyud): dpas byas pa/ sman gton pa cho meng 'gas// jid na mam rgya bste// brags rjes ba byungs ma dang po// nabangs par bang bye / da pa/ cwagasrang ngag gro'o// dag rnas pa nam khyen nas// ldan pa shes pa
203a4(rnying rgyud): rnams padun pa gas sa ga pa brjod da pa// gsang rdzogs pa na / ban pa stong ba na pa rig/ gas kyi sa // dab na mi du sa/ na sa
203a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin pa yang/ ma nas / btsun pa na pa sa no/ ma gon bya ba nan pas skye padas/ dag tshang tu drags
203a6(rnying rgyud): spyang // dub chung pa / da cig rnas// ga // sa/
203a7(rnying rgyud): ma// yang bamin kyi'i thug gnan dang rgyal ba// dpa ma pa'i 'i ba na// dang mi da// zab 'i shid da// ma tha gyings su ra/ la
203b1(rnying rgyud): 'di// bder gshegs rnams kyi thugs dam yin// grub thob rnams kyi gshegs bul yin/ skal ldan rnams kyi mgo 'dren yin// 'gro ba rnams la thugs brtse'i phyir// phyir mi ldog pa'i lam bstan pa// rgyal ba nyid kyi thugs bskyed nas// bla med
203b2(rnying rgyud): byang chub 'thob par shog/ rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i chud las/ rgyud kyi gtad rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// paN+Di ta shrI sid+ha dang / lots+tsha ba bi ro tsa nas gtan la phab pa'o// rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//
203b3(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra satwa A tA shA n+ta sa ma ma hA tan+ta/ bod skad du/ rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i chud chen po/ dpa khri rdo rje snying po ye shes gsang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na/ de bzhin
203b4(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas longs spyod chen po nam mkha'i mtha' ltar rtag par bzhugs shing / sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lta bur gyur pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' kun dang dbyer med pa/ lhun gyis grub pa'i dbang phyug/ nyi ma stong
203b5(rnying rgyud): ltar brdal zhing lhag pa'i che ba dang ldan pa/ thams cad gcig gi ngo bor gyur pa/ gang dang yang tha mi dad pa chen po dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i dpa' rdo rje sems dpa'/ 'og min gyi gnas chos kyi dbyings sgo skur dang bral ba/ rig
203b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / mtha' dang dbus med par nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ ye shes gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ kun tu khyab gdal chen po/ tshad dang rgya dpag tu med pa/ zab cing phral togs par dka' ba'i rang bzhin
203b7(rnying rgyud): zug pa med cing / zad 'phel med pa nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyan rab 'byams dpag tu med pas brgyan pa na/ rdzogs pa chen po bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ rang bzhin ngo bo'i 'khor dang / rang bzhin la rjes su lta ba'i 'khor dang / rang bzhin mtshan
204a1(rnying rgyud): du thob pa'i 'khor la 'di lta ste/ sa dang / chu dang / ma dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / 'dod par khams dang / gzug kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la rdzogs pa dang / yongs sun la 'byor dang / rdul 'byor chen
204a2(rnying rgyud): rjes su rnal 'byor dang / shin tu rnal 'byor la stsogs pa thams cad dang / phyogs bcu'i 'das pa dang // ma byon pa dang / de ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sprul pa'i sku mtha' yas pa
204a3(rnying rgyud): ji bla gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas lha'i dbang pos/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba yis// kun gyi 'dod pa bskur zhes pa// tshol byas theg pa mthar ston nas// tshel med 'dul ba'i rnal 'byor la/
204a4(rnying rgyud): char theg pa gsung du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sems dpa' chen po rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye ma rdo rje sems dpa' che// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thug
204a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje can// khyod na rgyal ba kun gyi rje// rang bzhin ma bcos thugs rje yis// bya bral rdzogs lung bshad du gsol// zhes gsungs pa dang / de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i chos kyi dbyings las ye shes sprul pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' gcig bya
204a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rtse lnga pa yis dbang bskur te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i gter 'dzin cing // sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba 'ching // khyod ni smra ba'i seng ge te// rtsel med 'dul ba'i gang
204a7(rnying rgyud): zag la// lhun grub thog pa gsung du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs so// gsang snga glo rdo rje nam mkha' che// tshig gi khyo dbul ma yin pas// brjod pas rtog par mi nus to// 'di zhes 'gro ba rab tu dka'// 'on kyang dam
204b1(rnying rgyud): bcas bskod pa dang // sangs rgyas thugs rje'i byin rlangs kyis// brda don sprad la togs bya'i phyir// tshig gi sgo nas dgrol bar bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' shar rdzogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya
204b2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa zhes bya ba dang gi 'khor la rtsol med sems kyi don rgya cher gsungs pa la 'di skad ces zhus so// sems nyid dang byang rdo rje la// skye shi 'du 'bral ji ltar byeng // zhes gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas 'di skad ces gsungs so//
204b3(rnying rgyud): sems nyid rang byung rdo rje la// ma skyes pas na 'jig pa med// 'du 'bral mkha' ltar dag pa yi// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes dpal deng ldan pa zhes byab po phyogs kyi 'jig rten na// de
204b4(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa rin po che mngon par mdze ba la 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal ba rang byung dngos med kyis// dpag med bsam pa ji ltar bskang // zhes gsol ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par mtho bas 'di skad ces gsungs so//
204b5(rnying rgyud): nyi zer nor bu ltar// ma bsags gdod nas lhun gyis rdzogs// 'gro 'ong med par kun khyab pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten pad+ma'i phung po zhes bya ba na/ sangs
204b6(rnying rgyud): rgyas pad+ma chags pa med pa la 'di skad kyis gas so to// rang byung dag pa'i snying po la// las dang bag chags gos migos// zhes gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad ces gsungs so// rang byung ye shes ka dag pas// nga rgya ni'ajam
204b7(rnying rgyud): du// mtshams med lnga yi bag chags dag// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes byang phyogs thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten na/ de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad grub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//
205a1(rnying rgyud): // spyan rdzog phrin las la// 'gro don phrin las ji ltar mdzod// ces gsol bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa des 'di skad ces gsungs so// rtsol med ldan grub byin rlabs las// mdzad pa'i byin rlabs phyog bcur brdal// phyogs ris mi mnga' yongs
205a2(rnying rgyud): byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems nyid rin chen 'phrul gyi sgo// rtogs par 'dod na ji ltar blta// zhes gsol pas/
205a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdod kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'phrul gyi skyes bu'i tshul bzhin du// gcig rtogs kun kyang de 'dra ba// ma bcos byang chub snying po la// phyogs su bltas pas mthong mi 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'dod
205a4(rnying rgyud): khams tha ma ru// ming gsum ldan pa'i skyes bu la// ltas gsum ldan phyir bskul ba'i mthus// thugs rje sems dpa'i byin brlabs kyis// 'od lnga ldan pa'i sku bstan te// chos kyi 'khor lo'i gdan stengs su// rin chen 'bar ba'i bsil bkab
205a5(rnying rgyud): nas// rdo rje sems dpas ma brjod gsungs// de nas byas burgya la phras des// rig pa gdong gdon rtogs nas// de tshod yi dus nyid du// dus mtha'i skad cig nyid la ni// klong dgu bam po ti khri nyid// gang ldan gyi gnas grags par gyur// de nas
205a6(rnying rgyud): thugs rje'i byin brlabs kyis// d+ha na ko sha gling gi phug/ lha mo sems dga' rdo rje can// sprul pa'i 'dab chags phra men lus// byin brlabs ye shes thugs mtshan las// ya mtshan sprul pa'i cha 'dzin cing // stong nyid rtsol med sgrogs gyur pas//
205a7(rnying rgyud): yang sbrul skal ldan sras bdun la// rgyal thabs skye blugs dbang bskur nas// thob med byang chub sems dang phrad// gsang ba'i 'khor lo rig pa'i gnyer// brda skad tshogs med don po che// ma btsal rang bzhin bzhag pas 'grub// dpag
205b1(rnying rgyud): med pa'i rgyal ba yis// phun bum tshogs pa kun bsdus nas// bstan pa bsam yas gsungs pa yang // grong dbu'i nang du ma 'dus med// skal ldan thugs rjesams dpa' yis// dus gciganyid la rtogs pa'i lung // rdo rje nam mkha' dbyem ba
205b2(rnying rgyud): mtha' dbus spros pa rnam par bcad// sgron me ye shes 'khor lo can// skur med rang gsal brjod dang bral// dgongs pa nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam pa// mtshan ma'i spos dang gdong nas dag/ rig pa rang snang 'khor lo la// bsam brjod dpyad pa
205b3(rnying rgyud): mtha' las 'das// mnyam nyid rig pa'i 'khor lo la// mtshan ma'i sgra yis gtan la phab// ye shes rang byung 'khor lo las// cho 'phrul thugs rje'i rang bzhin 'chang // rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// rang byung gsang ba'i 'khor lo/
205b4(rnying rgyud): las// klong dga'i bstan pa char bzhin 'byung // rang byung dang gsal gtan la phebs// rang la 'chad cing rang gis ston// rang gis bsdus nas dang du bsdu// ma bcos thig le gcig tu gnas// rang gsal brjod 'das rig pa'i gsung //
205b5(rnying rgyud): gya bral rdzogs pa'i rgyud du grags// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad
205b6(rnying rgyud): ces gsol ba btab bo// rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog/ rig pa'i bsten pa sgrogs pa'i bdag/ rdzogs chen gsum gyi ngo bo la// brda don sprad pa'i gtan tshigs kyis// bshad pa gsum la nges
205b7(rnying rgyud): dgongs nas// gzhi lam 'bras bu gsung du gsol// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po legs par nyon cig/ nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i
206a1(rnying rgyud): rgyud// rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs don 'di// dpag med rgyal ba bskrun pa nyid// stong nyid smra ba ma yin kyang // tshe gdon spad pa rab tu gces// rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu nyid// rdzogs chen ma bcos dgongs pa la//
206a2(rnying rgyud): 'gal brjod pa'i sgra yis mtshon// dngos po'i don nyid gtan la phab// 'gyur med snying po tshol med lam// ma bsgrubs rang byung 'bras bu gsum// ma 'dres gcig tu nges par mnyam// bshad tshul gsum du shes par bya// gzhi dang la
206a3(rnying rgyud): dang 'bras bu ni// ye shes rang gnas bde mchog dang // bsgrub pa bde ba gsal byed dang // rtog pa rab 'byams nyid du 'chang // ngo bo rgyu rkyen nges pa'i dpe// mtshan nyid khyab tshad lung gi don// ye shes rang gsal kun gsal te//
206a4(rnying rgyud): ma bcos ma bskyed ye nas byung // 'du 'bral med par rang la rdzogs// gsal ba mi g.yo rang byung dbyings// snang la mi rtog mnyam pa'i drang // rang gsal ma bsgribs rang rig dang // mkhyen pa'i ye shes nyid du 'char// rang gsal ma dmigs
206a5(rnying rgyud): yul dang bral// rdzogs chen ye shes gsal ba'i ngang // tshig bral mnyam nyid don du rdzogs// rang la mi rtog gzhan mi rtog/ gnyi gar mi rtog mtha' dang bral// bskyed bya skyed byed rgyu med pas// ma gyes snying po byang chub pa// skye 'geg brtag
206a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i tha snyad bral// ye shes rdzogs par gsal ba'i ngang // chu dang mi rgyu dbyings su gcig/ ma skyes 'bras bu ye nas byung // rang byung 'khor lo ye nas gsal// su nyid 'bras bur yaM nas byung // thams cad ye shes snying por rdzogs// ma
206a7(rnying rgyud): lus gcig ste tha dad med// ma bcos byang chub snying po la// ma btsal rang rig gsal bar rdzogs// sgron mes mun pa'i rdzas 'tshal ltar// brda don sprad pa'i 'phrul tshig gis// 'khor ba ye shes snying por gsal// bskyed pa med pas
206b1(rnying rgyud): rlung thub thal// rgan nyid ma byas byung chub t+ta// rdorje snang ra dus gcig rdzogs// bar bamams gyur mad gcig tuganas// gsal pa rang snang dkyil 'khong pa// rgyanang mi ga gdang nasang // chu med ye shes ma gtugs pa// bdad
206b2(rnying rgyud): rang rig stong nyid lung // mtshungs med skad cig tshun dang bral// yul med dmigs bral chos kyi dbyings// ma bcos rang byung rkyen dang bral// gnas dang 'byung bud de phyir dang // kun dngos phyogs sum lhung dang // shes dang bsgrub dang shes pa'i phyir/
206b3(rnying rgyud): ming du btags dang mtshon dang bral// dngos nyid btags pa'i mtha' bral la// nges dang ma nges tshul mi 'dug// btags med nges pa'i chog dang bral// yi ga brda bral mnyam nyid la// de ltar rtog pa ni pa'i lam// dngos po nges dang ma res kyang //
206b4(rnying rgyud): gcig pas tha dad mi gnas kyang // don gyi phyogs la gtsor bzung nas// de rtogs kyi phyir nges par bshad// nges pa mi bad+ma'i sgra mchog/ rjes su 'gro ba don byed nus// yin sa rig pa'i 'khor lor sbyor// rig pa'i gsung gi don pa sbyor/
206b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin rin chen phung po la// gter khyim lung du ni mthong nas// btsal ba med pa 'bras bu ragasal// mtha' gsum gsal ba'i dpe nyid ni// zhen pa'i snang ba mi mthong bas// smag gi mun rum lta bur bshad// ro la bas chad pa gsal ba'i phyir// chu
206b6(rnying rgyud): gter ma lha bur bshad// gsal snyoms ma 'dres btang snyoms thal// hi me shar bska bur bshad// mu gsum rol pa'i dpe nyid ni// khyab gdal ngo po'i don bral bas// chos sma nam mkhanga' klong du bshad// rdzogs su mangs gsal kun khyab pas//
206b7(rnying rgyud): nyi ma 'bum gdal lta bur bshad// 'byung 'dug mi mang 'akun gnas pas// srul mu nye ma'i zer ltar bshad// ye nas lhun grub snying po la// nam tog blo yis bcad pas na// sprin dang khrag sna lta bur bshad// kun kyang ye shes ro gcig pas// lan
207a1(rnying rgyud): tshwa ldan pa'i rgya mtshar bshad// de ltar gnyis mang rtogs bya'i phyir// rdzogs chen gzhung la ngas thos pas// thos pa zla ba lta bur bzhad// don la spyod pas nges ma dzes// skar len bsam pa skar ma ltar/
207a2(rnying rgyud): par gsal snyoms 'du shes bral// bsgom pa nyi ma lta bur bshad// mtshan nyid gang yang ma spangs pas// rang gsal ye shes snying por rdzogs// gdod nas stong pa'i rang bzhin ni// 'du shes bral ba'i dbyings su rdzogs// ci
207a3(rnying rgyud): no gang yang rung // ma bkag sems kyi khyad par las// bkag pa med de dang gsal dbyings// gcig kyang ma 'dres tha dad gsal// snang yang zhen pa rnam par bcad// dmigs kyang btsal ba'i yul dang bral// ye shes snying po'i nyi/
207a4(rnying rgyud): 'char// rin chen nor bu'i khang pa bzhin// ci yang gsal la ci yang min// phyogs su mi snang mnyam nyid pas// gang ltar bltas pa de ltar spang // nam mkha'i mtha' ltar mnyam sbyor bas// tshad dang zla dang dpe las 'das//
207a5(rnying rgyud): ma'i snying po 'bar ba bzhin// mtha' yi sgrib pa bral ba'i tshad// ye shes gsal la mi 'gag pas// phyogs kyi nges pa mi gnas par// cing yang nges par 'char pa'i phyir// 'phrul gyi me long gsal ba'i tshad// sems nyid rin chen
207a6(rnying rgyud): la// zhen snang btags pa kun bral bas// nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od zer bzhin// rang las byung ba rol pa'i tshad// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam sbyor bas// che chung tshad las 'das la la// 'dzin po nam mkha'i mtha' tshol 'dra// phra ba'i phra ba nyung 'ju
207a7(rnying rgyud): 'bru yis mi bsrun phra ba'i tshal// mkhyen ldan ye shes snying po yis// gang yang mi mkhyen rang gsal mkhyen// mtha' dang dbus su mi dmigs pas// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par mkhyen// ye shes rang gsal rdzogs tshul la// mtha'
207b1(rnying rgyud): slob pa rang gsal bas// rang byur ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal// bya bras rdzogs pa'i lung du bshad// rang rig la shes mkhyen ldan pas// gnyis med snying por rdzogs pa rtogs// rang gsal ye shes rdzogs par ldan// rig pa dang
207b2(rnying rgyud): nyams su shar// rang byung 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la// 'phrul yig reg pa'i brda sprad pas// skye med dbyings kyi brda don mdzal// btsal med tshogs chung don po che// rang byung ye shes rin chen gter// sgo mang 'dug thabs bsam mi khyab// rtogs
207b3(rnying rgyud): na gcig tu gnas pa'i don// rtogs pa thabs chen brgyud pa'i lung // rang gsal nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'char// mkha' khyab rig pa'i klong du son// ra byung rlig pa rang gasngal 'di// mkha' khyad byang chub sems kyi lung // rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs
207b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil nas// rig pa'i khu zug dgu stsogs pa// sems nyid rang gas la mthong bya'i phyir// klong dgub ma po tI gsal// de nyid dbu ldan sems kyi gzhi// rin chen phung po 'phrul gyi blo// rin chen phung po gter khyiman// nyi ma'i 'od
207b5(rnying rgyud): lta ye nas gnas// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ ye shes rang 'char gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des rdo rje sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab
207b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i rgyal ba kun gyi mes// gsad pa'i yang gsang byang chub sems// rin chen khang la sgo mang dag/ rang gsal sgo nas rtogs bya'i phyir// bde chen rtsol bral snying po la// bshad thabs bshad bya 'bras bu'i don// rang gsal
207b7(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i don du rdzogs// khyab bdag 'chang chen bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye sems dpa' chen po/ yi ge med pa mchog gi rgyud// bring med kha dog
208a1(rnying rgyud): dbyibs dang bral// rnam mkhang mtha' dang mnyam pa'i chud// gsang ba kun 'das gtad 'di nyid// bshad thabs gsam rdzogs rgyan gsam// gan lam 'das cur rdul du gnas// dgangs pa kur sbyin grags
208a2(rnying rgyud): pas// dgongs pa klong brdol tshul du bshad// man ngag rtsa ba 'dir 'dus pas// man ngag zhal tshems sngags ltar bshad// klong dgu'i rtsu ba sems nyid klong // sel med rgya mtsho'i gling du bshad// kun bzang sems nyid stong gsal
208a3(rnying rgyud): las// rang byung rol pa mi 'gag pas// mkha' la gza' skar bkram ltar bshad// mkha' khyab sems l+r-ing kun gyi mchog/ yin phyir spyi don lnga yis bshad// rgyud kun 'dus pa'i mchog yin pas// phun sum tshogs pa lnga yis bshad
208a4(rnying rgyud): tha ma shes bya'i ngo bo la// thun mong thun mong min pa ste// thun mong khyad par grags tshul nyid// grags pa gol zhing bsgribs pa ste// lta spyod ting 'dzin dam tshig dang // bsrub dang phrin las dbang mchod dang // dkyil 'khor sa lam 'bras bu
208a5(rnying rgyud): bcu// ma shes bdag 'dzin gzung 'dzin dang // yang dag bden la ris 'byed dang // ngag dang gnyis spyod gtsang sme dang // blang dor sgrib pas bcings pa kun// lam gol lam sgrib gol sgrib byung // ye nas rang gsal gsang rdzogs la// mthong
208a6(rnying rgyud): dang ma mthong gnyis su phye// ye nas dmigs med rang gsal la// bdag dang gzhan du bzung bas bcings// skye 'jig bral ba'i rdo rje la// rgya 'bras 'brel par bzung bas nor// dngos po gnyis med rdzogs chen la// tha dad brtags po log
208a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i lam// gnyis med rang rig gter 'di la// bden gnyis bye bas gcig dang 'gal// rang gsal dmigs med stong nyid la// yang dag bsgrubs pas dmigs med 'gal// 'ching bral lta ba gza' gtad med/ gza' gtad bral
208b1(rnying rgyud): 'don lang rtsa 'khrul// ma bcas ma nas rang gas pa la// dbying sa dang sa shas 'jal ba rgyas// yanas ran can dag pal// dag pa gsus tshul zad nang// bzung rdul la shes dkyil 'khor pa// bskrad dang ma thal napa byu /
208b2(rnying rgyud): btsal bas rang bung gter dang bral// ye shes rin chen phung po la// byin rlabs snang 'dod dogs can// rang snang 'khor long don dang 'gal// rin chen 'khor lo kun bzang 'di// 'gro drug rang gsal thugs la gnas// gsal rig 'dzin bra
208b3(rnying rgyud): dbyings la son// thim gyur gsal nas mi mngon pa'o// rang gsal nyi ma'i byin brlabs ni// btsal med 'od kyis phyogs bcur brdal// khyad par bcu bzhi'i bshad pa dang // chos rnams sems kyi ngo bo la// mtha' dang log lhas mi 'gyur bas//
208b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs chen ma lus thams cad kun// gsal btan ri bo lta bur bshad// rtag chad mtshan ma cir snang yang // sems la yangs dog chos med pas// num mkha'i klong dang 'dra bar bshad// chos kun gsal snyoms btsal med 'char// rang gsal
208b5(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i rtsal rdzogs pas// mkha' la ti shar 'dra bar bshad// sems can sangs rgyas la sogs pa// bde lhag ma 'byes rdzogs chen pas// gser gying ngo bo lta bur bshad// rang gsal mtha' bral rgya mtsho la// rtsol bas ming sogs brtags dka'
208b6(rnying rgyud): bas// zab pa mcho ga ting lta bur bshad// lhan grub rin chen phung po yis// rtsol med byin brlabs rang 'char bas// nor bu rin chen lta bur bshad// nyi ma mun snang gcig pa'am// nyon mongs ye shes gsal rdzogs pas// draganyid sman du gnas ster//
208b7(rnying rgyud): bshad// rang rig thams cad gsal rdzogs pas// spun grub pa de chen rol snang bas// rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs ltar bshad// mtshan ma'i bye brag cir snang yang // mi 'gyur zos sur gnas bslad med// kha dog nag po ste bur bshad// rang byung
209a1(rnying rgyud): ma bsgrubs rang 'char la// cir snang rang las smin pa'i phyir// shing tog a mra lta bur bshad// rang byung theg pa'i rgyal po ba// zil gnon ma bgrod kun son pas// mkha' la byung 'phur lta bur bshad// mtha' bral
209a2(rnying rgyud): rang byung rdzogs lung la// mtha' yi zhen pa zil gnon pas// seng ge'i sgra sgrogs ci ltar bshad// kun bzang 'khor lo'i rim pa la// gnang bkag yod med kun bral bas// kun bzang spang len med ltar bshad// chos kun rang rig
209a3(rnying rgyud): sems nyid la// sems nyid gdod nas gdag pas// rin chen gser gling lta bur bshad// thun mong min pa'i rdzogs chen gsum// btsal med lam med spyi gzhung nyid// grub pa mngon byung ma nang ga go// lta ba rang gsal gza' gtad bral//
209a4(rnying rgyud): mthong med pang gsal ye shes spyan// gsal la mkhyen pa sgribs mtha' dang bral// rang gsal rig pa'i dbyings su rdzogs// spyod bral kun bzang rol pa 'di// rol ba 'gag med rang 'char rdzogs// ma bcos snying por spyod pas na// mtha'
209a5(rnying rgyud): dbus med pa'i grong du rol// rgyal thabs spyi blugs dbang gi mchog/ ma bskur rang rdzogs kun la gsal// dus gcig ye shes rig pa 'char// dus tshod bla ma'i ngag las brtags// thig le chen po'i dam tshig 'di// rin chen kun bzang sems
209a6(rnying rgyud): la gnas// bsrung du med pa'i dam tshig la// mi bsrung phyogs dang bral bar gnas// yenas kun thub rang byung gis// phyogs ris med par gang la zin pas// phrin las byer med mtha' bral la// byar med rdzogs pa'i ye shes gsapa/
209a7(rnying rgyud): kla ka yi nor bu'am// 'jig rten 'od kyi rgyal po lteng // byin rlabs thugs rje dang shad la// btson pos bsgrub cing btsal du med// re shes rang gsapa ting 'dzin dade/ ma yeng+ge reng gsal spun grub la// 'tshal zhing yengs pa rnam par gcad// be shes snying po rang gas pa kun/ mtha'
209b1(rnying rgyud): dbus med pa'i dkyil 'khor la// mugasu ma rang shar bsam mi khyad // mthanga' bral nam mkha' snying po ltar// thigal rang gsung rdzogs par gsal// rang byung rang shar rang la rdzogs// nya ma dzod dang snying pa rgyar// ngashes rdzogs
209b2(rnying rgyud): pa la// 'bras bu grangs 'das mkha' ltar sbyin// rang zung yo byad mchod pa yis// lhun grub rang gsal dbyings su dri ma// phyogs bral lhun grub mchod pa 'dis// kun mkhyen rang gsal nyid du mnyes// gab pa mngon gyur don 'di la// sog
209b3(rnying rgyud): tshul rim par ngos bzung nas// rgyal thabs spyi thugs dbang bskur nas// sems nyid rin chen rtogs bya'i phyir// de nyid blta bas thag bcad bshad// de nyid ma yengs goms bya'i phyir// brda don phral ba'i man ngag bshad// ci spyad stongs
209b4(rnying rgyud): gyur ched med pa do// thang sbyin nur thugs ni na shA shA da de// grong da 'dus pa'i ga da te// rgyud ngan gtan pa dab ba pa ga/ shang par byam na// glang du rje da kyi 'as// nyid la 'chad da kyis 'brel//
209b5(rnying rgyud): med theb chen gang zab la// dzig rnal rig pa'i 'khor lo skor// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mthar dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ bshad pa'i rje mig gis klong dab dbye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
209b6(rnying rgyud): de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des/ rdo rje sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi gter 'chang ba// ye shes mdzod ldan gnyis med rdzogs// rang gsal
209b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad mkhyen nyid dang // mgon po khyod la gsol pa ni// ngo bo thabs kyi mtshan nyid de// rnam grol rig pa'i gter kha dag/ mgon pos bdag la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpas
210a1(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces bkang stsal to// kye sems dpa' chen po// mkha' mnyam byang chub sems kyi lung // nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud// rin chen dbyug dang phrad pa'i rngubs// ya zhes gas 'jigs
210a2(rnying rgyud): sa dbyings rgyad// dpag phrul bad+hAg pa gas / ngas dang pas ma pan pa'i tshul// dag mkhan ze slong po dpas// coM ma chug kyim rtse ba yin// dus rnam pa mtha' nyas pa/
210a3(rnying rgyud): rangags pa dngangs la chags// mi das thapas pa kyir mi dgongs// sa thal dag pa'i ya lag ra// rangs rgyas pa yin sems can men// byad+he yon dgas padzad// shA bad+harnyar par cad// mtha bus
210a4(rnying rgyud): pa ni// phyogs bral mnyam nyid dag pa'i gta// ngan can no pa'i phung po bzhin// kun la phyogs ris med par gas pa// dma' kha'i mtha' mnyam ti gyid // dpagabs ma khor lo dang char dang // kun snang gas lce dang rnamam/
210a5(rnying rgyud): gang bya rin chen dbyig dang phrad// gan gyi po yags lus// mtha' med dbus bral snying por gsal// gas pa rang rig chos dbyings gsung // ba gsungs rang mngal rig pa'i sa// bsam ched rang byung rang gsal la// gis lab po gtog mdud
210a6(rnying rgyud): bsrung ngas// nyid dbyings su migs snyan// bkrol snang thar bar pa gyur ro// rnam ga'i dzi pa gnas nga // rang gas pa mi ga la mi gnas// rang byung rang bas mi dbyings su rigs// brjod meng rig pa'i nga ba la/
210a7(rnying rgyud): 'di nas btag dag ba// bsam byas sa thab cas kyi byangs// ba dan da pral pa dang// yang dag sa kyipa btsun// thugs kyin ldanam bang// dang grags kyi na yi dang // rgyal ba kyi thugs dang
210b1(rnying rgyud): theg pa'i bye brag 'byed la brtson// brjod mkhas tshig don 'brel par ston// brda don spod pa'i slob dpon yin// mtshan ma mi bsam dbyings gnas pas// dgongs pa klong ltar brdal ba dang // mtha' dbus bral ba'i don la mkhas//
210b2(rnying rgyud): min dgongs pa'i lung ldan pas// phral ba yin par nges par gsungs// rang rig gsal bas rang la ston// rang gsal lung la rang gis mtshon// rang rig gzer chen rang la 'debs// slob dpon kun gyi mchog tu gsungs// nges pa'i ser
210b3(rnying rgyud): ge'i rjes byung ba// btsal med seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa// dpal ldan kun mkhyen rnam grol thugs// 'jig rten gsal ba'i nyi ma yin// rang byung shes rab 'od po che// rang gsal rig pa rang las 'char// thos bsam bsgom pa gsal byed lung //
210b4(rnying rgyud): nges par rtog pa'i rkyen du bshad// rin chen 'phrul gyi khang pa dang // kun gyi zad med gter 'chang ba// theg sgo lde mig rig pa'i tshul// gang phye 'ang nam zhig thob par 'gyur// theg pa'i bye brag ci bstan pa// klong dgu'i don la nges par
210b5(rnying rgyud): 'dus// rnam mkha'i mtha' mnyam klong dgu'i rgyud// rtogs pas rin chen dbyig dang phrad// rnam grol rig pa'i phung po la// btsal med lung gsum rig pa yis// rtog dpyod 'jug pa'i yul med kyang // de nyid tsam gyis rdzogs sangs rgyas//
210b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal thabs spyi blugs dbang thob nas// ye shes rang gsal don dang sprad// shes pa rgyab bzhi cha'i dus// gsum ni rnam par rtog pa ste// gcig po ye shes gsang ba yin// dus tshod bla ma'i thugs la brtags// brgyad pa thabs kyi me long
210b7(rnying rgyud): gos// gang ni drugs la ba la shes pa// gang ltar 'tshams pa de dag yin// rmongs pa bkri ba'i thabs su bsten// byas dang mabyas gnyis kyi bar// 'dzin bral dbu ma'i shes pa gnas// yo shes 'dzin pa'i man giH// 'phrul gyi
211a1(rnying rgyud): skyes bu'i blo dang mtshungs// gsal ba dang po mam+b+has mtha'// sbas nam sbas don dang thal// mtha' dbus bral ba'i rna pon// rdzogs pa thug phrad yin par gsungs// tsal gang sdang dus den// ma btsal das
211a2(rnying rgyud): snang mi rtog lung // nyams brjod kun bral ye shes te// bu mo dga' ba'i ro bzhin no// ye shes mnyam rdzogs cha gcig la// sku gsung thug phrad man dag gsal// yun k+Shang ye shes rang gsal te// dus tsheng tha ma'i zhal las shes/
211a3(rnying rgyud): thabs sbyor man ngag bcu gsum po// gang la 'dul ba'i thabs su bstan// so so rang rig ngos bstan pa// mkhyen ldan tha ma'i zhal las bshes// thabs kyi rim pa gang dang gang // ji ltar yin pa de ltar 'jug/ 'dod 'gyang rin chen 'phrul
211a4(rnying rgyud): dbyig/ rtsol med gnas pas thob par 'gyur// ngo bo dang gsal dmigs med de// rang gsal chos dbyings brjod bral dang // yul med mtha' bral dang byung klong // gnyis med rig pa gcig la rdzogs// rig pa'i 'khor lo gsal ba'i
211a5(rnying rgyud): gter // 'du shes thal bas dbyings su rdzogs// ting 'dzin yangs med tshig rdzogs la// gangs dang gcig gi 'dzin mi 'jug/ ma bcos sgo thal mnyam nyid la// tshogs ris 'dzin tog gdod nas stong // mtha' bral rang gsal snying po la/
211a6(rnying rgyud): bsgom dang mi bsgom 'du shes bral// rang rig rang gsal rdzogs lung la// gnyis pa'i 'du shes rnam pa bcad// brjod pal rang gsal rig gsung la// brjod dang me brjod 'du shes spangs// phyogs med rang gsal ye shes la// 'du shes mi mang
211a7(rnying rgyud): gcig gi gter// rarigs la 'bras rdzogs snying po la/ dngos su ti ba'i 'od ltar 'char// me khyer bral gzigs med ye shes sung// dgongs med snying po'i don la gzigs// ma 'dres mkhyen pa'i snying po las// 'dod dgu'i byin rlabs chang du
211b1(rnying rgyud): 'babs// rnams pa'i klong bangs nga bzhidang// brjod mang grong la thams cad ngogs// gsal banyi ma'i snying bskyed// rang gsal byin nubs dbyings sardzogs// 'ad 'byung rin chen phung ba ltar// phyogs ris su mda' phangs kyi gtar// rnal
211b2(rnying rgyud): chen rdzogs pa'i seng ge ltar// rtsol bsrub zil gnon gcig tu rdzogs// 'phur skyen mkha' la 'gro ba ltar// bgrod med sa rnams cig char non// gza' bral rig pa'i dbyings su rdzogs// thams cad gsal snang rig par rdzogs// mkha' la gza
211b3(rnying rgyud): skar bkram pa ltar// ma 'dres rang gsal dbyings su rdzogs// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// ma bcos ji bzhin rig pa'i klong // shes par gyis la rang dgar zhog/ spros med rgyu rkyen rten bral ba// nam mkha' rang byung stobs po che//
211b4(rnying rgyud): byung gzhan med rang gi dbyings// gang ltar bzhag pa de ltar yin// rang gsal nyi ma kun la snyoms// mtha' bral nam mkha'i snying po ltar// gsal la brtags na dmigs dang bral// mig yo 'dzin bral mnyam nyid gter// rang byung bstan pa rang las
211b5(rnying rgyud): 'char// rang gsal 'khor lo rang la bskor// rang gsal nyi ma kun gyi gter// kun la gnas so brtag bral dbyings// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las// rin chen shes bya gter gyi le'u ste bzhi
211b6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes rdo rje sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po// rang gsal nyi ma 'od kyi mchog/ mdzod dgu rig pa'i gter dang ldan// lhun grub bya bral rdzogs lung las// mdzod dbus 'dod
211b7(rnying rgyud): char phob la// nyon mongs ye shes gcig tu snang / gcig la dgur phye bshad du gsol// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye sems dpa' chen po// thig le gcig la gnyis su kye// dben pa gcig la
212a1(rnying rgyud): s+pho mur byung / 'gro drug gcig las sor bsdus// mdzod dgu rig pa'i gter la bslabs// thig ma yangs kyis thur po la// 'khor dang myu 'das yenas med// 'khor ba byang chub snying por// sdug ba
212a2(rnying rgyud): kun bzang rol par shar// de nyid spros med thig ler gsal// gsal yang mi mngon dbyings su thim// chags sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang // gang phyir phrag dog chen po ni// btsal med ye shes lngar gsal bas// ye shes nyi ltar kun la
212a3(rnying rgyud): padal// 'dod lnga yul lnga kun gyi gsos// rang byung thugs rje yongs kyi gsos// rang gi rol ba rar la snang // ring gi lo ngos spyod rang la mdzad// ma rig 'thebs pa'i 'gro ba la// sdang gsal sgron ma rang bzhin 'char// 'khor ba nyid na
212a4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas// sdug bsdub longs spyod bde ba'i rgyan// gdod nas ye shes rang gsal la// gnyis su btigs pa 'khrul pa'i lam// sku dang gsung thugs phrin las kun// rig pa gsal ba'i dbyings la gsal// mkha' la byal ma 'dra
212a5(rnying rgyud): ba yi// nam mkha'i dbyings thi ma gsal mi 'gyur// zhing khams dbang thob rdzu 'phrul yang // mnyam nyid rig pa'i gtor la rdzogs// mdzad spyod dgongs pa mtha' yas kyang // rang gsal ye shes dpal gnas// rang bzhin gnyis med mtha
212a6(rnying rgyud): lhar brdal// mdzad pa'i byin rlabs skar ltar bkram// thugs rje'i byin rlabs 'di ltar brdal// rang gsal dang la 'du 'thal med// rig pa'i ye shes rtag gcig la// byin rlabs yid bzhin nor bu ltar// 'gro drug rang sdang 'khor tshogs
212a7(rnying rgyud): laM// 'bras thun ma mapa'i char bzhin pa ba// gnyis mid gcig gi nga bzhin la// ji ster brtags pas ma 'byung bas ni// rang gsal ze long ngod ci// yul 'ad gsal ba'i dbyings su rdzogs// ya nas byang chub snying po la// yin man gas
212b1(rnying rgyud): byung // da sa gnasas 'bras bas// dun dadas na zug// dpeng nam pa las nga// 'a pa na ba'as/ sma da na dang/ gyu dgas kyang na//
212b2(rnying rgyud): 'dabs stong mtha' med pa'i mtha'// 'di kun thog pa'i tshang gyur ba// rdol gas du na pa skar// ra nga bad+hab lgang lazhen pas// dz+ra zlas de rang srang 'bras 'dod pa// gsul 'bras pa nyid rin// debs pa gsal mnyam pa'o//
212b3(rnying rgyud): rim pa med pa'i sems kyis 'jug/ glo zal rig pa'i 'khor logs la// phrer bral rig par dgas la ldang // byabyas thal mnyam nyid rig pa'i gter// 'dug med paslad med de bzhin gnas// marka nyid rnam mkha'i mtha' sanya brgyad//
212b4(rnying rgyud): tuganas pal// skye gasbyi pa gis cad du// smyan pang ba na gas pa// ni na na ba byed pa // dmyal ba dad dang // ga la na pa bapas/
212b5(rnying rgyud): gzhan ma smin// nga rgyal mngon mtho lhar gsal nas// longs spyod pa lcag so so lar// ma bcos dang la gnyis med pas// gnyis med pang la spun gyis rdzogs// 'dod chags zhen 'jug brtags pa yis// gling 'ati mi li longs spyod
212b6(rnying rgyud): dang // bde sdug 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yang // rang byung dang la gnyis med pas// rang gsal ye shes snying por rdzogs// gti mug 'thebs shing bsgribs dbang gis// byol song gnas su ltung gyur kyang // sdug bsngal dngos la mi gnas pas/
212b7(rnying rgyud): de dag rig pa'i 'khor lor rdzogs// ser sna chags bcings 'bras bu yis// zas dang longs spyod phongs pa dang // 'dod pa yid du mi 'ong ba// dngos la de ltar gnas ma yin// phrag dog gdug rtsub dbang gis ni// 'thab rtsod 'khrug pa'i sdug
213a1(rnying rgyud): sa/ sa
213a2(rnying rgyud): sman sa
213a3(rnying rgyud): su sa
213b1(rnying rgyud): mas// nyom 'ad cing kyil lab shang // rig rang zung nyag gcigalas// gdul dbang bas pa pa'i thad par gyis/ khyegacig sa pa thang dpa bzhed// gcig sa dbu ma tshul du thub// reg pa rlo don lu'adang// dbug sadangs gzus rnal padams//
213b2(rnying rgyud): la smras klu pa kyi / sa sa da// sa
213b3(rnying rgyud): tshul/ dzad dag rig pa'i gtang byed pa// gtu bang po ba gang cigags// brjodon byed 'gro rim pa dres// rdus kyi 'dod byed dgyes par gyur// dri sri gang da ga dang ba// de srid pa shes san ma grangs te// gzugags pa sa
213b4(rnying rgyud): shA / 'di kyi sa / sa // / rnapa pa ba nga sa
213b5(rnying rgyud): dbu med gtir gyi mi skyel pa'o// / de nas sem snad pa 'di sa rdo sems dpa' chen pol 'di skad ces gastsol// dus gsums sa rgyas rnams pa hU~M// 'dod 'byung nam mkha' mdzo kyi 'dag/ sdugasang dru
213b6(rnying rgyud): dbyings ma // 'gyur med deng la rtag tu bzhugs// mnan pakhyod la gsol b.rI// rin chen dbyig dang 'phrad bya'i phyir// rin chen rdzing po rang gas la don// gang gis gsal ba bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dza rjesems
213b7(rnying rgyud): na sa gsu sug/ rgya #rnabs 'dzi ba // ma / ngabya sa pas su
214a1(rnying rgyud): mam po ngan chen dbyub// thabs sto gas la bsams // dang byas pa dzod la rgyab tu bzhugs// rkyen yul byug la byunag/ rdo nga du dang myi ldan par// gas g.yang bral ba pos/
214a2(rnying rgyud): gas pa rig pa'i 'khor lol// bskul par brtags kyang don rnyed// rna brgyad thugs kyi rin chen pa// ga spyi blugs kyi rab 'byor pas// bra mdzo srog tu 'dzin// po rgyad snying pos mnyes bya // rna gas ma thun du 'phya myung /
214a3(rnying rgyud): khams khyab par gsal// rang gsal rig pa'i sgo skur bcad// 'du shes bral ba'i dbyings la rdzogs// spros bral mtshan ma'i 'du shes bcad// rnam dag gsal ba'i ye shes la// mtha' yi mun pa ma bsal dag/ brda don smad pa ma gtogs
214a4(rnying rgyud): pa// mtshan ma sgra yi rjes mi 'jug/ rang gsal nyi ma'i snying po ltar// gsal yang 'du shes med par gnas// nam mkha' mi 'gyur rtag pa ltar// kun 'gyur rtag chen 'gyur med klong // rdo rje sems dpa' lha bzhin du// bsgom dang bral ba'i
214a5(rnying rgyud): na
214a6(rnying rgyud): gtsug nor bu ji bzhin du// ma btsal rang gas la dbyings la gnas// bcud 'dzin rin chen gter bzhin du// spro ba sdug yo med ji bzhin gsal// dbyings la gsal ba'i 'od bzhin du// ma 'dres rang gsal 'du shes bcad// rgyal ba'i gtsug
214b1(rnying rgyud): tarang bzhan du// brnyas pas thug ma dngam mkha dkyang // rlubathonags pa pa'i mi 'a gyur// thad dgasul yang dngas rdzogs// kAl pa shang las gan gan// gangs na kyang samatha' dmangs// da
214b2(rnying rgyud): duM// thub pa rigasal pang nyams myong med// rin chen gol gyis gzhi ltar// ci gas la migu yo rdzas thal dbyings// rgyam tho sde ba'i snang ba ltar// datshogs ga ni gtsu bum tam// ti blang bar ba'i 'od bzhin du// phyogs ris med de rang ba
214b3(rnying rgyud): dang // nam mkha'i ngo bo ji bzhin du// bcug cing gzung ba'i mtha' dang bral// rang gsal spros pa rnam par bcang // dmigs bral kun snang rnam kun bcas// rgya mtsho'i 'phro 'dra byin rlabs thar// rang las byung zhi dri rang la 'dus// rtogs ris
214b4(rnying rgyud): mi mnga' phongs kyi gter// gsal ba'i byin rlabs bas ma mi khyab// mtha' gsum gsal bas dbyings pa jug/ dper na rin chen gsor gli b+hair// kun tu snang yang gzugal gas// rang gsal rig pa kyi mi dgongs// rin chen ya
214b5(rnying rgyud): spyomo pa// kun nas kun tu mnyam skor bas// gang ltar phyin kyang rin chen gcig/ de las dbyig de thob par dgyur// rgyal mas rus pa'i skal ldan gyis// rang gsal kun gyi 'od la bzhugs// zhe sdang ban 'joms ting nge 'dzin// gti phrag
214b6(rnying rgyud): chen po de bzhin te// 'dod chags kun stor de nyid dang // nga rgyal gdeng gsum ldan pa dang // phrag dog mi chung don lnga yang // rang bas la 'od la 'dus te bzhugs// gcig gi don la sngar snang ba// dga' ba'i ro yis khyab dang 'dra// rtog dmod bral ba'i
214b7(rnying rgyud): chos dbyings la/ 'od gsal rig pa'i gdeng gis gnas// bsam bral nam mkha'i snying po la// rtsol bral mnyam pa'i yid kyis 'jug/ mthong med rig pa'i kha lo bsgyur// yi ge ma thong ba'i don du mthong // mtshan ma'i sra yi rjes babrangs nas/
215a1(rnying rgyud): na sa na sa/ gyung mjom// gas na ma nga ga/ rags pazla // na
215a2(rnying rgyud): pa 'i dzad// phyogs ris mi mang yongs ma snyoms// matan nyid rin pa // dang yang pon nonam kun bcas// rang dpa' bo 'gyur med pa la// ji ltar gas la yang dzidi zhes med// sran gsal ma mo da che// ye shes rdzogs pa'i /
215a3(rnying rgyud): le nas theg po chen rdzog // bad ga gzhan pa zhis dkyi rlos// rgyal ba byin gyi dbyu ma ny-ir// d+hi mam pa 'dzin// rdo rje sems dbang ba na gyu pa// 'phrul gyi ma rig pa'i skyon ma pas// gter kyi dpal bcing pos nas// skye bamed
215a4(rnying rgyud): ltas kA /
215a5(rnying rgyud): baprets+tsha ha~M// ye shes gas pa'i phun na/ gabyed pa pa ma// rangags pa rig pa'i 'ad pa bzhan/ tshul bcu babral ba'i 'bras pa sad// 'di ltar sto pa'i thang dponan// dzu sa m+b+ha gdabang po ni dus zag/ bskul par ba
215a6(rnying rgyud): rang san// bu dang rgyang man / dgas// dam pa bar mi nan// dpag med rgyun la mkhas gyur chang // byed gad gyu rnye dra nas// nges par rdo rje la ltung // mgyogs 'gros mtshams
215a7(rnying rgyud): 'das dang 'dra// 'khor ba'i gting du lhung gyur nas// dam pa de la ma brten par// thar pa'i skabs ni mi sri nga// rdzogs tshon rna brgyad man dag la// bla ma'i man ngag mi ldan pas// log rtog shes pas dpyad pa ni// nges par lung 'gyur the tshom med
215b1(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin ngan pa'i mi rnams dang // zas chung kA pa mas med dang // theg pa dman pa'i skyob dang // rdorje srod dpon skrod pa dang // dzo ldan bu 'khu ba dang // rang gas la don la skur ba dang // khe kragam pa'i rgya bsgrub dang // chos pa dngag sgru brgyad/
215b2(rnying rgyud): pa dang // don med stsal gter ba dang // don 'ad rdzob dpon dbang 'dad la// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud// yang gsang bu gas kyi man ngag 'di// bshad cing nges par bstan byas na// ngam shod gling gi dur khrod dngadu // DA ma ru lang rung
215b3(rnying rgyud): ltar// mkha' 'a shin tan 'dus pa yis// 'chi'u'i dus min sngon rol du// sha khrag mngon du bza' ba dang // mi bzad drag po'i sdug sngal gyis// 'chi dang nges par srog bcad nas// rdo rje'i khab tu nges par 'gro// byang chub sems dang ma
215b4(rnying rgyud): ldan par// thar bar mi 'gyur stobs dang bral// de gyi dra nges par dbang thob pa'i// rgyal sras nges pa gcig la gtad// ces gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rig pa gsal byed dpe'i ledra ste drug pa'o//
215b5(rnying rgyud): de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des rdo rje sems dpa' men pa la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes chen po rang gsal bdag/ 'phrul tshig brda yis mtshon pa'i phyir// brjod pa dag pa'i ngo la/ @
215b6(rnying rgyud): byas gdams ngag rim pra yis// gas pa par nges par gsung dugasol// zhes gsol to// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' rjen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyang // rdzogs rten thags
215b7(rnying rgyud): gyi gleng gi mchog/ dmigs dang babasags la gnas pa ni// gyon yon rim pa brtags gtses// nam mkha'i dbyig gi gter 'chang zhing // rang rig rang gsal mig lo thugs// ma bcos 'od gsal 'od la bzhugs// tshi gnas tog thal cir me
216a1(rnying rgyud): dgos/ thos ma pa na don ma lano// dgab pa spyad myo stsalangs// bsas ga pa gra dang gos gdus// ngas 'og/ dgas dun pa d+hagatu bzhugs/
216a2(rnying rgyud): rnam tha/ ngas pa'i dag/ bang pas 'arnas gnasas // d+hA 'dzin pa pa na yo / mig pa she ba gyi/ mi bdags sa 'i migs / ga sa /
216a3(rnying rgyud): mkhas spyod pa yis// mams ma ba ces rig par gsal// gang dadag gi thabs nyid kyis// bam pa ni de ma thar rnas// bsra ga ba dang ngags na// sa gcig 'gre la byang chub lam// spos pas ga pa dkyil la kho /
216a4(rnying rgyud): bcos med rig pa'i sems kyis gnas// byangar med lhan grub phrin las la// bya btsal zeng bar rang bzhin gnas// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid la// ma bgrod la mgun rdzogs par gsal// 'phrul tshig rig pa'i sgo ma yis// bsam pa'i
216a5(rnying rgyud): zag de ba'i rlagasal// dbang da byin lhan thabs mkhas // rdo rje mchog gi rnal 'byung // yon tun brjid 'dzi rdorjes// dam pa gnas pa'i gang bag gis// gso d+d+hi ba dang sems pa ning // rabab mang ga tsong rje 'dzi pas// nog su
216a6(rnying rgyud): dran pa'i ga nyid das// ma pagasams mi kyad drung // zhing dang than pa zan po dang// rlung bags nga mdza can// da baman pa mas / sa med sam pas gta ngaH/ sa nga brji pa dang // bca dag
216a7(rnying rgyud): bskyed dang // yun ring dmal migadags dang // dregs pa bas la dang sbyang bar bzhag/ gang zhig de la dbab pa dang // khas len bsrad dang gzhu ba dang // bkru dang thugs badrug patshang 'bru dang // dbrog dang khyed gi sa de bang 'dir dang // thams cad
216b1(rnying rgyud): bka' migacig pa so// dbab cas bcwo brgyad byung byas la// mgon po rang gas la thugs mang 'a b+h+ring // rang gsal 'od la mnya ma du gnas// smyos med blo mis gcig so// dogs pad rung dag gsapal 'dud// khyod kyi yonas rnying bas//
216b2(rnying rgyud): rig rang gis mtshon pa'i phyir// ma brjod rig pa'i gsung gis ni// bdag la rig pa'i don gsal mdzod// rang la rang gsal nges rtogs pa'i// ma bcos rig pa'i bu khyod la// rtsol med rig pa ngo bstan gyis// blo yi gtad du go bar byos// gal
216b3(rnying rgyud): dam tshig 'das pa la// gsang ba'i ye shes nges bshad pa// rdzogs rkyen rna brgyud nges bstan na// bam+bA ra yi 'bru bzhin 'gyur// de ma thag tu brtag pa dang // mkha' 'grong ma can 'dus gyur nas// dur khrod 'bar ba'i ri gling du// gcan gzhan
216b4(rnying rgyud): sa/ rnas nas / na ga/
216b5(rnying rgyud): byin brlabs nyams byin na/ nyi ma stong gi 'od ltar 'gyur// sran gyi dbang bskur gnang pob nas// ye shes rang gsal 'od la bzhugs// bde baphrag brgya'i rdo byed nas// de nyid tsam gyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ chol phreng gnas pa'i rnam
216b6(rnying rgyud): 'byor la// glang du zhugs pa'i rig pa yis// bcos med 'od gsal nyid du gnas// nAm mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam spor bas// yon tan grangs med snying por rtogs// de ltar bla ma mnyes byas nas// rin chen dpal be'u'i sgo h+yaM saM/ swAng
216b7(rnying rgyud): wAr yin pa'i thabs nyid kyis// rin gyinang bstan rjod chad bshad// brjod pa babs kyi po long gas// mngon gas pa rin men 'bar bal// mchod cing brtags pa ma yin yang // 'dral dbang nga la de ltar gsal// thig pa 'odags so 'i 'don cis/
217a1(rnying rgyud): tha dad dmigs gsal gcig la gnas// gnas med rang gas la ye shes pas// 'bab chu 'dra ba'i man ngag sbyin// mi gnas drag po'i blo nyid la// glang chen tod pa'i man dag sbyin// der yang mi gnas 'gro ba la/
217a2(rnying rgyud): glang chen phyal ba sbyin par bya// 'dzin med yal ba'i gang zag la// gzungs ldan rig pa'i man+ta ngag sbyin// thabs dang shes rab rtag 'char bar// kha sbyor bar bu'i gad ma dag sbyin// skal med dbang po dman pa la// shin tu gdams pa'i man
217a3(rnying rgyud): ngag sbyin// phyi nang g.yeng ba'i gang zag la// bgrang dang bzung dang brtag pa dang // thun mong rlung gi man ngag sbyin// blo ldan rtogs pa'i gang zag la// 'phrul gyi me long man ngag sbyin// chags zhen 'dod pa'i rigs can la// rin chen bde bskyil man
217a4(rnying rgyud): ngag sbyin// rtag 'dzin de nyid rigs can la// ngo bo brtags pa'i man ngag sbyin// shes ldan dbang po dul ba la// brda ldan rig pa'i man ngag sbyin// yul la zhen pa'i gang zag la// dbang po rtul po'i thabs kyis bstan// tshig la dga' ba'i gang zag la//
217a5(rnying rgyud): sba la brtag pa'i man ngag bstan// rgyan du mnyam 'jog 'dris pa la// spyod lam rgyun gyi gdams ngag phog/ blo ldan skal can yang rab la// chu sred lta bu'i man ngag sbyin// 'dzin rtsol bral ba'i rig pa la// 'jug med rig pas de ltar blta// 'od
217a6(rnying rgyud): gsal ma bcos dang du bzhag/ rjes ma 'brang zhing yul mi 'tshol// rang gsal rkyen thal cis mi 'khrugs// rang la mi bsam dbyings mi tshol// 'du shes kun bral gsal ba'i 'od// phyogs bral kun khyab dmigs su med// re dogs pasam sbyangs mtha'
217a7(rnying rgyud): las grol// phyogs bral nyi 'od 'bar bltar// byin rlabs yongs su khyab par brdal// nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar// kun lad lta nyid du ston// rtsol bral rig pa rang gsal la// 'byung 'jug 'dzin pa kun dang bral// zhes gsungs so// nam
217b1(rnying rgyud): mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ don gnyis gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum sangs rgyas
217b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyis khyab pa'i sku// rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' bar// mtshan med ye shes nyid sbyangs nas// ngo bo rang gsal rig pa yis// nyams rtogs rus pa dam pa rnams// rang gsal nyid du rtogs bya'i phyir// mgo
217b3(rnying rgyud): pos bdag la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba btab po// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po// ji ltar snang ba thams cad kun// rang rig ye shes dkyil 'khor la//
217b4(rnying rgyud): brtags pa'i tha snyad kun dang bral// phyogs bral mnyam pa'i snying po las// gang ltar bltas pa de ltar gsal// 'dzin med kun bral nyag gcig po// ye shes gsang ba'i ngo bo la// brjod dang snang ba'i chos so cog/ rang gsal ye shes rdzogs pa'i
217b5(rnying rgyud): dang // gnyis med gcig gi rang bzhin la// mtshan ma'i tha snyad kun dang bral// rang gAsal thabs kyi me long la// 'gag med kun go gzugs brnyan 'char// de nyid ma bcos rang gsal lung // sgo bral rig pa'i gdeng la gnas// ma bcos rang gsal
217b6(rnying rgyud): mkha' ltar dag/ mi gnas nam mkha' lta bu'i tshul// gdod nas dag pa chos kyi dbyings// rang rig rang gsal dbyings la bzhugs// mtha' dang dbus bral gnyis med lam// ma chags dag pa rig pa'i gnas// 'od gsal kun gyi gzhal yas
217b7(rnying rgyud): la// tshad dang dpag pa'i yul las 'das// mi bsam mi dpyad rang gsal mchog/ rig pa 'gyur med dag pa'i sku// brjod med rang gsal khyab gsal gsung // yon tan phrin las btsal du med// bya bral brjod med chos kyi dbyings// kun la gsal te 'du shes
218a1(rnying rgyud): da// dag pa mas na 'dzin la // de bzhin ma dag pa thong // gsal dang gA dpapa la'anapa// 'du ga pas cig tu gsal// gas sa dang migs pa 'dzin ma 'an// bzla ca dpatshan
218a2(rnying rgyud): rten dang bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis// cir yang gsal la dmigs su med// rang gsal rig pa'i bde ba de// mtshan ma'i sgra yis mi mtshon te// nyams myong gsal ba bstan med lung // dga' ba'i re dang mtshungs par gnas// rig pa'i gzhal yas rgya tha
218a3(rnying rgyud): mtshan med 'od gsal rtag tu bzhugs// ji bzhin krung la ji bzhin 'jug/ mnyam pa med pa'i sems kyi gnas// gang du'ang mi gsal gcig tu gsal// gcig po ye shes rang gsal dang // rig pa spyi blugs rang 'char bas// yul dang yul can tshul mig
218a4(rnying rgyud): rang la mi gsal gzhan mi gsal// gnyis ka ma yin mtha' bral lung // sgo srur gnyis bral dag pa la// bslad med rang byung dang la 'jug/ rig pa rang gsal nyams ldan na// mtshan ma dag la dga' brod med// 'jigs dang mi 'jigs chos med de// ci la'ang 'jug pa
218a5(rnying rgyud): yid mi 'byung // gnyer med chu dung rang gsal la// g.yo med spyod la ma rtag tu gnas// dmyal ba'i 'khor lo mi bzad pa// rang gsal ye shes dang du mkhyen// rig pa spos brel chos dbyings la// sdug bsngal drag po mi bzad dang // bde ba'i longs spyod cir byung ba// ye
218a6(rnying rgyud): shes rol pa nyid yin pas// rang gsal gnyis med dang du gsal// rang byung ma bcos shes rab kyis// rig pa rang dbang rgyal po des// mnyan bsam med par phul du phyung // gzhan gyi shes rgyad grol bar nus// gnyis med ye shes chen po la// gnyis 'dzin rig pa rjes mi
218a7(rnying rgyud): 'jug/ 'od gsal bde mchog ma yin pa// rnam rtog mtshan na'i chos mi gnas// mya ngan 'das la mi phyogs shing // 'khor bar skyo ba'i sems mi gnas// bar mtshams med pa'i ting 'dzin la// 'dzin med blo yis gsal bar gnas// yangs med 'du 'bral mi gnas pas//
218b1(rnying rgyud): med bar sru ces bub// dus pa'i thag mtha' pab / da pa ba nga sbyar/ mamras zi la gdunagacig su/ pa'i stong ba dzad bzhin // 'khar ba'i lags dang gas pa dang // gsung ngas kha dag kyibs bkod du// dan na
218b2(rnying rgyud): las kyis bcos mad // 'dab chags nam mkhar gnas pa ltar// 'khor ba'i gtsang do la mdu bde// sna ma'i rdzu 'phrul ji bzhin du// rang gi ngang las g.yos med gnas// 'gro gan 'dre pa'i mthu yis ni// ngan par mi ltang byi dkris brtsibs
218b3(rnying rgyud): gsal rus mthu bsam mi khyab// ye shes rang gasngal 'gro 'ong med// thugs rje rang gsal rdzogs ris med// ting 'dzin rang gsal dmigs dang bral// rang gsal ti du la nyid mi 'jug/ 'ching grol med pa'i rang gsal ba// rnam rtog bstod pa'i rlung gi gnas//
218b4(rnying rgyud): gsal la mar me'i tshul nyid la// 'du shes med pa N+DI sems nyid 'dru// tser yang bri bal ma rkyen mi dgongs// gang yang ma yin de gang yin// mtha' brul na mu ma khwa'i rdo rje la// dmigs gtad 'jog pa nor ba'i lam// ye shis snying po nyi ma shar// rang snresab
218b5(rnying rgyud): rig gter mdzugs// mtha' dang dbus dang phyogs bral la// de dag mnyam pa'i sems mi 'a // 'jug tu med pa'i 'dags la la// gnyis med rig pa gcig gis 'jug/ ji ltar rgal chu bzhag ltar// gnyis med gnas dzu ba ng+ge/ rab dag/ la
218b6(rnying rgyud): ba ma shes snying ba gas sa// 'a 'a bsil po tepas// mtha' khri mu pagad nas spyod// mi gas gas la 'i TIm hU~M// spyad tu gdal sa dmigasu dang thal// yang ma yin thams cad yin// phyogs sa pang pa'i zug sa rjon// ma ma
218b7(rnying rgyud): snang ba cigadas/ zigs kyim chosu mapa' bad // thom bad kyi 'ari bar ba brdzog ldang/ yim na dang sam ba bang // mi'achu nyi dkyis 'thor de// cal ma dmapa pa ma dgas pa// nga ba' da gas pa dpalang 'ad
219a1(rnying rgyud): bcos med dbyings na rang bzhin gsal// mngon par mtho ba'i spyi gtsug la// mtha' yi blta bas reg tu med// bcos dang ma bcos de nyid mtha'// dbus mtha' med pa de bzhin nyid// gang la'ang mi gnas dbyings na
219a2(rnying rgyud): gnas// dbyings de ma bcos zhi ba'i sa// gdod nas stong pa'i rang bzhin la// stong dang mi stong 'du shes bral// ma bsam pa nyid bsams pa'i mtha'// mtha' dbus bral ba'i ye shes la// mtha' dbus yod med bskrad mi gdags// bstod
219a3(rnying rgyud): med ye shes 'od po che// 'khor ba rang gsal nyid du 'bar// kun 'byung nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang // snang srid ye shes gsal bar gnas// gang dag cir gsal ye shes nyid// ye shes gsal ba'i 'khor lo la// ma rig sgrib pa ye nas med//
219a4(rnying rgyud): kun bzang rig pa'i 'khor lo ni// ci yang yin no 'gag pa med// bsam dang bral ba'i chos nyid la// bsam zhing dpyad pas yul mi bskyod// rang bzhag lhag pa'i ting 'dzin la// sems kyi 'gro 'du'i las mi byed// rang gsal klong la ye
219a5(rnying rgyud): gnas pa// bcos med byang chub mchog gi lam// gang ltar 'gyur ba'i rin chen ni// rdzas su med de de ltar snang // rang snang sems kyi dkyil 'khor las// thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bum phrag yas// ma bgrod ye shes dbyings la gnas// mi
219a6(rnying rgyud): bsgom rig pa cig char 'jug/ rang sems gsal ba ma yin pa// gnyis med bral ba'i chos mi gnas// rol pa 'gag med cir yang 'byung // rig pa spos bral dbyings la 'dus// brjod pa sgra yi 'khor lo can// sra yis don nyi dbyings la
219a7(rnying rgyud): 'bebs// kun 'dus sems kyi me long la// 'dzin bral rig pa cir mi dgongs// rang gsang thab kyis chod pa la// ye shes gsal ba'i don mi snang // zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rig pa
219b1(rnying rgyud): rang gsal gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rig pa'i ye shes gsal ba la// gnyis med dag
219b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i don mi snang // gang phyir sgrib pa bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa las/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces gsungs so// ye shes gsang ba'i rang bzhin la// rnam rtog dra bas so sor bcings// de nyid rang gsal ma rtogs
219b3(rnying rgyud): pas// log pa'i grong khyer nyid du lhung / zhes gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo nyid// gnyis med ye shes gsang ba'i don// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam sbyor ba// ye shes kun snang me long ni// 'khor min
219b4(rnying rgyud): kyang na 'das pa snyen// legs 'dags pa rig pa'i mkha'// sangs rgyas sems can byams cad la// dang gas la rig pa yi shes ni// kun la khyab par yinas drung / gang yang ma yin de bzhin da// chos nyid spros bral 'gyur dang thal// /
219b5(rnying rgyud): bral ye shes snying por gsal// dper na chu ru gcig pa la// rkyen dang phrad dang ma phrad kyis// nus pa so sor snang ba ltar// rgyal ba'i ye shes rang gsal la// rtog dang ma rtog khyad par de// dngos la de dag mi gnas kyang // bsam pas
219b6(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i ngo la grags// rang gsal rig pa'i mthu med pas// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// lta ba'i khyad par bsam mi khyab// dngos la 'od gsal rig par 'dus// ji bzhin rig pa'i mthu med pas// bdag dang byed po dbang phyug/
219b7(rnying rgyud): dang // rang gzhan dus dang glo bur tshul// yod med rtog pa log pa'i chos// don la de dag kun dang bral// dge dang sdig pa rnam phye nas// blang dor byas pas mngon par 'joms// gong 'og tshul gyi rim pa can// thob 'dod byas pa ngal ba'i rgyu//
220a1(rnying rgyud): bden bzhi bcu drug lam brtan nus// nyon mongs rnam par spangs byas te// rgyun zhugs la sogs ri ma thog pa// skyes pa ngal 'don med yon// ta 'brel dag pa'i chung byas nas// gnyis med chos la gnyis bzung dang /
220a2(rnying rgyud): sred pa'i 'khor lo dgag ces pa// dgag bsgrub byed pa'i don dang 'gal// gnyis med don la gnyis bzung nas// bskal pa grangs med gsapa nyid du// sa bcwal ma lnga pha rol phyin// stong bzhig nyis rtog spang lam can// rangs thob kyang bzar
220a3(rnying rgyud): ma phyin// gnyis med rang gsal don las nyams// chos dbyings ye nas gcig pa la// drag pa nyid dang ma dag pa// sprang len ye shes gzung 'dzin gyis// rdo rje 'dzin thob 'bras mthar phyin// 'od gsal kun mkhyen don ma rig/ ye shes
220a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i don ma rtogs// rgyal thabs rig pa'i dbang ma thob// gnyis med rang gsal nyag gcig la// nges med gnyis kyi cha 'dzin cing // don la nges pa'i 'bras bu gcig/ 'dod pa 'khrul pa'i rigs cananA de// gnyis kyis gnyis med ji ltar rnye/
220a5(rnying rgyud): mching bu gser du mi gcig dang // nges pa med pas che be la 'dra// ye shes gsal ba'i don la bsgrib// byin rlabs snang ba cho ga dgu// dkyil 'khor bskyeng dang bzlas pa dang // ting 'dzin gsal ba'i rim pa yis// sgeg po bkod pa'i sa 'dod pa//
220a6(rnying rgyud): dngags 'dod lartog pas bsgrub// rang byung la rnams bskyed// seM nas sbya ga 'jug nas// maugs sa byung don dang 'bral// brjong pa la 'byung zer mas// bskye rdzogs gas rdzas pargyam kyid rnas// dag pa 'dzi pa
220a7(rnying rgyud): lam la gnas// dbang bskur ye shes dkyil 'khor gsal// sku gsung thugs dang gzhal yas dang // spyan drangs bzlas brjod mchod pa yis// rim pas rnam rtog kun spangs nas// 'bras bu 'dod pas don mo rnyed// reg pa'i ye shes gcig po
220b1(rnying rgyud): la// ting 'dzin gsum du 'dod pas bcings// mtshan nyid rang gsal dkyil 'khor la// zhi dang khro bo su yis phye// ye shes kun khyab brdal bra la// byon dang mi byon 'khrul pa'i chos// khams gsum ye shes rang gsal la// bzor
220b2(rnying rgyud): slob babyung mi dgos// mgyis snying po byung chub pa// sgru ba bzhi las ltung bya 'phrul// ngas gcig sa smras 'ad gsal la// ris skye ba debs mtshon du med/ nga brjing dgag dang bgrang ba dang // thun ma nyid kyis sems sbyangs nas/
220b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sems la mnyam sbyor bas// ye shes rang gsal dron mi rnyed// ye shes 'dus pa'i ka ba gsum// me long bzhi brtsegs 'brel pa lngas// 'byed 'dzum drag tu bsgral ba yis// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor 'ben la phog/ ye shes 'bar ba'i 'od nyid
220b4(rnying rgyud): gyis// mthar thug med pa kun bduganas// ye shes thig le gcig tu 'dus// rin chen 'phrul gyi lugu rgyud// shel ltar dag pa'i thig mi can// khams gsum 'od kyis khyab gdal nas// slar yang ye shes snying por thim// bdud rtsis nam
220b5(rnying rgyud): mkha'i khams bkang nas// bde ba phrag brgya'i ro myangs nas// nam mkha'i bdud rtsi 'byongs pa yis// stong chen 'od brdal nyid gsal yang // 'di yang bcos ma log pa'i lam// g.yo byed dbang dbyibs dkyil 'khor te// bu gsum e
220b6(rnying rgyud): yi dbyibs ldan gnas// de steng rin chen 'khor lo ni// me long brtsegs pa'i tshul du gnas// sum cu gnyis gnyis ldan pa yi// dbus su bsil ba'i sa bon can// zhi ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bskor// gnyis pa dab brgyad dngas mar ldan//
220b7(rnying rgyud): chos nyid la shes rang byung rgyud// yon tan gsum gsum ri 'o// 'od zer thum da kyi lo// tha 'og gur du badz+wali ngo // mthing ga she la slong bcus tshul la// spang mig sa gras rbA hU~M// dmar nag zlag ma gzhul dbyibs// ze
221a1(rnying rgyud): shes par bya// ma rtogs 'gro drugs bon la// rtogs pas sku gsang thugs nyidadu// gnyis ma bsres pas ye shes yin// rnam bzhi shes pa brgyad kyi rten// rgyu ba'i tshul gyis shes par bya// snying pos bo dzo/
221a2(rnying rgyud): 'bar nas// mi shigs thig le'i snying por gnas// dbugs tshol rang bral gyur pa yis// ye shes brdal khyab sa la gnas// bcu gsum gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor nas// ye shes gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor spro// bcu drug 'khor
221a3(rnying rgyud): los mtshams sbyar nas// bur du 'gro zhing gyen du 'khyil// bcu dang gsum bzhi'i chos kun ni// sngar gsal ye shes ro nyid do// gzungs ldan chos kyi phyag rgyal// byin brlabs dbang bskur cha rdzogs la// 'khyud sbyor rig pa'i bde ba'i ro//
221a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung dang 'jug pa gnyis kyi cha// brgyad gnyis bzhi gnyis bcu drug gnyis// rang gsal lhan cig skyes pa de// 'dod chags ting 'dzin bde ba des// ye shes rang gsal rkyen bral lung // rgyu chen bral ba'i don ma rlod// rgyan dang cha yi
221a5(rnying rgyud): tshul bzhin 'phags// rjes su rnal 'byor tshul gyis ni// dbyings dang ye shes rang bzhin gyis// rgyu 'bras dag pa'i tshul du blta// 'od kyi ting 'dzin stobs kyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' sa la 'gro// rangs 'bras bu mngon thob kyang // mthar
221a6(rnying rgyud): thug 'bras bu de la med// 'di kun 'jig rten lam yin te// rtsol bas rang gsal don mi rnyed// gnyis med dang la gnyis par bzung // rang gsal dang lngas mun par 'khyams// rgyu rkyen bral bar chu 'bras bltas// ma bcos dang la 'dzin pas
221a7(rnying rgyud): bcings// bgrod me dngangal lam gyis bgrod// gcig la bdag gzhan gnyis su bzung // 'di kun ye shes don la sgrib// khams gsum 'khor bar de yis lhung // kun 'dus rang gsal nyag gcig las// cir bltas rang gsal dbyings la
221b1(rnying rgyud): thugs// gza' gtad 'dzin bral chos kyi dbyings// rang la mi rtog de mi rtog/ 'dug med rig pa cig car skyes// kun gsal mtshan ma rig par rdzogs// klung du'ang mi gnas dran la son// glen pa ma bcos dbyings gsal bas// 'khor
221b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas par mkhyen// snying rje 'du shes yul med la// gdung med rang bzhin khyab par gdal// yul dang shes pa 'byung 'jug med// rang gsal ye shes me long la// dmigs 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes kyis// dus gcig zug phrad nyid du 'jug/
221b3(rnying rgyud): gang la'ang mi gnas rang la gnas// rang yang dmigs yul rnam bcad nas// rig pa smra la rten mi 'cha'// dbang po yul gyi rjes mi 'brang // 'di ltar gsal bar ma rtogs na// gang ltar brtags pa de ltar min// zhes gsungs so// nam
221b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnab 'ad marnam pa'i rnye chen pa las/ gas gangal ba sgrings pa'i yi pa / nas pa skyenas dpa' dzi ma parji 'di gas hU~M// rtsol tham migs sto bu ma// bar du ma chags pa sa
221b5(rnying rgyud): bde// khyad par ma 'dres gsal ba ru// mgon pos bdag la bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po/ chos nyid dang byung byang chub sems// rang byung dang
221b6(rnying rgyud): rig dkyil 'khor la// gnyis med ye shes chen po la// rnam dbye ba sgrub mi gnas na// rig par don la 'jug pa'i phyir// dngos dang bsam par phye ba yi// gang ltar 'tshams pa de ltar brtan// ngo bo mthong tshul gnyis kyis so// rang rig ye shes ma
221b7(rnying rgyud): yin pa// rnam par bcad pa'i chos mi gnas// spu gsum rig pa'i grong du rdzogs// gnas ni spos bral rig pa ste// bstan pa rang gsal me long yin// 'khor ni rig pa'i tshe 'phrul te// dus ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa// srud pa kun 'dus
222a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i gter// dngags la dang la ma yin pa// ngan mgyogs pa mi gnas te// rig pa 'dzi' gyung med pa'i gtang // bas pa gyis ma tha dus dashes// theb pas dpa' man pa/ smyon pa chas kwa'i zhing khams na// nam
222a2(rnying rgyud): mkhas ga khyab chos nyid gter// chos nyid sems nyid dbyer med pa// rjes bu 'i khams nyid du bzhed// gangs ni rig pa'i 'og min te// spos thal 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // mtha' dang dngus med lo shes gas la// sems cad sangs kyas
222a3(rnying rgyud): kun gyi gnas// ston pa rang byung 'od gsal ba// rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi rje// brjod med rig pa'i ngo 'o mis// 'phro 'ong med pa'i chos kyang ston// spos med sbyin rlabs phyogs bcur brdal// rig pa rang gsal ngo bor ni// ma gsungs byin gyis rlabs kyis
222a4(rnying rgyud): bshad/ gamam zhi pa// dang shi da bdug da pang/ da sa // 'dugapa la na pa'i na nga// bkod pa med pa ngas tugadas// thab
222a5(rnying rgyud): shes sbying po bas// nyid pa 'chad cing nyid kyis 'grel// ye shes snying po gan 'dus pas// de nyid byang chub sems kyi 'khor// smad pa rang gsal dbyings kyi slong // su kyang rig pa'i 'ong la 'dus// gnyis gagasal ba'i rang 'azhin la// ma 'dus pa
222a6(rnying rgyud): yi chos mi gnas// dus ni thams cad mnyam pa'i dus// rang gsal ngo bo thog mtha' med// rang byung byang chub sems nyid la// dus gsum khyad par gcig tu 'dus// bstan pa chos kun rang gsal la// ma bcos ma bslad 'gyur med lung // gnyis
222a7(rnying rgyud): med rig pa'i ye shes nyid// rang snang tshul gyis gtan la 'bebs// ma bcos rang bzhin bzhag pas go// nang pa gsum gyis bsta dang spogs// cig char 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rtogs// gang yang mi mkhyen gsal mkhyen pas// ye shes rang sdang gsal
