222b2(rnying rgyud): sa sa
222b3(rnying rgyud): sa
222b4(rnying rgyud): sa
222b5(rnying rgyud): ba byu pa ba/ san pa bgad/ sa bzhin sa bya shAm // na skyes pa dam pa 'dzi / gang su /
222b6(rnying rgyud): dedag kyigs mapa sa pa // nga ba'i / nga sa sa sa/ da / sa smos
222b7(rnying rgyud): /
223a1(rnying rgyud): zung nga'i rim pa yis// gang skar 'arnams pade ltar bsan// zan sa byang chung sams pa 'jus/ bcos pa dang byang 'du ba 'das// mags gas na 'job pa// ji sa gas pa padakang yig/ gsang ba'i milong gas pa pa'i mngo
223a2(rnying rgyud): da / / na pa ra slas/
223a3(rnying rgyud): chags spad pang // rang gsal ning la rang nyid gnas// gang yang ma yin 'od gsal yin// zhes gsungs so// nam ma kha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ phun sum tshogs pa bskrun pa'i le'u skye bcu pa'o// / de nas sems dpa
223a4(rnying rgyud): rje dam pa des 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag 'dus pa rig pa'i tshogs// ye shes gsal ba ji ltar brtag/ rang thung rig pa'i 'khor lo las// rma byung rig pa ji ltad 'char// ye shes nyim bcom ldan 'das// rang zung don la bshad du gsol//
223a5(rnying rgyud): zhes zhus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po/ rang byung ye shes kyu rkyen bral// gdod nas dang snang 'od kyi mchog/ gang yang ma yin kun la gsal// phyogs med thugs
223a6(rnying rgyud): ni kun 'dag la// phyogs mni me mnga' chog mi mda'// mkha' gsuman pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// thad dpas ma yas 'dul thabs can// rang dang ga pa'i sems la bzhugs// chos dbyings thabra la rdzogs pa'i lung // gus mdzad rig pa
223a7(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi gter// sku gsung thugs kyi bde ba'i mchog/ kun bdal rig pa'i klong du son// palta med ye shes rang gsal ni// yul med sgros bral ji bzhin nyid// rang sdang rig pa'i 'khor lo la// yul med rang gsal rig pas mthong // bsam bral
223b1(rnying rgyud): rig pa cir mi dgongs// gza' bral dbu ma'i lam po che// ji ltar ma yin de bzhin nyid// de ltar rig pa nyid kyis gsal// cis kyang ma bcos de bzhin nyid// phra rags 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog la// mtshan ma'i rnam grangs ci skyes kyang // de nyid 'od gsal dag pa'i
223b2(rnying rgyud): mkha'// gnyis med rang gsal gcig la son// mthong ba'i skabs na don mi mthong // mi mthong bas na don mthong ste// gnyi ga ma bcos rang rig la// mthong dang ma mthong rjes mi 'jug/ thams cad byang chub sems nyid la// log rtog rtsol ba'i chos mi gnas//
223b3(rnying rgyud): rang byung mtshan mar mi 'dug pas// gang ltar gsal yang dmigs dang bral// 'byung 'jug med pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// ji bzhin nyid kyi don la rtogs// lta bral gzigs med ye shes spyan// chos rnams byang chub sems su gsal// byang chub sems nyid 'od
223b4(rnying rgyud): brdal bas// mtha' dbus med pas gcig tu gnas// 'dod lnga yul lnga chags sdang lnga// cir yang sems las gzhan med pas// de nyid ma yin gzhan ma yin// 'khor ba ye shes 'od du 'bar// rang gsal 'jug med rig pa yis// mthong 'jug
223b5(rnying rgyud): med pa'i ngo bor brtag/ phyogs med gsal ba'i ye shes kyis// phyogs su blta ba zil gyis mnan// dang po sems la rgyu med pas// tha mar gyi 'jig mtha' las 'das// rang byung rdo rje ste 'gag med// dus gcig rdzogs pas rim skye med// skad
223b6(rnying rgyud): cig med de rgyan dang bral// rig pa rang gsal mngon sum la// rjes dpag rig pa'i rdzun gyis bslus// de kho na nyid rang gsal lung // rgyu rkyen byang chub sems rig pas// ye shes 'khyil pa'i 'khor lo can// cir yang 'phrul lo thams cad rig/ nam
223b7(rnying rgyud): mkha' rang gsal dbyings la gnas// sdang srid bde sdug 'khrul 'khor yang // rig pa ye shes 'khor lor zhugs// rang byung dang las gzhan pa med// 'du 'bral med par rang la thug/ khyab gdal rig pa kun tu bzang // gang ltar gsal bde ltar
224a1(rnying rgyud): yin// klong yangs chu bo 'dra 'gro bzhin// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gcig tu gsal// nam mkha' gsal ba'i gzhal yas su// rig pa mchog gi 'od brtul nas// rig pa dang gsal mchog tu brtag/ brda don phrad nas
224a2(rnying rgyud): gsal bar bshad// mchog tu gsang ba'i chos 'di ni// snang med rig pa mchog gi dang // rtog cing dpyod pa'i yul las 'das// zlos bral mtshan ma cir mi rtog/ snang dang srid pa'i chos kun ni// dang po sku med ngang yin la// bar du rtog cing dbyar
224a3(rnying rgyud): las 'das// tha ma rang gi mtshan ma med// gsum ka ma skyes chos lha'i dang // yul dang dbang po spyod pa dang // myong tshor so sor me 'dres gsal// rang thung rang la cir yang byung // rdzogs longs spyod pa rang bzhin gsal// kun la khyab cing don byed
224a4(rnying rgyud): nus// dpag med rig pa sna tshogs 'char // rang las skul cing rang las mdzod// rang phyung rig pa sprul pa'i sku// bye 'gro myi nang ma lus pa'i// gzugs snang phra rags gang yang rung // rmad byung sgra yi rol par shar// ye shes 'od gsal mchog gi
224a5(rnying rgyud): sku// sgra skad rab 'bring ma lus pa// gsal stong rig pa nyid kyi gsung // gang brjod tshig 'angs gang yang bral// brjod bral mi g.yo brjod pa nyid// dmigs zil mtshan ma'i rtog mi 'jug/ chos bu snying po mchog gi gsung // brda mngal nyams co
224a6(rnying rgyud): gsal rig cing // nges phyes the tshom rnam par bcad// brda yi don go gnyis med pa// rdzogs longs spyod pa'i gsung du gsal// the snyad ma 'dres don byed nus// don dang 'brel zhing khyab par gsal// kun dang mthun par rang brda 'phrad// sprul pa'i
224a7(rnying rgyud): gsung du rang bzhin brdal// brjod bral tshig gi rang bzhin gyis// rang byung kun la khyab par gsal// gling byur rang gsal do ba'i sgra// yi shes rol pa'i gsung du shar// dran rtog rig pacir pi brta// rnam tho la rang gas la ching mi dgongs// mtshan
224b1(rnying rgyud): ma rnam par rtog dang thal// gnyis med rig pa mchog gi thugs// sna tshogs rang gsal ba 'bru dang // tsa pad ma yan grang yang gsal// 'ad gsal phan pa'i don la brgyags// ba chad thugs zab par brdal/ tshogs 'phru pa
224b2(rnying rgyud): gang yang min// gcig tu mi gnas khyab par gsal// kun dang mthun pa'i dgongs pa can// rang las rang 'phrul sprul pa'i thugs// mig po mi gnas gang du'ang min// rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che// rmang byung rang gsal thugs kyi mchog
224b3(rnying rgyud): rmad byung thugs kyi rol par shar// nyi ma'i 'od bzhin 'bar ba ltar// rtsol bral rang byung rig pa las// rtsol med thugs rjes khyab par gsal// kun la gnas so dmigs dang bral// dpal ldan nam mkha' khyab pa'i 'od// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin
224b4(rnying rgyud): 'char// 'od gsal nam mkha' rgyas pa'i mtha'// 'jig rten gsal bar dus gcig shwar// 'khor ba rang rig rang gsal yang // ye shes rig par mi gsal bas// ye shes nyi ma'i 'od kyang nub// rang gsal rig pa'i don dang 'ga'// rang byung/
224b5(rnying rgyud): sgra yi rjes 'brengs kyang // de yi ngo bor ma gyur na// gsal ba'i ye shes nyid dang bral// bcings pa'i mdud pa lcags dang 'dra// rang la rang gis gzer chen 'debs// mi rtog gsal ba'i gdeng du gyur// klong zhugs rang gsal mchog gi gter//
224b6(rnying rgyud): rnam rtog mtshan mas bcos su med// 'gyur med rdo rje'i klong du yon// brjod bral sems kyi dkyil 'khor la// pra khrid don gyis ma mtshon na// rig pa rang gsal don mi mthong // gter khyim gser dang gsal byed ltar// nges pa rnyed nas tshig
224b7(rnying rgyud): mi dgos// rang byung gsang ba'i 'khor lo la// ye shes rig pas mnyam sbyar nas// rin chen 'bar ba'i gling bzhin du// ye shes dkyil 'khor nyid du 'bar// thams cad ye shes dkyil 'khor gsal// ma bsgribs dang thung sgo mo la// rtsol brel
225a1(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i thabs kyis la // mthong med mi migs dkyil 'bar la// yangs pa med pa'i sems kyis gnas// phyir snang rig pa dang gsal bas// sgrub pa'i mun pa dam par bcad// ya sangs rgyas pa'i thangs can
225a2(rnying rgyud): las// gru rkyen rtsol bas ci gra bya// ye shes snying po'i mtshan nyid ni// khyab par gsal la rang bzhin med// snang srid gsal ba'i me long la// gsal yang da pa'i mtshan ma myed// mi 'jug ni blta cing mi tshal// shes nas ma btsu
225a3(rnying rgyud): dgang gnas// bsam bral dmigs pa'i byad tshor med// ces gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ ye shes rang gsal mthong ba'i le'u skye bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rje de nyid kyis
225a4(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mu gsung thugs kyi gsung ba 'chang // zlos bral mnyam nyid rig pa'i gter// gnyis med rang gsal bcom ldan 'das// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// rnal 'byor bya bral rdzogs
225a5(rnying rgyud): lung la// gnyis pa'i 'du shes med mod kyang // spyod pa'i khyad par gsung du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po/ gnyis med dang dru ye shes la// gnyis
225a6(rnying rgyud): 'du shes mi 'jug kyang // 'jug pa thabs kyi sgo mtshon phyir/ spyod pa rnam par bshad pa/ bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rjes 'gro zhing // / thad ma ldan mi 'gag/ de nyid de// thugs rje mdzad pa'i byin brlabs brdal// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang
225a7(rnying rgyud): mnyam// thams cad rang gsal ma bcos la// rnam rtog 'dzin pa'i dri ma med// mi 'byung mi 'dug yul dang bra la// gsapa la me tog 'dzin pa med// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i sdod pa la// rnam rtog mi mnga' cing mi dgongs// ma btsal rang bzhag dgongs pa
225b1(rnying rgyud): la// 'dzin pa 'jim gdang nas dben// nam dag gsal badz+ra ba shes la// gang du'ang ma yin khyab par gsal// rang bzhin 'ad gsal bde ba'i dbyings// 'dren pa mi 'dug dbyings mi 'tshol// rang gas pa rig pa rang la 'dabs// ma baphral cha
225b2(rnying rgyud): dz+hagA cing mi gnas// ma bzhag thabs sde me long la// stsogs rim med pas theb ba stesngags la// nam mkha' mi bzung bas ma dang dral// dmigs med gtad med yid ldi 'drug/ yul la li gnas shes pa min// gnyis ka ma len smos dang thal/
225b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa mi 'jug gnyis 'dzin med// ye shes gsang ba'i ngo bo la// mtshan ma med do dang gas la dbyings// snang ba ye shes rang gsal la// dgrag bsgrub med pa rang gi dbyings// rang gsal 'od la yiganas na// mtshan pa'i spyod pa kyi spyad kyang // ra
225b4(rnying rgyud): sa ltos pa'i 'bras bul// ma btsal dang gsal bde chen bral// bcings med yongs rdzogs rig pa'i lam// bgrod du med do yi sangs rgyas// phyogs ris med pa'i ye shes la// gnyis med gcig pa'i mtha' dang bral// bung 'jug 'od gsal brda
225b5(rnying rgyud): chen la// gnyis dang gcig pa'i 'dzin pa med// mtha' brel nam mkha'i rdo rje la// 'gyur med ye shes rang bzhin gsal// de bzhin rig pa'i rnal 'thor la// rtsol dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor med// rig pa klung zhugs bde ba'i dang // cing gsal gyi
225b6(rnying rgyud): col rig pa'i mchog/ 'byung 'jug med de dbyings la gsal// bcud pa thabs kyi me long gis// rang gas la don la mtshon byas nas// gnyis med ye shes zhes brjod pa// rang gsal ma yin gzhan gsal min// mngon sum ring gsal po shes la/
225b7(rnying rgyud): brtan ma'i rtags la rten 'dod pa// gleng po nyid nas rjes 'tshal 'dra// gnyis med ngang la gnyis su 'dod// rangags la dang la gzhan gyis bskrad// rang rig gnyis kyi mtshan bral la// zhen pas de nyid matogs pas// khams gsum byad du gaganas su
225'a1(rnying rgyud): ru na 'khor// mngon sum rig pas nyams kyang ba// lung dang rigs pa rngas dpag gis// ma rtog dang gsal don la ba ziH// de yis dal rtog pa'i nan// ya shas gsal ba'i dang nyid las// thugs rngan ma mnga' mtha' ltung bdal/
225'a2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje chen po nyi 'od ltar// 'gro 'ong med par rang bzhin 'char// ji ltar gang 'dul de dag la// ston pa yid bzhin nor bu ltar// kun la mthun par mi snang na// skyog pa'i thugs rje yal la yaci// glang phyir de ltar mi 'thung na// rnam pa kun mkhyen min pa dang // 5
225'a3(rnying rgyud): 'dogs nus pa med pa dang // thugs rje'i mdzad pargyan chang dang // zhing rtsonas tham gyon du 'gyur// gag/ med thugs rje 'amadang pal// 'byung dang mi 'byung gang rtog pa// rin chen 'bar ba'i 'od kyang rngub// 'khor ba'i rtags las bar ba med// nam rtog mtshan ma'i 'dam dra/
225'a4(rnying rgyud): sa// de lci ba rnas thar pa byed// nyis med pa zhes gsal ba// margyad ma 'dzin pa ni gnas de// na brtags gtas 'dad // sog pa'i lam pa la ba bar byung // dngom la gnyis pa'i gnas na// byas sa pa'i 'dugs kyi la dug
225'a5(rnying rgyud): de dag mtha' la cod pa yin// dngos la rtsod pa kun dang bral// rjes 'jug rig pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rang gsal rig pa'i don la zhugs// thugs rje'i mdzad pa kun la brdal// 'dod don rin chen lta bur 'byin// mdzad pa'i byin rlabs bsam mi khyab//
225'a6(rnying rgyud): mkhyen pa ye shes nyid du 'char// 'gro la phan 'dogs kun la snyoms// kun kyang 'od gsal bde bar gzigs// g.yo med rig pa'i byin rlabs ni// 'byung 'jug med pa'i yongs la brdal// rgya mtsho rkyen gyis bskul ba ltar// kun tu snang zhing nyid du 'dus
225'a7(rnying rgyud): shes reg kun ldan mkhyen pa'i dang // thugs rje'i ngang las mi 'da' bas// ji ltar 'tshams pa de ltar bstan// me dang cha ba'ide bzhin no// thugs rje med pa'i rgyal ba dang // gsal rig med pa'i ye shes ni// bem po don med 'bras bu las// rnyed kya
225'b1(rnying rgyud): ba don med yin// thams cad rang gsal ye shes la// gnyis med 'du shes mi mnga' yang // byin rlabs nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du// 'gro 'ong med par khyab par gang la// de nyid thugs rnga ma yin pa'o// dzas ni gnas par mi srid do// nam mkha'
225'b2(rnying rgyud): sa chu me dang rlung // 'dod lnga bde dang 'dod yon kun+da// thugs rje'i byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// gang zhig phan 'dogs don byed nus// kun kyang thugs rje chen po yin// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'bar ba yang // rgyal ba'i mdzad pa'i thugs rje yin//
225'b3(rnying rgyud): gzhan dag bde sdug btang snyoms kun// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// 'od gsal reg pa'i thabs ldan na// rang gsal min pa'i chos mi gnas// gang ltar spyod pa de dag kun// thabs chen 'od gsal spyod pa yin// thabs ldan rig pa'i
225'b4(rnying rgyud): skyes bu yis// dug chen sman du mdzad pa ltar// 'od gsapa rig pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'khor ba ye shes snying por gsal// ma bcos thabs kyi rnal 'byor pas// gang ltar spyad pa de ltar bde// thabs ldan rig pa 'phrul gyi sgo// kun 'byung/
225'b5(rnying rgyud): rin chen phung po can// dang gsal rig pa'i lde mig gis// rmad byung rig pa'i sgo phye la// rin chen gser gyi sa gzhi la// rin chen rig pa bcud kyi sgo// 'gyur med rang gsal phur bus gdab// gsal byed rin chen 'bar ba bstan// phyir mi 'byung
225'b6(rnying rgyud): bar nan chags bya// tshig don sprad pas brda sprad la// ye shes gsal bas phyogs bcur brdal// 'byung ba'i dus su brda sprad la// 'jug pa'i dus su phral bar bya// dngos med rig pa'i khyad par la// sprad dang bral bar mi gnas kyang // zhen pas
225'b7(rnying rgyud): dngos po mthong bya'i phyir// brda don gnyis kyi man ngag bstan// tshig gi lam dang don gyi lam// don nyid rang gsal 'od bzhin gnas// 'jug pa tshig gi khyad par gyis// gnyis med don gcig bstan par zad// rang skang rig pa 'phrul gyi dmig
226a1(rnying rgyud): phrad pa med par rang bzhin 'char// bcos med de ltar rang bzhag na// rtogs pa rab 'byams nyid du 'char// rang rig ye shes thabs med par// zhen pa'i chags snang kun spyad pas// rdo rje'i khab tu srung gyur nas// byang chub sems/
226a2(rnying rgyud): kyi rigs dang bral// dngos po kun bral ye shes la// phyogs dang ris su mi gnas te// chags sdang bral ba'ang mi spyod na// chags sdang spyod pa spos ci dgos// nges par ltung bar gyur nas ni// thog chen rigs dang rten thal nas// thar pa'i ris su dgyur mi
226a3(rnying rgyud): srid// ye shes gsal ba'i spyod pa yis// ci spyad byang chub sems su gsal// 'od gsal chos sku rig pa'i ngang // btsal med de dag thob par 'gyur// ye shes rang gsol don dang phrad// 'khor ba sangs rgyas lam du mkhyen// rang byung ye shes 'od du
226a4(rnying rgyud): 'badra// rtsol med byin rlabs ngang gis 'char// nam mkha' dbyings kyi gter 'dzin cing // rang gsal rig pa'i 'od la bzhugs// phyogs med rig pa'i thugs rje yis// mkha' lter dag cing kun la 'char// bcos med rang bzhag don thob nas/
226a5(rnying rgyud): ye shes bla ma'i sa gnon te// che ba'i ye shes kun rdzogs pas// ma bgrod sa rnams dus gcig non// rnal 'byor rig pa'i khyad par la// sa dang lam zhes brjod pa las// dngos po ye shes rang snang la// sa dang lam la bgrod pa med// bsam pa'i khyad
226a6(rnying rgyud): par ci tsam pa// de dang de yi tshul bzung nas// 'gro ba 'dren pa'i thabs bstan te// dngos la 'od gsal rig pa'i mkha'// rang rig 'dren pa mchog gi sku// kun 'dus gsang ba dbyings nyid lung // ma bsal bcos med snying po la// gdod nas dag pas
226a7(rnying rgyud): gnyen po med// ces gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ spyod pa rig pa'i khyad par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad
226b1(rnying rgyud): kye// rangags pa ye shes mthong khyod// gdong nas byang chub snying por bzhugs// bcos med rig pa'i dang la gnas// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// spos yad dag pa rang bzhin la// dkyil dang 'khong du dbyer med kyang // de yi tshul 'di bshang dugasol//
226b2(rnying rgyud): zhes zhus so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpas 'driskad ces gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud// gan 'dus rig pasems kyi lung // bcos med rig pa dron gyi gter// 'pho 'gyur med pa'i dbyings nyid
226b3(rnying rgyud): dang // rig pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor la// bskyed pa med pa'i rang bzhin gsal// gsal ba 'od 'bar dasgril 'khor ni// nam mkha'i mtha' bzhin khyab par gnas// 'od gsal rig pa'i bde ba la// tha dad rig pa mi gnas na// chos tshul mthong rtogs
226b4(rnying rgyud): ga sa su sa sa sus/ rlu sa // tshul pa turdzu
226b5(rnying rgyud): bltas rang gsal bcos pa med// su yi sku ste yul rol// rang gsal rig pa mchog gi sgo// nam mkha' khyab pa'i sgra mngal zhing // btsal med nyi ma'i 'od la bzhugs// kun la thub po bas ma dang bral// gzhi rgya med pa sems kyi lung // kun gsal rabal
226b6(rnying rgyud): bsam du med// rmang byung rol pa'i skye chu sha ro// rang gsal sgyu bral rig pa'i gsung // brjod myed rig pa'i 'khor lor spogs// gnyis med 'od gsal gcig tu go// bas ma spyod med pa'i dang du gnas// chos med rig pa'i ngo bo la// thos kyang dang gsal
226b7(rnying rgyud): mchog gi dang // 'di kun rang rig yo shes te// brjod med rig pa'i bstan pas bshad// rmad byung rol pa'i gsung du shar// rig pa mi gnas cir mi dgongs// rang la mi tog gzhan mi rtog/ gsalal mi mngon dbyings su sras// mkhyen rig ye shes dus/
227a1(rnying rgyud): 'ardzur// bgam ga ya ga// sas rgyags rdzogs// sa su / sa// gapa / sa smra sa la ga
227a2(rnying rgyud): ga na
227a3(rnying rgyud): da
227a4(rnying rgyud): mas / su
227b1(rnying rgyud): bsgrub med// byang chub snying po dang ma thu// reg pasgos palanyid kyi sa dkyil// cho 'phrul dag pa'i 'bar dang ldan// thags pa pa pa rnam pa pan// mags ra 'a dgasul bas+ho// / dang gas ladag pa'i sgral 'das// 'dod nga dang ga/
227b2(rnying rgyud): brjod pal rang bzhin gsal ba las// 'od gsal sgra yi rang bzhin gsal// skye 'gro sa yi rang bzhin ni// ma bAsregs gsung du rnam par gsal// brjod bral rig pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// rig pa'i dkyil 'khor rkyen du che// rang byung dag gsal mchog
227b3(rnying rgyud): gsung // brjod med rang byung byin rlabs kyis// gsung gI rang bzhin phyogs bcur brdal// rig pa gsung gi gzugs brtan yin// dran rtog mi g.yo mchog gi thugs// rang byung rig pa mchog tu gsal// spos med nyi ma'i 'od brdal bas//
227b4(rnying rgyud): shes snang bas phyogs bcur gsal// cir yang 'dzin pa mi mnga' bas// mtha' yi smos pa rnam par bcad// rnam rtog tha rags gang skyes kyang // ma skyes sems kyi khyad par las// ji ltar gsal yang ngos bzung med// de ltar rang snang nyid kho
227b5(rnying rgyud): na'o// 'du shes mi 'jug yul mi tshol// gang ltar gnas pa de ltar bde// rten mi bca' zhing ro mi myang // 'od gsal bde ba'i rol bzhugs// nam mkha' bdud rtsi mchog gi ro// gsal bar gnas pa'i 'od kyis 'thungs// gtad 'dzin
227b6(rnying rgyud): bral ba'i sems kyi su 'jug/ ye shes rlung gi don la rtog/ ce snga gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rang gsal dgod pa dang bral ba'i le skye bcu gsu ma pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rje snying rje
227b7(rnying rgyud): des 'di skad ces gsel to// kye mdus gsum rgyal ba yis// rig pa 'gyur med thugs kyi gter// rang byung rig pa'i rtsal rdzogs pas// ma bsrung rang gsal dbang la bzhugs// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// nam mkha'i ro yi chu 'thungs shing /
228a1(rnying rgyud): thal thabs sa thags mos pa'adabang // bdag cag rnamapa la ba shAng gas pa// zhes nusas// de ngas ngagazhir gshegs pa sa mas dang can pas bang chus pasgra blugs tshangs pa'i dbang 'jigs
228a2(rnying rgyud): kyi sems dpa' chen po/ nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud // rang gsal rig pa mchog ge rgyan// ye shes gsang ba mchog gi lung // rnga brgyad thugs kyi me long gi/ dbang mchog gob med de spyod thabs// bslar thub med par
228a3(rnying rgyud): par gsal// rang gsal ye shas smon pa 'di // rgal thabs snga thugs rdzogs pa'i bang // rang gsal dag pa rdzogs lung ni// rang bzhin thabs dus sdong dang // skyon yon rang gas la rig par rdzogs// rang blang drug pa'i rgyal po 'ang/
228a4(rnying rgyud): gyi 'gro gyi nang kun la khyab// thams cad nam mkha'i dang gnas bzhin// rgyal thabs rang byung mchog gi dang // rang gnas rig pa'i gter la rdzogs// ye shes gsal ba kun dbang bsgyur// phyogs med ye shes rtsol bral gter// til 'bru ba
228a5(rnying rgyud): khyab par bzhugs// rgyal thabs rig par mi ldan na// rtsol ba'i khyad par gang gang gis// ji ltar de ltar dbang bsrung yang // 'khor ba'i lugs las zang pa med// dang dang dam tshig zin pa dang // 'di rnams ldan pa'i slob ma ni// stong gsuman
228a6(rnying rgyud): yang 'byung ba bad// chags che dang thung dang pa med// zos med rang thang mchog bral// sa pa snyi rje med dang yod// mang dag spel zhing bsrung la// de 'dra dbang gi brnyas pa yid// mthod pa 'tsho lajug brdal zhing // sa minang ngas cha ba dag// bang gag
228a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis ka'i rgyud badrag napa// rdo rje khabatungs par lung // rgyal thabs spyi thugs dbang bsrung na// snying rje thos ldan 'angs sems bral// dus dang srog la mebalta zhing // 'jig rten grags pa rnams spangs nas// snying po byang chub mchog la brtson// pang yang ga
228b1(rnying rgyud): las mi brtan te// the zom bcad lades brtags pas// mi ru ba nges par gzung ba'i phyir// rtsal tshab nges pa gcig la gtud/ nges pa'i rnal sas gsang bal// thang chub sems kyis dbang bskur na// btsal du 'bras bu rang gsapa nas/ !
228b2(rnying rgyud): de ma thag tu rig pa 'char// rdo rje'i rgyud la mkhas pa dang // rgyal thabs dbang gi rig pa 'chang // rang gas la rig pa'i don la goms// thabs mkhas snying rje ldan pa yis// snod ldan rang gsal rig pa la// skye med rig pa'i doni bstan nas// 6
228b3(rnying rgyud): thabs spyi thugs dbang bskur nas// nges par gsang ba'i nan tan bya// 'jig rten grags pa gtsor bzhag nas// lung dang man ngag mi ldan dar// nga rgyal chags pa'i bla ma ni// rdo rje 'bar ba'i khab tu ltung // rna brgyad man ngag mi ldan par// gsang ba'i
228b4(rnying rgyud): man ngag log bstan pas// myur du tshe yi dus byas nas// rdo rje dmyal bar spos ci dgos// legs par brtags pa'i bu nyid kyis// gsol gdabs nyes byas btags pa la// gnad sbyin nyes dmigs bstan byas la// ye shes gsang ba'i don la bcug
228b5(rnying rgyud): sems nyid drin chen gnyis med laM// bsrung ba'i cha gnyis mi tog kyang // rgal thabs kyi thugs dbang bslang nas// rig pa nga gas la da na dang rdzid// gsal byed rin men 'bar ba bstan// sgra yo mtshan nyid bshad pa yis// ya zhes de 'dzin man ngag sbyir//
228b6(rnying rgyud): rang gsal rig pa'i me long la// yengs pa med pa'i man ngag sbyin// ma lus 'gag med ngos bstan nas// rig pa bla mas gdams dag dpog/ yul sems rang gsal don bshad na// mi 'bral gzungs kyi man ngag sbyin// rang byung rig pa g.yo med pas/
228b7(rnying rgyud): steng chu lta bu'i man dag sbyin// ci s+yAd gang yin don rtogs la// 'dam skyes lta bu'i man ngag sbyin// rang gsal rig pa'i ye gas pa// mtshan ma'i rtog pas ni 'gyur bas// gnas skabs chu ltar gnas pa sbyin// dran rtog rjes 'brang rig pa la// yul shes thal
229a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i man ngag sbyin// 'gro don lhun grub col med la// brda don spad pa sbyin par bya// rtsol med rig par gnas pa la// brda don phrad pa'i don la sbyar// rang byung sdugasum ldan grub la// zug phrad bla ma'i zhal las brtams/
229a2(rnying rgyud): bsrur thob med par rang gsal lung // ma 'gros chu la chu bzhag ltar// rdo rje bla ma'i dgongs pa'i lung // brjod med rnal du bzhag pas go// bum par bum pa'i bcud bstims bzhin// dgongs don slob ma'i blo la bzhad// dam med slob ma mi bsten dang /
229a3(rnying rgyud): gsang par nyes dmigs bstan par bya// snod med gsang ba'i dam sri la// nyes dmigs med pa'i bla ma yis// rgyal thabs kyi thugs dbang bskur zhing // byang chub sems kyi don bstan na// snod ngan btsal 'chang zho thugs na// gnyis ka ma rungs byed pa
229a4(rnying rgyud): de ma thag tu 'jig pa dang // 'jig rtend byas ka chen por 'gyur// de phyir snod ngan slob ma ni// rmi lam du'ang mi bsam na// man ngag 'dzin pa'i slob ma yi// dam par brten pa smos ci dgos// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rdo rje sems dpa'
229a5(rnying rgyud): chen po yis// ma brjod dgongs pago ba'i lung // rgyal thabs spyi thugs rig pa'i dbang // rtsol med byang chub sems kyis bskur// dus mtha'i cha la mngon par gshegs// lung ldan rdo rje bla ma yis// snod ldan gus pa'i slob ma la// rgyal thabs spyi thugs
229a6(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur nas// dus mtha'i shes pa skad cig la// rang gsal chos su dang gnas bstan// 'bab chu gnas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// btsal med 'od gsal bde ba che// rang bzhag gnas pa 'grub par 'gyur// de ltar dbang thob gang zag ni//
229a7(rnying rgyud): rtsol ba'i tshulas rab thang // rangags la rig pa'i 'od du 'bar// rig pa dang rgyal ba thob// rdo rje sems dang nal mnyam// las dang las kyi bag chags kyis// gas par ming byar pa d+ma sbyar// nam mkhang dag pa'i thong bzhi /
229b1(rnying rgyud): med la shes can po ngas// rangags pa dag pa'i byung zhugs nas// 'od par ti bzhin bdag la 'char// zhes gsangs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud min pa las/ rgyal thabs spyi thugs pa shes nga bstan pa'i yang sbyang dubazhas pa/
229b2(rnying rgyud): de nas sems dpa' do rje dam pa des 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs// ye nas rang gsal 'da' med la// bsung med ye shes rig pa yis// mnyam du 'jog cing ye shes gsal// mgon mo khyod pa gsol ba ni// bsku
229b3(rnying rgyud): bu med pa'i dam tsheg la// gang ltar bsungs kyang ming gal don// mgon pos bdag la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa' chen po des 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye sems dpa'
229b4(rnying rgyud): po/ bsung bral rig pa'i dmatshig la// bsrungs shing btsal bas log pa'i lam// bsung med rtogs pa da mtshig gzhi// ye shes gas ba mchog pa rtogs// gnyis med rig bcol thul lung // bcos med rig pa mchog gi mkhang // 'du 'bral
229b5(rnying rgyud): mnga' rig pa'i gter// rang gsal 'od las 'da' ba med// gcig ste 'od gsal khyab pa che// yongs la gdal bas phyogs ris med// gang yang ma yin khyab pa'i dbyings// ye nas rig pa mchog la sbyor// gnyis bral rig pa'i dam tshig la// 'dod
229b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i bsam pas bsrung du med// phyogs bral mnyam pa'i dam tshig la// phyogs kyi bsam pacur mi 'dug/ bsam thal gnyis med rig pa la// bsam zhing dpyod pa'i yul mi gnas// rang dga' lhan rdzogs dam tshig la// btsal zhing bsrub pa'i ming mi
229b7(rnying rgyud): gnas// ci pang mo yin 'od gsal yin// rangags pa rdo rje thabs kyi lung // brjod thal rig pa'i ngo bor srin// rig pa rang gsal ye shes la// bsung dang mi bsrung phyogs ris med// mnyam nyid rege pa'i gter lardzogs// ji tsas med rig pa
230a1(rnying rgyud): dbyings la gsal// phyogs bral mnyam pa'i sems kyis 'jug/ ye shes gsang ba'i dam tshig ni// mi bskyod rdo rje semasma dpa'i lung // brjod bral sgra yi dam tshig la// ma yengs rig pa mchog gi ngos// yi ge med par ga
230a2(rnying rgyud): rlu kha'
230a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i chud// mnyan bsam med par rang bzhin gsal// dgongs pa ma bcos rnal du pheb// ji bzhin rig pa bas ma thal lung // gsang ba rkyen bral cing migs la// rang gas la rig pa mchog la gnas// nam mkha' rang byung khyab pa'i ngang // mtshan mar ma
230a4(rnying rgyud): yin mtshan med min// rdo rje gsang ba'i thabs lung ni// gnyis med rang gsal mnyam rdzogs so// ma bcos gsang ba'i dam tshig la// bcos pas mkha' la mdud 'dra'i tshul// gnyis med rig pa'i mchog nyid la// yul dang yul can bsung bas
230a5(rnying rgyud): log/ grangs 'das tshad med rang gsal la// grangs tshad mkha' yi mtha' 'tshol 'dra// bsung med ye nas thug zin la// nga gdod bsrung bas thug pa med// bsrung dang mi bsung tshig gi mtha'// ye shes rig pa'i tshig mtha' bral// phyogs bral
230a6(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal tshig las 'das// phyogs kyi bsung ba log pa'i lam// rtsol bral lhun rdzogs dam tshig la// btsal bas mi rnyed ngal don med// bya bra la rdzogs lung dam pa la// 'jug lta'i tshig gis gang rtsol ba// mtshan ma rtog pa'i rgyun gyis
230a7(rnying rgyud): khring // mtshan ma'i rtsol ba log pa'i chos// ye shes rang gsal nyi ma la// mtha' yi zhen pa'i mun pas bsgribs// ma rig mun pas thibs kyis 'gags// snang gsal rig pa'i 'od dang bral// rang gsal ye shes me long la// rang byung rig
230a8(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtsal 'gags nas// ci yang mi mthong chad blta ba// mnar med rdo rje'i khab tu ltung // brtags bral gnyis med ye shes pa// phyogs ris med par kun gsal bas// ci yang yin no gang yang rung // kun brtags yod med mtha' dang bral//
230b1(rnying rgyud): da dang med pa gan btags// mtha bal gnyis smras// dgas lang na sa pa// bdug gas ga sus// mas sa non// na nga dang pa// mang tham pa
230b2(rnying rgyud): nyid la gnas// med dang rgyal pa gcig pu dang // skun rdzogs dang rig chen po la// ngo tsa ma bcas chos gcig la// bsam pa'i 'du shes tshul nas bye// phyogs med nges med 'odags la mkha'// rtog med pa gas la ye sangs rdzas// ci yang med pa ma tsir yang
230b3(rnying rgyud): gsal// rig par dgas la dbyi nu ba zugs// ye shes rig pa mchog gis// tsaM yang med do khyab par gal// rkyen bral thebs mchir mi dgongs// gnyis med pa de chen rdzogs brgyad ba pa// rtog med dang gsal bad ba'i lhung // bdag med rig pa'i
230b4(rnying rgyud): chos nyid las// 'di zhes rig pa'i sems mi 'jug// gnyen po med pas 'jig dang bral// rig pa'i 'od gsal rdzogs la bzhugs// rang las gzhan pa'i chos med pas// med pa'i dmatshig 'dar ba med// phyogs bral rig pa'i ye shes la// 'di
230b5(rnying rgyud): dang 'di zhes bsrung du med// phyogs bral chen po'i skyes bu des// phyogs gcig thal bas phyogs kun thal// rang rig nam mkha'i mtha' ltar gsal// phyogs thal ye shes chen po'i klung // rang rigi 'od gsal nam mkha' che// phyogs bltas pas dri
230b6(rnying rgyud): mthong // chos nyid phyogs med dang gsal la// rdzogs med rig pa'i ye shes 'dug/ rtsol bral ye shes mnyam pa la// rtsol med de bzhin nyid kyi gnas// nam mkha'i mtha' bzhin kun khyab kyang // rig pa rang gsal gcig gi dang // bsam bral ye shes
230b7(rnying rgyud): nyid la rdzogs// thal ba chen po zla med pa'o// cir snang ci srid ma lus kyang // ye shes rig pa gcig lags la// gcig ngo tog dpyod yul las 'das// gcig dang du mar yongs kyis med// rig pa'i la shes nyag gcig la// mtha' dbus ma/
231a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos sngags pa// ye shes gcigag dang la bzhugs// ye shas rgya mtsho ma mtha' med// bdag gas la gzhan gas la thams cad gas la// kun gas pa rag pal khar mtha' mad// kun bzang mchagag khong pa//
231a2(rnying rgyud): gcig dang gnyis zhes bgrang du med// ye nas rig pa de bzhin gnas// tshig tshigs rgya maN+Da lta bu'i klung // gang ltar gyi yang gcig las med// thig le gcig las dam tshig grangs// de ga tad dngus sor grags// 'dul ba'i thabs ldan dang rag lung // rig
231a3(rnying rgyud): pa mchog gi 'khor lo bskor// rang gsal brjod med don la nyan// yengs pa med pa'i don gyis go// de nyid dgu ldan sems nyid gzhi// rin chen 'bar ba 'od kyi lung // rtsol med bde bas nyams su blang // rang gsal gcig pu'i dam tshig thob// rang byung ldan
231a4(rnying rgyud): zlab ma tshig la// bsam las 'bras bu'i gter rdzogs pas// rtsol med ldan grub yis ngas rgyas// rin chen 'bar ba'i sagazhi ltar// 'khor ba ye shes snying por dgas la// brgya byin srigatsug nor bya ltar// bsam med gdod nas lhun gyis rdzogs// nyi mar
231a5(rnying rgyud): snying po'i 'od bzhin du// rim pa med par dus gcig gsal// lhun rdzogs bstan pa'i me long la// mtshan ma'i rig pa cir snang yang // phyogs ris med pa'i ye shes kyis// ldan grub rang gsal ye shes nyid// cir snang ye shes lhun grub la// spang bar bya
231a6(rnying rgyud): bag la yod// lhun grub rang gsal ye shes la// kun mkhyedan rig pa mi 'char na// sems can sangs rgyas khyad par gyi// khyad med thos bsam bsgom ci phan// gang yang mi mthong gang zer ba// ye shes ma yin mi shes yin// ye shes mun pa'i khams//
231a7(rnying rgyud): kyis bsgribs// sangs rgyas sems can khams su srung // ye shes gsal ba'i snang ba la// glo bur mun pas bsgribs pa ni// sangs rgyas 'khor bar lhung gyur nas// grol zar med pa'i skyon du 'gyur// ye shes gsal ba'i snang ba la// ye nas mun par
231b1(rnying rgyud): du tu tu
231b2(rnying rgyud): sa sums pa du na
231b3(rnying rgyud): ngas ma pa thab na da kyi su / dadags pa nga pa drugs dugs g+sa/ rnag ni rlung lagasu padun/ nug
231b4(rnying rgyud): de smram na pa kyi/ brna du ga sa sa sags gas pa / bas
231b5(rnying rgyud): sa/ sgru / gsapa/ smra ga
231b6(rnying rgyud): sa sa#
232a1(rnying rgyud): na na na zla rgyu rgyu ga tu gas tu na sa
232a2(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma na mam// gas pa mas seMn su ma// 'dim sa ba na bas// rnams ci mthun pa
232a3(rnying rgyud): lamyal mngasab ma gas pa gA/ / sa/ sbyi mam / sa ra mi sa/ mam 'dzin
232a4(rnying rgyud): dang thag/ dag pas pa'athal ngas/ na 'i ma s+ho/ ma 'i na padum pa na/ // mig ma nga du / gas pa ga pa na ldan
232a5(rnying rgyud): gsal kun lade bzhin gnas// brjod med rig nga'i dron yin yad// tshon pa'i sgra yi lad ma mos// yaM nas mnyam pa'i de na la spyod// tsal bral med pa'i thung chub sems// thams chogan ta ma'i 'od bzhin gnas// rig pa'i'ajig min
232a6(rnying rgyud): g+sa ka/ rang byung rig pa'i thabs kyis gas so// migs ma rdzogs pa rna khri mam// 'byung 'a gru bsla pa'i sems kyis jig// rig parang gsul chos kyin gyis// yangs dgra med pas kun gyi gnas// btsal mya gnas pa'i rna
232a7(rnying rgyud): 'byor bas// yangs med kyi na dang bzhag pas 'brug// de bzhin gas la pa'i rnal 'byor pas// chos kyis mtho ba'i gzhal yas su// rig pa 'phrul gyi spros nas// 'dogs la mchog gi dkyil 'khor na// rin chen glang po tha me ba gas/
232b1(rnying rgyud): de sbyar thabs sa rlom pa'o// gang nga gang gi rim pa yis// tung kral gang 'dug pas// bsgrub ma ngon pa zlogs par gastsa// dbang sa ldan dbang bal// gcaganadun nan mang pa stod// mnyes pa'adas pa gang byas pas// las na cadang /
232b2(rnying rgyud): pa 'gyur// de nyid dang la dang thub pas// de ltar 'ad pang bzhin du// btsal brgyab med par yon tan ni// bai rlu dgas pa de nga rdzog// thabs kyi rkye pag gang gis// dngos pa gas pa mtshan byas na// phyogs ldan pa shu pa
232b3(rnying rgyud): yis// yon tan cha de bzhin zlob// btsal mdang bzhin bzlags pa yis// ga pa dang ba yo ba pa'i ga/ sa btsal nyi ma'i 'od zer ltang // bde mchog rigang mchog la bzugs// phyogs med rig par nga byung la// bajug pa'i mtshan nyid menam snying bas/
232b4(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i mthar mnyam 'bras nyid// reg pa rangags pa nyid kyis thob// phyogs med rig pas bya ba ga la yang // ye shes gsal byed rgyu medan// bskal pagrangs med patha~Md btsal yang // rin chen gsal pa'i 'od mi mthong // gtor khyim phung po
232b5(rnying rgyud): gsal byed ltar// rang gas la ga nang nas 'chang // stobs chen nor zugs la byed sbyar // dang gi de nyid mthong bar zad// rgyu mtsho tsAbs su dz+wa ladz+ra// rengags la 'bras bu nyid du 'char// phyogs ngas med pa'i thugs rje ni// mthar thug med pa
232b6(rnying rgyud): 'grib la// gzung med nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du// 'gro ba kun gyi dpal dzu shad// 'grod ni med pa'i rgyal ba ni// mthung 'byung bar mi srid do// skyon ldan ye shes skye 'gag can// rgyu dang byin ldan phyogs ras can// 'di la rang gsal 'bras bu med// rang
232b7(rnying rgyud): gyid// byam thabs sa tsun pa med // ti 'an su mdzu // sa mabyams pas na delagasong du 'du da bya/ thags ga pa ba maban// rin chen bar bags
233a1(rnying rgyud): rin po cha man dgag rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol te// kye ho gsung ba'i bdag po lags// chos nyid mtshon pas rtogs 'dang
233a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i// slob dpon slob ma'i mtshan nyid ni// gsang ba'i bdag pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ slob dpon slob ma'i snod bcud de// legs
233a3(rnying rgyud): par bshad kyis yid la zung // dka' ba mang spyad skyong la chung // rgyad la mkhas shing man ngag che// thugs rje che la 'dod pa chud// brgyad pa ldan la mtshon pa mkhas// dbang rnams thob pa ti dang dzin gsal// de rnams ldan
233a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i bla ma la// bcud dang ldan par ngas bshad do// bla ma la gras gtod phod che// dad pa ldan la brtson 'grus che// bla ma mi gsang shes rab ldan// sems bzang go cha mthug pa dang // rgyud 'jam zhe sdang chung ba dang // 'jig rten 'brel pa'i
233a5(rnying rgyud): skyob chen min// bla ma 'khor ba'i gnyen gcig po// skye shi la sogs sdug bsngal gyis// mthong nas de las sgrol 'dod pa// de rnams ldan pa'i slob ma ni// snod dang ldan par shes par gyis// ye shes gsang ba sgron ma rin po che man ngag gi rgyud las/
233a6(rnying rgyud): slob dpon slob ma'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho gsang ba'i bdag po legs// snod ldan smin par bya ba'i phyir// dbang gi rim pa bshad du gsol/
233a7(rnying rgyud): zhes gsal te// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ kye sems dpa'i chen po nyon cig// gseng sngags myed la mos 'dod ni// smin pa dbu srid dbang bskung bas// lci dbang rus la bsrung ba 'o// thag bcas lha yi dbang bsrung ni// thun mong
233b1(rnying rgyud): dngos thub phra mo dbyang // 'jig rten thos la dbang bsgyur pas// rang lus lhu ru phyag rgya shes// sgyu mad rag pa'i dbang bskur na// rang lus ma skyes dngos gzhi med// sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal bas// rdul tshan rdzas
233b2(rnying rgyud): pa rag ma las// dbang thob byin brlabs rtags rnams 'byung // dang sems mthong pas ting 'dzin gsal// byin brlab dgug gzhug bya mi dgoso// thabs dang shes ra bzung du 'brel// bde chen tshes srur shes pas na// mtshan ma
233b3(rnying rgyud): bro yang dang srar grol// gzung 'dzin thag pa de ru chad// rig pa stong gsal dbyer med la// gab pa mngon du phyung bas ni// rang byed ye shes ngo bo nyid// rig pa 'dzin med gtan la pheb// rig ma la sogs pa tsal mi dgos// bdag dang
233b4(rnying rgyud): bdag gir 'dzin pa zad// 'dzin med sems la bcos bslad med// ye shes gsang ba sgron ma rin po che man ngag gi rgyud las/ rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang sems dpa' chen po rdo rjes 'di skad ces
233b5(rnying rgyud): gsol to// kye ho gsad pa'i bdag po lags// rang byung rig pa'i dbang bskur nas// bsgom pa'i rim pa bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ nges
233b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i don la mos pa yi// rnal 'byor pa yi don ched du// sems kyi gzhag zabs 'di ltar lags// dpe don rtags dang ting 'dzin nyams// gzhag thabs btsa' thabs bcos pa'i thabs// rnam pa brgyad du rig par bya// yon tan rnam pa gsum
233b7(rnying rgyud): du bstan// dpe yis mtshon pa 'di ltar lags// bram ze gtsang mas khrus gsol te// rgyal srid kun la dbang bsgyur bzhin// ma las sems can thams cad la// byang chub gnyis med rang bzhin gnas// de don rtogs par bya ba ni// dmigs pa
234a1(rnying rgyud): bltabs byin ci log/ rtsol bral rig pa'i phrin las la// btsal bas ma 'grub don dang 'gal// 'dug bral mnyam nyid 'od gsal pa// rdzas 'dug rtog pa byin ci loka/ thogs med byasal ba'i mang me
234a2(rnying rgyud): la// bar chod bsgribs pas gsal mi 'gyur// grangs med byas ma las phrin las la// grangs dang 'dre shes log pa'i las// tsaM yang yid la ma byas pas// yid la byed pa'i 'du shes la khrul// san+d+ha spyod rig pa'i phrin las
234a3(rnying rgyud): la// rdza mnyam ye nas rig pa la// gsal byed 'od kyis ma mtshon par// rang gsal phrin las don ma rtogs// rang gsal 'od la kun gnas pas// de nyid ma yengs rang gsal lung // de ltar de nyid de bzhin gnas// bya ba med
234a4(rnying rgyud): par gyud kyis grub// ma byas ma btsal rang bzhag lung // dmigs pa yul gyi rjes mi 'jug/ rang gsal mnyam pa'i thabs kyis bste// rdo rje rang gsal thabs kyi lung // byas pa med par dus gcig rdzogs// rang gsal rig pa
234a5(rnying rgyud): phyogs med la// chu ldang bzhag pa'i man ngag gis// sbas pa'i thugs kyi klong btol nas// brda don sprad pa'i man ngag sbyin// bum chu lta bu'i man ngag gis// mig po rnal 'byor mchog gi lam// bslang med rig pa rang bzhin gsal//
234a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin bral rang bzhin dmigs su med// rang gsal rin chen phung po de// dgu rum sbas pa'i don yin yang // gsal byed sgron ma de yis mthong // cog bzhag rig pa dang gsal la// bcos med pag yangs blo yis 'jug/ 'thung 'jug
234a7(rnying rgyud): med pa'i sems nyid kyis// rig pa'i pho zar chos kyi dbyings// sbas pa thugs kyi nges bstan nas// rdo rje zla pa'i dgongs lung bstan// 'dor skyor blo 'i 'dug tshul ni// bla za'i zhal las zhes par bya// rdo rjeb ma mnyes byas la/
234b1(rnying rgyud): gra cwams thangs can pa rnyan// byur bums rnam pan ga// sadang ga jug cagasas// 'ad pa nga mjug nanas/ gargyas da gA na bya// pa don dums// ngag padang na
234b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzi mtshan ma'i nang du skye// nges par dris tshod gang yin pa// rdo rje bla ma'i lung las shes// gtad bral rig pa phyogs gcig pa// nam mkha' sgom pa'i rnal 'byor te// nges par bsgom lung tshul bstan pa// slob dpon
234b3(rnying rgyud): brda' las shes// glang chen bskyod thabs rig pa'i gter// de'i spyod lam bslab pa des// ji bzhin rig pa nyams su myong // des tshad bla ma'i zhal las shes// drod ldan rdo rje bla ma yis// rgyal thabs dbang bskur brjod med par// rgyas bti blo
234b4(rnying rgyud): g.yo med lung // byin rlabs dag pa'i man dgra yir// 'di ni dngadags bya'akhor lo la// 'dug pa'i thubs kyi zin pas te// rna brgya man ngag mi ldan na// rang brtags bre yis ci brtags kyang // lung 'di tshigs par mi 'gyur ro// dus lung ga dmas
234b5(rnying rgyud): ngag med pa yi// rna brgyad med pa'i slob dpon gyis// rang la nges pa'i don med pas// gzhan bsgral gnyis ka ltung ba'i rgya// rdo rje bla ma mi bsur zhing // man ngag gus pas mi len na// gsang bdag rdo rje 'ang drag 'gyur na// dam med slob ma thob
234b6(rnying rgyud): dgos// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ bya bral phrin las bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// dus gsum rgyal ba
234b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi// bgrod bral lam gyi rang bzhin la// bgrod pas phyin par ga la 'gyur// ye nas rig pa mchog gis// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// 'dug dang bgrod pa'i yul bral ba'i// sa dang lam gyi rang bzhin dag/ bdag la nges par bshang du
235a1(rnying rgyud): gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen pa/ nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud// bgrod bral lam gyi rang bzhin la/
235a2(rnying rgyud): bgrod pas phyin par mi 'gyur te// rang gsal rig pa mngon 'char pas// phyin pa med par dus gcig mnan// phyin pa lam gyi yul bral la// bgrod pas phyin med lam mtha' ring // rang byung rig pa gcig la son// rang gas pa 'od la 'dza
235a3(rnying rgyud): zhing 'du// rang byung snying po yi sangs rgyas// 'khor ba lam gyi rgyu dang bral// mya ngan mi 'da' 'khor ba'i rgyan// gaN+DI ga rang gsal 'od la thim// dbyer med rig pa mchog gi sku// bgrod med rig pa dang gsal lung // bgrod cing phyin pas
235a4(rnying rgyud): mtha' la zug/ rang gsal ma yin chos med pas// ye shes 'di gsal dbus mtha' med// 'dzin pa kun bral cir mi dmigs// 'od 'byung bde chen khyab gsal lhung // gnyis med mtha' bral chol gyi dbyings// mya ngan 'das min 'khor
235a5(rnying rgyud): ba'ang min// dbu ma'am gnyi ga'ang ma yin te// ma bcos lci ba'i snying po la// btsal zhing bgrod pa bcos ma'i lam// mthar thug med pa'i sangs rgyas sras// phyogs bcu mtha' yas kun bgrod pas// rig pa rang gsal dbyings las med//
235a6(rnying rgyud): de nyid nyams myong kun dang bral// 'od gsal ye shes bde ba'i klong // rdo rje sems dpa' dges chen mchog/ yengs med mtshan ma'i rgyud dang bral// 'di ni rang byang rmad grags lung // 'od gsal rig pa'i brda' mjal na// shi lo na le dra yi
235a7(rnying rgyud): tshul// lugs pas dga' ba'i ro myong bas// tshig mtshon pa yi thabs dang bral// bde chen ro las khyab pa kun// mi mnyam tshad 'di mtha' dang bral// byin med lam la bgrod du med// sa btul lngarnam rtog yin// mtha' yis chos
235a8(rnying rgyud): yegrang
235b1(rnying rgyud): dbyangs dang gsal la// gang ltar phyin pa de nyid dang // rang gsal nam mkha'i gzhal yas la// byin pas zad pa ga la yod// rang gsal 'od la rtag tu gnas// de bzhin nyid de rig par gsal// gang ltar snang ba de bzhin nyid// ji ltar bsdus
235b2(rnying rgyud): pas chos kyi dbyings// ji ltar dang gsal rang la phyin// bgrod du med pa'i sangs rgyas sa// btsal med rang gsal lam gyi phugs// ye shes rig pa'i 'khor lo can// rang la 'khor zhing nyid du 'dus// sgra bral brjod pa'i yu ba can// de kho na nyid sems kyi
235b3(rnying rgyud): lung // khyab gdal rig pa phyogs ris med// mngon du mi snang khyab par gdal// gsal ba ye shes snying po can// rig pa rang gsal dbyings la rdzogs// rang bzhag ye shes dbyings nyid la// gsal 'bad rig pas gsong zhing 'bigs//
235b4(rnying rgyud): rig pa dang gsal ye shes nyid// med na mi 'byung de phyir lam// rang byung rig pa'i 'khor tshogs la// skra bral rig pa'i bstan pa sgrogs// rig pa nam mkha' rgyas pa'i mtha'// spro ba sdu med pa'i dbyings la gtugs// rang byung rig
235b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i yu ba la// gnyis med rig pa mchog gis 'dzin// rang gsal mtha' bral rgyas btab nas// 'da' ba med pa'i tshul du gnas// zhen pa'i rnam rtog khri phrag kyang // 'od gsal dbyings la spo zhing 'du// rnam rtog ye shes dbyings
235b6(rnying rgyud): kyi lung // gcig tu gsal ba cir yang 'byung // de nyid rang shar cir mi blta// rang la rang blta cir mi mthong // rdzas kyi khyad par ci bgrod kyang // gser la gnyis pa ye nas med// sa dang lam la ci bgrod kyang // rang gsal rig
235b7(rnying rgyud): pa bgrod dang bral// rig pa'i 'og min chos kyi dbyings// rig pa rang gsal 'bar ba'i gnas// rgyal pa kun gyi gsang ba'i gnas// gzhan med ye nas rang gsal lung // 'khor ba rmad kyang ye sangs rgyas// sgo nga'i byung zug nyid dang
236a1(rnying rgyud): marungs// na dam dul bzhanan// dang bzlas pas ral tun/ snang ba gsapa bags pa// bzang pa skyor ba bad dang // gas ma 'a 'dzar na// mdan
236a2(rnying rgyud): bong dra// de ltar matogs 'grob la// 'khrul gzhi ye shes snying pos kyis// de nyid rang gsal thabs ldan pas// de nyid shes pas sangs tshul la// glo zur tsam du rtsol bas gsungs// gzhi ldan glo bur gteg pang // 'khru pa'i
236a3(rnying rgyud): yin log pa'i chos// 'khrul dang log pa'i ba skad kyang // dngos dang sems la mi gnas te// ma bcos cing chub snying po lnga// de dag kun gyi bzung bcang // mthang zed dbus la mtha' mi dmigs// dbus mad mtha' yang de bzhin te// de dag
236a4(rnying rgyud): gang la'ang mi dmigs pas// rang gsal rig pa nyid du mkhyen// dge dang sdig pa'i tshul phye nas// gcig dang gnyis kyi spang len pa// 'dod khams gong 'og gnas skyes pa// thar pa mi tho ba 'ching ba'i rgyu// phreng zhing dang blangs spyad pa yis//
236a5(rnying rgyud): gzhi thong rim par bgod pa des// 'gro don med pa'i gzhong gnas te// shi ring mtshungs pa'i 'bras bu yin// bdag med kyad dang gnyis rtogs te// rten 'brel 'byung babrog tshul bsgoms pas// gzhan don 'ga' tsam thong mor kyad/
236a6(rnying rgyud): byis pa'i 'bras na med dang 'dra// bden gnyis sgyu ma'i tshul bzung na// bskal pa grangs med gsum gyi nas// lam lngas ngarje mthar phyin pa// srid pa log pa'i skar len can// gcig la mtho dman tshul bzung nas// dag pa gsum
236a7(rnying rgyud): bsdus nas// bcug cigartags pas rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod pa'i sdig tu bskyes dang dra // gnyis thugs nges med tshul bzung nas// rigs pa'i tsha phrul nanas sa// rdo rje 'ching 'dod pa men ces// nges pa'i 'bras drikyi mthong// nye dzin rig
236b1(rnying rgyud): nga gra brdung sa// rtag yan 'ag ba bal nas// sug pa zag pa'as bzod pa// dang gzhan pas d+ha zlas// rna thabs dang shas rab ces// ti dzin gsum kyil lab sgyur// byed dgas pazhi yos pa ma /
236b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis badz+rab de du jug gis// mthong ba zag med nyid la thor// de nas bcwa phrag pa drug gis// yig 'khor ma tshogs chenas// rang 'dod zong kyang 'od gsal med// dbyings dang la shes rgya 'bras kyis// yi ge dag pa'i tshul bltas nas// 'od kyi
236b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin dag pa'i 'jas// gangs med rta ba nga dgas pa// gnyis ga paras// nga rje sems dpa mchog gis// dang la thob gang mthar thug zul// rtsed bra la rin pa'i'adan da gal// 'dibyam yin pas d+hag bcings// rang byang nga
236b4(rnying rgyud): gsal dbyings dang bral// dang gsal yi shes te ma nub// rang gsal ye shes 'od gsal la// 'dug pa'i thabs kyis mngon myur nas// thos pas ma bskum pa rab sbyangs nas// rang gsal ye shes 'od du 'bar// rig pa rang gsal dbyings la
236b5(rnying rgyud): glanas// 'ad 'bar thig le gcig tu gnas// gang la chags dang thug grang dang // rang la gang gcas phun sum tshogs// ser sna spangs pa'i drad pa yis// rdo rje rgyal po mnyes par bya// rang gsal rig pa'i byin rlabs dang // dang dang ngag pa'i nus pa
236b6(rnying rgyud): sa// mkha' dang rdul zla ba ni// ngag dang dag pa'i tshul gyis snang // grang gcig med pa'i tshul gyis ni// gsal ba'i stobs demi snang ngo // rang gsal rlig pa gdeng ldan cad // ma rabs kyis pa bkri ba'i phyir// lca gu
236b7(rnying rgyud): spyod pa drabs chen po// rang gas la rig pa'i gdeng gis bya// mkhas shing rig pa'i gdang du byung // rgyal ba'i dgongs pa'i lung dang ldan// na bcud rgal gyi mu yis brjod// rig pa gsang ba gtar pyad// dbang thob par
237a1(rnying rgyud): don mngal bu'as// rnab don pa'ang dgag // la na pa// rngan pa du ga pa na// 'dog tan grags pa ma nas// sa dang nga tsun 'bu na
237a2(rnying rgyud): mgalas pa sa gyu bachags pa// rigs gsang pa'i gta nu / rnam da/ gyi gas dag// 'a na ma ma pa sa mi des/ 'a gas pa ga
237a3(rnying rgyud): la banag/ mos dang zas pa chung ba dang // rang gas la rtags pa'i mthu me rje// de nas goms pa'i mthu rnyed nas// rang gas la legs pa 'dzin pa byag// sems myong kyil lam grags brtags pa// mkha' 'a/ dpa
237a4(rnying rgyud): btsug nan tan bya// gal te sngon ldan slob ma la// gsang ba'i nyes dmigs mi shes pas// na brgya mni dge bstan byas na// sdug brdal drug thos srogs dang // mgyogs 'grod la snang ba stod // bar mtshams med pa'i
237a5(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis ni// rdo rje'i gnas su snyeng gyur nas// byang chub sems kyi rigs dang bral// goms sa rig pacing mi 'jug/ na pa rji / da pags tha' sa/ ma me gi 'tshul bye nyid na// ma na ju /
237a6(rnying rgyud): yongs med 'dzin thal chas dbyi sa la// gnyis med drug phrang tshul gyis gsal// mar mi mun pa'i tshul bzhin du// gnyis med reg pa'i tshul dug cig/ 'du shes gang du'ang mi 'jug par// dang tsha gar yang ba 'grus pa'i/
237a7(rnying rgyud): dran me da gar bdag nga gas la pa'o// btsam ma rang bzhig byin dang gnas// dragangs rgyag gcung ba// nges pa rang gas nyams grangs pa so// de ba zhin rig pa'i phung du drug/ rgyal chab ngas pa'i slob ma la// lung ldan
237b1(rnying rgyud): pas ngan bstan na// la bar ba byang chub la mdugs la// gtsang rang ye shes gnas su bar// bgrod ma bya ma'i sa la 'jug/ sa gcig mnan pasas kun mnang // rdo rje sems dpa' mchogags// thams cad pa khyad par ma na
237b2(rnying rgyud): ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs par gsal// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ bgrod cing srung du med pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pas 'di
237b3(rnying rgyud): ces gsol to// rang gsal rig pa mchog gi dang // thams cad ye shes chen por mkhyen// dus gsum chos rnams thams cad kun// dus mtha' gcig la gsal bar rtogs// mgon po khyod kyi ye shes ni// bdag la
237b4(rnying rgyud): gsal bar bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po/ nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud// ye shes ngo bo rnam grangs ni// mtshan
237b5(rnying rgyud): ting snang tshul rim pa ni// ye shes gsal ba'i sgo 'byed pa'o// rang snang grangs ming ye shes ni// sems dang chos dbyings nam mkha'i mtha'// phyogs ris bgrang bar mi nus pas// rnam grangs de yi tshul sbyang nas// ji lta
237b6(rnying rgyud): 'tshams pa'i tshul du snang // rang gsal ye shes dbus mtha' med// stong nyid rig pa cir mi gzigs// 'od gsal rig pa thams cad mkhyen// dus gcig kun mkhye ni ga pa'i lung // sleb dang sgo sbyar rnam par bcad//
237b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin// ma bcos rig pa'i me long la// thams cad rang gsal gzugs brtan 'char// ci yang 'gag med rnam mi rtog/ gnyis med rig pa gcig lags la// phyogs ngos mi mnga' 'od gsal ba
238a1(rnying rgyud): rul shes med dgacig la 'dus// rdo dzi nas mkha' 'od gas pangs// rnams sa dag rtogags pa par mkhyen// rang rig pa shes mnyam pa 'phrul// cha chung mtha' dbus med pa la// rangags pa snyoms pas
238a2(rnying rgyud): nyi ma'i 'od// thams cad dang gsal 'od du 'bar// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam sbyor bas// dbye ba sres yang sa dog mi mnga' bas// mnyam nyid rig pa'i ngang du gsal// ma bcos dang la gnyis med kyang // shes rab 'od gsal chen po
238a3(rnying rgyud): yis// mkha' la gza skar ba kram pa'am// me tog mdzes pa'i phung po ltar// so sor ringags pa gcig tu 'dras// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gsal ba ni// phyogs med rang gsal ye shes su// dus mtha'i tshad la gsal bar mkhyed//
238a4(rnying rgyud): rang gsal rig pa gnyis med la// thams cad ma lus yongs rdzogs po// ye shes rgya mtsho mu mtha' med// yi nas grub pas kyu btsal tha'o// ma bsgribasngags ka pa'i rig pa la// thams cad ma lus rdzogs par ldan// ma bcos
238a5(rnying rgyud): byung gsal ba ni// rnam dag dbyings nyid dkyil 'khor la// klas pa ba'i 'od kyis mngon par mthong // thos pa med par don grung pa'o// thams cad 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// nam mkha' ldan 'gyur rig pa'i sgo// 'byung 'jug reg pa'i
238a6(rnying rgyud): l-I can// bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyi sgo// kun 'gyur rig pa'i 'khor lo bsgyur// nam dag pad+ma lta bu yis// rang gsal rig pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// ma bsgribs gsapa pa'i ye shes sa// rang gsal sgrib med rig pa'i nyams//
238a7(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i blo lis gang la// gsal yang dmigs yul kun dang bral// cir yangs dmigs ces ma bslad// rdo rje nam ma' tha pa'i dad// btsal thal rig pa pa nas gas pa// mgyes pa nas gdong dang byung // rang pas byung bsag na
238b1(rnying rgyud): min// lhun gyis grub pas phyogs ris med// rang gsal rig pa'i ye shes la// gzhan gyis rig pa gdod nas stong // lhun grub nyid la phyogs med pas// gsal dang migs la rdzogs dang bral// rang byung nyid la rgyu med pas// bskyed bya skyed byed
238b2(rnying rgyud): gdod nas med// rtsol bral ye shes chen po la// rtsol ba'i chu bo kun las 'das// bdag gzhan ma gsal nam mkha'i ngang // yul dang yul can dmigs yul bral// gang yang ma yin gdod nas stong // sgrib pa med pa'i ngo bo ni// bltas pa med par
238b3(rnying rgyud): kun lags la// nyams myong bde ba'i 'du shes yal// 'du shes med pa'i 'du shes can// 'byung 'jug spangs pa'i thabs kyis shes// kun la gsal ba'i ngo bo yang // 'di zhes tshig tu bstan pa med// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' yis// rig pa'i 'od
238b4(rnying rgyud): min chen po ru// rig pa'i ye shes 'khor tshogs la// ye shes ngo bo bstan pa yang // rang gsal rig pa'i ngo bo de// ma bcos rig pa'i klung zhugs nas// dgongs pas gtan la phab pa las// tshig dang yi ger bstan pa med// de phyir ye shes chen po
238b5(rnying rgyud): ni// khyab pa gsal la dngos po med// ye shes rig pa'i pho brang du// rang snang rig pa'i 'od gdal bas// ci ltar bltas pa de ltar gsal// mtha' bral ye shes rdo rjer rig/ ma bcos ye nas rang gsal lung // ye nas shes pas ye shes yin//
238b6(rnying rgyud): ye nas rig pa chen po bas// rig pa ye shes chen po yin// ma bcos ji bzhin rig pa'i don// gtan la pheb pas ye shes yin// dgongs lung rang gsal rig pa la// gnyis med ye nas rig pa'i phyir// ye shes rig pa chen po yin// dgongs pa
238b7(rnying rgyud): rig pas mnyam du shes// ma balngas gsal ba ye shes yin// rang byung ye shes nyi de yin pas// btsal ba'i bsam pa gdod nas dag/ yin ni ci yang ma yin la// gsal ni kun la mthun par gsal// 'byung 'jug med par rig
239a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i mabal// maman nyid nges par gzung druka/ 'bras// gang yang ma na phyogasas pan// rnams ma gun phyogs ris ya ba'i gtad// rang gas pa dag pa'i maman cad rdzun// mtshan gzhas gas pa tha
239a2(rnying rgyud): las 'das// rang byung rtag pa mchog gi sgra// spos bral brjod med rig pa'i gsung // mtshan 'don dran rtog med pa'i thugs// 'phel 'grib med pa'i yon tan gter// b+ha btsal bral ba'i lam chen mo// sbyin la khyab cing rang la
239a3(rnying rgyud): gangal// dmigs su med cing bstan du med// rang gsal me long 'od po che// ma bcos rig pa'i khyad par pas// ci ltar bsdus pa de ltar sdang // thams cad rang gsal rig pa yang // 'khrul pa'i shes pa cir mi 'dod// smod sbrul
239a4(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i 'khor lo las// mtho man sngang tshul cir ma brtags// zag pa'i rang bzhin sbrul min yang // 'khrul pas sbrul gyi jo bar snang // dngos pa sbab du mi gnas kyang // 'khrul pa'i rol sna gzhi yod// rang gsal ma bcos ji bzhin
239a5(rnying rgyud): la// rtag dang mi tog mi gnas kyang // 'khrul pas gnyis sa rtog pas bzung // dngos la de ltar mi gnas kyang // rang rang zhen pa'i dbang gis na// de ltar sbyong ba'i 'khrul gzhir gnas// drag pa'i zhing khams gzhal yas khang // @
239a6(rnying rgyud): dang dpe byad rod 'brar ba// ye shes gsal ba'i ngo bor snang // dngos la de ltar gnas pa med// ces gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ ye shes bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dgu pa'o// / de nas sems dpa'
239a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dam pa des 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung rol bzad byung ba// rang gsal ya shes snyams pa'i mgon// 'gro drug le shes gsal bar rtogs// mi gauni mi rtsod pa gsol ba ni// gsang ba rdzang byung
239b1(rnying rgyud): theg pa 'di// ma 'ongs dus ni ji ltar 'gyur// mgon pos bdag la bshad du gsol// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces gsungs so// the sems dpa' chen po/ nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam
239b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i// rdzogs chen byang chub sems kyi rgyud// nga yi dgongs pa gsang ba'i don// yang gsang thugs kyi rna brgyad 'di// dgongs pa rnams kyis nges brgyud nas// lha gnas gsum du grags par 'gyur// de nas thugs rje'i sprul pa yis/
239b3(rnying rgyud): rgyan gling gi dur khrod du// yang gsang phug na gnas bcas nas// ya mtshan sprul pa'i cha 'dzin pas// yang sbrul thugs kyi sras bdun la// rigs pa'i dkyil 'khor sgo rtse nas// rgyal thabs spyi blugs dbang bskur nas// gsang ba'i lung 'di ston par
239b4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// de nas yang sul skal ldan gyis// 'dzam gling dbus su rgyas par 'gyur// nor bu rin chen ltar grags pas// kun gyi 'dod pa bskangs zin nas// skal ldan rig ldan rtogs pa can// sangs rgyas sa la gnas par 'gyur// gang zhig rang 'dod rtog pa dang /
239b5(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma'i sgra la zhugs pa dang // skal ba med pa'i mi rnams ni// ngan 'gror 'khyams pa nyid 'gyur ni// skal ldan sprul pa'i sras 'dus nas// mi mngon dbyings su sred par 'gyur// de nas thugs rje byin rlabs dang // dad pa las 'gro ldan pa ni// gnyis su med par
239b6(rnying rgyud): mthun pa yis// mtha' 'khob yul du snang 'gyur nas// skal ldan rigs brgyad 'dzin pa rnams// rang gsal rig pa'i don go nas// sangs rgyas sa la 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di rnams skal ldan rgyal phras te// rigs su nges pa nyid du 'gyur// rang gsal ring
239b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i glegs pam 'di// skal ldan rim po brgyad byas nas// gsang ba rig pa'i rgyal btab nas// 'phel dang rngub par mi 'gyur ro// de nas gsang ba 'chol ba yis// skal bar ldan dang mi ldan pa'i// 'dus pa'i tshogs la bshad pa yis// mtha' 'jo ba lung
240a1(rnying rgyud): du dang bar 'gyur// datsha rigs can dam pa'i sras// rgyal ba'i sa la gnas par 'gyur// skal med sgra bzhin spyod pa dang // ngan 'gro log par gnas su 'gyur// rang gi rnam rtog mi mthun
240a2(rnying rgyud): pas// rang gsal gnyis med ye shes la// yin dang ma yin cha 'dzin cing // rtsod pa 'phel ba nyid du 'gyur// de tshe dam pa'i rigs can yang // the tshom zabs mi 'grub cing // kun la rgyas par bsgrags pa'i mthus// thun mong ze/
240a3(rnying rgyud): gsu ni/ nga/
240a4(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs rtsod pa 'phel gyur nas// phyogs ris zhen pa'i nus mthu yis// rang gsal 'od kyang gsal mi 'gyur// de nas thugs rje skal med pas// gsang ba'i lung 'di dub par 'gyur// gzhan gyis nub par mi 'gyur te// seng ge'i khog par
240a5(rnying rgyud): 'jig ltar// nga yi sas su khas blangs pas// gsang ba'i lung 'di nub par byed// de yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na// chos la phyogs ris bzung ba yis// rtsod pa'i las su 'gyur ba dang // rang gsal nyams dang ma ldan par// rnam par
240a6(rnying rgyud): dkar ba'i las bor nas// nyon mongs zhen pa'i las byed dang // rna brgyud gdams ngag mi ldan par// rang brtags zhen pas 'chad pa dang // lhag pa'i che ba 'dod pa dang // khe dang grags pa gtsor bzhag nas// nges dang ma nges kun
240a7(rnying rgyud): bzlas nas// 'jug pa tshogs la 'chad pa dang // ba las thes pa can thabs dang // brdung po ngag dang rjod pa dang // rnam par dgar ba'i las thor te// spang ba'i las dag spang ba yis// 'di ted pyas ga/ thogs pa ga
240b1(rnying rgyud): na du/ sa/ sa/ / su zhus/ un sa// sna sasu
240b2(rnying rgyud): sa / ma sa ma /
240b3(rnying rgyud): ga das pa byed kyis na// la med 'bras thazab par 'gyur// derjes gsad pa 'dil ba'i sa/ rnas pa rgyad pa ga zhing snags// mas kyim ga rgyang me zhes// sa sa la pa'ang byang ba rgyu/ sa drug
240b4(rnying rgyud): ni// rgya ngas 'tsho ba mkhas pa dang // rang gsal drin la bsgom pa dang // nges pa'i gzhung lugs 'dzin pa dang // na brgya gdams dag 'dzin pa dang // grasang bu mi 'phrul sdom pa dang // dgon par gnas shing de ni mkhas
240b5(rnying rgyud): dang // ma~M k+ka sems la zungs su 'dzin// bdun gyis bstan pa 'brel bar 'gyur// de nas lnga brgya tha ma la// nyon mongs rang dgang zhen pa dang // don la zhen pa'i mthu med cing // snod ldan gang zag med pa dang // mi no ngas
240b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i bla ma rnams// gdung brgyad chad par gyur pa'i mthus// rna brgyad thugs kyi bcud bral nas// las dang skal par mi ldan pa'i// gang zag mang du 'dus pa'i mthus// las dang thugs rje skal med pas// yang gsang rmad byung theg pa
240b7(rnying rgyud): 'di// 'jam gling dbus su nub par 'gyur// sprul pa'i bstan pa tha ma'i tshe// ma 'ongs dus na 'jig rten 'dir// 'di ltar nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po
241a1(rnying rgyud): ts+tsha/ 'am ngabastan pa la klu / danas sems du dza ga pa sa du sa gsas / dgag smras ngas sa da//
241a2(rnying rgyud): mchog/ lung bstan skal ldan gang zag la// klong dang/ 'i bstan pa ji ltar 'char// zhes zhus so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpas 'do da rjes gsungs so// kye sems dpa seM so/ de bzhin
241a3(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa kan+d+ha sde gsang // sems can sa ngas rgyas gnyis su med// de nas med rnam grol rig pa'i thugs// thu btsal kun bral ye sangs rgyas// de nyid dgu ldan sems kyi gzhi// rin chen lam+ba gyi sa doms pa shA ga/
241a4(rnying rgyud): rang byung rig pa'i ye shes ni// rtsol med rang shar thob par 'gyur// rig pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor nas// ye shes rig pa'i 'od kyis gdal// brjod med rig pa'i bstan pa la// ye shes shes le ba'i gsung mchog gis/
241a5(rnying rgyud): ma brjod pas ni gtan la phab// 'od gsal ye shes rig pa las// klong dgu bstan pa dus gcig 'char// rin chen 'od gsal thig la ni// gsal ba'i mtshan ma mthong ba'i phyir// grong dbu bam po nyi khri nyid// ri chen gsal
241a6(rnying rgyud): bya'i ched du gsungs// rin chen 'od 'bar sems kyi mtha'// theg pa'i rje btsor bstan pa// rdzogs chen byang chub zag pa 'di// klong dgur ma 'dus bstan pa med// rang gsal rig pa mtha'i dbus med// jing snang cir 'azer
241a7(rnying rgyud): gas// rgyam thab srib pasam sul 'dug/ la ba 'phrul sa // 'jigs nga gang ba// rnam pa pa dmig sa drag/ pa sa byeng // 'a ba bas pa

241b2(rnying rgyud): bsgyur zhing // rig pa kun khyab brdal ba ni// rgyal thabs spyi blugs dbang gi glong // bsrung med sems kyi rang bzhin ni// lhag pa'i dam tshig bzhi la gnas// thig le nyid las mi 'da' bas// bsrung thal dam tshig dad med klong/

241b7(rnying rgyud): kun gyi snying por gsal// sgra bral rig pa'i bstan pa ni// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gsal// klong dgu bstan pa kun gyi spyi// rang gsal me long rdzogs pa'i lung // thams cad ye shes rang gsal bas// slob pa'i chos
242a1(rnying rgyud): dang gdod nas thal// spos bral nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// dAn dang rtog pa gang yang med// ma bcos chos nyid 'od gsal la// bcas pa'i snong ba gyid kyi srog// rin chen grong ga dra tugs na// thams cad
242a2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i lam dugasal// ye nas phyag rgya 'dzi ba las// lus kyis rtsol ba'i las mi byed// rtsol bral rig pa'i gsung go bas// bzlas dang 'phro 'dra'i lasu mi byed// rang gas la rig pa'i klung zhugs pas// rdo rjem ces bral zod gsal sems/

247b6(rnying rgyud): zag brtag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o// // de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs// gsang mdzod thugs kyi me long 'di// bstan dang bshad dang bklag
247b7(rnying rgyud): pa yi// yon tan rgya cher bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po/ dus gsum rgyal ba'i gter gyi dbyig/ nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud//
248a1(rnying rgyud): gsang pa'i ya bstan pa 'ad// ngas sa kun cidag sa 'a// sa byung sa tud pa rjod// phyagasung dpapa 'a 'bar btas pa// hostabs bstan pa pad ma dgongs// theg pa'i ya
248a2(rnying rgyud): 'grel// lung gsum man ngag kun gyi bcud// rin chen phung po zad mi shes// zag med ye shes bde chen thong // rtag pa ye shes 'khor lo can// rab tu gsang ba rtogs dka' zhing // dman pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa// rang gsal
248a3(rnying rgyud): rang gi ye shes mdzod// rang byung rig pa'i 'od la zhugs// bde chen khyab pa'i ngo bo ni// nam mkhar 'dzin pa'i sems dang bral// 'di la mos pa'i gang zag ni// sangs rgyas sa la skal ba mnyam// rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das// rang
248a4(rnying rgyud): gsal khyab pa'i 'od mnga' zhing // rig pa gsal ba'i dbyings la gnas// 'khor ba sangs rgyas dus gcig gsal// rig pa ye shes gsang bar snang // 'gro drug ye shes snying por gsal// dadro bo thams cad gasngal ba rtogs/ bstan pa
248a5(rnying rgyud): snying po gang 'char ba// rgyal ba'i su gsung thugs 'chang ba// de bzhin ma nor rig pas 'dzin// ye shes nyi ma'i 'od ltar snyoms// thugs rjes 'gro ba'i dpal du shar// bdud dang 'gegs kyis mi tshugs shing // rig pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du
248a6(rnying rgyud): 'char// klog dang 'bri dang 'dzin pa la// kun kyang bu bzhir skyong bar byed// de phyir bstan pa'i yang snying 'dri// rigs nges rgyal tshab gcig la gtad// brag dang chu gting sa bya ste// srog dang bral ba'i kha bzhin bsdam// zhes gsungs so// nam
248a7(rnying rgyud): mkha'i mtha' dang nyam pa'i chud zin thams/ drung gcung 'i le shuHbdun pa // byud kyirgyal po chen po rdzas pas dpa 'dams pa'i batha' dang rgas par myong bzhes kyi drang chub kyis pam rdzogs pa byo dud rdzogs so//
248b1(rnying rgyud): nas yang gzus nga sa da/ da/
248b2(rnying rgyud): dgasang sa na sa shA gyun da kyipa
248b3(rnying rgyud): brdeg ga nga// ba myo myig sa kyid kyis sto pa du sa pa de / sang rdzugs / dus sa myed pa/
248b4(rnying rgyud): yid dag shang papa ngag grogs pa nas/ pa spya ngas papa sa di sa ga /
248b5(rnying rgyud): sa yang 'a gabs pa pas la/ zhesan/ sa bden pa dngag drug
248b6(rnying rgyud): lda du smrag spyod las / da da
248b7(rnying rgyud): lus
249a1(rnying rgyud): // byas lhur// rig pa rang gsal dbang thob nas// brda don sprad nas rgyal sar bzhag// mkhyen pa'i ye shes gcig tu la sbrel// rol pa'i phyag rgya ma 'dres gsal// btsal med rig par
249a2(rnying rgyud): khyad par las// lhan grub rin chen 'od ltar 'byung // zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ btsal med bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rje
249a3(rnying rgyud): rje dam pa des de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsum rmad byung rol par shar// rtsol bral lhan grub phrin las bdag/ phyogs med rang gsal kun gyi
249a4(rnying rgyud): dngos// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// rtsol bral rig pa'i phrin las la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas// de bzhin nyid du mdzad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad
249a5(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po/ rgol bral rig pa lhun grub padag/ phyogs med rang byung gnyis med la// gnyis kyi 'du shes 'byung 'jug med// lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las so// rig pa'i byin rlabs mkhal d+ha
249a6(rnying rgyud): brdal// mdzad pa'i bye brag bsam mi khyab// gsal ba'i me long yid kyis 'jug/ bya bral lhan rdzogs phrin las ni// bde ba'i thig le ye shel 'od// ji ltar gsal ba de ltar gsal// gang rung rig pa gcig la rdzogs// rin chen phung
249a7(rnying rgyud): ma'i 'od zer ltar// dbyings su 'khyil zhing slar yang 'gro// gang yang mi mdzad thams cad kun// kun mdzad rig pa'i phrin las can// btsal bral ye shes gsal ba'i 'od// kun la snyoms shing yongs la brdal// bya bral rig pa'i
249b1(rnying rgyud): drin pas ni// mdzad pa phyogs bral 'od ltar brdal// ye nas byas zin bu med pa// rdo rje nam mkha' mchog gi las// ye shes gsang ba'i phrin las ni// rig pa bde ba'i dben la phrog/ ye shes mye song thabs bya s+ho// rang snang rig pa'i tshul gyis rtse// gnyid
249b2(rnying rgyud): mede rang gsal gcig gi rdo// nyams rkyong ye shes mtha' dbus med// brjod bral rig pa'i me long gter// ji ltar bltas pa de ltar gasngal// gang zhig rig pa'i dong tshwa'i sgo// 'phrul gyi lde mig nyid kyis kye// rin chen phung po 'bar ba
249b3(rnying rgyud): bstan// nam mkha' mdzod kyi gter la spod// theg sgo thabs kyi phrin las ni// gang 'dod theg pa so so'i sgo// mos pa'i 'dul tshad pas ma mi khyab// de ste rig pa bsam mi khyab// thabs kyi phrin las gang bstun kyang // rang byung rig pa'i sgo
249b4(rnying rgyud): nas gsal// bya ba byas pa'i rjes 'jug ltar// gang zhugs rang gsal rig pa la// phrin las ma lus dus gcig rdzogs// rang gsal rig pa'i don la bzhugs// btsal ba rim pa gang sgo nas// de dang de yi rjes zhugs pas// rtog pa lam
249b5(rnying rgyud): gyi rjes su zhugs// mtshan ma chags lam dbang gis khrid// rnam rtog mtshan ma'i rjes 'brangs nas// rig pa rang gsal don dang bral// brda tshig sla yi tshul nas zhugs// 'khor ba'i gnas rabra dgu chu brgyad// gang dang gang gi rjes 'jug pa//
249b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba mtshon ma'i lam du zhugs// chags pa g.yas g.yon kun gyis khrid// bde mchog don las sbyin ci log/ ye shes gsal ba'i 'od dang bral// gang 'thibs log pas shin tu bsgribs// long bas long ba'i lam mtshon ltar/
249b7(rnying rgyud): bde 'a bor nas sdug bsngal rnyed// rang gsal ye shes don bor nas// ye shes btsal bas grub par 'dod// gnyis med don la gnyis kyis chags// dmigs med don la dmigs pas bzung // phyogs med rig pa'i ye shes la// rang 'dod
250a1(rnying rgyud): mA/ drug la brtan byas nas// mi dmigs pa ni rag ste// mi dmigs pa la gams byas nas// dmigs mdang pa nyid du thab// mazin zin phyi snang bzhi bsam// zin pa btan mye goms par \u0f7f// 'dzin med ngang gas
250a2(rnying rgyud): rten ma 'cha'// zang thal rig parjen par bzhag/ brtan pa pogs dbyung lda ba thabs// rang sems dag bcos mu yin// rang byung ye shes mtha' las 'das// zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel// rig pa yul gyis mi gnod pa// dper na
250a3(rnying rgyud): dngul chu 'bob 'dra// rtags ni lus ngag yid gsum la// lus ni 'dir zhing sdug pa dang // 'phags dang byug pa'i las rnams byed// ngag ni rgod cing ngu ba dang // / kha nas sla skad sna tshogs 'don// sems ni 'dzin med btang dka' bas// phyi nang /
250a4(rnying rgyud): shes pa mi 'gyur zhing // dper na sbyin por mdzub brdugs bzhin// ting 'dzin go spo bar ba ni// rjud dang snod dang de bzhin nyid// nyams de mid du mi thogs par// shes pa khong rjes dag pa 'byung / sngar ma thos pa'i chos skad 'byung // dngon
250a5(rnying rgyud): ga me yul lam zhen na// 'dzin ming sems dang ma thal bas// snod lam rnam pazhi gang byed cing // sems kyi rtse yis zin pas ni// 'di ni gzhag zabs dam pa ste// dgongs pa bang+gA'i thugs dang mnyam// de don dud la brtul ba ni// thos gad
250a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i rtog pa med// dper na gri bya tshang 'jug bzhin// ma yengs la mdu khyer dgos pas// dper na dmu rgod rta 'dul bzhin// ma yengs par ni gzhag par bya// de las sems ni 'phro 'gyur na// dper ni nam mkha'i sprin bzhin du// 'byung
250a7(rnying rgyud): yang gzhal gnod med ltar// rtag pas mi 'gri' bcos mi dgos// gsal la ma tog rgya mato// mi bakhyod rgyamaze'i gti dang dra// byang chub sems kyi dag pa 'di// gtug ma gangs pa chos kyi sra// wa~M gyi ngas 'bring 'khrul pa'i lala~M/
250b1(rnying rgyud): shes pa mi 'gyur bather me bcug// shes pasgying bar gyur pa'im// 'gro 'du'i babs kyis zhi bar 'thun// shes pa nad par gyur pa cha// 'grub dal zas bda' ba ni// rjes nas bajug pas rang sa ldog/ dper na dran pa tshor ma tha/
250b2(rnying rgyud): bskrad dang bzhin dengs pa bzhin// sems kyi rang bzhin chos nyid la// rang bzhin gsal ba ngang gis zhog/ de ltar rtogs pa'i rdul 'byor nyams// shing bal lta bu'i lus 'byung la// dbug pa ni gyi nang 'argya mtshor// chos nyid badre gsal chen po
250b3(rnying rgyud): nyams// yon tan 'char lugs 'di ltar lags// mtha' dbus med pas nam mkha' 'dra// 'jig rdal med pas rdo rje 'dra// chags zhen med pas bud pa 'dra// rang dud ye shes ngo bo yin// lo shes gsang bsngon pa dran po che ma ngag gi
250b4(rnying rgyud): rgyud las// sems kyi gzhag thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa/ kye ho gsang ba'i bdag po lags// sngon mi mnga' la yon tan rdzogs// bdud dang chos su dbye ba'i phyir// bdud
250b5(rnying rgyud): ngos bzung bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ bdud dang chos mu dbye ba la// rnam pa bco brgyad 'dir bshad do// gzugs ni phung po bdud du gnas// bu sogs lnga yi brjod
250b6(rnying rgyud): du sprul// de la 'dzin pa nyon mongs bdud// 'khrul pa'i sems ni 'chi bdag bdud// dgos pa'i nor yang bdud yin pas// gnod sbyini lce yang de dang 'dra // stong pa rgyal chad lta ba'i bdud// had po bogs med bsgoms pa'i badrad //
250b7(rnying rgyud): rtag me dang ga spyod pa'i bdud// thag med 'dod pa 'bras bu'i bdud// phra mos chog shes thos pa'i bdud// rtsa chung 'jug pa rlung gi bdud// grub mtha' log pa chos kyi bdud// mi thab dpa bca' sdom pa'i badzud// 'du'aja langs spyod g.yeng ba/
251a1(rnying rgyud): du
251a2(rnying rgyud): ma
251a3(rnying rgyud): na
251a4(rnying rgyud): sus su
251b1(rnying rgyud): cing ye shes gsal// gnas lugs dang las ma g.yos pas// dper na gsar gling phyin pa 'dra// dgongs pa rdo rje 'chang dang mnyam// de nyid gsal la ma zhan na// yang dag don la gnas pa yin// chags snang gti mug dbang ga
251b2(rnying rgyud): ni// rgod cing bying pa byung ba'i tshe// phyi nang gsang ba gsum po la// sems gtad de ni zhi bar 'gyur// khams bde thun ni ring par bya// mi bde thun bzhir bsgom par bya// de nas blta bas zag bcad de// mtha' gnyis dmigs pa'i yul
251b3(rnying rgyud): las grol// dmigs pa med pa byang chub sems// gzung 'dzin med pa'i ye shes la// chos kun byang chub sems su gcig/ sems ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ltar// mtshan ma med par rogacig pas// skye med rnam grol bdud rtse'i zas// brjo pa blta ba'i
251b4(rnying rgyud): 'joms pa// byang chub sems kyi lam chen 'di// dngos po stong pa nyid las grol// gdags su med pa'i sems nyid la// mtshan par btags na blo yin pas// chos nyid blo las 'das pa yin// blo yi blo gros ngo mtshar che// de ni blo gros dam pa'i chu//
251b5(rnying rgyud): de phyir yod yang gnyis mad zhan// yang dag byang chub sems nyid la// yod dri gro mi 'dzegs pa dang // ma pang srung sa mi 'degs pa sa// tag/ dang zang pa'i mtha' las 'das// 'byung ba'i rgyu ba'i ci dmig sa can// rlung sems rang khang ma mnan//
251b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyu ba med pa bzhin// mi snang bzhin du 'gyu bar zad// dper na nam mkha'i sprin bzhin du// smin tshogs nas yang gnod mi nus// de bzhin byang chub sems nyid la// rtog pas 'grib par yodra mi nus// rang sems dgang chos nyid la// ma btsal lhur
251b7(rnying rgyud): gyis grub pa ste// gang ltar bsgoms kyang thig le'i ngang // dper na til gyi mar me bzhin// gyi nang gsal ba'i rig pa'i mdangs// rang sems rtogs pas sangs rgyas pa// 'og ma'i lam lngas mi bgrod// gsang sngags thabs lam skad cig gis/
252a1(rnying rgyud): chu / / sa // smra smra smra sa / nas ga dang /
252a2(rnying rgyud): na sa/ sa pa da nas pas pa pa'i // mi ldan sa 'a na
252a3(rnying rgyud): rnams la gsung drugadul/ dag du ga'ams byas dpa sa sa/
252a4(rnying rgyud): 'alo// pabacwal kun gyis rnam // delu mi gas sems pa dmas/ dom ci dal/ / 'a dag ga de mi ga bad// ga 'tha/ ga dag bam pa snga ga pa ma /
252a5(rnying rgyud): ga ni 'as dag ga
252a6(rnying rgyud): gyu/ sa sa / bya
252a7(rnying rgyud): rgya du su / lu su sa
252b1(rnying rgyud): bu phun sum tshogs pa yin// mthong ba'i chos la blo mi gzhag/ stong pa la yang de bzhin no// sems nyid drang por bzung ngu med// nges par dang la zhen na 'chings// 'di la chags pa 'ga' yod na// rang gis bcings pa'i srin bu bzhin//
252b2(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu med par brlag par 'gyur// de bas sangs rgyas thob 'dod pas// rang gi sems kyi rtsad bcad ste// bsam med ye shes sna rtse yin// des na chos kun rtsa ba 'di// sems nyid yin par shes par bya// ye shes gsang ba sgon ma
252b3(rnying rgyud): rin po che man ngag gi rgyud las// sru pri lta bu'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho gsang ba'i bdag po lags// 'gro ba'i skyabs mdzad thugs rje can// bdag cag rmongs par gyur pa la// ye
252b4(rnying rgyud): shes ngos gzung bshad du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos yang gsungs pa// kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ de nyid ngos gzung spyi blugs dang // tshogs drug lcag dang thug phrad dang // gnas pa'i thabs dang lnga ru bshad// dang po ye shes ngos
252b5(rnying rgyud): gzung ni// sman pa mkhas pa lta bu ste// de yis nad dang nad pa'i nyams// rtsa dang chu yi sgo nas rtog/ na dngos zin na ming 'dogs bzhin// de bzhin bde bar gshegs pa'i rgud// bla ma mkhas pa'i gdams dag dang // rang gi nyams kyi bye brag gis//
252b6(rnying rgyud): tshad ma gsum la brten nas ni// ye shes mkha' lhur khyab pa la// ngo las zin na bde dang 'phrad // ye shes spyi thugs dgongs pa ni// 'phrul gyi me long sum phrug ltang // de bzhin gnas lugs rtogs pa'i med// 'di dang khyi ma gnyis su med// de bzhin do
252b7(rnying rgyud): la gnas par// tshogs drug sdug pa'i man dag no// sras nad kyis gcing pa la// ma gleng batsha rtag med bzhin// de bzhin sems nyid rtogs pa'i ma// bdag gzhan 'dzin pa'i rtog pa med// tog med lam du khyer dgongs pa'o// ma rga
253a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ thug phrad gdams dag ni// dper na dang ya'i sman bzhin du// reg pas nang rnams zhi bar byed// de bzhin ye shes bdud kyis zin// sems can lus la bud+hA thugs// sems gnas pa ya man dag ni// dus phral 'khar gzhong bzhag pa
253a2(rnying rgyud): ba'in// yan lag 'khyams pas bzung mod rnyer// de bzhes na la 'dzad rnam rtag phreng // rnalnga 'thong sems la dbang bgyur bas// mjal pani shes pas 'jas ma nAs// yaM shes gsang bsngon pa na po chesan ngag kyi rgyud las/ ye shes nges ga
253a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i le rbaste/ dgra pa'o// / de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa/ gtogasang ba'i bdag po lags// dang b+ha ye shes rab nyid// rang sa 'char lugs ji ltar lags// bdag cag rnams la bstan drugasoso// gas pa'i byangag thos pa
253a4(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa// rje sems dpa' tshan panyon cig/ rang byung mi shes ribad// 'chang ba'i thabs ni 'di ste ste// rang sems pa thag mar gnas pani// blathama'i pa dang ga thabs kyis ni// gnas pa 'don shes ye shes pa'o// de mas 'das pa ni gong ma brgyad
253a5(rnying rgyud): than yod pa can pa yin// de ltar ma shes tha zang bas// dang por dben par lus pardzang nas// margo mkha' la 'drar ba bzhin// dpe gang btang ba la la ngan pa gtang// rlung bams gcig tu 'dus thas te// thams gsungs paji bzhin du// zol bya drag pos
253a6(rnying rgyud): drugazug/ mda' mkha sdug mang thong ba bzhid// dmigs pa'i tshul bdag tu bsgrim// na tsang dab 'bring gsum dzub cang // khabapa pa ca la col thub brjid// den dpos bzod la bzhig// nyams kyi chang lugs rnam pa gsum// thong rgal
253a7(rnying rgyud): ma kyis dang // tha mi lags pa chu// na pag gas kyis // lus 'ad yin yang sdug pad// la nga na sdig pa // babasha sa sa// 'phrul dum padang // bcwa
253b1(rnying rgyud): gta dgang // rgas pa da 'grags 'dan// khams dang sa da pas// na can gsas pa rna pa / bas dadag kya // bang du rnams lanas da/ dal ya ya da'adas// na 'du
