253b2(rnying rgyud): ma bcos so ma lkug par bzhag/ rab 'dzin sprin phor mdzub bzugs dadra// 'bring 'dzin 'dag par rdo brgyab 'dra// tha mtshol du drug na gnas// skra yi tsher mas mi gnod pas// ting 'dzin nyin mdzun bsre bar rus// brtan pa yangs su rdzogs
253b3(rnying rgyud): rnyeng ste// lus sems khor klong gtsug ma'i ngang // byang sems bde ba che dang phrad// mA nga' ltar mtha' dbus sems la med// lus ni yod du mi tshor ba// shing bal 'dab ma ltar yang bri// dbugs ni phyi nang 'gyu mtshor// sems ni mkha' ltar phyogs
253b4(rnying rgyud): med// ye shes khong 'char bde chen 'bar// ye shes gsang ba sgon ma rin po che man ngag gi rgyud las/ rang byung gi ye shes gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rjes yang zhus pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po lags/
253b5(rnying rgyud): chub bems ni gzung dka' bas// sems kyi gzhag thabs bshad du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ gzhag thabs btsang thabs bcos rngums tshad// drod rtags kyi tshul 'bras bu bstan// gzhag thabs rnam pa
253b6(rnying rgyud): gsum yid la// mkha' la zung lding gzhag pa dang // thi tra tshang du 'jug pa dang // bya ba btang ba'i skyes bu bzhin// mkha' la khrung lding bzhag pa ni// gshog pa thang bcang lding ba dang // rtsol bsrub med par ldang ba dang // 'og ma mthong bar lding ba dang // yon tan rdzogs
253b7(rnying rgyud): par ldir ba dang // nad dug shog du rgyas pa ltar// rnal 'byor mi rtog bsgom pa'i tshe// shes par zang bcad mnyam par gzhag// rtsol bgrub med par mnyam pang gzhag// 'og ma'i don mthong mnyam par gzhag/ yon tan yang la rdzogs par gzhag/ rnal 'byor lus la sangs kyis rdzogs//
254a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7fra du 'jug pa snang // de bzhin rdzo ba med par bzhag/ byab btung ba'i rgyas pawAr// dza lta gnas pa sdug bsngal med// bca thabs rnam pags ma sa// da thA rgong dag bcang ba dang // ngan panag ta
254a2(rnying rgyud): btsa' ba dang // dA rnga'i btsun mo ltar btsa' ba'o// dbu rgod btul ba ma yengs ltar// de bzhin bsgom pa'i sems ma yengs// rtogs pa'i don la gnas par gyis// rin chen gter ltar btsang ba ni// the ma yig gzhan la pa shor bar// gzhan
254a3(rnying rgyud): chom rkun mi tshugs shing // de bzhin rnal 'gyor bsgom pa'i tshe// gdams ngag rtsi yis zin pa ni// rnam par rtog pas mi tshugs so// btsun mo lta bur btsa' ba ni// rgyal po mnga' dang btsun mo la// gzhan gyi gnod pas mi grogs bzhin/
254a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin gdams ngag ldan pa'i mis// chos rnams sems su shes pa la// dngos po'i dug gis tshogs mi srid// bcos thabs rnam pa gsum du bstan// mkha' la sprin ltar bcos pa dang // khang stong na num lta bu dang // dug la sngags kyis btab lta /
254a5(rnying rgyud): tshad la rnam pa gsum du bstan// gsal ba'i tshad ni mar me ltar// mi g.yo'i tshad ni rgya mtsho ltar// yang zhing 'jam pa shing bal ltar// drod rtags rnam pa gsum du brtan// gyi rtags lus po yod mi tshong // nang rtags dbugs ni 'bru mi tshor/
254a6(rnying rgyud): gsang rtags dngos po'i zhen pa chod// skye tshul rnam pa gsum yin te// rnam par rtog pas ye shes skye// stong pa nyid las snying rje skye// zhi gnas bsgoms na lhag mthong ste// 'bras bu spa du ye shes 'char// ye shes gsang ba sgron ma rin po che man
254a7(rnying rgyud): ngag gi rgyud las/ byang chub kyi sems gtan la dbab pa'i le'u stebacu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho gsang ba'i bdag po lags// lta bsgom spyod pa ci ltar lags// 'dus pa'i
254b1(rnying rgyud): khangal bstanangs so// gsang ba'i ba na pas bka'aphral ba// thamams dpa' nas can // dngag sapas zag bcad pa// bang dbags pas nyams sadang // na pa 'a sa// da sa pas dag pa dang // ngag
254b2(rnying rgyud): bcud zags thog mtha' med// sems nyid tu rkyen gnyis las 'das// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog smon dang thal// blo dang ldan pa'i chu bskyed de// mtha' las 'das dang ldan gyis thub// rgya thab gdal nyid druganas// mtha' dang dbus
254b3(rnying rgyud): su mi rtog na// lta ba'i go la sar lgang mi 'gyur// yin pa gsum gyis zag bcad pa// skugasung thugs lnga yid ches skye// rin po che yi gas+yer gling du// srin pas thams cad gsar du snang // 'khor 'das bzung dran med par shes/
254b4(rnying rgyud): spang en yA yi mi ga bzhin du// gnyis su med par thug chod do// bsgom pas nyams su blang ba ni// 'das pa'i shes pa rjes mi gcod// ma 'ongs shes pa skyon mi bsu// da lta'i shes pa ma bskrad pa// dngos po'i rjes su ma 'brangs na//
254b5(rnying rgyud): gtsug ma'i sems ni yin par rjes// dbang po sgo lnga'i rjes 'byangs nas// sems can pal ba'i yul la chags// thang ba brjod la chags pa ltar// me tog pa la rgyags pa'i tshe// tshor bas ci yang mi tshor ba// chos can por nas chos
254b6(rnying rgyud): nyid pa// grangs can gyi lI bsgom par 'gyur// snang tshod nyams su myang dbus na// chu 'bras khyad gsod chad par 'gyur// srung zhing 'geg par byed pa ni// nyad thos 'gog pa'i mi rtog par// thams cad ma lus tshor bas na// yul dang
254b7(rnying rgyud): yul chen gnyis su tog/ ci yang yid la ma byas na// rjes su mi 'brangs mi rtog pas// grol bar 'dod pa lam gyi mchog/ ci yang ma skyes ma bcos pa// shes pa so ma nyid du 'dod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa yin// tha ma
255a1(rnying rgyud): spyod pas la dor ni// nya mo chu las mi 'da' bzhin// dkar po'i chos dang thal thabs med// dngos po'i chos la zhen na 'khor// yang na ri dwags su nyan ltar// yang na glang po mtsho phrang ltar// nam mkha'i mdud
255a2(rnying rgyud): 'dra ba'o// gang la thogs pa med pa ni// ral gri so mang 'dra ba ste// gdong du ci byung thams cad gcod// ye shes gsang ba sgron ma rin po che man ngag gi rgyud las// lta sgom spyod pa ma 'dres rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//
255a3(rnying rgyud): sa yangs nga dngas 'di da pam / ma nga bdag palag // thams cad bamyed pa gas // bdag gim b+hAs / myed pas jogs// thos pa'i mkho la bstan du ga dong /
255a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ kun gzhi skye med ma bcos stong pa nyid// de rtogs rnal 'byor gang gis mi gnod pa// skyes bu goms pas gang rgyags lhung med ltar// skye med rtogs shing 'dris
255a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gang ltar spyad kyang mi nyams thig le'i dang // ched du mi spang dang la bzhag pas 'bral// ma spangs lhun grub byang chub chen por spyod// kun gzhi ma bcos brdal ba chen po nyid// chos kun ma 'dres byang chub sems su gcig/
255a6(rnying rgyud): kun gzhi ma bcos dang la gang spyod pa// chos rnams kun la mi spyod mi rtog na// spyod med gnas lugs rtogs pa'i spyod pa yin// chos nyid spong pa'i rtag ni ji ltar lags// gang la zhen pa med pas chags pa chung // ma nor don la kun gzhi 'gyur med
255a7(rnying rgyud): gsal// rtag chen de yod gzhan gyi khar mi lhung // mngon shes stobs dang rdzu 'phrul lung ston 'thung // de la rlom sems med pa dang rgyal ri bo slad// de yis spang len mi byed mnyam pa nyid du gsal// thig le gcig tu rtogs pas tha dad 'dzin pa za//
255b1(rnying rgyud): gzhan nas ma btsal rang la yod pa ngo mtshad che// rang bzhin med par shes pas 'bras bu 'byin mi nus// ma nor pa yi thabs kyis zin pas na// nyon mongs lnga dang dug lnga'i rtsa ba bral// dper na rnga ma'i snying po gzung dang mtshungs// skyes bu de la bya
255b2(rnying rgyud): btsal med pa ste// pan sa yi 'bras bu smin pa ltar// smin par bya ba'i rtsol ba mi byed dang // zed pa'i rtsol ba de ni smin pa'i gegs su 'gyur// kun gzhi mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas pa ni// 'khor ba'i chos kun mi spang de la rdzogs// 'a
255b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i bden pa de'i lam yang de la rdzogs// rang rgyal rten 'brel lam yang de la rdzogs// byang sems sngon 'dug lam yang de la rdzogs// byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun de la rdzogs// bcu yis bgrod pa'i sa yang de la rdzogs// dkyil 'khor ra
255b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang yang de la rdzogs// lha dang bzlas pa phrin las phyag rgya de la rdzogs// 'phags pa mnyes byed mchod pa de la rdzogs// sdom pa gsum gyi bsrung bya de la rdzogs// gnong zhing 'gyod pa'i bshags pa de la rdzogs// legs pa'i bsngo ba
255b5(rnying rgyud): smon lam de la rdzogs// rgyal ba'i sku gsum thob ka de la rdzogs// kun gzhi ma bcos thig le nyag gcig la// yon tan rdzogs pas zhing sa gshin pa 'dra// thig ni mi 'gyur rang sems skye med yin// le ni gdal ba mnyam pa nyid du gsal//
255b6(rnying rgyud): bslu ba'i don ni gcig pas gcig ces bya/ thag men nag mnyam pa'i tshul gyis gol sgrib ji ltar spongs// mi lha mi bsgom me spyad dbyer med na// 'og ma'i lta spyod gnas su grol mi 'gyur// gar yang mi 'gro 'dug pa'i mi dang mtshungs//
255b7(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa'i tshul gyis bdud rnams ji ltar 'dul// mnyam pa'i gdeng la yid ches ma bral na// bdud kyi bar chod sprul pa ci byung yang // thams cad sems su shes pas kla na ka li tshug zhing // khyim bdag dpa' bos bsrung ba'i bud med 'dra// gza'
256a1(rnying rgyud): gtad med pas lta ba'i mtha' dang bral// 'dzin pa med pas sgom pa ngang la gsal// blang dor med pas spyod pa gang la bzang ngan med// 'bras bu spang thob med pas sku dang ye shes gsal// de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal
256a2(rnying rgyud): 'byor ba la 'chi ba med// ye shes gsang ba snron ma rin po che man ngag gi rgyung las/ yon tan yar ldan gyi le 'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de dus yang sems dpa' rdo rjes nus pa/ kye phyogs pa'i bdag po lags/
256a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i lam ston pa// mkha' spyod gnas su 'gro ba'i phyir// 'phags pa'i lam gcig bstan du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ mkha' spyod gnas su 'ong 'dod na// dang po zos pa'i shes rab kyis/
256a4(rnying rgyud): nang chos la sgo 'dogs chod// bar du bsam pa'i shes rab kyis// de don rgyud la goms par bya// tha ma bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis// bdag tu 'dzin pa'i nyon mongs gzhom// tshogs lam bla ma mtshan ldan la// mnyes pa gsum gyi mchod pa 'bul//
256a5(rnying rgyud): spyod lam bla ma'i gdams ngag gis// zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel// mthong lam spyan lnga dag pa yis// rang sems kye med mthong bar bya// bsgom lam ting 'dzin nam gsum gyis// gnyug ma'i yid la goms par bya// mthar phyin nyes
256a6(rnying rgyud): pa gnyis zad pas// chos rnams zad sar bstsal bar bya// nga ni thabs kyis mkhan te// thar la ma tshol ba lam 'dir shog/ mjal dang thos dang rtogs dang goms// chos dang mdo dang mdzod dang 'jigs// thabs kyis de yi rang la 'jog/ ye shes
256a7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba sgron ma rin po che man ngag gi rgyud las/ 'phags lam bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// phyog snang ba'i bdag po lags// khyod ni ye shes sun dang ldan// bdag cag
256b1(rnying rgyud): sa pa'i 'khod namasus// rgyad sa yan tan ba ska drugasal// gas pa'i bdag pas ka dumab// thamams dpa ca sa ga/ rgyud rnams par bya brgyad ba rnam pa// lugs gsang chud pa 'dus// smon pas na sa nga ba/
256b2(rnying rgyud): yon tan 'byung bas rin chen yin// yon tan pasam gyis mi khyab pas// ming tsam brjod pas stob pa dang mAn// drug par byed cing blo dpel ba mi// dngos grub nges par 'byung ba'o// bdud rtsid dbye rnams la mas par byed// ga lcag
256b3(rnying rgyud): lus zol lce thang na// 'dod khams zhen pa med pa gyur// srid pa'i gnas su mi 'jug pas// legs kyis la med// mun pa se la tha~Mng sro pa'i drung // dngos myo da dam gsu thal// rgyud rgyang chag sa zhes d+ha n+te/ 'kho ba byung /
256b4(rnying rgyud): ni chung du 'dod// 'brel dang mtshang med pa dang // dgos pa tshang bas spyod ces bya// legs gas brnyan ma rjenas kyi pa dngag girdzu nas/ rgyud kyi ya tan bzhin po'i ma skye tsa ldang ma// den sa yang sems dpa' rdo rjes des dukyil gsol
256b5(rnying rgyud): kyai hogasang ba'i bdag po lags// dus gsum mkhyen pa'i rdo rje chang // 'khor rnams tshangs par gyur ba la// chud kyi gtad tu gsung du gsol// zhab gsol to// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' ba pa/ bre sems dpa' chen po na cig/ 'khor/
256b6(rnying rgyud): sbyinang nas dam pa ste// khyong ni rnas pa'i stobs dang lhan// ny-i las mig zhen 'khor yin pas// ban ga rgyab brten monama'i drung // thugs la tshang la gces par gyis// lan cig stegs pa lha'i ngas na// ti zla bzhin rje dang shing nas// byang chub
256b7(rnying rgyud): ga dang pardi pa da pa nga/ sa nyid gtu dzubs pa shes ba // 'a ba dgas ba ba // rjed pag tums payin pa mnas// mi rgyagakyil kyi sa tha ya pa 'dis to// miseM shin dang 'ad kyig
257a1(rnying rgyud): 'chad dang bsgom par bya ba'i mi// bar gcod med par skye shi gnyis las grol// ye shes gsang ba sgron ma rin po che man ngag gi rgyud las/ rgyud kyi gtad rje bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / ye shes gas
257a2(rnying rgyud): sngon ma rin po che man ngag gi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// // pa ti ta shrI se d+ha dang zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba bi do tsa nas man ngag gi chud gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ rat+na tsal nA ma tan tra/ bod skadadu/ rin po che 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i chung
257a3(rnying rgyud): gsang bdag che la phyag 'tshal lo// bstan pa ston pa 'khor gnas dus// ngo mtshar chen po'i tshig lnga yis// sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs la// gsang bdag chen pos bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas sems can gzhi gcig kyang /
257a4(rnying rgyud): kyi nang snod bcud gnyis su bzung // ye shes 'khrul pa gnyis su snang // mun pa'i nang 'khyabs don mi gsal// gcig la 'char sgo gnyis su byung // gcig gis drug gi 'bras bu myong // ming mthogs las shugs kyis 'khrul// rin
257a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i gnas su 'khyams// snang dang mi snang gzugs su 'khrul// zhes gsungs pa dang / sems dpa' rdo rjes slar gsol pa// sangs rgyas sems can gzhi gcig la// gnyis snang shes pa'i mtshan nyid rnams// gcig pa lags sam tha dad/
257a6(rnying rgyud): lags// zhes gsol ba dang / gsang bdag chen pos pan gsungs pa// ming mthogs kyi spris nas// snang ba dag dang ma dag gnyis// mtshan nyid gnyis su snang mod kyang // ling mabogs su skyes gcig/ gcig med gnyis kyang yin ma yin//
257a7(rnying rgyud): dper nag khur sman dug bzhin// dug min sman kyang kho na min// sman dug gapur gyis gcig/ rkyen dang gang 'phrad sman dug go// ming ma sogs kyi dris na// 'char sgo rnam pa gnyis su ru // ma rig 'khrul pa'i 'char sgo dang // rig pa ye shes
257b1(rnying rgyud): kyang ga gnyis// dus dalas byu sa// 'bral ba pa dang mthad pa sa/ gas da gas sa gas dang // gsang 'dug smras sarnas pa spyod// rtag padas spangs sas spyo// btsums sa
257b2(rnying rgyud): sa// mnya sa sangs rgyas tshul ba'i rtsa// thugs ma zhid byem sna ga nga/ rdzogs 'phrul pa'i shes pa / bdag rjid kyi 'a na// mdas pa byung yul b+he// dza su myo med byung bas//
257b3(rnying rgyud): b+h+yas// bde snyam mi ba de snyamathung bas// bde sngam nyams su myong ba yis// 'brel mi da pa'i tshugs sems ces// mi bdenas pa'i sems byung bas// m-i byad srid kyi tshul kho thas// nga'o snyam pa'i dUd pa skyes// byad drugasums
257b4(rnying rgyud): la yun ring bAs// gsal snyam mi gsal snga ma gnyis 'byung // gsal ma gsal pa yid rtog gyis// 'od gzugs rigs gzugs gnyis suM byung // rig pa stong pa'i snying po kyang// kun dbyung rin pa rje yaM gtor // 'dod dgra'i mangs
257b5(rnying rgyud): myod zad mtha' med// thams cad 'bras bu 'char pa'i gzhi// gsang bdag chen po ngas bshad kyis// sems dpa' rdo rje legs par nyon// ces gsungs so// rin po che 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//
257b6(rnying rgyud): s+yAd gsol ba'i chog rjes su// gsang bdag med po'i rang bzhin las// sems dpa' rdo rjes slar gsol pa// sun gzhi gyis gcig pa la// 'char po gnyis sa byung ba de// rgyas pa lags sa mabyung ba lags// byas na 'dus byas
257b7(rnying rgyud): dngos yin pas// bsgrubs pa rnams kyang den med 'gyur// srung ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa ni// bdag las byung dpe gzhan las byung // zhes gsol pas/ gseng bdag chen pos la da btab pa// gzung dag gi rang bzhid pa/
258a1(rnying rgyud): sman dug ming du ma btags kyang // spyan drug gnyis su snang ba ltar// kun gzhi spris gcig pa las// 'chang sgo gnyis su thugs kyis 'byung // sngon la gang gyis ldog bcas so// ma rig 'khrul ba'i
258a2(rnying rgyud): 'char sgo nas// rig pa'i 'char sgom shar bar// kun gzhi 'od kyi gzugs su snang // 'od la 'dod pa'i sems skyes pas// 'dod khams lha ru shugs kyis 'khrul// 'od la yang dag ngos su bzung // gzugs khams lta bu
258a3(rnying rgyud): shugs kyis 'khrul// 'od kyi rang bzhin ma shes shing // ci yang min pa'i yid skyes pas// gzugs med khams su shugs kyis 'khrul// 'od la rig pa'i rtsal skyes pas// rtsal la gdeng rnyed rtog pa shar// rig la yun ring
258a4(rnying rgyud): gnas pas thob// 'od la chags shing zhe sdang byung // dmyal ba'i gnas su shugs kyis 'khrul// 'od la chags shing 'bral mi pong// yi dwags gnas su shugs kyis 'khrul// yang dag ma shes don mi gsal// byol song dag
258a5(rnying rgyud): tu shugs kyis 'khrul// 'od gzugs bzang ngan phrag drog skyes// mi rnams ngag tu shugs kyis 'khrul// nga las med pa'i sems skyes pas// lha min dag tu shugs kyis 'khrul// rdzab ma rig gnyis yin pas// snang
258a6(rnying rgyud): dang mi snang gnod byed pas// dadre kun dag gis dpe yis bstan// gzhi ni kun gzhi'i rnam shes yin// chags las zhe sdang lus su 'khrul// 'dod las 'dod chags sha ru 'khrul// gti mug sha yi gzugs su byung // bden
258a7(rnying rgyud): rdzun rnam pa sna tshogs byung // lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig las// kun brtags ma rig rtog pa zung // yid gnyis kyi nang gnyis su bzung // yul la 'jug cing sgrib rnams gsog/ 'byung 'jug gyi dang dag tu blta// zhes gsungs
258b1(rnying rgyud): pal ba nga rgyad pas/ 'khrul rdul bstan pa gnas pa'o// dad dgas la ba gangs pa// bya ngas su gas sa/ ga dul bul pas ma dan/ 'jang 'a
258b2(rnying rgyud): mas tshas// gtsud pa'i tshul pa'i thad pa rtse// 'bral ga de sa 'i lta chung // dwen dgas la pa 'i rigasasadangs// gsang bad dpas ng+ge // de ni dge 'i ba pa shes// 'brel ba sa
258b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i yid// gzhi ni le nas yid pa bye// 'khrul pa yid rdzog ga zung sa// gzhin rig pa rgya yin te// 'khrul phyernam / du zar byung // skyeg zag/ thegazhi la sus// nr-i spel ba 'khrul dpe yis mcho// bcas bskrad/
258b4(rnying rgyud): 'phel 'grib rgya rkyen thal// 'jo 'byung chu 'jol 'gyur ba med// dngos med ma bcos ldan gyis grub// rgyo buM se pa dag lus mi ri// pa bri tsas ma bskrad ma bcol drin// 'dzi ni bcas blo las khyad par grol// kun gzhi'i rnam
258b5(rnying rgyud): shes ma rig gzhi// lhan cig gnas pa'i ma rig de// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gaN+DI// 'gyu ba'i yid kyi shes pa de// nyon mongs can gyi yid kyigazhi// nyon mongs 'bru ba'i nas bde// rdo lnga rnam par shes pa'i gnyi// phyi lha nang lta yid gnyis de// de khru
258b6(rnying rgyud): ba zhil med par bcad// chos gsangs so// rin po kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud lus/ 'khrul gzhi sad nas bcad pa'i le sti gsus par// dag dgasal ba'i cag ngas la// sems dpe rdo rjes yang gsol pa// 'khrul babs la zhing
258b7(rnying rgyud): ldog pa'i thabs// khyang bar chos ni yod dam med// de da gsol pa'i tshig gsan nas// gsang bdag chen pos lan bta pa// 'khrul ba bas lan tha dkang bsale// 'khrul pa ldog na hUM nas ldog/ sgo lnga yul lags la du
259a1(rnying rgyud): snang ba'i mtshan nyid shes pas ldog/ nyon mongs rnam lngar gsal ba'iH// blo zung 'a khrul par shes pas klog/ yid kyis nang du bltas panam// gro la 'dzin par shes pas ldog/ bden pang chos la ba tshom na/
259a2(rnying rgyud): mi bden chos la yang dag 'dzin// bden rdzun shes pa skyes pa'i tshe// ma rig 'khrul par shes pas ldog/ ci yang mi shes mi gsal tshe// gdams brgyud la thebs pas ldog/ snang yang mi 'geg mi bsgrub na// gyi yi 'khrul bsol ba yin//
259a3(rnying rgyud): gsal kyang yul la mi 'jug na// rten gyi 'khrul bsol ba yin// nang du bdag 'dzin mi rkyen// 'phang gi 'khrul pa sol ba yin// phyi nang shes pas ma bzung na// blo yi 'khrul pa sol ba yin// yang dag don la gdeng rnyed cing // 'dzin dang the tshom
259a4(rnying rgyud): ma gyes na// ma dge 'khrul bkrol ba yin// rig pa stong pa'i snying po can// snying po ngo yis zin pa'i tshe// rtsol bsrub 'khrul ba sol ba yin// rgyud kyi bya ba thong pa'i tshe// zhen chags 'khrul pa sol ba yin// gnyen po klong du gyur pa'i tshe// rkyen
259a5(rnying rgyud): gyi dayul bsol ba yin// ye shes klong du gyur pa'i tshe// ma rtogs 'khrul pa sol ba yin// ye shes rgyun chad med pa'i tshe// dum bu'i 'khrul pa sol ba yin// rtogs pa rang dang mi 'brul tshe// 'khrul pa thams cad ma spangs sol// zhes
259a6(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// rin po che 'khor lo'i rgyud pas/ 'khrul pa bsal thabs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de skad gsol pa'i tshig rjes la// sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// 'khrul pa sel nas blta ba'i don// nyams
259a7(rnying rgyud): su glang du yod dam med// de skad gsol ba'i tshig gsan nas// gsang bdag chen pos lan btab pa// 'khrul pa log nas ye shes 'char// 'khor ba'i shes pa ma sol na// rang gi ye shes ngos mi zin// snyam byed blo dang
259b1(rnying rgyud): mabral na// ngam gas tud la'achar mi ba// ngas nasakhrul pa ldog bas gnas// gang+gAs snang ba'i ye shes ni// rang bzhid dag pu'i lta ba yin// b+ha zal 'don pa med pa ni// ma bskrad sa ma'o smra ba yod// 'thum das/
259b2(rnying rgyud): mi sle ba ye shes ni// rtogs pa gdeng gi lta ba yin// mdzem bkol mi gnas na// yin min med pa'i lta ba yin// spros pa'i chos rnams shugs grol na// phyogs thal chen po'i blta ba yin// byin tog kha ru mI 'grin/
259b3(rnying rgyud): blta ba gdeng du tshul ba yid// gong 'og khyad par ma mthong na// thig le nyag gcigs lta ba yin// bzang den blang dor mi sten// 'khrul tog thams cad nub pa yin// snyam byed shes pa mi gyen// bro yi chos las grol ba yin/
259b4(rnying rgyud): sems la khu 'jogs mi zan// go rtogs nang nas shar ba yin// snang ba yul gyis mi gnod na// phyi yi sgo 'dogs chod pa yin// bden pa'i don la yid ches na// nang gi sgo 'dogs chod pa yin// sdug bsngal shes pa mi 'byung na// blta ba
259b5(rnying rgyud): gdad la thebs pa yin// dge zhig shes pa mi rkyen// bde me ga nad kyis zin pa phyin// 'byung ldog shes pa'i phyin// rig pa gnad la 'bas pa yin// 'khrul pa'i shes pa ma phyin// gdong gi gnang la phebs pa yin// rdu chen mos
259b6(rnying rgyud): ngang byung bdung la khebs pa'i // rig pa'i rtsal rnams rdzogs pan// stobs kyi gnang la phebs pa yin// stong brtsal par mamyong na// rig pa gdang la khebs pa med// rig pa gzung 'dzin mi ston// stong ba gnang la thebs pa yin/
259b7(rnying rgyud): rig steng ba dad mi byer// gnyis med gnad la bebs pa yin// gsal 'grib shes pa ma phyed// ma shes gnang la phebs pa yin// zhes gsungs so// rin pa zi'i 'khor la'i khyud las/ 'jal ba las ldog pa'i lta ba bstan pa'i le
260a1(rnying rgyud): sangs/ dun dgas lab chags pa// nga dun das padags pa// rtog pa das na du du su byas tha da ma ngamamang / degadugasol pa'i chog gsan dug// gas/
260a2(rnying rgyud): bdag chen pos lan btab ba// lha sgom bkol ba med pa la// lha bzhin gnas pa bsgom pa yin// skom bzhin 'char ba blta ba yin// blta rtogs bying ba'i skyon las grol// bsgom gnas rgod pa'i smon las grol// bying rgod sngon las
260a3(rnying rgyud): grol bas na// mi bzhos thos pa'i rang basbyin pan// mi gnas garnas pa sgob pa yin// me brgya'i rang po'i banom bya med// mi skyong pa nas ma tsal pa'i// ma bsgosapa rnon gyi stong po ca // chub rdzun pa babapa brjid// rbang /
260a4(rnying rgyud): 'brel ba'i skabs dang bral// lha bsgom d+ha snyoms bkol ba med// slo bsdu bcos bslad gsal 'grib med// ma bcos don gyi snying po can// rtsol bsgrub 'gyur ba'i gnas ma yin// ma bkol bsgom pa'i dngos yin te// ri bzhin ma bco
260a5(rnying rgyud): rang bzhi na gnas// log rgyan grol nas don rgya can// bsam gtan dang gnas don tan ldaH// kun nam sa ltos rang bzhin gnas// ti 'dzin nan dug rnam pa 'a mchog/ 'dzin nyams su byung ba'i chos// de nyid rnam pa thams cadang/
260a6(rnying rgyud): ma drug dang gas// 'ag sman ga da byasas// dedags gdas pa / thod pa the pa sbyin// ngas ga sa rgyam pams / rtson 'dalag cing gnas nga//
260a7(rnying rgyud): gang du mi 'brel zhing // med nas grol bag la yod// gyi dang nang gi 'khrul pa rnams// grol ba nyid ni yin ni napas// de dang mi 'jal don ldan no// 'khrul pa'i zhen pa las grol te// de rked nges rnyed gzhan da med// mi dmigs pas /
260b1(rnying rgyud): gtan bsgom par bya// rang la gnas pa'i ye shes ni// tog ge'i spyod yul ma yin te// phra zhing zhi ba la brtag tu med// zug rngu'i nad rnams 'joms mdzad pa// ting 'dzin sman gyi rgyal po yin// ces gsungs so// rin po che'i 'khor
260b2(rnying rgyud): lo'i rgyud las/ bsgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de skad gsol pa'i tshig rjes la// sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// lta bsgom bkol ba med pa la// gol sgrib gdang sha ji ltar bcad// de skad gsol pa'i
260b3(rnying rgyud): tshig gsan nas// gsang bdag chen pos lan btab pa// gang rtogs dus nas don gsal na// gol sgrib 'khrul pa'i chos med pas// rig nas rkyen gyis ga la tshugs// de skad gsungs pa'i tshig rjes la// sems dpa' rdo
260b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas yang gsol pa// rtogs nagol skye ba myed mor kyang // de matogs kyi gang ga la// golas sleb pa skar 'byung // de skad gsol ba'i tshig gastan nas// gsang bdag chen pos lan pa byu // de mardzogs kyi gang thug la/
260b5(rnying rgyud): go las sgrib pa gnyis su bstan// 'gro sgo nor pa'i go las yin// gnas don ma rtogs sgrib pa yin// sgo lhur 'khyams pas 'khrul pa yin// gong mas 'og tu 'gro sgo nor// go las zhes sungs bshad do// sgrib gnyis bya yi mig bzhin du/
260b6(rnying rgyud): ma bsgribs dag tu ngas bshad do// las go lams bsgribs theg pa rnams// rdzogs chen man ngag tshig gcig gis// gong 'og go la sgrib gdar sha gcad// 'phrang gsum nang du srungs btsud la// rdzong gsum nang du gtsigs la dbab/
260b7(rnying rgyud): rgyal po btson du bzung ba dang // blon po basbyar la gdon pa dang // dgra yi bu rnams gsang ba dang // dgra gnyen cho ma la phebs pa yin// ldog bcas gnyis kyis 'khrul byung na// 'khor 'das gol sgrib gdar shag cad// ces gsungs so//
261a1(rnying rgyud): gamam sa mas/ ma ga na ban // / zhin ga na na/ ma nas// sa mas
261a2(rnying rgyud): sa / / 'du nga sa ma tha ma
261a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin nyams blangs na// las dang bag cha kla bsgrib mi srid// rang byung ye shes nyams blangs na// mu rkyen chos la sgom gyi// lus ngag yi gsum ci s+yAd kyang // bde chen spong la 'gyur rdzog med// de rtogs nyams su blangs na de// gzung 'jo ma na nang
261a4(rnying rgyud): ldog par 'gyur// rig pagyogs ris myed pa'i phyir// gang ltar sdud kyang zhen mi 'byung // blun po dman pa'i snod gal min// lus ngag sems kyi spyod pa rnams// dman pa'i sems la bstan pa yin// dngos pa'i yid ces mung skyed par/
261a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshi ga la rgyo gtod pa// kun tu bzang po khas blangs kyang // golas 'khrul pa nyid du 'gyur// kun ta bzang por yongs mnyam yang // rtogs matogs la yongs mi mnyam// bkal med don du ma smad na// mun pa'i skye mched dag tu
261a6(rnying rgyud): bstan// ngo bo nyid kyi rnal 'byor ba// gang ltar gnas kyang grol bar 'gyur// mtsha ma 'khrul ba las grol te// de nyid nge skyed gzhanan med// gam sa blangs nges par grol bar 'gyur// mi srang nyams su blangs pa'i dod// 'tho 'dzin
261a7(rnying rgyud): dus rnams thams cad du// 'du 'bral med par rang bzhin gnas// byung ba'i chos ni dgag mi bya// med pa'i chos ni bsgru rgya// sangs pas sang par mi 'gyur te// bsgrubs pas 'grub pa dag la 'gyur// chu 'bras gzhan pas pa/
261b1(rnying rgyud): byung bas// s+thA 'thas med pa ye shes yin// 'khrul rgyan kyad nas don tan ldan// gang du gnas kyang ma 'bral cing // rtogs nus 'thul ba ga la yod// rtsi dang dang gi 'khrul ba rnabs// cheng du ma blangs grol bar 'gyur// dgos brjod/
261b2(rnying rgyud): nams 'byung ba yi// yid bzhin rin po che yi rgyud// de nyid mkhas las 'byung ba yin// log par rtog pa ga la yin// zhes gsungs so// ri nopo che 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ nyams su blangs pa'i spong ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// rin po
261b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo'i rgyud rdzogs so// // gdams pa'i rgya dang ldan par gyis// gdams pa'i rgyad dang mi ldan na// srid pa yi ni mtsho 'khrugs so// de phyir gdams pa'i cha rnams gces// / rgya gar skad du/ dz+nyA na gu h+ya nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ ye shes gsang
261b4(rnying rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i rgyung / ye shes gsang ba zugs kyi rang bzhin la lhag 'tshal lo// 'di skang bdag gis bshad pa'i ngas gcig na/ ye shes gsung pa'i gnas chos nyid kyi mda'/ mtha' bus med pa'i gzhal las khaden bcom ldan 'das rdzogs pa chen po
261b5(rnying rgyud): bzhugs te/ rang bzhin gyi 'khor dang / rang bzhin la lta ba'i 'khor dang // rang bzhin rtogs pa'i 'khor 'di lta ste/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / snang ba thams cad dang / yongs su rnal 'byor zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor pa chen po
261b6(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / sems dpa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba dang / shin tu rnal 'byor zhes bya ba dang / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang // ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ 'byed pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rjes thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas lha'i
261b7(rnying rgyud): dbang pos phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la 'di skad ces bskul to// gsung gi mnga' bdag thams cad kyis// rtsol ba'i theg pa mthar bton nas// rtsol med theg pa mi gsung ba// thugs rje chen po yal lam ci// skal ldan gdul bya mchis pas na/
262a1(rnying rgyud): yun lung theg pa gsung du gsol/ zhes zhus pa dang // de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad mgrin gcig tu// rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rdzas gsum sangs sras thams cadaH
262a2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje'i rang bzhin khyed yin pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad pa shar// gsung gi mnga' bdag thams cad kyi// ye shes rang bzhin khyod yin pas// thams cad byang chub sems su gsal// bde gshegs ma lus thams cad kyi// spu yi ngo
262a3(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pas// rmad byung rol pa'i sku ru shar// gsung gi mnga' bdag thams cad kyi// gsung gi bdag nyid rig pa'i gsung // rmad byung rol pa'i gsung du shar// tshig gcig don kun rdzogs pa'i bdag/ rin chen 'phrul gyi snying po'i sgo// skal ldan
262a4(rnying rgyud): rnams la bstan du gsol// rin chen 'phrul gyi thabs ldan pas// gang 'dod mthun pa'i sgo de nas// rtsol med dbyings dang 'phaphrad par gyis// byang chub sems kyi dngos po la// brjod pa'i tha snyad kun thal yang // ma rtogs sgo la tshig sgo nas// gsung
262a5(rnying rgyud): gi sgron mas gsal bar gyis// zhes gsungs so// de nas rdo rje sems dpas phyag na rdo rje thugs ka nas phyung nas// rin po che rang 'bar gyi 'khor lo lag tu gtad nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// gnyis med ye shes gsang ba'i don// byar
262a6(rnying rgyud): med mi rtsol ye sangs rgyas// dbu ma chen po drang po'i lam// 'dus pa'i tshogs la bstan par gyis// zhes gsungs so// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes/ rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che//
262a7(rnying rgyud): chogag spyod yul ma yin pas// bdag gis bzo ba shin tu dka'// ma rtogs pa la tshig sponas// mtshon nas rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// ci reg par ni rnam par dgrol// zhes klas pa dang / de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes/ shar phyogs rdo
262b1(rnying rgyud): rnam par gnon pa'i zhing khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba/ mi phyed pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems nyid rdo rje lta bu la// skye 'gag/ 'byung ba ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / de na
262b2(rnying rgyud): debazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje gsang bas bka' stsal pa/ sems nyid mi 'gyur rdo rje la// skye 'gag yod pa ma yin te// rnam rtog blo la skye 'gag byung // zhes gsungs so// de nas lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten
262b3(rnying rgyud): gyi khams rin po che snang ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zhabs zhes bya ba/ rang 'bar snang ba'i khri la bzhugs te/ nyid kyi 'khor la gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid ston cing bzhugs pa la/ sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol
262b4(rnying rgyud): to// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la// rgyu rkyen rtsol bas ma bsgrubs par// yon tan 'bras bu ji ltar 'char// zhes gsol pa dang / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zhabs kyis bka' stsal pa/ tak+Sha ka yi rgyan bzhin du// rgyu 'bras mthar
262b5(rnying rgyud): phyin gzhi nas rdzogs// thams cad dang byung snying po'i mchog/ gsang ba'i thabs gis rtogs gyur na// nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'bras bu 'char// zhes gsungs so// de nas nub phyogs na pad+ma brtsegs pa'i zhing khams na/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i 'od ces bya ba/
262b6(rnying rgyud): dri ma med pa'i pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs te/ nyid kyi 'khor la gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid skyon cing bzhugs pa la/ sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// sems nyid pad+ma ltar dag par// gzung 'dzin dri ma ji ltar byung // zhes gsol pa dang / bcom
262b7(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das pad+ma'i 'od kyis bka' stsal pa// pad+ma 'dam na gnas bzhin du// 'dam gyi skyon gyis gos pa med// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo ni// 'khor ba'i rtog par mi 'gyur te// rnam rtog blo la 'khor ba byung // zhes gsungs so// de nas byang phyogs rnam dag
263a1(rnying rgyud): grub pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten na/ de bzhin gshegs pa grub par snang ba zhes bya ba/ rang bzhin snang ba zhes bya ba'i gdan la bzhugs te/ nyid kyi 'khor pa chos sngags kyi de kho na nyid ston cing bzhugs pa la/ sems dpa' rdo rjes
263a2(rnying rgyud): 'di na ces gsol to// btsal med sems kyi rang bzhin la// 'gro don mdzad pa'i gar 'thung // zhes gsol pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa grab pa sdang bas bka' stsal pa/ radabyung ye shes rtogs gyur na// mdzad pa'i phyid rlabs dang las 'jar/
263a3(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs khyed rnams kyis/ thal ba kun gyis blugs kyi bzud// ye shes gsang btogs par gyis// zhes gsungs pa dang // de nas sems
263a4(rnying rgyud): pang rdo rje rten las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la zhus pa/ khyod ni gsung gi seng ge ste// ye shes gsang ba ma rtogs na// bim par yi 'bras bu 'dra// smin kyang 'bras bu mi 'byung bas// ye shes gsang ba rtogs par
263a5(rnying rgyud): gyis// thugs rje'i mnga' bdag khyod kyis bstan// de dag bdag gis ma rig pas// ye shes gsang ba bstan du gsol// zhes zhus pa dang / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' rdo rje danyon cig/ ye
263a6(rnying rgyud): shes gsang ba'i rang bzhin ni// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med// nam mkha' bzhin du kun tu khyab// ma rig ye shes tha dad med// ma rtogs rtogs pa lam du gcig/ ye shes gsang ba'i mtshan nyid ni// rig 'od gsal rnam par
263a7(rnying rgyud): dag/ nam tog ye shes nyid du gnas// gni bdag rang lcags rin chen mdzod// mabyang sa btsal gdod nas gnas// ye shes gsang pa'i rnam pa ni// gatshogs snang la ngas gzung med// mi dmigs sum sprin grub de// rkang / gsal ni bskab
263b1(rnying rgyud): yin// zhes gsungs so// ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang ba'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la/ sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// gang dag ji ltar gang
263b2(rnying rgyud): rnams la// zabs cing gang gis rnam par dbye// zhes nus pa dang / de bzhin ga she gapa rnam par sna mdzad kyis bka' stsal ba/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// snang srid sdo bcung dkun la khyab// ces rnams kun kor bar shar// sang sa cas
263b3(rnying rgyud): gsung ye shes thugs// sems can lus ngag yid la khyab// thams cad dbyer med byeng chub sems// de ltar dag pa'i don dgan// thams cad sgra gsung thags yin na// rang byung lnga ru snang ba la// rang byung nyid du ma rig pas// zhen pa
263b4(rnying rgyud): rkyen ci log/ 'bras bu khams gsum sems can byung // dpe ni nam mkha' ga thAste// mtha' dang dbus med gdod nas dag/ sgyu yis ma bsgrubs ye nas grub// rkyen gyis mi shigs 'gyur ba med// phyin med par le gsal khab// 'byung cher bani
263b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun// nam mkha'i dang du 'dus pa bzhin/ snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus kun// rang bzhin med de gdod nas dag/ 'a ba nyon mongs chag snang kun/ ma btsalas byung rgyus khor gang / rjes kyang mtshan 'das byang thub sems/ mi 'du lda jo da 'an ma/ khang
263b6(rnying rgyud): son de ste// gdod nas da ga sa pakra// bsam du me dbu skom dang thal// mi bas ma rang bzhin lhag par bzhag/ mi bad+ma mi spros nang bzhag/ me lus 'dus pa snying po 'don// g+ha lis ma bskyed byen dang byu// bden pazhi rtogs pa'i rlung bral/
263b7(rnying rgyud): gdod nas yod pas tshogs mi gsog/ ye nas dag pas sgri mi sbyang // dag pa gsum la dag ma sras// rgya la yan lag sprin mo byed// ye nam sangs rgyas srun gyis grub// nyis med sems ca rang bzhin la// nges med dag gis slaba'i byed//
264a1(rnying rgyud): rigs bzhi 'dod pa'i rtsol ba bral// mtshon med sems kying bo la// shes rab thabs kyis mtshon du med// rgyu 'bras bral ba'i rig pa la// dbyings dang ye shes rgyu 'bras med// 'byung ba lnga la rag ma lus// sku gsung
264a2(rnying rgyud): thugs la rten mi bca'// rig pa'i blo yis ma dpyad na// rang bzhin thog tu phebs par 'gyur// gdod nas ma cos shin tu dge// bsam dang bral bas de bzhin zhog/ sems kyis rig pa rtogs gyur na// sems kyi rtogs pa bsam mi khyab/
264a3(rnying rgyud): rgud 'gres tshig gis ma bkrol bar// gtan tshigs rigs pas 'byin par nus// thos pa bsam pa bsgom pa gsum// rtogs bzla skar nyi ma bzhin// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo ni/ dman pa'i sems kyi mi rtog te// gtan tshigs gsum gyis
264a4(rnying rgyud): shes par bya// rang gis rig pa gsal ba ste// rang bzhin rig pa cir yang snang // bdag nyid snang stong tha dad med// bsgrub bya dag gi rang bzhin ni// 'khrul pa byang chub sems su shes// bdag nyid chen po'i gtan tshigs kyis// thams cad
264a5(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems su shes// gang ltar gnas kyang chos nyid do// dbyings dang ye shes gtan tshigs ni// dbyings ni dag pa'i rgyu yin te// ye shes 'bras bu nyid du gsal// gcig tu 'dus pas gzung 'dzin med// rang bzhin dpe dang don
264a6(rnying rgyud): dang ni// gtan rdzogs bzhi ru shes par bya// zhes gsungs so// ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las/ byang chub sems kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces
264a7(rnying rgyud): zhus so// khyod ni smra ba'i seng ge ste// tshal bral bstan pa thugs la rdzogs// byams mgon thugs rje chen po yis// skal ldan 'dus pa'i tshogs chen la// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// gang lags rab bstan du gsol// zhes
264b1(rnying rgyud): gsol ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal ba/ nyon pa gsum dang rim pa brgyad// byin ci log gsum 'gro drug la// ye shes gsang ba nyid du bstan// snang ba ma bcos mos byas// reg pa sa / ngas yongs na
264b2(rnying rgyud): da/ sa/ sa /
264b3(rnying rgyud): ga pa pasu ma ga rgyugs// gsang byugs pate dz+nyAn / rtog pa yang lezhe na shogs med rje ba sems sa ga/ ci// bams pa pa 'i khyo bzhed// chos rgyu dag
264b4(rnying rgyud): pas/ ma bcos ma bzhin drug pa yin// chos glang nga bzhin spos med pas// ye shes yul thos med gsal// des nabyed gyis rlabs kyis bshad// longs spyod nga rig nyi yin te// gzugs su snang ba rnam pa yin// 'dod pa'i bden pa thams cad
264b5(rnying rgyud): dang / srud kun ma lus than mong gis// bde ba ngos 'dzin dang reg kyang // rig pa nyid ni gdod na sa rdzogs// bsam gtan bzhi yi bde ba yang // khams gsum lha yaM longs spyod de// sems kyi bde ba rang bzhin chung // skye mched sra bzhi'i
264b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin de// rang byung byang chub sems la rdzogs// gnyis 'don ldan pa'i bde ba dang // gnyis rdzogs ldan pa'i mthur gyen kyang // ma bsgrubs bde ba rang bzhin rdzogs// dag pa gsum dang gnyis su blta// bskrad pa byin rlabs bde ba yang // sems
264b7(rnying rgyud): nyid rtogs pa nyid la gnas// gsal bya'i rim pas don mdzang cing // 'dod pa'i stobs kyis nye bar bsgrub// bgrod pa'i rim gyis thob par 'gyur// bde thabs dang shes rab kyang // rang rig kun mkhyen nyid la rdzogs// dbyings dang ye shes
265a1(rnying rgyud): b+hab dang // ting na shes rab rtswa ze yang // rtswanang byengs rdzogs pa// 'bras thal gas dkyi 'khor da// 'bras gnyis med sems mardzogs// des na mangs kyang rdzogs pa yin// meganas sal /
265a2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin ni// la bcos mos srur bzhugs tsam na// gnas ni yang dag 'og min te// 'khor ni byang chub sems kyi 'khor// thos med byin drabs phyogs bcur gsal// bstan pa phyi nang byasang ba gsun// drang byung ye shes cha mthun pas// ma bcos dang byung rtag pa yin//
265a3(rnying rgyud): chos sku rang byung spros med pas// chos kyi sku yi bstan pa bshad// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad dag/ snang srid snod bcud ma lus ga/ chos nyid dang las mag yos pas// sems nyid chos sku'i zhing khams yin// longs spyod sku yi zhing khams ni// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad de//
265a4(rnying rgyud): spyod kyang ma chags longs spyod yin// bzod ldanas thob 'khor de la// dgongs pas sku dang ye shes bshad// ting 'dzin rig pa'i gdeng gis go// mtshan ma'i sku gsung mi mnga' bar// bskrun pa phye ba'i gsang sngags gsum// snang ba cha mthun yod
265a5(rnying rgyud): pas na// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bstan par bshad// gnas ni rig pa'i 'og min te// rig pas bkra thob rnams la// rang gi ngo bor gsal bar ston// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i mdzad pa ni// rang 'dod 'bras bu'i mthar thug kyang // ma bcos
265a6(rnying rgyud): pa la ma reg pas// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i mdzad par shar// gdul bya dman pa'i 'khor de la// rgyal thabs spyi blugs dbang bsrung nas// thob med byang chub sems dang phrad// ma bgrod rtog pa'i 'jim la ma bsgral// bde ba phrag brgya'i don
265a7(rnying rgyud): thob nas// zhing khams thams cad bde bar spyod// rgyal thabs spyi thugs ma thob par// rangs thob kyang mthar ma phyin// des na lu/ bstan bla ma yis// rgyal sras skal ldan slob ma la// pra khrid sems kyi don bstan pas// sems nyid rin chen
265b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis med la// bskur ba'i cha gnyis mi tog kyang // badz+ra don smad pa'i man ngag sbyin// thugs rje'i rang bzhin sprul bar shar// sna tshogs gdul bya'i bsam pa bzhin// lam gnyis rdzob kyang 'gro drug 'khyams// bstan pa sde sno dag sum du bzhan zhi
265b2(rnying rgyud): khams stong gsum 'jig rten khams// thug rje'i gnas la nges pa med// ma bcos rang byung ye shes ni// rang byung ye shes lngar snang la// phyin ci log gi bsam pa yis// ye shes nyid du ma rtogs te// yang dag zhen pa lnga ru mthong // na
265b3(rnying rgyud): pa lnga yi 'bras bu ni// khams gsum sems can nyid du shar// ngo bo sems la 'gyur ba med// 'dod chags las kyi rnam smin gyis// lha yi gnas su skyes nas kyang // ltung ba'i sdug bsngal yang dag myong // 'dod chag dngos la ma grub sas// 'dod na pa ye shes nyid du dag
265b4(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems la bskyod pa med// nga rgyal las kyi rnam smin gyis// lha min gnas su skyes nas kyang // 'thab rtsod sdug bsngal dngos myong yang // nga rgyal ngo bo shes pa na// nga rgyal ma spangs gnas su dag// de bas nga rgyal mi gnas stong // phrag dog/
265b5(rnying rgyud): las kyi rnam smin gyis// mi yi gnas su skye 'gyur nas// sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong 'gyur yang // phrag dog chos kyi dbyings yin pas// phrag dog ma spangs gnas su dag/ des na byang chub dbyings mi bskyod// ser sna'i las kyi rnam sbyin gyis// yi
265b6(rnying rgyud): gla bkres skom gnas su skye// bkres skom sdug bsngal myong 'gyur yang // ser snam bcos byang chub sems// sems nyid rang bzhin stong pa'i phyir// des na dpying la 'gyur ba med// gti mug las kyi rnam smin gyis// dud 'gro'i gnas su blun lcags myong// rig pa phra mo'i chos shes
265b7(rnying rgyud): kyang // gti mug ma be cos byang chub sems// yul yang de ltar rig pas na// gti mugs spangs gnas su dag/ zhe sdang las kyi rnam smin gyis// dmyal ba'i gnas su sdug bsngal myong // zhe sdang ye shes nyid du shes// thams cad de ltar shes
266a1(rnying rgyud): bas na// ci yang men par chos rnams shes// thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan gyi mchog/ snying po don gyi chos rnams gas pa// bstan pa tu 'bras theg pa gsum// 'dul mdang ston pa drug snang te// lha yi dbang po sa sa
266a2(rnying rgyud): myi ton pa sri thub 'dzin// mi yi thub pa thab dbang po// dud 'gro'i ston pa gsapa byed 'bar// ya~M dgas rton pa stobs kyi bdag/ bsi la byed 'bang bzugs rdo'i bdag// gdul bya 'gro badrug yod pas// ye shes rnam bajug tu sharang // gang zag to
266a3(rnying rgyud): mas rdzogs pa// gang dang mthun smonas ston// zhes gyi spangs so// ye shes gas pa'i rgyun la sa/ thugs pa bstan pa'i se gegs pa// denas sems dpa rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzadas 'a
266a4(rnying rgyud): nga ces gsol to// khyab bdag ma bcos spyan grubam// rtsol med gnas pas mngon sangs rgyas// phyog pa ris mi mnga' nyi ma ltar// ye shes 'od zer rdzogs brgyar 'das// snying rje don mdzad kun gyis thAb// phyogs rjes mi myanga'
266a5(rnying rgyud): mchog gis// rim pa brgyad lags da ba'i di// 'dus pa'i tshogs la bstan du gsol// zhes gsol ba dang / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdza rjes dka' stsal pa// gsam la ngos bzang mimanga' nye// brgyad kyis dang 'dod gnyis
266a6(rnying rgyud): kyis log/ gcig gis ma rig khas mi len// drug gi lnga yi 'bras bu myong // de sa na ye shes gsang ba yin// chos sgra gdod nas dag pa la// btags pa'i gzung 'dzi na dang gis med// des no chos nyid gas ba yin// longs spyod mig pa
266a7(rnying rgyud): pa la// phyi nang med par sems nyid gsang // chos can ma yin chos nyid min// ci yang ma yin mi nang nog/ 'khrul pa rna tshogs cing ston kyang // zhen pa'i bsam pa ma gtogs pa// yang dag dngos por grub pa med// deseng ma
266b1(rnying rgyud): bcwas mthong yang // zag pa'i mtshan nyid thul ma yin// sdang ba brtags pa zhin mong kyang // ma bcos spang ba brtags pa min// rol pa kun gang su ma // rtsol med sum bde mchog zad// je 'gyur dang baban po yin// ma btsas ta/
266b2(rnying rgyud): gru ba chen po la// nges pa med pas gas bar bshad// gang zhig gnyis mthong ba yis ni// gzugs med phrar rab rdul du mthong // sems le rdul med dun kyi log/ bdag med nges bzung chos nyid gsang // gang zhig tu mthunan
266b3(rnying rgyud): nas ni/ lnga chos la gcig ma rtogs// rten 'brel chos la nges brtags pas// tu med chos kyi don ma mthong // gnyis med sku yi ngo bo la// bden gnyis lta bar rnam gyi ste// don dam stong pa'i dngos po med// rig bzhi'i
266b4(rnying rgyud): gtan tshigs dag gis tshol// don gyi ngo bo rtogs nas ni// zhi gnas gang zag 'dod pas bsgom// lhag mthong 'phel ba'i skabs su 'dod// lam gnyis sbyor ba'i rim pa ste// don mthong rigs pa'i rtogs pa spangs// sra ba'i rim pa
266b5(rnying rgyud): bcu yi bar// shin tu phra ba'i sgrib pa la// mthar thugs yi sbyor bas gcod// rang 'dod rtogs pa'i mthar thug yin// des na bskye gnas drang ba las// bzod med bgrod pas ye shes gsang // btsal med bcal bas grub pa med// bdag
266b6(rnying rgyud): dang mi mthun log pa bzhin// des na 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs khyed// btsal med chos la btsal mi bya// bgrod med chos la rang bzhin zhong // rgyal rtags phyi bas mthong ba ni// mtho 'jam dma' rtsu ba rigs gsum 'dod// dag pa gsum gyi
266b7(rnying rgyud): zhugs nas// dam tshig ye shes rje 'bangs lha// rtogs pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa// nges par mthong yang bcos ma'i sa// ma thob rang gyon me long tshul// rim ma mchig char rim gyis 'jug/ rgyal thabs kyi thugs tshangs pa'i dbang // skad cig nyid kyis rdzogs
267a1(rnying rgyud): shA/ sangs rgyas// ma rtogs nas gnas thams ca dang / denyid tshe dang ldan pa yin// gzhinas 'azlas pa yin pa don// dmachog ye shes thogs pa// mtshan ma dngos po na 'i tshul// mthong ba'i dgongs ca ba dang nga/
267a2(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma med bsgoms pas// stong nyid la sogs ye shes 'grub// gcig la'ang sgra lnga 'byung ba ste// lnga dang de gnyis de bzhin no// de nyid dgrangs mthur sprul pa ste// de yi rgyud la'ang byin brlabs te// de las sprul pa bsam mi khyab// skal ldan rnams
267a3(rnying rgyud): sems la snang // yo ga rang 'dod bsam pa yis// mthar thug 'bras bu yin 'dod kyang // de yang rtsol ba'i 'bras bu yin// ma bcos ji bzhin ma rtogs pas// rang snang ma bcos yul byas nas// 'jug pa'i rim pa snga ma bzhin// brdal
267a4(rnying rgyud): don smad pas rgyal gral bzhag/ bya ba'i spyod pa dag gis gnas// byin brlabs brgyad pa'i lta bar 'dod// rtsol bas 'jug dang gnyis kas len// yo ga'i sgyid la gang gnas pa// 'bras bu lam du 'jug pa ste// rang 'dod rtogs pa'i/
267a5(rnying rgyud): sa yin yang // ma bcos tha ma'i sa ma rtogs// smin kyang 'bras bu mi 'byung ste// bim par yi 'bras bu bzhin// bskyed pa ma hA yog ni// gzhi nas 'bras bu de bzhin te// tha ma la gtsang sde'i lam du 'dod// gzhi nas 'bras bu yin pa'i don// bskyed
267a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rim pa brtsam pa dang // rdzogs pa'i rim pas 'grub pa yin// la mo gnyis grol dang thabs gnyis te// re re'ang bskyed dang rdzogs pa ste// grol ba'i lam la bzhi yin no// thams la ma nang dang gsang ba gnyis// gnyis bzhi brgyad du ldan pa ste/
267a7(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis dag tu shes par bya// lta spyod dkyil 'khor dbang dam dang // grub pa phrin las las rim ni// phye dang nang dang gsang ba ste// rang bzhin gnas dang col bas 'jug/ rgyud kyi dngos po gsum du bstan// dang ngo bskyed pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom/
267b1(rnying rgyud): 'byed pa ga su rdzogs pa'i bskyed// zhabs dang sgru bas des na sa// das sa na// sol dgel lag yang da gsabs// de thag tu shAn kyis thub// na gas ma la gang 'grub//
267b2(rnying rgyud): la'adu// de nyid ngogs pas nyid de// gas ba'i po zang ma bsam// lugs ma dkyil la sa te sa dga' ba'o// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor mid// spyis padrug da dang / dasas pa a ya rang bzhin te/ ma
267b3(rnying rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo dag la brgyad// de dkyil dngas mA ga su mA dag ste// lnga dbus thig le byang chub sems// chos nyid gsum dang ye shes gcig/ rang rlung dag tu shes par bya// de nyid ci 'drang sems pa na// chos nyid rtsa ya 'od ser/
267b4(rnying rgyud): dbyibs zlum po dngul tho bzhin// sa tsan su tri t+te ba s+ho// de dag ga sum gyi bdog ni// b+ha 'og zur bya lta bang gnas// ye shes rtsala'od mthing ga/ zag par shel slong bzlas pa'adra// sa pon sbyi po banan+da/ rje rjo da
267b5(rnying rgyud): thag pa 'dri// tshul ni dpe mas shes par bya// sa bon zhing po zeg+sa / gtogams pan ma la sogs// rtogs pas sre shes skrag sung zhugs// gnyis su med pas pamig pa rin// thezag padeng gnas n-i// rnam shes brnya 'i nyid ste/
267b6(rnying rgyud): skye ba ba ni du shes par \u0f7f// snyigasum gsum la gnyis sum+b+ha// rnam shos drab ga rgyal dang mthun// grang gis gang byed de bzhin no// de yi pa rtag gnas na// bde ba'i rtags rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// g.yo zhing 'bar na rtsol grod// rna
267b7(rnying rgyud): zhig de ltar gas la 'gyur na// snying po gsum dang sa bon drug/ ye shes rang bzhin 'od du'abar// thig le rang bzhin med par thim// rgyub rigs kyi phal gnas// dbugs sogs rang bzhin med gyur nas// rtse dbugs nam mkha' ltung dang //
268a1(rnying rgyud): ye shes khyab gdal kun tu bzang // chos dbyings gsal ba'i go skabs 'byed// gsang ba'i shes rab yum gyi dbyings// gnyis dang drug cu'i dkyil na bzhugs// shes rang thabs la snyoms par 'jug/ tha
268a2(rnying rgyud): rgyas btab dkyil 'khor yin// lnga yi rang bzhin nyid du blta// 'tsho dang 'phang ba steng 'og tu// steng gi snying po bsgral byas pas// bde ba chen po'i mchod pa yin// de nyid thig le mnyam sbyor bas// drug dang bcu yi dkyil du ste// dkyus
268a3(rnying rgyud): ris ni// badreb chen po stobs par byed// myo ba sod nams kyis/ su sa rnams skye ma ring ldang ba// rol moSh+NI de bamang dag gis// ba bu chen po chen las 'gro/ s+yAmra thA Takra ni 'a kyil 'khor na// mig yo dang
268a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i yid// kun gyi dngos yin kun gyi gtso// bcu dang bzhi ni mngon rdzogs pa// gsum dang gnyis su yang dag gnas// kun gyi dngos por bdag nyid gnas// gsang ba'i lam la gang gnas pa// mtshon byed reg ma'i bde ba yis// lhan cig skyes pa
268a5(rnying rgyud): dga' ba rtogs// bde ba gsal la mi rtog pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa yin kyang // de yis don rnams mi 'thob ste// rgyal dang de yi cha bzhin no// shes pa dbang sogs glo bur bas// rang gnas ye shes mi rtog ste// 'dzin pas rang rig mi rtog bzhin
268a6(rnying rgyud): dngos 'dzin zhen pa'i rang rig gis// lhun grub rang rig don mi mthong // rangs thob nas ma bcos pa// snga ma bzhin te 'jug pa'ang 'dra// mthar phyin a nu yo ga la// rang bzhin dbyings dang ye shes la// 'khrul pa 'khor dang rang rgyud pa// bde
268a7(rnying rgyud): gshegs chos dbyings ma bcos gsal// rang bzhin snang ba bzhir gnas pa// bde gshegs snang ba 'bras bu yin// 'khor gyi snang ba lam pa ste// lam la phyi nang gsang ba gsum// cig car rim pa'ang de bzhin no// rim par 'jug pa'i tshul gyis
268b1(rnying rgyud): ni// bskyed par btan par gyur nas nI// rdzogs pa'i don la 'jug par b+hA// mos pas nang yang de bzhin no// gsang mdzi ngan ladzan paH/ bsgom// 'bras bu dbyings dang ye shes la// rang 'dod 'bras bu zab rjod kyang // mthar thug 'bras tra
268b2(rnying rgyud): mA yin// e ma'o me nas gsang ba'is// rtsol ba'i lam gyis thob ma yin// 'gro drug zhen pa'i drang zad dang // mu stegs rang bsam log pa dang // brgyad kyis rang 'dod dbyings la bsdus// phyi nang med la sgo bsdu byas// ngo bo mang la dmigs
268b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin byas// rang byung nyid la rgyu yis btsal// ma bcos ci yang ma yin la// cir yang 'dzin pa'i bsam pas brtags// bzod med 'bras bu ldan grub la// lam brgyad bgrod pas bgrod med bslad// des nam bcos dngos po la// log rdzog
268b4(rnying rgyud): na pa'i blo yis ni// ji ltar de pyad kyang ma yin pas// ma dpyad rang bzhin bzhag pas go// dpyad med sems la dpyad pas na// ma yin log ste gzhan lta bzhin// zhes gsungs so// ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gang la gsang ba bstan pa'i
268b5(rnying rgyud): le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzod la/ 'di skad ces gsol to// thugs rje'i bdag pos gang gsungs pa// 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis rtogs pani// sems kyi rang bzhin la gnas
268b6(rnying rgyud): la// zhen drug log gsum rtsol brgyad kyis// de nyid rang bzhin gsang bar gsungs// gsum la ngos bzung med pas gsang // thams cad kun la gsang bas na// de nyid gang gis shes par 'gyur// gsung gi mnga' bdag khyod kyis kyang /
268b7(rnying rgyud): gan lags ba ji ltar rtogs// zhes gsol ba dang / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzod kyis bka' stsal pa// theg chen sems kyi rang bzhin ni// sgra dang tha snyad kun 'das kyang // snod ldan rtogs par 'dod pa yis// gtan
269a1(rnying rgyud): tshogs tshad ma gsum gyis na// de togs pa'i thabs su bshad// brazlal rdzogs lang rig pa'i rnams// blon cog rdung ba'i man ngag byasum// ye shes rtog pa'i rig pa'i mchog/ thabs chen chung nga bya sa
269a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// mkha' khyab byang chub sems lung gis// snang srid sems su gtan la 'bebs// ye shes gsang ba'i ngo bo ston// bdag nyid gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ston// lung gsum snang bas ston pa'i bka'// yin pas nga yi bka' dang mthun//
269a3(rnying rgyud): reg pas nyams su len pa nA// yid ches rig pa'i gtan tshigs so// rnam gsum lung gi ngo bo ni// sems nyid rig pa'i chos yin no// thams cad sems su 'dus pas na// sems ma yin pa'i chos mi snang // ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ni/
269a4(rnying rgyud): sems la sdang phyir sems yin te// sems nyid rig pa ma yin na// de nyid ji ltar snang bar 'gyur// tha dad mthong bar brtags pa te// bag chags log pas 'khrul tsam na// med kyang log par ldang ba ste// dung la ser por mthong ba bzhin//
269a5(rnying rgyud): nyid ser po ma yin te// ji ltar de la ser por mthong // des na ser po'ang yin 'dod nas// dung la ser po yod pa na// ma 'khrul shes pas cis mi mthong // zhen rtog 'dzin pa'i dbang gis na// brtags pas sna tshogs dag tu mthong // dang po mtshan
269a6(rnying rgyud): ma'i rang rig ste// gnyis pa med pas rang rig yin// gnyis pas gnyis ka med pa ste// mtshan gzhi med pa'i mtshan nyid ni// mi srid me med tsha ba bzhin// gsum la zhen pa'i rang rig ste// rang rig bde ba'i don la zhe na// zhen pas ma bcos don
269a7(rnying rgyud): mi mthong // gzhis ma bcos rang rig ni// ngos bzung med pas gang yang min// ye shes rol pa rang snang la// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// rol pa ye shes rang snang dang // rtog pa'i zhen pa sna tshogs pa// bye zag ma shes gti mug po//
269b1(rnying rgyud): byang thung sems kyi lung gis ni// thams cad sems su gtan la 'debs// des na byang chub sems kyi phung // ma bcos sems kyi rang bzhin la// byang grub sems kyi rang rig ste// byang chub snying por de ma thag// rig pa'i tshad ma nyid kyis shes/
269b2(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i tshad ma ma skyes na// sgra yis tshad mchi bstan kyang // pra yi don dang de 'phrid nas// bla don rjes su rtogs mi 'gyur// phyi la rtog pa dre gnas kyang // rang gi mtshan nyid de ma yin// rig pa'i tshad mas don mdzang na// de'i
269b3(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i don ldan pas// rlung sogs cang ma rnams mi dgos// de ltar de ni rang bzhin no// zlob tshul rim pa ma yin te// ma bzod cig cher 'jug pa yis// de bzhin gni las ma g.yos pas// mthar byin ga la
269b4(rnying rgyud): g.yos paskyed// rdzogs pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin no// brda'adon med pas mthar byin kyang // 'dzin pa drug la khyen pa ste// rtog pa sems shes pa la// b+h+yo ma thag pas mi // sa paskye ba gsum yin pas/ thong ba cog ga pa gas gang
269b5(rnying rgyud): po gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin// chu drag 'bab pa'i dpe yis bstan// myur dang dal bas 'bab zla 'dra// gnyis pa la ni mi g.yo ba// rgya mtsho'i gting bzhin mi g.yo'o// gsum pa bzhi pa 'bras bu'i nyams// mnya ma nyi ye shes lcu
269b6(rnying rgyud): kyis grub// sdang pa rnam rtog cir mi blta// dran pa kun spangs ye shes nyid// zin pas rtsol ba'i nad sbyangs te// kun gyis gnas par bzhag pa yin// rin chen brgyud pa shis pa'ang // thob dpon thob ma'i bye brag dang // sngon du 'gro dang
269b7(rnying rgyud): tshad ldan pa// bstan pa'i don la bzhag tshul lo// de yi yon tan dbye ba dang // phrin las dam tshi gdon bzhin no// rgyud dang mdo sde thugs la rdzogs// bka' gzhung rig pa'i don la mkhas// dman pa'i blo grangs khyad par kun mkhyen pa/
270a1(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i shes rab ting 'dzin da la gnas// rdzas dang 'brel ba mi gtong ba zin ldeng mo bzhin// thugs rje sogs ris mi mang dkun la snyoms// dman pa'i sangs rgyas re thag lus pa'is// slob dpan rnam pa na
270a2(rnying rgyud): bstan// brda' don phrad pa'i slob dpon ni// rang rgyud ma bcos nAm dag pas// don dang 'brel pa'i sgra tshig gis// ye shes rig pa'i ngo bo ston// phye ba med pa'i brda don spad// de ltar ma yin brda' don thal// mnor nges pa'i slob dpon gyis
270a3(rnying rgyud): tha dad ma yin slob ma la// sgra dang mtshan ma mi mnga' bar// ji bzhin rig pa'i ngo bo bstan// myi tog brda dron go zhing rtogs// bde gshegs kun gyi ngo bo'o// sems can kun gyi dngos gzhi yin// de yi stobs kyis she gsal zhing // de nyid
270a4(rnying rgyud): la de gnas na// don rnams rig pa'i phyag rgya can// mi g.yo rnam dag sman chen gyis// gcod rnying ye shes nyid du sbar// 'khor ba rnam par dag pa ste// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// dug chen snyan du btul ba ltar// 'khor
270a5(rnying rgyud): ba ye shes nyid du gsal// snying po don gyi de nyid ni// gang ltar ci yang ma yin pas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i dgongs pa la// bden par gzigs pa mi mda' la// de bzhin mun par gzigs pa'ang min// thams cad gang yang ma mamed pas
270a6(rnying rgyud): snying po don gyi ngo bo mkhyen// ma bcos thugs kyi phrin las can// cis kyang bcos med ni sa mi g.yo// gdod nas dag pa'i chos nyid la// dran pa rkyen gyis de bzhin gnas// lhun grub sems la rtsol ba med// rang byung ye shes na rkyen
270a7(rnying rgyud): med// mi gnas thugs la gyi nang med// stong pa'i ye shes dngos po med// me lode lta bu'i ye shes ni// shes bya kun la mngon phyogs med// mnyam nyid ye shes che chung med// so sor rtogs pas ma 'dres gsal/
270b1(rnying rgyud): nan tan thugs rje'i dngos// rang byung ye shes rtag gcig la// yon tan ca nas du ma dpags// rang rig nyid la yul med pas// yul gyis bskyed pa'i ye shes min// rang byung nyid la rgya med pas// r+g+ha yis bskyed pa'i ye shes min
270b2(rnying rgyud): lhan grub rnyir la col med pas// rtsol bas bskyed pa'i ye shes min// nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes la// phyogs ris med par ye gdal ba// sman gyis grub pa'i phrin las yon// nam dag dbyings la gnas bzhi du// yongs la
270b3(rnying rgyud): nyams pa'i thugs rje 'byung // 'gro ba gang gi ngo dag tu// gang la 'tshams pa'i thugs rje 'byung // skal ldan gdul bya gnas pa na// thugs rje gdul bya bzhin du 'byung // gdul bya gang yang mi gnas na// thugs rje'i mdzad pa gang
270b4(rnying rgyud): 'chang // gang gis skal ldan gdul bya la// thugs rje gzhan zhig 'dod pa ni// rang nyid thugs rjer ma rtogs te// gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i blo yis brtags// thugs rje gzhan la 'char na ni// sdug bsngal drag po'i 'khor ba la// rgol pa'i
270b5(rnying rgyud): thugs rje yal la ma hrI// nim zhig dang myad drug tsas na// thugs rje gzhan gyis ci zhig \u0f7f// rtog pa pa ga sdu gdul ba la// yin pa dge pa'i thugs rje 'char// 'pho 'dul thugs rje'i phrin las so// da mchog yid bzhin den poH//
270b6(rnying rgyud): mtsho'i pha rol stsol ba'i grwa// ma bcos rig pa'i chos nyid la// mi 'gyur ye shes gsal bar gnas// col bral rig pa'i dam tshig go// dam tshig mi ldan rdo rteni// bka' rlung don la mkhas gas la yang // khrel ma g.yang du 'brel ba bzhin/
270b7(rnying rgyud): bdag gzhan rdo rje'i khab tu 'gro// des nadam tshig gzhung ldan ni// 'jig rten grags ngor chos mi gtong // 'brel ba rdzas kyi ched ma yin// bdag gzhan gnod pa'i las mi byed// kun la snyoms pa'i thugs kyis gnas// 'jig rten 'brel
271a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i ched mi byed// ma bcos dbyings la mi 'gyur brtan// ye shes ga deng gis mgrin par// chags pang zhen pa'i las mi byed// sems nyid ye shes rnam dag la// gnang bkag chos yod ma yin yang /
271a2(rnying rgyud): zhen pas ye shes ma rtogs par// lhag pa'i spyod pa gtso cher 'dzin// de nyid don ldan legs pa che// slob ma'i bye brag gnyis ldan pa// brda dron spang ba'i slob ma ni// sdod ldan mchog gces su 'dzin// sems nyid dag pas gdeng byang
271a3(rnying rgyud): nas// d+ham tshig mi srang tha ma la sems// r-ing rgyung ngan pas dregs pa dang // thos pa chung ba'i blo blam dang // wAn dag brgyad chen 'dzag pa dang / ye nas blo 'phang dma' ba dang // 'jig rtenabya pa'i rgyu bsgrub dang // pra cor smra zhing mkhas 'dod dang /
271a4(rnying rgyud): srog tu mi 'dzin dang // man ngag bslab byar mi sems la// rdzogs chen rna brgyad bstan byas na// 'dam shong gling gi dur khrod d+ha// mkha' 'pho naldan 'dra 'a bzhin// 'chi ba'i dus kyi sngon rol du// shaM khrag mngon du za bar byed// gzhung du me
271a5(rnying rgyud): sman rdzob ma ne// grib bzhin 'khor yang spang bar bya// lhas srog thal yang khadra dbyung min// 'dra 'thal byung yang las kyis byung // yon tan de ldan slob ma ni// stong gsum btsal yang gcig kyang dkon// mang yang gsu pa las 'da' mi bya// man drag/
271a6(rnying rgyud): rmyi la thebs cig la bstan// bskal pa grangs med sngon rol nas// rdzogs chen don la spangs sbyangs pa// ye shes gsang ba'i snod du bsngags// sgo nga'i nang du khyud phrug ltar// 'khor ba nyid du ye sangs rgyas// sgong chag mkha' la 'phung bya bzhin//
271a7(rnying rgyud): tog pas ma bcos phra ma'is// rgya mtsho'i bcud bsdus bdud rtsi bzhin// bka' yi btud b.lus rdzogs chen 'di// snod ldan dang tshul bzang la bstan// dbang dang sdod brtags cho ga dang // gsol ba gad ba dang gnang ba byin// sngon du 'gro ba'i ram
271b1(rnying rgyud): ngag sugasas sa na// rlu rnanapa sa sa ldas// nas na// mnas lanags / da pag shAn pa dang na// //
271b2(rnying rgyud): dbang po ba bskur mi dgos// rtogs thabs pakhrid babs kyis shes// bcos ma'i sbyor bya'am rnal ma byed// gang mos mthun pa'i sgonas bstan// thabs sbyor bcos pa'i smon sa de// 'bral gyi mo long bzhin du bstan// tig so dzad du
271b3(rnying rgyud): dzuH// drin rtogs bcos pa'i slor ba yang // tshigadon byung bar bstan pa ste// dgos don gong ma don la 'jug/ brjod don thams cad sems su bstan// nal mam bcos pa'i snod bzhin// ldan nub gsas kyi da pa'i drin/ rim
271b4(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa pa ni seMs so// thab med pa'i kyil 'khor gsus// gdod nas tshul ma tshun gyis zlab// mi she 'i gling por shing// rang gas la sran pa phye nas dag/ malus thig pa chen po rjid// mi g.yon ma tog khrel 'das la
271b5(rnying rgyud): dang 'bras bur rtog 'dzin cing // sri shes smra ba thobs bcings// rang blangs bcos 'i mngag/ ma bcal nyid bzhin ldang byas na// ming po sems su grolas med// thams cad gsal ba'i snying por 'bar// 'og tu khro'i dang gi spri'i
271b6(rnying rgyud): sbed med mabar ba 'i brgya kyang // ye shes dbyings las g.yos pa med// sangs rgyas rnams legs ni// bdug tu dong/ bo nyid las byung // rto/ pa'i blo lnga mtshan mar srung // me tog ye shes grol ba'i thugs// ye shes mi ny-ig ma
271b7(rnying rgyud): gisa'o// mapa' la 'dzi tshan bzhin du ldang // rang byung ye shes rabal// ras pa'i khyad par/ dzang ni// snang la ngos bza long ma yin// rtswa yi thab ste par sbed// gang spang ye shes rol pa la// gang yang ma yo de bzhi pa/
272a1(rnying rgyud): rang ldang ma bcos de bzhin nyid// dngos nyid mi g.yo bde man dang // btsal zhing g.yo ba n+d+ha yang med// dbyings dang ye shes tha snyad de// de nyid ma yin zhen pa'i gnas// rmad byung gzhal yas spos bral na//
272a2(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i ye shes bder gshegs gsung // thug phrad nyid du bzhag pa ste// tha ma'i zhal las shes par bya// spyod pa'i sgo nas sna tshogs pa// lung ldan bla mas shes par bya// 'phral tshig sgra yis shes pa dra ba rtag/ gang
272a3(rnying rgyud): gang zhig de yin na/ de nyid ye shes reg pa 'char// ma yin de nyid log pa na// rig dang mi mthun rang bzhin log/ rlung dang mkhris pa'i chos bzhin no// spyod pas chags sdang bye brag shes// de yi drag ngal gnyug
272a4(rnying rgyud): ma'i don// de nas rdo rje slob ma yis// rig don 'dod pa'i gsol ba gdab// gnang na de nyid rgyal tshab bya// rtsol bral zin dang ma bzung bar// gsang ba'i 'khor lo ye shes gter// gseng sngags gter gyi mdzod 'dzin cing // rig pa'i
272a5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa sgrogs pa'i bdag/ gzhi cha'i rig pa rang gsal te// dus gsum bde gshegs snying po yin/ gsum ldan 'khor ba'i rang bzhin no// dus tshod bla ma'i zhal las shes// gzhan du'ang de bzhin kho na yin// shes rab gsang ba'i
272a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor ni// ku rum sbas padag yin kyang // gsal byed sgron ma de yis mthong // ye gsal chen po rdzogs med la// phyi nad med par kun la gsal// 'khor ba dgas pa'i chu yis ni// de nyid phra ba'i don mi mthong // bden don
272a7(rnying rgyud): mthong bas bcings pa grol// rdzogs pa ye shes de nyid go// nyams blangs goms pas mthar thug ste// ji ltar bas mags 'thung bar no// ma lus par ni zad bur na// mi tog ye shes gsal mthar phyin// 'gyur med sems kyi g.yung drung
272b1(rnying rgyud): du su nan // sa rna nag/
272b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i sa nga na
272b3(rnying rgyud): shA / da pa / nan// / sa da
272b4(rnying rgyud): rtags / ma pa dang bzhim pa ma rgya // sras da rdzas // shes pa me du ldan gyi/ yami dag gno sbyin/ brgya mags pa su tshul pa // nami bya
272b5(rnying rgyud): ngas// sem dza ga / pa ga s+ho/ sa na/ ga sa/ sa smras rgyu /
272b6(rnying rgyud): dus su myed pa / smrag+sa // ga / shA rdzugs
272b7(rnying rgyud): du zhes na/ dad gang gis gis sa / mas nyin gsheg rnasapa pa'i mdas man bcu cig/ chen ga rje pa'i
273a1(rnying rgyud): byu sa grub mtha' dag skyes// nga po nyid las// mang chog nam grangs spang ba'i bdag/ bung brjod gsung gi sa nang dun// dus mthu skang cig nyid lan// khyod dus pam pad// rin chem
273a2(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i cheng du gsungs// de nyid dang / ldan sa TI ga'i// rin chen las kyis nyan s+yas / blangs// me rlabs 'bras bu ldan gyis ba// sba ba'i sems la bu dror med// mtha' da bas med pa'i snying po len// ye shes
273a3(rnying rgyud): 'gags gsal bar snang // gnang bkag med pa stong pa'i rgyun// ma~M bAs mA mi yengs dgongs pa'i klong // rgyal thabs kyi blugs tshangs pa'i dbang // bgrod med mthar byin sems kyi lam// bcos med dam tshig gdod nas dag/ @
273a4(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu lhan grub klo // sems nyid ma bcos rnal ma'i gzhi// don dang nges tshi ga da pe yis bstan// gzhodon ldan grub ni migs ma la// rnam pa rang bzhin mtshan nyid rnams// bde ba chen po ldan grub pa// dus gsum badre gshegs
273a5(rnying rgyud): shes dang // 'gro drug sems kyi ma bcos pa// tha dad ma yin rang bzhin gcig/ rnam pa lce dgrub snyam ni// rol pa bzang 'jos bzung med// rang gi mtshan nyid lhun grub la// gakhrang 'dzin btags pa gang gis med// de nyid de yi rang bzhin
273a6(rnying rgyud): no// ma lus don gyi snying po gzhi// mi shes rtog pa'i rang bzhin te// rtog tsam nyid na mi rtog pa// thams cad rol pas 'khor ba'ang yin// 'dzin rtog med pas sangs rgyas yin// 'ching ba bral ba blta ba yin// rang 'bar gsal pa'i snying
273a7(rnying rgyud): po 'bar// ma lus 'dus pa'i lus po che// gcig ni kun gyi rang bzhin te// lhag ma med par yongs su rdzogs// rig pa'i 'khor la 'bum phrag las// gzhi mtshon dpe yi rang bzhin ni// mun pa chu dang nyi mas bstan// sems nyid rig pa
273b1(rnying rgyud): dag la// zhen pas brtags pas snang med pas// sreg gi mun dum lta bur bshad// dngos med rig pa rang sdang ma// ye shes rol pa mi 'gag pas// rba yi gnyer ma lta thar bshad// ma bcos sems kyi mtshan nyid la// tsal bas bkag pa pa yin pa
273b2(rnying rgyud): gdong nas dag pa'i med pas// hi ma shar ba lta bur bshad// tha dad rtag par 'dzin pa rnams// rol pa'i snang ba bkag pas chad// mtha' thal dbu ma'i don 'dzin pas// mtha' gsum gsal ba'i dgos pa'o// rang snang spyan grub ste gnas la// bcwo
273b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i lam gyis btsal mi dgos// mtha' med nam mkha' lwaT la// bgrod pas phyin par ga la 'gyur// sims la bzod pas byin 'dod na// mkha' la tshad kyis 'ang la ba 'ang// lam bskrun pa dang lam gyi dpe// nges pa'i drin ldan de nyid yid// don gyi
273b4(rnying rgyud): lam dang tshig gi lam// don gyi thug grang gsum yin lnga// de yi bar phrad tshig gI lam// ye shes bzod med rdzogs pa'i lam// rnam grol 'bras bu kun gyi lha// ye shes gsang ba'i don rtogs na// mi g.yo sems kyi dkyil 'khor na// theg pa
273b5(rnying rgyud): byabs ba nar// krom rjo pa'i rnams// ma tho mo med cigs / rlo sa kyis sa/ rmug sa mamangon pang // mang tsum mam gas// gas la na dzud/
273b6(rnying rgyud): dro mi myong pas brda brjin// 'dren pa rigs pa'i rtog pa dag/ rang pung ye shes nyid drugs pa// col ba po'i sems la gnas// mi 'gyur thos nam chos nyid la// 'dzin thal ba tang snyoms rnal 'thod kyis// khyon nyid kyang chub sems su mthong // gnyis
273b7(rnying rgyud): mi 'ong gas 'chen po la// gyon kyang yon tan zung du med// bsam pa ma lus sems sa shes// mthar byin byang chub sems kyi lam// mang me'am pad+ma' bab rgya bogs// tshig dang skabs kyis don la myod// lus dang ngag gicol ba dang /
274a1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin sems kyi rim med par// thams cad sgrol bas rdzogs pa'i lan// rig pa'i gnas su rtogs pas phyed// des na mthar byin 'bras b+ha'i lam// ya nas yod med rnam dag lam// gyon yon rnam dag kun tu bzang /
274a2(rnying rgyud): dbyer med thams cad mtshungs pa'i lam// byang chub sems la rgyu med pas// rgya yis bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu min// dang po'i ye shes rgyu med pas// rang gsal nyag gcig dri ma med// rtsol med nam mkha' bzhin du gnas// sangs rgyas sems
274a3(rnying rgyud): can kun la khyab// de nyid rtogs pas 'bras bu'i sa// 'das pa ma 'ongs da ltar yang // rtogs pa ste phyi'i khyad par las// dus gsum gcig ste khyad par med// ma bcos thugs kyi rig pa las// sngon med phyis med nyag gcig gsal// rang byung
274a4(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal gdod nas yod// rgyu med 'bras bu byang chub sems// 'bras bu kun gyi bdag nyid yin// chos sku 'bras bu rang gsal la// rin chen 'bar ba lhun grub ltar// thugs rje'i byin rlabs 'dod dgu 'char// skal ldan rab rkyen nyi ma bzhin// sems
274a5(rnying rgyud): can dus na skabs kyis mthun// lhu na gu ba dus na phyogs ris med// 'od gsal rig pa'i dkyil 'khor na// rang snang 'bras swa rgya mtshor 'khyil// gsal bar 'bras bu bdag gzhan med// bdag gzhan 'bras bur snang ba la// dngos dang bsam pa skabs
274a6(rnying rgyud): kyis shes// gsal bar rig pa'i byin rlabs ni// chos nyid rig pa'i gzhi la rdzogs// snying po don gyi gzhi rtogs nas// rang bzhin tshogs rdzogs sgrib pa med// gnyis kyis mi bsgrub spang ba med// spang med thig le nyid kyi dbyings// mtshon med sems
274a7(rnying rgyud): kyi 'bras bu ni// rig ma'i bde bas mtshon du med// 'od gsal rgyu 'bras gnyis med la// rgyu 'bras gnyis su rtog pa min// gsal bar rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu ni// 'byung ba lnga la rag ma las// sgra gsung thugs la ten mi 'cha'// zhes gsungs
274b1(rnying rgyud): su na na sa rnam/ sa na // sa sa / na
274b2(rnying rgyud): 'bram thag yas// 'od gas la dbyings la bzhugs bzhin du// thugs rje'i mdzad pa tshogs bcur brdal// 'gro ba'i bsam pa re bskong // yid bzhin nor bu lta bur shar// khyod ni sdang gsal sgo num ste// mdog spyan pa dang bar byed// sman chen bdud rtsi
274b3(rnying rgyud): byams mgon gyis// rdzogs chen sems kyi rang bzhin la// bkag med spyod pa ji ltar bgyi// zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa// sngags kyi spyod pa spyod pa'i mchog/ sems kyi 'phro 'dra'i las mi byed//
274b4(rnying rgyud): rang gsal klong la ye gnas pas// nam mkha' rdo rje ma bcos sems// sgo gsum rdo rje ma bcol par// lus kyis phyag rgya'i las mi byed// tha mal lus spyod de bzhin no// ngag gi snying po bzlas brjod med// ma bcos gsung gi spyod pa las// zhen pa'i nga
274b5(rnying rgyud): rtsol gang yang min// sems kyi 'pho 'du'i las mi byed// rang gsal klong la ye gnas pas// dran pasam rgyu ba gang yang min// spros bral nam mkha' lta bu la// rang gsal ye shes ma bcos par// rtsol med rang bzhag lhag pa'o// gang du bsam
274b6(rnying rgyud): bzhag 'od gsal mkha'// dus gsum dran pa rkyen gyis bzung // tha snyad mtshan ma g.yo 'gyur na// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i spyod pa la// 'od gsal lhag pa'i sems kyis gnas// rnam rtog dran pa g.yos tsam na// rin chen 'phrul gyi snying po'i sgo// dran pa'i rkyen
274b7(rnying rgyud): gyis gzung bar bya// lus ngag gtso ru 'jog byed na// de yang spyod nyid spyod ma yin// spyod med rig pa'i spyod pa la// rtsol med 'bras bu lhun gyis grub// bcos med sems kyi rang bzhin la// bcos pa'i spyod pa phyin ci log/ dngos thal rig pa bdag
275a1(rnying rgyud): mad la// btags pa'i bdag 'dzin log pa bzhin// 'od gas la rig pa snyun bung la// rtsol ba'i spyod pas sems mi mthong // bsam gyis mi khyab 'od gsal sems// 'gyur med dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // dang snang ldan thub
275a2(rnying rgyud): ma las// skel ldan bsam pa ji bzhin du// 'gro 'dul thags kyi spyod pa mdzad// rang sems pargya bzhin da ga nas// gzhan dag de ltar mos bzhin mdzad// g.yem par 'dod la g.yes pa nyid// rang sems gang 'thang sgo dang bstun/
275a3(rnying rgyud): sdang ma nur sems nga rgyal nyid// thabs nyid gsang ba'i lam du bstan// nyan thos la sogs 'jug pa'i spro// gang sos mthun pa'i thabs kyis bstan// gsang don rtogs na gang yang rung // rang byung ye shes nyag gzig la// gsang ba'i
275a4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor grangs med pa// mthun 'dug thabs su bstan pa yin// ci yang yin no gang yang rung // su zhig thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gter dang ldan no khyad par che// ma bkag sems rtogs khyad par las// sgrib par gyur pa gang zhig
275a5(rnying rgyud): yod// ma bkag ce bder rtogs par spyod// snab gsal rig pa'i gdeng ldan na// gdul bya mos pa'i ngo dag tu// sna tshogs skrod pa rgya mtsho spyod// gang yang ma bkag kun tu bzang // mthar phyin dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis// dug lnga rtogs pa'i stod
275a6(rnying rgyud): pa yis// bya ba tsal kun thal lhun gyis grub// dus gsum sangs rgyas gang ya lang // spyod pa de las yongs mi med de// rnam dag sems kyi spyod rtogs na// rtsol ba'i spyod pa log pa'i chos// lhag pa'i spyod pa 'od gsal thugs// gang la sems nyi
275a7(rnying rgyud): lhag spyod kyang // lhag pa'i spyod pa mos pa 'jug/ skal ldan lhag pa'i don zin kyang // che la dmigs pa'i cha snyoms pas// gong 'og dmigs pa'i sems dang bral// rang bzhin nam mkha' rdo rje dang // mthun 'dug 'gro 'dul thabs kyis spyod//
275b1(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs so// ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las/ bya ba dang bral ba'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to// gsang 'dzin thugs
275b2(rnying rgyud): rje'i mnga' bdag khyod// rol pa'i 'khor lo gsung gi ba dang // sku yi 'khor lo mkha' ltar khyab// snying po'i don ldan kun mkhyen thugs// sngags kyi bdag nyid skyob pa la// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs mos pa yis// dam tshig gsang ba'i don
275b3(rnying rgyud): zhu ba// gsang ba'i dam tshig bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa// lhun grub ye shes gsang ba li// bsgrub cing bcas pa'i dam tshig med// rig pa gsal ba'i dam tshig ni// rin
275b4(rnying rgyud): chen 'bar ba sgrol ba'i sku// rdo rje nyi ma lta bur gnas// lhun grub phyogs ris med min pas// sdom dang tshul khrims phyogs mtshams dang // gyi nang gsang ba'i dam tshig yin// ma bcos gsang ba'i dam tshig ni// med pa phul pa gcig pu dang // lhun
275b5(rnying rgyud): kyis grub pa'i dam tshig go// rang rig gdod nas lhun grub la// gzung 'dzin mtshan ma'i chos med pas// brjod du med pa'i sems nyid kyis// bsrung du med pas dang du bsdam// de yang bsrung du med na bde// gnyis med sems kyi dam tshig la//
275b6(rnying rgyud): 'da' med srog gi gnas gyur na// ma bcos rgyal ba'i dam tshig yin// nam mkha' lta bur gsal khyab la// mtha' dang dbus med ma bcos pas// 'di yin 'di min phyogs dang bral// phyogs bral skyes bu chen po des// phyogs gcig spang zhing phyogs
275b7(rnying rgyud): gcig bsgrub tu med// gtad med 'dzin bral chen po la// phyogs mtshams te sa pa'i chos ma yin// bde gshegs sems can thams cad la// ma bcos sems kyi rig par gcig/ chu yis ma bskyed ye nas byung // rkyen gyis ma sbyangs gdod nas dag/ rang
276a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin 'od gsal rig pa la// ma lus dgongs pa thams cad 'das// dus gsam sangs rgyas thams cad la// rang bzhag dgongs pa gcig las med// dang blang ste 'gyur rdzas ste la/ rang bzhag dag pa mi gda'an/
276a2(rnying rgyud): mas nyid gcig phrad ma tshig ste// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad la// dam tshig 'di las yongs mi mnga'// rnam dag rang bzhin 'od gsal la// lus dang ngag gi bya col med// ting 'dzin sems kyis rim btsal med// 'di ni zlog dang bral ba
276a3(rnying rgyud): byin lhun grub dam tshig yin// lhan grub mchog rtol thal la// btsal blding mtshig yenas med// sel byed ri chen gling bzhin du// d+ham dag ye shes rang byung la// snron gyi rang bzhin dang gis dag/ gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid la// pa
276a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i yon pa rnam par dag sbyin grub 'a gas pa dag pal// sa tog btag pa'i mas su / su stes sangs rgyas ci 'acod// sangs rgyas sems can ci la gdags// rtogs pa dngos la grub pan// don chen 'phrul gyi lde mig gis// tha ma la zhen pa ci sngar bzlog/ spun gra'ang mchog bya
276a5(rnying rgyud): btsal med// lhan grub rin chen snying po ltar// gcig rdzogs dang gsal dag par rdzogs// kun rdzogs rang byung sems su rdzogs// thams cad ldan grub rnam par rdzogs// des na lhun grub rdzogs pa che// zhes gsungs so// ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las/ rdzogs
276a6(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// thog med dus nas rin chen bral// gsal mod kham
276a7(rnying rgyud): gsum 'khor bar 'khyams// dus 'dir thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// kun mkhyen byed kyi 'khor du 'dus// rtogs pa sems su shes pa'i sa// kun ma khyen khyod kyis kyi kyang du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis
276b1(rnying rgyud): dka' stsal pa/ rog pa'i sgra la sems gtong cig/ rang byang ye shes sems kyis// brjod pa'i tha snyad kun b+hal yang // dman pa'i blo yis rtogs bya'i phyir// rig pa gsung gi sgo nas bstan// ma bcos rang snang bla pa'i sa/ sbyangs pas ma yin pan
276b2(rnying rgyud): grub// rang byung rnam dag kun bzangs// dbyer med che mchog chos kyi sku// rgya dadang mdo rje bla med sa// sun na 'od dang rdo rje 'dzin// ma chags pad+ma stug po bkod// tshogs chen yi ge 'khor lo dang // kun tu dbye ba med pa'i sa// sa drag sems la bzangs
276b3(rnying rgyud): da/ ba mardzogs rgyu ba'is/ ga par bdu na pa na/ u mas sa / 'dus sa ngas brtson pal// masor ba du gad ya dang / seM gas spya ma// da nargya ra
276b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad sems las byang ba'i phyir// rang snang byang chub sems kyis// 'gyur med sems kyi ngo bo ni// rtog pa ma yin mi rtog mi ni// gang la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa// gnas med 'dzin bral rig pa'i gnas// ma spangs kun bra la 'od gsal
276b5(rnying rgyud): gnas// mi gnas gnas pa'i chos nyide la// skal ldan dang po 'jug pa na// mthar phyi nas 'khyad par med// dag pa thugs rje'i rang bzhin te// rtogs pa'ang rang bzhin sems su gcig/ 'dzin pa'i blo yis g.yos gyur kyang // rang byung 'od gsal 'gyur ba med// 'gyur med dang
276b6(rnying rgyud): dang bzhag ste// ma s+yad sems kyi gyi nar gnas// dbang po yul la gang snang ba// ye shes 'od du kun la gsal// bkrag gas la gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// 'od gsal rang byung ngo mtshar tshe// brjod bral sra yi dkyil 'khor la// snang ba'i ye shes ra
276b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin gsal// rang bzhin sna tshogs dri med la// ye shes gsal bar rang byung sems// mu~M Sha ro yi dkyil 'khor la// lce yi ye shes ngo mtshar che// gsal ba dag bya'i rang bzhin la// shes rab lus kyi rang bzhin gnas// kun 'dus chos kyi
277a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor la// ye shes thugs kyi rig pa gsal// rang bzhin bde chen dkyil 'khor drug/ gnyis med rdo rje 'gyur med las// ye shes mi 'bral 'dzin pa'i sa// 'dzin pa'i yul lam chags shing // kun mkhyen dri ma
277a2(rnying rgyud): dang bral bas// ma chags pad+ma can gyis// rang nyid gsal ba kun 'dus pas// tshogs chen dkyil 'khor yi ge'i sa// mi byed sems la stug po bkod// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la// dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med pas// kun gzang dbye ba/
277a3(rnying rgyud): sa// ba sa dug/ garnams sung+yas smras da sa/ rnas / ga she sa da/ de shA sa /
