277a4(rnying rgyud): shug rje'i mnga' bdag skyob pa'i lha// bsam gyis mi khyab chen po yis// gsang ba'i theg pa gsungs pa 'di// ma 'ongs dus na ji ltar 'byung // zhes gsol pa dang // de bzhin gsheg pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa// rtsol bral gsang ba'i theg pa 'di// lha gnas gsum du grag 'gyur nas//
277a5(rnying rgyud): yang sbrul gang zag thug sras kyis// 'dzam gling dbus su rgyas par byed// rgyal sras gsang ba'i snod ldan la// rna brgyud rig pa sngags kyi don// 'phrul tshig rig pa'i sgo nas ston// gsang 'dzin rig pa'i snod ldan rnams// ma bcos gsal ba'i don ga nas//
277a6(rnying rgyud): rnam grol 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur// de nas gsang ba dam pa 'di// mtha' 'khob yul du rgyas par 'gyur// der yang gsang ba dam pa 'dis// skal ldan gdul bya'i ngo gang du// rig pa'i smon ma byed par 'gyur// de nas thugs rje'i skal med pas//
277b1(rnying rgyud): gsang bdam pa nub par 'gyur// gsang ba'i theg pa dam pa 'di// gzhan gyis nub par mi 'gyur te// dri med bdud rtsi rtogs dka' la// rna brgyud 'phrul tshig ma ldan pas// sgra bzhin spyang nas smra ba dang // lha spyod log pa'i nga rgyal can// ma bcos rang
277b2(rnying rgyud): rol pa dang // rnam rtog zhen pa'i brtags pa dag/ bye brag ma phyed rmongs pa dag/ rdo la gser du 'dzin pa ltar// 'od gsal lhun grub rang snang dang // brtags pa'i zhen pa bsres nas smra// ma bcos rig pa gdeng med par// rang ltar ya bas mtho 'dong
277b3(rnying rgyud): nas// babacol 'dod lnga spyod pas log/ de yi dus kyi gang zag rnams// spel ma g.yang du lhung ba bzhin// rdo rje khab tu lhung 'gyur nas// byang chub sems kyi rigs dang bral// mgyogs 'gro so mtshams 'das dang 'dra// de nas lho phyogs
277b4(rnying rgyud): rgyud du rgyas// skal ldan grol ba'ang 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas 'dzam gling dbus su nub// sprul pa tha ma'i bstan pa la// ma 'ongs dus na 'byung bar 'gyur// de yang rang bzhin rigs can dag/ rdzogs chen 'bras bu'i sgor zhugs nas// rnam grol 'bra
277b5(rnying rgyud): pra 'thob par 'gyur// bsgom dang spyod pa'i tshul ma nor// mnyam pa'i don la mnyam bzhag na// de ma thag tu rig pa 'char// gsang ba'i don ldan gang zag bzhi// de yi dus na 'byung bar 'gyur// bstan pa bcud kyi mdzod 'dzin cing // gsang sngags
277b6(rnying rgyud): ma lus sgrogs pa'i bdag/ dgongs spyod zab mo'i don dang ldan// 'dzin pa log pa'i gang zag gis// gsang ba'i theg pa bsgrub par 'gyur// 'das pa'i dus na theg pa 'di// skal ldan mngon rdzogs rgyal po yis// thugs kyi sras bdun rnams la bstan//
277b7(rnying rgyud): de dag rig pa mthar phyin nas// de bzhin rtsol bral chos la bkod// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sde dpon gyis// sems nyid rig pa'i theg pa bsgrub// zhes gsungs so// ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las/ lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas de ba
278a1(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa rnam par drang mang dkyis sems dpa' dadapa 'dud ces pakalas to// byang chu bsams 'din bya bdang // masas 'dus bya sring pa mchog/ the pa rna pa' badrubs pa'i dang / ma sa dngag
278a2(rnying rgyud): 'das ye shes dag pa'i 'od// phyogs mtshams kun tu gsal bar 'phro// ye shes me long thams cad gsal// ma bcos gzugs brtan snang bas na// ye shes me long dag tu bshad// rang rig ye shes 'od gsal la// mtho dman rlom sems che chung med/
278a3(rnying rgyud): bdag gzhan gnyis med rang rig la// 'dzin pa kun bral 'od gsal dag/ dbyer med nam mkha' lta bur khyab// snang srid byang chub sems su mnyam// mnyam pa rang gsal phyogs bcur brdal// 'od gsal rig pa mnyam par bshad// bcos med dbyings
278a4(rnying rgyud): kyi rang bzhin la// 'dzin tog zhen pa'i chos med pas// mi 'gyur ye shes rang byung la// bden par mi 'dzin brdzun pa'ang min// 'dzin med rig pa gnyis bral la// gang yang mi snang kun tu bzang // chos nyid sems la dngos med gsal// stong pa kun mkhyen
278a5(rnying rgyud): ye shes thugs// dngos med kun ldan stong chen po// 'dzin med rig pa 'od gsal bas// stong nyid ye shes dag tu bshad// ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// gnyis med rig pa ka dag la// ye shes rol pa ma 'dres gsal// kun bzang chos nyid spros
278a6(rnying rgyud): med la// rol pa'i 'khor lo bsam mi khyab// 'du zhing 'phro ba rgya mtsho bzhin// 'bar ba'i ye shes rmang po che// rang gsal rig pa kun mkhyen thugs// mnyam la ma 'dres kun tu bzang // ma 'des gsal ba'i ye shes so// mi 'ad 'phyag rgya chen po las
278a7(rnying rgyud): rang byung mdzad pa cir yang 'gyur// lhun grub mdzad pa phyogs ris med// kun gyi snying po rang byung la// thugs rje lhun grub shar 'gyur nas// gdul bya'i byab kun mdzad gsal// ngas na bya ba nan tan no// rang gsal ye nas ma bcos pa// don de shes pas ye
278b1(rnying rgyud): shes yin// chos nyid ka dag 'od gsal sems// don te shes pas ye shes yin// ma bkag rang rig tu med gsal// rang byung ye shes 'gyur med sems// 'od gsal bsam gyis mi khyab pa// kun bzang rol pa mtha' dbus med// me rtsol
278b2(rnying rgyud): mtha' bral dbu ma'i sems// mtshon 'das rang bzhin zhen rtog med// gnyis med rang rig yul dang bral// dang rig ye shes thig le drug/ blta spyod dgongs pa'i rang bzhin no// ma 'bros zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar// mi g.yo sems nyid mi 'gros
278b3(rnying rgyud): pa// thig le spros bral ye sangs rgyas// byang chub sems kyi khyad par che// mngon par sangs rgyas che ba lnga// ye shes thig le kun tu bzung // rnam gsum thig le kun bzang nyid// chos nyid dbyings su sangs rgyas che// kun bzang cig le byang drub
278b4(rnying rgyud): sems// thams cad yin pa'i che ba nyid// rdzol bral lhun grub thig le nyid// bdag nyid chen po'i sangs rgyas yin// mtha' bral 'od gsal chen po ni// sangs rgyas med pa'i che bar bshad// mi 'gyur brdal khyab spros pa bral// cis kyang mi bskyod sems
278b5(rnying rgyud): nyid che// 'du 'bral gnyis med rdo rje nyid// phyi nang med pa'i gsal khyab la// phyi nang gsang ba'i sgo phugs med// yul dang dbang po gdod nas dag/ mtshan ma gzhil ba'i sku med pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' mi 'gyur che// ye shes mkha' gsal kun tu bzang // bsam med
278b6(rnying rgyud): mkha' gsang ye sangs rgyas// cir yang mi dgongs chos nyid dang // mi 'da' phyag rgyar 'gyur med sems// mi rtsol mtha' bral dbu ma'i lam// mkha' ltar khyab pa'i bde chen po// rgyu 'bras gnyis med ye nas rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// ye shes
278b7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyud las/ ye shes bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzod la 'di skad ces gsol to// kun tu bzang po ye shes thugs// bde chen
279a1(rnying rgyud): 6\u0f7f/ gsung gi 'khor lo'i bdag/ bya med ye shes rol pa'i dra/ dbyer med no mchog gyur la// 'das pa'i 'khor tshogs mos pas 'dud// rtsol thal lo shes gsang ba'i rgyud// chos nyid gsang ba'i tshang na gsungs// bdag
279a2(rnying rgyud): cag 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis// mtshan gyi rnam grangs ji ltar gzung // zhes gsol pa dang / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang rgyud theg pa'i snying po 'di// nyon mongs zhen pa'i 'brel thag chod// chos rnam
279a3(rnying rgyud): sal ba'i ye shes sgron// kun tu bzang po'i ye shes thugs// bde chen mdzes pa'i ye shes rgyan// gsal ba'i ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud// 'di la mtha' dbus med pas na// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud// kun 'das mnyam pa chen po yis//
279a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba kun 'dus rig pa'i gter// rang byung 'od gsal chen po la// zhen pa'i brtags pa gdod nas med// ma bcos dang snang rtogs pas na// nyon mongs zhen pa'i 'phreng thag gcod// thams cad sems su 'dus pas na// sems nyid rang gsal ye shes
279a5(rnying rgyud): smon/ mi 'gyur lhun grub rang byung 'di// ji ltar gnas kyang kun tu bzang // zhen cing 'khrul pa cer gyur kyang // rang gas la ye shes kun tu bzang // rig pa bsam bral rgyal ba'i thugs// phyogs med btang snyoms chen po la// rtsol ba'i sdug bsngal
279a6(rnying rgyud): bral bas bde// bde chen mtshan nyid kun las 'das// kun gyi 'byung gnas lhun grub che// rangags la ye shes dkyil 'khor ni// sku dang gsung thugs mdzes pa'i rgyan// rang gnas ye shes bde chen nyid// rnal 'byor dgyes pa'i rgyan zhes bya// bsam med
279a7(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i mtha' ltar bral// byang chub sems la mtha' dbus med// mi 'gyur nam mkha' rtag pa ltar// sems nyid ye gas la g.yung drung ngo // thams cad byang chub sems su 'dus// thams cad kun 'dus lhan gyis rdzogs// snang sring 'khor ba'i ngo bo la/
279b1(rnying rgyud): gtsung mad rdul pa 'dagangs pa dag/ 'dags la rnams ldan par mabyas// bstan pa bsha 'das gas pa'i thabs// gas ma dzad sa pazugs ga // bstan pa cu grolags da da// yul ba srang gags pa// nga ga ma ga
279b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin// snying gi dkyil du btsa' bar gyis// srog dang bral ba'i ba bzhin sdoms// bskrun pa'i yang snying snying ltar thung // gnas ni thag dang rgyal cos// zhes gsungs so// ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mtshan gyi rnam grangs bstan ga le'u snyed na
279b3(rnying rgyud): gas gas du zhes rdzogs su/ dang lA na/ / rnasargyan spyanam/ smyadapa/ thang bab kyi sem pa mis sa gas pa'i du badzag/
279b4(rnying rgyud): oM shes rdzogs pa laphyag 'tshal lo// 'di gang bdag gis bshad pa'i dus gcigs/ khyod myin gyi gnas sems nyid bdal brten po sde'i rnams n-i hU~M rdzogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das dgod pa dang byung gi don la bzhugasas// yang nang cad
279b5(rnying rgyud): po'i 'khor 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin gyis gnas pa dang / rang bzhin la blta ba dang / rang bzhin rtogs pa chen po dang / rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i don la mngon par dga' ba 'ba' zhig 'dus so// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po sna tshogs bsam bral gyi ting nge 'dzin la rloms
279b6(rnying rgyud): par zhugs so// de'i tshe 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis thams cad rang byung du mthong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// rang byung dag pa yi sangs rgyas// chos dang chos nyid lnga tshogs pa// rig pa nyid yin pa
279b7(rnying rgyud): par dag/ smin pa'i 'khor tshogs dang sems kyis// rnatshogs rang byung zhing du khros// zhes gsungs pa dang / spen pa chen po'i nang nas sems dpa' dro zhin po ring byung ste/ 'di skad ces gsol to// rig pa rnam dag bcom ldan 'das//
280a1(rnying rgyud): gsum rdzogs pa'i ye shes che// mdzad pa gyogs bcu su mtha' med// thugs rje rang sdang phyogs ris med// btang snyoms chen po kun tu bzang // rig pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor nas// rdzogs pa'i ye shes thabs chen gyis/
280a2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i ye shes sgo phye nas// dpal gyi mgur nas gsung bsgrags pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor la gsal bar gsungs// zhes zhus so// de nas rig pa'i rgyal pos rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ye shes rdzogs pa'i bde ba che/
280a3(rnying rgyud): mtha' las 'gro ba kun la ldan// rig pa dbyer med kun tu bzang // gang yang ma yin rig par gsal// rtsol ba'i sems la mngon sangs rgyas// rgyu 'bras gnyis med 'gyur ba bral// rnam kyang shes pa rang gnas pa// byed pa nyid kyis mthong bar gyis//
280a4(rnying rgyud): shes pa'i rnam grangs gang skyes kyang // rnam byang nyid las gzhan ma yin// bsam gyis mi khyab dus na shes// 'khor ba'i shes pa glo bur ba// rang bzhin ma yin rkyen gyis snang // brjod pa'i brtan ma nyid dang mtshungs// rnam par rtog pa'i sems nyid ni// gang ltar
280a5(rnying rgyud): brtags pa bzhin du mthong // du ma'i rigs kyi rtog pa dag/ sgo rnams kun tu rgyu ba ste// mi gcig skar khung du ma bzhin// don gyi rnam byang du ma min// rig pa dbyer med dkyil 'khor 'di// mtha' bral lta ba'i don ldan gyis// rang gzhag dgongs pas
280a6(rnying rgyud): gnas par bya// rang byung thugs rje g.yo med kyis// 'gro don mi lus rdzogs par mdzad// sku gsum lhun grub 'bras bu ni// gzhan ma yin te ye shes rdzogs// ris drug dbang po tshig chod dam// sbyangs pa'i 'phro can gang yang rung // chos kyi rnam grangs
280a7(rnying rgyud): gang sgo nas// spyi blugs dbang la gnas byas te// rna brgyud gdams ngaganod par bya// bzod med lam la gnas byas la// sbyang med sa yi yon tan 'phel// rlos min cig chang 'jug pa'i sa// rang byung ye shes bla ma'i sa// rab tu che mchog chos
280b1(rnying rgyud): sdewu// rdol med gnas pas mngon sangs rgyas// 'gro ba'i rige pa gang dag la// bas maphrul nyid du 'jug par bya// shes pa rang sngags thal byung ba// dus gsum mi ga yog nas d+har na// chal ba'i ye shes gas lam thar phyin// zhes gsungs so// byang chub
280b2(rnying rgyud): sems ye shes rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas rig pa'i rgyal pos/ sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sna tshogs 'khor ba'i rtog pa dang // rdzogs nyid ye shes rang bzhin gcig/ rdzogs pa'i ye shes
280b3(rnying rgyud): rtog pa nyid// rtog pa gang yin ye shes nyid// tha dad yod pa ma yin te// ye shes rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin de// kun spangs kun gyi dngos gzhi can// 'dzin pa du ma'i rtog pa 'di// byang chub sems su brjod pa yin// brjod med sems kyi rang 'azhin la// ma brjod
280b4(rnying rgyud): go bar mi 'gyur bas// brjod med don gyis mtshon par bya// kun bzang sems nyid rnam par dag/ mtshon bya mtshon byed gang yang min// btsal med rang bzhag nyid kyis mtshon// tha ma la snang ba'i shes pa dag/ bka' yi shes pas drangs byas te// gtang 'dzin med pa'i ngang la
280b5(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ yid la mi byed bya ba gtang // blo yis ma dpyad rang bzhin gsal// 'dzin pa'i rgyu 'bras gang yang min// 'bras bu nyid kyis 'bras bu 'grub/ re 'dod rtsol ba'i mtha' du 'gyur// 'dzin med rang bzhin sman chen gyis// 'khor ba'i gcong rnying kun dang bral//
280b6(rnying rgyud): rnam rtog ye shes 'od gsal nyid// rang gsal ye shes ye nas dag/ rin chen dag pa'i gling bzhin du// sems kyi ye shes ye nas dag/ rim med sems kyi rang bzhin la// bgrod pa'i lam gyis thob pa med// rnam grol 'bras bu rang byung nyid// bgrod med
280b7(rnying rgyud): rnam grol rdzogs pa'i lam// gdod nas rtsol med lhun gyis grub// ye shes nyi ma'i snying po shar// ma lus thig le chen po nyid// ga/ dung 'dzin gnyis med mi g.yo ba// rgyu dang 'bras bur rtog 'dzin cing // mi shes sgyu ma'i 'dzin pas bcings// sems nyid
281a1(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'dra waba'i rmo// ye shes yangs pa brdal ba che// khang dor gzis med col babral// byang chub sems kyi ngalba zag bcad// ting 'dzin nabs nyams su blangs// byang chub sems kyi blta ba ni// gang ska ci yang
281a2(rnying rgyud): yin pas// rang byung ye shes mtshan nyid gsal// mi bsam gyi nar gzhag pa'o// bsnam gyis mi khyab ye shes mthong // rang byung rdzogs pa'i lta ba ni// mtha' gsum gral lo yi sangs rgyas// rtsol bral dbu mdzang po'i lam// 'ching bral ltang gza
281a3(rnying rgyud): gtad med// rin chen 'khor lo kun bzang 'dis// rang sems gnyis med rtogs par gyis// btung snyoms blta ba blang dor med// byung chen mkha' la lding ba bzhin// globasgra gnyis med gtang bzhag bral// rang bzhin gnas pas ro ngogs bral// spyod lA la
281a4(rnying rgyud): lus sems su shes// sna tshogs 'khor ba'i rang bzhin dang // ye nas rang rig gnyis su med// nyid las gzhan sems grub pa med// rig pa ci yang ma yin pas// 'dod pa'i bsam pa kun dang bral// shes pa mtha' bral stong pa nyid// ye shes 'od
281a5(rnying rgyud): gsal rang gnas pas// yid la 'dzin med ye shes gsal// rol bar snang yang grub pa med// sgyu ma'i ye shes rtsal du 'gro// ma bcos sgyu ma lhun grub sa// 'dzin pa'i sems dang ngos gzung med// ye shes rgyal po rnam par dag/ 'dzin pa'i sems bral
281a6(rnying rgyud): rig par gsal// sems nyid nam mkha' lta bu la// nam mkha' lta bur bsam du med// nam mkha' bsam du med pa bzhin// ye shes bsam du med pa yin// cir yang mi dgongs rang bzhag pa// dus gsum rgyal ba'i blta ba yin// lha med rang
281a7(rnying rgyud): bzhag palta ba ni// dus gsum gang yang ma yin te// 'gyur med dbyings kyi blta ba yin// 'dod pa'i bya ba gang yang men// 'dod pa med pa'i bya ba'ang min// ngo bo nyid la yang sa dog med// sems nyid dri ma ka dag la// 'gyur med rin chen gsor ba
281b1(rnying rgyud): no// 'dzin pa'i rlung gis g.yos gyur kyang // rig pa mang bar 'gyur ba med// rgya mtsho snang ba chen po bzhin// phyi nang mi mnga' ye shes gsal// mtha' dbus mi mnga' thogs dang thal// ye shes sems nyid lba ba la// rtswa dang rtsen gyi cwo /
281b2(rnying rgyud): med// rdo rje nyid 'dra 'jig pa med// nyi ma rin chen 'bar ba ltar// rang snang rnam par rtog dang bral// 'khor ba nyid na ye sangs rgyas// rang sems rig pa gang yang rung // bsam pa dang bral ye shes nyid// chos dang chos nyid gang yang min//
281b3(rnying rgyud): mtha' bral ye shes rdzogs pa 'di// rtag pa ma yin mi rtag min// shes pa mi 'gag 'dod pa min// bya byed mi rtsol rang bzhin dag/ dbu ma chen po drang po'i sems// phyogs kyi yul la 'jug pa med// sems nyid yul la gang 'jug na// 'dzin
281b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyogs can 'dod pa nyid// dbu ma'i sems dang mi ldan pa// bag chags 'dzin pa'i sems kyis dkrugs// bsam med rig pa brjod med 'di// tha rgyud ming la mi gnas te// gdul bya dman pa'i sems dag la// tha snyad sgra yi 'khor los
281b5(rnying rgyud): bstan// snang srid snang ba sna tshogs pa// khru ga snang thugs lngas ma g.yos te// dAn rtog ting 'dzin rig pa'i thugs// nam mkha' lta bur mi zad pa// bde chen rig pa sems kyi rgyan// rnam par rtog pa'i sgro 'dogs gsod// 'ad gsal reg pa'i
281b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo yini// lus can rnams kyi sgra rnams ni// sngags kyi gsung du zags pa yin// snang stong gnyis med rig pa'i gsung // kha dog dbyibs su gang snang ba// sku mchog rgyan gyi 'khor lor zab// rdo rje lta bur dbyer med pa// sems kyi rang bzhin
281b7(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang // sku gsung rdzogs pa'i 'deb che// bas ma med rang bzhin nyid kyis sgo// rim pa mchog ldan kun tu bzang // bka' yi 'khor lo 'bum phrag yas// ting 'dzin me tog rang bzhin gsal// rang rig rdo 'gyur med lung // ye shes rdzogs pa'i
282a1(rnying rgyud): s+yAng gas ni// thams cad le gas pa po rag+sa lnga// rten pa / ma smras pa// pe gas dag pa 'khor los gcod // rabu gas la rag pang snang ba la// ga wAn gsal ba'i dag pas mthong // gab de ni sa ma bzang
282a2(rnying rgyud): rang rig rdzogs pa'i ye shes la// ngo bo grub pa gang yang min// rtog pa'i mthu yis cir yang mthong // me long dngas pa'i brdzun ma ltar// rdo rje gsang ba'i gdams pa yis// rig pa'i ye shes kun tu bzang // yi ge med pa'i don du mthong // rang gsal
282a3(rnying rgyud): sgra rang bzhag na// ye shes rdzogs pa rjes su dbugs// rang reg 'brel pa nyid lags la// ye gas la rig pa'i 'khor lo la// 'dod pa'i blo yis ga la ba// rang 'dor theg pa'i khyad par ni// gsang ba'i don la ma lus stong // 'dod pa'i sbung
282a4(rnying rgyud): kyis 'phangs nas rlos// rang gsal 'khor lo'i don la 'gal// 'dang zlas gsal ba'i ye shes kyang // rtsol ba nyid la 'da' ba med// rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde chen ni// rang bzhag rig pa'i 'khor los dag/ rnam dag radi snar 'ong gi sal hA/
282a5(rnying rgyud): sa na
282a6(rnying rgyud): rten// den dado// seMsas pa dus ny-id/ lag // yang ga ma pa band su drug la b+h+yas/ da /
282a7(rnying rgyud): gsal bar snang // byang chub sems kyi la shes ni// rnam shes dmigs pa'i tshul las 'das// rig pa dgas lagazung 'dren med// byang chu por bsugs // migs su med// me shes kun pa rnas pa nga/
282b1(rnying rgyud): 'byar ba'i ting 'dzin ngo mtshar che// rang gsal rig pa cir mi dgongs// bde gshegs 'khor lo'i ngo bo nyid// mi 'gyur 'joms pa'i rdo rje 'chang // kun 'byung rin chen lta bu'i 'od// skyon med pad+ma'i rang bzhin dag/ 'dra byed las
282b2(rnying rgyud): skye rdo rje 'chang // 'dul mdzad ting 'dzin 'bra phrag yas// bas ma bral ting 'dzin 'od gsal sems// thabs 'jug sgrub pa dang lus yin// rtsa ba mi g.yo thig la byang chub sems// rang byang yangs rdzo gas ston pa'i ngo bo nyid// rang rag
282b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa mchog gi sku// sna tshogs 'dren pa mchog gi sgra// rang byung sems la ngo bo gcig/ rig pa mchog gi bstan pa ni// brjod med kun la rang bzhin ston// rnam dag rin chen lta bur gsungs// maM g.yo thig le nyid du gsal// yi ge'i tha
282b4(rnying rgyud): da gan dang bral// ma 'gags dang sdang den bshas/ tshogs spang ba'i rang bzhin dag/ rang ga des don nyid du bstan// rnam bshad rang ba na rnyan matso/ snang rnam pa'i rang shin gyis// de 'gror bas ma ma ba'i rna bskam
282b5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i yan lag 'bum phrag yas// rang byung dag pa'i shugs kyis 'byung // 'dod rtsol blo la drang ba dang // thugs kyi dgongs pa nges pa'i don// gdul bya rab 'bring don du bshad// nges pa'i snying po gsang ba nyid// drang ba'i don min rang byung
282b6(rnying rgyud): bshad// chos sku rang byung ston pa'i mchog/ de 'dus 'khor dang bstan pa dag/ nyid las mi gzhan rang byung nyid// rig pa mchog gi sbyor ba la// so so ma yin brjod bya gcig/ tha snyad lam gyi sgon ma gang // kun bzang rig pa'i gter don
282b7(rnying rgyud): bstan// brjod pa'i don mtshon dman pa'i sku yis ston// rang byung rig pa mchog gi sku// rang byung mchog gi sku gsum rdzogs// ma bcos rang nyung snying po la// 'dod pa'i rnam pa gang yang min// bsgrub bya ma lus kun gyi bdag/ ye shes
283a1(rnying rgyud): nyi ma'i bsgrub pas gsal// snang ba ma lus rang byung sems// rig pa mchog ldan bde gshegs bka'// rang byung tshad ma mngon sum gsal// 'khor ba'i rtog pa'i gcong rnying dag// ye shes rang rig nyid du 'bar// kyi thugs tshangs
283a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i thabs kyis gsal// gsang ba'i don myong 'od gsal lung // gzer chen man ngag theg pa'i skas// rig pa'i brda mngal tshegs dang bral// mngon sum ye shes gsal ba yi// rjes su rang gzhag ye nas spags// zhes gsungs so// byang
283a3(rnying rgyud): chub kyi sems ye shes rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor ba ye shes su bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas rig pa'i rgyal pos sems dpa' rdo rje la bka' stsal pa// dang byung rdzogs pa'i lta ba'i klong // mnyam nyid rig pa'i ye shes sems// snang ba
283a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes rdzogs pa nyid// nam mkha'i rdo rje blta ba'i mchog/ blta med rang byang sems la blta// btsal med rig pa'i rnal 'byor yin// 'jug pa gnyis med rig pa'i klong // ye shes mkha' mnyam sgra don med// rang gsal yul la med rtogs
283a5(rnying rgyud): pas// ye shes thig le'i nyi ma shar// snang med ma 'gags cir mi dgongs// snang ba rig pa'i thig le bsdus// sdug bsngal bde ba'i ngang du gnas// re 'dod kun bral thob spang med// rang byung bde ba'i sems nyid la// snang ba nyid du gub/
283a6(rnying rgyud): ma yin// bde chen rig pa mtsho ltar zab// ye shes rol pa mkha' dang mnyam// dngos grub rin chen 'od ltar 'byung // zhes gsungs so// byang chub kyi sems ye shes rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
283a7(rnying rgyud): de nas rig pa'i rgyal pos rang bzhag rig pa'i don gsungs pa/ rig pa'i sems nyid phreng med la// ting 'dzin mi g.yo 'jug pa med// rtsol med rig pa bas ma dang bral// ye shes rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo la// thig le bde chen bsam mi khyad/
283b1(rnying rgyud): rol pa bde ldan cu rlabs bzhin// ye shes ji bzhin mi bskyod pa'o// ye nas yin phyir bya mi dgos// ye shes gsal ba'i phyag cha yis// mtshan ma ye shes 'khor lo bskor// 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin kun dang bral// rang byang snying po g.yo med
283b2(rnying rgyud): na// dbang kyang rgyal ba'i thugs dang mnyam// ting 'dzin rang bzhag mkha' dang mnyam// mi 'gyur ye shes mkha' ltar khyab// rtsol bral rig pa'i ye shes la// yengs pa med par rang bzhin bzhad// dbang po'i ngo la snang ba la// mi tog/
283b3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin rig par gsal// ye shes kun bzang 'phro 'du med// gang la mi 'dzin rang byung sems// mtshanA ma'i spyod pas 'gyur ba med// brda sgor 'jug pa'i gdams ngag sbyin// ting 'dzin 'khor lo smyo slar gcod// ye shes 'khor lor mtha'
283b4(rnying rgyud): dbus med// rang rig 'khor lor gzung 'dzin bral// shes rig ye shes nyid du 'char// 'dzin pa'i rim 'jug theg khyad kyis// ngos bzung rtogs dang dmigs 'byed pa// 'dod 'dzin ma lus de dag stong // rang rig stong nyid rnam bcas pas//
283b5(rnying rgyud): bde chen lhan grub rang rig gsal// ye shes rig pa'i 'khor lo la// gang yang yin no rnam kun bcas// ye shes rang gsal ma bsgrubs gsal// rnam dag rang snang ye shes la// zhen pa'i rtog pa bzlog tu med// lhan grub 'bras bu btsal mi
283b6(rnying rgyud): dgos// kun bzang 'bar ba'i ye shes la// gzung 'dzin gnyen po brten mi dgos// thogs med rang byang phyogs dang bral// byang chub rang sems kho na pas// lam gyis ma bcos ye sangs rgyas// gang sdang rnam pa cir rtog kyang // rang rig bde/
283b7(rnying rgyud): chen mngon sum gsal// 'dod pa'i skabs bral gang mthong tshor// rang bzhag ye shes rdzogs pa mthong // btsal med rang byung rdo rje'i bdag/ skye med rdo rje mi 'gyur 'chang // lhun grub rin chen 'bar ba'i 'od// dri med pad+ma rang byung ba dag/ rtsol med
284a1(rnying rgyud): pa rna/ na ma na na / na
284a2(rnying rgyud): chogs pa sa ga // bad ga pa na chos sa na /
284a3(rnying rgyud): rnan / ba tsun dgas na du rnas rdzogs pa ngas pan hU~Ms/ dpa
284a4(rnying rgyud): de rang sems 'khrul// da 'byams dbyings las ma g.yas kyang // lajul tog zhug pa rnal rna thogs rtsong // rdzu dang 'i ga yo thugs rjes bshad du gsol// kyis byas pa dang / byin pa ngos bka di ma// ye shes nga
284a5(rnying rgyud): kun da la gang ston pa mchag/ ma la bstan par blang pa// kyang ba mi byung rnams sa pa shad// shi gang pa dang / )// glang bshad pa shugs ces pa/ srid pa sa rnam bya// sa sa pa da
284a6(rnying rgyud): sa/ gangagapa kyi kyis gastsal/ 'i tshig 'i'i nga tum/ ga kyis rgyas mi mangs/ byang / ma sa gsas pa 'bar po'o// 'dzin pa 'dris gra pa ba dan/
284b1(rnying rgyud): ltar rig pa 'char// bde chen rig pa'i 'khor lor bshad// brda don sgra yis gang la rgyud don rtogs// rig pa'i gdeng ldan ye shes klong du shan// gsal ba'i ye shes dgongs pa la// thugs rje rin chen 'od ltar 'phro// tshig gi don bral ye shes
284b2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa re// brda' sgo lam gyi zhen pa gang bzlog dang // brdang dang tha snyad rig pa'i snying por 'char// dang byung rtsa ba ma lus gcig tu rtogs// sbyor ldan lam gyi rtog pa ma lus 'dus// dngos grub rang byung dgos ched bsam mi khab// ston pa gas
284b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin yi ges don du bshad// brda 'phral stong nyid rang la bzlog par bya// de nyid bzhin te thams cad kun ma yin// rang byung bde chen 'khor lo la// ye shes don du rang gsal zhing // 'dzin med rig pa'i mkha' la gzhag/ chub med pa'i ye shes bskyed/
284b4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gsal ba'i 'od la zhugs// sku gsum gsal ba'i don ldan na// lhun rdzogs ye shes thig ler bshad// tha snyad smra yi rnam pa kun// ye shes 'dren pa'i mtshon pa'i brda'// don la brjod bral ye shes rdzogs// rig pa'i brda' blo don
284b5(rnying rgyud): gsapag// med spyong ldan chu ma / bdi cin dag pa na 'a / di sa pa smra da/ gzong pa'i 'gas pa// gas klog gi rung ba 'du // zhes gsungs/ kyise mas shes rdzogs
284b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud las/ gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas rig pa'i rgyal pos rang rig pa'i phun sum tshogs pa 'di gsungs so// ye shes khyab grang la rig pa'i sgra// rang byung rig pa ma 'gags gsal// brjod med sems kyi de kho na// rang
284b7(rnying rgyud): byung ston pa'i thugs rje'i bdag/ 'gro drug sems can thams cad kyis// rang sems ston par ma shes na// rang byung mthong bar yongs mi 'gyur// des na ye shes rdzogs pa'i don// rang rig bde bas shes par gyis// rang byung rgyal po ston pa'i mchog/
285a1(rnying rgyud): la gas ma 'gags par yang gas// dag pa sapa/ khyod du dgas/ dang gams pa 'dun rtogs pas// bstan pa mam mag pa'abyung // nabadag byu bams kyi song nam// 'gyur med 'ang sa dadapa'adas
285a2(rnying rgyud): dan du / ga ga sa
285a3(rnying rgyud): ye sras rol pa'i bri// yi ge bcu bal yo shes rnyeg pa'i gsab// d+h+r-ig pam ye she smon ma 'bang // len med na dang thal bas bde mchog gsang ba'i lalta// dad+ha mi 'jug pas gsang ba 'dzin me gsal// ming dang don mad
285a4(rnying rgyud): glang yo gas gas pa// rig pa'i thig legasal ba'i gsung // brjod med ye shes 'kha lho'i bdag/ tha b+ha pan la brjod byang ga/ brda' med dang shAng ye shes tid // rlig pa'i 'khor lo bdag la 'char// rin chen 'ad ba sa
285a5(rnying rgyud): sathAb// rang byung gzer chen dngul 'drebs// ra shAng 'i khor los dang la gcod// rig rgyag rgya b+ha ra ni // sa gsungs so// byang chub kyi sems ye shes rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ phran sum tshogs pa 'di rjen ting bstan pa
285a6(rnying rgyud): de d+has rig pa la pos bcog pa med pa la rjes dang thas cad med migs pa 'jug / bdal med pa bzhag sa sangs nas// rnam dag byung sted pa la// thams cad legs stong ba ga ra//
285a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo spang ba med// ye shes rin chen rtsol bathal// rang krung mi 'gyur gA tu // sems nyid byeng chub rig bdag la// sras ngan sems kyi btsal zang pas// ting 'dzin mi g.yo 'jug dang thal// sa sna 'khor ma la par
285b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes smod pa pad+ma ltar// spyod bzhin ma chags ye nas dag/ bsam dang bral ba'i chos nyid la// ye shes 'khor lo rang bzhag ste// dus gsum g.yo ba med par gnas// rtog pa'i dngos po gang snang yang // rang byang rig pa'i 'khor los
285b2(rnying rgyud): gcod// rig pa rgya mtsho'i klung ltar zab// mngon sum snang ba'i ye shes la// sangs rgyas sems can khyad med kyang // rang dbang sems la mi gnas na// sems nyid bde bar spyod mi nus// 'dzin sems dag gi lcags bkrol yang //
285b3(rnying rgyud): goms pa'i brag chags bcings dang 'dra// ye shes 'khor lo rang dbang na// ji ltar gnas kyang bya btsal med// rig pa mtha' med dkyil 'khor la// lus kyis btsal med chos spar gsal// rang skad rig pa'od gsal la// ngag
285b4(rnying rgyud): gis bcal med rig pa'i gsung // mi 'gyur kun bzang ye shes la// thugs kyis btsal med bas ma dang bral// snang ba gzugs kyi rnam pa kun// mnyam med chos kyi sku ru thim// grags pa'i sgra yi rnam pa kun// mtshon pa'i rang rtags gsung du
285b5(rnying rgyud): bris// shes rig ma lus ji snyed pa// thugs kyi mtshon pa'i rang rtags de// ye shes rig pa'i thugs sa khyim// rig pa 'gyur med rdo rje ltar// dbyer med ye shes bya btsal bral// zhes gsungs pa dang / dri nas sems dpa' rdoras 'di nan
285b6(rnying rgyud): ces nus so// rnam dgra ye shes dkyil 'khor nus// 'gro drug ye nas sangs rgyas kyang // las stobs drug pos bdag zhugs te// rang rkyen phyog pa'i thugs kyis dkrugs// rang bzhin rin chen nor bral bas// ris drug 'khor lo'i gnas su
285b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyu su// dus 'dir thug pa'i byi drungs kyis// rdzogs pa'i las la mos bskyed pa/ na kyil bcas 'bras su med// nas tog g.yo bcir 'gyur ba// rig pa'i don lag gas bskrun// nges pa'i gas 'dron gang gis nga/
286a1(rnying rgyud): zhes zhus pa dang / rag pa'i rgyal pos skur gsungs pa// ye shes rdzogs pa'i sems bskyed zung // spro ba'i sems ldan don la spongs// rang bzhag rig pa ma yin par// brda' rno rtog pa'i rjes ma 'brangs// bde chen gsang ba'i 'khor
286a2(rnying rgyud): lo la// gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin pas// chos can chos nyid gang yang min// 'dod pa'i blo yis gang sbyor ba// dman pa'i sems la bstan par zad// bas ma bral ye shes 'khor lo la// chos can chos nyid gang rtog pa// rang byang gsang ba'i
286a3(rnying rgyud): sems ma shes// bde mchog 'khor lo'i don ma rnyed// mi 'gyur gsal ba'i sems dang bral// ye shes rin chen 'od kyang nub// 'khor ba'i lcags las thar pa med// sna tshogs 'khor ba'i rang bzhin la// rmongs pa'i blo yis blang der byed// gnyis//
286a4(rnying rgyud): med rang byung 'od gsal la// sgro dang sbar bas rang sems spang // zhes gsungs so// byang chub kyi sems ye shes rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ bya ba dang bral ba las chos dang chos can ma grub par bstan pa'i le'u sde bdun pa'o// // de nas yang rig
286a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyal pos ye shes rig pa'i spyod pa 'di gsungs so// ye shes bde mchog kun tu bzang // rang byung nam mkha'i rdo rje nyid// ci la spyod kyang chags pa med// sgo gsum bag yangs lhag pa nyid// snang med rang byung ye shes gsal// rang bzhag ye
286a6(rnying rgyud): shes spyod pa la// blang dor gnyis med bde chen dang // mkha' mnyam ye shes rang byung la// dus gsum 'da' ba med par gnas// rang 'bar ye shes dkyil 'khor nas// dngos grub rin chen po de ltar 'byung // ye shes rgya mtsho mu mtha' med//
286a7(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal rig pa'i gdeng ldan la// mtshon pa lam gyi rgyud dang thal// rang byung lung gi don mthong bas// lung chen tshad ma kun gyi bdag/ rig pa'i ye shes brjod bral bas// brjod pa'i lung la sems mi 'jug/ sems nyid rig
286b1(rnying rgyud): de'i blon pa byas// can ma shal ga gsal bas// don can man ga sun kyi bdag/ gnags la ma lang mthong bas pas// rba byu na pa dag ma las// chos nyid byu ma smra pa// rang byung gsul ba ma gang// bas
286b2(rnying rgyud): mdag/ 'dod 'jug rim rdol kun dang bral// bsam med rang bzhag spyod pa gnas// sku gsum gi pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // thugs rje nyi ma'i zer shar nas// 'gro 'dul stod pa che bder spyod// thabs kyi rig pa rang shang nas// ye shes gas
286b3(rnying rgyud): bar 'gro don mdzad// ye shes rang byung 'dren skur shar// sna tshogs srul sgra rin chen thos// gang dge dmAn pa'i 'khor dag la// glo dang mthun pa'i bstan pa bkod// 'dod pa'i blo yis dpag med kyang // thig le gcig las 'da' ba med// grob
286b4(rnying rgyud): yi theg pa rnams// ye shes thugs rje'i sgra byung nas// rang phyung gcig la bstan par zad// ri ma 'dug blo yi theg pa rnams// 'dren pa'i sku yis drang don bstan// nges pa'i thig gcig snying po la// 'dod pa'i yanA lag/ kun dang bral// ma lus bstan pa
286b5(rnying rgyud): rnam pa kun// ye shes rig pa'i mkha' la rdzogs// zhes gsung so// byang chub kyi sems ye shes rdzog pa'i rgyud las/ spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas rig pa'i rgyal pos rang byung rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// sems
286b6(rnying rgyud): nyid rang byung dkyil 'khor ni// ma bcos rig pa lhun grub ste// mtha' dbus med pa'i gzhal yas na// rang 'bar ye shes rdzogs sangs rgyas// rang byung rig pa'i 'khor mtha' med// lha ni grub pho brang chen por ni// spyan drangs ma yin ye sangs
286b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas// rang byung gsal ba'i sngags ldan pas// lha yi snying po dbul mi dgos// bde chen gsal ba'i don ldan pas// ye shes gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes// rang byung sems nyid kun gyi lha// dus gsum 'da' med thugs dam mo//
287a1(rnying rgyud): dag ragasug dgal// nyes pa'i drim dang thal bas// ye shes dmachog rnam par dag/ brjod pa rig pa'i don mthong na// rang byung gsang ba'i dmachog thob// rang bzhag sems las mi 'da' na// me tog dmachog nyid yin pa
287a2(rnying rgyud): rang byung dam tshig rnam par dag/ mi rtog 'dzin bra la ye shes la// bsod nams ye shes lhun gyis grub// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// 'gyur med rang byung kun tu bzang // ye shes gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// mtha' dbus med pa'i snying po la//
287a3(rnying rgyud): mA lcen thapa pa'i sems kyis 'jug// rang bzhinan ma dag dbye ba med// ldan grupa rang bzhin mas ngas rgyas// rang rig 'odags ldanam byur dag/ la shes gang bcon mtshan tu dag pal// skrun grupa dang rig gnas pa dang // lce shes rdzogs pa'i kyil
287a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor lha// gzung 'dzin dang bral dri ma med// ye shes snya ma kun tu bzang // rang byung skya mngos bzung med// rnam dag rang byung dkyil 'khor gsum// ma skyes ldan grub bya ba med// don la gang 'jug sbyor ldan rnams// yi ge brda' med gnyis med
287a5(rnying rgyud): gsal// sgyu ma dang bral rig pas rtogs// rang snang rig pa'i 'od la bzhugs// bsam med rang bzhags la leb// ci yang ma yin smin pa// rang gsal ye shes nyi ma'i 'od// kun bzang rgyal ba'i thugs dam mo// zhes gsungs pa
287a6(rnying rgyud): dang / de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad zhus so// snang med bde chen rang snang la// brtags pa'i snang bas gnyis su mthong // rang bzhin rnam dag gser bzhin yang // thog med dus nas don ma mthong // dus 'dir sbyor 'jug gang dag ni//
287a7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i don la mos pas 'jug/ gsal byed rin che ni sgron ma gang // 'dzin pa'i dri ma gang gis dge/ bde chen gsang ba gang gis rnyed// ces zhus pa dang / rig pa'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// bsam gyis mi khyab dus gang la//
287b1(rnying rgyud): gang ldan rig pa'i lde mig gis// rin chen sems nyid khong du chud// snang ba'i rnam pa cir 'gyur yang // yid la mi byed rang bzhag na// 'dzin pa'i dri ma rnam par dag/ ces gsungs so// byang chub kyi sems ye shes rdzogs pa'i drud las/ dkyi /
287b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor gsang ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas rig pa'i rgyal pos sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so// sems nyid gsang ba sngags kyi lha// rang bzhin dag pas sbyang mi dgos// rang gnas ye shes 'od gsal bas//
287b3(rnying rgyud): drangs ma yin ye nas gnas// ye shes kun bzang 'pho 'gyur med// lhun grub rig pa btsal med pas// sprod du bsdu ba dang gis zhi// rang byung khyad par lam chen ni// blang dor gnyis med rig pa'i dang // ye shes dbu ma mtha' bral la// bgrod pa'i las//
287b4(rnying rgyud): med ye sangs rgyas// rig pa kun bral chos nyid la// rang gsal 'od la gang gnas pas// rim pa ma yin cir mi dgongs// ye shes kun bzang lam chen la// blo yi stobs kyis gang 'jug pa'i// spyod ldan kun gyi lam dang bral// btsal med rang
287b5(rnying rgyud): byang bde chen ni// 'dod pa'i rtsol bas gang 'phangs pa'i// rim 'jug rgyu 'bras ma lus stong // kun bzang rang reg 'od gsal la// 'dod pa'i sbyor bas gang 'jug na// phyogs bral rang byung don dang bral// rtsa ba rnam dag mkha' ltar khyab// rnam
287b6(rnying rgyud): dag 'dzin pa'i spyod yul min// sgro med stong pa'i thig le ni// rnam pa med dang gsang ba'i sems// brtags pa sna tshogs ngo bo la// mi g.yo rang bzhin dkyil 'khor nas// ye shes nyi mas kun mthong yang // shin tu sbyor ldan rnal 'byor la//
287b7(rnying rgyud): btags pa'i rnam pa mthong ba med// bsam gyis mi khyab gang dus na// 'od gsal ye shes don snang yang // gang mthong sna tshogs sems dang bral// rang byung dag pa'i 'khor lo la// rang bzhag rig pa kun rdzogs dang // sbyor 'dod sna tshogs mthong
288a1(rnying rgyud): bamed// gsang ba'i 'thar mchogs pa de// ma ma tha gyur bya gnas pa// jim dasnying po rang gas labs// ca 'dod pa dang sa song // gang shig tu ma ba nyid// dpon pong dra bzhin no// su med cus bskyed da
288a2(rnying rgyud): 'dra// rang gnas ye shes gdod nas grub// gang dag dag pa'i 'khor lo la// kyor 'dod nu tshol gang zhig na// mthun pa nyid dam mi mthun pa// thug pa med de gang la 'thad// khyad par ma grub 'od gsal nyid// ma bzlas rang bzhag nyid du bad/
288a3(rnying rgyud): bac+doMs med dgongs pa ci yang min// gzhan la den de bzhin pas// shes padra ma gang langs// de 'dod nyid la'i ltar 'gyur// rtsol 'jag gang la de don la// mthar 'gyur de la de bzhin 'byung // des na gnas pa'i don yinan// bde ska ga
288a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas la// rtog pa'i rnam pa kun med pas// gang zhig 'bras bu'iji ltar 'dod// lhor lan don la yin pas na// de bzhin thams cad dag pa'ang 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// byang chub kyi sems ye shes rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ rig pa
288a5(rnying rgyud): sa bskyed pa dang bral pU bskrun pa'i 'i the brgya 'o// byang rjeb kyisems mi shes rdzogs pa'i dru ces bya rdzogs sa// / ga sa ma khan pa naming ba dang / zang tsa mahAbacas nas d+ha gan 'dra ba dang bsrung ba/
288a6(rnying rgyud): gar skad du/ ma hAs d+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta sarba a btA ra bi shud+d+ho d+hiSh+Tha tar+thA nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems/ kun la 'jug pa rnam dag ston pa'i chud ces bya ba/ dpal kun tu bzang po li phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i
288a7(rnying rgyud): dus gcig na// thams cad sdang zhing de dag de nyid dbyings// rang bzhin mi gnyis chos kun 'gag pa med// ye nas lhan grub ye shes sde tshogs gzhi// byang chub sems dbyings dkyil 'khor byas pa'i tshogs// kun tha bzang po breb med
288b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad mkhyen// ston pa bde chen grug sum gzhan chung skyel// zung 'jug dbyer med yon tan 'phrul pa'i dngos// skra gsung thugs mchog khyad par lha yi wa// sangs rgyas gnyis med dngos kun dus gusam nyid// 'og men ldan tha 'cho
288b2(rnying rgyud): gyi longs spyod gzhi// zhing khams rnam bkod yon tan kun sna tshogs// 'jig rten grangs med gcig tshul btsal med pa'i// dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med pa'i gdanas mchog/ ye shes ma 'gags rin cheni sna tshogs mdangs// dkyil 'khor kAnat+na
288b3(rnying rgyud): yongs ma chad pa'i// rgyan tshogs 'dod pa'i longs spyod sna tshogs par// nyid kyi snang ba'i gdan kun rnam par brtsegs// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs sogs rnam dag pa'i// nyon mongs rkyen bcas dug lnga la sogs 'bras// bdag po ye shes
288b4(rnying rgyud): mthu lnga'i ngo bo nyid// sgra gsung thags mchog yon tan dzin lis brgyan// dri me rdo rje snying po 'dus ma byas// bde gshegs 'khor los theg chen mtshon par byed// don gnA rin chen sna tshogs 'byung ba'i gzhi// chos rnams rang bzhin pod+ma chags parjid/
288b5(rnying rgyud): phrin las thams cad rtsol bral mthar phyin pa// rigs mchog rgyal ba lnga dang bcas pa'i yum// dkyil 'khor dbyings dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mchog/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor grangs med rnam ston cing // thams cad rang bzhin sprul pa'i khyad
288b6(rnying rgyud): par lngas/ mthu dbang byin brlabs yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtso// dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs byams pa dri ma med// kun tu bzang po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ sa snying nam
288b7(rnying rgyud): mkha'i snying po nyi zla'i 'od// rin chen dra ba brtson pa'i dbang phyug dang // phyag na rdo rje dga' dbang spyan gsal stobs// sgrib pa rnam sel shes rab dran pa'i mchog/ thugs rje shes rab 'brel tshogs yul dang bcas// gangs med rigs
289a1(rnying rgyud): kyi gca bor gyur pa dag/ rgyu 'bras chos kun rnam par spong byed cing // rang gi mtshan brjod ston pa'i don ji ltar// sangs rgyas mthu yis phyogs rnams 'khod par 'gyur// ye nas rang bzhin ma bcos dkyil 'khor che/
289a2(rnying rgyud): de nyid gtso ba de nyid 'khor kyi tshul// 'byung rjen sa rgya me chung nam mkha' las// rang byung rigs tshogs dkyil 'khor rten dang gnas// 'gro ba'i lam kun 'phrul pa'i mthu mtshungs pas// brtan g.yo de bzhin thab mthar byin pa'i// rang
289a3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas pad+ma'i snying po can// gnyis sdud gnyis med pade chen khyab pa'i dbyings// ston pa gnas 'khor bstan pa gnyis med pa'i// dus gsum nyid na rab tu mthar phyin pa'i// thams cad gnyis med byin gyis brlabs las ldang // de dag bad
289a4(rnying rgyud): ba chen po chos nyid do// de nas ston pa'i cho 'phrul thabs sna tshogs// gnyis med gnyis kyi tshul du snang ba las// thams cad ngo mtshar skyes pas ngoms par 'gyur// bskyod tshig gsang ba'i rgyud kyis gsol ba gdab// chos kun rab tu mi gnas gan/
289a5(rnying rgyud): med pa'i// dngos tshogs de bzhin rang byung ma btsal dbyings// thabs dang shes rab zung du 'jug pa'i sku// kun tu bzang po sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// khyed kyi chos nyid byin rlabs brtag dka' bas// bdag cag ngo mtshar sgo 'dir the tshom skyes// de
289a6(rnying rgyud): kun gsang ba'i chos chen 'brel ba'i tshul// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs bsam 'das pa// dus kun thugs rje dri ma med pa'i spyan// mtha' bral bstan pa'i snying po theg pa che// dag pablo gros shin tu sbyangs pa la// thugs kyi ye shes rgyud chen gsang /
289a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i mthus// de ltar bde gshegs rig lnga'i sangs rgyas tshogs// gcig gis gcig la dga' ba'i gsol 'debs shing // rang gi mtshan nyid gsang don bstan mdzad nas// kun gyis mthun par kun tu bzang la 'dud// de dag byin rlabs ngo
289b1(rnying rgyud): mtshang tshogs rgya chen// rgyas nyid mthulas zhing khyams kun tu g.yas// snod brgyad rab tu 'khrugs shing rnam par grol// sangs rgyas grangs med rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung // de las spang ba'i stong khams rdul ted kyis// rang gi mthu ga
289b2(rnying rgyud): dpe bral kun tu ston// sna tshogs gnas rnams bkod pa chen po'i dbyings// me 'gyur mnyam pa'i phrin las kun spyod pa'o// zhes kun na tu zer skyon to// rdzogs pa chen pa mas nyid byang chub kyi sems gan la 'jug pa rnya ma dag ston pa'i snang pas/
289b3(rnying rgyud): brtan pa'i gzugs brtan rje skar 'brang zhing snang ba'i le'u snyed de po'o// / de nas thams cad rig pa'i mchog gyur pa// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor chen po tshogs zin nas// kun tu chos rnams mi 'gyu tshogs pa'i// thag cha chen por
289b4(rnying rgyud): lnga tshags gsal// rigs mchog rgal ba kun gyis gsol 'debs shing // rang byung mchod pa'i tshogs rnams kun tu 'bul// rgyud mchog rol pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i gnas// byang chub sems pade kun tu khyab pa las// rang sdang dkyil
289b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor zab mo zung 'brel ba// byin chubs yul tshogs gnyis med gsang bas 'dug/ de yi rang bzhin ngo mtshar chos 'byung ba'o// dngos tshogs las 'bras gnyis sgra med pa gang / gaba' ba'i yul mede stong pa gran thal bas// ba ba rdon
289b6(rnying rgyud): pa thab mtha' ste tshugs cing // martog ting 'dzin gsal ba'i gtus 'jug pa// don can zug rgya bsgos pa ga tshogs tsas// byin cag sa gnyis med bang dror phyag tu'i gzhi/ 'ching krol chos gnam pa' mas stod pa'i // gol gribs pa
289b7(rnying rgyud): bcas kun tu 'bring byed pa'o// so sor 'dzin mang byang chub chen po mchog/ spang thob rtse zag dbye zhing dpeng med// 'bras bu tshul chen lhun gyis grub gnas shing // 'di ltar de las de bzhin de 'byung ba'i// 'brel med 'brel bcas pa/ na du bzhag sa
290a1(rnying rgyud): na smra// da par me ga pa me pa smos// smad pa sa nga gsu pabs na// sa padas snru mas phul ma dug dang / danam 'amigs gas g+sag slob dag/ 'og pa ga thar
290a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i nyes rtogs nam mang ba// sgo 'drogs slar 'debs yang dag don las nyams// mnyam pa chen po'i dbyings su la bzla' zhing // blo dman theg pa'i gol rmi ba rnam par dang // rgyu 'bras rigra 'dzin sngar yang 'khrul pa'i tshogs/
290a3(rnying rgyud): las kun bskrod pa'i mthas 'ching byin pa med// gnyis kyis gnyis bskyed gnyis su grub pa'i chos// col bzlas mtha' bskyod don kun phyag tu 'jig/ gdams ngag dam pa ston pa'i mdzod nas byung // kun rdzi mtshan nyid dmigs par dka' ba/
290a4(rnying rgyud): chos// yon tan rin chen tshogs rnams thams cad 'byung // de yi gnas 'gyur sangs rgyas kun gyi yab// dmigs med thugs rje rang las kun snang gsal// ma lus mtha' rnams ye nas lhan grub cing // ji bzhin chos kun ma bcos lhag
290a5(rnying rgyud): bzhag cing // phyogs chu lhun grub rang byung ye shes drangos/ zung 'dzin rnam dag bsgom pa'i grol ba yang // dmigs bral ting 'dzin nyams su myong ba gang // lta ba med pa'i spyod pas mi grol tshul// gzhan nas 'dod pa'i 'khrul pas 'dod
290a6(rnying rgyud): pa bsgeg/ gzhan nas thob par 'dod pas gol ba'i lam// theg gzhan dang brtson spong bas don mi rnyed// thabs kyi mtshan nyid che ba'i chos spyod pas// gsang sngags kyi nang spyod pas gol bar 'jug/ spang blang dbyer med mthun 'dug dpe dang
290a7(rnying rgyud): bcas// dpe yi'i zad pas yang dag don gsal byed// 'bras bu rang chas gnas pa'i tshul 'dzin cing // ngo bo rang byung byang chub sems kyis brgyan// snang srid rtog tshogs byang chub gzhan na med// 'di don dus kun 'gyur med shes pa'i 'o//
290b1(rnying rgyud): thugs rje'i mdzang bgang yang mi 'gog pa// rang bzhin bde ba'i yul rnams mthun pas bsgrub// lhun gyis grub cing bskyod cing bzlas pa'i don// ye nas gnas sogs gzhan du rtsol ba'i chos// bden pa zung du 'jug pa'i ngang tshul bzang //
290b2(rnying rgyud): gang las gang ltar de dag de yi gzhi// 'di na mos pa tsam gyis 'dzin byed dag/ don kun gsang ba'i theg chen 'brel pa'i rgyud// thabs mchog rgyal ba kun gyi byin rlabs kyis// phra ba'i gnas don dgongs pa'i byin rlabs shugs// zhes pa
290b3(rnying rgyud): dag par cha cher gsungs so// rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems kun la 'jug pa rnam dag ston pa'i rgyud las/ bstan pa'i don zhus pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog kun ston snyed gtso/
290b4(rnying rgyud): chos kun sna tshogs don 'byung brjod pa'i tshig gsang bas// rang byung bde ba'i gnas chen kun tu khyab mdzad cing // mdzes pa'i rigs mchog dkyil 'khor rgya cher bshad cing gzung // mi gnas dmigs pa'i yul med mi rtog chos kyi lam/
290b5(rnying rgyud): bsngo ba'i cha shas phra ba'i yul las byung ba de// rtog bsgom chos kyi sku ni khyad par don med pas// rang byung ye shes mi tog kun tu ji bzhin gnas// thabs la mkhas pas thabs kyi bye brag sna tshogs kun// thams cad gcig tu 'jug pa'i rgyun ldan
290b6(rnying rgyud): don kun gsang // ma 'dres phyag rgya bskyod pa'i tha snyad thabs kyi chos// ye shes rang gnas shes rab che gzhan kun tu btsal// ngo mtshar mthong ba'i yul med de la mthong ba'i ming/ gang la thob par mi rigs bsnyad pa kun dang bral// chos
290b7(rnying rgyud): dang chos nyid rtag tu 'dres shing dbyer med la// don dam chos gzhan lhag par bstan cing bzung ba med// 'khrul dang byang chub la ma de rtog pas thob pa med// rang byung ye shes nyid kyang tshig gi mtha' dang bral// ye nas sangs rgyas bdag
291a1(rnying rgyud): nyid mngon sum gnas pa la// grib ma gzugs kyi dpe bzhin de la rtog pa 'byung // med de med pa ma yin med pa'i snying po 'byung // stong ste stong pa ma yin spyod pa'i yul la gnas// nam mkha'i rang ba' na
291a2(rnying rgyud): de las 'byung ba'i dran pa bskyed// bye brag 'dzin pa'i bde ba 'dod pa med pas len// chos nyid chos tshogs gang dag rgyud 'dzin pa'i// kun tu ma g.yos phyogs rnams sgrub byed chos snang ba// don kun phyag rgya rgya mtsho'i gzhir
291a3(rnying rgyud): gyur gsang ba'i yul// thams cad rnam par mi bskyod dpe yi tshogs rnams brjod// rang byung ngo mtshar gtan tshigs yul thal med pa'i mig/ snang med rtog pa'i rgyud kun don stong gsang sngags che// gang gis gang la dngos can
291a4(rnying rgyud): mthar 'don de yi chos// tha snyad gyud las thams cad 'das pa'i don gsal ba// thos shing dpyod pas rnam mkhyen phyag rgya sngags kyi klung // mdud pa'i sbubs de dag chu bzhin 'khrul pa'i rdzas// tshogs meng mtha' 'das bsod nams las
291a5(rnying rgyud): chen po mchod// yod sdang med pa'i khams kun bde bar rang byung zhing // btsal sems so so'i dpe 'das dbye bas la de nyid med// 'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs de nyid der snang bas// de yi chos kun mkhyen pas don 'dir ston// bden zhing ming dang
291a6(rnying rgyud): skad to/ 'i myatha' 'gags bya'o// 'di dag rang bzhi dang byer med chos pa'i snang ba nyid// sems kyi tha skad don kun dkyil 'khor cha shas dag/ dmigs pa'i yul rnams thub mo'i dgongs 'jug togs dka'i chos// shes pa tsam du
291a7(rnying rgyud): sman pa nang la dngos 'dzin ces rtog kun// de med mi 'byung de las mtha' yi spyad selab// thams cad rtag dang chad pa'i srab phyogs pa 'khor// yul sems so so'i rten 'brel gcig las gnyis tshogs spang // rang bzhin ma
291b1(rnying rgyud): g.yos de las rtag tu 'byung // gzhan dag 'bral ba'i don gyis gcig las gcig spang zhing // b+hang dang mi snang tha skad sems kyi myos kun dag/ chos dang chos nyid dbyer med gcig las thams cad 'byung // don dmagun rdzong pa
291b2(rnying rgyud): ga dag gi dngos kun cing // mangs pa sa can ma ma kun las phyogs rgyas 'gyur// rang byung bde ba'i rtog pa'i mdangs kyi yul dpyod ma 'aM/ bzung ba'i yul med de pas ye shes 'byung ba la// sngon med drang stong bsnyen du bsgom
291b3(rnying rgyud): mid byang 'jog/ bal med rnam col 'bad pa'i gdung bas zin pa ni// rang bzhin lam de 'khrul bas thams cad gdas 'ad das/ mthen pa med// ji bzhin pa zhes rnam nag de kyai tog bsgom pa// bde ba chen po 'dod pas chags pa'i nad yin te/ mi
291b4(rnying rgyud): g.yo rang bzhin gnas pa'i sman chen ma byas na// mtho ris bgrod pa'i rgyu kon mongs zin par 'gyur// las kyi mtha' yis kun tu 'jig cing nye bar spyod// 'gyur ba de dag bdag po'i mthu las gzhan du sdang // ma dang smin nga rtog
291b5(rnying rgyud): tshogs pas ma dpyod pas// mu stegs rigs can rang gi phyogs kun 'ching bar byed// bltab pa snyems pas grub mtha' bden grub dngos kun gnas// yang dag srid mtha'i kun tu rtog pa'i chu rgyun gsal// nam mkha'i rang bzhin don
291b6(rnying rgyud): ku gzhan du 'bras bslabs pas// ming dang brda' las byung ba'i cha shas dngos su rnam par dag/ lAm mAd lam du 'jug pa rnams kyi nad che ba// byin par 'dod pas ri dwags sreg su ba byug pa 'dra// rnyed pa'i yul med 'jig rten
291b7(rnying rgyud): gsum las myong mi 'byung // sa bcur ltos pa'i gnas kyang byang chub sgrib pa yin// shin tu myur ba'i ye shes bsam pa kun dang bral// bshes gnyen kun las byung ba'i nor bu rin chen mdzod// dmigs pa med cir 'gyur ba'i gnas
292a1(rnying rgyud): la mi ltos par// nang gi rang bzhin legs pas re ba thams cad spang // brtags na med la sna tshogs 'byung ba'i legs pa che// dngos su mi snang chags pa'i cha shas kun la ston// bdag dang gzhan
292a2(rnying rgyud): du thal ba'i ston mkhan rin chen mdzod// thams cad grub pa'i yul zhes bdag med snying rjes bstan// nang nas ma g.yos nang du btsal ba'i gnas med de// yul phyir chags shing yul la brjo ba'i dmigs pa med// mi 'byung
292a3(rnying rgyud): drug bdag med snying rje de yin na// gzhan gyis nor min ma byung ye nas gnas pa yin// bdag gzhan gang gi phyogs 'dzin mthar gyin lha gsum nyid// ma des snying po byang chub rtsol med tha dad lam// bdag nyid chos de
292a4(rnying rgyud): don tshal gnas mnges pa yis// rtsal dang sgyu ma'i spyan bral thabs kun dkyil 'khor che// ming bsam yul med bdud tshogs gzhom med dngos gru'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor rgya zla theg tshogs kun 'byung rgya chen bral// rab tu ra
292a5(rnying rgyud): pas don 'dir bde ba'i ye shes gzhi// thams cad ma nges phyag rgyas mthar 'don 'jigs pa sel// bya bral yul la mi gnas gnyen pos bcos su med// yan lag chos kyi dbang gis snying po'i yul tshal zhing // rnam pa cir nga
292a6(rnying rgyud): mi rtog thabs kyis de la rol// snying po'i rang bzhin 'byung ba gzhan na med// phul phran gcig las bsres shing phyogs bcu kun dang bral// mi// nAs don nyid legs pa'i ye shes rang byung ste// mngon sum kun tu mi rtog yangs
292a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i snying po la// rnam dag lam 'dir zhugs pas mnyam pa'i rgyal po 'thob// mi 'gyur 'gyur ba med pas chags pa'i gnas med de// de bzhin gzung ba'i yul med 'dzin pa'i gnas kyang med// yang dag ye shes kun
292b1(rnying rgyud): ba sa pas banan/ rnapapa ga rdzun na/ mas ba du da chu byu dag pa thog+sa da/
292b2(rnying rgyud): s+ya thob par 'dod pas rgyal rtag tu bsgom// bsgom chags bad bde las mnyam pa'i rnon mi 'byung // skragatsog+sa kun tu khyab pas mngon pa'i chos med de// mtha' la thug pa med pas dbyings la da rjo/
292b3(rnying rgyud): chos
292b4(rnying rgyud): r-il sa nyams 'phags lhag pa'i gnas byed // rang blang ye shes che ba'i yul kun de bzhin gnas// gsong ba'i sbrul kun de las de rgyud 'brel ba'i don// lhag pa'i don 'di thabs dang shesu dbya gnyis ze dang // ga
292b5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag drug tung byed pa'o// mdad pe dran pa'i rtags kun zhi banyid du m+b+ha// 'drid 'dug gsal pa'i yul nyid mtha' pA lA d+hag tu bde// sems drupa'i me mchog dpal mdod don ldan pas//
292b6(rnying rgyud): 'bras thugs du sngags cad 'dir 'gags pa'i chos// de dag me skyes nas kyi dang byed pa'iH// 'di zhes gsung rdzogs brjod pas dgra pa'i tshogs 'phel zhing // mi mthun gnas phrin 'grib pa'i bag chags dngos med pa'o/
292b7(rnying rgyud): don mthun snang zhi gas de lpags pa ga shags kun gyi tshul// nges pa'i ma grom dus kun gnas par thams cad 'jug/ tsasteg sbyangs so// rdzogs pa chen tha chos nyid byung grub kyis mas can la 'jug par bla dge ston pa'i
292b8(rnying rgyud): sa/ nges par bstan pa'i tshul gyis bsdus pa'i la khyegasum pa'o// / de nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog/ dmatshar 'jig tan rmad byung 'o// 'od gnags pa du pa do//
293a1(rnying rgyud): // par spyod pa'i gzhi// gang la yul 'di mthar phyin pa'i// phyag rgya rig pa'i bdag nyid sngags// dngos grub yul med mthar phyin pa'i// mtshan bcas 'jug pa'i chos kun las// 'di dag gsang ba'i ye shes sku// rigs rnams tha dad sna tshogs
293a2(rnying rgyud): pas// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems kyi gzhi// tha snyad gang gis rgyun bsgrubs shing // don kun gsang ba'i chos 'jug pa// nges bzhin 'byung ba'i gdangs gsal bzhin// med pa'i bsam brjod yun gyis rdzogs// ji ltar zab mo'i tha snyad kun// don
293a3(rnying rgyud): 'di rnam par grol byed pa'i// sems rgyud tha dad ngo bos 'jog/ dang po'i rtog pas yul kun nyid// shes pa gang gis gang la 'jug/ chos nyid bde ba'i don kun gnas// phyogs kyi snang ba ma 'gags chos// bsam 'das dpyod par dka' ba'i tshigs//
293a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun gyi cha lugs gsal// de las phyogs kyi cha bzung ste// phyi nang kun tu 'byung ba'i tshogs// chos dang chos dbyings dbyer med la// mi mthun gnyen po'i rtog 'dzin cing // don dam kun rdob lhag pa'i gnas// gdags pa'i yul mthar skye ba'i rgyun// ming chog
293a5(rnying rgyud): byed dngos stong pa'i chos// de dag las kyi mtha' 'gog pa'o// 'khrul pas sna tshogs btags pa'i cha// ji ltar mi bsgrib 'khor lo bzhin// nga med phyag rgya'i mtha' gsang bas// byang chub sems kyi lam rgyud gsal// rtog pa'i yul tshogs chos 'dzin pa'i// theg pa gzhan
293a6(rnying rgyud): rgyud rnam par bsdus// rang byung ye shes ji lta bar// dngos kun gsal ba'i don ston pa'o// 'das pa'i mtha' rnams spyod pa'i yul// de dag dngos kun ma 'ongs dus// da lta'i tshig tshogs mtha' las 'das// rang gi ngo bo kun 'jog byed// 'di dag ye nas ma bcos pa'i /
293a7(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu'i dngos kun gzhan du 'gyur// de dag blo yi snang bas te// rigs kun de bo ma 'gags pa// don kun phyag rgya'i cha lugs sku// mi shegs rdo rje lta bu'i dngos// thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i gnas// spyod bcas rnam pa sna tshogs gzhi// byang chub
293b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// thabs kyi gar tshogs yul kun nyid// bde ba'i chu lugs ma rmongs pa// rigs tshogs gsang ba'i lha nyid do// khams gsum dngos grub lhag pa'i gnas// rang byangs yi rtags las gyes// don kun \u0f7fga
293b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor tshogs// sems dpa' rang rig kun nas 'jug/ ji ltar don kun rang bzhin bcas// phyi nang chos kun rnam par dag/ med pas phyogs su dmigs pa'i yul// thams cad stong pa'i mtha' rnams skyes// med pa'i snying po gas
293b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzhi// tha dad don min der 'jug pa'i// dpe 'dis zab mo sder bcas pas// dpe yi tha snyad gang du 'jug/ de dag rtag chad stong pa'i yul// sgro skur ming las mtha' rnams gnas// ma 'dres gsang ba'i thig le che// bslab med
293b4(rnying rgyud): mi mthun gnas las lces// mi bskyod kyi nang med par 'phel// ma bgrod lam kun sa yi dbyings// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ji lta bar// 'byung tshogs ma 'dres bkod pa'i sgo// theg pa thams cad gsal byed pa// thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten
293b5(rnying rgyud): 'dras// dran pa'i gnas kun bskyed pa'i phyir// dngos 'di dngos po gsal byed pa'o// bya bral yul kun rnam par gnas// thabs kyi rdzas kun snang ba'i tshogs// gang dag zin pas de yi mtha'i// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam kun spyod// bde ba chen
293b6(rnying rgyud): po'i 'jug pa ni// 'bras bu 'dod pa med pa'i dbyings// de yi mthu kun yul spyod pas// yang dag dkyil 'khor gsal mi 'gyur// phyi rol yul tshogs 'dus pa'i bdag/ rdul phran gang bu'i mtshan nyid can// ma byas mtshan ma med chos rtags//
293b7(rnying rgyud): mkha'i dbyings bzhin phyogs bcur brdal// bza' ba'i yul med bsam bral rgyud// rang gi ye shes gsal ba'i gnas// thams cad dngos kun spangs pa'i blos// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsang dang bral// 'byung 'jug res kyis 'khyil pa las//
294a1(rnying rgyud): ye shes yul bcas 'byung bar tsa la// bran gyi dang skyong chen po yis// dan 'di rje gcig sgom byed cing // nang gi chos kun 'gags pa'i don// de las de byung mthar byed cing // nA macol zhi bas phyogs gcig gnas// rang bawAn ya shas
294a2(rnying rgyud): las nyams// blo rgyud rnam par nyams pas 'khrul// phyi rol las nang nang las phyi// theg pa'i mchog gis grol 'dod pas// des na nyes pas kun tu 'ching // 'di dag stong dang mi stong zhes// rtag chad bde sdug mtshan mas chags// mi mthun rnam
294a3(rnying rgyud): par rtog pa'i yul// ji bzhin chos kun ngo bor 'dzin// de las de yi yul bcas rtog/ thabs rnams la sprul pa'i mthar 'dzin pas// yul med dngos kun ma rdzogs 'ju// bya bdag las tshul 'di rtse// mdze ris byams pa'i gnas bgrod cing // de rgya zar pa'i chos ba
294a4(rnying rgyud): pas// ma rig gnas su 'di rgyud chos// bdag dang bcas pa'i gnas kun 'jig/ 'jig rten las 'das mi mthun stobs// 'khrul tshogs sdug bsngal skye ba'i rgyun// rgyu 'bras gnyis tshogs mthar 'dzin dmigs// lam med phyogs kyi gnas bgrod pas// lam
294a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i nyes tshogs nad chen rnams// dus gsum sgrib pa'i 'khrul rtog rkyen// 'jig rten mtshan nyid shes dka' bas// dgos don gsal ba kun gyi yul// rang gi mthar 'dzin dman pa'i shugs// dam bcas 'jig rten sgrol ba stobs// de med de yi rgyu 'bras
294a6(rnying rgyud): thob// mtha' bzhir spyod pa'i tshul 'bras shing // mgos byung tshor bstan pa'i sgo// mtha' dbus phyogs su ltos pa'i yul// rab tu dga' ba la sogs 'bras// sbyin sobla stobs kyis bgrod pa'i mthus// rang gi ye shes gnas kun dag// pha rol phyin sogs sa
294a7(rnying rgyud): brnyes pa'o// thabs mkhas shes rab rnam par sbyangs// rgya chen zab mo sngags kyi lam// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor tshogs// sangs rgyas 'khor bcas kun gyi mdzod// rtog pa'i chos rnams sdang byed pa'o// mya ngan 'das par kun rdzogs chos// thabs 'di
294b1(rnying rgyud): rang byung gnas stod cing // mi shes ngo tshom kun tu spyod// ba shas gnyen chen po'i gdams ngag las// don kun 'bras bu rtse bar 'gyur// gang las ma bstan chos rnams 'bras// ye shes dbyid kyi sangs rgyas tshogs// 'di dag yon tan kun 'thung gnas// thams
294b2(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i gsang ba nyid// rgyud chen snying po'i don gsal byed// thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// thams cad yul phyir ma 'dres bstan// gang 'di sangs rgyas gang las byung // snang ba phyogs kun gang gi don// cha med yul tshogs cha thal bas// kyi nang dkyil
294b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor bkod pa bzhin// 'di ltar phung po 'byung bcas pa// de las de snang rgyun 'brel pa// thabs kyi rtse mo kun spags pas// mtha' dag zag pa med pa'i yul// 'gyur ba med pas phyogs chos kun// rang snang dpe rnams sna tshogs byos// nang gi yul can gyi rol rgyun// de
294b4(rnying rgyud): mtha' gang du'ang ma 'gags pa'o// legs par bstan pa'i gnas rdzogs byed// theg pa thams cad rtsod pa'i gzhi// don gsum the tshom kun bral bas// grangs can yul las grol bar 'gyur// dngos su rtsod pa'i mtha' spangs pas// phyag rgya chen po gnyis med pa'o//
294b5(rnying rgyud): mi rtag gang dag tha snyad rgyun// de yi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin gsal// ston pa 'jig rten sgron ma'i gtso// sangs rgyas theg pa kun 'dus pa'i// mya ngan 'das lam 'jig byed bdag/ de dag phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis 'joms// gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i yul med par// sa bon kun 'jug
294b6(rnying rgyud): 'i rgyun// ma g.yos dngos kun mtha' 'das pas// phyin ci log rnams kun tu snang // bdag gzhan ris su ma grub na// de dag tha snyad ga la 'dzin// yang dag byang chub sems kyi dngos// phyogs bcu dus rnams rdzogs pa nyid// thams cad grub pa'i yul dag ni// dben pa'i
294b7(rnying rgyud): rtsal sems rdzogs pa nyid// phyed bcas phyed la rab tu sgrol// de las nyi ma'i mdangs rdzogs pa'o// dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje che// nam mkha'i gza' skar sna tshogs pas// nang nas ma g.yo nad kun zhi// de dag gang gi rdzas su sbyong // don 'byung gsang chen gsang ba'i rgyud//
295a1(rnying rgyud): mas rgyu / gas / pa dun dru/ rnam sa da// ga/
295a2(rnying rgyud): bcobargyad la sogs par// tha dad mi rtog ma spros pas// rang bzhin kun tu ma dzes pa'o// mkhas rnams rab tu zhi ba yi// reg pa sa tshogs dbang ba ldan// mi gnyis tha da dper bab pa// rab turtags pa'i mthar gyi pa'o// mi 'gyur mi 'jugs
295a3(rnying rgyud): ba// thams cad skyes pazhi nas 'gag/ de las skyes dang 'gag pa'i rgyun// don 'di bcwa snang bar 'gyur/ dag seM ste chen po yis// sa sten rnams rdzogs smras te// rang byung b+hag pa myed pa na// 'phags pa'i rdzas bdun kun myong ba // der
295a4(rnying rgyud): 'jug dmigs pa'i rting nge 'dzin// don ku rdzogs brgya tshogs pa// de yi chags dmigs dang thA li// dus gsu pa ma tha~M rnye zeng // thabs ca mkhyen pa dab dang shes// TI gnas gnyen pos bcos su med// las can rnam par 'byed pa'i tshogs// chags
295a5(rnying rgyud): las ste/ yan ga rnams cing chu bams// bsgrud byu dzin/ migs pa gas / phyogs pa ni gan pa// la sa sa// bdung pa 'a dus nga/
295a6(rnying rgyud): bya byed ba nga coM ste// de nga byi dzin 'phrul// rnam pa pa zugs ba don// bing ba 'i nyon theg pa thabs dang na par ba jug ci tshogs// ku d+ha babang po'i rol pa'idrabs// mi sag ma kyang kya skye pagan// don ma tha theg par ldang per gyis
295a7(rnying rgyud): pa g+sa// desas thams ba y-i/ ma dran tha pa bas pas// mas pa pa na na pa / nga tshog sa pas pas byed ba/ dag cags ngas las thag/ krigs tshe tha sa kyis/
295b1(rnying rgyud): yi rol par sbyang // 'di ltar kha dog la sogs rdzas// nam mkha'i rang bzhin rnams kyis 'dod// gang byung rdzas kyi khyad par gyis// khams gsum rab tu 'jig par 'gyur// de nas grub pa'i mtha' dpyod pas// b+h+yo yi chos rnams 'jig par byed// mi
295b2(rnying rgyud): gnas don kun ston byed pas// shes rab chen po'i yul mthar phyin// dka' ba'i gnas kun pade rdzogs pa'i// don kun phyag rgya legs pa'i gzhi// ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi// rang byung ngo mtshar rnam spyod pa'o// de dag thabs kyi bdag nyid las//
295b3(rnying rgyud): rgyamatsho'i rlabs bzhin kun tu g.yo// chos nyid mngon rtogs las byung ba'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes mchog/ mngon sum tshul gyi mngon sum mchog/ theg pa'i 'bras bu che ba nyid// me rtog de bzhin nyid kyi bdag/ nam mkha'i mtha' bzhin zab
295b4(rnying rgyud): ma'i dbyings// yangs par sbyong bas che ba'i mchog/ rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin mnyam dang bral// yangs pa'i snying po kun gyi gzhi// snying po nyid las snying po'i tshogs// rnam dag thams cad kun tu dag/ ma dag lus tshogs mtshon pa'i tshig/ phyogs bcu'i
295b5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rang gi chos kun nges par sbyor// mnyam pa'i lam 'di mthar phyin pas// phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// bdag las gzhan las gnyis ka las// bde ba'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur// gdod nas rab tu
295b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i chos// s+ya gyen 'bras bu'i rgyu smin pa'i// thams cad ye shes rnam spong pas// mtha' rnams phyogs kyi gzung bral zhing // phyi nang dbye bas kun spyod dag/ mi 'gyur 'gyur ba med pa'i khams// de dag rang gi las kyis
295b7(rnying rgyud): 'dug/ dag pa'i rjes tshogs nyi shu'i grangs// phyogs mthun gcig pas kun tu bskyed// chags pa'i tshul gyis chags bral spyod// ma chags dngos kun 'jug pa'i rgyun// bsam gtan chen po 'di 'dzin pa'i// sres bu rtog
296a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i dra bas bsgribs// mi 'gyur chags pa'i gnas med par// su dag gang gis chos don gnyer// thams cad byang chub sems las skyes// gzung dang 'dzin pa kun spangs pa'o// rang bzhin bde bas kun bskyod
296a2(rnying rgyud): dbregs pa'i byeng po nar pa 'byung // cha 'ding mngon du kyang 'dod pas// 'bras tham mthanam gyung byed// rdu la 'jug pa 'di dgagang // sems kyi gnas la pa'o// mngon sngamathob par 'dod pa rnams// de du sto
296a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzungs// gnyis med ye shes thugs gsang ba// mgos spyod pa'i yul gyis min// rdzogs pa'i chos nyid gshegs pa'i chos// sna tshogs ngo bo mthar phyin pas// b+ha ba tsal bsngo ba'i rgyu rnams kyang // kun tu khyab pa'i chos grwa nyid// de yi mdzad tshogs sgra rnams las//
296a4(rnying rgyud): saM saM 'i rnam bcas tha dad pas// bya ba thams cad rab tu rdzogs// 'di la bstan par bya ba dang // gzhag cing dbri ba'i chos med de// phyi nang yul la bltas byas na// sems nyid zag med ye shes che// de bzhin mtha' las de dag 'jug/ sems dpa' chen po'i 'bras bu'i
296a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi// thabs kyis nyams su myong ba'i dus// nang gi bde ba phyi yi chos// de bzhin de yi gnas su gzhi// de las phyag rgya'i bde ba 'byung // chos kyi rol pa'i yul tshogs kun// nyams kyis de yi stobs mtshungs te// nor bas 'khrul ba'i blo bskyed kyang // rang bzhin ye
296a6(rnying rgyud): shes nyams pa med// dngos 'di byang chub sems rgya chen// rang byung che ba'i snying po las// dus gsum kun tu ri bzhin gnas// rab tu rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyas// rnal 'byor de yi chos 'dod pas// de bcas tshul ni nyams par byed// dga' ba'i rnam grangs so sor
296b1(rnying rgyud): dpe// dgongs par bcas pa gtan la 'bebs// 'di nyid theg mchog gsang ba'i rgyud// rus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi bka'// ngo mtshar phyag rgya 'da' dka' bas// nges don gsang mchog gzung bar gyis// zhes rgya cher bstan to// rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid
296b2(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi sems kun la 'jug pa rnam dag ston pa'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po phyag rgya'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas thams cad 'dus pa'i tshogs// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bslang bas// phyogs 'dud pa yi dga' bde yis// rang gi ston pa
296b3(rnying rgyud): mnyes par mdzad// e ma bde gshegs sangs rgyas kun// rang bzhin dngos rnams ma grub pas// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul// de yi mtshan mA ya mtshan che// don kun rab tu sgrub pa yi// gsang ba'i spyod pa ji ltar skad// de badzin gshegs pa
296b4(rnying rgyud): dgyes chen po// kun tu spyan dras dbang phyug gis// kun bzang yum dang 'khril sbyor zhing // byang chub sems kyi spyod pas rol// thabs dang shes rab khyad par gsang ba'i mchog/ rang gi yum mchog 'khril pas spor byas te// don kun gsang ba'i mchog tu dgongs
296b5(rnying rgyud): spyod pas// nye bar bstan pa'i cha shas yongs su rdzogs// bde ba 'dod pas bde ba rgyab kyis phyogs// bde ba zin te bde bas bde ba 'tshol// byang chub 'khrul pas ye rngam chos la gza'// de lta bu yi yul can sangs rgyas mthong ba yin// sangs rgyas med pas
296b6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas ming yang med// sangs rgyas ston pa ming du btags pas nor// sangs rgyas gzhan nas thob byed nor ba'i lam// gzugs med chos kun bshad pa rdul cha med// khams gsum ye shes cha lugs rnam bkod pas// gnas galdem mi gnyis thams cad
296b7(rnying rgyud): brtson par byed// rab tu dka' ba'i thabs kyis stobs rdzogs na// mi btsal bde ba'i chos rnams sems las byung // gnyis su med pa lta spyod gsags pa'i gzhi// bsgrub pa'i dngos gzhi don kun rnam par 'jug/ rnal 'byor 'di dag theg par rang brtson byed//
297a1(rnying rgyud): sa brgya mtshan ma'i gnas kun sgrib pa med// sangs rgyas rnam grol sems dpa'i yul kun 'ag/ mA rtag ldag bskul stong zhing bdag med pas// des byas byang po'i ma tshogs ma rjes pas// don 'dig tan tshogs kun sa gzhag par dka'// ben/
297a2(rnying rgyud): dang chags dang bral dang zhi// dngos po med dang rnam par yangs// bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin la// bza' ba'i thabs la rag pa med// yangs so che'o chos chen po// chung ngu rnams kyi gnyen po yin// che la dmigs pa'i tshe skam na// chung che de rnams dmigs dang bral/
297a3(rnying rgyud): gsungs dang rgyas dang dmigs dang snang // sgra mkhan ri mo'i rnam pa bzhin// 'byung 'jug ye shes byed thugs kyis// de yi dbang las skye bar 'gyur// 'di ni theg pa kun gyi rgyal// btang ngo bzhag go rang bzhin gyi// 'dod pa med cing len pa med//
297a4(rnying rgyud): thod pa rdul tsam mi skye zhing // khyung chen nam mkhar lding ba ltar// spro ba med cing bslab med// thams cad yul kun 'jug pas na// gtor ba mi dgos bza' ba med// rgya mtsho bzhin du ye gnas la// chos rnams sna tshogs 'byung bar byed// yon tan
297a5(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// bsdu ba'i gnas su nges pa med// byang chub snying por de ma thag/ ting 'dzin rgyal po chen po 'byung // snang ba rgya mtsho chen po bzhin// mi rtog nam mkha'i mtha' ltung yangs// kun tu bzung po'i spyod yul la// skye zhing 'tsho
297a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos med de// chu rkyen yan lag bcu gnyis so// skur pa btab nas bshad pa yin// 'khrul pa rnams kyi sgo tsam du// mkhas pas de bzhin shes par gyis// 'gro ba rgyud drug snang ba yang // dang po'i lam du shes par bya// 'dod spyod stong rjes brlan pos na// gang
297a7(rnying rgyud): dra dga' bar byang chub spyod// bshan pa smad 'tshong mtshams med lnga// kha na ma tho 'jig rten spong // yongs su rdzogs pa chos kyi rtse// bdeb che las gzhan med do// rnam par mi rtog snying po'i mchog yongs kyi rgyud gsal sbas pa med// mi len byang chub spyod rnams la//
297b1(rnying rgyud): smod pa kun tu rang bzhin gnas// su zhig rab tu zhi brnyed// de dag rnam par spyod pa'i yul// sangs rgyas theg pa bla na med// don kun bzung ba'i rnam grangs yin// mya ngan 'das lam mngon sum ston// rab tu skrod pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// seng gi rnam par grol sogs kun//
297b2(rnying rgyud): rtsa gcig the tshom yul kun rtogs// rab tu mi gnas 'di yi mthus// chu 'bras bye brag sna tshogs pas// don mchog dngos kun bzhag pa'i rdzas// 'di ltar khams gsum rnam par 'khrul// mig yo rab tu gsang ba rnams// thams ca ku
297b3(rnying rgyud): spyod las 'das// chos nyid snying po rjes 'jug dag/ nyid kyi snang ba mya ngan 'das// 'di la rmyi med rkyen tshogs ma skyes pas// sgo sbar mtshan ma'i mtha' bral rnam dag dbyings// dus gsum ston pa'i bden pas mtha' rnams sel// phan gnod pa dag cag sa
297b4(rnying rgyud): mthun gnas gzugs pas// rlud chen gsang ba rang bzhin don gyis 'byung // ngo bos mi kun rab rtogs sprul pa'i yul// sba mchog thams cad mkhyen pa'i gzhi// rnam grangs yon tan tshogs kyi bdag nyid ni// dras kun mi gnyis pha rol gyi
297b5(rnying rgyud): mchog/ rnal 'byor theg mchog rnams kyis gzung bar gyis// don bzhin ston pa'i snang ba byen rlabs shugs// mchog gi blo gros kun gyis bstod pa'i gnas// 'di ltar rgya chen 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// rab btsal byang chub sems 'di gzung bar
297b6(rnying rgyud): gyos// mthar phyin bstan pa'i gnas 'di dus kun du// rab tu bsngags pas sangs rgyas dam pa'i gzhung // zhes sogs rgya cher ston to// rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems/ kun la 'jug pa rnam dag don gyi rgyud ces rjes su mthun pa stong pa spyad pa'i le'u lte
297b7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// // rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems kun la 'dug pa rnam dag ston pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// / phya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang / bod kyi sba ba slar gyi lo ts+tsha pa ga yu sgra snying pos bskur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
298a1(rnying rgyud): myu ga du sa // sa ga sa/ su sa ma/
298a2(rnying rgyud): ga na tham pa ngas ma/ bcom na sam pa nga tid de pa ba med pa gan ga pa cwo 'a pa gyis gi ci ba sa/ byed pas jal zla par 'jo ba zhes thab byung chub sesus dpar dzurnam pa
298a3(rnying rgyud): du na / da pa brjo / // zhes pa 'gas shegs pa gas pa/ sa/
298a4(rnying rgyud): chos kyi rjes bka' stsal ba/ sems dpa' chen pa nyon cig/ shin tun la 'byo rgya yim// rnal 'byor las kyang la 'byor mjug/ daphags pa las kyang 'phags bas na// rdo rje rgyal ba kun gyims// rje btsan dem pa kun tu dang /
298a5(rnying rgyud): chang rgyal 'jigs pa'i thabs// nyams pa'i chad ba blang ba la// mgon btsud la sa gzhan med do// dmachog sem panyid byin pa d+ma// 'gro ba'i mgon mos yang dgra gsungs// sems nyid dngos po med pa la// zhams pa'i chad pa ma kyin/
298a6(rnying rgyud): gcad// gang las nyams teci zhig nyams// gang durnams te ltar nyams// nyams par sems pa nyid yin// spang ba 'dzin pa de nyid yin// sems nyid dag pa'i chung ba sa// dag par ma gyu gang yang med// myong nyid dben pa 'don
298a7(rnying rgyud): rtogs na// bde dang sdug bsngal med yar med// bde dang sdug bsngal sdug mi sdug/ bdag dang bdag med to po shong // de bzhin nyid du 'dzin pa yang // de ni med pas dngo po med// de la tha snar kyi btags kyang // phyog cu zabs par ba /
298b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// ma bcos rang bzhag rig pas mtshon// ji ltar nam mkha' zhig gyur na// de tshe chad pa 'byung bar 'gyur// chos nyid mthong bar gyur pa yang // ji ltar rang gi mdzub rtse la// rang gis rig pa'i dus byung na// de tshe chos nyid mthong bar 'gyur//
298b2(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// byang chub sems rde btsan dam pa rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i rgyud las/ nyams pa chad pa mi 'byung ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// // kye sems dpa' chen po// nyams pa zhes ni gang la bya// chad pa zhes ni ci la bya// nyams
298b3(rnying rgyud): dang chad par 'dzin pa yang // de nyid yin te de mi 'byung // 'bras bu bsgrub dang grub pa ru// 'dod pa des kyang mi rnyed de// mdongs pas nam mkhar bsnyeg pa bzhin// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'di// brtag dka' brjod du rdul tsam
298b4(rnying rgyud): med// drug gi yul bzhin med pas na// so so skye bo'i blos ma reg/ byang chub gang yin sems ni gang // kun gzhi rang byung ye shes la// ngang gis spros med chen po la// che ba'i yon tan btsal du med// de nyid sems yin byang chub sems//
298b5(rnying rgyud): ji ltar me yi rtse mo yis// rdzas kyi dngos po kun bsregs kyang // rang gi dngos po bsreg mi nus// de bzhin byang chub sems kyis kyang // kun shes rang rig ma shes te// gal te shes na shes pa'o// 'di la rtsol bsgrub byar yang med// dag dang mdag
298b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis med de// rang byung dag pa chen po la// med ces bya ba btags pa nyid// btags pa nyid la mi gnas na// byang chub sems lam gnas pa yin// gnas pa nyid na gnas med pas// gnas zhes tha snyad mi gdags so// dus gsum
298b7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas sems las byung // sems pa tha snyad yod ce'am// sems las kun 'byung thams cad sems// sems ni skye med de bzhin nyid// rang gisal thams cad sa le mkhyen// mkhyen pa nyid kyang sems yin par// sems dpa' chen po
299a1(rnying rgyud): rig par gyis// byang chub sems rje btsun dam pa rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i rgyud las/ thams cad sems su bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / kyisams dpa' chen pa/ sems las 'khor bu rnams cad byung // mngan das
299a2(rnying rgyud): pa de bzhin te// byung ba yin nyid nyid yin// yin zhes bya ba mtshon pa tsam// yang dag nyid la yin pa med// kun yin gang yang min pa'i phyir// ngas kyang yang dag rig pa bzhin// skal ldan rnams kyis shes par bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' gzhan yang
299a3(rnying rgyud): nI// nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub las// rkye ci log nyid byang chub ste// yang dag pa nyid sbyin ci log/ thams cad sems kyis byas pa yin// sems nyid rang la med pas na// ra byung ye shes dngu la yod// gal te dang la mod na ni// de ni rang byung yi nas
299a4(rnying rgyud): men// gzhan la btsal zhing bslab dgos pas// chu rkyen gnyis la rag lus pas// / de la rung byung ye shes med// su dang glen la rag ma lus// rang gsal nyag gcig dri ma med// n+ya rkyen pabaskyed rang byung ste// ma sgribs gas la bas ye shes so//
299a5(rnying rgyud): gdod nas snying po byang chub la// btsal ba'i bsam pas dbyings me bskyod// 'dir bstan de la brten nas ni// snum pa'i thabs kyis brkyang ba'i phyir// 'tshams par mdzad pa'i skyes bu la// rig pa'i don 'di bstan par bya// gal te don 'di ma shes shing //
299a6(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi du med na// rgyal ba rnams kyang skyes par 'gyur// gal te gzhan la rtsol ba ni// 'o ma 'dod pa'i btsun mo zhig/ rnal 'jo ba'i btsun mo des// dralas ngo ma rnyed mi 'gyur// 'di las kun kyang 'di la son// 'di las ma byung gcig
299a7(rnying rgyud): kyang med// byang chub sems rje btsad rnam pa rdo rje 'od 'gro ba'i rgyud las/ thams cad sems las byung bar bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas rdo rje sems dpas gsol ba/ kye bcom ldan 'das sems kyi ngo bo gang lags/ bcom
299b1(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sems dpa' chen po sems kyi rang gi ngo bo ni// ci yang min las cir yang snang // dpag med brjod bral bsam mi khyab// 'di zhes mtshon du med pa ni// sems kyi ngo bor de gsungs so// 'gro ba'i sdug
299b2(rnying rgyud): bsngal snang ba yang // rang yin gzhan las de mi 'byung // bde dang thar dang longs spyod kyang // chos nyid dbyings las ma gtogs pa// rdul cha tsam yang med par gsungs// sku dang rgyan gyi 'khor lo yang // rang gi sems yin gzhan na med//
299b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun yang // rang yin de las gzhan na med// de phyir bkur ba'i yul yang med// bsrung med bsgrub med rtsol ba med// kha dog dbyibs dang gnas ris med// bde dang sdug bsngal rgyu 'bras med// med pa ma yin kun
299b4(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid// yod pa ma yin brjod du med// bdag med gzhan med 'chi 'pho med// med pa ma yin thams cad 'byung // 'byung ba ma yin de nyid yin// kun gcig ye shes khyab pa'i ngang // nam mkha'i chu yi ro mthun bzhin// dbye bsal med/
299b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i don du gcig/ 'di ni rang rig byang chub sems// 'di zhes bstan du med pa'o// ci yang med las cir yang snang // rang byung snying po mchog gi don// snang ba nyid na snad med pas// snang ba med pa'i tshul gyis snang // med ces bya ba 'dzin
299b6(rnying rgyud): pa tsam// de nyid la yang gnas mi bya// gal te gnas na go la sa yin// gang zhig gol te ci zhig gol// gang du gol te ji ltar gol// gol bar snang ba de nyid yin// de nyid dngos po med pas na// de phyir de la gnas mi bya// gal te gnas na
299b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa yin/ zhes gsungs pas rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid la gnas par gyur to// byang chub sems rje btsan dam pa rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i rgyud las// sems kyi ngo bo bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / kye sems dpa' chen po sems kyi yon tan
300a1(rnying rgyud): ngas bshad kyis// sems dpa' khyod kyis mnyan par byos// sems kyi yon tan chen po ni// stong gsum rdul snyed sangs rgyas kyis// bskal pa bye bar brjod byas kyang // de la brjod par mi nus te// de ni ma bsgribs kun tu
300a2(rnying rgyud): gsal// de ni kun gyi snying po nyid// sdug bsngal bye bas gdungs pas kyang // de la g.yos pa rdul tsam med// bde dang sdug bsngal thams cad kun// de yi longs spyod chen po ste// de yi dus na der mi 'dzin// ci yang mi dmigs chos kyi sku// cho 'phrul
300a3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin de la 'gyed// 'gyed pa ma yin de nyid yin// spos med bsdu med yi ge med// rtsis las 'dras pas lhun grub sku// der gzhol der ni mchod pa'i sprin// klong du gnas pa'i sgrub thabs so// ngang gis mi ldog dngos grub las// don du phyag rgya
300a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa yin// 'di yi don rtogs skyes bu ni// bkur ba med cing bzlas brjod med// mchod pa med cing bsgom po med// bsrung ba med cing rtog pa med// spang med blang med byang chub sems// ched du bya med thams cad rdzogs// 'di ni rang byung rgyal po
300a5(rnying rgyud): yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// 'bras bu kun gyi btsud bsdus yin// rang bzhin gsal bas mun pa med// de ltar snang ba ma lus kun// 'di las byung zhing 'di la 'dus// skyon dang yon tan gnyis med de// blang medo dor med 'pho
300a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur med// byas pa med par thams cad 'grub// phyin pa med par thams cad son// bstan pa med par kun la go// 'di ni sems kyi yon tan zhes// bcom ldan kun tu bzang pos gsungs// byang chub sems rje btsan dam pa rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i rgyud
