384b3(rnying rgyud): gyi ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis// bsgoms pas nges par 'byin par bshad pa ni// rang bzhin bcu dra dgongs pas bshad pa yang // skye ba med pa'i don du bsdus te bstan// skye med rtogs pa'i don las ma yengs pas// bsgom pa'i mdo lung
384b4(rnying rgyud): bcu ru bsdus te bstan// 'di las 'phros shing thams cad 'dir 'dus pas// kun gyi rtsa ba don gyi 'grel pa'i lung// kun byed nga ye sras su gyur pa la// ming gis don mtshon ste med rtogs phyir bstun// kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par nan tan gyis//
384b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi lung // kun byed rgyal pos bsdus pa'i rtsa ba 'di// sems dpa' rdo rje legs par rtogs 'gyur na// rgyal ba'i rgyal pa kun byed rgyal por 'gyur// de phyir kun byed nga yi 'khor rnams la// sems dpa' rdo rjes don 'di lung ston
384b6(rnying rgyud): cig/ skye med byang chub sems su lung ston cig/ 'khor 'das dbyings su gcig par lung ston cig/ rgyu 'bras dus gcig rdzogs par lung ston cig/ ces gsungs so// byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las dgongs don lde mig gi le'u ste brgyang cu
384b7(rnying rgyud): rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rjes gus pa'i tshul gyis bstod pa/ kye ston pa'i sngon po kun byed rgyal po khyod// dus gsum rgyal ba'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings// 'khor ba mi spong thugs rje phyogs ra
385a1(rnying rgyud): stan pa kun byed rgyal gcod la 'dung// smyon pa'i ston pa bung byed rgyal ba stong// 'das pa' sangs rgyas kun kyang khyod kyis thas// ma bAn pa dung du ltar byeng byung mang// smyan pa kun byeng rdul ga/ khyod la 'jud/ shAtan pa ben pa
385a2(rnying rgyud): kun byed rgyal po khyod// khams gsum sring gsum med mkhyen khyod kyis byas// rang 'byung byangang chu kyiN+Da lnga dang // ye shes lngabs sun byed khyod la 'du/ bye ston pa smon pa kun byed rgyal ba byed// mu gsam ston pa gsum mye / byad gyis byas//
385a3(rnying rgyud): gsum rdzags gsam ma gus pan byas pas// smyod pa gan byed tshul po spyad pa 'dra // d+ha pa'i ston pa zin bye na pa po khyod// thugs pa 'khrugs pa'i gnas kya khyod gyis zas// 'khong gyi dang ma srung 'ang nyid las byung // ston pa kun byed rgyal
385a4(rnying rgyud): la 'dud// kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod// 'dus pa'i 'khor yang nges par khyod kyis byas// bstan pa gsum yang nges par khyod kyis byas// kun byed rgyal po nyid la phyag 'tshal 'dud// kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod// zag med shes
385a5(rnying rgyud): rab rtogs pa gsum bstan pas// 'khor gyi mun pa'i dkyil 'khor snang mdzad pa// kun byed rgyal po nyid la phyag 'tshal 'dud// kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod// nyid kyi thugs gcig dang 'byung ye shes las// 'byung zhing srung pa'i rtsa ba khyod nyid
385a6(rnying rgyud): pas// rjes kyi snying pa khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// kye ston pa'i ston pa phrin byed rgyal po khyod// ma rig pa pi la ma nibs pa nas kyang // ye shes snang ba kun du mched par byed// smyon pa kun byed rgyal po khyed la 'drang// kye ji ltar snang po'i rdzas ni zams ma
385a7(rnying rgyud): rang 'du nyid pas rna rkyen kun dgas// mang oM sbyi bang ba dgas pa pasan/ shes par bye / sna ba ga ti mtha' du sa me / ra gyi byung gnas pas /
385b1(rnying rgyud): 'dug las 'das rnam par ni// su zhig 'jug cing dmigs dang dad pa dag/ 'di la dman dang dam par dmigs med pas// mi rtsol ba de la gnas shing dbugs phyin 'gyur// chos kyi rtsa ba kun byed rgyal po las// ji ltar gdus pa rtsol sgrub kun dang bral//
385b2(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rjes su bstod pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rjes legs par 'dun nas zhus pa/ kye ston pa'i ston pa kuni byed rgyal po lags//
385b3(rnying rgyud): ji ltar snang zhing grags pa'i chos rnams kun// rang 'byung ye shes gcig tu bstan pa'i mdo// chos kyi rtsa ba kun byed rgyal po'i rgyud// phyi rabs rnal 'byor gang dang gang dag las// bstan cing gdams pa legs par bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas
385b4(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos skal ldan la gdams pa'i don 'di gsungs so// kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par dkon rdzogs/ ston pa'i ston pa gun byed rgyal po ngas// ji ltar snang zhing grags pa'i chos rnams kun// ngas byas byed pang byer 'gyur snang po'i don//
385b5(rnying rgyud): gzhi rtsa kun 'das snying po byang chub rgya// dgongs pa mngon du byung ba'i mdo lung 'di// dad dang dam tshig brtson 'grus che ba dang // snying rje yi ring sgo dang yid ldog med// lus dang tha dang chung ma brin dang nor// gang la'ang mchags dad dang dga' bas 'bral// 'di dag dang
385b6(rnying rgyud): dam tshig rtags yin pas// snying po'i don dang ldan pas sbyin par bya// grags pa spang zhing nga rgyal bral ba dang // dam pa snying po'i don phyir lus srog phangs pa med// bka' las mi 'da' rtags dang ldan pa la// snying po don dang skye med bstan pa sbyin// gang gis snying
385b7(rnying rgyud): po'i bstan pa bdag thob na// 'jig rten mtshan mas bdag la ci bgyi ste// thob na bdag gis dka' ba sgrub po zhes// dam bca' legs par gnas na bstan pa sbyin// ji srid bdag dang slob dpon 'tsho ba'i bar// lus dang srog gi 'brel pa ma mchis par// khyod
386a1(rnying rgyud): kyi bka' bzhin bsgrub cas gnas par la// brtan du srang po kun byung rgyal po b+h+yon// mdor na lus dang srog kyang 'phrug bya zhing // rdzas dang shing yul dang 'gros smos dgas// gal tu bdag la dgos par ma gyur kyang // dam pas bla tu
386a2(rnying rgyud): mchog gsum la 'bul// kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis// snod yin log pa'i gang zag bstan pa ni// grogs dang 'jig rten chos la dga' ba dang // dmyal dam par mi bkur yid thung ldog/ 'phyar zhing rdzas dadu dad par mi ldan te// rang tshod
386a3(rnying rgyud): nyams len pa can thabs 'dod pa dang // bstan pa yongs la 'phel zhing mi mthun zhing // sgo skur bdag gzhan gnod sems bsgom pa min// 'di la mi bstan mchog tu gsang bar bya// sngon du rtags dang ngang pa brtag bya'i phyir// rin chen dbyig dang rdzas
386a4(rnying rgyud): pas gus mnod kyis// chags sems nga rgyal gzhan sems ma nges la// de la kun byed rgyal po bstan mi bya// snying po'i don la blang dor mi gnas kyang // mi ma yin dang 'byung pos par gcod cing // mkha' 'gro grub pa can gyis gnyis ka la// dus yin 'ching
386a5(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa'i dbang gyur nas// sgo skur dbang gis snying po'i thig badrug// de bas rigs ngan gang zag spang bar bya// 'jig rten zhen pa dbul zhing rgyud brtag phyir// lus dang longs spyod bla ma sA bu ni blangs la// dus dang mi rus khyad par rtags ldan nas// snying po
386a6(rnying rgyud): don bstan kun byed rgyal po sbyin// zhes gsungs so// byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po lngas bsten pa gang la gzhag pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu rtswa gsum pa'o// // de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rjes legs par mdangs
386a7(rnying rgyud): phyung ste mdun nas zhus pa/ kyi ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags// nyid kyi thugs gcig rang 'byung ye shes las// skal ldan dus gcig grol bar mdzad pa'i mdo// mtshan gyi khyad par bdag la bshad du gsol// zhes zhes so// de nas byang chub
386b1(rnying rgyud): sems kun byed rtul pos mtshan gyi rnam grangs rnam par bye ba 'di gsungs so// kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis// mtshan gyi khyad par phye ste bshad pa ni// ji ltar sdang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun// ma lus kun byas byed cing byed 'gyur te//
386b2(rnying rgyud): nyid la bya mi dgos te ldan grub pas// kun byed rgyal po zhes su bstan pa yin// kye snying po de la dri ma med pa dang // ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i don ldan pas// 'di la btsal zhing sgrub pa mi mnga' ste// byang chub sems zhes nges par bstan pa yin/
386b3(rnying rgyud): ma gdod nas grub pa'i chos nyid la// rgyu dang rkyen med btsal med snying po 'di// ma bsgribs kun la phyogs ris med gsal bas// rang 'gyur ye shes zhes su bstan pa yin// kye ji ltar sdang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun// ma bcos ji bzhin dngal ku
386b4(rnying rgyud): snang bas// phyogs ris gnyis su chad pa'i don med de// bka' yi 'grel pa chos kyi me long yin// kye ji bzhin ma bcos snying po rnal ma la// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa 'byung sdud pa// blang ngor 'dzin chags rgya las rnam grol te// snying po don gyi
386b5(rnying rgyud): theg pa bstan pa yin// blo 'das dang ma byon de ltar rgyal ba la// skye med 'di las ma gzigs mi dgongs pas// ma bArngo sa thig le gzung 'dzin las 'das pas// lta ba'i me long zhes su bsan pa yin// kye nga ni ma bcos je bzhin snying po la//
386b6(rnying rgyud): 'dogs spang 'debs don lus kun 'das te// dus gsum N+Dal ba las byung bstan// rgyal ba'i blam zhes ngas byar bstan pa yin// snres bcos ste skyed kun byed rgyal po la// ma bAtsal dgos pa'i yon tan tshad rdzogs pas// btsal zhing bsgrub pa kun lam rji
386b7(rnying rgyud): pasen// da kyi rgyam grozhes sre sbyin payin// rgya ma rjes dron pa ma na byu ga pas// nga ngas sro sbya bral// gcig mi 'galangan drug phyin pa// ma bcomangon kyi lung du rgya pa yin/ spyod pa sngon pa kun bya pa ba du/
387a1(rnying rgyud): kya/ pa// kyi mau byang chub sems dang da bu 'dang// gas zad byu za zan \u0f7fna gnas par// bran gyi mnan mdo nga brtan pa yin// rnam dag pa yi mun bsal ba yin// ye shas snang ba mdzad par byung ba yas// sdug pasngal na su na
387a2(rnying rgyud): bar byed pa yin// snying po dod pa goms par byed pa man pa rig pa mi da' rab nas// skye med kyang chub sems ni 'dzin bstan // \u0f88\u0f90 la wAn rdul brjir mi ga dang ldan pa nga// tha ba med pa'i rang bzhin tho bar brjod// zag par yang
387a3(rnying rgyud): bka' yardzogs can dade// yang dag nying po wang dang ldan rnams rgyas// rang bzhin bad par gdus nagasas pa dang brag// ma bcis ma 'dur rgyag kyang rtsol ba med// sed ni ston pa kun byang rgyal po ste// theg pa'i rtse bcos kyi byung po'i zang // chu gsum ldan
387a4(rnying rgyud): pas mags pas che ba// skye ba med par ston pa'i sems chud 'di// dus gsum rgyal bas sngon chad ma gsungs te// phyi ma me gsung nga ltar ston mi mdzad// kun byed rgyal pos 'pho 'gyur mi mnga' bas// smra bar gsungs shid gyis kyang gsung 'phru
387a5(rnying rgyud): la// da lta dbyung bar gsungs pas bral ldan pa// nges pa byasan pas pabang med sgrol bu'i phreng // dado bud mngon du bstan pa'i bkang chung 'di// mi 'phel ma nub snang po 'dzin pa la// sran byed rgyal po ngas par myong la gtad// ces gsungs so// byang chub
387a6(rnying rgyud): sems pan byed rgyal po las mtshan gyi rnam grangs bstan pa'i phyi ste brgyad curtsa bzhi pa'o// byang chub kyi sems par byed rgyal po lci ba nam mkha' ltar mtha' dbus med pa'i rgyud nam mkha'i snying po mchog gi don gsang ba mchog gi mdo grang brgyang brtse ba/
387a7(rnying rgyud): pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya bar gyi mkhan po dpal gyi seng ge mgon po dang dge slong po ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan pa phab pa/
